articles.title: Kumuka 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tichaongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kumuka"

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane Chitsauko 11, ndima 21-25, uye titange kuverenga;

Marita akati kuna Jesu, "Ishe, dai maiva pano, hanzvadzi yangu ingadai isina kufa. Kunyange nazvino ndinoziva kuti zvose zvamuchakumbira, Mwari achazvipiwa kwamuri." ,” akadaro Marita, “kuti uchamukazve pakumuka.” Jesu akati kwaari: “Ndini kumuka noupenyu, unotenda kwandiri, kunyange akafa.

Jesu akati: "Ndini kumuka noupenyu! Ani nani unotenda kwandiri, kunyange akafa, uchararama" Ameni

(1) Muprofita Eriya akanyengetera kuna Mwari, uye mwana wacho akararama

Shure kwaizvozvi, mukadzi akanga ari tenzikadzi weimba, mwanakomana wake akarwara zvokuti akapererwa nemhepo (zvinoreva kuti akafa).
(Mweya wemwana uchiri mumuviri wake, uye mupenyu)

... Eria akawira pamusoro pomwana katatu, akachema kuna Jehovha, akati, Jehovha Mwari wangu, ndinokumbira kuti mweya womwana uyu udzokere kumuviri wake .Muviri wake anorarama. 1 Madzimambo 17:17,21-22

(2) Muprofita Erisha akamutsiridza mwanakomana womukadzi muShunemi

Mwana akati achikura, akaenda kuna baba vake nokuvakohwi, akati kuna baba vake, "Musoro wangu, musoro wangu; akamutora, akamupa kuna mai vake; mwana akagara pamakumbo amai vake, akafa masikati.
...Erisha akapinda mumba akawana mwana akafa, akarara pamubhedha wake.

....Akabva aburuka, akafamba-famba mumba imomo, ndokukwira ndokuzvambarara mwana akahotsira kanomwe ndokuvhura maziso. 2 Madzimambo 4:18-20, 32, 35

(3) Munhu akafa paakabata mapfupa aErisha, munhu akanga afa wacho aimutswa

Erisha akafa akavigwa. Pazuva reGore Idzva, boka revaMoabhi rakapinda nechisimba munyika yacho hupenyu ndokusimuka. 2 Madzimambo 13:20-21

(4)Israel →→ Kumuka kwemapfupa

muporofita anoprofita → Izirayeri → Mhuri yese yakaponeswa

Akati kwandiri, "Mwanakomana womunhu, mapfupa aya angamuka here?"
Zvino akati kwandiri: Porofita kumapfupa awa, uti,
Inzwai shoko raJehovha, imi mapfupa akaoma.
Zvanzi naIshe Jehovha kumapfupa aya:
“Ndichaita kuti mweya upinde mamuri,
Unenge wava kurarama.
Ndichakupai marunda, ndikupei nyama, nokukufukidzai neganda, nokuisa mweya mukati menyu, murarame; zvino muchaziva kuti ndini Jehovha.

"....Jehovha akati kwandiri: "Mwanakomana womunhu, Mapfupa aya ndiyo mhuri yose yaIsraeri . .. Reference Ezekieri 37:3-6,11

Hama, handidi kuti musaziva chakavanzika ichi (kuti murege kufunga kuti makachenjera), kuti vaIsraeri vane moyo mikukutu; kusvikira uwandu hwevaHedheni hwazara , Ipapo vaIsraeri vose vachaponeswa . Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi:

“Muponesi achabva paZioni, uye achabvisa chivi chose cheimba yaJakobho.” Uye zvakare: “Iyi ndiyo sungano yangu navo, pandichabvisa chivi chavo.”

Ndakanzwa izvozvo pakati pamarudzi ose aIsiraeri Chisimbiso Nhamba yacho i144,000. Zvakazarurwa 7:4

(Cherekedza: Mukati mevhiki imwe, hafu yevhiki! VaIsraeri vakaiswa chisimbiso naMwari → vakapinda mumireniyamu → uko kwaiva kuzadzikiswa kwechiporofita chechiporofita. Pashure peJubheri reQian → mhuri yose yaIsraeri yakaponeswa)

guta dzvene Jerusarema →→ mwenga, mukadzi wegwayana

Mumwe wevatumwa vanomwe vakanga vane ndiro nomwe dzendarama dzizere namatambudziko manomwe okupedzisira akauya kwandiri akati, “Uya pano, uye ndichakuratidza mwenga, mukadzi weGwayana.
Mazita emarudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri
“Ndakafemerwa noMweya Mutsvene, vatumwa vakandiisa kugomo refu, vakandiratidza guta dzvene Jerusarema, rakaburuka kudenga richibva kuna Mwari; rakanga rakaita sebwe rinokosha kwazvo, sejasipa, rinoonekera sekristaro.
Mazita evaapositori gumi nevaviri vegwayana

Kurutivi rwamabvazuva kuna masuwo matatu, masuwo matatu kurutivi rwokumusoro, masuwo matatu kurutivi rwezasi, uye masuwo matatu kumavirira. Rusvingo rweguta rune nheyo gumi nembiri, uye pamusoro penheyo dzacho pane mazita evaapositori gumi nevaviri veGwayana. Zvakazarurwa 21:9-14

( Cherechedza: Madzinza ane gumi nemaviri aIsraeri + vaapostora gumi nevaviri veGwayana,
Chechi yeIsrael + Chechi yeMamwe Marudzi

Chechi ndiyo imwe chete! )

Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?)

(5) Nomunyengetero: Kumutswa kwaTabhita naDhokasi

PaJopa pakanga pano mumwe mudzidzikadzi, ainzi Tabhita, zvichireva kuti Dhokasi (kureva kuti mhara) aiita mabasa akanaka uye aipa zvizhinji. Panguva iyoyo, akarwara ndokufa.

...Petro akavaudza kuti vabude vose, akapfugama ndokunyengetera . Mabasa 9:36-37, 40

(6) Jesu akamutsa vana vaJairosi

Jesu paakadzoka, vanhu vazhinji vakasangana naye nokuti vose vakanga vakamumirira. Zvino kwakauya murume wainzi Jairosi, mutungamiriri wesinagoge, akawira patsoka dzaJesu, akakumbira kuti apinde mumba make; Jesu akati achienda, vanhu vazhinji vakamuunganira.

.... Jesu akati asvika kumba kwake, hapana akabvumirwa kupinda naye kunze kwaPetro, Johani, Jakobho, uye vabereki vomwanasikana wake. Vanhu vose vakachema vachizvirova zvipfuva nokuda kwomwanasikana. Jesu akati, “Musachema! akadzoka , uye pakarepo akasimuka uye Jesu akamuudza kuti amupe zvokudya.

(7) Jesu akati: “Ndini kumuka noupenyu.

1 Rufu rwaRazaro

Kwakanga kune mumwe murume airwara ainzi Razaro, aigara muBhetani, mumusha waMaria nomukoma wake Marita. .. Jesu apedza kutaura mashoko aya, akati kwavari, Shamwari yedu Razaro avata, ndichamumutsa Akataura pamusoro porufu rwake, asi ivo vakafunga kuti akanga avete sezvaaisiita mazuva ose, akati kwavari, “Razaro afa. Johane 11:1, 11-14

2 Jesu akati, “Ndini kumuka noupenyu anotenda kwandiri, kunyange akafa, achararama.

Jesu paakasvika akawana Razaro ava nemazuva mana ari muguva.
...Marita akati kuna Jesu, "Ishe, dai manga muri pano, hanzvadzi yangu ingadai isina kufa. Kunyange nazvino ndinoziva kuti zvose zvamuchakumbira kuna Mwari, Mwari achakupai." achamukazve.” Marita akati, “Ndinoziva kuti achamukazve pakumuka kwaMobhai.

” Jesu akati kwaari, “Ndini kumuka noupenyu. Unotenda kwandiri, kunyange akafa, uchararamazve;

3 Jesu akamutsa Razaro kubva kuvakafa

Jesu akagomerazve mumwoyo make uye akasvika paguva, rakanga riri bako munzira. Jesu akati, Bvisai ibwe.
Marita, hanzvadzi yewakafa, akati kwaari: Ishe, unofanira kunhuhwa zvino; nekuti wava nemazuva mana afa ?" Vakabvisa ibwe.

Jesu akatarira kudenga akati: “Baba, ndinokutendai nokuti mandinzwa, uye ndinoziva kuti munogara muchindinzwa, asi ndinotaura izvi nokuda kwavose vamire pano, kuti vatende kuti mandituma.” Akati ataura izvozvo, akadanidzira nenzwi guru achiti, “Razaro, buda!” Murume akanga afa akabuda, maoko ake netsoka zvakapombwa nemucheka akati kwavari: Musunungurei, mumurege aende

Cherechedzai : Mashoko ataurwa pamusoro apa inzira yaMwari yekumutsa vakafa kuburikidza neminyengetero yevanhu, mikumbiro uye kuporesa! Uye munhu wose ngaaone nemaziso ake Ishe Jesu achimutsa Razaro.

Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Ndini kumuka noupenyu. Ani naani anotenda kwandiri, kunyange akafa, achararama.

Ishe Jesu akati: “Munhu wose anorarama uye anotenda mandiri haazombofi. Izvi zvinorevei? ) Unotenda izvi here?” Johane 11:26

Kuti uenderere mberi, tarisa kugovera traffic "Kumuka" 2

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

articles.title: Kumuka 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekudzidza kuyanana uye kugovera "Kumuka"

Chidzidzo 2; Jesu Kristu akamuka kubva kuvakafa akatibereka patsva

Takavhura Bhaibheri pana 1 Petro Chitsauko 1:3-5 , uye tinoverenga pamwe chete kuti: Mwari naBaba vaShe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe, maererano nengoni dzake huru, akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa achishandisa Jesu Kristu kuberekwa patsva mutariro mhenyu munhaka isingaori, isina kusvibiswa, isingasvavi, yamakachengeterwa kudenga. Imi munochengetwa nesimba raMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muchakwanisa kugamuchira ruponeso rwakagadzirirwa kuratidzwa mumazuva ekupedzisira.

1. Jesu Kristu akamuka kubva kuvakafa uye akatibereka patsva

bvunza: ani naani anorarama uye anotenda kwandiri haangatongofi. Unotenda izvi here?
Jesu airevei paakataura izvi?

Nokuti Rugwaro zvakare runoti, vanhu vakatemerwa kufa kamwe chete, uye shure kwaizvozvo kune kutongwa. VaHebheru 9:27

mhinduro :Kuzvarwa patsva! Pfekai hupenyu hwaKristu, munhu mutsva anozvarwa patsva haafi. Ameni!

unofanira kuberekwa patsva

Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: Unofanira kuberekwa patsva, usashamiswa. Verenga Johani 3:7

Jesu Kristu akamuka kubva kuvakafa!

Kuberekwa patsva → → Isu:

1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya - Johane 3:5
2 Akazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri - 1 VaKorinte 4:15 naJakobho 1:18

3 Akaberekwa naMwari - Johane 1:12-13

bvunza : Akaberekwa naAdhamu?
Akazvarwa naJesu Kristu?
Chii chakasiyana?

mhinduro :Detailed tsananguro pazasi

(1) Adhamu akaitwa neguruva — Genesisi 2:7

Adhama akava munhu mupenyu nomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti nyama)— 1 VaK 15:45

→→Vana vaakabereka vakasikwawo, nyama nevhu.

(2)Adam wokupedzisira Jesu

→→Ishoko rakaitwa nyama—Johani 1:14;
Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari - Johane 1:1-2
→Mwari akava nyama;
Mudzimu waMwari - Johane 4:24
→Mweya wakava nyama nomweya;

Naizvozvo, Jesu akaberekwa naBaba - ona vaHebheru 1:5.

Jesu Kristu akamuka kubva kuvakafa → anotibereka patsva Ameni

Isu takazvarwa patsva ( Newcomer ) inogadzirwawo neShoko, rakaitwa naMwari, rakaitwa neMweya Mutsvene, rakazvarwa neshoko rechokwadi raJesu Kristu kuburikidza nokutenda muvhangeri, rakaberekwa naBaba Vekudenga, muviri wemweya) nokuti tiri nhengo dzemuviri wake (mimwe mipumburu yekare inowedzera: Mafupa ake nenyama yake). Verenga VaEfeso 5:30

(3) Adamu akatyora chibvumirano mubindu reEdheni - tarisa kuna Genesisi Zvitsauko 2 ne3
Adamu akatyora mutemo akatadza → akatengeswa kuchivi.
Sevazukuru vaAdhamu, takatengeswawo kuchivi patakanga tiri panyama - tarisa kuna VaRoma 7:14
Mubairo wechivi rufu - Ona VaRoma 6:23
Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza. VaRoma 51:12
Muna Adhamu vose vachafa. Ona 1 VaKorinte 15:22
→ Naizvozvo zvakatemerwa kuti munhu wose afe kamwe chete ---Rejera VaHebheru 9:27
→Muvambi Adhamu akanga ari guruva uye achadzokera kuguruva - tarisa kuna Genesisi 3:19

→Muviri wedu wekare wakabva kuna Adhamu, uyewo ivhu uye uchadzokera kuguruva.

(4) Jesu akanga asina chivi uye akanga asina chivi

hapana chivi
Munoziva kuti Jehovha akazviratidza kuti abvise chivi chomunhu, asi maari hamuna chivi. 1 Johani 3:5

hapana mhosva

Haana kuita chivi, uye kunyengera kwakanga kusina mumuromo make. 1 Petro 2:22
Nokuti muprista wedu mukuru haagoni kutinzwira tsitsi pautera hwedu. Akaedzwa pazvinhu zvose sesu, asi asina chivi. VaHebheru 4:15

2. Jesu Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa

→→Vana vanozvarwa patsva havana zvivi uye havatadzi

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna 1 Johane 3:9, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari;

bvunza :Jesu akamutswa→Ko vanhu vatsva vakazvarwa patsva vachine zvitadzo here?

mhinduro : haana mhosva

bvunza :VaKristu vakazvarwa patsva vangatadza here?

mhinduro :kuzvarwa patsva( Newcomer ) haazopara mhosva

bvunza :Sei?

mhinduro :Detailed tsananguro pazasi

(1) Munhu wose akaberekwa naMwari →→ (mutsva)

1 Usatadza - 1 Johane 3:9
2 Haungatadzi- 1 Johane 5:18

3 Uyewo haangatadzi- 1 Johane 3:9

(Vanhu vakazvarwa patsva, sei musingatadzi? Mwari vachataura nemubhaibheri! Haufanire kutaura kana kupokana, nekuti unobva wakanganisa paunongotaura. Chero uchitenda muchirevo chemweya che Mashoko aMwari, mavhesi eBhaibheri anotevera achapindura:)

4 Nokuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari, haangatadzi 1 Johane 3:9
5 Nokuti akaberekwa naMwari - 1 Johane 3:9
(Munhu wose mutsva akaberekwa naMwari anogara muna Kristu uye agere naKristu mumwoyo yenyu nomunzvimbo dzokudenga. Abba! Ruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba. Ameni!)
6 Ani nani anogara maari haatadzi Johane 3:6
7 Kana Mweya achigara mamuri, hamuchisiri venyama, asi veMweya - VaRoma 8:9
8 Nokuti iwe (mutana) wakafa, iwe ( Newcomer ) Upenyu hwaKristu hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari - VaKorose 3:3
9 Akatimutsawo (vanhu vatsva) uye akatigarisa pamwe chete munzvimbo dzokudenga naKristu Jesu - VaEfeso 2:6
10Muviri unodyarwa ( earthy ), chinomutswa muviri wemweya ( zvemweya ) Kana kune muviri wenyama, panofanirawo kuva nemuviri wemweya. 1 VaKorinte 15:44
11 Iye chisikwa chitsva - tarira kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:17

12 Akaberekwa naMwari ( Newcomer ) hazvionekwe - tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 4:16-18

Cherechedza: Mupositora Pauro akati muna 2 Vakorinde 4:18 → Nekuti isu hatine hanya ne tarisa "Ndinokuwona( murume mukuru) , asi nzvimbo yekutarisira" tarisa "Kushaikwa ( Newcomer ); Uyu murume wekare ari kuwedzera zvishoma nezvishoma nokuda kwokunyengera (chivi) kwezvishuvo zvoudyire - VaEfeso 4:22 → Muviri wokunze womunhu wekare uri kuparadzwa zuva nezuva - nongedzera kuna 2 VaKorinte 4:16 . Nekuti maziso anogona kuona ( murume mukuru ), inyama yakaberekwa naAdhamu uye iri yenyama Iye akatengeswa kuchivi Kana akatadza nokuda kwomuedzo wokuchiva kwenyama nezvishuvo zvake, zvishoma nezvishoma achava akaipa uye anoparadzwa pakutanga guruva, uye acharamba achidzokera kuguruva pashure pemakore zana .

Mubvunzo: Munhu wedu mutsva akazvarwa patsva aripi?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Uye izvo zvisingaoneki ( Newcomer )Mucheka wemvere! Sezvambotaurwa: Jesu Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa uye akaberekwazve ( Newcomer ) ndiko kugara muna Kristu, kuvanzwa naKristu muna Mwari, kuva naKristu munzvimbo dzokudenga, uye kugara kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba, uye mumwoyo yenyu → sezvakataurwa naPauro muna VaRoma 7:22! Nokuti maererano nechirevo changu chemukati (chinyorwa chepakutanga munhu) → munhu asingaoneki anogara mumwoyo yenyu ndiye munhu mutsva akamutswa pamwe chete naKristu uye ari muviri wemweya meso asina kupfeka. Muviri wemweya unobatanidzwa neupenyu Kristu hupenyu, idyai chikafu chemweya cheupenyu, inwai mvura mhenyu yechitubu cheupenyu, muvandudzwe zuva nezuva muna Kristu uye mukure muve murume, azere nechimiro chekuzara kwaKristu Pazuva iro, Jesu Kristu achazviita uya paanouya zvakare, akaberekwa patsva Murume mutsva acharatidzwa uye aratidzwa → rumuko rwakanyanya kunaka! Ameni. Sezvinoita nyuchi inoburitsa “mahosi” mumukoko wayo, “mahosi enyuchi” akakura uye akapfava kupfuura dzimwe nyuchi. Munhu wedu mutsva ndiye mumwe chetewo muna Kristu. Achamutswa uye achaonekwa mireniyumu isati yasvika, uye achatonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru, achatonga naJesu Kristu kudenga idzva nenyika itsva nokusingaperi! Ameni.

Chero mutendi anoona, anonzwa uye anonzwisisa shoko rechokwadi achasarudza kubatana nesu “Chechi munaShe Jesu Kristu” Kereke ine huvepo hweMweya Mutsvene uye nekuparidza evhangeri yechokwadi. Nokuti mhandara dzakachenjera dzine marambi mumaoko avo uye dzakagadzirira mafuta mumidziyo, mhandara dzakachenjera dzinonzwisisa dzidziso yechokwadi yevhangeri, dzinotsigira dzidziso yechokwadi, uye dzinonzwisisa munhu mutsva akaberekwa patsva, vatsvene, havana chitadzo, uye havagoni kutadza . , imhandara, hadzina gwapa! Kufanana nevanhu 144 000 vari kutevera Gwayana. Ameni!

Kune makereke mazhinji anodzidzisawo Bhaibheri, sezvakangoitawo mamwe makereke haana huvepo hweMweya Mutsvene uye havaparidzi dzidziso yechokwadi yevhangeri vhiki imwe neimwe, uye havagoni kunzwisisa zvavari kunzwa!Kana usina kudya nokunwa zvokudya zvomweya zvoupenyu, usina kuberekwa patsva, uye usina kupfeka (munhu mutsva) Kristu, unova netsitsi nokushama. Naizvozvo Ishe Jesu akatsiura machechi iwayo akaita seRaodhikia → Iwe wakati: Ndakapfuma, ndakawana pfuma, uye handishayiwi chinhu; Ndinokukumbirai kuti mutenge kwandiri ndarama yakaidzwa mumoto, kuti mufume, nenguvo chena, kuti murege kuonekwa, namadonhwe ameso, kuzodza meso enyu, kuti muone. Zvakazarurwa 3:17-18

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Chenjedzo: Une nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe.

Vanhu vanotungamirirwa neMweya Mutsvene vachazvinzwisisa pavanenge vangozvinzwa, asi vamwe vanhu havazvinzwisise kunyange vakazvinzwa? Kunewo vanhu vanoomesa mitsipa uye vanoramba nzira yechokwadi, vanoparadza nzira yechokwadi, uye vanotambudza vana vaMwari, pakupedzisira, vachatengesa Jesu nevana vaMwari.
Naizvozvo, kana paine munhu asinganzwisisi, ngaanyengetere kuna Mwari achizvininipisa uye atsvake, uye achawana; Ameni
Asi haufaniri kuramba nzira yechokwadi uye kugamuchira mwoyo unoda chokwadi. Zvikasadaro, Mwari achamupa mwoyo usina kururama uye agomuita kuti atende nhema. Verenga 2 VaTesaronika 2:11
Vanhu vakadai havazombonzwisisi kuzvarwa patsva neruponeso rwaKristu. Unozvitenda here kana kuti kwete?

(2) Munhu wose anopara mhosva →→ (Munhu mukuru)

bvunza : Mamwe machechi anodzidzisa kuti ... vanhu vanozvarwa patsva vanogona kuramba vachitadza?

mhinduro : Usataure neuzivi hwevanhu;

1 ...Uyo anotadza haana kumuona - 1 Johane 3:6

Cherechedza: Ani naani anogara maari (zvichireva avo vari muna Kristu, munhu mutsva akaberekwazve kubva kuvakafa kwaJesu Kristu) haatadzi ani naani anotadza haana kumuona → Wakamboona rugwaro rwebhaibheri here? yaMwari muHurukuro yeBhaibheri! Jesu akati, “Mashoko andinotaura kwamuri mweya noupenyu!

2 Mumwe nomumwe unoita zvivi...haana kumuziva - 1 Johane 3:6

Cherechedza: Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi: kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, naJesu Kristu, wamakatuma. Pane mhosho mune mamwe maBhaibheri emagetsi: “Kuzivei Imi, Mwari Wechokwadi Bedzi” ine rimwezve izwi rekuti “mumwe”, asi hapana kutaipa muBhaibheri rakanyorwa.
Saka, ndapota zvibvunze umene, unoziva Ishe Jesu Kristu here? Unonzwisisa here ruponeso rwaKristu? Vafundisi ivavo vanokudzidzisai sei kuti munhu wese anomutswa? Newcomer ), ucharamba uine mhosva here? Bhaibheri rinotii nezvevaparidzi vanodzidzisa nenzira iyi → Ndiani anogara maari ( Munhu mutsva ani naani anotadza haana kumuona kana kumuziva.

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

3 Usaedzwa

Cherechedza: Vana vangu vaduku, musaidzwa navamwe, ndiko kuti, musaidzwa nokunyengera nedzidziso; Newcomer Kwete munyama yako yekare, muviri wako wekare unotadza, asi munhu mutsva mauri, anogara muna Kristu, kudenga, kwete panyika, matiri. Newcomer hazvionekwe nemeso chete" munhu wemweya “Nokuvandudzwa kwoMweya Mutsvene, muitwe vatsva zuva nezuva uye muve munhu nekuita kururama. Izvi zvinoreva kuti unoita kururama munhu akarurama, saJehovha akarurama. Ameni.

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Ani nani unogara maari haatadzi; ani nani anotadza haana kumuona kana kumuziva. Vakomana vangu, musaedzwa. Uyo anoita zvakarurama akarurama, saJehovha akarurama. 1 Johani 3:6-7

3. Nyika yose iri mumaoko ewakaipa

Avo vanotadza ndevadhiabhorosi

Uyo unoita chivi unobva kuna dhiabhorosi, nekuti dhiabhorosi wakatadza kubva pakutanga. Mwanakomana waMwari akaonekwa kuti aparadze mabasa adhiabhorosi. 1 Johani 3:8

(Vanhu pasi rose, avo vari pasi pomurairo, avo vanodarika murairo nezvivi, vatadzi! Vose vavete pasi powakaipa. Unozvitenda here?)

Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi; Tinoziva kuti tiri vaMwari uye kuti nyika yose iri musimba rowakaipa. Tinozivawo kuti Mwanakomana waMwari akauya akatipa uchenjeri hwokuziva iye wechokwadi, uye tiri muna iye wechokwadi, Mwanakomana wake Jesu Kristu. Uyu ndiye Mwari wechokwadi noupenyu husingaperi. 1 Johani 5:18-20

Kugovaniswa muhurukuro yechitatu: "Kumuka kuvakafa" 3

articles.title: Kumuka 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora zvekufambisa uye kugovera "Kumuka"

Chidzidzo Chechitatu: Kumuka Kuvakafa uye Kuberekwazve KweMunhu Mutsva uye Murume Akwegura

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna 2 Vakorinde 5:17-20, torivhura toverenga pamwe chete:
Kana munhu ari muna Kristu, ava chisikwa chitsva; Zvose zvinobva kuna Mwari, akatiyananisa naye kubudikidza naKristu uye akatipa ushumiri hwokuyananisa. Uku ndiko kuti Mwari akanga ari muna Kristu achiyananisa nyika kwaari, asingavaverengeri kudarika kwavo, akatipa isu shoko rokuyananisa. Naizvozvo tiri vamiririri vaKristu, sokunge Mwari ari kukukurudzirai kubudikidza nesu. Tinokukumbirai nokuda kwaKristu kuti muyananiswe naMwari.

1. Tiri vatumwa vevhangeri

→ → Usaisa ( murume mukuru ) kudarika kuri pamusoro pavo ( Newcomer ) uye akatipa shoko rokuyananisa.

(1) Munhu wekare uye munhu mutsva

Mubvunzo: Ungasiyanisa sei murume wekare kubva kumunhu mutsva?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Munhu wekare ndewesungano yekare;
2 Munhu wekare ndewaAdhamu; munhu mutsva ndewaJesu, Adhamu wokupedzisira - 1 VaKorinte 15:45
3 Munhu wekare Adhamu akaberekwa; munhu mutsva Jesu akaberekwa— 1 VaK
4 Munhu wekare ndewepanyika;
5 Munhu wekare mutadzi;
6 Munhu wekare anotadza;
7 Munhu wekare ari pasi pomurairo;
8 Munhu wekare anoteerera mutemo wechivi;
9 Munhu wekare ane hanya nezvinhu zvenyama;
10 Munhu wekare ari kuwedzera kuipa;
11 Munhu wekare haangagari nhaka youmambo hwokudenga;
12 Munhu wekare akafa naKristu;

(2) Mweya Mutsvene unorwa nenyama

Mubvunzo: Mweya Mutsvene anogara kupi?

Mhinduro: Mweya Mutsvene anogara mumoyo yedu!

kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vana. Nokuti muri vanakomana, Mwari akatumira Mweya woMwanakomana wake mumwoyo yenyu (chaizvoizvo, yedu), achidanidzira, “Abha, Baba!” ( VaGaratia 4:5-6 )

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. VaRoma 8:9

bvunza : Hazvina kutaurwa here kuti miviri yedu itemberi yoMweya Mutsvene? — 1 VaKorinte 6:19
→→Zvinoreva here pano kuti hausi wenyama? — VaRoma 8:9

mhinduro : Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Nyama yedu yakatengeswa kuzvivi

Tinoziva kuti murayiro ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa kuzvivi. VaRoma 7:14

2 Nyama inoda kuteerera mutemo wechivi

Mwari ngaavongwe kuti tinogona kupukunyuka kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Kubva pakuona uku, ndinoteerera mutemo waMwari nemoyo wangu, asi nyama yangu inoteerera mutemo wechivi. VaRoma 7:25

3 Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu →→Muviri wechivi unoparadzwa, uye iwe wakaparadzaniswa nemuviri unofa.

Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vezvivi;

4 Mweya Mutsvene anogara mune vakazvarwa patsva ( Newcomer ) pa

bvunza : Takazvarwa patsva (vanhu vatsva) kupi?

mhinduro : Mumoyo yedu! Ameni

Nokuti maererano nomunhu womukati (chinyorwa chokutanga) ndinofarira mutemo waMwari—VaRoma 7:22

Cherechedza: Pauro akati! Maererano nezvinorehwa mandiri (zvinyorwa zvepakutanga munhu) → izvi zviri mumwoyo mangu ( vanhu ) nezvokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa ( munhu wemweya ) Muviri wemweya, munhu wemweya, anogara matiri, ichi chisingaoneki ( munhu wemweya ) ndini chaiye; Shadow ! Nokudaro, Mweya Mutsvene anogara muvanhu vakazvarwa patsva pamweya! Akazvarwa patsva ( Newcomer ) Muviri wemweya itemberi yoMweya Mutsvene, nokuti muviri uyu wakaberekwa naJesu Kristu, uye isu tiri nhengo dzake! Ameni
Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(3) Kuchiva kwenyama kunorwisana noMweya Mutsvene

→→Mudhara nemurume mutsva vanorwa

Panguva iyoyo, avo vakaberekwa nenzira yenyama ( murume mukuru ) akatambudza avo vakaberekwa noMweya ( Newcomer ), uye ndizvo zvazviri. VaGaratia 4:29
Ndinoti, fambai muMweya, ipapo hamungazadzisi kuchiva kwenyama. Nokuti nyama inochiva zvinopesana noMweya, uye Mweya anochiva zvinopesana nenyama; izvi zviviri zvinorwisana zvokuti hamugoni kuita zvamunoda. VaGaratia 5:16-17

Nokuti vaya vanorarama namararamiro enyama vanoisa pfungwa dzavo pazvinhu zvenyama; Kufunga kwenyama ndirwo rufu; Nekuti kufunganya kwenyama ruvengo kuna Mwari; nekuti hakuzviisi pasi pemurairo waMwari; VaRoma 8:5-8

(4) Mukati memuviri kana kunze kwemuviri

Ndinoziva munhu ari muna Kristu, wakakwidzwa kudenga rechitatu makore anegumi namana apfuura (kana akanga ari mumuviri, handizivi, kana kana akanga ari kunze kwomuviri, handizivi, Mwari oga ndiye anoziva. )… Wakati akwidzwa muparadhiso, akanzwa mashoko akavanzika, asingagoni kutaurwa nomunhu. 2 VaKorinte 12:2,4

bvunza : Munhu mutsva waPauro kana kuti mweya wake.
→→Kubatwa chibharo kudenga rechitatu?

mhinduro : Munhu mutsva anozvarwa patsva!

bvunza : Ndozvitaura sei?

mhinduro : Kubva mutsamba dzakanyorwa naPauro

Nyama neropa hazvingagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari

Ndinoti kwamuri, hama dzangu, nyama neropa hazvingagari nhaka yeushe hwaMwari, zvisingaori kana zvisingafi. 1 VaKorinte 15:50

Cherechedza: Adamu akaberekwa nenyama neropa Ndiye anofa uye haangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. Naizvozvo, kwakanga kusiri kuti munhu wekare waPauro, muviri kana mweya, akabvutwa kudenga rechitatu, asi munhu mutsva akaberekwazve waPauro ( munhu wemweya ) Muviri wemweya wakakwidzwa kudenga rechitatu.

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Kukurukurirana netsamba dzakanyorwa nevaapositori nezverumuko nekuzvarwa patsva:

[ peter ] Wakazvarwa patsva, kwete nembeu inoora, asi neshoko raMwari benyu uye rinogara nokusingaperi... 1 Petro 1:23, yaPetro... Uye vamwe vadzidzi vakaona kumuka kwaJesu, vachitaura muna Mabasa Avapostori. Vaapostora vanoti, “Mweya wake hausiyiwi muHadhesi, uyewo muviri wake hauoni kuora.
[ Johani ] Muchiono chaZvakazarurwa, takaona vanhu vane 144 000 vachitevera Gwayana vakanga vari mhandara uye vasina chavanopomerwa, naizvozvo, 1 Johane 3:9 inoti: “Munhu wose akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi kana kuti haangatadzi;
Ava ndivo vasina kuberekwa neropa, kwete neruchiva, kana nechido chemurume, asi vakaberekwa naMwari. Jesu akati, “Chakaberekwa nenyama inyama, chakaberekwa noMweya, mweya.”— Johane 3:6; 1:13;
[ Jacob ] Aisatenda muna Jesu kare - Johani 7:5 aitenda kuti Jesu akanga ari Mwanakomana waMwari pashure pokunge aona kumutswa kwaJesu nemaziso ake pachake shoko rechokwadi maererano nokuda kwake.

[ Paul ] Chakazarurwa chakagamuchirwa chakanga chikuru kupfuura icho chavamwe vaapostora— 2 VaKorinte 12:7 , NW;

Iye pachake akati: “Ndinoziva munhu uyu ari muna Kristu; (kana zvakaitwa mumuviri kana kunze kwomuviri, handizivi, Mwari oga ndiye anoziva.)
Nokuti Pauro pachake akawana kuberekwa naMwari ( Newcomer ) akabvutwa akaiswa muparadhiso!
Saka matsamba emweya aakanyora aive akapfuma uye akadzama.

Pamusoro pemunhu wekare uye nemunhu mutsva:

( Newcomer Kana munhu ari muna Kristu, ava chisikwa chitsva; 2 VaKorinte 5:17
( murume mukuru ) Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama... VaGaratiya 2:20 , NW; anogara mauri, hausi wenyama ( murume mukuru .... VaRoma 8:9 → Uye tinoziva kuti kana tichigara mu (munhu wekare), takaparadzaniswa naShe. 2 VaKorinte 5:6
( Mweya Mutsvene Nokuti nyama inochiva zvinopesana noMweya, uye Mweya anochiva zvinopesana nenyama; izvi zviviri zvinorwisana zvokuti hamungagoni kuita zvamunoda. VaGaratia 5:17
( Vakamutswa naKristu semuviri wemweya )
Unodyarwa muviri wenyama, unomutswa muviri womweya. Kana kune muviri wenyama, panofanirawo kuva nemuviri wemweya. 1 VaKorinte
15:44
( Pfekai munhu mutsva, pfekai Kristu )
Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu. VaGaratia 3:26-27
( Mweya nemuviri zvinochengetedzwa )
Mwari worugare ngaakuitei vatsvene zvakazara! Mweya wenyu, nomwoyo uye nomuviri zvichengetwe zvisina mhosva pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Iye unokudanai akatendeka uye achazviita. 1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24
( Kuberekwazve, muviri mutsva wemunhu unooneka )

Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. VaKorose 3:4

Muapostora Pauro akazvionera oga ( Kumuka nekuzvarwa patsva naKristu ) yakasimudzwa muparadhiso yechitatu yedenga! Iye achangobva kunyora mabhii omudzimu akawanda anokosha, ayo ari ebetsero huru kuna avo vedu gare gare vanotenda matiri Tinogona kunzwisisa ukama huri pakati pomunhu mutsva akaberekwa patsva nomunhu wekare, munhu anooneka nomunhu womudzimu asingaoneki, muviri womusikirwo. nemuviri wemweya, nezvivi, nevasina mhosva, nevasina mhosva, nevasina kutadza.

Takamutswa pamwe chete naKristu sevanhu vatsva ( munhu wemweya ) ane mweya, mweya nemuviri! Zvose mweya nemuviri zvinofanira kuchengetedzwa. Ameni

Saka kwatiri Vakristu have vanhu vaviri , munhu wekare nomunhu mutsva, munhu akaberekwa naAdhama nomunhu akaberekwa naJesu, Adhama wokupedzisira, munhu wenyama akaberekwa nenyama uye munhu womudzimu akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene;

→→Nemhaka yokuti miuyo youpenyu inobva mumwoyo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Maererano nokutenda kwenyu, ngazviitwe kwamuri!

Vaparidzi vazhinji mukereke nhasi havanzwisise kuti kune vanhu vaviri mushure mekumuka nekuzvarwa patsva. Panongova nemunhu mumwe chete anoparidza shoko →Mudhara uye munhu mutsva, wenyama nemweya, ane mhosva uye asina mhosva, anotadza uye asina chivi Kuparidza kwakasanganiswa kukudzidzisa , kana munhu wekare achinge atadza, munatse matadzo ake zuva nezuva. Bata ropa raKristu semazuva ose . Paunotarira mavhesi eBhaibheri woaenzanisa, unogara uchinzwa kuti zvavanotaura hazvina kururama, asi hauzivi kuti chii chakaipa nezvavanotaura? Nekuti vakati " Nzira yehongu uye kwete ", chakanaka nechakaipa, haugone kuona mutsauko pasina kutungamirwa neMweya Mutsvene.

Tarisa "Izwi raHongu naKwete" uye "Kufamba muMweya Mutsvene" pamusoro pekuita nechitadzo chemudhara.

2. Iva mutumwa wevhangeri raKristu

→→Kwete murume mukuru kudarika kwe Newcomer Pamuviri wako!

Uyu ndiMwari muna Kristu, achiyananisa nyika kwaari uye asingavaparadzi. murume mukuru ) kudarika kuri pamusoro pavo ( Newcomer ) uye akatipa shoko rokuyananisa. 2 VaKorinte 5:19
Hama, zvinoita sekuti hatine ngava nenyama; Nokuti Kristu akaripa chikwereti chezvivi ) kurarama maererano nenyama. VaRoma 8:12
Ipapo akati: Handicharangariri zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo;

Sezvo zvivi izvi zvaregererwa, hapachina zvibayiro zvechivi. VaHebheru 10:17-18

3. Munhu mutsva akamutswa achaonekwa

(1) Munhu mutsva anovonekwa mukubwinya

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. VaKorose 3:3-4

(2) Muviri wemunhu mutsva unoonekwa wakafanana nemuviri wake unobwinya

Achashandura miviri yedu yakaderera kuti ifanane nomuviri wake wokubwinya, maererano nesimba raanogona naro kuisa zvinhu zvose pasi pake.
VaFiripi 3:21

(3) Uchaona chimiro Chake chechokwadi, uye muviri wemunhu mutsva uchaonekwa saIye

Hama dzinodikanwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichazova zvichigere kuratidzwa; 1 Johani 3:2

Nhasi tiri kugovera "Kumuka" pano Isu takagovanawo kare (kumuka, kuberekwa patsva).

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva
kereke munashe Jesu Kristu
Ava ndivo vanhu vatsvene vanogara voga uye vasingaverengerwi pakati pendudzi.
Kufanana nevasikana vane 144 000 vakachena vanotevera Kristu Gwayana.
Ameni!
→→Ndinomuona ari pamusoro pechikomo;
Ndivo vanhu vanogara voga, vasingaverengwi pakati pamarudzi ose.
Numeri 23:9
Nevashandi vaIshe Jesu Kristu: Hama Wang*Yun, Hanzvadzi Liu, Hanzvadzi Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi vanoshingairira kutsigira basa revhangeri nekupa mari nekushanda nesimba, nevamwe vatsvene vanoshanda nesu. vanotenda vhangeri iri, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu. Ameni! Verenga VaFiripi 4:3
Dzimwe hama nehanzvadzi dzinogamuchirwa kushandisa mabhurawuza avo kutsvaga - kereke munashe Jesu Kristu -Tinya kuti utore. Unganidza uye ubatane nesu, shandai pamwe chete kuparidza evhangeri yaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: “Kuberekwa kwaJesu Kristu”
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Jesu Kristu anozvarwa

---Ndarama, zvinonhuwira, mura---

Mateo 2:9-11 BDMCS - Vakati vanzwa mashoko amambo, vakaenda. Nyeredzi yavakaona kumabvazuva yakavatungamirira pakarepo, ikasvika panzvimbo pakanga pane mwana, ikandomira pamusoro payo. Vakati vaona nyeredzi, vakafara zvikuru, uye vakaona Mwana naMaria mai vake, vakawira pasi vakanamata Mwana.

Poshi: goridhe

Mubvunzo: Ndarama inomiririrei?

Mhinduro: Ndarama chiratidzo chembiri, chiremerera, uye mambo!

mumiririri wegoridhe chivimbo → ndakufonera" chivimbo “Maedzwa, munokosha kupfuura ndarama inoparara, kunyange ichiidzwa nomoto, kuti mugamuchire kurumbidzwa nokubwinya nokukudzwa pakuratidzwa kwaJesu Kristu.”—Ona 1 Petro 1:17 .

“Mwari akada nyika kwazvo zvokuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti zvose tsamba Iye haangafi asi achava noupenyu husingaperi. Johani 3:16

piri: mastic

Mubvunzo: Zvinonhuhwira zvinomirirei?

mhinduro: mastic "Zvinoreva kunhuwira, zvinofananidzira tariro yorumuko! Zvinomiririra muviri waKristu!"

(1) Chakavanzika chokunamata chikuru sei, chisingarambiki! NdiMwari vari kuonekwa munyama ( muviri waKristu ), akaruramiswa noMweya Mutsvene, akaonekwa nengirozi, akaparidzwa kuvaHedheni, akatendwa munyika, akakwidzwa mukubwinya - tarisa kuna 1 Timotio 3:16.

(2)Thank God! unogara uchititungamirira muna Kristu, uye kubudikidza nesu tichizivisa kwose kwose kunhuhwirira kwokuziva Kristu. Nokuti tine hwema hwaKristu pamberi paMwari, pane vari kuponeswa navari kuparara. Kuboka iri (mutana), ndiye munhuwi worufu kufa (kufa naKristu kuboka iroro (mutana); akazvarwa patsva munhu ) uye zvikava kunhuhwira mhenyu kwaari. rarama naKristu ) Ndiani anogona kubata izvi? Verenga 2 VaKorinte 2:14-16

(3) Kugadzirwa kwemafuta ezvinonhuwira kunogona kugadzirwa balm "→ Saka "Frenki" inofananidzira muviri wakamutswa waKristu se" Kunhuwirira “Vakakumikidzwa kuna Mwari, uye vakazvarwa patsva (munhu mutsva) matiri mitezo yomuviri wake. Naizvozvo, hama dzangu, ndinokukumbirai zvikuru netsitsi dzaMwari. chipiriso chemuviri , chibayiro chipenyu, chitsvene, chinogamuchirika kuna Mwari, ndiko kunamata kwenyu kwomweya. Verenga VaRoma 12:1

tatu: Mura

Mubvunzo: Mura inomirirei?

mhinduro: Mura Zvinomiririra kutambura, kuporeswa, kuregererwa uye rudo.

(1) Ndinoona mudiwa wangu sehomwe yemura ( rudo ), nguva dzose mumaoko angu. Nongedzera kuRwiyo rwaRwiyo 1:13

(2) Hakusi kuti tinoda Mwari, asi kuti Mwari anotida uye akatuma Mwanakomana wake kuti ave rudzikinuro rwezvivi zvedu kufanana . Verenga 1 Johani 4:10

(3) Iye pachake akatakura zvivi zvedu nokuturikwa pamuti, kuti sezvo takafa kuzvivi, tigoraramira kururama. nokuda kwemaronda ake ( tambura ), uchapora ( rudzikinuro ) Verenga 1 Petro 2:24

saka" goridhe , mastic , Mura "→ → mumiririri" chivimbo , tariro , rudo "!

→→ Nhasi kune nguva dzose tsamba ,ve maona ,ve kufanana Pavatatu ava, mukurusa ndiye kufanana . Verenga 1 VaKorinde 13:13

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

articles.title: Kuzvipira 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinodzidza ruwadzano uye togovana nezvechegumi!

Ngativhurei kuna Revhitiko 27:30 muTestamente Yekare tiverenge pamwe chete:
“Zvose zviri panyika,
kana iri mbeu yevhu, kana muchero pamuti;
Chegumi ndechaJehovha;
zvitsvene kuna Jehovha.

------Chimwe-chegumi-----

1. Kuzvitsaurira kwaAbrama

Zvino Merikizedheki mambo weSaremi (ndiko kuti mambo worugare), akauya kuzosangana naye nechingwa newaini;
Akaropafadza Abhurama akati, "Jehovha wokudenga napasi, Mwari Wokumusoro-soro, ngaaropafadze Abhurama! Mwari Wokumusoro-soro ngaaropafadzwe nokuti aisa vavengi vako mumaoko ako!"

“Saka Abhurama akapa Merkizedeki chegumi chemibairo yake yose.”—Genesi 14:18-20

2. Kutsaurirwa kwaJakobho

Jakobho akaita mhiko, achiti: “Kana Mwari akava neni, akandichengeta parwendo rwangu, akandipa zvokudya kuti ndidye, nenguvo yokufuka, kuti ndidzokere kuimba yababa vangu norugare, ndichaita Jehovha Mwari wangu. Mwari.

Mabwe andakamisa mbiru ichavawo temberi yaMwari; uye pane zvose zvauchandipa ndichakupa chegumi. ”—Genesi 28:20-22

3. Kuzvitsaurira kwevaIsraeri

nekuti vaRevhi ndakapa vaRevhi, vave nhaka yavo, chegumi chezvibereko zvavana vaIsiraeri, ndicho chipiriso chinosimudzwa kuna Jehovha. Naizvozvo ndakati kwavari, ‘Hapafaniri kuva nenhaka pakati pevanakomana vaIsraeri. ’”
Jehovha akarayira Mosesi, akati: “Taura kuvaRevhi, uti kwavari, ‘Pachegumi chamunotora kuvana vaIsraeri, chandinokupai kuti ive nhaka yenyu, munofanira kutora chimwe chegumi kuti chive nhaka yenyu ISHE— Numeri 18:24-26
Pazvipo zvose zvamunopiwa, zvakanakisisa zvazvo, izvo zvakatsaurwa, zvichavigirwa Jehovha chipo chinosimudzwa. — Numeri 18:29

4. Ipa chegumi kuvarombo

Makore matatu igore rezvegumi, munotora chegumi chenyika yose.
Upe kuvaRevhi (vashandi vebasa dzvene) nevatorwa, nherera nechirikadzi, kuti vagodya vari mukati memagedhi ako. Dheuteronomio 26:12

5. Chegumi ndechaJehovha

“Zvose zviri panyika,
kana iri mbeu yevhu, kana muchero pamuti;
Chegumi ndechaJehovha;
zvitsvene kuna Jehovha.

---Revhitiko 27:30

6. Zvibereko zvokutanga ndezvaJehovha

Unofanira kushandisa pfuma yako
uye zvibereko zvokutanga zvezvibereko zvako zvose ukudze Jehovha.
Ipapo matura ako achazadzwa nezvakawanda;

Zvisviniro zvako zvewaini zvinopfachukira newaini itsva. — Zvirevo 3:9-10

7. Edza kuisa chegumi mu "Tianku"

Ndiidzei, muchiuisa chegumi chezvegumi zvenyu muimba yekuvigira, kuti mugova nezvokudya mumba mangu, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha wehondo.
Ichakuvhurirai mafafitera edenga here nekukudururirai maropafadzo, kunyangwe pasina pekuigamuchira? —--Maraki 3:10

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

articles.title: Kuzvipira 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekudzidza kuyanana uye kugovana nezvekuzvipira kwechiKristu!

Ngativhurei kuna Mateo 13:22-23 muTestamende Itsva yeBhaibheri tiverenge pamwe chete: Wakakushwa muminzwa ndiye anonzwa shoko asi kufunganya kwenyika nokunyengera kwemari zvinovhunga shoko. kuti haungabereki zvibereko . Wakakushwa muvhu rakanaka, ndiye unonzwa shoko akarinzwisisa, vuye unobereka zvibereko, dzimwe nguva zvine zana, dzimwe nguva makumi matanhatu, uye dzimwe nguva makumi matatu. "

1. Kutsaurirwa kweVanachiremba vanobva kuMabvazuva

... Vamwe vachenjeri vakauya kuJerusarema vachibva kumabvazuva, vachiti, "Aripiko iye wakazvarwa Mambo wavaJudha? Takaona nyeredzi yake kumabvazuva, uye tauya kuzomunamata."

... Vakati vachiona nyeredzi vakafara kwazvo, vakati vapinda mumba, vakaona Mwana naMaria mai vake, vakawira pasi, vakanamata Mwana, vakazarura fuma yavo, vakamupa zvipo zvendarama , nezvinonhuwira, nemura. Mateu 2:1-11

【Faith.Hope.Rudo】

goridhe :Inomiririra chiremerera uye chivimbo!
mastic : Inomirira kunhuhwirira netariro yorumuko!

Mura :Zvinomiririra kuporeswa, kutambura, kuregererwa uye rudo!

2. Kuzvipira kwemarudzi maviri evanhu

(1)Kaini naAbheri

Kaini → Rimwe zuva Kaini akauya nechipiriso kuna Jehovha chezvibereko zvevhu;
Abheri → Abheri akapawo matangwe emakwai ake nemafuta awo. Jehovha ndokugamuchira Abheri nechipiriso chake; asi Kaini haana kugamuchira chipo chake.

Kaini akatsamwa kwazvo uye chiso chake chikashanduka. Genesi 4:3-5

bvunza :Sei wakafarira Abel nemupiro wake?

mhinduro : Nokutenda Abheri (akapa matangwe akanakisisa emakwai ake nemafuta awo) akapa kuna Mwari chibayiro chakanakisisa kupfuura chaKaini, uye nokudaro akagamuchira uchapupu hwokuti akanga aruramiswa, kuti Mwari akaratidza kuti akanga akarurama. Kunyange zvazvo akafa, akaramba achitaura nokuda kwokutenda uku. References VaHebheru 11:4 ;

Chaipiwa naKaini chakanga chisina kutenda, rudo, uye ruremekedzo kuna Mwari, Jehovha, uye haana kupa zvibereko zvokutanga zvezvibereko zvakanaka sechinopiwa, kunyange zvazvo Bhaibheri risina kutsanangura akanga atomutsiura akati chipiriso chake chakanga chisina kunaka uye chakanga chisingagamuchirwi.

→Jehovha akati kuna Kaini: "Watsamwireiko? Nei chiso chako chashanduka? Kana ukaita zvakanaka, haungagamuchirwi here? Kana ukaita zvakaipa, zvivi zvinovandira pamusuwo. Zvichakuchiva. Iwe, iwe, achaikurira.”— Genesi 4:6-7 .

(2) Vanyengeri vanopa chegumi

(Jesu) akati: “Mune nhamo imi, vanyori nevaFarisi, vanyengeri!

Mukupesana, nhau dzinokosha zvikuru mumutemo, dzinoti ruramisiro, ngoni, uye kutendeka, hazvichagamuchiriki. Ichi ndicho chinhu chinonyanya kukosha chaunofanira kuita; Mateu 23:23

MuFarisi wacho akamira uye akanyengetera mumwoyo make kuti: ‘Mwari, ndinokuongai kuti handina kufanana nevamwe vanhu, makororo, vasakarurama, mhombwe, kana nomuteresi uyu. Ndinotsanya kaviri pavhiki uye ndinopa chegumi chezvose zvandinowana. ’—Ruka 18:11-12

(3) Mwari haafariri zvinopiwa maererano nomutemo

Hamufariri zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvezvivi.
Panguva iyoyo ndakati: Mwari, tarirai ndauya,
Kuita kuda kwenyu;
Mabasa angu akanyorwa mumipumburu.

Rinoti: “Chibayiro nechipo, nechipiriso chinopiswa, nechipiriso chezvivi, zvamakaramba, nezvamusina kuda (izvi zviri maererano nomutemo)”;

bvunza : Sei musingadi zvinopiwa maererano nemutemo?

mhinduro : Chibayiro chinoitwa maererano nomurayiro murayiro wemirayiro, kwete chipiriso chokungopa nokuzvidira, chinoyeuchidza vanhu zvivi gore negore, asi hachigoni kubvisa zvivi.

Asi zvibayiro izvi zvakanga zviri chiyeuchidzo chegore negore chechivi, nokuti ropa renzombe nerembudzi rakanga risingagoni kubvisa chivi. VaHebheru 10:3-4

(4) Ipa "chimwe-chegumi"

“Zvose zviri panyika,
kana iri mbeu yevhu, kana muchero pamuti;
Chegumi ndechaJehovha;
zvitsvene kuna Jehovha.

---Revhitiko 27:30

→→Abrahama akapa chegumi

Akaropafadza Abhurama akati, "Jehovha wedenga nenyika, Mwari Wokumusoro-soro, ngaaropafadze Abhurama! Mwari Wokumusoro-soro ngaaropafadzwe nokuti aisa vavengi vako mumaoko ako." Genesi 14:19-20

→→Jakobho akapa chegumi

Mabwe andakamisa mbiru ichavawo temberi yaMwari; uye pane zvose zvauchandipa ndichakupa chegumi. ” Genesisi 28:22

→→VaFarisi vaipa chegumi

Ndinotsanya kaviri pavhiki uye ndinopa chegumi chezvose zvandinowana. Ruka 18:12

Cherechedza: Nokuti Abrahama naJakobo vaiziva mumwoyo yavo kuti chose chavakagamuchira vakachipiwa naMwari, naizvozvo vakanga vakagadzirira kupa gumi muzana;

VaFarisi, kune rumwe rutivi, vakanga vari pasi pomutemo uye vaipa mipiro maererano nemirau yomutemo.

Nokudaro, maitiro uye mafungiro ekupa "chegumi" zvakasiyana zvachose.

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

3. Kutsaurirwa kwechirikadzi murombo

Jesu akatarisa kumusoro akaona mupfumi achiisa chipo chake muchivigiro chemari, uye imwe chirikadzi murombo ichiisa tumari twemhangura tuviri, akati, “Ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, chirikadzi murombo iyi yaisa mari zhinji kupfuura vamwe vose ane zvakawanda kupfuura zvavanazvo.” , ndokuchiisa muchibairo, asi chirikadzi yakaisa zvose zvayaiva nazvo kuti irarame nokushayiwa kwayo imene (kutenda mukuda Mwari).”— Ruka 21:1-4

urombo :Urombo hwemari yezvinhu
shirikadzi :Kusurukirwa pasina rutsigiro

mukadzi : Zvinoreva kuti mukadzi haana simba.

4. Ipa mari kuvatsvene

maererano nezvakaitira vatsvene, sezvandakaraira kereke dzeGaratia, imwiwo muite saizvozvo. Nomusi wokutanga wevhiki, mumwe nomumwe ngaatsaure mari yake zvichienderana nezvaanowana, kuti arege kuzoitora kana ndauya. 1 VaKorinte 16:1-2
Asi musakanganwa kuita zvakanaka nokupa, nokuti zvibayiro zvakadaro zvinofadza Mwari. VaHebheru 13:16

5. Iva nechido chekupa

bvunza : VaKristu vanopa sei?

mhinduro : Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) nokuzvidira

Hama, ndinokuudzai nezvenyasha dzakapiwa naMwari kukereke dzeMasedhonia. Ndinogona kupupura kuti vakapa pachena uye nokuzvidira maererano nokugona kwavo uye kupfuura zvavaikwanisa, 2 Vakorinde 8:1-3 .

(2) Kwete nekuzeza

Naizvozvo ndinofunga kuti ndinofanira kukumbira hama idzodzo kuti dzitange dzauya kwamuri kuti dzigadzirire zvipo zvakavimbiswa kare, kuitira kuti zvionekwe kuti zvamunopa ndezvekuda uye kwete zvekumanikidzwa. 2 VaKorinte 9:5

(3) Batanidza muzvikomborero zvomudzimu

Asi ikozvino ndinoenda kuJerusarema kunoshumira vatsvene. Nokuti vaMakedhonia navaAkaya vakanga vachida kuunganidza zvipo kuvarombo pakati pavatsvene vaiva muJerusarema.
Kunyange zvazvo uku kuri kudisa kwavo, kunorangarirwa chaizvoizvo sechikwereti (mungava wokuparidza evhangeri nokugovera kuperevedza kwavatsvene navarombo); tsigira hutano hwavo. VaRoma 15:25-27

Tora chikamu mune zvikomborero zvemweya:

bvunza : Chii chinobatsira pakunamata?

mhinduro : Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1: Vanhu ngavatende evhangeri vaponeswe - VaRoma 1:16-17
2: Nzwisisa chokwadi chevhangeri - 1 VaKorinte 4:15, Jakobho 1:18
3: Kuti munzwisise kuberekwa patsva—Johani 3:5-7
4: Tenda murufu, kuvigwa, nekumuka pamwe chete naKristu - VaRoma 6: 6-8
5: Hwisisa kuti munhu wekare ndiye anotanga rufu, uye munhu mutsva anoratidza hupenyu hwaJesu — 2 VaKorinte 4:10-12
6: Kutenda uye kushanda pamwe chete naJesu—Johani 6:28-29
7: Kukudzwa kwatingaitwa naJesu—VaRoma 6:17
8: Mawanirwo emubayiro— 1 VaKorinde 9:24
9: Gamuchirai korona yokubwinya- 1 Petro 5:4
10: Rumuko ruri nani— VaHebheru 11:35
11: Kutonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru - Zvakazarurwa 20: 6
12: Kutonga naJesu nokusingaperi-peri—Zvakazarurwa 22:3-5

Cherechedza: Naizvozvo, kana muchizvipira kutsigira basa dzvene muimba yaMwari, varanda vanoparidza vhangeri rechokwadi, uye hama dzinotambura pakati pavatsvene, muri kushanda pamwe chete naMwari varanda vaKristu, Mwari achazvirangarira. Vashumiri vaIshe Jesu Kristu, vachakutungamirirai kuti mudye uye munwe zvokudya zvomudzimu zvoupenyu, kuti upenyu hwenyu hwomudzimu huwedzere uye mugova nokumuka kuri nani mune ramangwana. Ameni!

Iwe wakatevera Jesu, ukatenda kuevhangeri yechokwadi, uye uchitsigira varanda vaiparidza vhangeri rechokwadi! Vanogamuchira mbiri yakafanana, tuso, uye korona naJesu Kristu → → Kureva kuti, iwe wakafanana navo: gamuchira mbiri, mubayiro, nekorona pamwe chete, rumuko ruri nani, rumuko rusati rwavapo makore ane chiuru, uye kutonga kwaKristu kwemakore ane chiuru. , Denga idzva nenyika itsva naJesu Kristu achitonga nokusingaperi-peri. Ameni!

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(Sezvo rudzi rwaRevhi rwakabhadhara chegumi kubudikidza naAbrahama)

→→Zvinogonawo kunzi Revhi, akagamuchira chegumi, akagamuchirawo chegumi kuburikidza naAbrahama. Nokuti apo Merekizedheki akasangana naAbrahama, Revhi akanga atova mumuviri (rugwaro rwapakuvamba, chiuno) chatateguru vake.

VaHebheru 7:9-10

【Vakristu vanofanira kungwarira:】

Kana vamwe vanhu vakatevera→uye vachitenda→vaya vaparidzi vanoparidza dzidziso dzenhema uye vachivhiringa vhangeri rechokwadi, uye vasinganzwisisi Bhaibheri, ruponeso rwaKristu, nokuzvarwa patsva, saka iwe hauna kuzvarwa patsva, unozvitenda here kana kuti kwete. Kana zviri zvechishuvo chavo chokugamuchira mbiri, mibairo, korona, uye zvirongwa zvavo zvounyengeri zvokumutswa pamberi pemireniyamu, ngatisatombozvitaura Unofunga kuti ndizvo here? Une nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe uye akasvinura.

4. Zviunganidzire pfuma kudenga

“Musazviunganidzira pfuma panyika, pane zvipfukuto nengura zvinoparadza, uye pane mbavha dzinopaza dzichiba. Mateu Evhangeri 6:19-20

5. Zvibereko zvokutanga zvinokudza Jehovha

Unofanira kushandisa pfuma yako
uye zvibereko zvokutanga zvezvibereko zvako zvose ukudze Jehovha.
Ipapo matura ako achazadzwa nezvakawanda;

Zvisviniro zvako zvewaini zvinopfachukira newaini itsva. — Zvirevo 3:9-10

(Zvibereko zvokutanga ipfuma yokutanga inowanwa, yakadai somuhoro wokutanga, muhoro webhizimisi rokutanga kana kuti gohwo renyika, uye zvibayiro zvakanakisisa zvinoitirwa kukudza Jehovha. Zvakadai sokupa kutsigira basa reevhangeri muimba yaMwari. , muchiparidza Vashumiri vevhangeri, vatsvene vevarombo, kuti mugova nezvokudya mumatura edenga zvakawanda.)

6. Kune wese anazvo, achawedzerwa

Nokuti mumwe nomumwe anazvo (akachengeterwa kudenga) achapiwa zvimwe, uye achava nezvakawanda; asi ani naani asina, kunyange nezvaanazvo achazvitorerwa. Mateu 25:29
(Cherechedzai: Kana ukasazvichengetera pfuma kudenga, zvipembenene zvinokuruma panyika, mbavha dzichapaza dzichiba. .)

7. “Anodyara zvishoma achakohwa zvishoma;

→ →Ichi ichokwadi. Mumwe nomumwe ngaaite sezvaakasarudza kuita mumwoyo make, asingaomerwi kana kumanikidzirwa, nokuti Mwari anoda vaya vanopa nomufaro. Mwari anogona kuita kuti nyasha dziwande kwamuri, kuti nguva dzose muve nokuringana kwose pazvose, uye muve nokuwanda pamabasa ose akanaka. Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi:
Akapa varombo mari;
Kururama kwake kunogara nokusingaperi.

Uyo anopa mbeu kumudyari nechingwa chokudya achawanza mbeu yokudyara kwenyu uye nezvibereko zvokururama kwenyu, kuti muve vapfumi pazvinhu zvose, kuti mugopa zvakawanda muchivonga Mwari kubudikidza nesu. 2 VaKorinte 9:6-11

6. Kuzvipira zvachose

(1) Mukuru mukuru wemupfumi

Mumwe mutongi akabvunza “Ishe” kuti: “Mudzidzisi Akanaka, ndingaiteiko kuti ndigare nhaka youpenyu husingaperi?” “Ishe” akati kwaari: “Nei uchinditi ndakanaka? Hakuna munhu akanaka kunze kwaMwari; , “Zvose izvi ndakazvichengeta kubva pauduku hwangu.” Jehovha akanzwa izvi akati, “Uchiri kushayiwa chinhu chimwe chete: tengesa zvose zvaunazvo upe kuvarombo, uye uchava nepfuma kudenga; achauya agonditevera.

Akati anzwa izvi, akasuwa zvikuru, nokuti akanga akapfuma kwazvo.

( Vakuru vakuru vakapfuma vanozengurira kuchengeta pfuma yavo kudenga )

Jesu paakamuona akati, “Zvakaoma sei kuti mupfumi apinde muumambo hwaMwari!

Chengeta pfuma isinga peri kudenga.

—--Ruka 12:33

“Musazviunganidzira pfuma panyika, pane zvipfukuto nengura zvinoparadza, uye pane mbavha dzinopaza dzichiba. Nokuda kwako pane pfuma yako, ndipo pachavawo nomwoyo wako.”— Mateo 6:19-21

(2) Tevedzera Jesu

1 akasiyiwa—Ruka 18:28, 5:11
2 Kuzviramba—Mateu 16:24
3 Tevera Jesu—Mako 8:34
4 Kutakura mharadzano dzenzira - Mako 8:34
5 Venga upenyu— Johani 12:25
6 Rashikirwa noupenyu hwako— Mako 8:35
7 Wana upenyu hwaKristu— Mateo 16:25
8 Gamuchira mbiri—VaRoma 8:17

.......

(3) Ipa sechibayiro chipenyu

Naizvozvo ndinokukumbirisai, hama, netsitsi dzaMwari, kuti mupe miviri yenyu, chive chibayiro chipenyu, chitsvene, chinogamuchirika kuna Mwari, ndiko kunamata kwenyu kwemweya. Musaenzaniswa nenyika ino, asi mushandurwe nekuvandudzwa kwefungwa dzenyu, kuti muidze muzive kuda kwaMwari kwakanaka, kunogamuchirika uye kwakakwana. VaRoma 12:1-2

7. Mhanya wakananga kuchinangwa

Hama, handizviti ndatochigamuchira, asi ndinoita chinhu chimwe: ndinokanganwa zviri shure, ndichinanavira zviri mberi, ndinoshingairira kunharidzano, kuti ndipiwe mubayiro wokudana kwekumusoro kwaMwari, muna Kristu Jesu.

VaFiripi 3:13-14

8. Pane 100, 60, uye 30 nguva

Yakakushwa muminzwa, munhu akanzwa shoko, asi kufunganya kwenyika nokunyengera kwemari zvakavhunga shoko, rikasabereka zvibereko.

Wakakushwa muvhu rakanaka, ndiye unonzwa shoko akarinzwisisa, vuye unobereka zvibereko, dzimwe nguva zvine zana, dzimwe nguva makumi matanhatu, uye dzimwe nguva makumi matatu. ” Mateu 13:22-23

[Tenda kuti uchawana zvakapetwa kazana muhupenyu huno nehupenyu husingaperi muhupenyu hunotevera]

Hakuna munhu asingagoni kurarama zvakapetwa kazana munyika ino uye asingagoni kurarama nokusingaperi munyika inouya. "

Ruka 18:30

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

Ava ndivo vanhu vatsvene vanogara voga uye vasingaverengerwi pakati pendudzi.
Kufanana ne144,000 mhandara dzakachena dzinotevera Ishe Gwayana.

Ameni!

→→Ndinomuona ari pamusoro pechikomo;
Ndivo vanhu vanogara voga, vasingaverengwi pakati pamarudzi ose.
Numeri 23:9

Nevashandi vaIshe Jesu Kristu: Hama Wang*Yun, Hanzvadzi Liu, Hanzvadzi Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi vanoshingairira kutsigira basa revhangeri nekupa mari nekushanda nesimba, nevamwe vatsvene vanoshanda nesu. vanotenda vhangeri iri, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu. Ameni! Verenga VaFiripi 4:3

Titambire hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kutsvaga nebrowser yako - kereke munashe Jesu Kristu -Tinya kuti utore. Unganidza uye ubatane nesu, shandai pamwe chete kuparidza evhangeri yaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Mufananidzo weMhandara Gumi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tiri kutsvaga kugoverana kwekuyanana: Mufananidzo weMhandara Gumi

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu pana Mateu 25:1-13 toverenga pamwe chete: “Ipapo umambo hwokudenga huchafananidzwa nemhandara gumi dzakatora marambi adzo dzikabuda kunochingamidza muroori Vakachenjera vakatora marambi avo, asi havana kutora mafuta mumidziyo yavo;

Mubvunzo: Mhandara dzinomiririrei?

mhinduro: mhandara "Zvinoreva kuchena, utsvene, kuchena, kusava nemhosva, kusina kusvibiswa, kusina chivi! Zvinomiririra kuberekwa patsva, hupenyu hutsva! Ah varume

1 Kuzvarwa nemvura nemweya-- Tarisa kuna Johane 1:5-7
2 Akazvarwa kubva muchokwadi chevhangeri--tarira kuna 1 VaKorinte 4:15, Jakobo 1:18.

3 Akazvarwa naMwari--tarira kuna Johane 1:12-13

[Ndakakuberekai muna Kristu Jesu kubudikidza nevhangeri] → Imi muri vadzidzi vaKristu mungava nevadzidzisi zviuru gumi asi vanababa vashoma, nokuti ndakakuberekai nevhangeri riri muna Kristu Jesu. 1 VaKorinte 4:15

【" mhandara “Nokuda kwekereke.

Mubvunzo: “Rambi” rinomiririrei?

Mhinduro: "Mwenje" inomiririra kutenda uye kusatya!

Chechi umo “Mweya Mutsvene” uripo! Reference Zvakazarurwa 1:20,4:5
Chiedza chinobudiswa ne“mwenje” wechechi → chinotitungamirira munzira inoenda kuupenyu husingaperi.
Shoko renyu ndiwo mwenje wetsoka dzangu, nechiedza panzira yangu. ( Pisarema 119:105 )

→→“Panguva iyoyo (ndiko kuti, pakuguma kwenyika), umambo hwokudenga huchafananidzwa nemhandara gumi dzakatora marambi (ndiko kuti, kutenda kwemhandara gumi) ndokubuda kunochingamidza (Jesu) chikomba Mateu 25:1

[Mapenzi mashanu akabata mwenje]

1 Ani nani anonzwa dzidziso dzeushe hwekumatenga, asi asinganzwisisi

“Kutenda, kutenda” kwavanhu vashanu mapenzi → kwakafanana no“Mufananidzo woMukushi”: Ani naani anonzwa shoko roumambo hwokudenga akasarinzwisisa, wakaipa anouya ndokubvisa chakadyarwa mumwoyo make. ; Mateu 13:19

2 Nokuti akanga asina mudzi mumwoyo make ... akadonha.

Yakakushwa parukangarahwe ndiye munhu anonzwa shoko origamuchira pakarepo nomufaro, asi nokuti haana mudzi mumwoyo make, anongogara kwenguva duku chete kana achitambudzwa kana kuti kutambudzwa nokuda kweshoko, pakarepo anowira pasi. Mateu 13:20-21
bvunza: Mafuta "Zvinorevei?"
mhinduro: Mafuta “Inoreva mafuta okuzodza. Shoko raMwari! Rinomiririra kuzvarwa patsva uye kugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso! Ameni.

“Mweya waShe uri pamusoro pangu, nokuti wakandizodza, kuti ndiparidzire varombo Evhangeri; :18

【 mhandara shanu dzakachenjera 】

1 Kana vanhu vanzwa shoko uye vakarinzwisisa

"Kutenda. Kutenda" kweMhandara Vashanu Vakachenjera: Chechi Iine Kuvapo kweMweya Mutsvene → Inodyarwa pavhu rakanaka ndiye anonzwa shoko ndokurinzwisisa, uye ipapo rinobereka zvibereko, dzimwe nguva zana, dzimwe nguva makumi matanhatu; uye dzimwe nguva zvakapetwa makumi matatu. ” Mateu 13:23

(Type 1 people) Ani nani anonzwa dzidziso dzehumambo hwekudenga asi asinganzwisisi... Matthew 13:19

(Rudzi rwe2 vanhu)→→... Vanhu vanonzwa shoko uye vanorinzwisisa ...Mateo 13:23

bvunza:
Dzidziso yehumambo hwekudenga chii?
Zvinorevei kunzwa mharidzo uye kuinzwisisa?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Kunzwa shoko rechokwadi → ichokwadi chehumambo hwekudenga

Uye sezvo makanzwa shoko rechokwadi, Evhangeri yeruponeso rwenyu, uye makatenda muna Kristu...

1 (Kutenda) Jesu ndiye Mesiya akatumwa naMwari - Isaya 9:6
2 (Kutenda) Jesu akanga ari mhandara akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene - Mateo 1:18
3 (Kutenda) Jesu iShoko rakava nyama - Johane 1:14
4 (Kutenda) Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari - Ruka 1:35
5 (Kutenda) Jesu ndiye Muponesi uye Kristu - Ruka 2:11, Mateo 16:16
6 (Kutenda) Jesu akarovererwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu,
Uye akavigwa - 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4, 1 Petro 2:24
7 (Kutenda) Jesu akamutswa pazuva rechitatu - 1 VaKorinte 15:4
8 (Kutenda) Rumuko rwaJesu runotibereka patsva - 1 Petro 1:3
9 (Kutenda) Tinozvarwa nemvura noMweya - Johane 1:5-7
10 (Kutenda) Tinozvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri - 1 Vakorinde 4:15, Jakobho 1:18
11 (Kutenda) Takazvarwa naMwari - Johane 1:12-13
12 (Kutenda) Evhangeri isimba raMwari roruponeso kumunhu wose anotenda - VaRoma 1:16-17
13 (Kutenda) Munhu wose akaberekwa naMwari haazombotadzi— 1 Johani 3:9, 5:18
14 (Kutenda) Ropa raJesu rinochenesa zvivi zvevanhu (kamwe) - 1 Johani 1:7, VaHebheru 1:3
15 (Kutenda) Chibairo chaKristu (kamwe) chinoita kuti avo vakacheneswa vakakwana nokusingaperi - VaHebheru 10:14
16 (Tendai) kuti Mweya waMwari unogara mamuri, uye imi (munhu mutsva) hamusi wenyama (munhu wekare) - VaRoma 8:9
17 ( Tsamba) Nyama “yomunhu wekare” inoshatisa zvishoma nezvishoma nemhaka yokunyengera kworuchiva— VaEfeso 4:22 .
18 (Tsamba) “Munhu mutsva” anogara muna Kristu uye anovandudzwa zuva nezuva nokuvandudzwa kwoMweya Mutsvene - 2 VaKorinte 4:16
19 (Kutenda) Kana Jesu Kristu adzoka uye achionekwa, vakazvarwa patsva (munhu mutsva) achaonekwawo uye achaonekwa pamwe chete naKristu mukubwinya - VaKorose 3: 3-4

20 Maari makaiswa chisimbiso noMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, iro Evhangeri yokuponeswa kwenyu—VaEfeso 1:13

【 Vanhu vanonzwa shoko uye vanorinzwisisa 】

Izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa naIshe Jesu: “Mumwe nomumwe unonzwa shoko rovushe hwokudenga... unorinzwa, akarinzwisisa, unobereka zvibereko, mumwe zana, mumwe makumi matanhatu, mumwe makumi matatu. Unonzwisisa here?


Matthew 25:5 Kana chikomba chinononoka...(Inotiudza kuti timirire nemoyo murefu kuuya kwaIshe Jesu chikomba.)

Mateo 25:6-10 ... uye chikomba chakasvika...mapenzi akati kune vakachenjera, ‘Tipeiwo mafuta nokuti marambi edu odzima.

(Chechi" rambi ”→→Hapana mafuta “chizoro”, hapana kuvapo kweMweya Mutsvene, hapana izwi raMwari, hapana kuzvarwa patsva kwehupenyu hutsva, hapana chiedza “chiedza chaKristu”, saka mwenje uchadzima)

’ Murume akachenjera akapindura kuti: ‘Ndinotya kuti hazvina kukwana kwauri newe.

Mubvunzo: Ndeipi nzvimbo inotengesa "mafuta"?
mhinduro: Mafuta "Anoreva mafuta ekuzodza! Mafuta ekuzodza ndiwo Mweya Mutsvene! Nzvimbo inotengeswa mafuta ikereke inoparidza vhangeri nevashumiri vaMwari, taurai chokwadi, uye kereke iyo mweya mutsvene unemi, kuti mugone inzwa shoko rechokwadi uye ugamuchire “mafuta okuzodza” akapikirwa oMweya Mutsvene!

’ Pavakaenda kunotenga, chikomba chakasvika. Vakange vakagadzirira vakapinda naye vakagara patafura, mukova ukapfigwa.

【Cherechedza:】

Benzi rakada kutengesa mafuta “panguva iyoyo”, asi rakatenga “mafuta” here? Hauna kuitenga, handiti? Nokuti Jesu, chikomba, auya, kereke yaShe ichabvutwa, mwenga uchabvutwa, uye maKristu achabvutwa! Panguva iyoyo, kwakanga kusina varanda vaMwari vaiparidza evhangeri kana kutaura chokwadi, uye musuo wokuponeswa wakanga wakavharwa. Vanhu mapenzi (kana kuti makereke) vasina kugadzira mafuta, Mweya Mutsvene, uye kuberekwa patsva havasi vana vakazvarwa naMwari Naizvozvo, Chikomba Ishe Jesu anoudza vanhu mapenzi kuti, “Handikuzivii imi.

(Kunewo vanoshora nemaune nzira yaMwari, vanonyonganisa nzira yechokwadi yaShe, vaprofita venhema, uye vaparidzi venhema. Sezvakataura Ishe Jesu → vanhu vazhinji vachati kwandiri pazuva iroro: ‘Ishe, Ishe! hatizi uporofita muzita renyu here, muchidzinga madhimoni muzita renyu, muchiita zvishamiso zvizhinji muzita renyu here? :22-23

Naizvozvo, tinofanira kusvinurira uye kugashira chiedza chechokwadi apo vhangeri richivhenekerwa! Kufanana nemhandara shanu dzakachenjera, vakabata marambi nemafuta mumaoko avo, vachimirira kuti chikomba chisvike.

Ngatinamatei pamwechete: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Titungamirirei isu vana kuti tipinde muchokwadi chese, tinzwe chokwadi cheumambo hwekudenga, tinzwisise chokwadi cheevhangeri, tigamuchire chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa, tigozvarwa patsva, tiponeswe, uye uve vana vaMwari! Ameni. Sezvakangoita vasikana vashanu vakachenjera vakabata marambi mumaoko avo uye vachigadzira mafuta, vanomirira chikomba nemoyo murefu. Ameni!

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

Ava ndivo vanhu vatsvene vanogara voga uye vasingaverengerwi pakati pendudzi.
Kufanana ne144,000 mhandara dzakachena dzinotevera Ishe Gwayana.

Ameni!

→→Ndinomuona ari pamusoro pechikomo;
Ndivo vanhu vanogara voga, vasingaverengwi pakati pamarudzi ose.
Numeri 23:9

Nevashandi vaIshe Jesu Kristu: Hama Wang*Yun, Hanzvadzi Liu, Hanzvadzi Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi vanoshingairira kutsigira basa revhangeri nekupa mari nekushanda nesimba, nevamwe vatsvene vanoshanda nesu. vanotenda vhangeri iri, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu. Ameni!

Verenga VaFiripi 4:3

Titambire hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kutsvaga nebrowser yako - kereke munashe Jesu Kristu -Tinya kuti utore. Unganidza uye ubatane nesu, shandai pamwe chete kuparidza evhangeri yaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: “Pfeka Nhumbi Dzemweya” 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinopfuurira kuongorora kuyanana uye kugoverana: VaKristu vanofanira kupfeka nhumbi dzokurwa dzomudzimu dzinopiwa naMwari zuva nezuva.

Chidzidzo chechinomwe: Vimba neMweya Mutsvene Namata uchikumbira chero nguva

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaEfeso 6:18 uye tiverenge pamwe chete: Nyengetera nguva dzose nemhando dzose dzemikumbiro nemikumbiro muMweya;

1. Rarama naMweya Mutsvene uye ugoita noMweya Mutsvene

Kana tichirarama noMweya, tinofanira kufambawo noMweya. VaGaratia 5:25

(1) Rarama naMweya Mutsvene

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi hupenyu neMweya Mutsvene?

Mhinduro: Kuzvarwa patsva – kurarama neMweya Mutsvene! Ameni

1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Akazvarwa kubva muchokwadi chevhangeri - 1 Vakorinde 4:15, Jakobo 1:18

3 Akaberekwa naMwari - Johane 1:12-13

(2) Famba noMweya Mutsvene

Mubvunzo: Unofamba sei neMweya Mutsvene?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Zvinhu zvakare zvapfuura, uye zvinhu zvose zvava zvitsva.

Kana munhu ari muna Kristu, ava chisikwa chitsva; 2 VaKorinte 5:17

2 Munhu mutsva anoberekwa patsva haazi wenyama yomunhu wekare

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mumoyo yenyu, imi (munhu mutsva) hamuchisiri wenyama (munhu wekare), asi weMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. VaRoma 8:9

3 Kurwisana pakati peMweya Mutsvene nekuchiva kwenyama

Ndinoti, Fambai noMweya, ipapo hamungazadzisi kuchiva kwenyama. Nokuti nyama inochiva zvinopesana noMweya, uye Mweya anochiva zvinopesana nenyama; izvi zviviri zvinorwisana zvokuti hamugoni kuita zvamunoda. Asi kana muchitungamirirwa noMweya, hamuzi pasi pomurayiro. Mabasa enyama ari pachena: upombwe, netsvina, novutere, nokunamata zvifananidzo, nouroyi, noruvengo, nokukakavara, negodo, nokutsamwa, nokupesana, nedzidziso dzakatsauka, negodo. Ndakagara ndakuudzai, uye ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. VaGaratia 5:16-21

4 urayai mabasa akaipa omuviri noMweya Mutsvene

Hama, zvinoita sokuti hatina chikwereti kunyama kuti tirarame maererano nezvinodiwa nenyama. Kana muchirarama maererano nezvinodiwa nenyama, muchafa; asi kana muchiuraya mabasa omuviri noMweya, muchararama. VaRoma 8:12-13 naVaKorose 3:5-8

5 Pfekai munhu mutsva uye mubvise munhu wekare

Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wenyu wekare namabasa ake uye mukafuka munhu mutsva. Munhu mutsva anovandudzwa muzivo mumufananidzo woMusiki wake. VaKorose 3:9-10 naVaEfeso 4:22-24

6 Nyama yomunhu wekare iri kuramba ichiipa zvishoma nezvishoma, asi munhu mutsva ari kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva muna Kristu.

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze (munhu wekare) uri kuparadzwa, munhu womukati (munhu mutsva) ari kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Kutambura kwedu kwakareruka uye kwechinguvana kuchatiitira kubwinya kusingagumi kusingaenzaniswi. 2 VaKorinte 4:16-17

7 Kura kuna Kristu, Musoro

Kugadzirira vatsvene pabasa rokushumira, nokuvaka muviri waKristu, kusvikira tose tasvika pahumwe hwokutenda, nokuziva Mwanakomana waMwari, pakukura, pachiyero choukuru hwomweya. kuzara kwaKristu, ... norudo chete kunotaura chokwadi uye kukura muzvinhu zvose maari iye Musoro, Kristu, uyo kubudikidza naye muviri wose wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete uye wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete, uye mutezo wose uchishandira chinangwa chawo uye uchitsigirana maererano ne kushanda kwenhengo imwe neimwe, zvichiita kuti muviri ukure uye uzvivake murudo. VaEfeso 4:12-13,15-16

8 Rumuko rwakanaka zvikuru

Mumwe mukadzi akamutswa kubva kuvakafa wake. Vamwe vakatsungirira chitambudzo chakakomba uye vakaramba kusunungurwa (rugwaro rwapakuvamba rwakanga rwuri rudzikinuro) kuti vawane rumuko rwuri nani. VaHebheru 11:35

2. Namata uye kumbira chero nguva

(1) Nyengetera kakawanda uye usaora mwoyo

Jesu akataura mufananidzo kuti adzidzise vanhu kunyengetera kakawanda uye kuti vasaora mwoyo. Ruka 18:1

Chose chaunokumbira mumunamato tenda chete uye uchachigamuchira. ” Mateu 21:22

(2) Udza Mwari zvaunoda kuburikidza nemunamato nekuteterera

Musafunganya pamusoro pechimwe chinhu, asi pazvinhu zvose, mikumbiro yenyu ngaiziviswe Mwari nokunyengetera nokukumbira, pamwe chete nokuvonga. Uye rugare rwaMwari, runopfuura kunzwisisa kwose, rucharinda mwoyo yenyu nemifungo yenyu muna Kristu Jesu. VaFiripi 4:6-7

(3) Namata muMweya Mutsvene

Asi, hama dzinodikanwa, zvivakei mukutenda kutsvene tsvene, munyengetere muMweya Mutsvene;

Zvichengetei murudo rwaMwari, muchitarira tsitsi dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu kuupenyu hwusingaperi. Judhasi 1:20-21

(4) Nyengetera nomudzimu pamwe chete nokunzwisisa

Pauro akati, "Ko izvi?" Ndinoda kunyengetera nomudzimu uyewo nokunzwisisa; 1 VaKorinte 14:15

(5) Mweya Mutsvene anotinyengeterera nokugomera

#Mweya Mutsvene unoreverera vatsvene maererano nokuda kwaMwari#

Pamusoro pazvo, Mweya Mutsvene anotibatsira mukusava nesimba kwedu; iye anonzvera moyo anoziva ndangariro dzoMweya, nokuti Mweya anonyengeterera vatsvene maererano nokuda kwaMwari. VaRoma 8:26-27

(6) Ngwarira, rinda uye unamate

Kuguma kwezvinhu zvose kwava pedyo. Naizvozvo, svinurai, musvinure uye munyengetere. 1 Petro 4:7

(7) Minyengetero yavanhu vakarurama inoshanda zvikuru pakuporesa.

Kana mumwe wenyu achitambudzika, ngaanyengetere; Kana mumwe wenyu achirwara, ngaadane vakuru vekereke; Munyengetero wokutenda uchaponesa munhu anorwara, uye Ishe achamumutsa; (Verenga VaHebheru 10:17) Naizvozvo reururiranai zvivi zvenyu uye munyengetererane kuti muporeswe. Munyengetero womunhu akarurama une simba guru. Jakobho 5:13-16

(8) Namata uye uise maoko pamusoro pevanorwara kuti vaporeswe

Panguva iyoyo baba vaPubhirio vakanga vavete vachirwara nefivha nekubudisa ropa. Pauro akapinda, akamunyengeterera, akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pake, akamuporesa. Mabasa 28:8
Jesu akanga asingakwanisi kuita zvishamiso ikoko, asi akangoisa maoko chete pavanhu vashomanana vairwara ndokuvaporesa. Mako 6:5

Usakurumidza kuisa maoko pamusoro pevamwe; 1 Timotio 5:22

3. Iva murwi akanaka waKristu

Shingaira pamwe chete neni somurwi wakanaka waKristu Jesu. 2 Timotio 2:3

Zvino ndakatarira, ndikaona Gwayana rimire pagomo reZiyoni, rinavamwe vanezvuru zvine zana namakumi mana navana, vane zita raro nezita raBaba varo rakanyorwa pahuma dzavo. …Ava havana kusvibiswa nevakadzi; Ndivo vanotevera Gwayana kwose kwarinoenda. Vakatengwa pakati pavanhu kuti vave zvibereko zvokutanga kuna Mwari nokuGwayana. Zvakazarurwa 14:1,4

4. Kushanda pamwe chete naKristu

Nokuti isu tiri vashandi pamwe chete naMwari; imi muri munda waMwari nechivakwa chake. 1 VaKorinte 3:9

5. Pane 100, 60, uye 30 nguva

Imwe yakawira muvhu rakanaka, ikabereka zvibereko, imwe zana, imwe makumi matanhatu, imwe makumi matatu. Mateu 13:8

6. Gamuchira mbiri, mubairo, nekorona

Kana vari vana, saka vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. VaRoma 8:17
ndinoshingairira kuchinangwa, kumubairo wekudana kwekumusoro kwaMwari, muna Kristu Jesu. VaFiripi 3:14

(Ishe akati) Ndiri kukurumidza kuuya, uye unofanira kubatisisa icho chaunacho, kuti kurege kuva nomunhu angakutorera korona yako. Zvakazarurwa 3:11

7. Kutonga naKristu

Vakaropafadzwa uye vatsvene avo vanotora chikamu pakumuka kwekutanga! Rufu rwechipiri haruna simba pamusoro pavo. Vachava vaprista vaMwari naKristu, vachabata ushe pamwe chete naKristu makore ane chiuru. Zvakazarurwa 20:6

8. Mutonge nokusingaperi-peri

Usiku hahwuchazovipo; havachazotsvaki mwenje kana chiedza chezuva, nokuti Ishe Jehovha achavapa chiedza. vachatonga nokusingaperi-peri. Zvakazarurwa 22:5

Naizvozvo, maKristu anofanira kupfeka nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzinopiwa naMwari zuva nezuva kuti vagone kudzivisa mazano adhiabhorosi, vagodzivisa muvengi mumazuva okutambudzika, uye vagoita zvose uye vagomira vakasimba. Saka mirai makasimba.

1Zvisunge chiuno nechokwadi,
2 Pfekai chidzitiro chechipfuva chokururama,
3 makapfeka gadziriro yekufamba, iyo evhangeri yerugare.
4 Pamusoro pazvo matora nhovo yerutendo, yamungagona kudzima nayo miseve inopfuta yewakaipa;
5 Pfekai ngowani yoruponeso, mutore munondo woMweya, iro Shoko raMwari;

Chinyorwa cheEvhangeri kubva:

articles.title: “Pfeka nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzomweya” 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinopfuurira kuongorora kuyanana uye kugoverana: VaKristu vanofanira kupfeka nhumbi dzokurwa dzomudzimu dzinopiwa naMwari zuva nezuva.

Mudzidzisi wechitanhatu: Pfekai ngowani yoruponeso mubate munondo woMweya Mutsvene

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaEfeso 6:17 tiverenge pamwe chete: Uye pfekai ngowani yoruponeso, uye torai munondo woMweya, iro shoko raMwari;

1. Pfekai ngowani yoruponeso

(1) Ruponeso

Jehovha ndiye akavamba ruponeso rwake, uye akaratidza kururama kwake pamberi pavahedheni;
Imbirai Jehovha, rumbidzai zita rake; Paridza ruponeso rwake zuva nezuva! Pisarema 96:2

Uyo anouya namashoko akanaka, rugare, mashoko akanaka, noruponeso anoti kuZioni: Mwari wako anobata ushe! Dzakanaka sei tsoka dzomurume uyu ari kukwira gomo! Isaya 52:7

Mubvunzo: Vanhu vanoziva sei ruponeso rwaMwari?

Mhinduro: Kuregererwa kwezvivi - wobva waziva ruponeso!

Cherechedza: Kana "hana" yako yechitendero inogara ichinzwa ine mhosva, hana yemutadzi haizocheneswi uye haizoregererwi! Waisazoziva ruponeso rwaMwari - Ona VaHebheru 10:2.
Tinofanira kutenda zvinotaurwa naMwari muBhaibheri maererano nemashoko ake. Ameni! Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Makwai angu anonzwa inzwi rangu, uye ini ndinoaziva, uye anonditevera.”— Johane 10:27
Kuti vanhu vake vazive ruponeso kubudikidza nekanganwiro yezvivi zvavo...

Nyama yese ichaona ruponeso rwaMwari! Ruka 1:77, 3:6

Mubvunzo: Zvitadzo zvedu zvinoregererwa sei?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(2) Kuponeswa naJesu Kristu

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi ruponeso muna Kristu?

Mhinduro: Tenda muna Jesu! Tenda kuevhangeri!

(Ishe Jesu) akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai mutende evhangeri!"

(Pauro) Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” ( VaRoma 1:16-17 )

Saka unotenda muna Jesu nevhangeri! Vhangeri iri ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu. Ameni.

Mubvunzo: Unotenda sei evhangeri iyi?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

[1] Tenda kuti Jesu akanga ari mhandara akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene - Mateo 1:18, 21
[2] Kutenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari- Ruka 1:30-35
[3] Tenda kuti Jesu akauya ari munhu wenyama - 1 Johane 4:2, Johane 1:14
[4] Kutenda muna Jesu ndiyo nzira yekutanga yehupenyu uye chiedza chehupenyu - Johane 1:1-4, 8:12, 1 Johane 1:1-2
[5] Tenda muna Jehovha Mwari akaisa zvivi zvedu tose pana Jesu - Isaya 53:6

[6] Tenda murudo rwaJesu! Akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu, akavigwa, akamukazve nezuva retatu. 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4

(Cherechedza: Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu!

1 kuti tose tisunungurwe kubva kuchivi - VaRoma 6:7;

2 Kusunungurwa pamurairo nokutukwa kwawo - vaRoma 7:6, vaGaratia 3:13;
3 Kununurwa pasimba raSatani - Mabasa 26:18
4 Kununurwa Kubva Munyika - Johane 17:14
Uye kuvigwa!
5 Tisunungurei pamunhu wekare nezviito zvake - VaKorose 3:9;
6 Kubva muVaGaratia 2:20
Akamutswa pazuva rechitatu!

7 Kumuka kwaKristu kwakatibereka patsva uye kwakatiruramisa! Ameni. 1 Petro 1:3 naVaRoma 4:25

[7] Kugamuchirwa sevanakomana vaMwari- vaGaratiya 4:5
[8] Pfekai munhu mutsva, pfekai Kristu - VaGaratia 3:26-27
[9] Mweya Mutsvene unopupurirana nemweya wedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari - VaRoma 8:16
[10] Tishandure (munhu mutsva) muumambo hweMwanakomana anodiwa waMwari - VaKorose 2:13
[11] Hupenyu hwedu hutsva hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari - VaKorose 3:3
[12] Kana Kristu achizoonekwa, isu tichaonekwawo pamwe naye mukubwinya - VaKorose 3: 4

Urwu ndirwo ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu. Munhu wose anotenda muna Jesu anomutswa uye anozvarwa patsva naKristu. Ameni.

2. Bata munondo woMweya Mutsvene

(1) Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa

Mubvunzo: Ungagamuchira sei Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa?

Mhinduro: Inzwai evhangeri, nzira yechokwadi, uye mutende muna Jesu!

Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. VaEfeso 1:13
Semuyenzaniso, Simoni Petro akaparidza mumba ma“Marudzi” Kornerio Ava vaHedheni vakanzwa shoko rezvokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwavo, uye vakatenda muna Jesu Kristu, uye Mweya Mutsvene wakawira pamusoro pavose vakateerera. Verenga Mabasa 10:34-48

(2) Mweya Mutsvene anopupura nemwoyo yedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari

Nekuti vose vanotungamirirwa neMweya waMwari, ndivo vana vaMwari. hamuna kugamuchira mweya weuranda kuti mugare mukutya; vana, ndivo vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari, vadyi venhaka pamwe naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye.
VaRoma 8:14-17

(3) Pfuma inoiswa mumudziyo wevhu

Pfuma iyi tinayo mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kwatiri. 2 VaKorinte 4:7

Mubvunzo: Pfuma iyi chii?

Mhinduro: Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi! Ameni

“Kana muchindida, muchachengeta mirayiro yangu. Uye ini ndichakumbira Baba, uye vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi (kana kuti Munyaradzi; iye ari pazasi), kuti ave nemi nokusingaperi, anova ndiye wechokwadi. haugoni kugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene; nokuti haumuoni, kana kumuziva, asi imi munomuziva, nokuti ugere nemi, uchava mukati menyu.

3. IShoko raMwari

Mubvunzo: Shoko raMwari chii?

Mhinduro: Evhangeri yakaparidzirwa kwamuri ishoko raMwari!

(1) Pakutanga kwaiva neTao

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. Johani 1:1-2

(2) Shoko rakazova nyama

Shoko rakazova nyama uye rakagara pakati pedu, rizere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. Johani 1:14

(3) Tenda muvhangeri uye ugozvarwa patsva.

Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Netsitsi dzake huru akatibereka patsva kuti tive mutariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa... Makaberekwa patsva, kwete nembeu inoora asi nembeu isingaori, kubudikidza neshoko raMwari benyu uye rinogara nokusingaperi. …Shoko raShe chete rinogara nokusingaperi.

Iri ndiro vhangeri rakaparidzwa kwamuri. 1 Petro 1:3, 23, 25

Hama nehanzvadzi!

Rangarira kuunganidza.

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu
