articles.title: “Pfeka Nhumbi Dzemweya” 5
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinopfuurira kuongorora kuyanana uye kugoverana: VaKristu vanofanira kupfeka nhumbi dzokurwa dzomudzimu dzinopiwa naMwari zuva nezuva.

Chidzidzo 5: Shandisa kutenda senhoo

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaEfeso 6:16 toiverenga pamwe chete: Pamusoro pazvo muchitora nhovo yokutenda, iyo inogona kudzima miseve yose yomoto yowakaipa;

(Cherechedza: Iyo bepa vhezheni ndeye "muzambiringa"; iyo yemagetsi vhezheni ndeye "nhoo").

1. Kutenda

Mubvunzo: Kutenda chii?
Mhinduro: “Kutenda” zvinoreva kutenda, kutendeseka, chokwadi, uye ameni “kunaka” zvinoreva hunhu, utsvene, kururama, rudo, mufaro, rugare, mwoyo murefu, mutsa, runako, kutendeka, unyoro, uye kuzvidzora.

2. Kuvimba

(1) tsamba

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi tsamba?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Kutenda ndirwo rusimbiso rwezvinhu zvatinotarisira, umbowo hwezvinhu zvisingaonekwi. Vanhu vekare vaive neuchapupu hunoshamisa mutsamba iyi.
Nokutenda tinoziva kuti nyika dzakasikwa neshoko raMwari, zvokuti zvinhu zvinoonekwa hazvina kusikwa kubva pane zviri pachena. ( VaHebheru 11:1-3 )

Somuenzaniso, murimi ari kudyara gorosi mumunda, anotarisira kuti kana tsanga yegorosi ikawira muvhu, ikadyarwa, ichabereka zvakawanda munguva yemberi. Uku ndiko kuwanda kwezvinhu zvinotarisirwa, umbowo hwezvinhu zvisingaonekwi.

(2) Kubva pakutenda uye pakutenda

Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” ( VaRoma 1:17 )

(3) Kutenda uye vimbiso

Tenda muna Jesu ugowana hupenyu husingaperi.
“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi.
Kubva pakutenda kuenda pakutenda.
Kubva pakutenda: Tenda muna Jesu ugoponeswa uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni.
Kusvika pakutenda: Tevera Jesu uye ufambe naye uchiparidza evhangeri, uye ugamuchire mbiri, mubairo, korona, uye kumuka kuri nani. Ameni!

Kana vari vana, saka vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. ( VaRoma 8:17 )

3. Kutora kutenda senhoo

Pamusoro paizvozvo, matora nhovo yokutenda, yamungagona kudzima nayo miseve inopfuta yowakaipa (VaEfeso 6:16).

Mubvunzo: Kutenda kungashandiswa sei senhoo?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1)Kutenda

1 Tenda kuti Jesu akaberekwa nemhandara uye akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene - Mateu 1:18, 21
2 Tenda kuti Jesu ndiye Shoko rakava nyama - Johane 1:14
3 Kutenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari—Ruka 1:31-35
4 Tenda muna Jesu seMuponesi, Kristu, uye Mesiya - Ruka 2:11, Johane 1:41
5 Kutenda muna Jehovha kunoisa chivi chedu tose pana Jesu - Isaya 53:8
6 Tenda kuti Jesu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu, akavigwa, uye akamukazve pazuva retatu - 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4
7 Kutenda kuti Jesu akamuka kubva kuvakafa uye akatimutsa patsva - 1 Petro 1:3
8 Kutenda murumuko rwaJesu kunotiruramisa—VaRoma 4:25
9 Nokuti Mweya Mutsvene anogara matiri, munhu mutsva haasisiri munhu wekare nenyama - VaRoma 8:9
10 Mweya Mutsvene unopupurirana nemweya wedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari - VaRoma 8:16
11 Pfekai munhu mutsva, pfekai Kristu - VaGaratia 3:26-27
12 Tenda kuti Mweya Mutsvene unotipa zvipo zvakasiyana-siyana, chiremera nesimba (zvakadai sokuparidza evhangeri, kuporesa vanorwara, kudzinga madhimoni, kuita zvishamiso, kutaura nendimi, nezvimwewo) - 1 VaKorinte 12:7-11 .
13 Isu takatamburira kutenda kwaShe Jesu tichakudzwa pamwe chete naye - VaRoma 8:17
14 Kumuka nemuviri uri nani—VaHebheru 11:35

15 Mutonge pamwe chete naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru uye nokusingaperi! Ameni-Zvakazarurwa 20:6,22:5

(2) Kutenda kunoshanda senhoo inodzima miseve yose inopfuta yowakaipa

1 Nzwisisai kunyengera kwewakaipa - VaEfeso 4:14
2 inogona kuramba mazano adhiyabhorosi - VaEfeso 6:11
3 Ramba miedzo yose— Mateu 18:6-9
(Semuyenzaniso: tsika dzenyika ino, zvifananidzo, mitambo yepakombiyuta, nharembozha, njere dzakagadzirwa... kutevera kuchiva kwenyama nemwoyo - VaEfeso 2:1-8)
4. Kudzivisa muvengi muzuva rokutambudzika - VaEfeso 6:13
( Sezvakanyorwa muBhaibheri: Satani akarova Jobho ndokumupa mamota kubva patsoka dzake kusvikira pamusoro wake - Jobho 2:7 ; nhume yaSatani yakaisa munzwa munyama yaPauro - 2 VaKorinte 12:7 .
5 Ndinoti kwamuri: Chenjerai mbiriso yevaFarisi (vanoruramiswa nemurairo) nevaSadhusi (vasingatendi mukumuka kwevakafa) izvi hazvireve chingwa unonzwisisa here? ” Mateu 16:11
6 Mumudzivisei, makasimba pakutenda, muchiziva kuti kutambudzika ikoko kunowira hama dzenyu panyika yose. Mwari wenyasha dzose, iye akakudanirai kukubwinya kwake kusingaperi muna Kristu, mushure mokutambudzika kwechinguvana, iye pachake uchakukwanisai, nekukusimbisai, nekukupai simba. 1 Petro 5:9-10

7 Naizvozvo teererai Mwari. Dzivisai dhiabhorosi agokutizai. Swederai kuna Mwari, uye Mwari achaswedera kwamuri… Jakobho 4:7-8

(3)Avo vanokunda kubudikidza naJesu

(Zvirinani kupfuura dhiabhorosi, zvirinani pane nyika, zvirinani pane rufu!)

Nekuti umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari unokunda nyika; uye unokunda nyika ndiko kutenda kwedu. Ndianiko anokunda nyika? Haasi iye anotenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari here? 1 Johani 5:4-5

1 Une nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kukereke. Kuno uyo anokunda, ndichapa kuti adye kubva pamuti woupenyu muParadhiso yaMwari. ’” Zvakazarurwa 2:7
2 …Unokunda haangakuvadzwi norufu rwechipiri. ’”
Zvakazarurwa 2:11
3 Anokunda, ndichapa kwaari mana yakavanzwa, nebwe jena, rine zita idzva rakanyorwa, risingazikamwi nomunhu, asi unorigamuchira. ’” Zvakazarurwa 2:17
4 Anokunda uye anochengeta mirairo yangu kusvikira kumagumo, kwaari ndichamupa simba pamusoro pemarudzi ... uye kwaari ndichapa hweva. Zvakazarurwa 2:26, 28
5 Uyo unokunda uchapfekedzwa nguvo chena, uye handichadzimi zita rake mubhuku reupenyu, asi uchapupura zita rake pamberi paBaba vangu, nepamberi pevatumwa vake vose. Zvakazarurwa 3:5
6 Unokunda ndichamuita mbiru mutembere yaMwari wangu, uye haangatongobudimozve. Uye ndichanyora paari zita raMwari wangu, nezita reguta raMwari wangu, rinova Jerusarema Idzva, rinoburuka kubva kudenga kuna Mwari wangu, nezita rangu idzva. Zvakazarurwa 3:12

7 Kune unokunda, ndichamutendera kuti agare neni pachigaro changu cheushe, seni ndakakunda ndikagara pamwe naBaba vangu pachigaro chavo cheushe. Zvakazarurwa 3:21

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

hama nehanzvadzi
Rangarira kuunganidza

2023.09.10

articles.title: Pfeka Nhumbi Dzemweya 4
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoramba tichiongorora kuyanana uye kugoverana kuti maKristu anofanira kupfeka nhumbi dzokurwa dzomudzimu dzinopiwa naMwari mazuva ose

Murairo wechina: Kuparidzira Vhangeri rorugare

Ngativhurei maBhaibheri edu pana VaEfeso 6:15 toiverenga pamwe chete: “Mapfeka gadziriro dzokufamba nadzo neevhangeri yorugare.”

1. Vhangeri

Mubvunzo: Evhangeri chii?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1)Jesu akati

Jesu akati kwavari, “Izvi ndizvo zvandaikuudzai ndichinemi kuti: Zvinhu zvose zvakanyorwa pamusoro pangu muMurayiro waMozisi, naVaprofita nomuMapisarema zvinofanira kuzadziswa vanogona kunzwisisa Magwaro, uye vanoti kwavari: “Zvakanyorwa kuti Kristu anofanira kutambudzika nokumuka kubva kuvakafa pazuva rechitatu, uye kuti kutendeuka nokuregererwa kwezvivi kunofanira kuparidzwa muzita rake marudzi ose (Evhangeri yaRuka. 24:44-47 )

2. Petro akati

Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Maererano nengoni dzake huru, akatibereka patsva kuti tive netariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa kuti tipinde munhaka isingaori, isina kusvibiswa uye isingasvavi, yamakachengeterwa kudenga. …Makazvarwa patsva, kwete nembeu inoora, asi isingaori, neshoko raMwari benyu uye rinogara nokusingaperi. ... asi shoko raShe rinogara nokusingaperi. Iri ndiro vhangeri rakaparidzwa kwamuri. ( 1 Petro 1:3-4, 23, 25 )

3. Johane akati

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. ( Johani 1:1-2 )

Pamusoro peshoko rapakuvamba roupenyu kubvira pakutanga, izvi ndizvo zvatakanzwa, takaona, takaona nameso edu timene, uye zvatakabata namaoko edu. Upenyu uhwu hwakaratidzwa, uye takahuona, uye zvino tinopupura kuti tinokupai upenyu husingaperi, hwaiva kuna Baba uye hwakaratidzwa matiri. ( 1 Johane 1:1-2 )

4. Pauro akati

Uye muchaponeswa nevhangeri iri, kana musingatendi pasina asi muchibatisisa zvandinokuparidzirai. Nokuti izvo zvandakakumikidzawo kwamuri, pakutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro (1 VaKorinde 15:2-4)

2. Vhangeri rorugare

(1)Kupa zororo

Uyai kwandiri mose makaneta makaremerwa, uye ini ndichakuzorodzai. Takurai joko rangu mudzidze kwandiri, nokuti ndiri munyoro uye ndine mwoyo unozvininipisa, uye muchawana zororo remweya yenyu. ( Mateo 11:28-29 )

(2) kuporeswa

Akarembera pamuti uye akatakura zvivi zvedu pachedu kuti, takafa kuchivi, tiraramire kururama. namavanga ake makaporeswa. ( 1 Petro 2:24 )

(3) Wana upenyu husingaperi

“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi.

(4) kukudzwa

Kana vari vana, saka vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye.

( VaRoma 8:17 )

3. Pfeka tsoka dzako nevhangeri rorugare seshangu kukugadzirira kufamba

(1)Vhangeri isimba raMwari

Handina nyadzi pamusoro peEvhangeri, nokuti isimba raMwari rokuponesa mumwe nomumwe anotenda, kumuJudha pakutanga, uye kumuGirikiwo. Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” ( VaRoma 1:16-17 )

(2) Jesu akaparidza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga

Jesu akafamba nomumaguta ose nemisha yose, achidzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, achiparidza evhangeri youmambo nokuporesa matenda ose nehosha dzose. Zvino wakati achiona zvaunga, akavanzwira tsitsi, nekuti vakange vane shungu, semakwai asina mufudzi. ( Mateo 9:35-36 Bhaibheri Rinoera )

(3) Jesu akatuma vashandi kunokohwa zvirimwa

Saka akati kuvadzidzi vake: “Kukohwa kukuru, asi vashandi vashoma. Naizvozvo kumbirai Ishe wokukohwa kuti atumire vashandi mukukohwa kwake.”

Hamutauri here kuti, ‘Kwasara mwedzi mina kuti kukohwa kusvike’? Ndinoti kwamuri, simudzai meso enyu muone minda yaibva. Mukohwi anopiwa mubayiro wake, uye anounganidza zviyo zvoupenyu husingaperi, kuti mukushi nomukohwi vafare pamwe chete. Sezvo chirevo chinoti: 'Mumwe anokusha, mumwe anokohwa', uye izvi zviri pachena kuti ndezvechokwadi. Ndakakutumai kukohwa zvamusakashandira; (Johani 4:35-38)

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

hama nehanzvadzi

Rangarira kuunganidza

articles.title: Kupfeka nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzeMweya 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovana maKristu anofanira kupfeka nhumbi dzokurwa dzemweya dzinopihwa naMwari zuva nezuva:

Mudzidzisi 3: Shandisa kururama sechidzitiro chechipfuva chokufukidza mazamu ako

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaEfeso 6:14 toiverenga pamwe chete: Naizvozvo mirai nesimba, makasunga bhanhire rechokwadi muchiuno chenyu, uye muchifukidza chipfuva chenyu nechidzitiro chechipfuva chokururama;


1. Kururamisira

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi kururamisira?
Mhinduro: "Gong" zvinoreva kururamisira, kururamisira uye kuvimbika;

Dudziro yeBhaibheri! “Kururama” kunoreva kururama kwaMwari!

2. Kururama kwevanhu

Mubvunzo: Vanhu vane “kururama” here?

Mhinduro: Kwete.

【Hakuna munhu akarurama】

Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi:
Hakuna akarurama, kunyange nomumwe.
Hakuna kunzwisisa;
hakuna anotsvaka Mwari;
Vose vari kutsauka kubva panzira yakarurama.
ivai vasina maturo pamwe chete.
Hakuna anoita zvakanaka, kunyange nomumwe.

( VaRoma 3:10-12 )

【Zvose zvinoitwa nevanhu zvakaipa】

Huro dzavo makuva akashama;
Vanoshandisa ndimi dzavo kunyengera.
Mweya unouraya wenyoka uri pamiromo yake;
Muromo wake waive uzere nekutukwa nekuvava.
Kuuraya uye kubuda ropa,
Tsoka dzavo dzinobhururuka,
Pachava nehutsinye uye hutsinye munzira.
Nzira yorugare havaizivi;
Kutya Mwari hakupo pameso avo.

( VaRoma 3:13-18 )

【Kururamiswa nokutenda】

(1)

Mubvunzo: Noa aive munhu akarurama!

Mhinduro: Noa (aitenda) muna Jehovha, akaita zvese zvaakarairwa naMwari, saka Mwari akadaidza Noa kuti murume akarurama.

Asi Nowa wakawana nyasha pamberi paJehovha.
Vazukuru vaNoa vakanyorwa pasi apa. Noa akanga ari murume akarurama uye murume akakwana muchizvarwa chake. Noa akafamba naMwari. ... Ndizvo zvakaitwa naNoa. Zvose zvaakarairwa naMwari, wakazviita.

(Genesi 6:8-9, 22)

(2)

Mubvunzo: Abrahama aive munhu akarurama!
Mhinduro: Abrahama (akatenda) muna Jehovha, Mwari akamururamisa!
Saka akamutora akaenda naye kunze akati, "Tarirai kudenga uye uverenge nyeredzi. Ungadziverenga here?" kururama kwake.

( Genesisi 15:5-6 )

(3)

Mubvunzo: Jobho aive murume akarurama here?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

"Jobho"

1 Kuperera kwakakwana:

Munyika yeUzi maiva nomumwe murume ainzi Jobho, murume akanga akakwana uye akarurama, aitya Mwari uye achinzvenga zvakaipa. ( Jobho 1:1 )

2 Mukurusa pakati pavaMabvazuva:

Zvipfuwo zvake zvaiva makwai zviuru zvinomwe, makamera zviuru zvitatu, nenzombe mbiri mbiri, namakadzi embongoro ana mazana mashanu, navaranda navarandakadzi vazhinji. Murume uyu ndiye mukuru pakati pavanhu vokumabvazuva. ( Jobho 1:3 )

3 Jobho anozviti akarurama

ndinopfeka kururama;
Pfeka kururamisira senguo yako nekorona.
Ndini meso amapofu;
Tsoka dzakakamhina.
Ndiri baba vavarombo;
Ndinoona nyaya yemunhu wandisati ndamboonana naye.
…Kubwinya kwangu kunowedzera mandiri;
Uta hwangu hwava nesimba muruoko rwangu. …Ndinosarudza nzira dzavo, uye ndinogara panzvimbo yokutanga….

( Jobho 29:14-16, 20, 25 )

Jobho akamboti: “Ndakarurama, asi Mwari akanditorera kururama kwangu;

Cherechedza: (kupfidza kwaJobho) Jobho 38 kusvika ku42, Jehovha akapindura nharo yaJobho Pashure pokunge Jobho ateerera mashoko aJehovha//

Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Jobho, Ko munhu, anoita nharo nowaMasimbaose, angakakavadzana naye here? Avo vanokakavara naMwari vanogona kupindura izvi! …(Jobho) Ndakashata! Ndichakupindurai nei? Ndakatozovhara muromo nemaoko. Ndakataura kamwe chete handina kupindura; ( Jobho 40:1-2, 4-5 )

Ndinokumbira kuti munditeerere, ndinoda kutaura; Ndakambonzwa nezvako,
Ndakuonai zvino nemaziso angu. Naizvozvo ndinozvivenga (kana shanduro: mashoko angu) uye ndinopfidza muguruva nemadota. ( Jobho 42:4-6 )

Shure kwaizvozvo, Jehovha akanzwira Jobho tsitsi, uye Jehovha akazomuropafadza kupfuura kare.

Naizvozvo, kururama kwaJobho kwaiva kururama kwevanhu (kuzviruramisa), uye akanga ari mukuru pakati pevanhu vekuMabvazuva. Akati, “Ndakabuda ndikaenda kusuo reguta ndikandomisa chigaro munzira yomumugwagwa. Majaya akandiona akandinzvenga; vatungamiri vakanyarara uye vakaisa ndimi dzavo kumusoro wemiromo yavo. Uyo anondinzwa nenzeve dzake anoti ndakaropafadzwa;

... kubwinya kwangu kunowedzera mumuviri wangu; Kana vanhu vachindinzwa, vanosimudza musoro vachimirira kutungamirirwa kwangu vanyerere.

Ndakasarudza nzira dzavo, uye ndakagara panzvimbo yokutanga… (Jobho 29:7-11, 20-21, 25)

--- Uye Ishe Jesu vakati chii? ---

“Mune nhamo imi kana vanhu vose vachitaura zvakanaka pamusoro penyu!…” (Ruka 6:26).

Jobho akazviti akanga akarurama uye “akarurama,” asi ngwavaira yakawira iye nemhuri yake gare gare, Jobho akapfidza pamberi paJehovha! Ndakambonzwa nezvako, asi zvino ndiri kukuona nameso angu chaiwo. Naizvozvo ndinozvivenga (kana shanduro: mashoko angu), uye ndinopfidza muguruva nemadota! Pakupedzisira Mwari akaropafadza Jobho nemaropafadzo akawanda kupfuura kare.

3. Kururama kwaMwari

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi kururama kwaMwari?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【Kururama kwaMwari】

Zvinosanganisira: rudo, mutsa, utsvene, tsitsi dzine rudo, kunonoka kutsamwa, kusingarangariri zvakaipa, mutsa, mufaro, rugare, mwoyo murefu, mutsa, runako, kutendeka, unyoro, kuzvininipisa, kuzvidzora, kururama, kururama, chiedza; kururama Nzira ichokwadi, upenyu, chiedza, kuporesa, noruponeso. Akafira vatadzi, akavigwa, akamutswa pazuva rechitatu, uye akakwira kudenga! Rega vanhu vatende vhangeri iri uye vagoponeswa, vagomutswa, vagozvarwa patsva, vave neupenyu, uye vave neupenyu husingaperi. Ameni!

Vana vangu vaduku, zvinhu izvi ndinokunyorerai kuti murege kutadza. Kana munhu achitadza, tine Murevereri kuna Baba, Jesu Kristu wakarurama. ( 1 Johani 2:1 )

4. Kururamisira

Mubvunzo: Ndiani akarurama?

Mhinduro: Mwari vakarurama! Ameni.

Achatonga nyika nokururama, uye achatonga vanhu nokururama. ( Pisarema 9:8 )
Kururama nokururamisa ndidzo nheyo dzechigaro chenyu choushe; rudo nechokwadi zvinokutungamirirai; ( Pisarema 89:14 )
Nokuti Jehovha akarurama uye anoda kururama; ( Pisarema 11:7 )
Jehovha ndiye akavamba ruponeso rwake, uye akaratidza kururama kwake pamberi pavahedheni ( Pisarema 98:2 )
nokuti anouya kuzotonga pasi. uchatonga nyika nokururama, nendudzi nokururamisira; ( Pisarema 98:9 )
Jehovha ndiye anoita zvakarurama, uye anotsiva vose vanoitirwa zvakaipa. ( Pisarema 103:6 )
Jehovha ane nyasha uye akarurama; ( Pisarema 116:5 )
Imi makarurama, imi Jehovha, uye mirayiro yenyu yakarurama. ( Pisarema 119:137 )
Jehovha akarurama panzira dzake dzose, ane tsitsi panzira dzake dzose. ( Pisarema 145:17 )
Asi Jehovha Wamasimba Ose akakudzwa nokuda kwokururamisira kwake; ( Isaya 5:16 )
Sezvo Mwari akarurama, achatsiva matambudziko kune avo vanokutambudzai (2 VaTesaronika 1:6).

Ndakatarira ndikaona kuti matenga akanga akazaruka. Paiva nebhiza jena, uye mutasvi waro ainzi Akatendeka uye Wechokwadi, anotonga uye anoita hondo mukururama. ( Zvakazarurwa 19:11 )

5. Shandisa kururama sechidzitiro chechipfuva chokufukidza mazamu ako

Mubvunzo: Ungachengetedza sei moyo wako nekururama?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Kunoreva kubvisa munhu wekare, kupfeka munhu mutsva, uye kupfeka Kristu! Zvishongedze zuva nezuva nokururama kwaShe Jesu Kristu, uye uparidze rudo rwaJesu: Mwari rudo, mutsa, utsvene, tsitsi dzine rudo, anononoka kutsamwa, asingarangariri zvakaipa, rudo, mufaro, rugare, mwoyo murefu, mutsa. , runako, Kutendeseka, unyoro, kuzvininipisa, kuzvidzora, kuvimbika, kururama, chiedza, nzira, chokwadi, upenyu, chiedza chavanhu, kuporesa, uye ruponeso. Akafira vatadzi, akavigwa, akamutswa nezuva retatu, uye akakwira kudenga kuti tiruramiswe! Gara kuruoko rworudyi rwaWamasimba Ose. Rega vanhu vatende vhangeri iri uye vagoponeswa, vagomutswa, vagozvarwa patsva, vave neupenyu, uye vave neupenyu husingaperi. Ameni!

6. Chengeta Tao, chengeta zvokwadi, uye dzivirira mwoyo

Mubvunzo: Ungatsigira sei nzira yechokwadi nekudzivirira moyo wako?

Mhinduro: Vimba neMweya Mutsvene uye unamatira zvakasimba kuchokwadi nenzira dzakanaka! Uku ndiko kuchengetedza mwoyo, kungofanana negirazi.

1 Chengeta mwoyo wako

Unofanira kurinda mwoyo wako kupfuura zvose.
Nokuti migumisiro youpenyu inobva mumwoyo.

( Zvirevo 4:23;

2 Vimba noMweya Mutsvene kuti uchengete nzira yakanaka

Chengeta mashoko mapenyu awakanzwa kwandiri, nokutenda norudo zviri muna Kristu Jesu. Unofanira kuchengeta nzira dzakanaka dzawakapiwa naMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri.

( 2 Timotio 1:13-14 )

3 Ani naani anonzwa shoko asi asingarinzwisisi

Ani naani anonzwa shoko roumambo hwokudenga haanzwisisi, ipapo wakaipa unouya ndokubvisa chakakushwa mumwoyo make. ( Mateu 13:19 )

Saka, unonzwisisa here?


7. Famba naMwari

Jehovha akakuratidza, iwe munhu, zvakanaka;
Anodei kwauri?
Chero bedzi muchiita zvakarurama uye muchida tsitsi.
Famba naMwari wako uchizvininipisa.

( Mika 6:8 )

8. Vanhu 144 000 vakatevera Jesu

Zvino ndakatarira, ndikaona Gwayana rimire pagomo reZiyoni, rinavamwe vanezvuru zvine zana namakumi mana navana, vane zita raro nezita raBaba varo rakanyorwa pahuma dzavo. … Vanhu ava havana kusvibiswa nevakadzi; Ndivo vanotevera Gwayana kwose kwarinoenda. Vakatengwa pakati pavanhu kuti vave zvibereko zvokutanga kuna Mwari nokuGwayana. (Zvakazarurwa 14:1, 4)

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

Hama nehanzvadzi!

Rangarira kuunganidza.

2023.08.30

articles.title: Pfeka Nhumbi Dzemweya 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kugoverana kwemigwagwa

Chidzidzo Chechipiri: Pfekai nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzomweya mazuva ose

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaEfeso 6:13-14 toiverenga pamwe chete:

Naizvozvo torai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira pamberi pomuvengi pazuva rokutambudzika, uye maita zvose, kuti mumire. Saka mirai nesimba, muchizvisunga chiuno nechokwadi...

1: Zvisunge chiuno nechokwadi

Mubvunzo: Chokwadi chii?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Mweya Mutsvene ichokwadi

Mweya Mutsvene ichokwadi.

Uyu ndiye Jesu Kirisito akauya nemvura neropa; ( 1 Johani 5:6-7 )

Mweya Wechokwadi:

“Kana muchindida, muchachengeta mirayiro yangu. Uye ini ndichakumbira Baba, uye vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi (kana kuti Munyaradzi; iye ari pazasi), kuti ave nemi nokusingaperi, anova ndiye wechokwadi. Hamugoni kumugamuchira; nokuti harimuoni, kana kumuziva, asi imi munomuziva, nokuti ugere nemi, uchava mukati menyu (Johane 14:15-17).

(2) Jesu ndiye chokwadi

Chokwadi chii?
Pirato akamubvunza akati, “Uri mambo here?” Jesu akapindura akati, “Iwe unoti ndiri mambo. Pirato akabvunza akati, “Chokwadi chiiko?”

( Johani 18:37-38 )

Jesu ndiye chokwadi:

Jesu akati, “Ndini nzira, chokwadi, noupenyu hapana anouya kuna Baba asi nokwandiri.

(3) Mwari ndiye chokwadi

Shoko ndiMwari:

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. ( Johani 1:1-2 )

Shoko raMwari ichokwadi:

Havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. Vaitei vatsvene muchokwadi; Sezvamakandituma panyika, neniwo ndavatuma panyika. Ini ndinozviita mutsvene nekuda kwavo, kuti ivowo vaitwe vatsvene muchokwadi.

( Johani 17:16-19 )

Cherekedza: Pamavambo pakanga pane Tao, Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari! Mwari iShoko, Shoko roupenyu (ona 1 Johane 1:1-2). Shoko renyu ichokwadi, naizvozvo, Mwari ichokwadi. Ameni!

2: Ungasunga sei chiuno chako nechokwadi?

Mubvunzo: Ungasunga sei chiuno chako nechokwadi?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Cherechedza: Kushandisa chokwadi sebhanhire rekusunga chiuno chako, ndiko kuti, nzira yaMwari, chokwadi chaMwari, mashoko aMwari, nekufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene, zvine simba uye zvine simba kuvana vaMwari nevaKristu! Ameni.

(1) Kuberekwazve
1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Akazvarwa kubva mukutenda kwevhangeri - 1 Vakorinde 4:15, Jakobo 1:18

3 Akaberekwa naMwari - Johane 1:12-13

(2) Pfekai munhu mutsva uye mupfeke Kristu

Pfeka munhu mutsva.

Uye pfekai munhu mutsva, akasikwa nomufananidzo waMwari mukururama kwechokwadi noutsvene. ( VaEfeso 4:24 )

Pfeka munhu mutsva. Munhu mutsva anovandudzwa muzivo mumufananidzo woMusiki wake. ( VaKorose 3:10 )

Pfeka Kristu:

Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu. ( VaGaratiya 3:26-27 )

Pfekai Ishe Jesu Kristu nguva dzose uye musarongera nyama kuchiva kwayo. ( VaRoma 13:14 )

(3) Gara muna Kristu

Munhu mutsva anogara muna Kristu.

Ikozvino hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu. (VaRoma 8:1 KJV)

Ani nani unogara maari haatadzi; ani nani anotadza haana kumuona kana kumuziva. (1 Johani 3:6 KJV)

(4) Ruvimbo-Ini handisisiri mupenyu iye zvino

Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri, uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino munyama, ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. (VaGaratiya 2:20 KJV)

(5) Munhu mutsva anobatana naKristu uye anokura kuva munhu mukuru

Kugadzirira vatsvene pabasa rokushumira, nokuvaka muviri waKristu, kusvikira tose tasvika pahumwe hwokutenda, nokuziva Mwanakomana waMwari, pakukura, pachiyero choukuru hwomweya. kuzara kwaKristu, ... norudo chete kunotaura chokwadi uye kukura muzvinhu zvose maari iye Musoro, Kristu, uyo kubudikidza naye muviri wose wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete uye wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete, uye mutezo wose uchishandira chinangwa chawo uye uchitsigirana maererano ne kushanda kwenhengo imwe neimwe, zvichiita kuti muviri ukure uye uzvivake murudo. (VaEfeso 4:12-13, 15-16 KJV)

(6) “Nyama” yomukweguru inoipa zvishoma nezvishoma

Kana makanzwa shoko rake, mukagamuchira kuraira kwake, mukadzidza zvokwadi yake, munofanira kubvisa munhu wenyu wekare, unoodza nokunyengera kwokuchiva kwake )

(7) Munhu mutsva “munhu womudzimu” anovandudzwa zuva nezuva muna Kristu

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uri kuparadzwa, asi womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Kutambura kwedu kwakareruka uye kwechinguvana kuchatiitira kubwinya kusingagumi kusingaenzaniswi. Zviri pachena kuti hatina hanya nezvinhu zvinoonekwa, asi zvisingaonekwi; ( 2 VaKorinte 4:16-18 .

Kuti kutenda kwenyu kurege kuva panjere dzavanhu, asi pasimba raMwari. (1 VaKorinde 2:5)

Cherechedza:

Pauro ndeweshoko raMwari nevhangeri! Munyama, akasangana nematambudziko nengetani munyika yeFiripi, akaona murwi akapfeka nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo. Saka akanyora tsamba kuvatsvene vose vaiva muEfeso vane zvikomborero zvomudzimu. Vanovimba nesimba raMwari uye varwi vakanaka vaKristu.

Zvichenjererei kuti murege kuita sebenzi, asi sevakachenjera. shandisai nguva, nekuti mazuva ano akaipa. Usave benzi, asi nzwisisa kuti kuda kwaShe kwakadini. Verenga VaEfeso 5:15-17

Chechitatu: VaKristu sevarwi vaKristu

Pfeka zvawakapiwa naMwari mazuva ose

-Nhumbi dzeMweya:

Zvikurukuru apo vaKristu vanenge vachinangana nemiedzo mumuviri, matambudziko, uye matambudziko; Zvisunge chiuno, ugadzirire basa rezuva rimwe.

(Sezvakataurwa naPauro) Ndine shoko rokupedzisira: Simbai munaShe nomusimba rake. Shongai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira muchirwa namano adhiabhorosi. Nokuti hatirwi nenyama neropa, asi navabati, navanesimba, namadzishe enyika erima rino, nemweya yakaipa yedenga. Naizvozvo torai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira pamberi pomuvengi pazuva rokutambudzika, uye maita zvose, kuti mumire. Naizvozvo mirai nesimba, muchizvisunga chiuno nebhanhire rechokwadi… (VaEfeso 6:10-14 KJV)

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

Hama nehanzvadzi!

Rangarira kuunganidza

2023.08.27

articles.title: rudo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
---Kusiyanisa rudo nehupombwe---

Nhasi tichaongorora kugoverana kuyanana: rudo nehupombwe

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Genesisi Chitsauko 2, ndima 23-25, tiverenge pamwe chete:
Murume akati: Uyu ipfupa remapfupa angu nenyama yenyama yangu.

Naizvozvo murume uchasiya baba namai vake, anamatire mukadzi wake, uye vaviri vachava nyama imwe. Vaviri ava vaive vasina kupfeka panguva iyi uye vaisanyara.

1. Rudo

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi rudo?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1)Rudo pakati paAdhamu naEvha

--Vaviri ava vaive vakashama vasinganyare--

1 Zvino Adhamu wakati kuna Evha: Uyu ipfupa remapfupa angu nenyama yenyama yangu;
"Vakadzi" ndizvo zvipo zvakanakisa zvakapihwa varume naMwari, ichokwadi, mutsa uye runako! Irumbidzo, mufambidzani, inyaradzo, uye mubatsiri!
2 Murume achasiya vabereki vake;
3Tora mukadzi wako,
4 Vaviri ava vachava chinhu chimwe.

5 Murume nomukadzi wake vakanga vasina kusimira, uye vakanga vasinganyari.

[Onai] Adamu naEvha vaive muBindu reEdeni, mwoyo yavo yaive yakachena, tsvene, rudo rwechokwadi, chokwadi, runako nerunako! Saka murume nemukadzi vakashama uye havana nyadzi urwu ndirwo rudo rwusati rwapinda muvanhu.)

(2)Rudo rwaIsaka naRibheka

Isaka ndokupinza Rabheka mutende raSara mai vake, ndokumutora kuti ave mukadzi wake, ndokumuda. Isaac akazonyaradzwa manje kuti mai vake vaenda. Genesisi 24:67

[Cherechedza] Isaka anofananidzira Kristu, uye Rebheka anomiririra chechi! Isaka akaroora Rabheka ndokumuda! Kureva kuti Kristu anoroora kereke uye anoda kereke.

(3)Rudo rweRwiyo Rwonziyo

【Vanodiwa Murume neVaviri】

“Mudikani” anofananidzira Kristu,
"Best Couple":
1 inofananidzira mhandara yakachena- 2 VaKorinte 11:2, Zvakazarurwa 14:4;
2 inofananidzira kereke-VaEfeso 5:32;

3 inofananidzira mwenga waKristu - Zvakazarurwa 19: 7.

Ini ndiri ruva rokuSharoni neruva romumupata.
Mudiwa wangu ari pakati pavakadzi, Seruva pakati pemhinzwa.
Mudiwa wangu ari pakati pavanhu somuapuro uri pakati pemiti.
ndakagara mumumvuri wake nomufaro, ndikaravira zvibereko zvawo;

Inonzwa kutapira. Anondipinza muimba yamabiko uye anoisa rudo somureza wake pamusoro pangu. Rwiyo Rukuru 2:1-4

Ndapota ndiise pamwoyo wako sechisimbiso uye unditakure paruoko rwako sechisimbiso.

Nokuti rudo rune simba sorufu, godo rine utsinye semheni yomoto, murazvo womoto waJehovha. Rudo harugoni kudzimwa nemvura zhinji, uye harugoni kunyudzwa namafashamo. Kana munhu akatsinhanisa pfuma yose yemhuri yake nokuda kworudo, iye achazvidzwa. Rwiyo Rukuru 8:6-7

2. Upombwe

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi upombwe neupombwe?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Maererano nomudzimu mutsvene wokutenda unoberekwazve:

1 Shamwari dzenyika--tarira kuna Jakobho 4:4
2 Kereke yakabatana nemadzimambo enyika--Verenga Zvakazarurwa 17:2

3. Avo vakavakirwa pamurairo--tarira vaRoma 7:1-3, vaGaratiya 3:10

(2) Maererano nemirairo yezvisungo zvenyama:

1 Usaita upombwe - Eksodo 20:14
2 Ani nani unoramba mukadzi wake akawana umwe unoita upombwe; ” Ruka 16:18

3 Ani naani anotarisa mukadzi neziso roruchiva atoita upombwe naye mumwoyo make - Mateo 5:27-28

3. Kusiyanisa rudo neupombwe

Mubvunzo: VaKristu vanozivisa sei rudo?

Mhinduro: Muchato wakarongwa naMwari rudo!

1Munhu anoda kusiya vabereki vake,
2Bata nomukadzi wako,
3Vaviri ava vanova mumwe,
4Kubatana kwaMwari,
5 Ngaparege kuva nomunhu anoparadzaniswa—Verenga Mateu 19:4-6
6Vakanga vasina kusimira vari vaviri,

7 Kwete kunyara - Tarisa kuna Genesisi 2:24

Mubvunzo: VaKristu vanozivisa sei upombwe?

Mhinduro: Chero ruchiva "kunze" kwewanano yakarongeka yaMwari kuita hupombwe.

(Muenzaniso:) Genesisi 6:2 Vanakomana vaMwari pavakaona vanasikana vevanhu vakanga vakanaka, vakavatora kuti vave madzimai avo akazvisarudzira.

(Cherechedza:) Achiona kunaka kwemwanasikana wemunhu (kuchiva kwenyama, kuchiva kwemaziso), anosarudza pamadiro (uye kuzvikudza kwehupenyu huno) uye anomutora somudzimai wake (uye haabvi kuna Baba " Mwari”) → Haisi muchato unorongwa naMwari . Verenga Jakobho 2:16
Genesisi 3-4 (kwete) Mwari anoshanda pamwe chete nevakadzi vevanhu kuti vabereke vana → “varume vakuru, vanhu vane simba uye vane mukurumbira” → “magamba, zvidhori, vanozvikudza, vanozvikudza” vanoda kuva “madzimambo” uye kuita kuti vanhu vanamate kana kuti vanamate. .
Jehovha akaona kuti kuipa kwomunhu kwakanga kuri kukuru panyika, uye kuti mifungo yake yose yakanga yakaipa nguva dzose, Genesi 6:5 .

4. Maitiro uye maitiro e (rudo, hupombwe)

Mubvunzo: Ndezvipi zviito rudo? Zviito izvozvo ndezveupombwe here?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Murume nomudzimai

1 Muchato webatira pamwe yaMwari

Murume achasiya vabereki vake onamatira mudzimai wake, uye vaviri vacho vachava nyama imwe! Muchato wakabatanidzwa naMwari haugoni kuparadzaniswa nemunhu. Somuenzaniso, murume anosuwa mudzimai wake kana mudzimai anosuwa murume wake vaviri vakashama uye "kubatana" pasina kunyara Tapota verenga 1 VaKorinde 7:3-4 .
Muenzaniso: Adhamu naEvha - tarisa kuna Genesisi 2:18-24
Muenzaniso: Abrahama naSara - tarisa kuna Genesisi 12:1-5

Muenzaniso: Isaka naRibheka - tarisa kuna Genesisi 24:67

2 Imba yakakomborerwa naMwari

Muenzaniso: Noa nemhuri yake - tarisa kuna Genesisi 6:18
Muenzaniso: Jakobho aidiwa naMwari, uye vadzimai vake vaviri navarandakadzi vaviri vakabereka madzinza gumi namaviri aIsraeri Uyu wakanga uri roorano yakakomborerwa naMwari!

Muenzaniso: Rute naBhoazi – Chiverengo Ruka: 4:13

3 Haisi muchato unorongedzerwa naMwari

Somuenzaniso, kana Abrahama akatora murongo ndokuvata naHagari, Abrahama achanzwa “kunyara” mumwoyo make nemhaka yokuti haana kufanirwa nomudzimai wake Sara! Nokudaro, iroorano isingafadzi Mwari. Pakupedzisira, vazhinji vevazukuru vaHagari “akabereka” Ishmaeri vakatsauka panzira dzaMwari uye vakasiya Mwari.

4 Mwari haatarisi maitiro evanhu

Muenzaniso: Tamashi naJudha

Maitiro aTamari, muroora, natezvara vake aionekwa sechivi che“ufeve” maererano nemitemo yenyama Mwari nokutenda kwake mukuberekera mwanakomana weimba yaJudha Mwari akamuzivisa kuti akarurama. Tarisa kuna Genesisi 38:24-26, Mateo 1:3 naDhuteronomi 22 “Chisungo cheKuchena”

Muenzaniso: Rahabhi naSarimoni—Mateo 1:5

Muenzaniso: Dhavhidhi naBhatishebha

Dhavhidhi akaita “upombwe nokukumbira bakatwa kuti auraye.” Pashure pokunge Dhavhidhi arangwa naMwari, akabereka Soromoni. Uye nekuti Dhavhidhi aida Mwari nemoyo wese uye aitevera kuda kwaMwari mune zvese (achitungamirira vaIsraeri kuti vavimbe naMwari), akadanwa kunzi murume wepamoyo waMwari. Ona Mabasa 13:22 na 2 Samueri 11-12 .

(2) Varume nevakadzi vasina kuroora

"Vakomana nevasikana" zvinoreva varume nevakadzi vasina kuroorana Vakomana nevasikana vanodanana uye vanoda kutanga mhuri. Kana uine pfungwa dzeruchiva nemumwe munhu mumoyo mako, uri kuita hupombwe.

Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: Asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani anotarisa mukadzi neruchiva atoita upombwe naye mumoyo make. Mateu 5:28

(3) Chirikadzi Kurambana uye nyaya dzewanano

Ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani anoramba mukadzi wake, kunze kwemhaka yeupombwe, anoita upombwe, uye ani nani anowana wakarambwa anoita upombwe. ” Mateu 19:9

[Semaonero aPauro pachake]

1 Kune vasina kuwana nechirikadzi

Kana usingakwanise kuzvibatsira, unogona kuroora. Pane kutsva nechishuwo, zviri nani kuroora. 1 VaKorinte 7:9

2 Kana murume wako akafa, unogona kuroorazve

Kana murume ari mupenyu, mukadzi wakasungwa nemurairo kana murume afa, mukadzi wakasununguka kuti awanezve sezvaanoda, asi kuna Ishe chete. 1 VaKorinte 7:39

(4) Kudanana kunze kwewanano
"Hongxing inobuda mumadziro" inotsanangura mukadzi ane maruva akazara uye zvishuwo zvake zvepabonde zvinomutswa panguva yeestrus. Murume angave achihura kana kuti mukadzi anohura, hunhu hwavo kuita hupombwe.
(5)Kuhura
Zvose zviri zviviri unzenza noufeve pakati pavarume navakadzi zviito zvoupombwe.
Naizvozvo Mwari akavaisa kukuchiva kunonyadzisa; Vakadzi vavo vakashandura zvavakasikirwa kuti vaite, zvive zvisina maturo; saizvozvowo varume vavo vakasiya basa ravo rechisikirwo, vakaparadzwa nokuchiva, nokuchiva, varume vachiita zvinonyadzisa navarume, vakafanirwa nazvo; ivo pachavo. Verenga VaRoma 1:26-27
(6)Bonhora

“Kunakirwa kwechivi”: Vamwe varume kana vakadzi vanowana kugutsikana panyama uye kunakidzwa kubva kuchivi kuburikidza nekuita bonyora mushure mekunge kupindwa muropa kwapera, vanonzwa kuzvidemba, kurwadziwa, uye kusava nechinhu mumweya yavo.

(7)Zviroto zvehusiku (zviroto zvinonyorova)

"Kufunga zuva nezuva, kurota usiku hwose": Muviri wemurume unobudisa mahomoni e-androgen uye anobudisa "urume". haazvizivi; zvimwe chetezvo kuvakadzi.” Kana ukarota uchirara nomurume une mimba, unenge uchiita hupombwe.

Revhitiko 15:16-24, 22:4 “Zvinobuda zvomurume usiku” zvinorondedzerwa sezvisina kuchena, uye zvimwe chetezvo ndezvechokwadi kuvakadzi.

5. Mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi

Mubvunzo: Munhu anganzvenga sei upombwe?

Mhinduro: Uyo anofanira “kuzvarwa patsva” uye akazvarwa naMwari haazoiti upombwe.

Mubvunzo: Sei?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Munhu mutsva akaberekwa patsva haasi wenyama - tarisa kuna VaRoma 8:9
2 Gara muna Kristu Jesu-- Tarisa kuna VaRoma 8:1
3 Zvakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari- Tarisai VaKorose 3:3

4 Uyo akaberekwa naMwari ane muviri wemweya, usina kuchiva uye nokuchiva kwenyama (munhu mutsva) haaroori kana kuwaniswa. Ona 1 VaKorinte 15:44 naMateo 22:30.

【Cherechedza】

Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari akamuka ane muviri wemweya - tarisa kuna 1 Vakorinde 15:44 munhu mutsva haazi wemuviri wekare - tarisa kuna vaRoma 8:9, saka uyo akazvarwa patsva (munhu mutsva) haana Kuchiva kwenyama nokuchiva kwenyama, uye haaroori kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroora kana kuroorwa. Munhu akaberekwa patsva haangatadzi, kana kuita upombwe.

Semuenzaniso, mirairo yezvisungo zvenyama:

1 Usauraya

Jesu akati: “Vanhu venyika ino vanowana nokuwaniswa; uye sezvo ivo vanomutswa, SoMwanakomana waMwari Ruka 20:34-36 .

[Ona:] Vanhu vatsva vanoberekwazve uye vanomutswa havagoni kufa zvakare, sengirozi. Panguva iyoyo, unofanira kuchengeta murairo wokuti “Usauraya”, handizvo here? rufu kana kutuka. Tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa 21:4, 22:3!

2 Usaita upombwe

Muenzaniso: Vanhu vanofarira kusvuta uye vasingafarire kuputa vanhu vanoda kusvuta nyama yavo inotengeswa kuzvivi (ona vaRoma 7:14) uye mwoyo yavo inotevera nyama inoda kusvuta;

Cherechedza: Nokuti munhu akaberekwa patsva muviri wemweya uye haasisina kuchiva kwenyama uye kuchiva kwenyama, havaroorwi kana kuwana, sezvinoita ngirozi.

Nokuti pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika (ona VaRoma 4:15)

Munhu akaberekwa patsva atosunungurwa kubva pamurayiro, uye hapana chikonzero chokuti uchengete mirayiro (kusaita upombwe) uye nemirau yenyama. Unonzwisisa here izvi?

3 Usaba

Cherechedza: Avo vaakagara atemera, ndivo vaakadanawo; VaRoma 8:30. Panyaya iyi, kuchiri kuba muumambo hwaMwari Ko iwe uchiri kufanira kugara ne "Usaba"?

4 Usapupura nhema

Cherechedza: Munhu mutsva akaberekwa ana Baba maari, shoko raKristu mumwoyo make, uye Mweya Mutsvene anozvivandudza pachake kuti aite zvinhu zvinofadza Baba. Ndizvozvo! Nokuti Mweya Mutsvene unogona kunzwisisa zvinhu zvose, Shoko raMwari riri matiri, uye tinogona kuona kunyange pfungwa nevavariro dzemwoyo yedu. Saka iwe uchiri kuda kutevedzera iyi mirau?

5 Usachiva

Cherechedza: Imi makazvarwa naMwari mose muri vana vaBaba Vekudenga uye muri nhaka yaBaba Vekudenga. Iye usina kutongoomera neMwanakomana wake, asi wakamukumikidza nekuda kwedu tose, ungarega sei nayewo kutipa pachena zvinhu zvose? VaRoma 8:32. Nenzira iyi, kana uine nhaka yaBaba vako vokudenga, ucharamba uchichiva zvinhu zvevamwe vanhu here?

Hama nehanzvadzi rangarirai kuunganidza

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

articles.title: “Ziva Mwari Wako Bedzi Wechokwadi”
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoongorora kuwadzana uye kugovera "Kuziva Mwari Wechokwadi"

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane 17:3, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi: kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari oga wechokwadi, naJesu Kristu wamakatuma.

1. Ziva Mwari wako mumwe chete wechokwadi

Mubvunzo: Zita raMwari mumwe wechokwadi ndiani?

Mhinduro: Jehovha ndiro zita rake!

Saka Mwari wechokwadi chete, zita rake ndiJehovha! Ameni.

Sezvakaita Mosesi akati: Zita rako ndiani?

Mwari akati kuna Mosesi: “Ndini ndini…” Mwari akatiwo kuna Mosesi: “Unoti kuvana vaIsraeri: Jehovha, Mwari wamadzibaba enyu, Mwari waAbrahama, Mwari waIsaka. , uye Mwari waJakobho akandituma kwamuri: Jehovha ndiro zita rangu nokusingaperi, uye ndicho chirangaridzo changu kusvikira kumarudzi namarudzi

Mubvunzo: Ziva Mwari wako mumwe chete wechokwadi, sezvo uriwe woga Mwari wechokwadi!
Nei vanhu vari munyika vachinamata zvidhori zvakawanda, vanamwari venhema, uye zvipoko? Zvakadai saSakyamuni Buddha, Guanyin Bodhisattva, Muhammad, Mazu, Wong Tai Sin, mwari wegonhi kumba, mwari wepfuma, mwari wenzanga mumusha, Bodhisattva, nezvimwewo, uye kune vamwari vakawanda vasingazivikanwi?

Mhinduro: Nokuti nyika haina ruzivo uye haizivi Mwari wechokwadi.

Sezvakataurwa naPauro muna Mabasa avaApostora, kuti: “Pandakanga ndichifamba-famba, ndakaona chamunonamata, uye ndakaona atari yakanga yakanyorwa kuti ‘Mwari Asingazivikanwi.’ Zvino ndinokuudzai chamunonamata chamusingaiti. ziva Mwari, iye Ishe wedenga nenyika, haagari mutembere dzakaitwa namaoko avanhu, kana kushumirwa namaoko avanhu, sokunge anoshayiwa chinhu, asi iye amene anopa kumunhu wose upenyu nokufema nezvinhu zvose. kuti asike marudzi ose avanhu, kuti agare panyika yose, uye akafanotaurawo nguva dzawo nemiganhu yenzvimbo dzavachagara, kuti vazvitsvake. Mwari anogona kunzwisiswa, asi haasi kure nomumwe nomumwe wedu; . Avo vakaberekwa ngavarege kufunga kuti umwari hwaMwari hwakafanana nendarama, kana nesirivha, kana ibwe, zvakavezwa noumhizha kana murangariro womunhu; Mwari haatariri, asi zvino anorayira vanhu vose kwose kwose kuti vatendeuke, nokuti akatara zuva raachatonga nyika nokururama kubudikidza nomurume waakagadza, uye achapa tariro kuvanhu vose nokumumutsa kubva kudenga. ufakazi hwakafa.” Mabasa 17:23-31 .

2. Hakuna mumwe mwari kunze kwaJehovha

Mubvunzo: Pane mumwe mwari kunze kwaMwari mumwe wechokwadi here?

Mhinduro: Ndini Jehovha, hakuna mumwe mwari kunze kwangu; Kunyange imi musingandizivi, ndichasunga zviuno zvenyu (ndiko kuti, sunga chiuno chenyu nechokwadi, kuti muzive chokwadi, kuti muzive Mwari wechokwadi).

Kubva parinobuda zuva kusvikira kwarinovirira, vanhu vose ngavazive kuti hakuna mumwe mwari kunze kwangu. ndini Jehovha, hakuna mumwe mwari kunze kwangu. Isaya 45:5-6

【Ani naani anotenda kuna Jehovha achaponeswa.

Munofanira kutaura uye nokuisa pfungwa dzenyu, uye itai kuti varangane pakati pavo. Ndiani akazviratidza kubva panguva yekare-kare? Ndiani akazvitaura kubva kare? Handizini Jehovha here? Hakuna mumwe Mwari kunze kwangu; Tarirai kwandiri, imwi migumo yose yenyika, mugoponeswa; nekuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe. Isaya 45:21-22

3. Mwari wechokwadi chete ane vanhu vatatu

(1)Baba, Mwanakomana, Mweya Mutsvene

Jesu akauya kwavari akati kwavari, “Simba rose rakapiwa kwandiri kudenga napanyika. Naizvozvo endai mudzidzise marudzi ose, muchivabhabhatidza muzita raBaba neroMwanakomana neroMweya Mutsvene. “Muvabhabhatidze muzita raBaba neroMwanakomana neroMweya Mutsvene) uye muvadzidzise kuchengeta zvinhu zvose zvandakakurayirai, uye ini ndinemi nguva dzose, kusvikira pakuguma kwenyika.” ( Mateu 28:18 -20

(2)Mazita aBaba, Mwanakomana, uye Mweya Mutsvene

Mubvunzo: Muzita raBaba, reMwanakomana, neroMweya Mutsvene! Zita raMwari here? Kana kuti zita?

Mhinduro: "Baba, Mwanakomana" izita, kwete zita! Semuenzaniso, baba vako ndivo vamunodaidza kuti "Baba" harisi zita rakapihwa baba vako ndiLi XX, Zhang XX, nezvimwe. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Mazita aBaba, Mwanakomana, uye Mweya Mutsvene ndiani?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Zita raBaba: Jehovha Baba— Eksodho 3:15
2 Zita roMwanakomana: Jehovha Mwanakomana! Shoko rakava nyama rikanzi Jesu! Tarisa kuna Mateo 12:21, Ruka 1:30-31

3 Zita roMweya Mutsvene: unonziwo Munyaradzi kana Kuzodza—Johani 14:16, 1 Johani 2:27

(3) Mwari wechokwadi chete ane vanhu vatatu

Mubvunzo: Baba, Mwanakomana, Mweya Mutsvene! Vamwari vanganiko vakadai?

Mhinduro: Kuna Mwari mumwe chete, Mwari wechokwadi chete!

Asi tina Mwari mumwe, ivo Baba, kwaari kunobva zvinhu zvose, uye kwatiri tinobva kwaari, naIshe mumwe, Jesu Kristu, kwaari kunobva zvinhu zvose, nesu tiripo naye. 1 VaKorinte 8:6

Mubvunzo: Vanhu vatatu ndivanaani?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Mweya Mutsvene mumwe chete
Kune marudzi akasiyana ezvipo, asi Mweya mumwe. 1 VaKorinte 12:4
2 Asi kuna Ishe mumwe chete, Ishe Jesu Kristu!
Kune hushumiri hwakasiyana, asi Ishe mumwe. 1 VaKorinte 12:5
3 Mwari mumwe

Kuna marudzi akasiyana amabasa, asi ndiMwari mumwe, iye anoita zvose muvanhu vose. 1 VaKorinte 12:6

Mubvunzo: Mweya Mutsvene ndimumwe, Ishe ndimumwe, uye Mwari mumwe chete! Havazi vamwari vatatu ava here? Kana kuti ndimwari?

Mhinduro: “Mwari” ndiMwari, Mwari mumwe chete wechokwadi!

Mwari mumwe wechokwadi ane vanhu vatatu: Mweya Mutsvene mumwe, Ishe mumwe, uye Mwari mumwe! Ameni.

(Sezvo) kune muviri mumwe noMweya mumwe, sezvamakadanirwa kutariro imwe. Ishe mumwe, nokutenda kumwe, norubhabhatidzo rumwe, Mwari mumwe naBaba vavose, pamusoro pavose, kubudikidza navose, uye muna vose. VaEfeso 4:4-6

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Zvakanaka, ngatigoverane kuyanana kuno nhasi!

Ngatinamatei kuna Mwari pamwe chete: Mazvita Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, uye tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekuvhura maziso edu emweya kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya! Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari oga wechokwadi, naJesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

articles.title: “Fambai noMweya” 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora, traffic, uye kugovera!

Chidzidzo Chechipiri: Mabatiro Anoita VaKristu Nechivi

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna VaGaratiya 5:25 toiverenga pamwe chete: Kana tichirarama noMweya, tinofanirawo kufamba noMweya.

Dzokeraizve kuna VaRoma 8:13. Kana muchirarama maererano nenyama, muchafa;

Mubvunzo: Chii chatinofanira kuita pamusoro pekudarika kwenyama?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 vasingaverengeri kudarika kwavo (kwemunhu mutsva), asi vakatipa isu shoko rokuyananisa - Verenga 2 VaKorinte 5:19
2 Kana tichirarama noMweya, tinofanirawo kufamba noMweya - Reference Gal 5:25
3 Urayai mabasa omuviri noMweya Mutsvene--Verenga VaRoma 8:13
4 Urayai mitezo yenyu iri panyika - tarisai VaKorose 3:5
5 Isu (munhu wekare) takarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama.
6 Zvitorei imi (varume vakuru) makafa kuchivi - Ona VaRoma 6:11
7Ani naani anovenga upenyu hwake (hwemunhu wekare) munyika ino anofanira kuchengetedza upenyu hwake (hutsva) upenyu husingaperi. Chirevo pamusoro pe12:25

8 Mitemo Yetsika Yevatendi Vatsva—Tarira VaEfeso 4:25-32

[Testamende Yekare] Naizvozvo, muTesitamende yekare, maiva nemirau nemirau, asi hapana airuramiswa nomutemo pamberi paMwari hazvina zvazvinobatsira - Tarisai VaKorose 2:20-23

Mubvunzo: Sei zvisingashande?

Mhinduro: Nokuti munhu wose anoshanda nomurayiro ari pasi pechituko... Hakuna munhu anoruramiswa nomurayiro pamberi paMwari.

[Testamente Itsva] MuTestamente Itsva, makafawo kumurairo nomuviri waKristu...uye zvino makasunungurwa pamurairo - tarisai vaRoma 7:4,6! Mava vaKristu vakazvarwa patsva vane huvepo hwoMweya Mutsvene. Kana tichirarama noMweya Mutsvene, tinofanirawo kufamba noMweya Mutsvene - ona vaGaratiya 5:25. Kureva kuti, tinofanira kuvimba noMweya Mutsvene kuti auraye mabasa ose akaipa ezvishuvo zvenyama, kuvenga upenyu hwechivi hwe (munhu wekare), uye kuchengetedza (munhu mutsva) kuupenyu husingaperi! (Munhu mutsva) NoMweya Mutsvene bereka: rudo, mufaro, rugare, mwoyo murefu, unyoro, kunaka, kutendeka, kupfava, kuzvidzora! VaGaratia 5:22-23 . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

9. Isa pfuma mumudziyo wevhu

Pfuma iyi tinayo mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kwatiri. 2 VaKorinte 4:7

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi mwana?

Mhinduro: “Pfuma” ndiMweya Mutsvene wechokwadi – tarisa kuna Johane 15:26-27

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi hari yevhu?

Mhinduro: "Mudziyo wevhu" zvinoreva kuti Mwari anoda kukushandisa semudziyo unokosha - tarisa kuna 2 Timotio 2:20-21 Pfuma yakaiswa mumudziyo wevhu Mweya Mutsvene wakaiswa pamunhu wedu mutsva.

Mubvunzo: Sei dzimwe nguva tichitadza kuratidza simba reMweya Mutsvene?

Zvakadai se: kuporesa zvirwere, kudzinga madhimoni, kuita zvishamiso, kutaura nendimi ... nezvimwewo!

Mhinduro: Simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari, kwete kwatiri.

Somuenzaniso: VaKristu pavakatanga kutenda muna Jesu, vaizoona zviratidzo nezviroto zvakawanda, uye zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoshamisa zvaizoitika pavari. Asi zvino inooneka zvishoma nezvishoma kana kuti inonyangarika. Chikonzero chacho ndechokuti pashure pokunge tatenda muna Jesu, mwoyo yedu yakatevera nyama, yakava nehanya nezvinhu zvenyama, uye yakatevera nyika, uye takanga tisingagoni kuratidza simba raMweya Mutsvene.

10. Rufu runoita matiri kuratidza hupenyu hwaJesu

Tinogara takatakura rufu rwaJesu nesu kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri. ... Saizvozvo kufa kunobata matiri, asi upenyu hunobata mamuri. 2 VaKorinte 4:10, 12

Mubvunzo: Chii chiri kutanga rufu?

Mhinduro: Rufu rwaJesu runoiswa matiri! Kana takabatanidzwa naye mukufanana norufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake - Ona VaRoma 6:5 uye isu nguva dzose takatakura mweya waJesu pamwe chete nesu. Tora muchinjikwa wako uye uve nzira yaShe. 35. Kana uine hupenyu hwaJesu, unogona kuburitsa hupenyu hwaJesu!

“Zuva iroro risati rasvika”, munhu wose anofanira kufa kamwe chete, uye munhu wose ari munyika achasangana “nokuberekwa, kukwegura, kurwara norufu” uye kunyange kufa nokuda kwezvimwe zvinhu, asi vaKristu vanofanira kunyengetera zvakanyanya kuna Ishe Jesu uye vasarega zvavo muviri wenyama "kuberekwa, kuchembera".Kurwara.Kufa", rega kutambudzwa ne "chirwere" uye kufa nemarwadzo emuviri, kufira muchipatara, kana kufira pamubhedha wechipatara; Tinofanira kunyengetera kuna Ishe Jesu kuti aite kuti rufu rwake rusimbiswe mumunhu wedu wekare. Zvichida kana wakwegura, chishuvo chakanakisisa ndechokufa mumuviri uri muhope kana kuti kufa nenzira yomuzvarirwo uye norugare muhope dzako.

11. Munhu wekare anova akaipa zvishoma nezvishoma, uye munhu mutsva anokura zvishoma nezvishoma

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uri kuparadzwa, asi womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. 2 VaKorinte 4:16

Cherechedza:

(Munhu akwegura) “Muviri wokunze” ndiwo muviri unooneka uchibva kunze kunyange zvazvo uchiparadzwa, nyama yomunhu akwegura inova yakaipa zvishoma nezvishoma nokuda kwokunyengera kworuchiva - nongedzera kuna VaEfeso 4:22 .

(Munhu Mutsva) Chinomutswa pamwe chete naKristu muviri wemweya - tarisa kuna 1 Vakorinde 15:44 hupenyu hwako hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari - tarisa kuna VaKorose 3: 3 maererano nezviri mandiri (chinyorwa chekutanga: "munhu " ") - Verenga VaRoma 7:22.

→→Asingaoneki (munhu mutsva) akaberekwa naMwari, akabatanidzwa naKristu, anokura zvishoma nezvishoma kuva murume, achizadzika chimiro choukuru hwakazara hwaKristu - nongedzera kuna VaEfeso 4:12-13 .

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze (nyama yomunhu wekare) uchiparadzwa, muviri womukati (munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva) uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva uye “unokura kuva murume”. Kutambudzika kwedu kwechinguvana uye kwakareruka (kubvisa kutambudzika kwemunhu wekare) kuchazadzisa kwatiri (munhu mutsva) kubwinya kusingaenzaniswi uye kusingaperi. Zvinoitika kuti hatina hanya nezvatinoona (munhu wekare), asi tine hanya nezvatisingaoni (munhu mutsva); onai (munhu mutsva) anogara nekusingaperi. Tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 4:16-18.

12. Kristu anooneka, uye munhu mutsva anooneka uye anopinda muupenyu husingaperi

Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. VaKorose 3:4

1 Hama dzinodikanwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichazova zvichigere kuratidzwa. 1 Johani 3:2
2 Asi kana vari vaya vakavata muna Kristu, Mwari achavaunzawo pamwe chete naJesu - nokuti - verenga 1 VaTesaronika 4:13-14
3 Kune avo vapenyu uye vanoramba varipo, muchinguvana, mukubwaira kweziso, nyama inoora ino“shandurwa” kuva muviri womudzimu usingaori - nongedzera kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:52 , NW.
4 Muviri wake wakaderera wakashandurwa chitarisiko kuti uve somuviri wake amene unobwinya—Rejera kuna VaFiripi 3:21 .
5 Achatorwa pamwe chete navo mumakore kuti asangane naShe mudenga - verenga 1 VaTesaronika 4:17
6 Kana Kristu achizoonekwa, isu tichaonekwawo pamwe chete naye mukubwinya - Verenga VaKorose 3: 4
7 Mwari werugare ngaakuitei vatsvene zvakazara; Mweya wenyu, nomwoyo uye nomuviri zvichengetwe zvisina mhosva pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Iye unokudanai akatendeka uye achazviita. Verenga 1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:
kereke munashe Jesu Kristu
Ava ndivo vanhu vatsvene vanogara voga uye vasingaverengerwi pakati pendudzi.
Kufanana ne144,000 mhandara dzakachena dzinotevera Ishe Gwayana.
Ameni!
→→Ndinomuona ari pamusoro pechikomo;
Ndivo vanhu vanogara voga, vasingaverengwi pakati pamarudzi ose.
Numeri 23:9
Nevashandi vaIshe Jesu Kristu: Hama Wang*Yun, Hanzvadzi Liu, Hanzvadzi Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi vanoshingairira kutsigira basa revhangeri nekupa mari nekushanda nesimba, nevamwe vatsvene vanoshanda nesu. vanotenda vhangeri iri, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu. Ameni!
Verenga VaFiripi 4:3

articles.title: “Fambai noMweya” 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tichaongorora kugovana traffic pamwe chete

Chidzidzo Chekutanga: Mabatiro Anoita VaKristu Nechivi

Ngativhurei kuna VaRoma 6:11 muBhaibheri redu toiverenga pamwe chete: Naizvozvo nemiwo muzviverenge semafa kuchivi, asi muri vapenyu kuna Mwari muna Kristu Jesu.

1. Nei vanhu vachifa?

Mubvunzo: Nei vanhu vachifa?
Mhinduro: Vanhu vanofa nokuda kwe“chivi”.

Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. VaRoma 6:23

Mubvunzo: “Chivi chedu” chinobvepi?
Mhinduro: Inobva kuna tateguru wekutanga Adhamu.

Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza. VaRoma 5:12

2. Tsanangudzo ye“mhosva”

(1) chivi

Mubvunzo: Chivi chii?
Mhinduro: Kutyora mutemo chivi.

Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro chivi. 1 Johani 3:4

(2) Zvivi zvinoendesa kurufu uye zvivi (kwete) zvinoendesa kurufu

Kana munhu achiona hama yake ichiita chivi chisingaurayisi, anofanira kumunyengeterera, uye Mwari achamupa upenyu; Kusarurama kose chivi, uye kune zvivi zvisingaurayisi. 1 Johani 5:16-17

Mubvunzo: Chivi chinoendesa kurufu chii?

Mhinduro: Mwari anoita sungano nemunhu!

se:

1 Chivi chaAdhamu chekutyora chibvumirano mubindu reEdeni—Tarira kuna Genesi 2:17.
2 Mwari akaita sungano nevaIsraeri (kana munhu upi noupi akaputsa sungano yacho, chinenge chiri chivi) - tarira kuna Ekisodho 20:1-17

3 Chivi chekusatenda muTesitamende Itsva -- Tarisa kuna Ruka 22:19-20 naJohani 3:16-18.

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi chivi “kwete” chinoendesa kurufu?

Mhinduro: Kudarika kwenyama!

Mubvunzo: Sei kudarika kwenyama (kwete) kuri kutungamirira kurufu?

Mhinduro: Nokuti makatofa - tarisai VaKorose 3:3;

Nyama yedu yakare yakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu nokuchiva kwayo uye nokuchiva kwayo - tarisa vaGaratiya 5:24 muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa kuti tisazovazve varanda vechivi - tarisa vaRoma 6:6;

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, hausi wenyama – ona vaRoma 8:9;

Zvino handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri - Reference Gal 2:20.

Mwari Nesu【Testamente Itsva】

Ipapo akati: Handicharangariri zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo; Sezvo zvivi izvi zvaregererwa, hapachina zvibayiro zvechivi. VaHebheru 10:17-18 Unonzwisisa here izvi?

3. Kutiza rufu

Mubvunzo: Munhu anopukunyuka sei kubva murufu?

Mhinduro: Nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu - tarisa kuna VaRoma 6:23

(Kana muchida kusunungurwa parufu, munofanira kusunungurwa pachivi; kana muchida kusunungurwa pazvivi, munofanira kusunungurwa pasimba romurayiro.)

Die! Simba rako rekukunda riripi?
Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi?

Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo. 1 VaKorinte 15:55-56

4. Tiza kubva pasimba remutemo

Mubvunzo: Ungapukunyuka sei kubva pasimba remurairo?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Wakasununguka pamurairo

Saka, hama dzangu, nemiwo makafa kumurayiro kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu, kuti muve vamwe, iye akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, kuti tiberekere Mwari zvibereko. Asi sezvo takafa kumurairo wakanga wakatisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe novutsva hwomweya (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare. yemhemberero. VaRoma 7:4, 6

2 Kusununguka paKutukwa kweMutemo

Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, nokuva chituko nokuda kwedu;

3 Kununurwa pamurairo wechivi norufu

Ikozvino hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu. Nekuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu. VaRoma 8:1-2

5. Kuberekwazve

Mubvunzo: Unotendei mukuzvarwa patsva?

Mhinduro: (Tendai) vhangeri rinozvarwa patsva!

Mubvunzo: Evhangeri chii?

Mhinduro: Zvandakakupawo ndezvokuti: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neMagwaro. 4

Mubvunzo: Kumuka kwaJesu kwakatiberekera sei?

Mhinduro: Ngaarumbidzwe Mwari uye Baba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Maererano nengoni dzake huru, akatibereka patsva kuti tive netariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa kuti tipinde munhaka isingaori, isina kusvibiswa uye isingasvavi, yamakachengeterwa kudenga. Iwe unochengetwa nesimba raMwari kubudikidza nokutenda uchagamuchira ruponeso rwakagadzirirwa kuratidzwa munguva yekupedzisira. 1 Petro 1:3-5

Mubvunzo: Tinozvarwa patsva sei?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Kuzvarwa nemvura nemweya- Tarisa kuna Johane 3:5-8
2 Akazvarwa kubva muchokwadi chevhangeri-tarira kuna 1 VaKorinte 4:15;

3 Akaberekwa naMwari—tarira kuna Johani 1:12-13;

6. Bvisa murume mukuru nemaitiro ake

Mubvunzo: Nzira yekubvisa sei murume wekare uye maitiro ake?

Mhinduro: Nokuti kana takabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo werufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nekumuka kwake, tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe. kuti tirege kubata muranda wezvivi, vaRoma 6:5-6

Cherechedza: Takafa, tikavigwa, uye takamutswa pamwe chete naKristu Jesu akamuka kubva kuvakafa uye akatizvarwa patsva. VaKorose 3:9

7. Munhu mutsva (haasi we) munhu wekare

Mubvunzo: Mudhara chii?

Mhinduro: Nyama yose inobva kumidzi yenyama yaAdhamu ndeyemunhu akwegura.

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi mutsva?

Mhinduro: Nhengo dzese dzakazvarwa kubva kuna Adamu wekupedzisira (Jesu) vanhu vatsva!

1 Kuzvarwa nemvura nemweya- Tarisa kuna Johane 3:5-8
2 Akazvarwa kubva muchokwadi chevhangeri-tarira kuna 1 VaKorinte 4:15;

3 Akaberekwa naMwari—tarira kuna Johani 1:12-13;

Mubvunzo: Sei munhu mutsva (asiri we) mutaru?

Mhinduro: Kana Mweya waMwari (kureva Mweya Mutsvene, Mweya waJesu, Mweya waBaba Vekudenga) uchigara mauri, hausisiri wenyama (munhu wekare waAdamu), asi (munhu mutsva) Mweya Mutsvene (ndiko kuti, woMweya Mutsvene, asi waKristu ndewaMwari Baba). Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Tarisai kuna VaRoma 8:9.

8. Mweya Mutsvene nenyama

1 muviri

Mubvunzo: Muviri ndewaani?

Mhinduro: Nyama ndeyemunhu akwegura uye yakatengeswa kuzvivi.

Tinoziva kuti murayiro ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa kuzvivi. VaRoma 7:14

2 Mweya Mutsvene

Mubvunzo: Mweya Mutsvene unobvepi?
Mhinduro: Kubva kuna Mwari Baba! Munhu mutsva ndeweMweya Mutsvene

Asi kana Munyaradzi asvika, iye wandichatuma kubva kuna Baba, Mweya wechokwadi, unobuda kuna Baba, uchapupura nezvangu. Johani 15:26

3 Kurwisana pakati peMweya Mutsvene nekuchiva kwenyama

Nokuti nyama inochiva zvinopesana noMweya, uye Mweya anochiva zvinopesana nenyama; izvi zviviri zvinorwisana zvokuti hamugoni kuita zvamunoda. VaGaratia 5:17

Mubvunzo:Ndezvipi zvishuvo zvenyama yamudhara?
Mhinduro: Mabasa enyama ari pachena: hupombwe, netsvina, novutere, nokunamata zvifananidzo, nouroyi, noruvengo, negodo, nokutsamwa, nemapoka, nokupesana, nedzidziso dzakatsauka, negodo. Ndakagara ndakuudzai, uye ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. VaGaratia 5:19-21

4 Munhu mutsva anofarira murairo waMwari;

Nokuti maererano nerevo yomukati (mashoko ekutanga munhu) (ndiko kuti, munhu akaberekwazve), (munhu mutsva), ndinoda murayiro waMwari; nemurairo mumoyo mangu, uye mundiite nhapwa kuti ndienderane nemurairo wechivi mumitezo. Ndine nhamo! Ndiani angandiponesa pamuviri uyu worufu? Mwari ngaavongwe kuti tinogona kupukunyuka kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Nenzira iyi, ndinoteerera mutemo waMwari nemoyo wangu (munhu mutsva), asi nyama yangu (munhu wekare) inoteerera mutemo wechivi. VaRoma 7:22-25

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi mutemo waMwari?

Mhinduro: "Mutemo waMwari" mutemo weMweya Mutsvene, mutemo wekusunungurwa, uye chibereko cheMweya Mutsvene - tarisa kuna vaRoma 8: 2 - tarisa vaGaratiya 6: 2; zverudo - tarisa vaRoma 13:10, Mateo 22:37-40 na 1 Johane 4:16;

Ani nani akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi - tarisa kuna 1 Johane 3:9 "Mutemo waMwari" ndiwo mutemo werudo. Nenzira iyi, kusatadza → mutemo waMwari chero ani zvake akaberekwa naMwari haazoputsi mutemo nechivi. Unonzwisisa here?

(Kana kuine huvepo hweMweya Mutsvene, vatendi vakazvarwa patsva vachanzwisisa pavanongonzwa, nekuti kana mashoko aMwari angozarurwa chete, vanobudisa chiedza uye vanoita kuti mapenzi anzwisise. Zvikasadaro, vamwe vanhu havanganzwisisi kunyange zvavo miromo yakaoma here? chivi,” mwoyo yavo inoomeswa, uye vanoomesa mitsipa mikukutu.

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi mutemo wechivi?

Mhinduro: Uyo anotyora mutemo uye anoita zvinhu zvisina kururama → Iye anotyora mutemo uye anoita chivi mutemo wechivi. Verenga Johani 13:4

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi mutemo werufu?

Mhinduro: Tsananguro ine hudzamu pazasi - VaRoma 8:2

#. .Nezuva raunoudya chokwadi uchafa—Genesisi 2:17
# ..Nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu - VaRoma 6:23
# ..Kana musingatendi kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu - Johane 8:24
# ..Kana musingatendeuki, nemi mose muchaparara saizvozvo!— Ruka 13:5

Naizvozvo, kana ukasatendeuka → usatenda kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu, usatenda muevhangeri, uye usatenda mu "Testamente Itsva" Imi mose muchaparara → iyi ndiyo "mutemo werufu". Unonzwisisa here?

4 Zvivi Zvenyama Yomunhu Akwegura

Mubvunzo: Muviri wemunhu wekare waiteerera mutemo wechivi, aifanira kureurura zvivi zvake here?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

[Johane akati:] Kana tichiti isu (munhu wekare) hatina zvivi, tinozvinyengera, zvokwadi haizi matiri. Kana tichireurura zvivi zvedu, Mwari akatendeka uye akarurama uye achatikanganwira zvivi zvedu nokutinatsa pakusarurama kwose. Kana tichiti isu (munhu wekare) hatina kutadza, tinoti Mwari murevi wenhema, uye shoko rake harisi matiri. 1 Johani 1:8-10

[Pauro akati: ] Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti isu (munhu mutsva) tirege kuvazve varanda vechivi. VaRoma 6:6 Hama, zvinoita sokuti isu (munhu mutsva) hatina chikwereti kunyama kuti tirarame maererano nenyama. VaRoma 8:12

[Johane akati] Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; uye haangatadzi, nekuti (munhu mutsva) akaberekwa naMwari. 1 Johani 3:9

【Cherechedza:】

Vanhu vazhinji vanofunga zvisiri izvo kuti zvikamu zviviri izvi muna 1 Johane 1:8-10 uye 3:9 zvinopokana.

“Wokutanga” ndeweavo vasina kuzvarwa patsva uye vasingatendi muna Jesu, nepo “wekupedzisira” ndeweavo vanotenda muna Jesu uye vakazvarwa patsva (vanhu vatsva); mumwe” ndeweavo vanotenda muna Jesu Marudzi gumi namaviri eIsraeri aigara muna. 1:1.

Uye Pauro ainyatsoziva mutemo uye akati, “Iyo pfuma pakutanga yava kurashikirwa nokuda kwaKristu – verenga VaFiripi 3:5-7; Pauro akagamuchira chizaruro chikuru (munhu mutsva) uye akatorwa. naMwari kumatenga echitatu, “paradhiso yaMwari.”—Ona 2 VaKorinte 12:1-4 .

Uye matsamba akanyorwa naPauro chete anoti: 1 Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mamuri, imi hamusi munyama.” 2 Mweya Mutsvene unochiva zvinopesana nenyama. 3 “Munhu wekare ndewenyama uye munhu mutsva ndewemweya. 4 Nyama neropa hazvigoni kuutakura umambo hwaMwari, 5 Ishe Jesu akatiwo nyama haibatsiri chinhu.

Nokuti munhu akaberekwa kutsva anoteerera murayiro waMwari uye haatadzi asi nyama (yakare) yakatengeswa kuchivi, asi anochengeta murayiro wechivi. Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausi wenyama – tarisa kuna VaRoma 8:9 kureva kuti (munhu mutsva) haazi wenyama (munhu wekare), uye (munhu mutsva) anoita kusava nechikwereti kunyama (kureva, chikwereti chezvivi), kuterera Nyama inorarama - ona vaRoma 8:12.

Nenzira iyi, munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva haa“reururi” zvivi zvenyama yemunhu wekare, kana ukati unoda kureurura, dambudziko rinovapo, nekuti nyama (munhu wekare) anoteerera murairo wechivi zuva nezuva, uye izvo. vanotyora murairo nekuita zvitadzo vane mhosva ye "zvivi" unozokumbira ropa rinokosha raShe "kazhinji" kuti ribvise nekunatsa zvivi zvako. sungano yokutsvenesa se "yakajairika" uye kuzvidza Mweya Mutsvene wenyasha --Chiverengo VaHebheru 10:29,14! Naizvozvo, vaKristu havafaniri kuva mapenzi, uyewo havafaniri kuchemedza Mudzimu Mutsvene waMwari.

Mubvunzo: Ndinotenda kuti munhu wangu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu uye muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa handisisiri ini ndinorarama zvino , kunwa, kurara, uye kuroora uye kuva nemhuri! Zvakadini nenyama yechidiki? 7:14), kurarama munyama kuchiri kuda kuteerera mutemo wechivi uye kutyora mutemo uye kuita zvivi. Muchinoitika ichi, chii chatinofanira kuita pamusoro pokudarika kwenyama yedu yekare yohunhu Hatifaniri kungofuratira here?

Mhinduro: Ndichaitsanangura zvakadzama muhurukuro yechipiri...

Gospel Transcript:
Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sisita Liu, Sisita Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi vanotsigira, vabatsire, uye vashande pamwechete mubasa revhangeri raKristu! Uye avo vanotenda evhangeri iyi, vanoparidza nokugoverana kutenda, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu!

Hama nehanzvadzi Rangarira kuunganidza

articles.title: Pfekai nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzomweya 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare hama!

Ngatitsvagei, tinoyanana, uye tigovane pamwe chete nhasi! VaEfeso yeBhaibheri:

Rugwaro rwokutanga!

maropafadzo emweya

1: Wana kuva vanakomana

Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Akatiropafadza nokuropafadza kwose kwomweya munzvimbo dzokudenga muna Kristu: Mwari sezvaakatisarudza maari nyika isati yavambwa kuti tive vatsvene uye vasina chavangapomerwa pamberi pake nokuda kworudo rwake kwatiri, akatisarudza maari pakuitwa vana kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, maererano nezvakafadza nokuda kwake (VaEfeso 1:3-5)

2: Nyasha dzaMwari

Tine rudzikinuro kubudikidza neropa reMwanakomana waanoda, iko kuregererwa kwezvivi zvedu, maererano nokupfuma kwenyasha dzake. Nyasha idzi dzakapiwa kwatiri kubudikidza naMwari muuchenjeri hwose nokunzwisisa kwose, maererano nokuda kwake kwakanaka, kwaakagara atemera kuti atizivise chakavanzika chokuda kwake, kuti pakuzara kwenguva aite kuti aite kuti nguva ikwane. zvinhu zvekudenga maererano nehurongwa hwake , zvese zviri panyika zvakabatana muna Kristu. Maari isu tinewo nhaka, yatakagara tatemerwa maererano nokuronga kwaiye anoita zvinhu zvose maererano nokuronga kwokuda kwake, kuti kubudikidza nesu, takanga tiri vokutanga muna Kristu, tigamuchire kukudzwa kwake acharumbidzwa. ( VaEfeso 1:7-12 )

Chetatu: Kuiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa

Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Uyu Mweya Mutsvene rubatso (rugwaro rwekutanga: nhaka) yenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe. ( VaEfeso 1:13-14 )

Chechina: Kufa naKristu, kumuka pamwe chete naKristu, uye kuva kudenga naye


Makanga makafa mukudarika kwenyu nomuzvivi zvenyu, uye iye akakuitai vapenyu. yamakafamba mairi nemafambiro enyika ino, muchiteerera muchinda wesimba rekudenga, iwo mweya unoshanda zvino muvana vekusateerera. Isu tose takanga tiri pakati pavo, tichiita kuchiva kwenyama, tichitevera kuchiva kwenyama nokwomwoyo, uye pakuzvarwa kwedu takanga tiri vana vokutsamwirwa savamwe vanhu. Zvisinei, Mwari, ane tsitsi zhinji uye anotida norudo rukuru, anoita kuti tive vapenyu pamwe chete naKristu kunyange patakanga takafa mukudarika kwedu. Wakaponeswa nenyasha. Akatimutsawo uye akatigarisa pamwe chete nesu munzvimbo dzokudenga muna Kristu Jesu (VaEfeso 2:1-6)

shanu: Pfekai nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzakapiwa naMwari

Ndine mashoko ekupedzisira: Simbai muna Ishe nemusimba rake. Shongai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira muchirwa namano adhiabhorosi. Nokuti hatirwi nenyama neropa, asi navabati, navanesimba, namadzishe enyika erima rino, nemweya yakaipa yedenga. Naizvozvo torai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira pamberi pomuvengi pazuva rokutambudzika, uye maita zvose, kuti mumire. Naizvozvo mirai nesimba, makasunga chiuno chechokwadi nezvokwadi, muchifukidza chipfuva chenyu nechidzitiro chechipfuva chokururama, uye mupfekedze patsoka dzenyu shangu dzeEvhangeri yorugare. Pamusoro pazvo matora nhovo yokutenda, yamungagona kudzima nayo miseve inopfuta yowakaipa; munyengetere nguva dzose nemhando dzose dzemikumbiro nemikumbiro muMweya; ndinoparidza zvakavanzika zveevhangeri, ini mutumwa ndakasungwa nengetani chechakavanzika chevhangeri iri, uye akaita kuti nditaure ndisingatyi zvichienderana nebasa rangu. ( VaEfeso 6:10-20 )

6: Rumbidzai Mwari nenziyo dzemweya

Mutaure kuno mumwe nomumwe namapisarema, nedzimbo uye nenziyo dzomweya, muchiimba uye muchirumbidza Jehovha nomwoyo wenyu uye nomuromo wenyu. muchivonga Mwari Baba pazvinhu zvose, muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Tinofanira kuzviisa pasi pomumwe nomumwe mukuremekedza Kristu.
( VaEfeso 5:19-21 )

Chinomwe: Penekera maziso emoyo wako

Namatirai Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu Mwari, Baba vokubwinya, vakakupai Mweya wouchenjeri nokuzarurirwa pakumuziva, uye meso emwoyo yenyu avhenekerwe, kuti muzive tariro yokudana kwake uye tariro yokudana kwake muMweya. Vatsvene pfuma yokubwinya kwenhaka yakadini uye ukuru hukuru sei hwesimba rake kwatiri isu vanotenda maererano nesimba guru raakashandisa muna Kristu pakumumutsa kubva kuvakafa nokumugarisa kudenga kwokudenga? anoisa ruoko rwake rworudyi, (VaEfeso 1:17-20)

Manyoro eEvhangeri

Hama nehanzvadzi!

Rangarira kuunganidza

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

articles.title: Mufananidzo weMuonde
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!
Nhasi tiri kutsvaga kugoverana kuyanana: Mufananidzo wemuonde

Ipapo akataura mufananidzo, akati, “Mumwe murume akanga ane muonde wakanga wakasimwa mumunda wake wemizambiringa, akasvika pamuti achitsvaka zvibereko, asi akashaiwa, akati kumurimi, Tarira, ndanga ndichiuya kumuonde uyu. makore matatu apfuura, ndiri kutsvaga michero, asi handiuwane, nekuti uri kutora pasi pasina!” Murimi akati, “Ishe, muchengete gore rino kusvikira ndachera. ivhu rakaripoteredza uye ugowedzera ndove pashure, ndizvozvo, kana kuti ndichazvitema zvakare.

Ruka 13:6-9

Metaphorical Notes:

Saka akashandisa mufananidzo kuti: “Mumwe murume akanga aine muonde (“muonde” unofananidzira vaIsraeri) wakasimwa mumunda wemizambiringa (Baba Vokudenga ndivo murimi - verenga Johani 15:1) Iye (achireva Baba Vokudenga). akauya akatsvaka muchero pamberi pomuti, asi akashaikwa.

Ipapo akati kumurimi webindu (Jesu), “Tarirai, mumakore matatu apfuura, Jesu, akatumwa naMwari, akaberekwa, akaparidza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga kuvanhu veIsraeri, uye akaita kuti vanhu vatende kuti Jesu ndiye Ishe. Mwanakomana waMwari naKristu ndiye Mesiya neMuponesi! Akafira vatadzi vanomutswa uye vakakwira kudenga → "Avo vanotenda muna Jesu" → vanozvarwa patsva, vanoponeswa, vane upenyu husingaperi, uye vanobereka zvibereko zvokutanga zvomudzimu) vakauya kumuonde uyu kuzotsvaka muchero, asi havana kuuwana (nokuti wakatadza kuuwana (nokuti) Jesu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa) Sezvibereko zvokutanga, uye vaIsraeri vasingatendi muna Jesu, havana kuzvarwa patsva → havagoni kubereka zvibereko zvomweya). Ritemei, matorerei nyika pasina!

'Mutariri womunda (ndiko kuti, Mwanakomana woMunhu Jesu) akati, 'Ishe, zvichengetei gore rino kusvikira ndachera ivhu rakandipoteredza (kufananidzira umambo hwaIsraeri → "kunze") (zvichireva kupararira kwe evhangeri kuvaHedheni) uye kuwedzera ndove (Inofananidzira kuwedzera kwenhamba yeruponeso rwevaHedheni uye kukura kwakawanda kwehupenyu hwemuviri waKristu) → Kubva pamudzi waJese (zvinyorwa zvepakutanga ndiro murwi) davi rinobuda pamidzi yake richabereka zvibereko.

Isaya 11:1

(VaIsraeri “vakaona” vaHedheni vanotenda muna Jesu: kuberekwa patsva, ruponeso, kudzoka kwaJesu Kristu pakupera kwezuva, kudzikinurwa kwemiviri yevaHedheni, uye zvibereko zvokutanga; pakupedzisira vaIsraeri vakapinda mu“Mireniyamu” Mireniyamu yakazotevera, vaIzirairi vese chaivo vakatenda kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu uye Muponesi Saka mhuri yese yaIsirairi yakaponeswa – tarisa kuna VaRoma 11:25-26 naZvakazarurwa Chitsauko 20).

Kana ukabereka zvibereko mune ramangwana, ngazvive zvakadaro, kana ukasadaro, uteme zvakare. ’”

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?
