articles.title: Kubhabhatidzwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoongorora kugovana traffic: "Rubhabhatidzo" Muenzaniso weHupenyu Hutsva hwechiKristu

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma Chitsauko 6, ndima 3-4, todziverenga pamwe chete:

Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tirarame upenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba.

Mubvunzo: Ungabatana sei naJesu?

mhinduro: muna Jesu nokubhabhatidzwa !

1 Bhabhatidzwa muna Jesu—VaRoma 6:3
2 Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naye - VaRoma 6:6
3 Ifa naye—VaRoma 6:6
4 Akavigwa pamwe chete naye—VaRoma 6:4
5 Nokuti vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi—VaRoma 6:7
6 Zvamakabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana naye, nemiwo muchabatanidzwa naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake - VaRoma 6:5
7 Akamutswa pamwe chete naKristu—VaRoma 6:8
8 Kuti mumwe nomumwe wedu afambe muupenyu hutsva—VaRoma 6:4

Mubvunzo: Ndeapi maitiro e“kutenda nemaitiro” emuKristu akazvarwa patsva?

Mhinduro: Kufamba kwese kune maitiro matsva

1. Rubhabhatidzo

Mubvunzo: Chinangwa chekubhabhatidzwa chii?
Mhinduro: Huya kuna Jesu! Batana naye muchimiro.

(1) Kuda kubhabhatidzwa murufu rwaJesu

Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye kubudikidza nokubhabhatidzwa murufu,...VaRoma 6:3-4

(2) Kubatanidzwa naye muchimiro cherufu

Mubvunzo: “Rufu” rwaJesu rwakanga rwakaita sei?
Mhinduro: Jesu akafira pamuti nokuda kwezvivi zvedu.

Mubvunzo: Ungabatanidzwa sei naye murufu rwake?

Mhinduro: “Nekubhabhatidzwa” murufu rwaJesu uye nekuvigwa pamwe chete naye;

“Kubhabhatidzwa” kunoreva kuroverwa, kufa, kuvigwa, uye kumutswa pamwe chete naKristu! Ameni. Verenga VaRoma 6:6-7

(3) Kubatanidzwa Naye mukufanana kwekumuka kwake

Mubvunzo: Chii chiri chimiro chekumuka kwaJesu?
Mhinduro: Kumuka kwaJesu muviri wemweya - 1 Vakorinde 15:42
Kana mukatarisa maoko angu netsoka dzangu, muchaziva kuti ndini chaiye. Ndibatei muone; Mweya hauna mapfupa uye hauna nyama. ” Ruka 24:39

Mubvunzo: Tingabatanidzwa naye sei murumuko rwake?

Mhinduro: Idya chirairo chaShe!

Nekuti nyama yaJesu → haina kuona kuora kana rufu - ona Mabasa 2:31

Kana tichidya “chingwa” muviri wake, tine muviri waJesu mukati medu. Ameni! Uku ndiko kubatanidzwa naye murumuko rwekumuka pese patinodya chingwa ichi nekunwa mukombe uyu, ticharamba takabatana kusvika auya zvakare. Verenga 1 VaKorinde 11:26

2. (Kutenda) Munhu wekare akafa uye asunungurwa kubva muchivi

Mubvunzo: Vatendi vanopukunyuka sei kubva kuchivi?
Mhinduro: Jesu akafira zvivi zvedu, achitisunungura kubva mazviri. Takabatanidzwa naye mukufanana norufu, munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda vechivi, nokuti uyo akafa asunungurwa kubva kuchivi. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 6:6-7 naVaKorose 3:3 nokuti makatofa...!

3. (Kutenda) Munhu wose akaberekwa naMwari haambotadzi

Mubvunzo: Sei munhu akaberekwa naMwari asingatadzi?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Jesu akashandisa ropa rake kushambidza zvivi zvevanhu (kamwe chete). Verenga VaHebheru 1:3 na9:12
(2) Ropa raKristu risina gwapa rinochenesa mwoyo yenyu (chinyorwa chepakutanga ndi“hana”) kureva VaHebheru 9:14
(3) Kana hana yangocheneswa, haichanzwi ine mhosva - VaHebheru 10:2

Mubvunzo: Sei ndichigara ndichinzwa ndine mhosva?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Nokuti une murayiro, uri pasi pomurayiro uye uri pasi pomurayiro, murayiro unokupa mhosva pamusoro pechivi, uye dhiabhori anokupa mhosva yechivi. Verenga VaRoma 4:15, 3:20, Zvakazarurwa 12:10
2 Ropa raJesu rakanatsa zvitadzo zvavanhu kamwe chete (hamutendi) kuti ropa rake rinokosha (kamwe) rakazova kuregererwa kwezvitadzo nokusingaperi; ." "Kushanda" → kusuka zvivi (kazhinji), kudzima zvivi, uye kubata ropa rake semazuva ese. Verenga VaHebheru 10:26-29
3 Avo vanonzwa vane mhaka havana kuberekwa patsva! Ndiko kuti, havana kuzvarwa patsva se (munhu mutsva), havana kunzwisisa vhangeri, uye havasati vanzwisisa ruponeso rwaKristu; kuchiva kwaAdama;
4 Hamuna (kutenda) kuti munhu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe... Nokuti uyo wakafa asunungurwa pachivi - VaRoma 6:6-7, nokuti imi makafa. .. VaKorose 3:3
5 Zvitorei imi (munhu wekare) kuti makafa kuchivi, asi zvitorei imi (munhu mutsva) kuti murarame kuna Mwari muna Kristu Jesu. VaRoma 6:11
Somuenzaniso: Jesu akati kwavari: “Kudai maiva mapofu, mungadai musina chivi, asi zvino zvamunoti, ‘Tinoona,’ chivi chenyu chinoramba chiripo.”— Johani 9:41
6 Munhu wose anotadza anodarika murayiro uye haasunungurwi kubva pamurayiro (nokutenda) kubudikidza naJesu, ari pasi pomurayiro uye avete musimba rowakaipa ndivo vana vadhiabhorosi. Verenga Johani 1:10

4. Mhandara dzakachena

(1) 144,000 vanhu

Varume ava vakanga vasina kusvibiswa nevakadzi; Ndivo vanotevera Gwayana kwose kwarinoenda. Vakatengwa pakati pavanhu kuti vave zvibereko zvokutanga kuna Mwari nokuGwayana. Hapana nhema dzinowanikwa mumiromo yavo; Zvakazarurwa 14:4-5

Mubvunzo: Vanhu 144 000 vari pamusoro vakabvepi?

Mhinduro: Gwayana rakatengwa kumunhu neropa rake - 1 VaKorinte 6:20

Mubvunzo: Vanhu 144 000 vari pano vanomiririra ani?

Mhinduro: Inofananidzira maHedeni akaponeswa nevatsvene vose!

(2) VaKristu vanotenda kuevhangeri uye vakazvarwa patsva mhandara dzakachena

Hasha dzandinonzwa pamusoro pako ihasha dzaMwari. Nekuti ndakakuwanisai kumurume umwe, kuti ndikuisei kuna Kristu semhandara dzakachena. 2 VaKorinte 11:2

5. Kubvisa murume wekare Adhamu

(1) Chiitiko→ Harahwa inomiswa zvishoma nezvishoma

Mubvunzo: Ndakabvisa rini harahwa yangu, Adhamu?
Mhinduro: Ini (ndaitenda) kurovererwa pamuchinjikwa, ndikafa, uye kuvigwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye nokudaro ndakabvisa munhu wekare Adhamu ipapo ndichitenda (ruzivo) kuti rufu rwaJesu rwakatanga mandiri, uye zvishoma nezvishoma ndikamubvisa munhu wekare. Ona 2 VaKorinte 4:4:10-11 naVaEfeso 4:22

(2) Chiitiko→Mutsva anokura zvishoma nezvishoma

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. ...Tarisa kuna VaRoma 8:9 → Naizvozvo, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze (munhu wekare) uri kuparadzwa, munhu womukati (munhu mutsva) ari kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Kutambura kwedu kwakareruka uye kwechinguvana kuchatiitira kubwinya kusingagumi kusingaenzaniswi. 2 VaKorinte 4:16-17

6. Idya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru

Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musingadyi nyama yoMwanakomana woMunhu nokunwa ropa rake, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi pakupedzisira. Iye anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu anogara mandiri, uye ini ndinogara maari

7 Pfekai munhu mutsva uye mupfeke Kristu

Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu. VaGaratia 3:26-27

8. Kuda kuparidza vhangeri uye kuita kuti vanhu vatende muna Jesu

Hunhu huri pachena hwaKristu akazvarwa patsva ndehwekuti anofarira kuparidza Jesu kumhuri yake, hama dzake, vaanodzidza navo kuchikoro, vaanoshanda navo, uye shamwari, achivaudza kuti vatende kuevhangeri uye vaponeswe uye vave nehupenyu husingaperi.
(Somuenzaniso) Jesu akauya kwavari akati kwavari: “Ndakapiwa simba rose kudenga nepanyika. Mweya Mutsvene ( muvabhabhatidze muzita raBaba neroMwanakomana neroMweya Mutsvene). 28:18-20

9. Hamuchanamata zvidhori

Vakristu vakazvarwa patsva havachinamati zvifananidzo, vanongonamata Jehovha akasika denga nenyika, Ishe Jesu Kristu
Makanga makafa mukudarika kwenyu nomuzvivi zvenyu, uye iye akakuitai vapenyu. yamakafamba mairi nemafambiro enyika ino, muchiteerera muchinda wesimba rekudenga, iwo mweya unoshanda zvino muvana vekusateerera. Isu tose takanga tiri pakati pavo, tichiita kuchiva kwenyama, tichitevera kuchiva kwenyama nokwomwoyo, uye pakuzvarwa kwedu takanga tiri vana vokutsamwirwa savamwe vanhu. Zvisinei, Mwari, ane tsitsi zhinji uye anotida norudo rukuru, anoita kuti tive vapenyu pamwe chete naKristu kunyange patakanga takafa mukudarika kwedu. Wakaponeswa nenyasha. Akatimutsawo uye akatigarisa nesu kudenga pamwe chete naKristu Jesu. VaEfeso 2:1-6

10. Kuungana kworudo, kudzidza Bhaibheri, uye kurumbidza Mwari nenziyo dzomudzimu

VaKristu vakaberekwa patsva vanodanana uye vanoda kuungana senhengo kuti vateerere mharidzo, vaverenge uye vadzidze Bhaibheri, vanyengetere kuna Mwari, uye varumbidze Mwari wedu nenziyo dzomudzimu!
kuti mweya wangu ukuimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza, urege kunyarara. Ndichakurumbidzai, Jehovha Mwari wangu, nokusingaperi; Pisarema 30:12
Shoko raKristu ngarigare kwazvo mumwoyo yenyu, muchidzidzisana uye muchirayirana namapisarema, nedzimbo uye nenziyo dzomweya, muchiimba nziyo dzokurumbidza kuna Mwari mumwoyo yenyu izere nenyasha. VaKorose 3:16

11. Hatizi venyika

(Sezvakataurwa naIshe Jesu) Ndavapa shoko renyu. Uye nyika inovavenga, nekuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. Handikumbiri kuti muvabvise panyika, asi ndinokumbira kuti muvadzivirire pane wakaipa (kana kushandurwa: kubva kuchivi). Havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. Johani 17:14-16

12. Kumirira kudzoka kwaKristu nokutenda, tariro, norudo

Zvino pane zvinhu zvitatu zvinogara zviripo: kutenda, tariro, norudo, chikuru kwazvo rudo. — 1 VaKorinte 13:13

Tinoziva kuti zvisikwa zvose zvinogomera uye zvinoshanda pamwe chete kusvikira zvino. Kwete izvozvo zvoga, kunyange isu vane zvibereko zvokutanga zvoMweya tinogomera mukati medu, tichimirira kuitwa kwedu vana, iko kudzikinurwa kwemiviri yedu. VaRoma 8:22-23
Unopupura izvi unoti: Hongu, ndinouya nekukurumidza. Ishe Jesu, ndinoda kuti muuye!

Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngadzive nemwi mose. Ameni! Zvakazarurwa 22:20-21

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:
kereke munashe Jesu Kristu
Ava ndivo vanhu vatsvene vanogara voga uye vasingaverengerwi pakati pendudzi.
Kufanana ne144,000 mhandara dzakachena dzinotevera Ishe Gwayana. Ameni
→→Ndinomuona ari pamusoro pechikomo;
Ndivo vanhu vanogara voga, vasingaverengwi pakati pamarudzi ose.
Numeri 23:9
Nevashandi vaIshe Jesu Kristu: Hama Wang*Yun, Hanzvadzi Liu, Hanzvadzi Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi vanoshingairira kutsigira basa revhangeri nekupa mari nekushanda nesimba, nevamwe vatsvene vanoshanda nesu. vanotenda vhangeri iri, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu. Ameni!

articles.title: “Tendai kuEvhangeri” 12
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai kuEvhangeri” 12

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Chidzidzo 12: Kutenda muvhangeri kunodzikinura miviri yedu

VaRoma 8:23 Kwete izvozvo zvoga, asi nesu, kunyange tine zvibereko zvokutanga zvoMweya, tinogomera mukati medu tichimirira kuitwa vana, iko kudzikinurwa kwemiviri yedu.

Mubvunzo: Miviri yedu icharegererwa riini?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Upenyu hwedu hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. VaKorose 3:3

Mubvunzo: Hupenyu nemiviri yedu yakazvarwa patsva zvinoonekwa here?

Mhinduro: Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari uye haaonekwe.
Zviri pachena kuti hatina hanya nezvinhu zvinoonekwa, asi zvisingaonekwi; 2 VaKorinte 4:18

(2) Upenyu hwedu hunooneka

Mubvunzo: Upenyu hwedu hunoratidzwa rini?

Mhinduro: Kana Kristu achizoonekwa, hupenyu hwedu huchaonekwawo.

Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. VaKorose 3:4

Mubvunzo: Upenyu hunoita sehune muviri here?

Mhinduro: Kune muviri!

Mubvunzo: Muviri waAdamu here? Kana kuti muviri waKristu?
Mhinduro: Muviri waKristu! Nokuti akatibereka nevhangeri, tiri nhengo dzake. VaEfeso 5:30

Cherechedza: Zviri mumwoyo yedu Mweya Mutsvene, Mweya waJesu, uye Mweya waBaba Vekudenga! Mweya mweya waJesu Kristu! Muviri muviri usingafi waJesu; naizvozvo, munhu wedu mutsva hausi muviri wemweya wemunhu wekare, Adamu. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mwari worugare ngaakuitei vatsvene zvakazara! Uye dai mweya wako, mweya, uye muviri (kureva, mweya wako wakaberekwa patsva nemuviri) zvichengetwe zvisina mhosva pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Iye unokudanai akatendeka uye achazviita. 1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24

(3) Avo vakarara muna Jesu, Jesu akauya naye

Mubvunzo: Varipi avo vakavata muna Jesu Kristu?

Mhinduro: Zvakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari!

Mubvunzo: Jesu aripi zvino?

Mhinduro: Jesu akamutswa akakwira kudenga, agere kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba. Verenga VaEfeso 2:6

Mubvunzo: Sei mamwe makereke (akadai seSeventh-day Adventist) achiti vakafa vanorara mumakuva kusvikira Kristu auya zvakare, uye vanobuda mumakuva vomutswa?

Mhinduro: Jesu achaburuka kubva kudenga paachauya zvakare, uye pamusoro peavo vakavata muna Jesu, zvirokwazvo achabudiswa kubva kudenga;

【Nokuti basa rokudzikinura raJesu Kristu rakapedzwa】

Kana vakafa vachiri kurara muguva, kutenda kwavo kuchava mudambudziko guru, ivo vachafanira kumirira kusvikira pamugumo wemireniyumu, rutongeso rwokupedzisira, apo rufu neHadhesi zvichagamuchidza vakafa pakati pavo asina kunyorwa mubhuku reupenyu, uchakandwa mudziva remoto. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa 20:11-15

Hatidi kuti muve vasingazivi, hama, maererano nevavete, kuti murege kuchema sevasina tariro. Kana tichitenda kuti Jesu akafa akamukazve, kunyange vaya vakavata muna Jesu Mwari achavauyisawo pamwe chete naye. 1 VaTesaronika 4:13-14

Mubvunzo: Avo vakarara muna Kristu vachamutswa vaine miviri here?

Mhinduro: Kune muviri, muviri wemweya, muviri waKristu! Verenga 1 VaKorinde 15:44

Nekuti Ishe amene uchaburuka kubva kudenga nekudanidzira, nenzwi remutumwa mukuru, nehwamanda yaMwari, uye vakafa muna Kristu vachatanga kumuka; 1 VaTesaronika 4:16

(4) Avo vari vapenyu uye vachasara vachashandurwa vopfeka munhu mutsva uye vachaonekwa mukubwaira kweziso.

Zvino ndinotaura kwamuri chakavanzika: Hatingazovata tose, asi tose tichashandurwa, pakarepo, mukubwaira kweziso, kana hwamanda yokupedzisira ichirira. Nokuti hwamanda icharira, vakafa vachamutswa mukusaora, uye isu tichashandurwa. Ichi chinoparara chinofanira kufuka icho chisingaori; 1 VaKorinte 15:51-53

(5) Tichaona chimiro chake chechokwadi

Mubvunzo: Chimiro chedu chechokwadi chinoratidzika sei?

Mhinduro: Miviri yedu inhengo dzaKristu uye inoita seyakafanana naye!

Hama dzinodikanwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichazova zvichigere kuratidzwa; 1 Johane 3:2 naVaFiripi 3:20-21

horaiti! "Tendai muEvhangeri" yakagoverwa pano.

Ngatinamatei pamwechete: Ndinokutendai Abba Baba Vekudenga, ndinokutendai Muponesi Jesu Kristu, uye tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekuva nesu nguva dzose! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso emweya yedu nekuzarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya nekunzwisisa Bhaibheri! Tinonzwisisa kuti kana Jesu auya, tichaona chimiro Chake chechokwadi, uye muviri wedu wemunhu mutsva uchaonekwawo, kureva kuti, muviri ucharegererwa. Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke muna Jesu Kristu

articles.title: “Tendai kuEvhangeri” 11
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai kuEvhangeri” 11

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Chidzidzo 11: Kutenda muvhangeri kunotigonesa kugashira kuva vanakomana

Mubvunzo: Ungawana sei humwanakomana hwaMwari?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Rusvingo rwepakati rwakaputswa

(2) Kristu akashandisa muviri wake kuparadza ruvengo

(3) Ruvengo rwakaparadzwa pamuchinjikwa

Mubvunzo: Ndezvipi zvichemo zvakaparadzwa, zvakabviswa, uye zvakaparadzwa?

Mhinduro: Ndiyo mitemo yakanyorwa mumutemo.

Nokuti ndiye rugare rwedu, akaita kuti vaviri vave chinhu chimwe, akakoromora rusvingo rwakaparadzana, akaparadza pamuviri wake zvirevo zvakanyorwa pamurayiro, kuti aite izvo zviviri nokuzvidira. pachake Murume mutsva nokudaro anowana kuwirirana. Tapedza ruvengo pamuchinjikwa, takayananiswa naMwari nomuchinjiko

(4) Mitemo uye zvinyorwa zvinoparadza

(5)Ibvise

(6) Kurovererwa pamuchinjikwa

Mubvunzo: Kristu akatizodzei? Bvisa chii?

Mhinduro: Dzima zvinyorwa zviri mumitemo inopesana nesu uye inotikuvadza, uye ibvise.

Mubvunzo: “Chinangwa” chaJesu “chekudzima” mitemo, zvisungo uye zvinyorwa chaiva chei, achichitora ochiroverera pamuchinjikwa?

Mhinduro: Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro chivi. 1 Johani 3:4

Nongedzera kuna Zvakazarurwa 12:10 nokuti Satani dhiabhorosi ari pamberi paMwari masikati nousiku achipomera → hama nehanzvadzi → Zvinopesana nomutemo here? Anokupomera mhosva nemirayiro uye anokutongera rufu here? Satani anofanira kuwana mitemo, mirau netsamba se“uchapupu” hunoratidza kuti watyora mutemo pamberi pechigaro chokutonga → kukupa mhosva kurufu uye kuda Mwari wedu, Ishe Jesu Kristu! Akadzima mitemo netsamba dzomurayiro, dzaitipomera mhosva, dzikatitongera rufu, akazvibvisa, achizviroverera pamuchinjikwa; Neiyi nzira, Satani haasati achizokwanisa kushandisa “uchapupu” kuti akupomere, uyewo haasati achizokwanisa kukupa mhosva kana kuti kukupa mhosva kurufu. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Makanga makafa mukudarika kwenyu nokusadzingiswa kwenyama, asi Mwari wakakuitai vapenyu pamwe chete naKristu, akakukangamwirai (kana kuti: isu) kudarika kwedu kwose, akadzima zvose zviri mumurairo akabvisa magwaro. uchapupu hwemhosva) zvakanyorwa pamusoro pedu nesuwo, uye zvirovererei pamuchinjikwa. VaKorose 2:13-14

(7) Rusununguko kubva kumutemo uye chituko chemutemo

Mubvunzo: Ungatiza sei murairo nekutuka?

Mhinduro: Ifa kumurairo nemuviri waKristu

Naizvozvo, hama dzangu nemiwo makafa kumurairo nomuviri waKristu... Asi sezvatakafa kumurairo watakasungwa nawo, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo... Romans 7:4,6

Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, nokuva chituko nokuda kwedu;

(8) Wana umwanakomana waMwari

Mubvunzo: Ungawana sei humwanakomana?
Mhinduro: Kudzikinura avo vari pasi pemurairo, kuti tigamuchire huvanakomana.

Nguva yakati yakwana, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nomukadzi, akaberekwa pasi pomurayiro, kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vanakomana. VaGaratia 4:4-5

Mubvunzo: Sei avo vari pasi pemutemo vachifanira kuregererwa?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Umwe neumwe unoita chivi unodarika murairo, uye kudarika murairo chivi. 1 Johani 3:4
2 Mumwe nomumwe anoita maererano nomurayiro akatukwa, nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “Munhu wose asingarambi achiita zvose zvakanyorwa mubhuku romurayiro akatukwa zvinovonekwa; nokuti Rugwaro runoti, "Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda."
3 Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha;
Saka →→
4 Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika - VaRoma 4:15
5 Pasina murairo, chivi hachinzi chivi - VaRoma 5:13
6 Nokuti kunze kwomutemo chivi chakafa—VaRoma 7:8

7 Ani naani anotadza asina murayiro achaparara asina murayiro; Verenga VaRoma 2:12

(Kutonga Kukuru Kwezuva Rokupedzisira: Hama nehanzvadzi dzinofanira kuva dzakasvinura uye dzichiteerera. Avo vari (vasiri) pasi pomutemo, kureva avo vari muna Jesu Kristu, vachamutswa votonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru. Mireniyamu isati yasvika; Mubhuku reupenyu akakandwa mudziva remoto akaparara.
Kana musingatendi kuti [vhangeri] iri isimba raMwari, ndapota musa“chema nokugeda-geda mazino enyu” pazuva rekutongwa. Tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa 20:11-15
Saka, unonzwisisa here?

horaiti! Igovera pano nhasi

Ngatinamatei pamwechete: Maita basa Baba Vekudenga! Akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, akazvarwa pasi pomurayiro, kuti adzikinure avo vakanga vari pasi pomurayiro, kuti vasunungurwe kubva pamurayiro uye kuti atipe ufana! Ameni.
Nokuti kana pasina murayiro, hapana chivi; .
Baba Vekudenga vanotidaidza kuti tinamate muMweya Mutsvene muumambo Hwavo husingagumi, murudo rwaJesu Kristu, uye kuti tirumbidze Mwari wedu nenziyo dzemweya mutemberi, Hareruya! Hareruya! Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe jesu kristu

articles.title: “Tendai kuEvhangeri” 10
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Tenda kuVhangeri》10

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Chidzidzo 10: Kutenda muvhangeri kunotizvarwa patsva

Chakaberekwa nenyama inyama; Usashamiswe pandinoti, “Unofanira kuberekwa patsva.” Johani 3:6-7

Mubvunzo: Sei tichifanira kuzvarwa patsva?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Kana munhu asingaberekwi patsva haangaoni umambo hwaMwari - Johane 3:3
2 Havagoni kupinda muumambo hwaMwari - Johane 3:5
3 Nyama neropa hazvingagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari - 1 VaKorinte 15:50

Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Usashamiswa kuti unofanira kuberekwa patsva.”

Kana munhu asina kuberekwa patsva, haana Mweya Mutsvene pasina kutungamirirwa neMweya Mutsvene, haunganzwisisi Bhaibheri, zvisinei kuti wakariverenga kangani, haunganzwisise Bhaibheri kana kunzwisisa kuti Ishe Jesu akati. Somuenzaniso, vadzidzi vakatevera Jesu pakutanga havana kunzwisisa zvakataurwa naJesu paakamutswa uye akakwira kudenga, uye Mweya Mutsvene wakauya paPendekosti, vakazadzwa noMweya Mutsvene uye vakagamuchira simba, uye ipapo vakanzwisisa. zvakataurwa naIshe Jesu. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Sei nyama neropa zvisingagoni kugara nhaka yeumambo hwaMwari?

Mhinduro: Zvinoparara (hazvigoni) kugara nhaka isingaori.

Mubvunzo: Chii chinoparara?

Mhinduro: Ishe Jesu vakati! Chinoberekwa nenyama inyama. Nyama yedu inoberekwa nevabereki vedu

Mubvunzo: Jesu aivewo nemuviri wenyama neropa here?
Mhinduro: Jesu akaberekwa naBaba Vekudenga, akaburuka kubva Jerusarema kudenga, akanambwa nemhandara uye akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene, iye ari mumweya, mutsvene, haana chivi, asingaori, uye haaoni rufu! Verenga Mabasa 2:31
Nyama yedu, yakabva muguruva raAdamu, yakatengeswa kuchivi, uye mubairo wechivi rufu, naizvozvo, muviri wedu unoora uye unofa. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Tingagara sei nhaka youmambo hwaMwari?

Mhinduro: Inofanira kuberekwa patsva!

Mubvunzo: Tinozvarwa patsva sei?

Mhinduro: Tenda muna Jesu! Tendai kuevhangeri, nzwisisai shoko rechokwadi, uye mugamuchire Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso. Tinodanidzira kuti: “Abha, Baba! ;Zvose zvinobva kuna Mwari Ani nani anozvarwa haatadzi, ameni! Tarisa kuna 1 Johane 3:9. Izvi zvinoratidza kuti wakazvarwa patsva.

Tichadzidza nekugovana nehama nehanzvadzi zvakadzama nezve "Kuzvarwa patsva" mune ramangwana.

Ngatinamatei pamwechete: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekutitungamirira isu vana kuti titende evhangeri uye tinzwisise nzira yechokwadi, inotibvumira kugashira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso, tive vana vaMwari. , uye unzwisise kuberekwa patsva! Avo chete vanozvarwa nemvura nemweya vanogona kuona umambo hwaMwari uye kupinda muumambo hwaMwari. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa shoko rechokwadi uye nekutipa Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa kuti mutibereke patsva! Ameni

Kuna Ishe Jesu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

kereke yashe jesu kristu

articles.title: “Tendai Vhangeri” 9
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Tenda Vhangeri》9

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Murairo wechipfumbamwe: Tenda muVhangeri nekumuka kuvakafa naKristu

VaRoma 6:8 Kana takafa pamwe chete naKristu, tichatendawo kuti tichararama pamwe chete naye. Ameni!

1. Tenda murufu, kuvigwa nekumuka pamwe chete naKristu

Mubvunzo: Kufa naKristu sei?

Mhinduro: Kufa naKristu kuburikidza “nekubhabhatidzwa” murufu rwake.

Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tirarame upenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. VaRoma 6:3-4

Mubvunzo: Tingararama sei naKristu?

Mhinduro: “Kubhabhatidzwa” zvinoreva kupupura kufa naye uye kupupura kurarama naKristu! Ameni

Makavigwa pamwe chete naye pakubhabhatidzwa, pamakamutswawo pamwe chete naye nokutenda kushanda kwaMwari akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa. Makanga makafa mukudarika kwenyu nokusadzingiswa kwenyama, asi Mwari wakakuitai vapenyu naKristu, akanganwira imi (kana kuti isu) kudarika kwedu kwose;

2. Kubatanidzwa naKristu kare

Nokuti kana takabatanidzwa naye pakufanana norufu rwake, tichasanganiswawo naye pakumuka kwake;

Mubvunzo: Rufu rwaJesu rwakanga rwakaita sei?

Mhinduro: Jesu akafira pamuchinjikwa, uye ichi ndicho chaiva chimiro cherufu rwake!

Mubvunzo: Ungabatanidzwa naye sei murufu rwake?

Mhinduro: Shandisa nzira yekutenda munaShe! Kana uchitenda muna Jesu nevhangeri, uye “wakabhapatidzwa” murufu rwaKristu, wakabatanidzwa naye muchimiro chorufu, uye munhu wako wekare anorovererwa pamwe chete naye.

Mubvunzo: Chii chiri chimiro chekumuka kwaJesu?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Rumuko muviri womudzimu

Muviri wakakushwa unoreva muviri waAdamu, munhu wekare, uye muviri unomutswa unoreva muviri waKristu, munhu mutsva. Kana kune muviri wenyama, panofanirawo kuva nemuviri wemweya. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Verenga 1 VaKorinde 15:44

(2) Nyama yaJesu haiori

Achiziva izvi, akataura nezvokumuka kwaKristu uye akati: “Mweya wake hauna kusiiwa muHadhesi, uyewo muviri wake hauna kuona kuora. ’ Mabasa 2:31

(3) Chimiro chokumuka kwaJesu

Kana mukatarisa maoko angu netsoka dzangu, muchaziva kuti ndini chaiye. Ndibatei muone; Mweya hauna mapfupa uye hauna nyama. ” Ruka 24:39

Mubvunzo: Ungabatanidzwa sei naye murumuko rwake?

Mhinduro: Nokuti nyama yaJesu haina kuona kuora kana kufa!

Kana tichidya Chirairo chaShe, Chirairo Chitsvene, tinodya muviri wake uye tinonwa ropa raShe! Isu tine hupenyu hwaKristu matiri, uye hupenyu uhu (husina chekuita nenyama neropa raAdamu). . Kusvikira Kristu auya uye Kristu aonekwa muchimiro Chake chechokwadi, miviri yedu ichaonekwawo uye ichaonekwa mukubwinya naKristu. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here? Ona 1 Johani 3:2, VaKorose 3:4

3. Hupenyu hwekumuka kwedu hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari

Nokuti makafa (ndiko kuti, munhu wekare akafa), upenyu hwenyu (kumuka kwaKristu) hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Saka, unonzwisisa here? VaKorose 3:3

Ngatinamatei kuna Mwari pamwe chete: Tinokutendai Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, uye tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekuva nesu nguva dzose! Titungamirirei muchokwadi chose uye tinzwisise kuti kana tichitenda mukufa pamwe chete naKristu, tichatendawo mukurarama naKristu nokubhabhatidzwa murufu, tinobatanidzwa naye mukufanana norufu, tinodya chirayiro chaShe; muviri waShe nokunwa Ropa raShe richabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake! Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe jesu kristu

articles.title: “Tendai Vhangeri” 8
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai Vhangeri” 8

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Tinoramba tichiongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muEvhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Chidzidzo chechisere: Tenda kuti kumuka kwaJesu ndiko kuti tiruramiswe

(1) Jesu akamutswa kuti tiruramiswe

Mubvunzo: Jesu akamutswa kuti tiruramiswe here?

Mhinduro: Jesu akasunungurwa nokuda kwekudarika kwedu uye akamutsirwa kururamiswa kwedu (kana kududzirwa: Jesu akaiswa nokuda kwokudarika kwedu uye akamutsirwa kururamiswa kwedu). VaRoma 4:25

(2) Kururama kwaMwari kwakavakirwa pakutenda, kuti kutenda

Handina nyadzi pamusoro peEvhangeri, nokuti isimba raMwari rokuponesa mumwe nomumwe anotenda, kumuJudha pakutanga, uye kumuGirikiwo. Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” ( VaRoma 1:16-17 )

Mubvunzo: Chii chakavakirwa pakutenda uye chinotungamira pakutenda?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Nokutenda → Kuponeswa nokutenda muvhangeri kuzvarwa patsva!

1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Vakazvarwa kubva mukutenda kwevhangeri - 1 VaKorinte 4:15
3 Akaberekwa naMwari—Johani 1:12-13
Saka kutenda ikoko → kutenda muMweya Mutsvene kunovandudzwa uye nekukudzwa!

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Akatiponesa, kwete namabasa okururama atakaita, asi nokuda kwetsitsi dzake, nokushambidzwa kwokuberekwa kutsva nokuvandudzwa noMweya Mutsvene. Tito 3:5

(3) Nhanganyaya yeYongyi

“Vhiki dzine makumi manomwe dzakatemerwa vanhu vako neguta rako dzvene, kupedza kudarika, kugumisa zvivi, kuyananisira zvakaipa, kuuyisa kururama kusingaperi, kunama chisimbiso nechiporofita, nokuzodza Mutsvene Dhanieri. 9:24.

Mubvunzo: Zvinorevei kumisa chivi?

Mhinduro: Kumira zvinoreva kumira, hapasisina mhosva!

Nekufa kumurairo unotisunga nomuviri waKristu, tasunungurwa pamurairo... Kana pasina murairo, hapana kudarika. Verenga VaRoma 4:15 . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Zvinorevei kubvisa chivi?

Mhinduro: Kuchenesa zvinoreva kuchenesa Ropa raKristu risina gwapa rinochenesa mwoyo wako. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Zvikuru sei ropa raKristu, iye kubudikidza noMweya usingaperi akazvipa asina gwapa kuna Mwari, richanatsa mwoyo yenyu pamabasa akafa kuti mushumire Mwari mupenyu. ... Kana zvisina kudaro, zvibayiro zvingadai zvisina kumira kare kare here? Nokuti hana dzevanamati dzakacheneswa uye havachanzwi vaine mhosva. VaHebheru 9:14, 10:2

Mubvunzo: Zvinorevei kuyananisira zvitadzo?

Mhinduro: Ruregerero runoreva kutsiviwa, kuregererwa. Mwari akaita Jesu asina chivi kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu, uye norufu rwaJesu, tinoyananisira zvivi zvedu. Verenga 2 VaKorinde 5:21

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi sumo yeYongyi?
Mhinduro: “Kusingagumi” zvinoreva nokusingaperi, uye “kururama” zvinoreva kururamiswa!

Kuyananisira zvitadzo uye kubvisa mhodzi yechivi (pakutanga mbeu yaAdhamu); Ameni nenzira iyi, unonzwisisa here?

(4) Vakatoshambidzwa, vakaitwa vatsvene, uye vakaruramiswa noMweya waMwari

Mubvunzo: Tinochenurwa riini, tichiruramiswa, tichiruramiswa?

Mhinduro: Kuitwa mutsvene kunoreva kuva mutsvene pasina chitadzo;

Kururamiswa kunoreva kuva kururama kwaMwari; Sezvakangoita Mwari paakasika munhu neguruva, Mwari akadana Adhamu kuti “munhu” mushure mokunge ava “munhu”! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita vamwe venyu, asi makashambidzwa, mukaitwa vatsvene, mukaruramiswa nezita raShe Jesu Kristu, noMweya waMwari wedu. 1 VaKorinte 6:11

(5) Ngatiruramiswe pachena

Nokuti vose vakatadza uye vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari; asi zvino vanoruramiswa pachena nenyasha dzaMwari nokudzikinura kuri muna Kristu Jesu. Mwari akagadza Jesu sorudzikinuro kubudikidza neropa raJesu uye nokutenda kwomunhu kuti aratidze kururama kwaMwari; nokuti akashivirira zvivi zvakaitwa kare kare kuti aratidze kururama kwake vanozivikanwa kuti vakarurama, uye kuti varuramise avo vanotenda muna Jesu. VaRoma 3:23-26

Tinonamata pamwechete kuna Mwari: Tinokutendai Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, uye tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekutitungamira muchokwadi chese uye kunzwisisa uye kutenda evhangeri! Kumuka kwaJesu kunotiruramisa kururama kwaMwari kunobva pakutenda, uye tinoponeswa nokutenda muvhangeri! Zvokuti kutenda, nokutenda mukuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene, kunotiunzira mbiri! Ameni

Tinokutendai Ishe Jesu Kristu nekutiitira basa rekuregererwa, kutigonesa kugumisa zvitadzo zvedu, kubvisa zvitadzo zvedu, nokuregererwa kwezvitadzo zvedu, uye kusuma avo vanoruramiswa nekusingaperi vachawana hupenyu husingaperi! Kururama kwaMwari kunopiwa kwatiri pachena, kuti isu takasukwa, nokuchenurwa, uye nokururamiswa noMweya waMwari. Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

articles.title: “Tendai kuEvhangeri” 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai kuEvhangeri” 7

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Chidzidzo chechinomwe: Kutenda muvhangeri kunotisunungura kubva pasimba raSatani murima reHadhesi

VaKorose 1:13 Akatinunura pasimba rerima akatiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda;

(1) Tiza pasimba rerima neHadhesi

Mubvunzo: “Rima” rinorevei?

Mhinduro: Rima rinoreva rima riri pamusoro pegomba rakadzika-dzika, nyika isina chiedza uye isina upenyu. Verenga Genesisi 1:2

Mubvunzo:Hadhesi zvinorevei?

Mhinduro: Hadhesi inorevawo rima, hapana chiedza, hapana upenyu, uye nzvimbo yerufu.

Naizvozvo gungwa rakabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri, norufu neHadhesi zvikabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri; Zvakazarurwa 20:13

(2) Kutiza pasimba raSatani

Tinoziva kuti tiri vaMwari uye kuti nyika yose iri musimba rowakaipa. 1 Johani 5:19

Ndiri kukutuma kwavari kuti maziso avo asvinudzwe uye vatendeuke kubva murima vaende kuchiedza uye vabve musimba raSatani vauye kuna Mwari; ’” Mabasa 26:18

(3)Hatisi venyika

ndakavapa shoko renyu. Uye nyika inovavenga, nekuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. Handikumbiri kuti muvabvise panyika, asi ndinokumbira kuti muvadzivirire pane wakaipa (kana kushandurwa: kubva kuchivi). Havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. Johani 17:14-16

Mubvunzo: Ndirini patinenge tisisiri venyika?

Mhinduro: Unotenda muna Jesu! Tenda kuevhangeri! Nzwisisa dzidziso yechokwadi yevhangeri uye ugamuchire Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso chako! Mushure mekunge wazvarwa patsva, waponeswa, uye watorwa sevanakomana vaMwari, hausisiri wenyika.

Mubvunzo: Vakuru vedu ndevenyika here?

Mhinduro: Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa no“kubhabhatidzwa” takaiswa murufu rwaKristu, uye hatichisiri venyika

Mubvunzo: Unoti handisi wenyika ino here? Ndichiri kurarama munyika ino mumuviri here?

Mhinduro: “Mweya Mutsvene uri mumwoyo mako unokuudza” kutenda kwakakosha, sezvakataurwa na“Pauro” ndivo vakazvarwa patsva. Zviri pachena here? Reference plus 2:20

Mubvunzo: Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva ndewenyika here?

Mhinduro: Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva anogara muna Kristu, muna Baba, murudo rwaMwari, kudenga uye mumwoyo yenyu. Munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari haasi wenyika ino.

Mwari akatiponesa kubva musimba rerima, musimba rorufu, muHadhesi, nomusimba raSatani, uye akatiendesa kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda, Jesu. Ameni!

Tinonamata kuna Mwari pamwe chete: Tinokutendai Baba voKudenga nokutuma Mwanakomana wenyu mumwechete Jesu. Shoko rakava nyama, rakafira zvivi zvedu, rakavigwa, uye akamuka zvakare nezuva retatu. Kuburikidza nerudo rukuru rwaJesu Kristu, takazvarwa patsva kubva kuvakafa, kuti tiruramiswe uye tigamuchire chinzvimbo chevanakomana vaMwari! Atisunungura mupesvedzero yaSatani murima reHadhesi, Mwari akapinza vanhu vedu vatsva vakazvarwa patsva kupinda muumambo husingagumi hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa, Jesu. Ameni!

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

kereke munashe jesu kristu

articles.title: “Tendai Vhangeri” 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai Vhangeri” 6

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Chidzidzo chechitanhatu: Vhangeri rinotigonesa kubvisa munhu wekare nemaitiro awo

[VaKorose 3:3] Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari. Ndima 9 Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare nezviito zvake.

(1) Kubvisa mudhara nemaitiro ake

Mubvunzo: Zvinorevei kuti wakafa?

Mhinduro: “Iwe” zvinoreva kuti munhu wekare akafa, akafa pamwe chete naKristu, muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa, uye haasisiri muranda wechivi, nokuti uyo akafa asunungurwa pachivi. Verenga VaRoma 6:6-7

Mubvunzo: “Murume wedu wekare, muviri wezvivi” wakafa riini?

Mhinduro: Jesu paakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, munhu wako wekare wechivi wakanga watofa uye waparara.

Mubvunzo: Ndakanga ndisati ndazvarwa pakarovererwa Ishe! Munoona, “muviri wedu wezvivi” hausati uri mupenyu here nhasi?

Mhinduro: Vhangeri raMwari rinoparidzwa kwauri! “Chinangwa” chevhangeri chinokuudza kuti munhu wekare akafa, muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa, uye hauchisiri muranda wechivi. Ishe kutenda.Kubatana nokushandisa (kutenda) mukufanana norufu uye nokubatanidzwa naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake.

Mubvunzo: Takabvisa riini harahwa?
Mhinduro: Kana uchitenda muna Jesu, ukatenda muvhangeri, uye uchinzwisisa chokwadi, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu, akavigwa, uye akamuka zvakare nezuva retatu! Wakamutswa pamwe chete naKristu. Pawakazvarwa patsva, wakanga wabvisa munhu wekare. Unodavira kuti evhangeri iyi isimba raMwari rokukuponesa, uye unodisa “kubhapatidzwa” muna Kristu uye nokubatanidzwa Naye murufanano rworufu rwake; . saka,

“Kubhabhatidzwa” chiito chinopupura kuti wabvisa munhu wekare nounhu hwako hwekare. Unonyatsonzwisisa here? Verenga VaRoma 6:3-7

Mubvunzo: Ndeapi maitiro emudhara?
Mhinduro: Zvishuvo zvakaipa nezvishuwo zvemudhara.

Mabasa enyama ari pachena: upombwe, netsvina, novutere, nokunamata zvifananidzo, nouroyi, noruvengo, nokukakavara, negodo, nokutsamwa, nokupesana, nedzidziso dzakatsauka, negodo. Ndakagara ndakuudzai, uye ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. VaGaratia 5:19-21

(2) Munhu mutsva anoberekwazve haasi wenyama yomunhu akwegura

Mubvunzo: Tinoziva sei kuti hatisi venyama yekare yemunhu?

Mhinduro: Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri wenyama, asi weMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. VaRoma 8:9

Cherechedza:

"Mweya waMwari" ndiwo Mweya waBaba, Mweya waJesu wakakumbira Mweya Mutsvene wakatumwa naBaba kuti ugare mumwoyo mako → unozvarwa patsva.

1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Vakazvarwa kubva mukutenda kwevhangeri - 1 VaKorinte 4:15
3 Akaberekwa naMwari - Johane 1:12-13

Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva haasisiri wenyama yekare, muviri wakafa wechivi, kana muviri wakaparadzwa, munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari ndewaMweya Mutsvene, waKristu, uye naMwari Baba Haiwa Jehovha, upenyu husingaperi!

(3) Munhu mutsva anokura zvishoma nezvishoma;

Mubvunzo: Vatsva vakazvarwa patsva vanokurira kupi?

Mhinduro: “Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva” anogara muna Kristu Muviri hausati waonekwa, uye haungauoni neziso rakashama, nokuti “munhu mutsva” akazvarwa patsva ndiwo muviri wemweya, muviri wakamutswa waKristu raKristu uye vari pamwe chete naKristu Vakavigwa muna Mwari uye vachikura zvishoma nezvishoma;

Kana uri muviri unooneka womunhu wekare, unofa uye muviri wawo wokunze unoparadzwa zvishoma nezvishoma huruva. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Verenga Genesisi 3:19

Tarisa kune mavhesi maviri anotevera:

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uchiparara, mwoyo womukati (ndiko kuti, Mweya waMwari unogara mumwoyo) uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. 2 VaKorinte 4:16

Kana wakateerera kushoko rake, ukagamuchira dzidziso dzake, uye ukadzidza zvokwadi yake, unofanira kubvisa munhu wako wekare mumufambiro wako wakare, uyo unoramba uchiipa zvishoma nezvishoma kupfurikidza nokunyengera kworuchiva.

VaEfeso 4:21-22

Chirevo: Hama nehanzvadzi! Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva abvisa munhu wekare uye maitiro emunhu akare. Zvakaoma kunzwisisa pano! ichaitsanangura zvakadzama patichagovera "Kuberekwazve" mune ramangwana Zvichava zvakajeka uye zviri nyore kuti vanhu vanzwisise.

Ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekugarovheneka maziso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tione nekunzwa varanda vamunotuma kuti vaparidze chokwadi chemweya uye kuti tigone kunzwisisa Bhaibheri. Tinonzwisisa kuti Kristu akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu uye akavigwa, zvokuti takabvisa munhu wekare namafambiro ahwo, takazvarwa patsva nokumuka kwaKristu kubva kuvakafa, uye Mweya waMwari unogara mumwoyo yedu, uye Tinowana Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva "anogara muna Kristu, anovandudzwa zvishoma nezvishoma uye anokura, uye anokura kusvika pakuzara nechimiro chaKristu; anosanganawo nekubviswa kwekunze kwemuviri wekare, uyo unoparadzwa zvishoma nezvishoma. munhu akanga ari guruva paakabva kuna Adhamu, uye achadzokera kuguruva.

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai kuEvhangeri” 5

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Murairo wechishanu: Vhangeri rinotisunungura kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwawo

Mubvunzo: Zvakanaka here kusununguka kubva kumutemo? Kana zviri nani kuchengeta murayiro here?

Mhinduro: Rusununguko kubva kumutemo.

Mubvunzo: Sei?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Mumwe nomumwe anoita nomurayiro akatukwa, nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “Vakatukwa vose vasingarambi vachiita zvose zvakanyorwa muBhuku roMurayiro.”
2 Zviri pachena kuti hakuna munhu anoruramiswa nomurayiro pamberi paMwari, nokuti zvinonzi, “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.”
3 Naizvozvo nemabasa emurairo, hakuna nyama inganzi yakarurama pamberi paMwari; nekuti murairo unoreva chivi. VaRoma 3:20
4 Imi munotsvaka kururamiswa nomurayiro makaparadzaniswa naKristu uye makawa panyasha. VaGaratiya 5:4
5 Nokuti murairo hauna kuitirwa vakarurama, vanova vana vaMwari, asi vasingateereri murairo, navasingateereri, vasingadi Mwari, navatadzi, navasingadi Mwari, navanomhura Mwari, nomuparadzi, nemhondi, nemhombwe. nemhombwe, kana gororo, kana chimwe chipi nechipi chinopesana nokururama. 1 Timotio 1:9-10

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(1) Kutyora mutemo waAdhamu wekutyora sungano

Mubvunzo: Wakasununguka kubva kumutemo upi?

Mhinduro: Kusunungurwa pachivi chinotungamirira kurufu mutemo waAdhama “woputsa sungano” uyo Mwari akaraira Adhama! (Asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nezuva raunoudya zvirokwazvo uchafa!”), uyu murairo womurayiro. Genesi 2:17

Mubvunzo: Sei vanhu vese vari pasi pechituko chemurairo apo “madzitateguru ekutanga” akatyora mutemo?

Mhinduro: Izvi zvakafanana nechivi chakapinda munyika nemunhu mumwe chete, Adhamu, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, saka rufu rwakauya kumunhu wese nekuti munhu wese akatadza. VaRoma 5:12

Mubvunzo: Chivi chii?

Mhinduro: Kutyora mutemo chivi → Ani naani anotadza anotyora mutemo chivi. 1 Johani 3:4

Cherechedza:

Vose vakatadza, uye muna Adhamu vose vakanga vari pasi pechituko chomurayiro uye vakafa.

Die! Simba rako rekukunda riripi?
Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi?
Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo.
Kana muchida kusunungurwa parufu, munofanira kusunungurwa pachivi.
Kana muchida kusunungurwa kubva pachivi, munofanira kusunungurwa kubva pamurayiro wesimba rechivi.
Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Verenga 1 VaKorinde 15:55-56

(2) Kusunungurwa pamurairo nekutuka kwomurairo nomuviri waKristu

Hama dzangu nemiwo makafa kumurairo nomuviri waKristu... Asi, zvatakafa kumurairo watakasungwa nawo, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo... Ona VaRoma 7:4,6

Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, nokuva chituko nokuda kwedu;

(3) Akadzikinura avo vakanga vari pasi pomutemo kuti tigamuchire kuva vanakomana

Asi nguva yakati yakwana, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nomukadzi, akaberekwa pasi pomurairo, kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vanakomana. VaGaratia 4:4-5

Naizvozvo vhangeri raKristu rinotisunungura kubva pamurayiro nokutukwa kwawo. Zvakanakira kusununguka kubva kumutemo:

1 Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika. VaRoma 4:15
2 Kana pasina murayiro, chivi hachiverengwi. VaRoma 5:13
3 Nokuti kunze kwemurairo chivi chakafa; VaRoma 7:8
4 Ani naani asina murayiro uye asingateveri murayiro anoparara. VaRoma 2:12
5 Ani naani anotadza ari pasi pomurayiro achatongwa nomurayiro. VaRoma 12:12

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Tinonamata pamwe chete kuna Mwari: Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutumira Mwanakomana wenyu waanoda, Jesu, uyo akaberekwa ari pasi pemutemo, uye akatidzikinura kubva kumutemo uye nekutuka kwemurairo kuburikidza nerufu uye kutukwa kwemuviri waKristu wakarembera pamuti. Kristu akamuka kubva kuvakafa kuti atibereke patsva nokutiita vatsvene! Wana kugamuchirwa seMwanakomana waMwari, sunungurwa, sunungurwa, uponeswe, ugozvarwa patsva, uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi. Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

Chechi muna Kristu Ishe

articles.content:
“Tendai kuEvhangeri” 4

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi ticharamba tichiongorora ruwadzano nekugovera “Kutenda muVhangeri”

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Murairo wechina: Kutenda muvhangeri kunotisunungura kubva kuchivi


Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi kutendeuka?
Mhinduro: “Kutendeuka” zvinoreva mwoyo wakapfidza, wakasuruvara uye wakapwanyika, uchiziva kuti munhu ari muchivi, mukuchiva kwakaipa nokuchiva, muna Adhama asina simba, uye ari murufu;

"Shanduko" zvinoreva kururamisa. Mapisarema 51:17 Chibayiro chinodiwa naMwari mweya wakaputsika, imi Mwari hamuzozvidzi mwoyo wakaputsika nowakapwanyika.

Mubvunzo: Ungagadzirisa sei?

Mhinduro: Tenda muvhangeri “Kutendeuka” hazvirevi kukumbira kuti uvandudze, uvandudze, kana kuti ushandure iwe pachako. Chirevo chaicho che "kutendeuka" ndechokuti iwe utende evhangeri isimba raMwari rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda muvhangeri → kunotisunungura kubva kuchivi, kubva mumutemo uye kubva kumurairo munhu wekare uye munhu wekare Mabasa, kutiza kubva kuna Satani, kutiza kubva musimba raSatani murima reHadhesi, kuberekwa patsva, kuponeswa, kupfeka munhu mutsva uye kupfeka Kristu, kugashira umwanakomana waKristu; Mwari, uye uwane hupenyu husingaperi!

→ →Ichi ichokwadi "kutendeuka"! Vandudzwei mundangariro dzenyu uye mupfeke munhu mutsva mukururama kwechokwadi noutsvene - tarisa kuna VaEfeso 4:23-24

Akanga ari munhu wekare, zvino ava munhu mutsva;
Kamwe muchivi, zvino pautsvene;
Pakutanga muna Adamu, zvino muna Kristu.
Kutenda muvhangeri → kutendeuka!
Shandurwa → Kare waiva mwanakomana waAdhamu akaitwa neguruva;

Zvino mwanakomana waJesu, Adhamu wokupedzisira. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Ungatenda sei vhangeri?

Mhinduro: Tenda muvhangeri! Ingotenda muna Jesu!

Tinotenda kuti Jesu Kirisito, akatumwa naMwari, akatiitira basa rokuregererwa (kuti aponese vanhu vake kubva kuzvitadzo zvavo). Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Tinotenda sei mubasa rekuregererwa?

Mhinduro: Jesu akapindura, “Iri ndiro basa raMwari, kuti mutende kuna iye waakatuma.”

Mubvunzo: Unganzwisisa sei ndima iyi?
Mhinduro: Tenda muna Jesu akatumwa naMwari kuti azotiitira basa rekuregererwa!
Ndakatenda: Basa raMwari roruponeso riri kushanda mandiri, uye “mubairo” webasa raJesu unoverengerwa kune avo “vanotenda”, uye Mwari anondiona sendakashanda → Ini ndakafanana naMwari, basa raMwari Ameni!

Saka Pauro anoti muna VaRoma 1:17! Kururama kwaMwari “kunoponeswa nokutenda→kunoponeswa nokutenda”, nokuda kwokutenda→kutenda, Mweya Mutsvene unoshanda “uchifamba naMwari” kuti uite basa rekuvandudzwa, kuti ugamuchire mbiri, mibayiro, nekorona. Izvi ndizvo zvinotaura Mwari kune avo vanotenda. Munonzwisisa here chakavanzika chebasa riri mumuviri?

Mubvunzo: Ko (kutenda) tinoverengwa sei sevashandi pamwe chete uye tinofamba naMwari?

Mhinduro: Tenda muna Jesu Kirisito akatumwa naMwari kuti azoita basa rekuregererwa.

(1)Ishe akaisa zvitadzo zvavanhu vose pana Jesu

Isu tose takanga takarasika samakwai; Jehovha akaisa pamusoro pake kuipa kwedu tose. Isaya 53:6

(2) Kristu akafira “vanhu vose

Nokuti rudo rwaKristu runotimanikidza; nokuti tinoti mumwe akafira vose, mumwe chete akafira vose

(3) Vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi

Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vechivi; VaRoma 6:6-7

[Ona:] Jehovha Mwari akaisa zvitadzo zvavanhu vose pana Jesu, uye Jesu akarovererwa nokuda kwavo vose, zvokuti vose vakafa - 2 VaKorinte 5:14 → Avo vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi - VaRoma 6:7; ” vakafa, uye vose vakasunungurwa pachivi. Ameni! Wakariona uye wakarinzwa. Iri ndiro vhangeri rakatumwa nevaranda vaMwari kuti vakuudze kuti wakasunungurwa kubva kuchivi Ndiro ruponeso rwaMwari. Unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo, evhangeri iyi isimba raMwari rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda kuti Jesu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu, kuti tisunungurwe kubva muzvivi. Iwe unonzwisisa maitiro e "dzidziso" iyi. Kana usingatendi kuti vhangeri iri rakakusunungura kubva kuchivi, uchapiwa mhosva uye uchatongwa pakupera kwezuva izvozvo?

Ngatinamatei kuna Mwari pamwechete: Abha anodiwa, Baba Vekudenga! Makaisa chitadzo chavanhu vose pana Jesu Kristu, uyo akafira zvivi zvedu, kuti isu tose tisunungurwe kubva muzvitadzo zvedu. Ameni! Vakaropafadzwa avo vanoona, vanonzwa, uye vanotenda vhangeri iri. “Mubairo” webasa rorudzikinuro rwaJesu unodzoserwa kumuviri weavo vanotenda uku kushanda pamwe chete naMwari uye kuita basa raMwari.

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe jesu kristu

articles.title: “Tendai kuEvhangeri” 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai kuEvhangeri” 3

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi ticharamba tichiongorora ruwadzano nekugovera “Kutenda muVhangeri”

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Chidzidzo Chechitatu: Vhangeri isimba raMwari

VaRoma 1:16-17 (Pauro akati) Handinyari neevhangeri; Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.”

1. Vhangeri isimba raMwari

Mubvunzo: Evhangeri chii?

Mhinduro: (Pauro akati) Zvandakakupaiwo ndeizvi: Kutanga kwazvose, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro. 15:3-4

Mubvunzo: Simba revhangeri chii?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kumutswa kwevakafa

Pamusoro poMwanakomana wake, Jesu Kristu, Ishe wedu, akaberekwa nomumbeu yaDhavhidhi panyama, uye akaziviswa kuti ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari nesimba nomudzimu woutsvene nokumuka kubva kuvakafa. VaRoma 1:3-4

(2) Tenda mukumutswa kwaJesu kubva kuvakafa

Shure kwaizvozvo, vane gumi nomumwe pavakanga vagere pakudya, Jesu akazviratidza kwavari akavatsiura pamusoro pokusatenda kwavo uye nokuoma kwemwoyo yavo, nokuti havana kutenda vaya vakanga vamuona mushure mokumuka kwake. Ipapo akati kwavari, “Endai munyika yose muparidze vhangeri kuzvisikwa zvose
Tomasi akashamisika nekumuka kwaJesu:

Mazuva masere akati apera, vadzidzi vakange vari mumbazve, naTomasi anavo, nemikova yakapfigwa. Jesu akauya akamira pakati akati, “Rugare ngaruve nemi.” Ipapo akati kuna Tomasi, “Tambanudza munwe wako, ubate maoko angu, uise parutivi rwangu. asi tenda!” Tomasi akati kwaari, “Ishe wangu, Mwari wangu!” Jesu akati kwaari: “Vakaropafadzwa vasina kuona asi vatenda.” 20:26-29

2. Tenda muvhangeri iri uye uchaponeswa

(1) Tenda ubhabhatidzwe ugoponeswa

Ani naani anotenda akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa; Zviratidzo izvi zvichatevera vanotenda: Vachabudisa mweya yakaipa nezita rangu; , uye vachapora. ” Mako 16:16-18

(2) Tenda muna Jesu ugova noupenyu husingaperi

“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi

(3) Munhu wose anorarama uye achitenda muna Jesu haazombofi

Jesu akati kwaari, “Ndini kumuka noupenyu. Ani naani anotenda kwandiri achararama, kunyange akafa, uye ani naani anorarama uye anotenda mandiri haangatongofi. Unotenda izvi here?

(Unonzwisisa here zvakataurwa naIshe Jesu? Kana usinganzwisisi, nyatsoteerera)

Saka Pauro akati! Handina nyadzi pamusoro peEvhangeri, nokuti isimba raMwari rokuponesa mumwe nomumwe anotenda, kumuJudha pakutanga, uye kumuGirikiwo. Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.”

Ngatinamatei pamwechete: Mazvita Ishe Jesu nokufira zvivi zvedu, nokuvigwa, nokumukazve nezuva retatu! Jesu akatanga kumutswa kubva kuvakafa sechibereko chokutanga, kuitira kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa vhangeri “rokumuka kwevakafa” iri isimba raMwari rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda mariri kwaJesu, Ishe Jesu vachatiitawo kuti tibatane naye. Kumuka kuvakafa, kuberekwa patsva, ruponeso, upenyu husingaperi! Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

guta munashe jesu kristu

articles.title: “Tendai Vhangeri” 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai Vhangeri” 2

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Chidzidzo Chechipiri: Vhangeri Chii?

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi evhangeri yehumambo?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1. Jesu akaparidza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga

(1) Jesu akazadzwa noMweya Mutsvene uye akaparidza evhangeri

“Mweya waJehovha uri pamusoro pangu, nokuti wakandizodza kuti ndiparidzire varombo Evhangeri; nyasha dzaMwari Gore reJubheri reNirvana” Ruka 4:18-19.

Mubvunzo: Unganzwisisa sei ndima iyi?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Jesu akabhabhatidzwa murwizi Jorodhani, akazadzwa noMweya Mutsvene, uye mushure mokunge atungamirirwa murenje kuti anoedzwa, akatanga kuparidza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga!

“Mweya waShe (ndiko kuti, Mweya waMwari, Mweya Mutsvene)
Mandiri (kureva Jesu),
Nokuti Iye (ndiko kuti, Baba voKudenga) akandizodza,
Ndikumbirei kuti ndiparidze evhangeri kuvarombo (zvichireva kuti havana kusimira uye havana chinhu, havana upenyu noupenyu husingaperi);

Ndatumwa kuzotaura:

Mubvunzo: Ndeapi mashoko akanaka akataurwa naJesu?

Mhinduro: Vakatapwa vachasunungurwa

1 Avo vakatapwa nadhiabhorosi,
2 Avo vakasungwa namasimba erima neHadhesi.

3 Izvo rufu rwakabvisa zvichasunungurwa.

Mapofu anowana kuona: ndiko kuti, hakuna munhu muTesitamende yekare akaona Mwari, asi muTestamente Itsva, zvino vakaona Jesu, Mwanakomana waMwari, akaona chiedza, uye akatenda muna Jesu kuti ave neupenyu husingaperi.

Vaya vakadzvinyirirwa ngavasunungurwe: avo vanodzvinyirirwa nevaranda ve“chivi”, avo vakatukwa uye vakasungwa nomutemo, vasunungurwe, uye vazivise Jubheri renyasha dzaMwari! Ameni

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(2) Jesu akafanotaura kurovererwa uye kumuka katatu

Jesu paakanga okwira kuJerusarema, akatora vadzidzi vake gumi navaviri parutivi akati kwavari, “Tarirai, tichakwira kuJerusarema, Mwanakomana woMunhu achaiswa mumaoko avaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro kurufu nokumuisa kuvaHedheni, ivo vachamusveveredza, nokumurovera pamuchinjikwa, nezuva retatu

(3) Jesu akamutswa uye akatuma vadzidzi vake kunoparidza evhangeri

Jesu akati kwavari, “Izvi ndizvo zvandaikuudzai ndichinemi kuti: Zvinhu zvose zvakanyorwa pamusoro pangu muMurayiro waMozisi, naVaprofita nomuMapisarema zvinofanira kuzadziswa vanogona kunzwisisa Magwaro, uye vanoti kwavari: “Zvakanyorwa kuti Kristu anofanira kutambudzika nokumuka kubva kuvakafa pazuva rechitatu, uye kuti kutendeuka nokuregererwa kwezvivi kunofanira kuparidzwa muzita rake marudzi ose. Ruka 24:44-47

Mubvunzo: Jesu akatuma vadzidzi vake sei kunoparidza evhangeri?

Mhinduro: Tsananguro yakadzama pazasi (pa28:19-20)

1 Kusunungura vanhu (kutenda muvhangeri) kubva kuchivi - VaRoma 6:7
2 Rusununguko kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwawo - VaRoma 7: 6, Gal 3: 13
3 Bvisai munhu wekare nemabasa ake - VaKorose 3:9, VaEfeso 4:20-24
4 Kununurwa pasimba rerima neHadhesi— VaKorose 1:13
5 Kununurwa musimba raSatani— Mabasa 26:18
6 Kubva pachangu - VaGaratiya 2:20
7 Jesu akamuka kubva kuvakafa akatimutsa patsva - 1 Petro 1:3
8 Tenda muevhangeri uye ugamuchire Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso - VaEfeso 1:13
9 Kuti tigamuchire kuitwa kwedu vana vaMwari—VaG
10 Bhabhatidzwa muna Kristu uye ugovane murufu rwake, kuvigwa nekumuka kwake - VaRoma 6: 3-8
11 Pfekai munhu mutsva uye mufuke Kristu—VaG
12 Uponese. Wana hupenyu husingaperi.
Reference John 3:16, 1 Corinthians 15:51-54, 1 Peter 1: 4-5
Saka, unonzwisisa here?

2. Simoni Petro anoparidza vhangeri

Mubvunzo: Petro akaparidza sei evhangeri?

Mhinduro: Simoni Petro akati

Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Maererano nengoni dzake huru, akatibereka patsva kuti tive netariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa kuti tipinde munhaka isingaori, isina kusvibiswa uye isingasvavi, yamakachengeterwa kudenga. Iwe unochengetwa nesimba raMwari kubudikidza nokutenda uchagamuchira ruponeso rwakagadzirirwa kuratidzwa munguva yekupedzisira.
…Makazvarwa patsva, kwete nembeu inoora, asi isingaori, neshoko raMwari benyu uye rinogara nokusingaperi. …Shoko raShe chete rinogara nokusingaperi. “Iri ndiro vhangeri rakaparidzwa kwamuri. 1 Petro 1:3-5, 23, 25

3. Johane anoparidza vhangeri

Mubvunzo: Johane akaparidza sei evhangeri?
Mhinduro: John akati!
Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. … Shoko rakazova nyama, rikagara pakati pedu, rizere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. …Hakuna akamboona Mwari, asi Mwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, ari pachifuva chaBaba, ndiye akamuratidza. Johane 1:1-2, 14, 18
Pamusoro peshoko rapakuvamba roupenyu kubvira pakutanga, izvi ndizvo zvatakanzwa, takaona, takaona nameso edu timene, uye zvatakabata namaoko edu. Upenyu uhwu hwakaratidzwa, uye takahuona, uye zvino tinopupura kuti tinokuparidzirai upenyu husingaperi hwakanga huri kuna Baba uye hwakaratidzwa kwatiri. 1 Johane 1:1-2
“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi

4. Pauro anoparidza vhangeri

Mubvunzo: Pauro akaparidza sei evhangeri?
Mhinduro: Pauro akaparidzira vhangeri kuvaHedheni
Zvino ndinokuzivisai, hama, evhangeri yandakakuparidzirai, ramakagamuchira, ramakamira mairi, muchaponeswa nevhangeri iri.
Chandakakumikidzawo kwamuri chaiva chokuti: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neMagwaro.

1 VaKorinte 15:1-4

Zvadaro, tichatarisa pakutora vhangeri rakaparidzwa naPauro kwatiri isu vaHedheni semuenzaniso, nekuti vhangeri rakaparidzwa naPauro rakadzama uye rakadzama, richibvumira vanhu kunzwisisa Bhaibheri.

Nhasi tinonamata pamwechete: Mazvita Ishe Jesu nokufira zvivi zvedu, nokuvigwa, nokumukazve nezuva retatu! Ameni. Ishe Jesu! Kumuka kwako kubva kuvakafa kwakaratidza vhangeri isimba raMwari rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda, uye ani naani anotenda muvhangeri achava noupenyu husingaperi. Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi Rangarirai kuitora.

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe jesu kristu

articles.title: “Tendai kuEvhangeri” 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Tendai kuEvhangeri” 1

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoongorora kuyanana uye kugovera "Kutenda muVhangeri"

Ngativhure bhaibheri kuna Marko 1:15, tivhure toverenga tose:

Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri."

Nhanganyaya:
Kubva pakuziva Mwari wechokwadi, tinoziva Jesu Kristu!

→→Tendai muna Jesu!

Mudzidzisi wekutanga: Jesu ndiye Mavambo eVhangeri

Kutanga kweevhangeri yaJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari. Mako 1:1

Mubvunzo: Tenda muvhangeri Chii chaunotenda machiri?
Mhinduro: Kutenda muvhangeri →→ ndiko (kutenda) Jesu! Zita raJesu ivhangeri Zita rokuti “Jesu” rinoreva kuti: nokuti achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo

Mubvunzo: Sei Jesu ari mavambo evhangeri?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1. Jesu ndiMwari asingagumi

1Mwari aripo uye aripo

Mwari akati kuna Mosesi, “Ndini iye wandiri” Eksodo 3:14
Mubvunzo: Jesu akavapo rini?
Mhinduro: Zvirevo 8:22-26
“Pakutanga kwezvisikwa zvaIshe,
Pakutanga, zvinhu zvose zvisati zvasikwa, ini ndakanga ndiripo (ndiko kuti, Jesu).
Kubva pakusingaperi, kubva pakutanga,
Nyika isati yavapo, ndakasimbiswa.
Hakuna kwakadzika, kana tsime remvura zhinji, kwandakaberekwa.
Makomo asati aiswa, zvikomo zvisati zvavapo, ini ndakaberekwa.

Jehovha asati asika nyika neminda yayo nevhu renyika, ini ndakavabereka. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

2 Jesu ndiArufa naOmega

“Ndini Arufa naOmega, Wamasimba ose, akanga aripo, uye akanga aripo, neachauya,” anodaro Ishe Mwari

3 Jesu ndiye wokutanga nowokupedzisira

Ndini Arifa naOmega; ” Zvakazarurwa 22:13

2. Basa raJesu rokusika

Mubvunzo: Ndiani akasika nyika?

Mhinduro: Jesu akasika nyika.

1 Jesu akasika nyika

Mwari, uyo akataura kumadzitateguru edu munguva dzakare kubudikidza navaprofita panguva zhinji uye nenzira dzakawanda, akataura kwatiri zvino mumazuva ano okupedzisira kubudikidza noMwanakomana wake, waakagadza mugari wenhaka yezvinhu zvose uye waakasika nyika yose kubudikidza naye. VaHebheru 1:1-2

2 Zvinhu zvose zvakasikwa naJesu

Pakutanga Mwari akasika denga nenyika - Genesisi 1:1

Zvinhu zvose zvakaitwa kubudikidza naye (Jesu) uye kunze kwake hakuna kana chinhu chakaitwa pane izvo zvakaitwa. Kunenge 1:3

3 Mwari akasika munhu nomufananidzo wake uye akafanana

Mwari akati: “Ngatisike munhu nomufananidzo wedu (kureva Baba, Mwanakomana, uye Mweya Mutsvene), akafanana nesu, uye ngavave nesimba pamusoro pehove dzegungwa, napamusoro peshiri dzedenga, napamusoro pezvipfuwo. napamusoro penyika, napamusoro pezvipembenene zvose zvinokambaira panyika.

Saka Mwari akasika munhu nomufananidzo wake, akamusika nomufananidzo waMwari; Genesi 1:26-27

【Cherechedza:】

“Adhamu” wekare akasikwa nemufananidzo waMwari pachake (Jesu aive “mumvuri” wemufananidzo waMwari nemufananidzo wake muviri! --Verenga VaKorose 2:17, VaHebheru 10:1, VaRoma 10:4.

Kana "mumvuri" waratidzwa, ndiye → Adamu wekupedzisira Jesu! Adhamu wekare aiva "mumvuri" → Adhamu wokupedzisira, Jesu → ndiye Adhamu chaiye, saka Adhamu mwanakomana waMwari! Ona Ruka 3:38 . Muna Adhamu vose vakafa nokuda kwe“chivi” muna Kristu vose vachamutswa nokuda kwo“kuzvarwa patsva”! Ona 1 VaKorinte 15:22. Saka, ndinoshamisika kana iwe uchinzwisisa?

Avo vanovhenekerwa noMweya Mutsvene vachanzwisisa kana vachiona nokunzwa, asi vamwe vanhu havanganzwisisi kunyange miromo yavo yakaoma. Avo vasinganzwisise vanogona kuteerera zvishoma nezvishoma uye kunyengetera kuna Mwari zvakanyanya. Asi hamufaniri kushora nzira yaMwari yechokwadi kana vanhu vangoshora nzira yechokwadi yaMwari uye vakasagamuchira rudo rwechokwadi, Mwari anovapa mwoyo isina kururama ovaita kuti vatende nhema .Vachatenda here kuti haufe wakanzwisisa vhangeri kana kuzvarwa patsva kusvikira wafa? Tarisa kuna 2:10-12.
(Somuenzaniso, 1 Johani 3:9, 5:18) Munhu wose akaberekwa naMwari “haazotadzi kana kutadza,” vanhu vakawanda vanoti “munhu wose akaberekwa naMwari” acharamba achingotadza. Chikonzero chacho ndechei? Unonzwisisa here kuberekwa patsva?
Kungofanana naJudhasi, uyo akanga atevera Jesu kwamakore matatu uye akamutengesa, uye vaFarise vaishora chokwadi, havana kunzwisisa kuti Jesu akanga ari Mwanakomana waMwari, Kristu, uye Muponesi kusvikira pakufa kwavo.

Somuenzaniso, "muti weupenyu" ndiwo mufananidzo wechokwadi wechinhu chepakutanga Pane "mumvuri" wemuti wepasi pemuti wehupenyu; Jesu! Jesu ndiye mufananidzo wechokwadi wechinhu chekutanga. Wedu (munhu wekare) akazvarwa nenyama yaAdama uye zvakare "mumvuri" wedu akazvarwa patsva (munhu mutsva) anozvarwa nevhangeri raJesu uye ndiye muviri waKristu, ini chaiye, uye vana vaMwari. Ameni, wanzwisisa here? Verenga 1 VaKorinde 15:45

3. Basa raJesu rokudzikinura

1 Vanhu vakawira muBindu reEdheni

Zvino wakati kuna Adhamu: Nekuti wakateerera mukadzi wako, ukadya muti wandakakuraira kuti urege kuudya, ivhu ratukwa nekuda kwako;
Munofanira kushanda nesimba upenyu hwenyu hwose kuti muwane zvokudya zvinobva muvhu.

Nyika ichakuberekera minzwa nerukato, uye iwe uchadya miriwo yemusango. Neziya rechiso chako uchadya zvokudya zvako kusvikira wadzokera kuvhu, kwawakabva. Iwe uri guruva, uye kuguruva uchadzokera. ” Genesisi 3:17-19

2 Chivi pachakangopinda munyika kubva kuna Adhamu, rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose

Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza. VaRoma 5:12

3. Mwari akapa mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, tenda muna Jesu uye uchava noupenyu husingaperi.

“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi .Akaponeswa

4. Jesu ndiye rudo rwokutanga

1 rudo rwekutanga

Zvisinei, pane chinhu chimwe chete chandinofanira kukupomera: wakasiya rudo rwako rwekutanga. Zvakazarurwa 2:4

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi rudo rwekutanga?
Mhinduro: “Mwari” rudo (Johani 4:16) Jesu munhu uye Mwari! Saka, rudo rwekutanga ndiJesu!

Pakutanga, waive netariro yeruponeso “nekuda” kutenda muna Jesu mushure, waitofanira kuvimba nemaitiro ako “kutenda”, uchasiya Jesu, wobva wasiya zvepakutanga rudo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

2 Murairo wekutanga

Mubvunzo: Chii chaive kurongeka kwekutanga?

Mhinduro: Tinofanira kudanana. Uyu ndiwo murayiro wamakanzwa kubva pakutanga. 1 Johani 3:11

3 Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita.

“Mudzidzisi, ndoupi murayiro mukuru pamurayiro?” Jesu akati kwaari, “Ida Ishe Mwari wako nomwoyo wako wose, nomweya wako wose, uye nepfungwa dzako dzose . Uye wechipiri wakafanana nawo: Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe.

Saka “kutanga kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, ndiJesu! Ameni, manzwisisa here?

Tevere, ticharamba tichigovera chinyorwa chevhangeri: “Tendai kuEvangeri” Jesu ndiye mavambo evhangeri, kutanga kwerudo, uye kutanga kwezvinhu zvose! Jesu! Iri zita i "evhangeri" → kuponesa vanhu vako kubva kuzvivi zvavo! Ameni

Ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Maita basa Baba vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekutivhenekera nekutitungamirira kuti tizive kuti Jesu Kristu ndiye: mavambo evhangeri, mavambo erudo, uye kutanga kwezvinhu zvose. ! Ameni.

Muzita raIshe Jesu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

articles.title: Kuziva Jesu Kristu 8
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 8

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane 17:3, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari oga wechokwadi, naJesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

Mudzidzisi wechisere: Jesu ndiArufa naOmega

(1) Ishe ndiArufa naOmega

Jehovha Mwari anoti: “Ndini Arufa naOmega (Arufa, Omega: mabhii maviri okutanga neekupedzisira ebhii rechiGiriki), Wemasimbaose, akanga aripo, aripo, uye achazouya

Mubvunzo: “Alfa naOmega” zvinorevei?

Mhinduro: Arufa naOmega → ndiwo mavara echiGiriki “wokutanga neokupedzisira”, zvinoreva kuti wekutanga newokupedzisira.

Mubvunzo: Chii chinorehwa nekare, iyezvino uye nekusingaperi?

Mhinduro: “Iye ariko kare” zvinoreva Wamasimba Ose mukusingagumi, mavambo, mavambo, mavambo, nyika isati yavapo → Ishe Mwari Jesu akanga aripo, aripo nhasi, uye achavapo nokusingaperi! Ameni.

Bhuku raZvirevo rinoti:

“Pakutanga kwezvisikwa zvaIshe,
Pakutanga, zvinhu zvose zvisati zvasikwa, ini ndakanga ndiripo (ndiko kuti, Jesu).
Kubva pakusingaperi, kubva pakutanga,
Nyika isati yavapo, ndakasimbiswa.
Hakuna gomba, hakuna tsime remvura zhinji, ini (ndichireva Jesu) ndazvarwa.
Makomo asati aiswa, zvikomo zvisati zvavapo, ini ndakaberekwa.
Jehovha asati asika nyika neminda yayo nevhu renyika, ini ndakavabereka.
(Baba Vokudenga) Akagadza matenga, uye ini (ndichireva Jesu) ndiripo;
Akaita denderedzwa pamusoro pechiso chegomba. Pamusoro ndiye anosimbisa denga, pasi anosimbisa matsime, anotemera gungwa miganhu, anodzivisa mvura kudarika murayiro wake, anoteya nheyo dzenyika.
Panguva iyoyo ini (Jesu) ndakanga ndinaye (Baba) mhizha huru (injiniya),
Anofadzwa naye mazuva ose, achifara nguva dzose pamberi pake, achifara munzvimbo yaAkagadzirira munhu (kureva vanhu) kuti agare mairi, uye (Jesu) anofarira kugara pakati pevanhu.

Zvino vanakomana vangu, nditeererei; nekuti unochengeta nzira dzangu wakakomborerwa. Zvirevo 8:22-32

(2) Jesu ndiye wokutanga nowokupedzisira

Zvino ndakati ndichimuona, ndakawira patsoka dzake sewakafa; akaisa ruoko rwake rwerudyi pamusoro pangu akati: Usatya, ndini wekutanga newekupedzisira;

unorarama; ndakanga ndakafa, zvino tarira, ndinorarama nokusingaperi-peri; Zvakazarurwa 1:17-18

Mubvunzo: Wokutanga newokupedzisira zvinorevei?

Mhinduro: “Kutanga” zvinoreva kubva pakusingaperi, kubva pakutanga, mavambo, mavambo, nyika isati yavapo → Jesu akanga atovapo, akagadzwa, uye akazvarwa! “Kuguma” kunoreva kuguma kwenyika, apo Jesu ari Mwari asingagumi.

Mubvunzo: Jesu akafira ani?

Mhinduro: Jesu akafa “kamwe chete” nokuda kwezvivi zvedu, akavigwa, uye akamuka zvakare pazuva retatu. 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4

Mubvunzo: Jesu akafira zvivi zvedu uye akavigwa?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Tisunungurei kubva kuchivi

Kuti tisavezve varanda vechivi - VaRoma 6:6-7

2 Rusununguko kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwawo - VaRoma 7: 6, Gal 3: 13
3 Bvisai munhu wekare nezviito zvake - VaKorose 3:9
4 Tabvisa kuchiva nokuchiva kwenyama - VaG 5:24
5 Kubva kwandiri, handisisiri ini ndinorarama - VaG 2: 20
6 Kubuda munyika - Johane 17:14-16

7 Kununurwa kubva kuna Satani - Mabasa 26:18

Mubvunzo: Jesu akamutswa nezuva retatu.
Mhinduro: Tiruramise! VaRoma 4:25. Ngatimutswe, tizvarwe patsva, tiponeswe, tigamuchirwe sevanakomana vaMwari, uye tive nehupenyu husingaperi pamwe chete naKristu! Ameni

(Jesu) Akatinunura pasimba rerima (rinoreva rufu neHadhesi) akatiendesa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa;

Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Ndakanga ndakafa, uye zvino ndiri mupenyu nokusingaperi-peri, uye ndine kiyi dzorufu neHadhesi.

(3) Jesu ndiye mavambo nemagumo

Ipapo mutumwa akati kwandiri, "Mashoko aya ndeechokwadi uye akatendeka. Ishe, Mwari wemweya yavaprofita, akatuma mutumwa wake kuti aratidze varanda vake zvinofanira kuitika nokukurumidza." kurumidzai kuuya kwamuri.” “Vakaropafadzwa avo vanoteerera kuprofita kwebhuku iri! "

Zvakazarurwa 22:6-7,13

Ndinokutendai Baba Vekudenga, Ishe Jesu Kristu, neMweya Mutsvene nekugara munesu vana, muchivhenekera meso emoyo yedu nguva dzose, nekutitungamirira isu vana (8 lectures to total) Kuongorora, kuyanana nekugovana: Ziva Jesu Kristu matumira Ameni

Ngatinamatei pamwechete: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Titungamirirei muchokwadi chose uye muzive Ishe Jesu: Ndiye Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, Muponesi, Mesiya, uye Mwari anotipa upenyu husingaperi! Ameni.

Jehovha Mwari anoti: “Ndini Arufa naOmega; ndini wokutanga nowokupedzisira, ndini wokutanga nowokupedzisira. Ndini Wemasimbaose, akanga aripo, akanga aripo, uye achazouya. Ameni!

Ishe Jesu, kurumidzai kuuya! Ameni

Ndinozvikumbira muzita raIshe Jesu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

articles.title: Kuziva Jesu Kristu 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 7

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane 17:3, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye kuti vazive Jesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

Murairo wechinomwe: Jesu ndiye Chingwa cheHupenyu

Nokuti chingwa chaMwari ndiye anoburuka achibva kudenga uye anopa upenyu kunyika. Vakati, Ishe, tipei zvokudya izvi nguva dzose. ” Jesu akati, “Ndini chingwa choupenyu.” Ani naani anouya kwandiri haangatongovi nenzara; Johani 6:33-35

Mubvunzo: Jesu ndiye Chingwa cheHupenyu! Saka “mana” ndicho chingwa choupenyu here?
Mhinduro: "Mana" yakadonhedzwa naMwari murenje muTesitamende Yekare mufananidzo wechingwa cheupenyu uye mufananidzo waKristu, asi "mana" "mumvuri" → "mumvuri" unoratidzika kuva Jesu Kristu, uye Jesu ndiye mana chaiwo, ndicho chikafu chechokwadi chehupenyu! Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Somuenzaniso, muTesitamende yekare, “hari yendarama yemana, tsvimbo yaAroni inotungira, uye mahwendefa maviri omurayiro” akachengetwa muareka yesungano zvose zvaimiririra Kristu. Verenga VaHebheru 9:4
“Mana” mumvuri nomufananidzo, kwete chingwa chaichoicho choupenyu, vaIsraeri vakafa pashure pokudya “mana” murenje.

Naizvozvo Ishe Jesu akati: “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, Ani naani anotenda ane upenyu husingaperi, ini ndiri chingwa choupenyu. Madzitateguru enyu akadya mana murenje uye akafa. ukazvidya, haungafi, unozvinzwisisa here?

(1)Chingwa cheupenyu muviri waJesu

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi chingwa cheupenyu?
Mhinduro: Muviri waJesu ndicho chingwa cheupenyu, uye ropa raJesu ndihwo hupenyu hwedu! Ameni

Ndini chingwa chipenyu chakaburuka kubva kudenga; kana munhu akadya chingwa ichi, achararama nokusingaperi. Chingwa chandichapa, inyama yangu, ini yandichapa upenyu hwenyika. Naizvozvo vaJudha vakakakavadzana vachiti: Uyu unogona kutipa sei nyama yake tidye? ” Johani 6:51-52

(2) Kudya nyama yaShe nokunwa ropa raShe kunotungamirira kuupenyu husingaperi

Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musingadyi nyama yoMwanakomana woMunhu nokunwa ropa rake, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi pakupedzisira. Iye anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu anogara mandiri, uye ini ndinogara maari

(3) Vanhu vanodya chingwa choupenyu vachararama nokusingaperi

Mubvunzo: Kana munhu akadya chingwa cheupenyu haafi!
Vatendi vanodya chirayiro chaShe mukereke uye vadya chingwa choupenyu chaShe nei miviri yavo yakafa?

Mhinduro: Kana munhu achidya nyama yaShe nokunwa ropa raShe, achava noupenyu hwaKristu → Hupenyu uhu (1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 akazvarwa neshoko rechokwadi reevhangeri, 3) akaberekwa naMwari), uyu “munhu mutsva” hupenyu hwakazvarwa naMwari Usamboona rufu! Ameni. Cherechedza: Tichatsanangura zvakadzama patinogovana "Kuberekwazve" mune ramangwana!

(Somuenzaniso) Jesu akati kuna “Marita”: “Ndini kumuka noupenyu. Ani naani anotenda mandiri, kunyange akafa, achararama; anorarama uye anotenda mandiri haazombofi.” Unotenda izvi here? " ” Johane 11:25-26

Nyama, yakabva “paguruva” ratateguru wedu Adhamu uye “yakaberekwa navabereki vedu, yakatengeswa kuchivi chinoparara uye chinoona rufu. Vanhu vose vanofa kamwe chete.” ( VaHebheru 9:27 )

Avo chete vakamutswa naMwari, vakamutswa pamwe chete naKristu, vanodya nyama yaShe uye vanonwa ropa raShe, ndivo vane upenyu hwaKristu upenyu husingaperi uye haachazooni rufu! Mwari achatimutsawo pazuva rokupedzisira, ndiko kuti, kudzikinurwa kwemiviri yedu. Ameni! “Munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari uye anogara muna Kristu, akavanzwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari, uye anogara mumwoyo yenyu, achaonekwa panyama munguva inouya uye achaonekwa naKristu mukubwinya. Ameni!

Saka, unonzwisisa here? VaKorose 3:4

Ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tendai Mweya Mutsvene nekutungamirira vana venyu vese muchokwadi chese uye nekukwanisa kuona chokwadi chemweya, nekuti mazwi enyu mweya uye hupenyu! Ishe Jesu! Imi muri chingwa chechokwadi choupenyu hwedu. Kana munhu akadya zvokudya izvi, achararama nokusingaperi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa chikafu chechokwadi chehupenyu kuti tive nehupenyu hwaKristu matiri Uyu "munhu mutsva" akazvarwa kubva kuna Mwari ane hupenyu husingaperi uye haambofi akaona rufu! Ameni. Kuguma kwenyika kuchave kudzoka kwaKristu, uye hupenyu hwemunhu mutsva nemuviri zvichaonekwa, zvichionekwa pamwe naKristu mukubwinya. Ameni!

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

kereke munashe jesu kristu
