articles.title: Kuziva Jesu Kristu 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 6

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Johane 17:3 toiverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye kuti vazive Jesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

Mudzidzisi 6: Jesu ndiye nzira, chokwadi, uye hupenyu

Tomasi akati kwaari: Ishe, hatizivi kwamuri kuenda; ko tingaziva seiko nzira? Jesu akati kwaari: Ndini nzira, nechokwadi, noupenyu; Baba kunze kwekwandiri Endai

Mubvunzo: Ishe ndivo nzira! Mugwagwa rudzii uyu?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1. Nzira yemuchinjikwa

“Mukova” Mukova Kana tichida kuwana mugwagwa uyu, tinofanira kutanga taziva “anotizarurira musuo” kuti tigoona nzira iyi inoenda kuupenyu husingaperi.

(1) Jesu ndiye mukova! tizarurireiwo mukova

(Ishe) Ndini mukova, ani naani anopinda napandiri achaponeswa, achapinda nokubuda uye achawana mafuro. Johani 10:9

(2) Ngationei nzira inoenda kuupenyu husingaperi

Ani naani anoda kuwana hupenyu husingaperi anofanira kupinda nenzira yemuchinjikwa waJesu!
(Jesu) akadana vanhu vazhinji pamwe chete navadzidzi vake akati kwavari, “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake agonditevera.

Nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa mweya wake acharasikirwa nawo, asi ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa. Mako 8:34-35

(3) Kuponeswa uye kuwana upenyu husingaperi

Mubvunzo: Ndingaponesa sei hupenyu hwangu?

Mhinduro: “Jehovha anoti” Tanga warasikirwa neupenyu hwako.

Mubvunzo: Ungarasikirwa sei nehupenyu hwako?
Mhinduro: Takura muchinjikwa wako utevere Jesu, “tenda” muvhangeri raShe Jesu, ubhabhatidzwe muna Kristu, urovererwe pamwe chete naKristu, paradza muviri wako wechivi, uye urasikirwe nehupenyu hwako hwe“munhu wekare” kubva kuna Adamu; uye kana Kristu akafa, akavigwa, akamutswa, akazvarwa patsva, uye akaponeswa, uchava noupenyu “hutsva” hwakamutswa kubva kuna Adhamu wokupedzisira [Jesu] Uhu ndihwo upenyu huchaponeswa! Verenga VaRoma 6:6-8

Naizvozvo, Jesu akati: "Nzira yangu" → nzira iyi ndiyo nzira yemuchinjikwa. Kana vanhu vari munyika vasingatendi muna Jesu, havanganzwisise kuti iyi inzira yehupenyu husingaperi, nzira yemweya, uye nzira yekuponesa hupenyu hwavo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

2. Jesu ndiye chokwadi

Mubvunzo: Chokwadi chii?

Mhinduro: "Chokwadi" chinogara nekusingaperi.

(1) Mwari ndiye chokwadi

Johani 1:1 Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari.
Johane 17:17 Vaitei vatsvene nechokwadi chenyu;

“Tao” ndi→ Mwari, “Tao” yako ichokwadi, naizvozvo, Mwari ndiye zvokwadi! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(2) Jesu ndiye chokwadi

Pakutanga, Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari; uye mashoko aanotaura mweya, upenyu, nechokwadi. Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(3) Mweya Mutsvene ichokwadi

Uyu ndiye Jesu Kirisito akauya nemvura neropa; 1 Johani 5:6-7

3. Jesu hupenyu

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi hupenyu?
Mhinduro: Jesu hupenyu!
Muna (Jesu) mune upenyu, uye upenyu uhu chiedza chavanhu. Johani 1:4
Uchapupu uhu ndehwekuti Mwari akatipa hupenyu husingaperi; uye upenyu husingaperi huri muMwanakomana wake (Jesu). Kana munhu ane Mwanakomana waMwari (Jesu), ane upenyu kana asina Mwanakomana waMwari, haana upenyu. Saka, unonzwisisa here? 1 Johani 5:11-12

Mubvunzo: Hupenyu hwedu hwenyama Adamu hune hupenyu husingaperi here?

Mhinduro: Upenyu hwaAdhamu hahuna upenyu husingaperi nokuti Adhamu akatadza uye akatengeswa kuchivi, takatengeswa kuchivi kubva kuna Adhamu. Avo vanobva mumuviri wechivi, nyama ivhu uye ichadzokera kuguruva, naizvozvo haigoni kugara nhaka youpenyu husingaperi, uye inoora haigoni kugara nhaka isingaori. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Ona VaRoma 7:14 naGenesi 3:19

Mubvunzo: Tinowana sei hupenyu husingaperi?

Mhinduro: Tenda muna Jesu, tenda kuevhangeri, nzwisisa nzira yechokwadi, uye ugamuchire Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso! Berwa patsva, gamuchira humwana hwaMwari, pfeka munhu mutsva uye upfeke Kristu, uponeswe, uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Tinozvigovera pano nhasi! Minamato yemunhu akarurama ine simba uye inoshanda, kuti vana vese vapupure kunyasha dzaMwari.

Ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Abba Baba vari Kudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nokugara uchivhenekera maziso emwoyo yedu kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye kunzwisisa Bhaibheri, kuti vana vese vazive kuti Jesu ndiye suwo Ishe Jesu vanotivhurira musuwo. Mwari! Makazarura nzira itsva uye mhenyu yokuti tipfuure nepakati pechidzitiro ichi chidzitiro muviri wake (Jesu), unotibvumira kupinda muNzvimbo Tsvene-tsvene nechivimbo, ndiko kuti tipinde muumambo hwekudenga uye nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 5

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane 17:3, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye kuti vazive Jesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

Murairo wechishanu: Jesu ndiye Kristu, Muponesi naMesiasi

(1) Jesu ndiye Kristu

Mubvunzo: Kristu, Muponesi, Messiasi zvinorevei?

Mhinduro: "Kristu" ndiye muponesi → zvinoreva Jesu,

Zita rokuti “Jesu” rinoreva
Kuti aponese vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Mateu 1:21
Nokuti nhasi mazvarirwa muguta raDhavhidhi Muponesi, iye Kristu Ishe. Ruka 2:11

Naizvozvo, “Jesu” ndiye Kristu, Muponesi, uye Mesiya. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Verenga Johani 1:41

(2) Jesu Muponesi

Mubvunzo: Sei Mwari achitiponesa?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Nokuti vose vakatadza vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari;
2 Nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu; asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu.

VaRoma 6:23

Mubvunzo: “Chivi chedu” chinobvepi?

Mhinduro: Kubva kuna tateguru "Adhamu".

Izvi zvakafanana nekuti chivi chakapinda munyika nemunhu mumwe chete (Adhamu), uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, saka rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vese nekuti vanhu vese vakatadza. VaRoma 5:12

(3) Jesu Kristu akatumwa naMwari anotiponesa

Mubvunzo: Mwari anotiponesa sei?

Mhinduro: Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti azotiponesa

Iwe uchataura uye utaure kufunga kwako;
Ngavarangane pakati pavo.
Ndiani akazviratidza kubva panguva yekare-kare? Ndiani akazvitaura kubva kare?
Handizini Jehovha here?
Hakuna mumwe mwari kunze kwangu;
ndiri Mwari akarurama noMuponesi;
Hakuna mumwe mwari kunze kwangu.
Tarirai kwandiri imwi mativi ose enyika, mugoponeswa;
Nokuti ndini Mwari uye hakuna mumwe.

Isaya 45:21-22

Mubvunzo: Tingaponeswa nani?

Mhinduro: Ponesai kubudikidza naJesu Kristu!

Hakuna ruponeso kune umwe munhu kunze kwa(Jesu); nekuti hakuna rimwe zita pasi pedenga rakapiwa pakati pevanhu ratingaponeswa naro. ” Mabasa 4:12

Mubvunzo: Chii chichaitika kana munhu akasatenda kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu uye Muponesi?

Mhinduro: Vanofanira kufira muzvivi zvavo uye vose vachaparara.

Jesu akati kwavari, “Imi munobva pasi, ini ndinobva kumusoro; imi muri venyika ino, asi ini handisi wenyika ino. Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu. Kana musinganditendi ini, ndinokuudzai kuti muchafira muzvivi zvenyu. NdiKristu wakafira muzvivi.” Johane 8:23-24.
(Ishe Jesu akatizve) Ndinokuudzai kuti kwete! Kana mukasatendeuka (kutenda muvhangeri), mose muchaparara nenzira iyi! ” Ruka 13:5

“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Ndizvo chete zvatinogovana nhasi!

Ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekuvhura maziso emwoyo yedu kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya, uye kuziva Ishe Jesu saKristu, Muponesi, Mesiasi, uye Tidzikinure kubva kuchivi, kubva pakutukwa kwemurairo, kubva pasimba rerima neHadhesi, kubva kuna Satani, uye kubva murufu. Ishe Jesu!
Chero kune hondo, matambudziko, nzara, kudengenyeka kwenyika, kushushwa, kana kutambudzika panyika, kunyangwe ndikafamba mumupata wemumvuri werufu, handingatyi zvakaipa, nekuti imi munesu, uye ndine rugare Kristu! Ndimi Mwari wokuropafadza, dombo rangu, wandinovimba naye; nhovo yangu, norunyanga rwokuponeswa kwangu, shongwe yangu yakakwirira, noutiziro hwangu. Ameni! Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva

kereke munashe jesu kristu

articles.title: Kuziva Jesu Kristu 4
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 4

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane 17:3, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye kuti vazive Jesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

Murairo wechina: Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari Mupenyu

(1) Yakadaro ngirozi! Chaunobereka Mwanakomana waMwari

Mutumwa akati kwaari: Usatya Maria; wanzwirwa nyasha naMwari. Uchava nemimba, ugozvara mwanakomana, uchamutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu; iye uchava mukuru, uchanzi Mwanakomana woMwanakomana woMunhu. Wokumusoro-soro achamuita mukuru;

Maria akati kumutumwa, "Handina kuroora. Izvi zvingaitika seiko?" Mutumwa akapindura akati, "Mweya Mutsvene uchauya pamusoro pako, uye simba roWokumusoro-soro richakudzikatira; naizvozvo Mutsvene achaberekwa achanzi Mwanakomana waMwari." (Kana kududzira: Iye uchazvarwa uchanzi mutsvene, uye uchanzi Mwanakomana waMwari). Ruka 1:30-35

(2) Petro akati! Ndimi Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu

Jesu akati: Ko imwi munoti ndini ani?

Simoni Petro akapindura akati kwaari: Ndimi Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu

(3) Midzimu yose isina kuchena inoti, Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari

Pose apo mweya yetsvina inomuona, inowira pasi pamberi pake yochema ichiti, “Ndimi Mwanakomana waMwari.” ( Marko 3:11 )

Mubvunzo: Sei mweya yetsvina ichiziva Jesu?

Mhinduro: “Mudzimu wetsvina” ingirozi yakawira shure kwadhiabhorosi, Satani, uye mweya wakaipa une vanhu pasi pano :4

(4) Jesu pachake akati aiva Mwanakomana waMwari

Jesu akati, "Ko, hazvina kunyorwa here mumurairo wenyu, kuti: Ini ndakati muri vamwari, Rugwaro harungaputswi; kana vakagamuchira shoko raMwari vanonzi vamwari, vakaitwa vatsvene vakatumwa naBaba? vachiri kuti kwaari, ‘Unomhura’, uyo akauya munyika achizviti Mwanakomana waMwari?

(5) Kumutswa kwaJesu kubva kuvakafa kwakaratidza kuti aiva Mwanakomana waMwari

Mubvunzo: Jesu akaratidza sei kune vaitenda maari kuti aiva Mwanakomana waMwari?

Mhinduro: Jesu akamuka kubva kuvakafa akakwira kudenga kuti aratidze kuti ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari!

Nokuti makarekare, hapasati pambova nomunhu munyika aigona kukunda rufu, rumuko, uye kukwira kudenga! Jesu ega akafira zvivi zvedu, akavigwa, akamukazve nezuva retatu. Jesu Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa uye akaratidza kuti aiva Mwanakomana waMwari ane simba guru! Ameni
Pamusoro poMwanakomana wake, Jesu Kristu, Ishe wedu, akaberekwa nomumbeu yaDhavhidhi panyama, uye akaziviswa kuti ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari nesimba nomudzimu woutsvene nokumuka kubva kuvakafa. VaRoma 1:3-4

(6) Munhu wose anotenda muna Jesu mwanakomana waMwari

Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. VaGaratia 3:26

(7) Avo vanotenda muna Jesu vane upenyu husingaperi

“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi … Anotenda muMwanakomana “Jesu” ano upenyu husingaperi haagamuchiri upenyu husingaperi (zvinyorwa zvekutanga hazvionekwi) upenyu husingaperi), kutsamwa kwaMwari kunogara pamusoro pake” Johane 3:16:36.

Tinozvigovera pano nhasi!

Hama dzangu ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Baba vokudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tendai Mweya Mutsvene nokutitungamirira kuti tizive Jesu Kristu wamakatuma akava nyama uye azere nenyasha uye chokwadi uye anogara pakati pedu. Mwari! Ndinotenda, asi handina kutenda kwakakwana. Ndinokumbira kuti mundipe simba kune avo vasina simba, uye muporese avo vanorwara Mwoyo wangu wakasuwa! Tinotenda kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu uye nehupenyu husingaperi. Nokuti makati: Ani naani anotenda muna Jesu ndiye mwanakomana waMwari, ane upenyu husingaperi, uye imi muchatimutsawo pazuva rokupedzisira, ndiko kudzikinurwa kwemiviri yedu. Ameni! Ndinozvikumbira muzita raIshe Jesu. Ameni Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.

Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.

"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 3

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane 17:3, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye kuti vazive Jesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

Mudzidzisi 3: Jesu akaratidza nzira yehupenyu

Mubvunzo: Kuzvarwa kwaJesu kunomiririra ani?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Ratidza Baba Vokudenga

Dai maindiziva mungadai maizivawo Baba vangu. Kubva zvino munovaziva uye makavaona. "
Aona ini aona Baba… ini ndiri muna Baba, uye Baba vari mandiri.

Johani 14:7-11

(2) Kuratidza Mwari

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. …Shoko rakazova nyama (ndiko kuti, Mwari akava nyama) akagara pakati pedu, azere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. Johane 1:1-2, 14

Hakuna akamboona Mwari, asi Mwanakomana Iye Mumwe Oga, ari pachipfuva chaBaba, ndiye akamuratidza. Johani 1:18

(3) Ratidza chiedza choupenyu hwomunhu

Maari (Jesu) ndimo mune upenyu, uye upenyu uhu ndicho chiedza chavanhu. Johani 1:4

Saka Jesu akatizve kuvanhu, "Ndini chiedza chenyika. Ani naani anonditevera haangatongofambi murima, asi achava nechiedza choupenyu."

[Cherechedza:] “Rima” zvinoreva Hadhesi, hero; kana ukatevera Jesu, chiedza chechokwadi, hauzopindizve murima reHadhesi.
Kana maziso ako akasviba (usingagoni kuona chiedza chechokwadi), muviri wako wose uchava murima. Kana chiedza chiri mukati mako chakasviba (pasina chiedza chaJesu), rima guru sei! ” Ndizvo here?
Genesisi 1:3 Mwari akati, “Chiedza ngachivepo,” chiedza chikavapo. Ichi “chiedza” chinoreva kuti Jesu ndiye chiedza, chiedza choupenyu hwomunhu! Nechiedza cheupenyu ichi, Mwari akasika denga nenyika nezvinhu zvose Akashanda kwamazuva matanhatu uye akazorora pazuva rechinomwe. Tarisa kuna Genesisi Zvitsauko 1-2

Saka, Johane akati! Mwari chiedza, uye maari hamuna rima zvachose. Iri ndiro shoko ratakanzwa kubva kuna Jehovha uye ratidzosa kwamuri. 1 Johani 1:5 Unonzwisisa izvi here?

(4) Ratidza nzira youpenyu

Pamusoro peshoko rapakuvamba roupenyu kubvira pakutanga, izvi ndizvo zvatakanzwa, takaona, takaona nameso edu timene, uye zvatakabata namaoko edu. 1 Johani 1:1
“Pakutanga” zvinoreva kuti “pakutanga kwokusika kwaJehovha,
Pakutanga, zvinhu zvose zvisati zvasikwa.
Ndiripo (zvichireva Jesu).
Kubva pakusingaperi, kubva pakutanga,
Nyika isati yavapo, ndakasimbiswa.
Hakuna kwakadzika, kana tsime remvura zhinji, kwandakaberekwa. Zvirevo 8:22-24

Johane akati! Iri “shoko roupenyu, Jesu,” rakaratidzwa, uye takariona, uye zvino tinopupura kuti tinokupai upenyu husingaperi, hwaiva kuna Baba uye hwakaonekwa kwatiri. 1 Johani 1:2 Unonzwisisa izvi here?

Tinozvigovera pano nhasi!

Ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Abba Baba vari kudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekutitungamirira muzvokwadi yose, kuti tione nokunzwa chokwadi chomweya, uye tinzwisise Jesu Kristu wamakatuma.

1Kuratidza Baba vedu vari kudenga,

2Kuratidza Mwari,

3Kuti ndiratidze chiedza choupenyu hwomunhu,

4 Ratidzai nzira yeupenyu! Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 2

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Chidzidzo Chechipiri: Shoko rakazova nyama

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane 3:17, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete:

Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye kuti vazive Jesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

(1) Jesu iShoko rakava munhu

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. …“Shoko” rakazova nyama uye rakagara pakati pedu, rizere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba.

( Johani 1:1-2, 14 )

(2) Jesu ndiMwari ari munhu

Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari.
Shoko ndi“Mwari” → “Mwari” akava nyama!

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(3) Jesu munhu womudzimu

Mwari mudzimu (kana kuti shoko), naizvozvo vanomunamata vanofanira kumunamata mumweya nomuzvokwadi. Johani 4:24
Mwari “mweya” → “mweya” wakava nyama. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Ndeupi musiyano uripo pakati peIzwi rekuva nyama nenyama yedu?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【zvakafanana】

1 Nokuti sezvo vacheche vachigovana pamuviri mumwe wenyama neropa, naiyewo wakagovana navo pakuitawo saizvozvo. VaHebheru 2:14

2 Jesu akanga asina simba panyama, kungofanana nesu

【zvakasiyana】

1 Jesu akaberekwa naBaba-VaHebheru 1:5 isu takazvarwa naAdhamu naEvha- Genesi 4:1-26
2 Jesu akaberekwa - Zvirevo 8:22-26 takaitwa neguruva - Genesi 2:7;
3 Jesu akava nyama, Mwari akava nyama, uye Mweya wakava nyama;
4 Jesu akanga asina chivi panyama uye aisagona kutadza - vaHebheru 4:15 nyama yedu yakatengeswa kuzvivi - vaRoma 7:14;
5 Nyama yaJesu haioni kuora - Mabasa 2:31 nyama yedu inoona kuora - 1 VaKorinte 15:42;
6 Jesu haana kuona rufu munyama; Genesisi 3:19
7 “Mudzimu” uri muna Jesu Mudzimu Mutsvene; 1 VaKorinte 15:45

Mubvunzo: Chinangwa cheIzwi chekuva munhu chii?

Mhinduro: Sezvo vana vachigovana muviri mumwechete wenyama neropa,

Saizvozvowo iye akapfeka nyama neropa.

kuti kubudikidza norufu aparadze uyo ane simba rorufu.
ndidhiabhorosi uye achasunungura avo
Munhu anenge ari muranda kweupenyu hwake hwose nekuda kwekutya rufu.

VaHebheru 2:14-15

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Nhasi tinogovana pano

Ngatinamatei pamwechete: Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Mwari! Tapota pfuurirai kuvhenekera meso edu omudzimu nokuzarura mwoyo yedu kuti vana venyu vose vagogona kuona nokunzwa zvokwadi dzomudzimu! Nokuti mashoko enyu akaita sechiedza chamambakwedza, chinoramba chichiwedzera kupenya kusvikira masikati makuru, zvokuti tose tinogona kuona Jesu! Zivai kuti Jesu Kristu wamakatuma ndiye Shoko rakava nyama, Mwari akaitwa nyama, uye Mweya akaitwa nyama! Kugara pakati pedu kwakazara nenyasha nechokwadi. Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

articles.title: Kuziva Jesu Kristu 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kuziva Jesu Kristu" 1

Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinodzidza kugoverana kwekugoverana "Kuziva Jesu Kristu"

Murairo 1: Kuzvarwa kwaJesu Kristu

Ngativhurei maBhaibheri edu pana Johane 17:3 toverenga pamwe chete: Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi bedzi, naJesu Kristu wamakatuma. Ameni

1. Maria akava nepamuviri paMweya Mutsvene

Kuberekwa kwaJesu Kristu kwakanyorwa seizvi: Maria, mai vake vakanga vatsidzirana naJosefa, asi vasati varoorana, Maria akava nepamuviri noMweya Mutsvene. Mateu 1:18
Mumwedzi wechitanhatu, ngirozi Gabrieri yakatumwa naMwari kuguta reGarireya (zita rainzi Nazareta) kumhandara yakanga yavimbiswa kuroorwa nomurume weimba yaDhavhidhi, ainzi Johani. Zita remhandara rakanga riri Maria;…mutumwa akati kwaari, “Usatya, Maria, wawana nyasha kuna Mwari, uchava nemimba, ugozvara mwanakomana, uchamutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu ngirozi, “Handisati ndaroora, sei izvi zviri kuitika? Mutumwa akapindura akati, "Mweya Mutsvene achauya pamusoro pako, uye simba roWokumusoro-soro richakudzikatira; naizvozvo icho chitsvene chichaberekwa chichanzi Mwanakomana waMwari." Ruka. 1:26-27, 30-31, 34-35
Mavhesi maviri aya anoti! Mweya Mutsvene wakauya kuna Maria, uye Maria akava nepamuviri neMweya Mutsvene. Ameni!

Mubvunzo: Ndeupi musiyano uripo pakati pe“kuzvarwa” kwaJesu “nekuzvarwa” kwedu?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【Mhandara yakabatwa noMweya Mutsvene】

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi mhandara?

Mhinduro: Isu vanhu tinozvarwa → "vasikana" vanonzi → vasikana vaduku (vacheche) pavanoberekwa kubva mudumbu raamai, vanova → mhandara, vanova → vasikana; pashure pokunge vasikana varoorwa muHuaichun, vanova → vakadzi;

Naizvozvo, "mhandara" izera risati rasvika kumwedzi uye musikana asati abuda uye ave nepamuviri Anonzi "mhandara"! Muviri we "musikana" unotanga kuita ovulation nekuda kwemaitiro emuviri, uye kuenda kumwedzi kunoitika mushure mekuita ovulation Musikana anonzi "musikana" kana aine nhumbu anoroora murume obereka mwana ndiye "mukadzi". Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo, Jesu akave nemimba neMhandara Maria uye akaberekwa neMweya Mutsvene Jesu akabva kudenga. Sezvakangoita mudzimai waAbrahama Sara, uyo akanga akura zvikuru uye akanga arega kuenda kumwedzi Mwari akamupikirawo kuva nemimba ndokubereka mwanakomana, Isaka akanga ari mwana akanga avimbiswa kubereka naMwari, uye Isaka akafananidzira Kristu. Ameni

→→ Zvakadini nesu? Inoberekwa kubva mukubatana kwemukadzi nemurume. Inobva panyika yakasikwa kubva muguruva raAdhamu. Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

2. Mutumidze zita rokuti Jesu

Ngirozi yakati kwaari: “Usatya, Maria, wanzwirwa nyasha naMwari; uchava nemimba, ugozvara mwanakomana, uchamutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu.”— Ruka 1:30-31 .

Zita rokuti Jesu rinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake kubva kuzvivi zvavo. Ameni

Iye achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti Jesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. ” Mateu 1:21

3. Mashoko aMwari anofanira kuzadzikiswa

Zvinhu zvose izvi zvakaitika kuti zvizadzise zvakataurwa naShe kubudikidza nomuprofita achiti: “Mhandara ichava nemimba uye ichabereka mwanakomana, uye vachamutumidza kuti Emanueri (zvinoreva kuti “Mwari anesu.”) Mateu 1:22-23

OK! Kugovera pano nhasi.

Ngatinamatei pamwe chete: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekuvhenekera maziso edu emweya kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya. Nokuti shoko renyu ndiwo mwenje wetsoka dzangu, nechiedza panzira yangu. Mazwi ako, kana avhurwa, anopa chiedza uye anoita kuti vasina nyore kunzwisisa. Ngatinzwisisei Bhaibheri uye tinzwisise kuti Jesu Kristu wamakatuma akaitwa pamuviri neMhandara Maria uye akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene, akanzi Jesu! Zita raJesu ndiro vhangeri, zvinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Ameni

Muzita raJesu! Ameni

Vhangeri rakatsaurirwa kuna mai vangu vanodiwa.
Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuiunganidza.
Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:
kereke munashe jesu kristu
---2021 01 01---

articles.title: Vakaropafadzwa avo vanotambudzwa nokuda kwokururama
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vakaropafadzwa vanotambudzwa nokuda kwokururama, nokuti umambo hwokudenga ndohwavo.
—-- Mateu 5:10

Encyclopedia tsanangudzo

Kumanikidza: bi po
Tsanangudzo: kukurudzira zvakasimba;
Mazwi akafanana: kudzvanyirirwa, kudzvanyirirwa, kudzvanyirirwa, kudzvanyirirwa.
Antonyms: kudzikama, kuteterera.

dudziro yeBhaibheri

Kuna Jesu, kwevhangeri, kweShoko raMwari, nokuda kwechokwadi, uye noupenyu hunogona kuponesa vanhu!
Kutukwa, kunyombwa, kudzvinyirirwa, kudzvinyirirwa, kutambudzwa, kutambudzwa, nekuuraiwa.

Vakaropafadzwa avo vanotambudzwa nokuda kwokururama! Nokuti umambo hwokudenga ndohwavo. Makaropafadzwa imi kana vanhu vachikutukai, vachikutambudzai uye vachikupomerai zvakaipa zvose nokuda kwangu. Farai mufarisise nokuti mubayiro wenyu mukuru kudenga. Nenzira imwe cheteyo vanhu vakatambudza vaprofita vakakutangirai. "
( Mateu 5:10-11 )

(1)Jesu akatambudzwa

Jesu paakanga okwira kuJerusarema, akatora vadzidzi vake gumi navaviri parutivi akati kwavari, “Tarirai, tichakwira kuJerusarema, Mwanakomana woMunhu achaiswa mumaoko avaprista vakuru navadzidzisi vomurayiro kurufu nokumuisa kuvaHedheni, ivo vachasekwa, nokurohwa, nokurovererwa pamuchinjikwa.” ( Mateo 20:17-19;

(2) Vaapostora vakatambudzwa

peter
Ndakafunga kuti ndinofanira kukuyeuchidzai uye ndikumutsei ndichiri mutende rino, ndichiziva kuti nguva yasvika yokuti ndibve mutende iri, sezvandakaratidzwa naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Uye ndichaita zvose zvandinogona kuti zvinhu izvi zvirambe zviri chirangaridzo chenyu shure kwokufa kwangu. ( 2 Petro 1:13-15 )

Johani
Ini Johwani ndiri hama yenyu uye mufambidzani pamwe nemwi pakutambudzika, nemuushe, nekutsungirira kwaJesu, uye ndaiva pachiwi chinonzi Patimosi nekuda kweshoko raMwari nekweuchapupu hwaJesu. ( Zvakazarurwa 1:9 )

Paul
nokushushwa nenhamo kwandakasangana nako paAndiyokiya, paIkoniyamu, napaRistra. Kushushwa kwakadini kwandakatsungirira; ( 2 Timotio 3:11 )

(3) Vaprofita vakatambudzwa

Jerusarema! Jerusarema! Iwe unouraya vaprofita nokutaka namabwe avo vanotumwa kwauri. Ndakanga ndichida kazhinji sei kuunganidza vana vako, semhambo inounganidza hukwana dzayo pasi pamapapiro ayo, asi imi hamuna kuda. ( Ruka 13:34 )

(4) Kumutswa kwaKristu kunoita kuti tive vakarurama

Jesu akasunungurwa nokuda kwekudarika kwedu uye akamutsirwa kururamiswa kwedu (kana kududzirwa: Jesu akaiswa nokuda kwokudarika kwedu uye akamutsirwa kururamiswa kwedu). ( VaRoma 4:25 )

(5) Tinoruramiswa pachena nenyasha dzaMwari

Zvino, nenyasha dzaMwari, tinoruramiswa pachena norudzikinuro rwaKristu Jesu. Mwari akagadza Jesu sorudzikinuro kubudikidza neropa raJesu uye nokutenda kwomunhu kuti aratidze kururama kwaMwari; nokuti akashivirira zvivi zvakaitwa kare kare kuti aratidze kururama kwake vanozivikanwa kuti vakarurama, uye kuti varuramise avo vanotenda muna Jesu. ( VaRoma 3:24-26 )

(6) Kana tikatambura pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwa pamwe chete naye

Mweya Mutsvene unopupurirana nomweya wedu, kuti tiri vana vaMwari; Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. ( VaRoma 8:16-17 )

(7) Takura muchinjikwa wako utevere Jesu

Ipapo (Jesu) akadanira vanhu vazhinji navadzidzi vake kwavari akati kwavari: Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere, nokuti ani nani unoda kuponesa upenyu hwake; mweya; zvakafanana pazasi)) acharasikirwa noupenyu hwake;

(8)Paridza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga

Jesu akauya kwavari akati kwavari, “Simba rose rakapiwa kwandiri kudenga napanyika. Naizvozvo endai mudzidzise marudzi ose, muchivabhabhatidza muzita raBaba neroMwanakomana neroMweya Mutsvene. “Muvabhabhatidze muzita raBaba neroMwanakomana neroMweya Mutsvene) uye muvadzidzise kuchengeta zvinhu zvose zvandakakurayirai, uye ini ndinemi nguva dzose, kusvikira kumugumo wenyika. 18-20) Mutambo)

(9) Pfekai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari

Ndine mashoko ekupedzisira: Simbai muna Ishe nemusimba rake. Shongai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira muchirwa namano adhiabhorosi. Nokuti hatirwi nenyama neropa, asi navabati, navanesimba, namadzishe enyika erima rino, nemweya yakaipa yedenga. Naizvozvo torai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira pamberi pomuvengi pazuva rokutambudzika, uye maita zvose, kuti mumire. Saka mirai makasimba.

1 Zvisunge chiuno nechokwadi;
2 Pfekai chidzitiro chechipfuva chokururama.
3 Uye pfekai tsoka dzenyu kugadzirira kufamba nevhangeri rerugare.
4 pamusoro pazvo muchitora nhovo yerutendo, yamungagona kudzima nayo miseve inopfuta yewakaipa;
5 fuka ngowani yoruponeso;
6 Torai munondo weMweya, iro Shoko raMwari;
7 Vimba naMweya Mutsvene uye unyengetere nemhando dzose dzemikumbiro nguva dzose;
8 Rindai pazvinhu izvi uye murege kuneta, muchinyengeterera vatsvene vose.
( VaEfeso 6:10-18 )

(10) Pfuma inoratidzirwa mumudziyo wevhu

Tine pfuma iyi (Mweya wechokwadi) mumudziyo wevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kwatiri. Tinokomberedzwa navavengi kumativi ose, asi hatina kubatwa nemisungo, asi hatinyadziswi, asi hatina kurashwa; ( 2 VaKorinte 4:7-9 )

(11) Rufu rwaJesu runoitwa matiri kuitira kuti upenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri

Nokuti isu vapenyu tinogara tichiiswa kurufu nokuda kwaJesu, kuti upenyu hwaJesu huratidzwe mumiviri yedu inofa. Kubva mukuona uku, rufu runoshanda matiri, asi hupenyu hunoshanda mauri. ( 2 VaKorinte 4:11-12 )

(12) Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uri kuparadzwa, mwoyo womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva.

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. muviri wekunze ( murume mukuru )Kunyange wakaparadzwa, mwoyo wangu ( Munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari mumoyo ) iri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Matambudziko edu echinguvana uye akareruka achatiitira kubwinya kusingagumi kusingaenzaniswi. Zviri pachena kuti hatina hanya nezvinhu zvinoonekwa, asi zvisingaonekwi; ( 2 VaKorinte 4:17-18 )

Hymn: Jesu Ane Kukunda

Manyoro eEvhangeri

Kubva: Mabhuratha nemasisita eChechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu!

2022.07.08

articles.title: Vakaropafadzwa vanoyananisa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vakaropafadzwa vanoyananisa, nekuti ivo vachanzi vana vaMwari.

—-- Mateu 5:9

Encyclopedia tsanangudzo

Harmony: Pinyin [iye mu]
Tsanangudzo: (Maumbirwo) Tarirai zvakanaka pasina kupopotedzana.
Mazwi akafanana: ushamwari, kugarisana zvakanaka, rugare, ushamwari, ushamwari, kuwirirana, kugarisana, zvichingodaro.
Antonyms: kurwisana, kupopotedzana, kupesana, kusawirirana.
Kwakabva: Xuanding, Qing Dynasty, "Records of Autumn Lamps on rainy Nights. Nanguo Scholars" "Iva filial kuvabereki vako uye uwirirane nevakuwasha vako."

bvunza: Vanhu vari munyika vanogona kuita rugare nevamwe here?
mhinduro: Sei vaHedheni vachipopotedzana?

Sei vaHedheni vachipopotedzana? Vanhu vose vanofungirei zvisina maturo? ( Pisarema 2:1 )

Cherechedza: Vose vakatadza → chivi, nomurayiro, nokuchiva kwenyama → uye mabasa enyama ari pachena: upombwe, netsvina, noutere, nokunamata zvidhori, nouroyi, noruvengo, negakava, negodo, nokutsamwa, namapati, namakakava; dzidziso dzakatsauka, godo (mimwe mipumburu yekare inowedzera shoko rokuti "kuuraya"), kudhakwa, kutamba, nezvimwewo. ...(VaGaratiya 5:19-21)
Naizvozvo, vanhu vari munyika havagoni kuita rugare pakati pavanhu. Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

1. Muiti worugare

bvunza: Tingaita sei kuti pave norugare?
mhinduro: Munhu mutsva akasikwa kubudikidza naKristu.
Ipapo pane kuwirirana!

dudziro yeBhaibheri

Nokuti ndiye rugare rwedu, akaita kuti vaviri vave chinhu chimwe, akakoromora rusvingo rwakaparadzana, akaparadza pamuviri wake izvo zvakatemwa, zvakanyorwa pamurairo, kuti asike munhu mutsva maviri, nokudaro kuwana kuwirirana. ( VaEfeso 2:14-15 )

bvunza: Kristu anosika sei munhu mutsva kuburikidza naYe?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Tisunungurei muchivi

Cherechedza: Kristu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu, akatisunungura kubva kuchivi. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 6:6-7

(2) Tisunungurei pamurairo nepachituko chemurairo

Cherechedza: Pamuchinjikwa, Kristu akabatanidza (denga, pasi, Mwari nomunhu) kuva chinhu chimwe, uye akaputsa rusvingo rwakaparadzana pakati (ndiko kuti, mutemo, vaJudha vane mitemo, asi vaHedheni havana mitemo). muviri wake kuti uparadze ruvengo, mirau yakanyorwa mumurayiro. Ona VaRoma 7:6 naVaGaratiya 3:13 .

(3) Ngatibvise mudhara nemaitiro ake

Cherechedza: Uye yakavigwa, kuti tibvise hunhu hwemurume wekare Ona VaKorose 3: 9.

(4) Kumuka kwaKristu kwakagadzira munhu mutsva kuburikidza Naye

Cherechedza: Ngaarumbidzwe Mwari uye Baba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Maererano nengoni dzake huru, akatiitazve tariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa ( 1 Petro 1:3 )

bvunza: Ndiani akaberekwa nomunhu mutsva akasikwa norumuko rwaKristu?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya- Johane 3:5-7
2 Akaberekwa nechokwadi cheevhangeri— 1 VaKorinte 4:15 naJakobho 1:18
3 Akaberekwa naMwari— Johani 1:12-13

2. Nokuti vachanzi vanakomana vaMwari

bvunza: Munhu anganzi Mwanakomana waMwari sei?
mhinduro: Tenda muvhangeri, tenda munzira yechokwadi, uye tenda muna Jesu!

(1) Kuiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wakapikirwa

Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. ( VaEfeso 1:13 )
Cherekedza: Tenda kuevhangeri uye naKristu Sezvo uchitenda maari, wakaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa Mwari →→ achanzi mwanakomana waMwari ! Ameni.

(2) Munhu wose anotungamirirwa nomudzimu waMwari mwanakomana waMwari

Nekuti vose vanotungamirirwa neMweya waMwari, ndivo vana vaMwari. Hamuna kugamuchira mweya wouranda kuti mugare mukutya, makagamuchira mweya wokuitwa vana, watinodana nawo tichiti, “Abha, Baba!” ( Bhuku 8:14-16 )

(3) Paridza vhangeri, ita kuti vanhu vatende muna Jesu Kristu, uye woita rugare pakati pevanhu muna Kristu

【 Jesu anoparidza vhangeri roumambo 】

Jesu akafamba nomumaguta ose nemisha yose, achidzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, achiparidza evhangeri youmambo nokuporesa matenda ose nehosha dzose. ( Mateu 9:35 )

【 Akatumwa kunoparidza vhangeri nezita raJesu 】

Zvino wakati achiona zvaunga, akavanzwira tsitsi, nekuti vakange vane shungu, semakwai asina mufudzi. Saka akati kuvadzidzi vake: “Kukohwa kukuru, asi vashandi vashoma. Naizvozvo kumbirai Ishe wokukohwa kuti atumire vashandi mukukohwa kwake.”

Cherechedza: Jesu anoita rugare, uye zita raJesu ndiMambo weRugare! Avo vanoparidza Jesu, vanotenda evhangeri, uye vanoparidza evhangeri inotungamirira kuruponeso, vanoita rugare → Vakaropafadzwa vanoyananisa, nokuti vachanzi vanakomana vaMwari. Ameni!

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. ( VaGaratiya 3:26 )

Hymn: Ndinotenda muna Ishe Jesu Rwiyo

Chinyorwa cheEvhangeri!

Kubva: Mabhuratha nemasisita eChechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu!

2022.07.07

articles.title: Vakaropafadzwa vakachena pamoyo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vakaropafadzwa vakachena pamoyo, nekuti ivo vachaona Mwari.
—-- Mateu 5:8

Tsanangudzo yeduramazwi rechiChinese

moyo wakachena qīngxīn
( 1 ) Rugare, pasina kunetseka, pfungwa dzakachena uye zvishuwo zvishoma
( 2 ) Bvisa pfungwa dzinovhiringidza, ita kuti manzwiro ako adzikame uye ave nerunyararo, iva nemwoyo wakachena, uye mwedzi wakachena uye wakachena.
( 3 ) zvinorevawo kuva nemoyo wakachena uye kuva munhu akachena nguva dzose.

1. Migumisiro youpenyu inobva mumwoyo

Unofanira kurinda mwoyo wako kupfuura chinhu chipi nechipi (kana kududzira: unofanira kurinda mwoyo wako kwazvo), nokuti zvibereko zvoupenyu hwako zvinobva mumwoyo mako. ( Zvirevo 4:23 )

1 mumongi : Iva wakachena pamwoyo uye uve nezvishuwo zvishoma, idya nekukurumidza uye dzokorora zita raBuddha, tevedzera Sakyamuni uye rima muviri - iva Buddha nekukurumidza, uye "famba" kuti uone Living Buddha anonamata.
2 Vaprista vechiTao: Kwira mugomo kunodzidzira chiTao uye uve munhu asingafi.
3 nun: Achiona munyika inofa, akagera bvudzi rake, akava sisita, akaroora uye akadzokera kuBuddhism.
4 Vakanyengerwa ne (nyoka), uye vakafunga kuti nzira yakarurama .
→→Kune nzira inoita seyakanaka kumunhu, asi pakupedzisira inova nzira yerufu. ( Zvirevo 14:12 )
→→Chenjerai, kuti mwoyo yenyu irege kunyengerwa, motsauka panzira yakarurama, muchishumira nokunamata vamwe vamwari. ( Dheuteronomio 11:16 )

2. Mwoyo womunhu unonyengera uye wakaipa zvikuru.

1 Mwoyo yevanhu yakaipa kwazvo

Mwoyo womunhu unonyengera kupfuura zvinhu zvose uye wakaipa kwazvo ndiani angauziva? ( Jeremiya 17:9 )

2 Mwoyo unonyengera

Nokuti mukati, imo mumwoyo womunhu, ndimo munobuda mirangariro yakaipa, upombwe, umbavha, umhondi, ufeve, ruchiva, uipi, kunyengera, utere, godo, kunyomba, manyawi, manyawi. Huipi hwese uhu hunobva mukati uye hunogona kusvibisa vanhu. ” ( Mako 7:21-23 )

3 Hana yakarasika

Naizvozvo ndinotaura uye ndinotaura muna She kuti: Musaramba muchifamba noupenzi hwevaHedheni. pfungwa dzavo dzakasvibiswa uye dzakaparadzaniswa noupenyu hwavakapiwa naMwari, nokuda kwokusaziva kwavo uye nokuoma kwemwoyo yavo, uye varasikirwa nehana dzavo, vanoita ruchiva uye vanoita marudzi ose etsvina. ( VaEfeso 4:17-19 )

bvunza: Chii chinonzi munhu akachena mumwoyo?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

dudziro yeBhaibheri

Mapisarema 73:1 Mwari ane mutsa kune vakachena mumwoyo muna Israeri!
2 Timoti 2:22 Tiza kuchiva kwouduku utevere kururama, kutenda, rudo norugare pamwe chete naavo vanonyengetera kuna She nomwoyo wakachena.

3. Hana yakachena

bvunza: Nzira yekuchenesa hana yako sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kuchenesa kutanga

Asi uchenjeri hunobva kumusoro pakutanga hwakachena, tevere hune rugare, hunyoro, hunyoro, huzere netsitsi, hunobereka zvibereko zvakanaka, hwusina kutsaura kana kunyengera. ( Jakobho 3:17 )

(2)Ropa raKristu risina gwapa rinochenesa mwoyo yenyu

zvikuru sei ropa raKristu, iye kubudikidza noMweya usingaperi akazvipa asina gwapa kuna Mwari, richanatsa mwoyo yenyu pamabasa akafa kuti mushumire Mwari mupenyu. ( VaHebheru 9:14 )

(3) Kana hana yako yacheneswa, hauchanzwi uine mhosva.

Kana zvisina kudaro, zvibayiro zvingadai zvisina kumira kare kare here? Nokuti hana dzevanamati dzakacheneswa uye havachanzwi vaine mhosva. ( VaHebheru 10:2 )

(4) Kugumisa zvivi, kubvisa zvivi, kuregerera zvivi, uye kuunza kururama kusingaperi →→Iwe "wakaruramiswa nekusingaperi" uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi! Unonzwisisa here?

“Vhiki dzine makumi manomwe dzakatemerwa vanhu vako neguta rako dzvene, kupedzisa kudarika, nokugumisa zvivi, nokuyananisira zvakaipa, nokuuyisa kururama kusingaperi, nokunamatidza chiratidzo nechiporofita, nokuzodza Iye Mutsvene; Danieri 9:24).

4. Tora pfungwa dzaKristu semwoyo wako

bvunza: Kuva nepfungwa dzaKristu sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Akagamuchira chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene akavimbiswa

Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. ( VaEfeso 1:13 )

(2) Mweya waMwari unogara mumwoyo yenyu, uye imi hamusi venyama

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Kana Kristu ari mamuri, muviri wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya mupenyu nokuda kwokururama. ( VaRoma 8:9-10 )

(3) Mweya Mutsvene nemoyo yedu zvinopupura kuti tiri vana vaMwari

Nekuti vose vanotungamirirwa neMweya waMwari, ndivo vana vaMwari. Hamuna kugamuchira mweya weuranda kuti mugare mukutya; ndima 14-16)

(4)Iva nepfungwa dzaKristu semwoyo wako
Kufunga kwenyu ngakuve mamuri, kwaivawo muna Kristu Jesu: Iye, ane chimiro chaMwari, haana kufunga kuti kuenzana naMwari chinhu chingabatisiswa, asi akazviita chinhu pasina, akatora chimiro chomuranda, akaberekwa ari munhu. akafanana naye, akati awanikwa ane chimiro chomunhu, akazvininipisa uye akateerera kusvikira parufu, kunyange rufu pamuchinjikwa. ( VaFiripi 2:5-8 )

(5) Tora muchinjikwa wako utevere Jesu

Zvino akadanira kwavari chaunga nevadzidzi vake, akati kwavari: Kana ani nani achida kuuya shure kwangu, ngaazvirambe, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere, nekuti ani nani unoda kuponesa mweya wake; zvakafanana pazasi) Iwe ucharasikirwa neupenyu hwako;

(6) Paridza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga

Jesu akafamba nomumaguta ose nemisha yose, achidzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, achiparidza evhangeri youmambo nokuporesa matenda ose nehosha dzose. Zvino wakati achiona zvaunga, akavanzwira tsitsi, nekuti vakange vane shungu, semakwai asina mufudzi. Saka akati kuvadzidzi vake: “Kukohwa kukuru, asi vashandi vashoma. Naizvozvo kumbirai Ishe wokukohwa kuti atumire vashandi mukukohwa kwake.”

(7) Tinotambudzika pamwe chete naye, uye tichakudzwa pamwe chete naye

Kana vari vana, saka vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. ( VaRoma 8:17 )

5. Vachaona Mwari

(1) Simoni Petro akati: “Ndimi Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu”!

Jesu akati kwaari: Iwe unoti ndini ani, Simoni Petro, akamupindura, akati: Ndiwe Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu haisi Nyama yakazvizivisa kwauri, asi Baba vangu vari kudenga vakazvizivisa (Mateo 16:15-17).

Cherechedza: VaJudha, kusanganisira “Judhasi,” vakaona Jesu seMwanakomana wemunhu, asi havana kuona Jesu seMwanakomana waMwari akatevera Jesu kwemakore matatu asina kuona Mwari.

(2) John akazviona nemaziso ake uye akaibata nevatsva

Pamusoro peshoko rapakuvamba roupenyu kubvira pakutanga, izvi ndizvo zvatakanzwa, takaona, takaona nameso edu timene, uye zvatakabata namaoko edu. (Upenyu uhwu hwakaratidzwa, uye takahuona, uye zvino tinopupura kuti tinopa kwamuri upenyu husingaperi, hwaiva kuna Baba, uye hwakaratidzwa kwatiri.) ( 1 Johane 1:1-2 )

(3) Akaonekwa kuhama mazana mashanu panguva imwe chete

Iniwo ndakakumikidza kwamuri, pakutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, uye kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, uye akaratidzwa kuna Kefasi, uye zvakaitika zvakaratidzwa vaapostora vanegumi navaviri; Zvino zvakaratidzwa kuna Jakobho, uyezve kuvaapositori vose, uye pakupedzisira kwandiri, semunhu akanga asati aberekwa. ( 1 VaKorinte 15:3-8 )

(4) Kuona zvisikwa zvaMwari kuburikidza nebasa rekusika

Zvinozivikanwa pamusoro paMwari zvinoratidzwa mumwoyo yavo, nokuti Mwari akazvizivisa kwavari. Kubva pakusikwa kwenyika, simba raMwari risingagumi noumwari zvave zvichinyatsozivikanwa, kunyange zvazvo zvisingaoneki, zvinogona kunzwisiswa kuburikidza nezvinhu zvakasikwa, zvichisiya munhu asina pembedzo. ( VaRoma 1:19-20 )

(5) Kuona Mwari kupfurikidza nezviono nezviroto

‘Namazuva okupedzisira, ndizvo zvinotaura Mwari, ndichadurura Mweya wangu pamusoro pavanhu vose. vanakomana venyu navanasikana venyu vachaporofita; majaya enyu achaona zviratidzo; ( Mabasa 2:17 )

(6) Kristu paanoonekwa, tinooneka pamwe chete naye mukubwinya

Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. ( VaKorose 3:4 )

(7) Tichaona chimiro chake chechokwadi

Hama dzinodikanwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichazova zvichigere kuratidzwa; ( 1 Johani 3:2 )

Naizvozvo Ishe Jesu akati: “Vakaropafadzwa vakachena mumwoyo, nokuti vachaona Mwari

Hymn: The Lord is the way the truth

Chinyorwa cheEvhangeri!

articles.title: Vakaropafadzwa vane tsitsi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vakaropafadzwa vane tsitsi nekuti vachagamuchira tsitsi.
—-- Mateu 5:7

Encyclopedia tsanangudzo

Tsitsi: [lian xu], zvinoreva rudo netsitsi.
Anoreva zvakafanana: tsitsi, tsitsi, tsitsi, rupo, tsitsi.
Antonym: utsinye.

dudziro yeBhaibheri

tsitsi : Zvinoreva mutsa, tsitsi, kufunga uye kutarisira.

Ndinoda kunaka (kana shanduro: tsitsi ), havafariri zvibayiro; Hosea 6:6

bvunza: Ndiani akanaka?
mhinduro: Jesu akati kwaari: Unondiidzirei wakanaka? Hakuna akanaka kunze kwaMwari oga . Mako 10:18

Jehovha ariko Kugona Iye akarurama, naizvozvo achadzidzisa vatadzi nzira dzakarurama. Pisarema 25:8

bvunza: Mutsa netsitsi zvenyika zvinokosha here?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Munhu wenyama atengeswa kuchivi
Sokureva kunoita Rugwaro → Tinoziva kuti mutemo ndewomudzimu, asi ini ndiri wenyama uye ndakatengeswa kuchivi. VaRoma 7:14

(2) Vanhu venyama vanoda “ mhosva "mutemo
Asi ndinoona kuti pano mumwe murayiro pamitezo unorwa nomurayiro mumwoyo mangu, uchinditapa uye uchindiita kuti nditevere murayiro wechivi mumitezo yangu. VaRoma 7:23

(3) Vanhu venyama vane hanya nezvinhu zvenyama
Nokuti vaya vanorarama namararamiro enyama vanoisa pfungwa dzavo pazvinhu zvenyama;

(4)Avo vane pfungwa dzenyama vakafa
Kufunganya kwenyama rufu;...Nokuti kufunga kwenyama ruvengo kuna Mwari; nokuti hakuzviisi pasi pomurairo waMwari; Uye vari munyama havagoni kufadza Mwari. VaRoma 8:5-8

Cherechedza: Kunze kwaMwari, hakuna munhu akanaka. Tsitsi dzevanhu vepanyika ndedzekuchengeta nyama nekunzwira tsitsi zvinhu zvenyama, kurangarira nyama inofa neinoora. Naizvozvo, mumeso aMwari, mufambiro wavo haurangarirwi wakanaka kana kuti une tsitsi. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Vanhu vari munyika vane tsitsi, ngoni, uye mutsa here?
mhinduro: Aihwa.

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Nokuti vose vakatadza uye vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari. Mutadzi munhu anotyora sungano otadza, onzi munhu akaipa.
“Tsitsi netsitsi” dzevakaipa dzinewo utsinye.

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu, vatadzi (vanhu vatadzi) havana kutenda muna Mwari, Jesu, kana muvhangeri! Hapana kuberekwa patsva uye hakuna chisungo cheMweya Mutsvene. ” Kugona “chibereko.” Pameso aMwari, vakaipa, “tsitsi netsitsi” dzake vose vanonyepedzera, vanyengeri, vanhu vakaipa havana kururama.

"Munhu akaipa" ngoni "Zvinogona kukuitira zvakanaka, kukubatsira, kana kukunyengera, zvichikutungamirira kuti ubve kuna Mwari noruponeso rwaKristu, ndizvo zvakaitawo wakaipa." ngoni “Ihutsinyewo.Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

Akarurama anochengeta zvipfuwo zvake; Asi akaipa anoraramisa ngoni Zvakare hutsinye . Tarisa kuna Zvirevo 12:10

1. Jehovha ane tsitsi, rudo, tsitsi nenyasha

Jehovha akati pamberi pake: “Jehovha, Jehovha, ndiye ngoni Mwari ane nyasha, anononoka kutsamwa, azere norudo nechokwadi. Eksodho 34:6

(1) Iva netsitsi kune vanotya Mwari
Sokunzwira tsitsi kwababa vana vavo, saizvozvo Jehovha tsitsi Avo vanomutya! Pisarema 103:13

(2) Kunzwira varombo tsitsi
Madzimambo ose achamunamata uye marudzi ose achamushumira. Nokuti achanunura varombo pavanochema, uye achanunura vanoshayiwa vasina mubatsiri. anoda tsitsi chengetedzai upenyu hwevarombo. Pisarema 72:11-13

(3) Iva netsitsi kune avo vanotendeukira kuna Mwari
Ipapo vaitya Jehovha vakataurirana, Jehovha akateerera, bhuku yokurangaridza ikava pamberi pake, nokuda kwavanotya Jehovha, vakarangarira zita rake.
“Vachava vangu nezuva randakatara,” ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha Wamasimba Ose, “vachava vangu chaivo, uye ndichavanzwira nyasha somunhu. tsitsi Shumira mwanakomana wako. Maraki 3:16-17

2. Jesu anoda ngoni uye anonzwira tsitsi munhu wose

(1)Jesu anoda ngoni
'Ndinoda tsitsi , haafariri zvibayiro. ’ Kana mukanzwisisa zvinoreva izwi iri, hamungatore vasina mhosva sevane mhosva. Mateu 12:7

(2)Jesu akanzwira ngoni munhu wose
Jesu akafamba nomumaguta ose nemisha, achidzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, achiparidza evhangeri youmambo nokuporesa matenda ose nehosha dzose. Paakaona vanhu vazhinji, iye ngoni nokuti vanotambudzika uye vasina pokugara, samakwai asina mufudzi. Mateu 9:35-36

Panguva iyoyo vanhu vazhinji vakaunganazve uye pakanga pasina chokudya. Jesu akadana vadzidzi vake akati: Ini ngoni Vanhu ava vose, nekuti vakagara neni mazuva matatu vasina chinhu chokudya; Mako 8:1-2

bvunza: Jesu ane tsitsi kune wese Chinangwa Chii ichochi?
mhinduro: Ngavazive kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari uye vatendeukire kuna Mwari .

Somuenzaniso, Jesu akafamba nomumaguta ose nemisha achiparidza evhangeri youmambo hwokudenga, achirapa vairwara uye achidzinga madhimoni, achiita zviratidzo nezvishamiso, uye achidyisa vanhu vanopfuura zviuru zvishanu nezvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri, kuti miviri yavo ipere. aigona kuporeswa uye kugutsikana.

( Chinangwa ) kuita kuti vazive kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari, Kristu, uye Muponesi, uye kuti kutenda muna Jesu kuchavagonesa kuwana upenyu husingaperi. Zvikasadaro, hapazove nemubairo kumiviri yavo yenyama kuporeswa nekugutsikana kana vasingatendi kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu.

Ndiko kusaka Ishe Jesu vakati: “Musashandira zvokudya zvinopera, asi shandirai zvokudya zvinogara kuupenyu husingaperi zvamuchapiwa noMwanakomana woMunhu, nokuti Mwari Baba vakamuisa chisimbiso

( Cherechedza: Vanhu vari munyika vanogona kuva netsitsi netsitsi apo neapo, asi havana kururama kwaMwari kana Mweya Mutsvene mukati mavo, uye havagoni kuparidza evhangeri yaMwari mupenyu. Tsitsi dzavo netsitsi dzinongotarisira nyama yemunhu inoora, uye havanei nehupenyu “husingagumi” hwemunhu. Naizvozvo, tsitsi dzavo netsitsi hadzibatsiri uye hadzizovi chikomborero. ) Saka, unonzwisisa here?

3. VaKristu vanofamba naMwari nomwoyo une tsitsi

(1) Mwari anonzwira tsitsi munhu wese

Makange musingateereri Mwari, asi zvino nokuda kwokusateerera kwavo (Israeri) makanyengerwa. tsitsi . Saka, (Israel)
Naivowo havana kuteerera, naizvozvo nokuda kwezvavakakupai tsitsi , zvino (Israel) yakafukidzwawo tsitsi . Nekuti Mwari akavharira vanhu vese mukusateerera nechinangwa che tsitsi Munhu wese. VaRoma 11:30-32

(2) Takanzwirwa ngoni ndokuva vanhu vaMwari

Asi imi muri rudzi rwakasanangurwa, uprista hwoumambo, rudzi rutsvene, vanhu vaMwari chaivo, kuti muparidze kunaka kwaiye akakudanai kuti mubve murima muuye kuchiedza chake chinoshamisa. Makanga musiri rudzi, asi zvino mava rudzi rwaMwari; tsitsi , asi zvino yapofumadzwa tsitsi . 1 Petro 2:9-10

(3) Iva nengoni uye famba naMwari nomwoyo une tsitsi

Jehovha akakuratidza, iwe munhu, zvakanaka; Anodei kwauri? Chero bedzi uchiita zvakarurama. Saka tsitsi , famba naMwari wako nokuzvininipisa. Mika 6:8

Naizvozvo ngatiuye takashinga kuchigaro chenyasha kuti tiwane tsitsi , gamuchirai nyasha uye muve rubatsiro runobatsira chero nguva . VaHebheru 4:16

Hymn: Anoshamisa Nyasha

Chinyorwa cheEvhangeri!

Kubva: Mabhuratha nemasisita eChechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu!

2022.07.05

articles.title: Vakaropafadzwa avo vane nzara nenyota yokururama
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vakaropafadzwa avo vane nzara nenyota yokururama, nokuti ivo vachagutiswa.
—-- Mateu 5:6

Encyclopedia tsanangudzo

nyota[jt ke]
1 Nzara nenyota
2 Idimikira retarisiro ine shungu nenzara.
Muyi [mu yl] kuyemura mutsa nokururama.

dudziro yeBhaibheri

1. Kururama kwevanhu

bvunza: Munyika mune kururama here?
mhinduro: Aihwa.

Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Hakuna akarurama, hakuna anonzwisisa, hakuna anotsvaka Mwari; kunyange vaRoma 3:10 -12 mapfundo

bvunza: Sei kusina vanhu vakarurama?
mhinduro: Nokuti vose vakatadza vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari;

2. Kururama kwaMwari

bvunza: Kururama chii?
mhinduro: Mwari kururama, Jesu Kristu, akarurama!

Vana vangu vaduku, zvinhu izvi ndinokunyorerai kuti murege kutadza. Kana munhu achitadza, tine Murevereri kuna Baba, Jesu Kristu wakarurama.
1 Johani 2:1

3. Akarurama ( tsiva ) vasina kururama, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari muna Kristu

Nokuti Kristuwo akatambura kamwe chete nokuda kwechivi (ndipo manyoro ekare: rufu), ndiko kuti Kururama pachinzvimbo chekusarurama kutitungamirira kuna Mwari. Pakutaura panyama, akaurayiwa, pakutaura pamweya, akamutswa. 1 Petro 3:18

Mwari anoita uyo asingazivi chivi, nokuti Takava chivi kuti tive kururama kwaMwari maari. 2 VaKorinte 5:21

4. Avo vane nzara nenyota yokururama

bvunza: Vaya vane nzara nenyota yokururama vangagutswa sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Idya mvura mhenyu yakapiwa naJehovha

Mukadzi akati, "Ishe, hatina nhumbi dzokuchera mvura, uye tsime rakadzika. Mvura mhenyu mungaiwanepiko? Tateguru wedu Jakobho akatisiira tsime iri, vakamwa patsime iri, iye navanakomana vake, nemombe dzake. mvura." , uri nani kumupfuura here? Yakakurisa here?” Jesu akapindura akati, “Ani naani anonwa mvura iyi achavazve nenyota;

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mvura mhenyu?
mhinduro: Nzizi dzemvura mhenyu dzinoyerera dzichibva mudumbu raKristu, uye vamwe vanotenda vachagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa! Ameni.

Pazuva rokupedzisira romutambo, iro rakanga riri zuva guru kwazvo, Jesu akasimuka, akadanidzira nenzwi, akati: Kana ani nani ane nyota, ngaauye kwandiri amwe; unotenda kwandiri, sezvazvakarebwa noRugwaro. mvura mhenyu ichayerera kubva mudumbu rake.” nzizi dzinouya.” Jesu akataura izvi achireva Mweya Mutsvene uyo achagamuchira vaya vanotenda maari. Mweya Mutsvene akanga asati apiwa nokuti Jesu akanga asati akudzwa. Johani 7:37-39

(2) Idya chingwa chaIshe cheupenyu

bvunza: Chii chinonzi chingwa cheupenyu?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Jesu ndiye chingwa cheupenyu

Madzibaba edu akadya mana murenje, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Akavapa chingwa chakabva kudenga kuti vadye.” ’”

Jesu akati: “Chokwadi, chokwadi ndinoti kwamuri, Mosesi haana kukupai chingwa chakabva kudenga, asi Baba vangu vanokupai chingwa chechokwadi chinobva kudenga, nokuti chingwa chaMwari ndicho chingwa chinoburuka chichibva kudenga. anopa upenyu kunyika.”

Vakati, “Ishe, tipei chingwa ichi nguva dzose.”
Jesu akati, “Ndini chingwa choupenyu. Ani naani anouya kwandiri haangatongovi nenzara;
Asi ndakakuudzai, uye makandiona, asi hamutendi nazvino. Johani 6:31-36

2 Idyai nekunwa kuna Ishe; Nyama uye Ropa

(Jesu akati) Ndini chingwa choupenyu. Madzitateguru enyu akadya mana murenje uye akafa. Ichi ndicho chingwa chakaburuka kubva kudenga, kuti kana vanhu vakachidya, varege kufa. Ndini chingwa chipenyu chakaburuka kubva kudenga; ani naani anodya chingwa ichi achararama nokusingaperi.

Chingwa chandichapa, inyama yangu, ini yandichapa upenyu hwenyika. Naizvozvo vaJudha vakakakavadzana vachiti: Uyu unogona kutipa sei nyama yake tidye? "

Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musingadyi nyama yoMwanakomana woMunhu nokunwa ropa rake, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi pakupedzisira. zuva randichamumutsa.
Johani 6:48-54

(3) Kururamiswa nokutenda

bvunza: vane nzara nenyota yekururama! Munhu anowana sei kururama kwaMwari?
mhinduro: Munhu anoruramiswa nokutenda muna Jesu Kristu!

1Kumbirai uye muchapiwa
2Tsvakai uye muchawana
3Godzai uye muchazarurirwa mukova! Ameni.

(Jesu akati) Zvakare ndinoti kwamuri: Kumbirai, uye muchapiwa, uye muchawana; Nekuti anokumbira anogamuchira, neanotsvaka anowana, neanogogodza anozarurirwa mukova.
Ndianiko baba pakati penyu angati kana mwanakomana wake akakumbira chingwa, omupa ibwe? Kukumbira hove, ko kana ukamupa nyoka panzvimbo pehove? Kana ukakumbira zai, ko kana ukamupa chinyavada? Kana imi, kunyange makaipa, muchiziva kupa zvipo zvakanaka kuvana venyu; Baba venyu vari kudenga vachapa zvikuru sei Mweya Mutsvene vanovakumbira? ” Ruka 11:9-13

bvunza: Kururamiswa nokutenda! sei ( tsamba ) kururamiswa?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1( tsamba ) Kururamiswa kwevhangeri

Handina nyadzi pamusoro pevhangeri, nokuti isimba raMwari roruponeso kuna ani naani anotenda, kumuJudha pakutanga, uye kumuGirikiwo. Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” ( VaRoma 1:16-17 )

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: Evhangeri yoruponeso → (Pauro) Iro randakakuparidziraiwo: kutanga, kuti Kristu maererano neMagwaro, akafira zvivi zvedu ,

→ Tisunungurei kubva kuchivi,
→Tisunungurei kubva kumutemo nekutukwa kwawo ,
Uye kuvigwa,
→Ngatibvise munhu wekare nemabasa ake;
Uye akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neBhaibheri.
→ Kumuka kwaKristu kunotiita vakarurama , (Kureva, kumutswa, kuzvarwa patsva, kuponeswa, uye kugamuchirwa sevanakomana vaMwari naKristu. Hupenyu husingaperi.) Ameni!

2 Kururamiswa pachena nenyasha dzaMwari

Zvino, nenyasha dzaMwari, tinoruramiswa pachena norudzikinuro rwaKristu Jesu. Mwari akagadza Jesu sorudzikinuro kubudikidza neropa raJesu uye nokutenda kwomunhu kuti aratidze kururama kwaMwari; nokuti akashivirira zvivi zvakaitwa kare kare kuti aratidze kururama kwake vanozivikanwa kuti vakarurama, uye kuti varuramise avo vanotenda muna Jesu. VaRoma 3:24-26

Kana uchipupura nomuromo wako kuti Jesu ndiye Ishe uye ukatenda mumwoyo mako kuti Mwari akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, uchaponeswa. Nokuti munhu anogona kururamiswa nokutenda nemwoyo wake, uye anogona kuponeswa nokureurura nomuromo wake. VaRoma 10:9-10

3 Kururamiswa noMweya waMwari (Mweya Mutsvene)

Ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita vamwe venyu, asi makashambidzwa, mukaitwa vatsvene, mukaruramiswa nezita raShe Jesu Kristu, noMweya waMwari wedu. 1 VaKorinte 6:11

Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu vakati: “Vakaropafadzwa avo vane nzara nenyota yokururama, nokuti vachagutiswa. Ameni!

Hymn: Semhembwe Irikurovera parukova

Chinyorwa cheEvhangeri!

Kubva: Mabhuratha nemasisita eChechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu!

2022.07.04

articles.content:
Vakaropafadzwa vanyoro, nokuti vachagara nhaka yenyika.
—-- Mateu 5:5

Encyclopedia tsanangudzo

Nyoro: (fomu) munyoro uye akapfava, (pedyo) akapfava uye akapfava.
Zvakadai sezvinyoro, zvinyoro, zvinyoro, zvinyoro, zvinyoro, zvinyoro, zvinyoro uye zvine hanya.
Ai Qing's nhetembo "Bouquet. Vienna":"Zuva rinogona kupenya nepamahwindo ako uye kubata maziso ako neminwe zvinyoro ..."

Antonyms: hasha, hutsinye, hutsinye, hasha, chisimba, hutsinye, kuzvikudza.

dudziro yeBhaibheri

Musatuka, musakakavara, asi ivai murugare; Ratidza unyoro kuvanhu vose . Tito 3:2

Zvininipise pazvinhu zvose, munyoro , muite mwoyo murefu, muchiitirana moyo murefu murudo, mushandise chisungo chorugare kuti muchengete humwe hwoMweya. VaEfeso 4:2-3

bvunza: Ndiani munhu munyoro?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1)Unyoro hwaKristu

“Itii kuvakadzi veZioni, ‘Tarirai, Mambo wenyu anouya kwamuri; ari munyoro , uye akatasva mbongoro, ndiko kuti, akatasva mwana wembongoro. ’” Mateu 21:5

(2) Ishe Jesu akati: “Ndiri munyoro uye ndine mwoyo unozvininipisa”!

Uyai kwandiri mose makaneta makaremerwa, uye ini ndichakuzorodzai. Ndiri munyoro uye ndakazvininipisa mumwoyo , takurai joko rangu mudzidze kwandiri, uye muchawana zororo remweya yenyu. Mateu 11:28-29

bvunza: Unyoro hunobvepi?
mhinduro: Kubva kumusoro.

bvunza: Ndiani anobva kumusoro?
Mhinduro: Jesu, Mwanakomana waBaba Vokudenga.

(Jesu akati) Kana ndikakuudzai zvinhu zviri panyika uye mukasazvitenda, mungatenda sei kana ndikakuudzai zvinhu zviri kudenga? Hakuna munhu akakwira kudenga kunze kwoMwanakomana woMunhu akaburuka kubva kudenga uye achiri kudenga. Johani 3:12-13

bvunza: Nzira yekugamuchira sei hunyoro kubva kumusoro?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kuchenesa kutanga

bvunza: Nzira yekuchenesa sei?
mhinduro: Kana hana yako yakachena, hauchanzwi uine mhosva. !

Kana zvisina kudaro, zvibayiro zvingadai zvisina kumira kare kare here? Nokuti avo vanonyengetera, Kana hana yacheneswa, haichanzwi mhosva. . VaHebheru 10:2

bvunza: Ndingachenesa sei ndisina mhosva?
mhinduro: ( tsamba ) Ropa raKristu risina gwapa rinochenesa (hana) yako kubva pamabasa ako akafa, uye mwoyo wako (hana) unotenda kuti kuburikidza neropa rinokosha raKristu, une " wash "Handichanzwa mhosva Amen!

zvikuru sei ropa raKristu, iye kubudikidza noMweya usingaperi akazvipa asina gwapa kuna Mwari, richanatsa mwoyo yenyu pamabasa akafa kuti mushumire Mwari mupenyu. Tarisa kuna VaHebheru 9:14

(2)Ekupedzisira rugare, kupfava nekupfava

Asi uchenjeri hunobva kumusoro pakutanga hwakachena, tevere rugare; Munyoro uye munyoro , azere nengoni, anobereka zvibereko, asina rusaruro, asina unyengeri. Jakobho 3:17

(3) Shandisa rugare kudyara zvibereko zverudo

Uye chinoita kuti pave norugare chibereko chokururama chinokushwa murugare. Jakobho 3:18

(4) Hunyoro chibereko cheMweya Mutsvene

Chibereko choMweya ndirwo rudo, nomufaro, norugare, nomoyo murefu, nomoyo munyoro, nokunaka, nokutendeka; munyoro ,control. Hakuna mutemo unopikisa zvinhu zvakadai.
VaGaratia 5:22-23

(5) Vanyoro vachagara nhaka yaBaba Vekudenga

Mweya Mutsvene uyu ndicho chitsidzo chenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (vanhu: Manyoro ekutanga iindasitiri ) akaregererwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe.
VaEfeso 1:14

Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. ... Kana muri vaKristu, muri vana vaAbhurahama, vadyi venhaka maererano nechipikirwa.
VaGaratia 3:26, 29

Naizvozvo Ishe Jesu akati: “Vakaropafadzwa vanyoro, nokuti vachagara nhaka yenyika. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Hymn: Ndinotenda ndinotenda

Chinyorwa cheEvhangeri!

Kubva: Mabhuratha nemasisita eChechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu!

articles.title: Vakaropafadzwa vanochema
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vakaropafadzwa vanochema; nekuti ivo vachanyaradzwa.
— Mateu 5:4

Encyclopedia tsanangudzo

Kuchema: Zita rechiChinese
Mataurirwo emashoko: āi tòng
Tsanangudzo: Kusiririsa, kusuwa zvakanyanya.
Kwakabva: "Bhuku reGare gare Han Dynasty · Ji Zun Zhuan":"Mutyairi wengoro akauya kuzomuona akapfeka mbatya dzakapfava, akamutarisa uye achichema nekuchema.

dudziro yeBhaibheri

kuchema : kuchema, kuchema, kuchema, kusuruvara, kusuruvara → se "kutya rufu", "kutya kurasikirwa", kuchema, kuchema, kusuruvara uye kusuruvara kune hama dzakarasika.

Sara akagara makore ane zana namakumi maviri namanomwe makore, ndiwo makore oupenyu hwaSara. Sara akafa paKiriati-abha ndiro Hebhuroni panyika yeKanani. Abhurahamu akamuchema, akamuchema. Tarisa kuna Genesisi Chitsauko 23 Ndima 1-2

bvunza: Kana mumwe munhu akachema kurasikirwa ne“mbwa,” ichi chikomborero here?
mhinduro: Aihwa!

bvunza: Nenzira iyi, Ishe Jesu akati: " kuchema Zvinorevei kuti "Vakaropafadzwa vanhu!"
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(Vakaropafadzwa avo vanoshayiwa, vachichema, uye vachichema maererano nokuda kwaMwari, uye vachishingairira vhangeri)

(1) Jesu anochema Jerusarema

“Iwe Jerusarema, Jerusarema, iwe unouraya vaprofita uye uchitaka namabwe avo vakatumwa kwauri, kangani kandaidisa kuunganidza vana vako pamwe chete, sehuku inounganidza hukwana dzayo pasi pamapapiro ayo, asi iwe ukaramba hongu! imba yasiirwa kwamuri, ndinoti kwamuri: Hamuchazondioni kubva zvino, kusvikira mati: Ngaarumbidzwe iye unouya nezita raShe.

(2) Jesu akachema paakaona kuti vanhu vakanga vasingadaviri kuti Mwari ane simba rokumutsa vakafa.

Maria akati asvika kuna Jesu uye akamuona, akawira pasi patsoka dzake akati, “Ishe, dai manga muri pano, hanzvadzi yangu ingadai isina kufa Vakagomera mumoyo mavo, vachitambudzika zvikuru, vakabvunza vakati, Mamuradzikepiko? Jesu akachema . Johani 11:32-35

(3) Kristu akachema zvikuru uye akanamata nemisodzi pamusoro pezvivi zvedu, achiteterera Baba Vekudenga kuti vatiregerere zvivi zvedu zvikuru.

Kristu paakanga ari panyama, aive nenzwi guru kuchema , akanyengetera nemisodzi kuna Jehovha uyo aigona kumuponesa parufu, uye akapindurwa nokuda kwoumwari hwake. Tarisa kuna VaHebheru 5:7

(4) Petro akaramba Ishe katatu akachema zvinorwadza

Petro akayeuka zvakanga zvataurwa naJesu zvokuti: “Jongwe risati rarira, uchandiramba katatu.” kuchema zvinorwadza . Mateu 26:75

(5) Vadzidzi vakachema rufu rwaJesu pamuchinjikwa

Mangwanani-ngwanani pazuva rokutanga revhiki, Jesu akamutswa uye akatanga kuzviratidza kuna Mariya Magadharini (uyo Jesu akabudisa kwaari madhimoni manomwe).
Iye akaenda akaudza vanhu vakanga vachitevera Jesu mucheme uye mucheme . Vakanzwa kuti Jesu akanga ari mupenyu uye kuti akanga aonekwa naMaria, asi havana kuzvitenda. Mako 16:9-11

(6) Kereke yeKorinde yakatambudzwa nekuda kwaPauro! Kushaikwa, kuchema uye kufarira

Kunyange patakasvika kuMasedhonia, takanga tisina rugare mumuviri wedu takanga takakombwa nokutambudzika, uye kunze kwaiva nokurwa uye kutya mukati. Asi Mwari anonyaradza vakaora mwoyo, akatinyaradza nokusvika kwaTito, uye kwete nokusvika kwake bedzi, asiwo nokunyaradza kwaakagamuchira kubva kwamuri, nokuti iye akakunyaradzai; kuchema , uye kushingairira kwangu, zvose zvakandiudza uye zvakaita kuti ndiwedzere kufara. 2 VaKorinte 7:5-7

(7) Shungu, chema, uye utendeuke maererano nokuda kwaMwari

nokuti Kusuwa maererano nokuda kwaMwari , iyo inobereka kuzvidemba kusingadembi kunotungamirira kuruponeso; Unoona, paunochema maererano nokuda kwaMwari, uchabereka kushingaira, kuzvinyunyuta, kuzvivenga, kutya, chishuvo, chido, uye kurangwa (kana shanduro: kuzvipa mhosva). Pazvinhu izvi zvose zviratidzei kuti makachena.
2 VaKorinte 7:10-11

kuchema zvinoreva:

1 Asi kusuwa kwenyika, kuchema, kuchema, nokuora mwoyo zvinouraya vanhu. .

(Somuenzaniso, vanoda imbwa nekatsi, vamwe vanhu “vanochema” pashure pokurasikirwa nembwa kana katsi, vamwe vanotochema nokuchema nokuda kworufu rwe“nguruve”, uye nyika inochema zvinorwadza nokuda kwehurwere kana kuti marudzi ose eshungu nokusuwa mukati. “Kuchema” uku, kuchema, kusuwa, uye kurasikirwa netariro kuri kuuraya vanhu nokuti havatendi muna Jesu Kristu semuponesi.

2 Vakaropafadzwa avo vanosuwa, kutendeuka, uye vachichema maererano nokuda kwaMwari

Somuenzaniso, muTesitamende yekare, Abrahama akachema rufu rwaSara, David akapfidza pamberi paMwari nokuda kwezvivi zvake, Nehemia akagara pasi akachema apo masvingo eJerusarema akanga akoromorwa, muteresi akanyengeterera kutendeuka, Petro akaramba Jehovha katatu. uye tikachema zvikuru, uye Kristu nokuda kwezvivi zvedu. , chechi yeKorinde inosuwa, inochema, uye inofarira kutambudzwa kwaPauro, kutambura kwevaKristu panyama munyika, vachinyengetera kuna Baba vokudenga uye vachichema, vachichema, uye vachishungurudzika, uye manzwiro evaKristu pamusoro pehama dzavo, shamwari, vaunodzidza navo, uye Vanoshanda navo vakavapoteredza, nezvimwewo. Avo vakamirira vachasuwa uye vachasuwawo nokuti havatendi kuti Jesu akamuka kubva kuvakafa uye ane upenyu husingaperi. Vanhu ava vose vanotenda muna Mwari naJesu Kristu! “Kuchema” kwavo kunokomborerwa. Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Vakakomborerwa avo vanochema → → Vakaropafadzwa avo vakasuruvara, vanopfidza, vanochema, uye vachichema maererano nokuda kwaMwari ivo vachanyaradzwa nenzira iyi, munonzwisisa here?

bvunza: " kuchema " Vanhu vanonyaradzwa sei?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Muranda akanga ari muuranda upenyu hwake hwose nokuda kwokutya rufu akasunungurwa

Nokuti sezvo vana vachigoverana ropa nenyama, iyewo akapfeka nyama neropa, kuti kubudikidza norufu aparadze uyo ane simba rorufu, iye dhiabhorosi, uye asunungure vaya vakanga vari muuranda kwoupenyu hwavo hwose. ku (chivi) nekutya rufu. VaHebheru 2:14-15

(2) Kristu anotiponesa

Mwanakomana woMunhu akauya kuzotsvaka nokuponesa chakarasika. Tarisa kuna Ruka Chitsauko 19 ndima 10

(3) Kununurwa pamurairo wechivi norufu

Nekuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu. VaRoma 8:2

(4) Tenda muna Jesu, uponeswe, uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi

Ndanyora zvinhu izvi kwamuri imi munotenda kuzita roMwanakomana waMwari kuti muzive kuti mune upenyu husingaperi.

( Kana wava nehupenyu husingaperi ndipo paunokwanisa kuwana nyaradzo kana usina nyaradzo yehupenyu husingaperi, ungaiwanepi? Uri right here? )-Tarira kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 5 Ndima 13

Hymn: Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu

Chinyorwa cheEvhangeri!

Kubva: Mabhuratha nemasisita eChechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu!

articles.title: Vakaropafadzwa varombo pamweya
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Jesu wakati achiona chaunga, akakwira mugomo, akagara pasi, vadzidzi vake vakauya kwaari, akashamisa muromo, akavadzidzisa, achiti:

" Vakaropafadzwa varombo pamweya; Nokuti umambo hwokudenga ndohwavo. — Mateu 5:1-3

Encyclopedia tsanangudzo

Zita rechiChinese: mwero
Zita rekunze: ane pfungwa dzakavhurika;anozvininipisa
Pinyin: xū xīn

Cherechedza: Zvinoreva kuti kusagutsikana kana kuzvikudza.
Mashoko

Semuenzaniso, ita mutsara: Kusagutsikana uye kukwanisa kugamuchira pfungwa dzevamwe vanhu.
Chete nekudzidza “kuzvininipisa” uye nekukumbira mazano kubva kune vamwe ndipo patinogona kuramba tichifambira mberi.

( 1 ) Paunofambira mberi uye ukawana zivo, kudzidza, pfuma, chinzvimbo, uye kukudzwa, iwe uchava manyawi, manyawi, manyawi uye kuzvikudza, uye uchava mambo wako uye chivi.
( 2 ) Kunewo rudzi rwemunhu anozvininipisa “anoratidza kuzvininipisa” → Mitemo iyi inoita kuti vanhu vanamate muzita rouchenjeri, vanamate vari voga, varatidze kuzvininipisa, uye vanobata miviri yavo nehasha, asi chaizvoizvo haina chayakaita pakudzivisa kuchiva. nyama. VaKorose 2:23

Naizvozvo, zviri pamusoro " kuzvininipisa "Avo vane zita rouchenjeri havana kukomborerwa → asi nhamo. Sezvo Ishe Jesu akati: "Apo vanhu vanotaura zvakanaka pamusoro pako, une nhamo iwe. Unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna Ruka 6:26

bvunza: Neiyi nzira, Ishe Jesu anonongedzera kunaani so“murombo mumweya”?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

dudziro yeBhaibheri

Kuzvininipisa: zvinoreva zvinoreva urombo.
Kuzvininipisa: zvinorevawo urombo.

“Maoko angu akaita zvinhu zvose izvi,” ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha, “asi izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvandakachengeta. kuzvininipisa (Mavhesi ekutanga anoti urombo avo vakazvidemba uye vanodedera nokuda kwamashoko angu. Tarisa kuna Isaya Chitsauko 66 ndima 2

Mweya waJehovha uri pamusoro pangu; humble munhu (kana shanduro: Paridza vhangeri kuvarombo )--Verenga Isa 61:1 uye Ruka 4:18

bvunza: Ndechipi chikomborero chiripo kuvarombo pamweya?
mhinduro: kutendeuka ( tsamba ) Vhangeri → Kuzvarwa patsva, ruponeso.

1 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya ( Johani 3:5 )
2 Vakazvarwa kubva pachokwadi chevhangeri ( 1 VaKorinte 4:15 )
3 Uyo wakaberekwa naMwari! ( Johani 1:12-13 )

kuzvarwa patsva ( Newcomer ) vanogona kupinda muHumambo hweKudenga, uye Humambo hweKudenga ndehwavo. Saka, unonzwisisa here? — Johani 3:5-7

Kuva murombo pamweya zvinoreva kuzvishaya wega, kuva murombo, kusava nechinhu, kwete ini (Jehovha chete ndiye ari mumoyo mako) Amen!

Razaro mupemhi: kudenga

“Kwakanga kuno mumwe mupfumi aipfeka nguo dzepepuru nomucheka wakaisvonaka uye aigara muumbozha mazuva ose. akawira patafura yomupfumi, uye imbwa dzikauya dzikananzva maronda ake.

Mupfumi: Kutambudzwa muHadhesi

Mupfumi akafawo akavigwa. ari pakurwadziwa muHadhesi, akasimudza meso ake, akaona Abhurahama ari kure, naRazaro mumaoko ake. Tarisa kuna Ruka 16:19-23

bvunza: " kuzvininipisa "Vakaropafadzwa vanhu, maitiro avo ndeapi?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Chinja kuva chimiro chemwana
Ishe akati, “Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kana mukasatendeuka mukava savana vaduku, hamungatongopindi muumambo hwokudenga

(2)Zvininipise semwana mudiki
Naizvozvo ani naani anozvininipisa somwana muduku uyu ndiye achava mukurusa muumambo hwokudenga. Mateu 18:4

(3)Tendeuka uye utende muvhangeri
Ishe Jesu vakati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tendeukai mutende evhangeri!"

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 VaKorinde 15:3-4 Muapostora Pauro paaiparidzira Vemamwe Marudzi. Vhangeri roruponeso ) Iniwo ndakakupaiwo, pakutanga, kuti Kristu wakafira zvivi zvedu, sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro .

1 (Kutenda) Kristu anotisunungura kubva kuchivi —Verenga VaRoma 6:6-7
2 (Kutenda) Kristu anotisunungura kubva pamurairo nekutukwa kwawo --Onai VaRoma 7:6 uye VaGaratiya 3:13

Akavigwa;
3 (Kutenda) Kristu kunoita kuti tibvise munhu wekare nemaitiro ake —-Verenga VaKorose. 3:9

Uye maererano neBhaibheri, akamutswa pazuva rechitatu!
4 (Kutenda) Kumuka kwaKristu ndiko kwekururamiswa kwedu! Ndiko (kutenda) kuti tinomutswa, takazvarwa patsva, takagamuchirwa sevanakomana vaMwari, toponeswa, uye tive nehupenyu husingaperi pamwe chete naKristu! Ameni —Verenga VaRoma 4:25

(4) "Zvidururire" Hakuna iwe, kunze kwaIshe

Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu
Handisisiri ini ndiri kurarama zvino !

Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri, uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino munyama, ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. Tarisa kuna VaGaratiya Chitsauko 2 Ndima 20

articles.title: Denga Idzva neNyika Itsva
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Zvakazarurwa chitsauko 21 ndima 1 tiverenge pamwe chete: Ipapo ndakaona denga idzva nenyika itsva, nokuti denga rokutanga nenyika zvakanga zvapfuura, uye gungwa rakanga risisipo.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete 《 denga idzva nenyika itsva 》 Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” munaShe Jesu Kristu chechi Kutuma vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, inova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nokubwinya, norudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni.

Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Vana vaMwari vose ngavanzwisise denga idzva nenyika itsva zvakagadzirirwa isu naIshe Jesu! IJerusarema Idzva riri kudenga, musha usingagumi! Ameni .Minamato iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Denga idzva nenyika itsva

Zvakazarurwa [Chitsauko 21:1] Ndakaona zvakare denga idzva nenyika itsva nokuti denga rokutanga nenyika zvapfuura, uye gungwa harichazovipo.

bvunza: Nderipi denga idzva nenyika itsva zvakaonekwa naJohani?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1)Denga nenyika zvakapfuura zvapfuura

bvunza: Denga nenyika zvakapfuura zvinorevei?
mhinduro: " nyika yapfuura “Ndizvo zvakataurwa naMwari muna Genesisi ( Mazuva matanhatu ebasa denga nenyika zvakasikirwa Adamu nezvizvarwa zvake, nokuti ( Adhamu ) akatyora mutemo akatadza uye akadonha, uye denga nenyika zvakatukwa nenyika zvakapfuura uye hazvisisipo.

(2)Gungwa hapachina

bvunza: Ingava nyika yakaita sei kudai pasina gungwa?
mhinduro: " umambo hwaMwari " Inyika yemweya!

Sezvakataurwa naIshe Jesu: “Unofanira kuberekwa patsva”. 1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya. 2 Vhangeri rechokwadi rinozvarwa. 3 Akaberekwa naMwari →( tsamba )Evhangeri! Vachangozvarwa patsva chete ndivo vanogona kupinda【 umambo hwaMwari 】Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Muumambo hwaMwari, ipapo ( vanhu ) chii chichaitika?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Mwari achapusika misodzi yose pameso avo ,
2 Hapasisina rufu.
3 Kuchema kana kuchema kana kurwadziwa hazvingazovipozve;
4 Hapasisina nyota kana nzara,
5 Hapachazovizve nekutuka.

Hapasisina kutukwa Muguta mune chigaro choumambo chaMwari necheGwayana uye varanda vake vachamushumira, kureva Zvakazarurwa 22:3.

(3) Zvese zvakagadziridzwa

Akataura neni akabata rutsanga rwendarama somubati; Cherechedza: " Rutsanga rwendarama somutongi "Zvipime christian inoshandiswa goridhe , sirivheri , gem simudza?
