articles.title: Kutonga kweZuva reDoomsday
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Zvakazarurwa chitsauko 20 ndima 12-13 todziverenga pamwe chete: Ipapo ndakaona vakafa, vakuru navaduku, vamire pamberi pechigaro choushe. Mabhuku akazarurwa, nerimwe bhuku rikazarurwa, iro bhuku roupenyu.

Vakafa vakatongwa maererano nezvakanyorwa mumabhuku aya uye maererano nemabasa avo. Naizvozvo gungwa rakabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri, norufu neHadhesi zvikabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri;

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kutonga kweZuva reDoomsday" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni.

Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” munaShe Jesu Kristu chechi Kutuma vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, inova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nokubwinya, norudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni.

Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Vana vaMwari vose ngavanzwisise kuti “mabhuku akazarurwa,” uye gungwa rikabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri; .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

♦ zuva rokutongwa ♦

1. Chigaro chikuru chichena

Zvakazarurwa [Chitsauko 20:11] Ndakaona zvakare Chigaro chikuru chichena chine kugara pachiri Denga nenyika zvatiza pamberi pake, hapasisina nzvimbo ingaonekwa.

bvunza: Ndiani agere pachigaro chikuru chichena?
mhinduro: Ishe Jesu Kristu!

Pamberi paShe, denga kana kuti pasi hazvigoni kunzvenga meso aMwari, uye hapana nzvimbo inooneka.

2. Zvigaro zvoumambo zvakawanda

Zvakazarurwa [Chitsauko 20:4] Ndakaona zvakare zvigaro zvoumambo zvakawanda , varipowo vagere pairi...!

bvunza: Ndiani agere pazvigaro zvakawanda?
mhinduro: Vatsvene vakatonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru!

Chechitatu: Uyo agere pachigaro ane simba rekutonga

bvunza: Ndiani ane simba rokutonga?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

( 1 ) Ishe Jesu Kristu vane simba rekutonga

Baba havatongi munhu, asi vakapa Mwanakomana kutonga kwose... Nokuti sezvo Baba vano upenyu mavari, saizvozvowo vakapa kuti Mwanakomana ave noupenyu maari uye nokuti ndiye Mwanakomana woMunhu. vakamupa simba rokutonga . Reference (Johani 5:22,26-27)

( 2 ) Millennium ( kumuka kwokutanga ) ane simba rokutonga

bvunza: Ndivanaani vachamutswa kekutanga mumireniyumu?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Mweya yeavo vakagurwa misoro nokuda kwokupupurira Jesu uye nokuda kweShoko raMwari ,
2 nevaya vasina kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho ,
3 kana mweya yevaya vakagamuchira chiratidzo pahuma dzavo nepamaoko avo , Vese vanomutswa!

Ipapo ndakaona zvigaro zvovushe, navanhu vagere pamusoro pazvo, vakapiwa simba rokutonga. Uye ndakaona kumuka kwemweya yevaya vakagurwa misoro nekuda kweuchapupu hwaJesu uye nekuda kweshoko raMwari, nevaya vasina kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho, kana kugamuchira chiratidzo pahuma dzavo kana pamaoko avo. uye vachatonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru. Uku ndiko kumuka kwekutanga. ( Vamwe vose vakafa havasati vamutswa , kusvikira makore ane chiuru apera. (Zvakazarurwa 20:4-5)

(3) Vatsvene vane simba rokutonga

Hauzivi here Vatsvene vachatonga nyika here? Kana nyika ichizotongwa nemi, hamuna kufanira kutonga chinhu chiduku here? Chirevo (1 VaKorinte 6:2)

4. Mwari anotonga nyika nokururama

【 akagadza chigaro chake choushe kuti atonge 】

Asi Jehovha anogara ari mambo nokusingaperi; Chirevo ( Pisarema 9:7 )

【 Tongai nyika nokururama 】

Achatonga nyika nokururama, uye achatonga vanhu nokururama. Magwaro ( Pisarema 9:8 )

【 kutonga nokururama 】

ndichatonga nenguva yakafanira. ( Pisarema 75:2 )

bvunza: Mwari anotonga sei marudzi ose nokururama, nokururama, uye nokururamisira?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Usatonga nezvaunoona nemeso ako, usatonga nezvaunonzwa nenzeve dzako

Mweya waJehovha uchagara pamusoro pake, Mweya wouchenjeri nokunzwisisa, mweya wamano nesimba, mweya wokuziva nokutya Jehovha. Achafarira kutya Jehovha; Usatonga nezvaunoona nemeso ako, usatonga nezvaunonzwa nenzeve dzako ;Chiverengo (Isaya Chitsauko 11 Ndima 2-3)

bvunza: Kutonga hakubvi pakuona, kuita kana kunzwa. Muchiitiko ichi, Mwari anoita rutongeso pahwaroi?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(2) Mwari achapenya chokwadi kutongwa

VaRoma [Chitsauko 2:2] Tinoziva avo vanoita izvi: Mwari achamutonga maererano nechokwadi .

bvunza: Chokwadi chii?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Mweya Mutsvene ichokwadi —1 Johani 5:7
2 Mweya wechokwadi — Johani 14:16-17
3 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya — Johani 3:5-7

Cherechedza: Munhu mutsva akaberekwa patsva chete ndiye anogona kupinda muumambo hwaMwari. akazvarwa patsva munhu ” → noMweya Mutsvene mumwoyo vandudza -Avo vanotsungirira pakuita zvakanaka uye vachitsvaka kubwinya nokukudzwa namaropafadzo asingafi; Mwari vachakupa hupenyu husingaperi ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?
(Iwe haufaniri kutonga) Tinoziva vanoita izvi; Mwari achapenya chokwadi mutongei . Iwe unotonga avo vanoita zvinhu zvakadai, asi unofunga kuti ungatiza kutonga kwaMwari here? …Achapa mubairo mumwe nomumwe sezvaakabata. Kune avo vanotsungirira pamabasa akanaka, vachitsvaka kubwinya nokukudzwa, nokusafa, muvape upenyu husingaperi; 2) 2-3 zvikamu, 6-8 zvikamu)

(3) Maererano ne Vhangeri raJesu Kristu kutongwa

VaRoma [Chitsauko 2:16] Mwari kubudikidza naJesu Kristu Zuva rekutongwa kwezvakavanzika zvevanhu , maererano ne vhangeri rangu akadaro.

bvunza: Chii chinonzi Zuva Rokutongwa Kwezvinhu Zvakavanzika?
mhinduro: " zvakavanzika "Zvakavigwa, ndizvo izvo vamwe vanhu vasingazive → isu tinozvarwa patsva" Newcomer “Upenyu hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari; Zuva rezvakavanzika ” ndiko kutonga kukuru kwezuva rekupedzisira maererano nevhangeri rangu → maererano neni ( Paul ) kutongwa kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu rakaparidzwa neMweya Mutsvene. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

ini ( Paul ) icho chandakagamuchira uye ndikachipa kwamuri, kutanga, kuti Kristu maererano neMagwaro,

akafira zvivi zvedu ( 1 " tsamba " wakasununguka pachivi, wakasunungurwa pamurairo nekutuka kwemurairo ),

Uye kuvigwa ( 2 " tsamba " Bvisa munhu mukuru nemaitiro ake ); uye maererano neBhaibheri,

Akamutswa pazuva rechitatu ( 3 " tsamba " Tinozvarwa patsva kuburikidza nekumuka kwaKristu kubva kuvakafa, kuchitiita kuti tiruramiswe, tizvarwe patsva, timutswe, tiponeswe, uye tive nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni . ◄ ZVIRI MUKATI ► 235 Vhangeri yokuregererwa kusingaperi ( 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4 ).

Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa, asi ave noupenyu husingaperi; kana kuti: Tongai nyika iri pasi, kuti nyika iponeswe naye; Mwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga! zita raJesu 】 Ndizvo → → 1 kuti musunungurwe pachivi, napamurairo, napachituko chomurairo; 2 Bvisai mutana nemaitiro ake. 3 Kuti ururamiswe, ugomutswa, ugozvarwa patsva, uponeswe, uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni! Vaya vanotenda maari → iwe( tsamba ) Rufu rwaKristu pamuchinjikwa - rwakakusunungura kubva muchivi → iwe ( tendai ) havazopiwi mhosva; vanhu vasingatendi , Mhosva yatongwa . Saka, unonzwisisa here? Reference ( Johani 3:16-18 )

(4) Maererano ne zvakaparidzwa naJesu kutongwa

Johane Chitsauko 12:48 (Jesu akati) Uyo anondiramba uye asingagamuchiri mashoko angu ane mutongi; mharidzo yangu Achatongwa nezuva rokupedzisira.

1 nzira yehupenyu

→→Chii chinonzi Tao?

articles.title: Nyaya yavhurwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Zvakazarurwa chitsauko 20 ndima 12 tiverenge pamwe chete: Ipapo ndakaona vakafa, vakuru navaduku, vamire pamberi pechigaro choushe. Mabhuku akazarurwa, nerimwe bhuku rikazarurwa, iro bhuku roupenyu. Vakafa vakatongwa maererano nezvakanyorwa mumabhuku aya uye maererano nemabasa avo.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Nyaya yavhurwa" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Vana vaMwari vose ngavanzwisise kuti “mabhuku akazarurwa” uye vakafa vachatongwa maererano nezvakanyorwa mumabhuku aya uye maererano nemabasa avo.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Iyo kesi faira inowedzera:

→→Tongwa maererano nemabasa avo .

Zvakazarurwa 20 Ipapo ndakaona vakafa, vakuru navaduku, vamire pamberi pechigaro chovushe. Iyo kesi file inovhurwa , uye rimwe bhuku rakazarurwa, iro bhuku roupenyu. Vakafa vakatongwa maererano nemabasa avo maererano nezvakanyorwa mumabhuku aya. .

(1) Munhu wose akatemerwa kufa, uye pashure porufu pachava nokutongwa

Zvinoenderana nemagumo, munhu wese akatemerwa kufa kamwe chete. Mushure merufu pane kutongwa . (VaHebheru 9:27)

(2) Kutonga kunotanga paimba yaMwari

Nokuti nguva yasvika, Kutonga kunotanga neimba yaMwari . Kana kukatanga kwatiri, magumo aavo vasingatendi evhangeri yaMwari achagoveiko? ( 1 Petro 4:17 )

(3) Kubhabhatidzwa muna Kristu, kufa, kuvigwa, uye kumuka zvakare kuti usunungurwe kubva pakutongwa

bvunza: Nei vaya vanobhabhatidzwa murufu rwaKristu vachisunungurwa pakutongwa?
mhinduro: nekuti" akabhabhatidzwa “Avo vanofa naKristu vanobatanidzwa naKristu muchimiro chorufu rwake → Munhu wekare wakatongwa pamwe chete naKristu , vakarovererwa pamwe chete, vakafa pamwe chete uye vakavigwa pamwe chete, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe → ichi ndicho Kutonga kunotanga neimba yaMwari ;

Kristu vakamuka kuvakafa kuberekwa patsva kwatiri, Handisisiri ini ndiri kurarama zvino Haiwa Jehovha, ndiKristu anoraramira ini! Ndakazvarwa patsva ( Newcomer ) upenyu huri kudenga, muna Kristu, hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari, kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba! Ameni. Kana ukagara muna Kristu, munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari haambotadzi, uye mwana wese akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi! hapana chivi Munhu angatongwa sei? Uri right here? saka haana kutongwa ! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? saka, Takavigwa pamwe chete naye kubudikidza nokubhabhatidzwa murufu , kuitira kuti kufamba kwose kwatinoita tive noupenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. Nokuti kana takabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo worufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake, tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe. Kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda vechivi (VaRoma 6:3-6)

(4)Rumuko rwekutanga rwemireniyamu Hapana mugove , vamwe vose vakafa vakatongwa

Uku ndiko kumuka kwekutanga. ( Vamwe vose vakafa havasati vamutswa , kusvikira makore ane chiuru apera. (Zvakazarurwa 20:5)

(5) Jehovha achatonga vanhu vake uye achavatsiva

Mapisarema 9:4 Nokuti makanditsivira, mukandirwira; makagara pachigaro choushe kuti mutonge zvakarurama.
Nokuti tinoziva kuti ndiani akati: Kutsiva ndokwangu, ini ndicharipira "; uyezve: "Jehovha achatonga vanhu vake. “Zvine nhamo sei kuwira mumaoko aMwari mupenyu! (VaHebheru 10:30-31)

(6) Jehovha akatsiva vanhu uye akarega mazita avo Siya zita rako mubhuku roupenyu

Nokuda kwechikonzero ichi, ndizvo Kunyange vakafa vakaparidzirwa vhangeri Tinofanira kuvafonera Nyama inotongwa nomunhu , yavo Zvemweya asi uchirarama naMwari . ( 1 Petro 4:6 )

( Cherechedza: Kana riri davi rinokura kubva pamudzi waAdhamu. Aihwa kubva" nyoka “Mbeu inoberekwa, mashawi akakushwa nadhiabhorosi; Vese vane mukana Siya zita rako zvakanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu , urwu ndirwo rudo, ngoni nokururamisira zvaMwari Baba; kana " nyoka "Vana vakaberekwa na Zvinodyarwa nadhiabhorosi zvinobudisa mashawi Hapana nzira yokusiya zita rako mubhuku roupenyu →→saKaini, Judhasi akapandukira Jehovha, uye vanhu vakaita savaFarise vanoshora Ishe Jesu nechokwadi, Jesu akadaro! Baba vavo ndidhiabhorosi, uye ivo vana vake. Vanhu ava havafaniri kusiya mazita avo kana kuvarangarira, nokuti Gungwa reMoto nderavo. Saka, unonzwisisa here? )

(7) Kutongwa kwemarudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri

Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, imi munonditevera, kana Mwanakomana woMunhu agara pachigaro choumambo chokubwinya kwake pakuvandudzwa, imiwo muchagara pazvigaro gumi nezviviri. Kutongwa kwemarudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri . Chirevo ( Mateo 19:28 )

(8) Kutongwa kwevakafa nevapenyu

Nomwoyo wakadaro, kubva zvino unogona kurarama nguva yasara munyika ino kwete nokuchiva kwavanhu asi maererano nokuda kwaMwari bedzi. Nokuti yatokwana nguva yakati kuti tichitevera kuchiva kwevaHedheni, tichirarama muupombwe, nokuchiva, nokudhakwa, nokunwa, nokunwa uye nokunamata zvifananidzo zvinonyangadza. Muzvinhu izvi vanoshamisika kuti haufambi navo munzira yekurasa, uye vanokutuka. Vachange varipo kuti vazvidavirire pamberi paIshe unotonga vapenyu nevakafa . ( 1 Petro 4:2-5 )

(9)Kutongwa kwengirozi dzakatadza

Uye kune vatumwa vasina kugara pamabasa avo, uye vakasiya nzvimbo dzavo dzekugara, asi Ishe vakasungwa nengetani nekusingaperi murima; Kumirira kutongwa kwezuva guru . Reference ( Judhasi 1:6 )
Nyangwe ngirozi dzakatadza, Mwari haana kushivirira akadzikanda mugehena akadziisa kugomba rerima. kumirira kutongwa . (2 Petro 2:4)

(10) Kutongwa kwevaprofita venhema nevaya vakanamata chikara nomufananidzo wacho

“Nezuva iro,” ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha Wamasimba Ose, “ndichazviita Paradzai mazita ezvidhori panyika , nyika ino haichazorangarirwi; Hapasisina vaporofita venhema nemweya yetsvina . Chirevo (Zekaria 13:2)

(11) Kutongwa kweavo vakagamuchira chiratidzo chechikara pahuma dzavo namaoko

Mutumwa wechitatu akavatevera akati nenzwi guru. Kana munhu akanamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho uye akagamuchira chiratidzo pahuma yake kana paruoko rwake , murume uyu achanwawo waini yehasha dzaMwari; Iye acharwadziswa mumoto nesarufa pamberi pavatumwa vatsvene napamberi peGwayana. Utsi hwokurwadziwa kwake hunokwira nokusingaperi-peri. Vaya vanonamata chikara nomufananidzo wacho uye vanogamuchira chiratidzo chezita racho havazorori masikati kana usiku. (Zvakazarurwa 14:9-11)

(12) Kana zita romunhu asina kunyorwa mubhuku roupenyu, akakandwa mudziva romoto.

Kana zita romunhu risina kunyorwa mubhuku roupenyu, iye vakakandwa mudziva romoto . Reference (Zvakazarurwa 20:15)

Asi mbwende, nevasingatendi, nevanyangadzi, nemhondi, nemhombwe, nevaroyi, nevanonamata zvifananidzo, nevose varevi venhema, ava vachava mudziva remoto unopfuta nesarufa; (Zvakazarurwa 21:8)

Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Mwari anopa vana vake vose mazita matsva Yakanyorwa muBhuku reHupenyu! Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

--- ♥ "Bhuku reHupenyu" ♥ ---

Poshi," bhuku roupenyu 》Zita rakanyorwa

Zvakazarurwa [Chitsauko 3:5] Uyo anokunda achapfekedzwa nguo chena, uye ini handizomuteveri bhuku roupenyu akazodza zita rake, uye achapupura zita rake pamberi paBaba vangu, nepamberi pevatumwa vose vaBaba vangu.

bvunza: Zita raani rakanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1)Zita raJesu

Zvizvarwa zvaAbhurahama, zvizvarwa zvaDhavhidhi. Dzinza raJesu Kristu ("vana", "vana": chinyorwa chekutanga ndi "mwanakomana". Zvimwe chete pazasi): ...Kuzvarwa kwaJesu Kristu kwakanyorwa seizvi: Mai vake Maria vakanga vatsidzirana naJosefa, asi vasati varoorana, Maria. akabatwa pamuviri naMweya Mutsvene. ... Achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumupa Zita rokuti Jesu , nokuti anoda kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. ” Chirevo (Mateo 1:1,18,21)

(2)Mazita evaapostora 12 vaJesu

(Guta Dzvene Jerusarema) Rusvingo rune nheyo gumi nembiri; Panheyo pane mazita eVaapositori vaneGumi neVaviri veGwayana . Reference (Zvakazarurwa 21:14)

(3) Mazita emarudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri

Zvino ndakasundwa neMweya Mutsvene, mutumwa akandiendesa kugomo refu, akandiratidza guta dzvene Jerusarema, rakaburuka kubva kudenga richibva kuna Mwari. Kubwinya kwaMwari kwakanga kuri muguta; Paiva nerusvingo rurefu rwaiva nemasuwo gumi nemaviri, uye nepamagedhi paiva nevatumwa gumi nevaviri, nepamasuwo pakanyorwa mazita emadzinza gumi nemaviri aIsraeri. Reference ( Zvakazarurwa 21, ndima 10-12 )

(4)Mazita evaprofita

Uchaona Abrahama, Isaka, Jakobho, uye Vaprofita vose vari muumambo hwaMwari , asi muchadzingirwa kunze, uko kuchava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno. Chirevo ( Ruka 13:28 )

(5) Mazita evasande

bvunza: Vatsvene ndivanaani?
mhinduro: " vatsvene " Zvinoreva kushanda pamwe chete naKristu! Varanda nevashandi vaMwari!

VaFiripi [4:3] Sezvakarehwa nomuapostora Pauro → ndinokumbirawo kwamuri, joko rechokwadi risina kuenzana, kuti mubatsire vakadzi ava vaviri, nokuti vakabatana neni paevhangeri, naKiremendi, navamwe vanobata neni; Mazita avo ari mubhuku rehupenyu .

Maiwe zvangu, vatsvene Imi mose vapostori navaprofita, farai pamusoro paro, nokuti Mwari akakutsivirai pariri. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 18:20)

(6) Zita romweya wowakarurama rinokwaniswa

Asi masvika paGomo reZioni, guta raMwari mupenyu, Jerusarema rokudenga. Kune makumi ezviuru zvengirozi, pane gungano guru revanakomana vematangwe, vane mazita ari kudenga, kuna Mwari anotonga vose, uye mweya yevakarurama iyo yakakwaniswa, inotaura (VaHebheru 12:22-22). 23)

(7) Vakarurama vanoponeswa chete muzita reruponeso

Kana zvakadaro Vakarurama vanoponeswa chete Haiwa Jehovha, vanhu vasingadi Mwari navatadzi vachamira papi? ( 1 Petro 4:18 )

“Ipapo Mikaeri mutumwa mukuru anochengeta vanhu vako achasimuka, uye pachava nokutambudzika kukuru, kusina kumboitika kubvira pakutanga kworudzi urwu kusvikira panguva ino. Vose vakanyorwa mubhuku , achaponeswa. Vakawanda vevaya vakarara muguruva renyika vachamuka. Pakati pavo pane vaya vane upenyu husingaperi. kunyadziswa , anovengwa nokusingaperi. ( Dhanieri 12:1-2 )

2. Zita idzva

Une nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya Mutsvene kukereke. Unokunda, ndichapa kwaari mana yakavanzwa, uye ndichamupa ibwe jena; Padombo pakanyorwa zita idzva ; ” Reference (Zvakazarurwa 2 ndima 17)

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mana yakavanzika?
mhinduro: " mana yakavanzika “Zvinoreva chingwa choupenyu, uye chingwa choupenyu ndiIshe Jesu,” mana yakavanzika ” zvinoreva Ishe Kristu.

Jesu akati, “Ndini chingwa choupenyu; anouya kwandiri haangatongovi nenzara; anotenda kwandiri haangatongovi nenyota.

bvunza: Zvinorevei kumupa dombo jena?
mhinduro: " Shiraishi "Zvinomiririra kuchena uye kusakanganisa," Shiraishi “Ndiro dombo romweya, uye dombo romweya ndiKristu! Shiraishi ” zvinoreva Ishe Jesu Kristu.

Vose vakanwa mvura imwe chete yomweya. Zvavakanwa zvakabva padombo romweya rakavatevera; Chirevo ( 1 VaKorinte 10:4 )

bvunza: Zvinorevei kana zvichinzi (zita idzva) padombo jena?
mhinduro: 【 zita idzva 】Kuti, kunze kwemazita awakapihwa nevabereki vako pasi pavakakuzvara → Kudenga, Baba Vekudenga vanokupa rimwe zita zita idzva ! Zita rekudenga, zita remweya, zita raMwari ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Ndingawana sei dombo jena rekunyora zita idzva pariri?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kuberekwa nemvura noMweya — Johani 3:5-7
(2) Akazvarwa kubva mushoko rechokwadi revhangeri — 1 VaKorinte 4:15
(3) Akaberekwa naMwari — Johani 1:12-13

Naizvozvo, vabereki vako pavakakubereka panyama, vakakupa zita panyika, Jesu, Mwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga akatumwa naBaba Vekudenga, akafira zvivi zvedu, akavigwa, uye akamutswa nezuva retatu! Jesu Kristu akamuka kuvakafa kuberekwa patsva Bata nesu →→ 1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya , 2 Akazvarwa kubva mushoko rechokwadi revhangeri , 3 akaberekwa naMwari ! Nenzira iyi, Baba vakatipa isu, vana vedu vakaberekwa naMwari, ibwe jena → kureva Ishe Kristu ! Nyora mazita matsva muna Kristu! ndizvo" bhuku roupenyu "Yakanyorwa mukati zita renyu idzva ! Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

3. Vanhu vatsva vakazvarwa patsva chete ndivo vanogona kunyorwa mu "Bhuku reHupenyu"

(1) Munhu haagoni kupinda muumambo hwaMwari kunze kwokunge aberekwa patsva

Jesu akati: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kunze kwekuti munhu akaberekwa nemvura noMweya Kana ukasadaro, haugoni kupinda muumambo hwaMwari. Chakaberekwa nenyama inyama; Ndakati: ‘ unofanira kuberekwa patsva ’, usashamiswa. Mhepo inovhuvhuta ichienda kwainoda, uye unonzwa inzwi rayo, asi hauzivi kwainobva kana kwainoenda. (Johani 3:5-8)

(2) Avo vanoshanda pamwe chete naMwari vakanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu

Ndinokumbira zvikuru kuna Yuobaba naSintike kuti vave nomwoyo mumwe muna She. Ndinokukumbirisaiwo joko rechokwadi, kuti mubatsire vakadzi ava vaviri, vakabatana neni paevhangeri, naKiremenzi, navamwe vakabata zvikuru neni; Mazita avo ari mubhuku rehupenyu . Reference (VaFiripi 4:2-3)

(3) Ani nani anokunda achanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu

Uyo unokunda ndiye uchapfekedzwa nguvo chena, uye handichadzimi zita rake pabhuku reupenyu. uye ndichapupura zita rake pamberi paBaba vangu, nepamberi pevatumwa vose vaBaba vangu. Une nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kukereke. (Zvakazarurwa 3:5-6)

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri! Mweya waMwari wakasunda vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sisita Liu, Sisita Zheng, Bhuratha Cen nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo kuti vatsigire nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu ! Ameni.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Millennium" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! 1. Rumuko Mireniyamu isati yasvika

Zvakazarurwa [Chitsauko 20:4] Ipapo ndakaona zvigaro zvoushe, navanhu vagere pamusoro pazvo, vakapiwa simba rokutonga. Zvino ndakaona mweya yevakange vagurwa misoro nekuda kweuchapupu hwaJesu neshoko raMwari, nevasina kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho, kana kugamuchira mucherechedzo pahuma dzavo, kana pamaoko avo; Vose vakamutswa uye vakatonga pamwe chete naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru .

bvunza: Ndivanaani vakamutswa mireniyumu isati yasvika?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Mweya yevaya vakapupurira Jesu uye vakagurwa misoro nokuda kweshoko raMwari

bvunza: Mweya yeavo vakagurwa misoro nokuda kwaMwari chii?
mhinduro: Ivo mweya yeavo vakaurairwa shoko raMwari uye neuchapupu hwavo hwevhangeri raJesu Kristu.
→→( kufanana ) Pandakazarura chisimbiso chechishanu, ndakaona pasi peatari mweya yaavo vakanga vaurayiwa nokuda kweshoko raMwari uye nokuda kwouchapupu... Ipapo mumwe nomumwe wavo akapiwa nguo chena...! Reference (Zvakazarurwa 6:9)

(2) Haana kumbonamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho

bvunza: Vanhu ivavo vasina kumbonamata chikara nomufananidzo wechikara?
mhinduro: Haana kumbonamatwa" nyoka “Nyoka dzekare, shato huru dzvuku, madhimoni, Satani. Zvikara nemifananidzo yechikara - kana usinganamati vamwari venhema, Guanyin, Buddha, magamba, vanhu vakuru nezvidhori zviri munyika, zvose zviri pasi, mugungwa, uye shiri dzedenga, nezvimwewo.

(3) Hapana mweya wakagamuchira chiratidzo pahuma kana pamaoko.

bvunza: Hatina kutambudzika" it "Mucherechedzo wei?"
mhinduro: havana kugamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara pahuma dzavo kana pamaoko avo .
Kunoitawo kuti munhu wose, mukuru kana muduku, mupfumi kana murombo, akasununguka kana muranda, apiwe chiratidzo paruoko rwake rworudyi kana pahuma yake. …Hehwu huchenjeri: Ani naani anonzwisisa ngaaverenge nhamba yechikara; nokuti inhamba yomunhu, uye nhamba yacho ndimazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nenhanhatu. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 13:16,18)

【Cherechedza:】 1 Mweya yeavo vakapupurira Jesu uye vakagurwa misoro nokuda kweShoko raMwari; 2 Havana kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho; 3 Hakuna munhu akagamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara pahuma kana pamaoko acho; Vese vanomutswa! Ameni
→→ Gamuchira mbiri, mubairo, uye kumuka kuri nani! →→Hongu 100 nguva, dziripo 60 nguva, dziripo 30 Nguva! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Imwe yakawira muvhu rakanaka, ikabereka zvibereko, imwe zana, imwe makumi matanhatu, imwe makumi matatu. Une nzeve dzekunzwa ngaanzwe! "
→→ Hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda dzakaona iyi nzira yechokwadi uye Chinyararire kumirira, Chinyararire teerera, Chinyararire tenda, chinyararire land chengeta shoko ! Kana ukasateerera ucharasikirwa . ( Mateu 13:8-9 )

(4)Vose vanomutswa

bvunza: Ndivanaani vakamutswa?
mhinduro:

1 Mweya yeavo vakapupurira Jesu uye vakagurwa misoro nokuda kweShoko raMwari , (Sezvakaita vaapostora makumi maviri nevatsvene vechiKristu vakatevera Jesu uye vakapupurira evhangeri mumazera ose)

2 havana kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho; 3 Kwete, hakuna munhu akagamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara pahuma yake kana pamaoko ake. .

Vese vanomutswa! Ameni.

(5)Uku ndiko kumuka kwekutanga

(6)Vamwe vakafa havasati vamutswa

bvunza: Vamwe vakafa vasati vamutswa ndivanaani?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
" vakasara vevakafa "Haasati amutswa" zvinoreva:
1 Vanhu vanonamata “nyoka”, dhiragoni, dhiabhorosi naSatani ;
2 Vaya vakanamata chikara nomufananidzo wacho ;
3 Avo vakagamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara pahuma dzavo nepamaoko avo .

(7) Vakaropafadzwa avo vanotora rutivi mukumuka kwokutanga ndokubata ushe naKristu kwamakore ane chiuru

bvunza: Mutori wechikamu mukumuka kwekutanga → Chikomborero chipi chiripo?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Makaropafadzwa uye vatsvene, imi munogovana pakumuka kwokutanga!
2 Rufu rwechipiri haruna simba pamusoro pavo.
3 Zvino vakapiwa kutonga;
4 Vachava vaprista kuna Mwari naKristu, uye vachatonga pamwe chete naKristu makore ane chiuru. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 20:6)

2. Kutonga naKristu Kwemakore Ane Chiuru

(1) Kutonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru

bvunza: Kutora chikamu mukumuka kwekutanga kutonga naKristu (kwenguva yakareba sei)?
Mhinduro: Vachava vaprista vaMwari naKristu, uye vachatonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru! Ameni.

(2)Kuva muprista waMwari naKristu

bvunza: Vaprista vaMwari naKristu vanotonga pamusoro pavanaani?
mhinduro: Tonga zvizvarwa zveIzirairi 144,000 mumireniyamu .

bvunza: Vangani vazukuru varipo kubva ku144,000 vanorarama (mumakore chiuru)?
mhinduro: Kuwanda kwavo kwakanga kuri kuwanda sejecha regungwa, uye vakazadza nyika yose.

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Zvakazarurwa chitsauko 14 ndima 1 tiverenge pamwe chete: Zvino ndakatarira, ndikaona Gwayana rimire pagomo reZiyoni, rinavamwe vanezvuru zvine zana namakumi mana navana, vane zita raro nezita raBaba varo rakanyorwa pahuma dzavo. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Vanhu zviuru zana nemakumi mana nezvina vakaimba rwiyo rutsva" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Ita kuti vana vaMwari vese vanzwisise -- VaIsraeri vakasanangurwa nevaHedeni---kereke inobatanidza mhandara dzakachena 144 000 kudenga vanozviratidza kuti vatevere Gwayana, Ishe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

-

♥ Vanhu 144 000 vakaimba nziyo itsva ♥

Zvakazarurwa [Chitsauko 14:1] Zvino ndakatarira, ndikaona Gwayana rimire paGomo reZioni, rinavamwe vane zviuru zvine zana namakumi mana navana, vane zita raro nezita raBaba varo rakanyorwa pahuma dzavo. .

Poshi, ♡ Gomo reZioni ♡

bvunza: Gomo reZioni chii?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

( 1 ) Gomo reZioni → iguta raMambo Mukuru!
Gomo reZioni, guta raMambo, rakakwirira kumusoro uye rakanaka, iro mufaro wenyika yose. Magwaro ( Pisarema 48:2 )

( 2 ) Gomo reZioni → iguta raMwari mupenyu!
( 3 ) Gomo reZioni → ndiro Jerusarema rokudenga!
Asi masvika paGomo reZioni, iro guta raMwari mupenyu. Jerusarema rokudenga . Kune makumi ezviuru zvengirozi, pane gungano guru revanakomana vematangwe, vane mazita ari kudenga, kuna Mwari anotonga vose, uye mweya yevakarurama iyo yakakwaniswa, inotaura (VaHebheru 12:22-22). 23)

2. 144,000 vanhu vanoiswa chisimbiso uye 144,000 vanhu vanotevera Gwayana.

Mubvunzo: Ndivanaani ava vanhu 144 000?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【Testamente Yekare】--Iyo "Mvuri"

Vanakomana 12 vaJakobho nendudzi 12 dzaIsraeri vakaiswa chisimbiso, vanosvika 144 000—vanomirira vakasarira vaIsraeri.
(1) Testamende yekare “mumvuri”---Testamente Itsva ndiko kuratidzwa kwechokwadi!

(2) Adhamu muTesitamende yekare “mumvuri”---Jesu, Adhamu wokupedzisira muTestamente Itsva, ndiye munhu chaiye!

(3) Vanhu 144 000 muIsraeri pasi pano vakaiswa chisimbiso "mimvuri" --- vanhu 144 000 kudenga vanotevera Gwayana ndivo munhu chaiye anoziviswa.

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(1) Vaapostora 12 vaJesu-vakuru 12.

(2) Marudzi 12 aIsraeri—vakuru 12.

(3)12+12=vakuru makumi maviri nemana (kereke yakabatana)

Ndiko kuti, vasanangurwa vaMwari nevaHedheni vachagamuchira nhaka pamwe chete!

Naizvozvo, pamwe chete naye pakanga pane vanhu vane 144 000 vakatevera Gwayana Vakatengwa naIshe Jesu kubva pakati pavanhu neropa Rake amene - vachimirira vaHedheni avo vakaruramiswa nokutenda, navatsvene, uye navasanangurwa vaMwari, Israeri! Ameni!

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Zvakatengwa naJesu neropa rake pachake

Zvichenjererei imi, neboka rose pamusoro paro Mweya Mutsvene akakuitai vatariri, kuti mufudze kereke yaMwari, yaakatenga neropa rake. Chiratidzo ( Mabasa 20:28 )

Hamuzivi here kuti muviri wenyu itemberi yoMweya Mutsvene? Uyu Mweya Mutsvene unobva kuna Mwari unogara mamuri, uye imi hamuzi venyu, nokuti makatengwa nomutengo. Naizvozvo kudzai Mwari mumuviri wenyu. ( 1 VaKorinde 6:19-20 )

articles.title: Vanhu zviuru zana nemakumi mana nezvina vakaiswa chisimbiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Zvakazarurwa 7:4 toiverenga pamwe chete: Ndikanzwa kuwanda kwezvisimbiso pakati pamarudzi avana vaIsiraeri vakasvika zviuru zvine zana namakumi mana nezvina.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete 《 144,000 vanhu vakaiswa chisimbiso 》 Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye neshoko rechokwadi ravanoparidza, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nembiri, uye nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu, Chingwa chinounzwa kubva kure kudenga, uye chinopihwa kwatiri munguva yakafanira, kuti isu Hupenyu hwepamweya huwande! Vana vaMwari vose ngavanzwisise kuti marudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri ane nhamba yechisimbiso ye144,000 →→ inomirira vakasarira vaIsraeri!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vanhu vane zviuru zvine zana namakumi mana nezvina vakaiswa chisimbiso;

bvunza: Vanhu 144 000 ndivanaani?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【Testamente Yekare】 Vanakomana 12 vaJakobho nenhamba yavanhu vakaiswa chisimbiso mundudzi 12 dzaIsraeri i144 000 →→vanomirira vakasarira vaIsraeri.

Mubvunzo: Chinangwa cheIsraeri “kuiswa chisimbiso” ndechei?
Mhinduro: Nemhaka yokuti vaIsraeri “havasati” vatenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari, vachiri kutarisira, vakamirira Mesiya, uye vakamirira kuti Muponesi avaponese! Naizvozvo, vakasarira vaIsraeri vanodzivirirwa naMwari uye vanofanira “kuiswa chisimbiso naMwari” vasati vapinda mumireniyumu.

Uye maKristu anotenda muna Jesu! Wakatogamuchira chisimbiso che → Mweya Mutsvene, chisimbiso chaJesu, chisimbiso chaMwari! (Hapachadiwe kuiswa chisimbiso zvakare)

→→Musachemedza Mweya Mutsvene waMwari, wamakaiswa chisimbiso maari (ndiko kuti, chisimbiso choMweya Mutsvene, chisimbiso chaJesu, chisimbiso chaMwari) kusvikira zuva rokudzikinurwa. Verenga VaEfeso 4:30
【Testamente Itsva】

1 Vaapostora 12 vaJesu→→vanomiririra vakuru gumi nevaviri
2 Marudzi 12 aIsraeri →→ anomirira vakuru 12
3 12+12=24 vakuru.

Pakarepo ndakasundwa noMweya Mutsvene uye ndakaona chigaro choushe chakagadzwa kudenga, nomumwe agere pachigaro. ...kwakange kune zvigaro zveushe makumi maviri nezvina zvakange zvakakomberedza chigaro cheushe; Zvakazarurwa 4:2,4

Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina:

Chisikwa chipenyu chekutanga chakanga chakaita seshumba → Mateu (Muchinda)
Chisikwa chipenyu chechipiri chakanga chakaita semhuru → Evhangeri yaMako (Mushumiri)
Chisikwa chipenyu chechitatu chaiva nechiso chakaita sechomunhu → Evhangeri yaRuka (Mwanakomana Womunhu)
Chisikwa chipenyu chechina chakanga chakaita segondo rinobhururuka → Evhangeri yaJohani (Mwanakomana waMwari)

Pamberi pechigaro chovushe pakanga pakaita segungwa regirazi, rakafanana nekristaro. Pachigaro cheushe, nepakapoteredza chigaro cheushe paiva nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, zvizere nemeso mberi neshure. Chisikwa chipenyu chokutanga chakanga chakaita seshumba, chechipiri chakanga chakaita semhuru, chechitatu chakanga chine chiso chomunhu, uye chechina chakanga chakaita segondo. Chimwe nechimwe chezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chakanga china mapapiro matanhatu uye akanga akafukidzwa nameso mukati nokunze. Masikati neusiku vanoti:
Mutsvene! Mutsvene! Mutsvene!
Jehovha Mwari akanga aripo, uye ariko,
Wamasimba Ose achararama nokusingaperi.
Zvakazarurwa 4:6-8

1. Vanhu 144 000 kubva kurudzi rumwe norumwe rwaIsraeri vakaiswa chisimbiso

(1) Chisimbiso chaMwari Asingagumi

bvunza: Chisimbiso chaMwari mupenyu chii?
mhinduro: " dhinda “Chiratidzo, chisimbiso! Chisimbiso chaMwari wokusingaperi ndechokuti vanhu vaMwari vakaiswa chisimbiso nokuiswa chiratidzo;

Uye ndezva" nyoka "Ndiro mucherechedzo wechikara 666 . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Shure kwaizvozvo, ndakaona vatumwa vana vamire kumativi mana enyika, vachidzora mhepo kumativi mana enyika, kuti irege kurira panyika, kana pagungwa, kana pamiti. Zvino ndakaona mumwe mutumwa achikwira achibva kumabvazuva, ane chisimbiso chaMwari mupenyu. Ipapo akadanidzira nenzwi guru kungirozi ina dzakanga dzine simba rokukuvadza pasi negungwa: References ( Zvakazarurwa 7:1-2 )

(2) Usakuvadza vashumiri vaMwari

“Musakuvadza nyika, kana gungwa, kana miti, kusvikira taisa chisimbiso pahuma dzavaranda vaMwari.” ( Zvakazarurwa 7:3 )

bvunza: Kusavakuvadza zvinorevei?
mhinduro: Israeri, vanhu vakasarudzwa vaMwari! Mukutambudzika kukuru kwekupedzisira~ vanhu vakasara ! Udzai vatumwa vane simba pamusoro pemhepo ina dzenyika, kuti varege kukuvadza vakasara vavanhu; Mwari anosarudza vakasara kuti vasungwe →→ Kupinda muMireniyamu .

(3) Dzinza rimwe nerimwe raIsraeri rakaiswa chisimbiso

Ndikanzwa kuwanda kwezvisimbiso pakati pamarudzi avana vaIsiraeri vakasvika zviuru zvine zana namakumi mana nezvina. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 7:4)

Dhiabhorosi wakavanyengera akakandwa mudziva romoto nesarufa , pane chikara nomuporofita wenhema. Vacharwadziswa masikati nousiku nokusingaperi-peri. Chirevo (Zvakazarurwa 20:7-10)

articles.title: Kuuya kwechipiri kwaJesu (Mutauro 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 8 ndima 23 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kwete izvozvo zvoga, kunyange isu vane zvibereko zvokutanga zvoMweya tinogomera mukati medu, tichimirira kuitwa kwedu vana, iko kudzikinurwa kwemiviri yedu. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kuuya kwechipiri kwaJesu" Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Vana vaMwari ngavanzwisise kuti Ishe Jesu Kristu vakauya nemiviri yedu yakaregererwa! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mukristu: Muviri wakaregererwa!

VaRoma 8:22-23 Tinoziva kuti zvisikwa zvose zvinogomera nekushanda pamwe chete kusvikira zvino. Zvisati zviri izvo chete, asi isu vane chibereko chekutanga cheMweya tinogomera mukati, tichimirira kuitwa kwedu vana. Ndiko kuregererwa kwemiviri yedu .

bvunza: Muviri wechiKristu unodzikinurwa sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1. Kumutswa kwevakafa

(1) Muna Kristu vose vachamutswa

Sezvo muna Adhamu vose vanofa, saizvozvowo muna Kristu vose vachararamiswa. ( 1 VaKorinte 15:22 )

(2)Vakafa vachamutswa

Kwechinguva, mukubwaira kweziso, Kana hwamanda yarira kekupedzisira . Nokuti hwamanda icharira. Vakafa vachamutswa vasingafi , tinofanirawo kuchinja. ( 1 VaKorinte 15:52 )

(3) Vakafa muna Kristu vachatanga kumutswa

Zvino tinozvireva kwamuri maererano neshoko raIshe: Isu vapenyu uye tichiri kusvika pakuuya kwaIshe, hatizotangiri vakarara. Nekuti Ishe amene uchaburuka kubva kudenga nekudanidzira, nenzwi remutumwa mukuru, nehwamanda yaMwari; Vakafa muna Kristu vachatanga kumutswa . Chirevo ( 1 VaTesaronika 4:15-16 )

2. Chakaora, pfekai chisingaori

【Pfeka kusafa】

Izvi zvinoora zvinofanira kuva (kuva: chinyorwa chepakutanga ndicho kupfeka Zvakafanana pazasi) Haafi , ichi chinofa chinofanira kuva chisingafi. ( 1 VaKorinde 15:53 )

3. Zvinoshoreka ( Change ) kuva nembiri

(1)Isu tiri vagari vokudenga

Asi isu tiri vagari vokudenga , uye kumirira Muponesi, Ishe Jesu Kristu, kuti auye kubva kudenga. Reference (VaFiripi 3:20)

(2) kuzvininipisa →chinja chimiro

Iye achatigadzira Muviri wakazvininipisa unochinja chimiro , wakafanana nomuviri Wake amene une mbiri. Reference (VaFiripi 3:21)

4. (Rufu) rwakamedzwa noupenyu hwaKristu

bvunza: (Rufu) rwakamedzwa nani?
mhinduro: " kufa " Kumutswa naKristu uye kumedzwa nehupenyu hwekukunda .

(1)Rufu rwakamedzwa nokukunda

Kana ichi chinoora chapfeka kusaora, uye ichi chinofa chafuka kusafa, ipapo kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: Mashoko okuti “rufu rwakamedzwa mukukunda” akazadzika. . ( 1 VaKorinte 15:54 )

(2) Chinofa ichi chinomedzwa neupenyu

Patinogomera nokushanda mutende, hatidi kubvisa izvi, asi kuti tifuke icho. kuti ichi chinofa chimedzwe neupenyu . (2 VaKorinde 5:4)

5. Kududza kusangana naShe mumakore

【 Kubvutwa kweVakristu Vapenyu 】

Kubva zvino tichienda Avo vari vapenyu uye vakasara vachatorwa pamwe chete navo mumakore , vachisangana naShe mudenga. Nenzira iyi, tichava naShe nokusingaperi. Chirevo (1 VaTesaronika 4:17)

6. Zvechokwadi tichaona chimiro chechokwadi chaIshe

【 Kana Ishe vaonekwa, miviri yedu inobudawo 】
→ → Tinofanira kuona chimiro chake chechokwadi!

Hama dzinodikanwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvichigere kuratidzwa zvatichazove mune ramangwana, asi tinoziva kuti Kana Ishe akazviratidza, isu tichafanana naye, nokuti tichamuona sezvaari . Reference (1 Johane 3:2)

7. Tichava naShe nokusingaperi! Ameni

(1) Mwari achava nesu pachedu

Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi guru richibva pachigaro cheushe, richiti: Tarirai, tabhenakeri yaMwari iri pakati pevanhu, iye uchagara navo, uye ivo vachava vanhu vake; Mwari pachake achava navo uye achava Mwari wavo . Reference (Zvakazarurwa 21:3)

(2) Hapasisina rufu

Mwari uchapisika misodzi yose pameso avo; hapasisina rufu , uye hapachazovi nokuchema, kana kuchema, kana kurwadziwa, nokuti zvinhu zvakare zvapfuura. (Zvakazarurwa 21:4)

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. . Vakaparidza evhangeri yaJesu Kristu, inova Vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe ! Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kuuya kwechipiri kwaJesu" Aihwa. 2 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Vana vaMwari vese ngavanzwisise zuva iroro 1 Gwayana rinozarura zvisimbiso zvinomwe. 2 Vatumwa vanomwe vakaridza hwamanda dzavo. 3 Ngirozi nomwe dzakadurura ndiro, uye zvinhu zvakavanzika zvaMwari zvakazadzikiswa - uye ipapo Ishe Jesu Kristu akauya! Ameni . Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Gwayana rinozarura chisimbiso chechinomwe

Kana Gwayana richizarura chisimbiso chechinomwe , denga rakanyarara kwenguva dzinenge mbiri. Ipapo ndakaona vatumwa vanomwe vamire pamberi paMwari; kukapiwa kwavari hwamanda nomwe. Chirevo (Zvakazarurwa 8:1-2)

bvunza: Chii chakaitika kweinenge nhambo mbiri dzokunyarara mudenga?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Pane hwamanda nomwe dzakapiwa ngirozi nomwe
(2) Vatsvene vose vakapfeka hwema hwaKristu uye vauye pamberi paMwari
(3) Mutumwa akatora mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira, akauzadza nomoto waibva paatari, akaudururira pasi .

Mumwe mutumwa akauya nechirongo chegoridhe, akamira parutivi rwearitari. Zvino kukapiwa kwaari zvinonhuhwira zvizhinji, kuti azvipe pamwe neminyengetero yevatsvene vose paaritari yendarama pamberi pechigaro cheushe. Utsi hwezvinonhuhwira hwakakwira kuna Mwari kubva muruoko rwomutumwa uye neminyengetero yavatsvene. . Mutumwa akatora mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira, akauzadza nomoto waibva paaritari, akaidururira panyika; Chirevo (Zvakazarurwa 8:3-5)

2. Ngirozi yechinomwe inoridza hwamanda

(1)Hwamanda yakarira kwazvo kekupedzisira
(2) Umambo hwenyika ino hwava umambo hwaShe wedu naKristu Wake
(3) Jesu Kristu achatonga samambo nokusingaperi-peri
(4) Vakuru makumi maviri nevana vanonamata Mwari

Mutumwa wechinomwe akaridza hwamanda yake, uye inzwi guru richibva kudenga richiti: Humambo hwenyika ino hwava humambo hwaIshe wedu nehwaKristu wake Achatonga nokusingaperi-peri. Vakuru makumi maviri navana vakanga vagere pazvigaro zvavo pamberi paMwari vakawira pasi nezviso zvavo, vakanamata Mwari, vachiti, Jehovha Mwari Wamasimba Ose, wakanga aripo, uripo, tinokutendai; Nokuti une simba guru uye wava mambo. articles.title: Kuuya kwechipiri kwaJesu (Chidzidzo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Mateo Chitsauko 24 uye ndima 30 tiverenge pamwe chete: Panguva iyoyo chiratidzo choMwanakomana woMunhu chichaonekwa kudenga, uye marudzi ose enyika achachema. Vachaona Mwanakomana woMunhu achiuya ari pamakore okudenga nesimba nokubwinya kukuru .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kuuya kwechipiri kwaJesu" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu, kuzarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, uye kutigonesa kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya: Vana vose ngavanzwisise zuva iroro uye vamirire kuuya kwaIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Ishe Jesu anouya ari mugore

bvunza: Ishe Jesu vakauya sei?
Mhinduro: Kuuya kumakore!

(1) Tarirai, ari kuuya ari mumakore
(2) Meso ose anoda kumuona
(3) Vachaona Mwanakomana woMunhu achiuya ari pamakore okudenga nesimba nokubwinya kukuru.

Tarirai! Anouya ari pamakore ! Meso ose achamuona, kunyange naivo vakamubaya; uye marudzi ose enyika achachema nokuda kwake. Ichi ichokwadi. Ameni! Reference (Zvakazarurwa 1:7)

Panguva iyoyo chiratidzo choMwanakomana woMunhu chichaonekwa kudenga, uye marudzi ose enyika achachema. Vachaona Mwanakomana woMunhu ane simba nokubwinya kukuru. Kuuya pamakore kubva kudenga . Chirevo ( Mateo 24:30 )

2. Kuti akafamba sei, achauya sei zvakare

(1) Jesu akakwira kudenga

bvunza: Jesu akakwira sei kudenga pashure pokumutswa kwake?
mhinduro: Gore rakamutora
(Jesu) akati ataura izvi, uye pavakanga vakatarisa, Akatorwa , Gore rakamutora , uye haachaoneki. Reference (Mabasa 1:9)

(2) Ngirozi dzakapupura kuti akauya sei

bvunza: Ishe Jesu vakauya sei?
mhinduro: Sezvamamuona achikwira kudenga, saizvozvo achauyazve.

Zvino wakati achikwira, vakatarisisa kudenga, pakarepo varume vaviri vakapfeka nguvo chena vakamirapo vakati: Varume veGarirea, makamirirei makatarira kudenga? Uyu Jesu, wakabviswa kwamuri achikwidzwa kudenga; , Sezvamamuona achikwira kudenga, saizvozvo achadzoka saizvozvo . (Mabasa 1:10-11)

Chechitatu: Kana njodzi dzemazuva iwayo dzapera

(1) Zuva richasviba, mwedzi hauzopi chiedza chawo, uye nyeredzi dzichawa kudenga. .

bvunza: Njodzi yacho ichapera rini?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 Chiono cheMazuva 2300 — Dhanieri 8:26
2 Mazuva iwayo achatapudzwa — Mateu 24:22
3 gore rimwe, makore maviri, hafu yegore — Dhanieri 7:25
4 Panofanira kuva nemazuva 1290 - —Dhan. 12:11.

" Kana njodzi yemazuva iwayo yapera , zuva richasvibiswa, nemwedzi hauchazopi chiedza chawo, nyeredzi dzichawa kudenga, nemasimba ekumatenga achazungunuswa. Chirevo ( Mateo 24:29 )

(2) Magetsi matatu achadzokera kumashure

Pazuva iro, hapazovi nechiedza, uye zviedza zvitatu zvichadzokera shure . Zuva iro richazikamwa kuna Jehovha; Chirevo ( Zekaria 14:6-7 )

4. Panguva iyoyo chiratidzo choMwanakomana woMunhu chichaonekwa kudenga

bvunza: Chii Omen Kuonekwa kudenga?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Mheni inotangira kumabvazuva uye inopenya kumadokero

Mheni inobva kumabvazuva , ichipenya zvakananga kumadokero. Ndizvo zvazvichaita pakuuya kwoMwanakomana woMunhu. Chiratidzo ( Mateu 24:27 )

(2) Hwamanda yengirozi yakarira kwazvo kekupedzisira

Achatuma vatumwa vake. Kurira nehwamanda , achiunganidza vanhu vake vakasarudzwa kubva kumativi ose (square: mhepo mumashoko ekutanga), kubva kune rumwe rutivi rwedenga kusvika kune rumwe rutivi rwedenga. ( Mateu 24:31 )

(3) Zvinhu zvose zviri kudenga nepanyika uye nepasi penyika zvichaona Mwanakomana woMunhu achiuya ari mumakore nesimba nokubwinya kukuru. .

Panguva iyoyo, Chiratidzo choMwanakomana woMunhu chichaonekwa kudenga Kwirai, uye marudzi ose enyika achachema. Vachaona Mwanakomana woMunhu achiuya ari pamakore okudenga nesimba nokubwinya kukuru. Chirevo ( Mateo 24:30 )

5. Kuuya nevatumwa vose

bvunza: Jesu akauya nani paakauya?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Avo vakavata muna Jesu vanounganidzwa
Kana tichitenda kuti Jesu akafa akamukazve, kunyange vaya vakavata muna Jesu Mwari achavauyisawo pamwe chete naye. Chirevo (1 VaTesaronika 4:14)

(2) Kuuya nenhume dzese
Kana Mwanakomana woMunhu achiuya mukubwinya kwaBaba vake navatumwa vake vanaye, achapa mubayiro mumwe nomumwe maererano namabasa ake. Chiratidzo ( Mateu 16:27 )

(3) Kuuya kwezviuru zvevatsvene zvakaunzwa naIshe
Enoki, muzukuru wechinomwe waAdhamu, akaporofita nezveava vanhu, achiti: “Tarirai, Ishe ari kuuya nezviuru zvavatsvene vake ( Judhasi 1:14 .

6 Sezvazvakanga zvakaita pamazuva aNoa, ndizvo zvazvichaitawo kana Mwanakomana woMunhu asvika

Sezvazvakanga zvakaita pamazuva aNoa, ndizvo zvazvichaitawo kana Mwanakomana woMunhu asvika. Mumazuva Mafashamo asati auya, vanhu vaidya, vachinwa, vachiroora uye vachiroorwa semazuva ose kusvikira zuva rakapinda Noa muareka vasingazivi, mafashamo akasvika akavakukura vose. Ndizvo zvazvichaita pakuuya kwoMwanakomana woMunhu. ( Mateu 24:37-39 )

7. Jesu akatasva bhiza jena uye anouya nemauto ose okudenga.

Ndakatarisa ndikaona matenga akazaruka. Kune bhiza jena, uye uyo akaritasva anonzi akatendeseka uye ane chokwadi Jehovha anotonga nokurwa nokururama. Meso ake akaita semurazvo womoto, uye pamusoro wake pane korona zhinji; Akanga akapfeka nguo dzakatsakatika ropa; zita rake rakanga riri Shoko raMwari. Hondo dzose dzokudenga dzinomutevera, dzakatasva mabhiza machena uye dzakapfeka rineni yakapfava, chena isina tsvina. Mumuromo make munobuda munondo unopinza kuti arove marudzi. Achatonga pamusoro pavo netsvimbo yedare, uye achatsika chisviniro chewaini yokutsamwa kwaMwari Wamasimba Ose. Panguo yake napachidya chake pakanga pakanyorwa zita rokuti: “Mambo wamadzimambo naShe wamadzishe.” ( Zvakazarurwa 19:11-16 )

8 Asi hapana anoziva zuva iro nenguva.

(1) Hapana anoziva zuva iroro neawa .
(2) Hazvisi zvenyu kuziva mazuva akagadzwa naBaba .
(3) Baba chete ndivo vanoziva .

Zvino vakati vaungana, vakabvunza Jesu, vachiti: Ishe, modzosera ushe kuvaIsraeri nenguva ino here? Hazvisi zvenyu kuziva nguva nemisi zvakatemwa naBaba nesimba ravo vamene. . Nhungamiro ( Mabasa 1:6-7 )

“Asi zvezuva iro nenguva iyo hakuna unozviziva, kunyange ngirozi dziri kudenga, kana Mwanakomana; Baba chete ndivo vanoziva . Chirevo (Mateo 24: Chitsauko 36)

articles.title: “Muranda Anotambudzika”
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 8 ndima 16-17 todziverenga pamwe chete: Mweya Mutsvene unopupurirana nomweya wedu, kuti tiri vana vaMwari; Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete “Muranda Anotambudzika” Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Kana tikatambura pamwe chete naKristu, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye! Ameni !

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Kutambura kwaJesu Kristu

(1) Jesu akaberekwa uye akarara muchidyiro chezvipfuwo

bvunza: Kuzvarwa nekugadzwa kwaMambo ane mbiri weChisiko chapose pose kwaiva kupi?
mhinduro: Kurara muchidyiro
Mutumwa akati kwavari: Musatya; ndinokuparidzirai mashoko akanaka emufaro mukuru uchava kuvanhu vose; nekuti mazvarirwa nhasi Muponesi, iye Kristu Ishe, muguta raDhavhidhi; Mucheche, kusanganisira Kuzvifukidza nemicheka nokuvata muchidyiro chiratidzo.” (Ruka 2:10-12)

(2) Kutora chimiro chemuranda uye kuitwa mumufananidzo wemunhu

bvunza: Muponesi Jesu akaita sei?
mhinduro: akatora chimiro chemuranda, akaitwa mumufananidzo wemunhu
Kufunga kwenyu ngakuve mamuri, kwaivawo muna Kristu Jesu: Iye kunyange ane chimiro chaMwari, haana kufunga kuti kuenzana naMwari chinhu chingabatisiswa, asi akazvidurura, akatora chimiro chemuranda, akazvarwa ari munhu. mufananidzo (VaFiripi) Bhuku 2, ndima 5-7)

(3) Kutizira kuIjipiti pashure pokutambudzwa

Zvino vakati vaenda, mutumwa waIshe akazviratidza kuna Josefa muchiroto, akati: Simuka, tora mwana namai vake, utizire Egipita, ugare ikoko kusvikira ndakuudza; nekuti Herodhe uchatsvaka mwanakomana. kuti vamuuraye.” Saka Josefa akasimuka akatora mwana namai vake usiku akaenda kuIjipiti, kwavakandogara kusvikira Herodhi afa. Izvi zvinozadzisa zvakataurwa naShe kubudikidza nomuprofita achiti: “Ndakadana Mwanakomana wangu kuti abude muIjipiti.” ( Mateu 2:13-15 )

(4) Akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa kuti aponese vanhu kubva kuchivi

1 Chivi chavose chakaiswa pamusoro pake

Mubvunzo: Chivi chedu chakaiswa pana ani?
Mhinduro: Chivi chevanhu vose chakaiswa pana Jesu Kristu.
Isu tose takanga takarasika samakwai; Jehovha akaisa pamusoro pake kuipa kwedu tose. Chiratidzo ( Isaya 53:6 )

2 Akatungamirirwa segwayana rinoiswa kunobayiwa

Akadzvinyirirwa, asi haana kushamisa muromo wake pakutambudzika kwake, akatungamirirwa segwayana rinoiswa kundobayiwa, uye segwai rinyerere pamberi pavaveuri varo, naizvozvo haana kushamisa muromo wake. Akabviswa nokuda kwokudzvinyirirwa uye nokuda kwokutongwa. ( Isaya 53:7-8 )

3 kurufu, kunyange rufu pamuchinjikwa

akati awanikwa ane chimiro chomunhu, akazvininipisa uye akateerera kusvikira parufu, irwo rufu pamuchinjikwa. Naizvozvo Mwari akamukudza zvikuru, akamupa zita riri pamusoro pemazita ose, kuti muzita raJesu mabvi ose apfugame, ari kudenga napanyika, napasi penyika, nendimi dzose dziti, “Jesu Kristu ndiye Ishe.” kuti Mwari Baba vakudzwe. Reference (VaFiripi 2:8-11)

2: Vaapostora vakatambura vachiparidza vhangeri

(1) Muapostora Pauro akatambura paaiparidza evhangeri

Ishe akati kuna Ananiasi: "Enda mberi! Ndiye mudziyo wangu wandakasanangura kuti apupurire zita rangu pamberi pavaHedheni namadzimambo uye navana vaIsraeri. Ndichamuratidzawo (Pauro) zvinofanira kuitwa nokuda kwezita rangu." Kutambura zvikuru” Reference ( Mabasa 9:15-16 ).

(2) Vaapostora vose nevadzidzi vakatambudzwa uye vakaurayiwa

1 Stefano akaurairwa kutenda --Verenga Mabasa 7:54-60
2 Jakobho, mukoma waJohani, akaurayiwa --Verenga Mabasa 12:1-2
3 Petro anourawa —Verenga 2 Petro 1:13-14
4 Pauro anourawa
Ini zvino ndiri kudururwa sechipiriso, uye nguva yokuenda kwangu yasvika. Ndarwa kurwa kwakanaka, ndapedza nhangemutange, ndachengeta kutenda; kubva zvino, ndakachengeterwa korona yokururama, yandichapiwa naShe, unotonga zvakarurama, nezuva iro; ( 2 Timotio 4:6-8 )
5 Vaprofita vakaurayiwa
“Iwe Jerusarema, Jerusarema, iwe unouraya vaprofita uye uchitaka nematombo vaya vakatumwa kwauri, kangani kandaida kuunganidza vana vako, sezvinoita huku inounganidza nhiyo dzayo pasi pemapapiro ayo, asi iwe unoramba 23:37)

3. Vashumiri vaMwari nevashandi vanotambura pavanenge vachiparidza evhangeri

(1)Jesu akatambura

Zvirokwazvo, akatakura matenda edu, uye akatakura kurwadziswa kwedu; Asi akakuvadzwa nokuda kwokudarika kwedu, akarwadziwa nokuda kwezvakaipa zvedu. Nokuranga kwake tinoponeswa; ( Isaya 53:4-5 )

(2) Vashandi vaMwari vanotambura pavanoparidza evhangeri

1 Havana kunaka kwakanaka
2 Kutarisa zvakanyanya kuoma kupfuura vamwe
3 Havadaidzi kana kusimudza manzwi avo ,
kana kuita kuti manzwi avo anzwike mumigwagwa
4 Vakazvidzwa uye vakarambwa nevamwe
5 Marwadzo mazhinji, urombo, nekudzungaira
6 kazhinji vanosuwa
(Pasina tsime remari, chikafu, zvipfeko, pekugara uye zvekufambisa matambudziko ese)
7 kutambudzwa
(“ kugamuchira kwemukati "→→ Vaprofita venhema, hama dzenhema dzinochera uye kuumba chitendero;" kugamuchirwa kwekunze "→→ Tichitungamirirwa namambo wepanyika, kubva pamhepo kusvika pakutonga kwepasi pevhu, takasangana nezvipingamupinyi, kushorwa, kupomerwa, vekunze vasingatendi, uye kumwe kutambudzwa kwakawanda.)
8 Vanovhenekerwa neMweya Mutsvene uye vanoparidza chokwadi cheevhangeri →→ Bhaibheri. Kana mashoko aMwari avhurwa, mapenzi anogona kunzwisisa, kuponeswa, uye kuva nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni!

Mweya Mutsvene unopupurirana nomweya wedu, kuti tiri vana vaMwari; Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. Chiratidzo ( VaRoma 8:16-17 )

Chimbo chemhepo chaishandiswa kuendesa mirairo muuto mumazuva ekare chaive muchimiro chechubhu ine chubhu yakaonda uye muromo mukuru Yakatanga kugadzirwa neshenjere, huni, nezvimwewo, uye gare gare yakagadzirwa nemhangura, sirivha kana goridhe.

Panguva iyoyo Mambo Herodhi akakuvadza vanhu vakawanda mukereke uye akauraya mukoma waJohani Jakobho nebakatwa. Magwaro ( Mabasa 12:1-2 )

3 vatsvene vakaurawa
Vamwe vakatsungirira kusekwa, nokurohwa, ngetani, nokuiswa mutorongo, nemimwe miedzo, vakatakwa namabwe kusvikira vafa, vakatemwa nesaha, vakaidzwa, vakaurawa nomunondo, vakafamba vakafuka matehwe amakwai nembudzi, vakatambudzika nourombo, nokutambudzika, nokukuvadzwa; ( VaHebheru 11:36-37 )

Zvakazarurwa 6:11 Ipapo mumwe nomumwe wavo akapiwa nguvo chena, vakaudzwa kuti vambozorora chinguva chiduku, kusvikira varanda pamwe navo nehama dzavo dzaizourawa saivo; zvinogona kuzadzikiswa.

( Zekaria 3:3-4 )

Kubva panguva yokubviswa kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nokumiswa kwechinonyangadza chinoparadza, zvichaita mazuva ane chiuru chimwe namazana maviri namakumi mapfumbamwe. ( Dhanieri 12:11 )

(5) Mambo Mikaeri achasimuka

“Ipapo Mikaeri, mutumwa mukuru, anochengeta vanhu vako, achasimuka, uye pachava nenhamo huru, isina kumbovapo kubva pakutanga kworudzi urwu kusvikira panguva ino bhuku richaponeswa ( Dhanieri 12: 1 ).

(6)Mazuva chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemashanu

Wakaropafadzwa unomirira kusvikira pazuva rechuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matatu neshanu. Chirevo (Danieri 12:12)

(7)Viga mashoko aya uname bhuku iri

Vakawanda vevaya vakarara muguruva renyika vachamuka. Pakati pavo pane vamwe vane upenyu husingaperi, uye vamwe vanonyadziswa uye vanosemwa nokusingaperi... Danieri, unofanira Viga mashoko aya, simbisa bhuku iri , kusvikira kumagumo. Vazhinji vachange vachimhanya uko nekudzoka (kana kuturikirwa se: kudzidza nemoyo wose), uye ruzivo ruchawedzera. ( Dhanieri 12:2-4 )

3. Mupumburu wakanamwa ne[zvisimbiso zvinomwe]

(1) Ndiani akakodzera kuvhura mupumburu nokusunungura zvisimbiso zvawo zvinomwe?

Zvino ndakaona muruoko rwerudyi rwaiye wakange agere pachigaro cheushe bhuku rakanyorwa mukati nekunze kwekunze, rakanamwa nezvisimbiso zvinomwe. Ipapo ndakaona mutumwa ane simba achidanidzira nenzwi guru, achiti: Ndiani wakafanira kuzarura bhuku nokusunungura zvisimbiso zvaro?

(2) Johane paakaona kuti pakanga pasina munhu akafanira kuzarura bhuku racho, akachema zvikuru

Hakuna kudenga kana panyika, kana pasi penyika, ungagona kuzarura bhuku kana kutarira mariri. Nokuti pakanga pasina munhu akakodzera kuvhura kana kutarira mupumburu wacho, ndakasvimha misodzi. Chirevo (Zvakazarurwa 5:3-4)

(3) Vakuru vakaudza Johani kuti ndiani aigona kuzarura zvisimbiso zvinomwe

Zvino mumwe wavakuru akati kwandiri: Usachema; tarira, Shumba yerudzi rwaJudha, Mudzi waDhavhidhi; (Gwayana) Akakunda , Kukwanisa kuzarura mupumburu nekuzarura zvisimbiso zvinomwe . (Zvakazarurwa 5:5)

(4)Zvisikwa zvina

Pamberi pechigaro chovushe pakanga pakaita segungwa regirazi, rakafanana nekristaro. Pachigaro cheushe, nepakapoteredza chigaro cheushe paiva nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, zvizere nemeso mberi neshure. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 4:6)

bvunza: Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chii?
mhinduro: Ngirozi- makerubhi .

Kerubhi rimwe nerimwe rakanga rine zviso zvina: chokutanga chakanga chiri chiso chekerubhi, chechipiri chakanga chiri chiso chomunhu, chechitatu chakanga chiri chiso cheshumba, uye chechina chakanga chiri chiso chegondo. . Chirevo ( Ezekieri 10:14 )

(5) Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvinofananidzira evhangeri ina

bvunza: Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvinofananidzirei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Chisikwa chipenyu chekutanga chakanga chakaita seshumba;
Kufananidzira Evhangeri yaMateu →→ Jesu ndimambo
Chisikwa chipenyu chechipiri chakanga chakaita semhuru
Kufananidzira Evhangeri yaMako →→ Jesu muranda
Chisikwa chipenyu chechitatu chakange chine chiso chakaita sechomunhu;
Kufananidzira Evhangeri yaRuka →→ Jesu mwanakomana woMunhu
Chisikwa chipenyu chechina chakanga chakafanana negondo rinobhururuka;
Kufananidzira Evhangeri yaJohani →→ jesu ndimwari

(6)Makona manomwe nemaziso manomwe

bvunza: Ko makona manomwe nemeso manomwe zvinorevei?
mhinduro: " Makona manomwe nemeso manomwe "ndizvo mweya minomwe yaMwari .

Cherechedza: " mweya minomwe ” Asi meso aJehovha anotarira-tarira kumativi ose enyika yose.
Chirevo (Zekaria 4:10)

bvunza: Zvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe chii?
mhinduro: " Zvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe “Ndiwo makereke manomwe.

bvunza: Zviedza zvinomwe zvinorevei?
mhinduro: " zviedza zvinomwe " wo zvinoreva mweya minomwe yaMwari

bvunza: Nyeredzi Nomwe zvinorevei?
mhinduro: " nyeredzi nomwe “Makereke manomwe messenger .

Zvino ndakaona chigaro cheushe, nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, neGwayana rimire pakati pevakuru, rakange rakabayiwa; Makona manomwe nemeso manomwe ,ndizvo mweya minomwe yaMwari , Yakatumirwa munyika yose . Reference (Zvakazarurwa 5:6 na1:20)

Zvakazarurwa [5:7-8] Izvi gwayana Iro rikauya, rikatora bhuku muruoko rwerudyi rwaiye wakange agere pachigaro cheushe. Akatora mupumburu , uye zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina nevakuru makumi maviri nevana vakawira pasi pamberi peGwayana, mumwe nomumwe akabata rudimbwa nehari yendarama yakanga izere nezvinonhuhwira waiva munyengetero wevatsvene vose.

bvunza: Chii chinonzi "Qin" chinorevei?
mhinduro: Vakarumbidza Mwari nekurira kwembira.

bvunza: “Kunhuhwirira” kunorevei?
mhinduro: izvi zvinonhuhwirira Ndiwo munamato wevatsvene vose! zvinogamuchirika kuna Mwari mweya chibayiro.
Kuvatsvene vose nziyo dzomweya imba nziyo dzokurumbidza, mukati Namata muMweya Mutsvene .namata!
Kana imi (ivo) muchiuya kuna Ishe, nemiwo makaita samatombo mapenyu, ari kuvakwa muve imba yemweya kuti mushumire savaprista vatsvene. Ipai zvibayiro zvomudzimu zvinogamuchirika kuna Mwari nokuna Jesu Kristu . Reference Peter (1 Bhuku 2:5)

(7) Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina nevakuru makumi maviri nevana vanoimba rwiyo rutsva

1 Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvinoimba rwiyo rutsva;

bvunza: Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zviri kuimba rwiyo rutsva zvinofananidzirei?
mhinduro: Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvinofananidzira: " Evhangeri yaMateo, Evhangeri yaMarko, Evhangeri yaRuka, Evhangeri yaJohane ”→Gwayana raMwari rinotumira vadzidzi kuburikidza nechokwadi cheevhangeri ina, uye maKristu ichokwadi chevhangeri chinoponesa vanhu vose uye chinopararira munyika yose kusvika kumigumo yenyika.

[Zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvinoimba rwiyo rutsva] runofananidzira Mwari gwayana shandisa yako Ropa Imbai rwiyo rutsva, rwakatengwa kubva kumarudzi ose, nendimi dzose, navanhu vose uye nendudzi dzose. → Pashure peizvi ndakaona, uye tarira, boka guru revanhu, vakanga vasingagoni kuverengwa nomunhu, vaibva kumarudzi ose, madzinza, vanhu, nendimi, vamire pamberi pechigaro choumambo nepamberi peGwayana, vakapfeka nguo refu chena, vakabata mapazi emichindwe mumaoko avo. , vachidanidzira nenzwi guru vachiti: “Ruponeso ngaruve kuna Mwari unogara pachigaro choumambo, uye kuGwayana! pamberi pechigaro cheushe, vachinamata kwasara Mwari, anoti: “Ameni! Kurumbidzwa, nokubwinya, nouchenjeri, nokuonga, nokukudzwa, nesimba, nesimba ngazvive kuna Mwari nokusingaperi-peri. Ameni ( Zvakazarurwa 7:9-12 )

2 Vakuru makumi maviri nevana

bvunza: Vakuru makumi maviri nevana ndivanaani?
mhinduro: Izirayeri 12 Tribe + gwayana 12 mupostori

Testamende Yekare: Madzinza Gumi Nembiri aIsraeri

Kwakanga kune rusvingo rurefu, unamasuwo anegumi namaviri, napamasuwo pakanga pane vatumwa vane gumi navaviri, napamasuwo pakanga pakanyorwa. Mazita emarudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri . Reference (Zvakazarurwa 21:12)

Testamente Itsva: Vaapostora Gumi neVaviri

Rusvingo rwakanga rune nheyo gumi nembiri, uye pamusoro penheyo dzakanga dziri Mazita evaapositori gumi nevaviri vegwayana . Reference (Zvakazarurwa 21:14)

3 Vanoimba nziyo itsva;

Vakaimba rwiyo rutsva, vachiti: Ndimwi makafanira kutora bhuku nekuzarura zvisimbiso zvaro; navaprista Mwari anotonga pamusoro penyika.” Uye ndakaona uye ndikanzwa inzwi revatumwa vazhinji vakanga vakakomberedza chigaro choumambo nezvisikwa zvipenyu navakuru, zviuru nezviuru zvavo mukuwanda, vachiti nenzwi guru: “Gwayana rakakodzera, rinoita serinoti akaurayiwa , pfuma, uchenjeri, simba, kukudzwa, kubwinya, kurumbidzwa. Uye ndakanzwa zvinhu zvose zviri kudenga nezviri panyika napasi penyika nezviri mugungwa nezvisikwa zvose zvichiti: “Kuna iye anogara pachigaro choumambo nokuGwayana ngakuve nokurumbidzwa nokukudzwa nokubwinya nesimba nokusingaperi-peri! Ipapo zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvakati: Ameni. Chirevo (Zvakazarurwa 5:9-14)

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. . articles.title: Zviratidzo zvekudzoka kwaJesu (Mufananidzo 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Dhanieri chitsauko 8 ndima 26 tiverenge pamwe chete: Chiratidzo chemazuva 2,300 ndechechokwadi , Asi iwe unofanirwa kuisa chisimbiso ichi chiratidzo, nekuti chine chekuita nemazuva mazhinji ari kuuya. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Zviratidzo zveKudzoka kwaJesu" Aihwa. 7 Ngatinamatei: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa chiono chemazuva 2300 chiri muna Danieri uye chizarurire kuvana vako vose. Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Chiratidzo cheZuva 2300

Gore rimwe, makore maviri, hafu yegore

1. Mutadzi mukuru anokunda nyika

(1) Kutora nyika kana vamwe vasina kugadzirira

bvunza: Mutadzi mukuru anowana umambo sei?
mhinduro: Akashandisa unyengeri kubvuta umambo apo vanhu vakanga vasina kugadzirira
“Munhu unozvidzwa uchamuka panzvimbo yake somambo, usina kupiwa kukudzwa koushe, asi uyo uchakunda ushe namashoko anonyengera, kana asina kugadzirira. ( Dhanieri 11:21 )

(2) Iva mubatsiri nedzimwe nyika

Hondo dzisingaverengeki dzichafanana namafashamu, uye dzichaparadzwa pamberi pake; Mushure mokunge aita sungano nomuchinda iyeye, achaita nounyengeri, nokuti achabva kuhondo duku kuti ave nesimba. ( Dhanieri 11:22-23 )

(3) Kupa vanhu chiokomuhomwe nepfuma

Achauya kunzvimbo yakaorera yenyika, vanhu vachiri vapenyu uye vasina kugadzirira, uye achaita zvisina kumboitwa nemadzibaba ake, kana madzibaba amadzibaba avo, uye achaparadzira zvakapambwa nezvakapambwa nepfuma pakati pevanhu, uye iye achatonga. gadzira magadzirirwo eAtack, asi izvi ndezvenguva pfupi. ... Achavimba norubatsiro rwavamwari vokumwe kuti aputse nhare dzakasimba kwazvo. Kuna vanomuziva, achavapa kukudzwa, achivapa ushe pamusoro pavanhu vazhinji, achivapa nyika sefufuro. (Danieri 11:24,39)

(4) Bvisai zvipiriso zvinopiswa zvenguva dzose, musvibise nzvimbo tsvene, muzvikudze

Achamutsa hondo, vachamhura nzvimbo tsvene, iyo nhare, vachabvisa chipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, ndokumutsa chinonyangadza chinoparadza. ... “Mambo achaita chero zvaanoda, uye achazvikwidziridza pamusoro pavamwari vose, uye achataura mashoko asinganzwisisike pamusoro paMwari wavamwari, iye achabudirira kusvikira kutsamwa kwaJehovha kwapera, nokuti zvaakatema zvichaitika .Haazovi nehanya nezvaMwari wamadzibaba ake, kana Mwari anodiwa navakadzi, nokuti achazvikwidziridza kupfuura zvimwe zvinhu zvose ( Dhanieri 11:31, 36-37 ).

(5) Vatsvene vachawa nebakatwa rake

Achashandisa mashoko akachenjera kuti atsause avo vanoita zvakaipa nokuputsa sungano; Vakachenjera pakati pavanhu vachadzidzisa vazhinji; kunyange zvakadaro vachaurawa nomunondo mazuva mazhinji, kana kupiswa nomoto, kana kutapwa nokupambwa. Pavakadonha, vakabatsirwa zvishoma, asi vanhu vakawanda vakauya kwavari nemashoko ekubata kumeso. Vamwe vevakachenjera vakawa, kuti vamwe vanatswe, vave vakachena, uye vakachena kusvikira pakuguma; nekuti nenguva iyo chinhu ichi chichapera. ( Dhanieri 11:32-35 )

2. Panofanira kuva nenjodzi huru

bvunza: Njodzi ipi?
mhinduro: Kubva pakuvamba kwenyika kusvikira zvino, hakuna kumbova nenjodzi yakadaro, uye hakuna kumbova nenjodzi yakadaro kubvira ipapo. .

“Maona zvakataurwa nomuprofita Dhanieri achiti, ‘ nyangadzi yokuparadza ' mirai panzvimbo tsvene (Avo vanoverenga rugwaro urwu vanofanira kunzwisisa). Panguva iyoyo vari muJudhiya ngavatizire kumakomo; Vane nhamo vane mimba nevanomwisa nemazuva iwayo. Nyengeterai kuti pamunotiza parege kuva nechando kana sabata. Nokuti ipapo pachava nokutambudzika kukuru kubva pakutanga kwenyika kusvikira zvino, hakuna kumbovapo kutambudzika kwakadaro, uye hakuchazovipozve. . Chirevo ( Mateo 24:15-2 )

3. Mazuva zviuru zviviri nemazana matatu

bvunza: Mazuva mangani ane zviuru zviviri nemazana matatu mazuva?
mhinduro: Anopfuura makore matanhatu, anenge makore manomwe .

Ndakanzwa mumwe woMutsvene achitaura, uye mumwe Mutsvene akabvunza iye Mutsvene akataura, achiti, “Ndiani anobvisa chipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose nechivi chokuparadza, iye anotsika-tsika nzvimbo tsvene nehondo dzaIsraeri kusvikira riniko? tora kuti chiratidzo chizadziswe?” Akati kwandiri, “Mumazuva zviuru zviviri namazana matatu, nzvimbo tsvene ichanatswa... Chiratidzo chemazuva 2,300 ndechechokwadi , asi iwe unofanira kuisa chisimbiso ichi chiratidzo, nokuti chine chokuita namazuva mazhinji ari kuuya. ” Chirevo (Danieri 8:13-14 uye 8:26)

4. Mazuva iwayo achatapudzwa

bvunza: Mazuva api achapfupikiswa?
mhinduro: Mazuva 2300 ekutambudzika kukuru achapfupikiswa .

Nekuti ipapo pachava nekutambudzika kukuru, kusati kwakambovapo kwakadaro kubva pakutanga kwenyika kusvikira zvino, uye hakuchazovipozve. Kunze kwekuti mazuva iwayo apfupiswe, hakuna nyama ichaponeswa; Asi nokuda kwavasanangurwa, mazuva iwayo achatapudzwa . ( Mateu 24:21-22 )

Cherechedza: Ishe Jesu vakati: " Mazuva iwayo achatapudzwa "," zuva iroro " Rinoreva zuva ripi?

→→ inoreva muporofita Danieri achiona Njodzi kuona, Ngirozi Gabrieri Yakatsanangura 2300 mazuva Chiratidzo chacho ndechechokwadi, asi unofanira kuisa chisimbiso pachiratidzo ichi nokuti chine chokuita namazuva mazhinji ari kuuya.

( 2300 mazuva Chakavanzika hachigoni kunzwisiswa nepfungwa dzemunhu, ruzivo rwemunhu, kana huzivi hwevanhu Kana munhu asina Mweya Mutsvene ), zvisinei nokuti une ruzivo rwakadii kana ruzivo rwakadii, hauzombofi wakakwanisa kunzwisisa zvinhu zvekudenga nezvemweya)
Ndinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nerudo rwenyu, kutenda Ishe Jesu Kristu nenyasha dzenyu, uye ndinokutendai nekufemerwa kweMweya Mutsvene.
Titungamirirei muchokwadi chese →→ 2300 mazuva Mazuva ekutambudzika kukuru akaderedzwa , zvose zvakaratidzwa kwatiri isu vana vaMwari! Ameni.

Nekuti makereke mazhinji ekare " expositor "Zvose Handina kutsanangura zvakajeka Zvakataurwa nemuporofita Danieri " Chakavanzika che "Mazuva zviuru zviviri nemazana matatu" Zvazvinoreva ndezvekuti zvinokonzeresa kuti kereke ivhiringike zvakanyanya uye nedzidziso isiriyo. Hazvifanirwe kunge zvakadaro" Seventh-day Adventist " Ellen White Shandisa Neo-Confucianism yako kuverenga kuti kubva 456 BC kusvika 1844 BC, kuferefeta uye kutongwa kudenga kwakatanga.

Mashanu, gore, makore maviri, hafu yegore

(1) Mutadzi anoputsa simba revatsvene

bvunza: Zvichatora nguva yakadii kuti munhu wechivi aputse simba revatsvene?
mhinduro: Gore rimwe, makore maviri, hafu yegore
Ndakanzwa akanga amire pamusoro pemvura, akapfeka mucheka wakanaka, achisimudzira ruoko rwake rworuboshwe norudyi kudenga uye achipika naJehovha anorarama nokusingaperi, achiti: Gore rimwe, makore maviri, hafu yegore , kana simba revatsvene raparadzwa, zvinhu zvose izvi zvichazadziswa. ( Dhanieri 12:7 )

(2) Vatsvene vachaiswa mumaoko ake

Achataura mashoko okuzvikudza kuWokumusoro-soro, achatambudza vatsvene voWokumusoro-soro, uye achatsvaka kushandura nguva nemirayiro. Vatsvene vachaiswa mumaoko ake kwenguva, neimwe nguva, nehafu yenguva . ( Dhanieri 7:25 )

(3) Kutambudzwa kwevakadzi (kereke)

Shato yakati yaona kuti yakandwa pasi, yakatambudza mukadzi akanga azvara mwana mukomana. Naizvozvo mukadzi akapiwa mapapiro maviri egondo guru, kuti abhururukire kurenje kunzvimbo yake, achibva panyoka; Gore, maviri nehafu . Reference (Zvakazarurwa 12:13-14)

(4)Mazuva chiuru nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe

bvunza: Inguva yakareba sei gore rimwe, makore maviri, nehafu yegore?
mhinduro: mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe → Ndizvo ( Makore matatu nehafu )
Kubva panguva ichabviswa chipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nokumiswa kwechinonyangadza chinoparadza, pachava mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe . ( Dhanieri 12:11 )

Cherechedza: 2300 mazuva Kutambudzika kukuru ndekwechokwadi, Ishe Jesu akati: “Kunze kwokunge mazuva iwayo atapudzwa, hakuna nyama ichaponeswa; Asi nokuda kwavasanangurwa, mazuva iwayo achatapudzwa .

bvunza: Ndeapi mazuva ekuderedza njodzi?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 gore rimwe, makore maviri, hafu yegore
Reference (Zvakazarurwa 12:14 naDanieri 12:7)

2 mwedzi makumi mana nemiviri
Reference (Zvakazarurwa 11:2)

3 mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe
( Dhanieri 12:11 )

4 mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu
Reference (Zvakazarurwa 11:3 uye 12:6)

5 Mazuva ane chiuru chimwe namazana matatu namakumi matatu namashanu
Chirevo (Danieri 12:12)

6 Mazuva eKutambudzika → Makore matatu nehafu .
→→Chiratidzo chakaonekwa nomuprofita Dhanieri,
→ → Ngirozi Gabrieri inotsanangura 2300 mazuva Chiono chekutambudzika kukuru ndechechokwadi;
→→ Ishe Jesu vakati: “Nokuda kwevasanangurwa chete, mazuva iwayo achapfupiswa→→kuitira Makore matatu nehafu 】 Saka, wanzwisisa here?

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Danieri Chitsauko 7, ndima 2-3, todziverenga pamwe chete: Dhanieri akati, “Ndakaona chiratidzo usiku, uye ndakaona mhepo ina dzokudenga dzichisimuka uye dzichivhuvhuta pamusoro pegungwa. Mhuka huru ina dzakabuda mugungwa, chimwe nechimwe chine chimiro chakasiyana :

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Zviratidzo zveKudzoka kwaJesu" Aihwa. 6 Ngatinamatei: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nokubwinya, norudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Avo vanonzwisisa zvikara zvaDanieri naZvakazarurwa kuona .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni
