bvunza: " mhuka "Zvinorevei?"
mhinduro: " mhuka ” inoreva zita rekuti “nyoka”, dhiragoni, Satani, dhiyabhorosi, uye munhu anopesana naKristu ( Zvakazarurwa 20:2 )

bvunza: " mhuka "Zvinofananidzira chii?"
mhinduro: " mhuka “Zvinofananidzirawo humambo hwenyika ino, humambo hwaSatani.
1 Nyika yose iri mumaoko ewakaipa →Ona kuna 1 Johani 5:19
2 Marudzi ose enyika →Taura kuna Mateu 4:8
3 Humambo Hwenyika →Ngirozi yechinomwe yakaridza hwamanda yayo, uye kudenga kwakava nenzwi guru richiti, “Umambo hwenyika hwava umambo hwaShe wedu nohwaKristu wake, uye achatonga nokusingaperi-peri.” 15)

1. Mhuka huru ina dzakabuda mugungwa

Dhanieri [Chitsauko 7:2-3] Dhanieri akati: “Ndakaona chiratidzo usiku, uye ndakaona mhepo ina dzokudenga dzichisimuka uye dzichivhuvhuta pagungwa. Mhuka huru ina dzikabuda mugungwa, neimwe ine chimiro chakasiyana;

Yekutanga yakafanana neshumba → Humambo hweBhabhironi

Chakanga chine mapapiro egondo; zvino ndakati ndichitarira, mapapiro echikara akabviswa, chikara chikasimuka kubva pasi, chikamira nemakumbo maviri somunhu, chikawana moyo wechikara. Chirevo (Danieri 7:4)

Mhuka yechipiri yakafanana nebheya → Medhiya nePezhiya

Kwakanga kune imwe mhuka yakaita sebere, mhuka yechipiri, yakanga igere pairi, ine mbabvu nhatu mumuromo mayo. Mumwe akarayira chikara, “Simuka udye nyama zhinji.” ( Dhanieri 7:5 )

Mhuka yechitatu yakafanana neingwe → dhiyabhorosi wechiGiriki

Shure kwaizvozvo ndakatarira, ndikaona imwe mhuka yakanga yakafanana neingwe, ina mapapiro mana pamusana wayo akafanana neeshiri; mhuka iyi yakanga ine misoro mina, ikapiwa simba. Chirevo (Danieri 7:6)

Mhuka yechina yaityisa → Hushe hweRoma

Ipapo ndakaona pane zvandakaratidzwa usiku, ndikaona mhuka yechina, yaityisa kwazvo, ine simba guru, ine simba guru, yakanga ina meno makuru esimbi, ikapedza, nokutsenga zvakanga zvasara, nokutsika-tsika netsoka dzayo zvakanga zvasara. Ichi chikara chakasiyana zvikuru nemhuka nhatu dzokutanga chine nyanga gumi pamusoro pacho. Ndakati ndichitarira nyanga dzacho, ndikaona runyanga ruduku pakati padzo; Runyanga urwu rune meso, akafanana nameso omunhu, uye muromo unotaura mashoko okuwedzeredza. ( Dhanieri 7:7-8 )

Muranda akatsanangura zvakaratidzwa mhuka yechina.

bvunza: chechina" mhuka "Rinoreva ani?"
mhinduro: humambo hweRoma

(Cherechedza: Maererano nenhoroondo dzekare, kubva kuBhabhironi → Medhiya nePezhiya → Mambo wedhimoni rechiGiriki → Umambo hweRoma.)

bvunza: Mhuka yechina ine musoro " gumi jiao "Zvinorevei?"
mhinduro: Musoro une" gumi jiao “Ndiyo mhuka yechina ( humambo hweRoma ) achamuka pakati pamadzimambo gumi.

bvunza: Ndivanaani madzimambo gumi achamuka muUmambo hweRoma?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
27 BC - 395 AD → Hushe hweRoma
395 AD - 476 AD → Hushe hweRoma hwekuMadokero
395 AD - 1453 AD → Hushe hweKumabvazuva hweRoma
Hushe hweRoma hwekare hwaisanganisira: Italy, France, Germany, Spain, Portugal, Austria, Switzerland, Greece, Turkey, Iraq, Palestine, Egypt, Israel, neVatican. Uyewo nenyika dzakawanda dzakaparadzana neUmambo hweRoma, kusanganisira Russia yanhasi, United States, nedzimwe nyika dzakawanda.

bvunza: saka" gumi jiao " madzimambo gumi Ndiani?
mhinduro: Havasati vakunda nyika
bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Nokuti havasati vauya, asi kana vauya vachaonekwa uye vachawana umambo → kubva "Zvinofadza" Umambo hweBhabhironi → Medhiya nePezhiya → Girisi → Umambo hweRoma → Tsoka hafu yevhu nehafu yesimbi gumi " zvigunwe " Ndidzo nyanga dzine gumi nemadzimambo gumi .
Nyanga dzine gumi dzaunoona ndiwo madzimambo ane gumi. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 17:12)

bvunza: Mumwe" Xiaojiao "Zvinorevei?"
mhinduro: " Xiaojiao ” → “ nyanga "Inoreva mhuka uye nyoka dzekare. Runyanga urwu rune maziso, akafanana nemeso evanhu → " nyoka “Iye akaoneka muchimiro chomunhu; akanga ane muromo waitaura zvinhu zvikuru → Iye kunyange akagara mutembere yaMwari, achizviti Mwari → Uyu murume akanga ari 2 VaTesaronika 2:3-4 ( NW ) Paul ) akati" Mutadzi mukuru akazivisa ", ndiKristu wenhema. Ndizvo zvakataurwa nemutumwa, "Ipapo mambo achamuka."

Uyo akanga amirepo akati, “Mhuka yechina ndihwo umambo hwechina huchauya panyika, huchasiyana noumambo hwose, huchadya nyika yose nokuitsika-tsika, uye huchabva muumambo uhwu. nyanga dzine gumi dzichamuka, ipapo mumwe mambo achamuka wakasiyana novokutanga, uchakunda madzimambo matatu; uye achaedza kushandura nguva nemirau. Vatsvene vachaiswa mumaoko ake kwenguva, neimwe nguva, nehafu yenguva . ( Dhanieri 7:23-25 )

2. Chiratidzo chemakondohwe nembudzi

Ngirozi Gabrieri inotsanangura chiono chacho

(1)Gondohwe rine nyanga mbiri

bvunza: Gondohwe rine nyanga mbiri ndiani?
mhinduro: mambo weMedia nePezhiya
Gondohwe rine nyanga mbiri dzawaona ndimambo weMedhia nePezhia. Chirevo (Danieri 8:20)

(2) mbudzi

bvunza: Ko mbudzi yebhiridha ndiani?
mhinduro: mambo wechiGiriki

bvunza: Mambo weGirisi ndiani?
mhinduro: Alexander the Great (zvinyorwa zvenhoroondo)
Nhongo yembudzi ndimambo weGirisi (chiGiriki: chinyorwa chepakutanga ndiYawan; imwe cheteyo pazasi nyanga huru pakati pemeso ndiye mambo wekutanga. ( Dhanieri 8:21 )

(3)2300 Day Vision

1 Chigunwe chikuru chakatyoka →Mambo wechiGiriki “Alexander Mukuru” akafa muna 333 BC.

2 Mudzi wenyanga huru inomera makona mana → "Madzimambo mana" anoreva Humambo Huna.
Cassander →akatonga Makedhonia
Lysimachus → Akatonga Thrace neAsia Minor
Seleucus → Akatonga Siria
Ptolemy → Akatonga Egipita
Mambo Ptolemy →323-198 BC
Mambo Seleucid → 198-166 BC
Mambo Hasmani → 166-63 BC
Hushe hweRoma → 63 BC kusvika 27 BC-1453 BC

3 Humambo hudiki hwakakura kubva kune imwe yemakona mana → Pakupera kwemakona mana, mambo akamuka.
bvunza: Ndiani uyu nyanga duku iri kuramba ichiwedzera kusimba?
mhinduro: humambo hweRoma
bvunza: Mambo achamuka achakutorerai zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa nguva dzose uye agoparadza nzvimbo yenyu tsvene.
mhinduro: Anopesana naKristu.
Muna AD 70, hushe hweRoma hunonyangadza uye hunoparadza " Mukuru Tito" Akakunda Jerusarema, akaparadza zvipiriso zvinopiswa, uye akaparadza nzvimbo tsvene. Ndiye mumiriri waAntikristu .

→→Pakupera kwoumambo uhwu huna, kana zvivi zvaavo vanodarika murayiro zvazara, mambo achamuka, ane chitarisiko chinotyisa uye anogona kushandisa ndangariro mbiri... Achashandisa simba kuita unyengeri hwake, uye achazvikudza mumwoyo make, kana vanhu vasina kugadzirira, iye achavaparadza vanhu vazhinji; Chiratidzo chemazuva 2,300 ndechechokwadi , asi iwe unofanira kuisa chisimbiso ichi chiratidzo, nokuti chine chokuita namazuva mazhinji ari kuuya. ( Dhanieri 8:23-26 )

3. Mambo weZasi naMambo woKumusoro

(1)Mambo weZasi

bvunza: Mambo wezasi ndiani?
mhinduro: Ptolemaeus I Soter... mambo wenyika dzakawanda mushure mezvizvarwa zvitanhatu. Iye zvino inoreva kuEgypt, Iraq, Iran, Turkey, Syria, Palestine nedzimwe nyika dzakawanda dzine zvitendero zvechihedheni → ivo vose vamiririri ve "chikara", mambo wezasi.
“Mambo wezasi achava nesimba, uye mumwe wavakuru vake vehondo achava nesimba kupfuura iye, uye achava nesimba, uye simba rake richava guru.

(2)Mambo weKumusoro

bvunza: Mambo wokumusoro ndiani?
mhinduro: Antiochus I kuna Epiphanes IV, zvichingodaro, gare gare inoreva Humambo hweRoma, Humambo hweTurkey Ottoman ... nedzimwe nyika. Vamwe vanoti iRussia,” Nhoroondo dzezvakaitika kare dzinotyisa "Ini handichazvikurukuri pano. Kunewo makereke mazhinji anoshandisa pfungwa dzavo dzeNeo-Confucian kuita zvisina maturo. VeSeventh-day Adventist vanoti iRoman Catholic, neUnited States. Munozvitenda here? zvisina maturo zvinotungamirira kunhema uye zvinogona kushandiswa nyore nyore nadhiyabhorosi, unonzwisisa here?

(3)Chinyangadzo chokuparadza

1 gore rimwe, makore maviri, hafu yegore
Ndikanzwa uyo amire pamusoro pemvura, akapfeka mucheka, achisimudzira ruoko rwake rworuboshwe norudyi kudenga, achipika naiye unorarama nokusingaperi, achiti: Hazvingaiti kusvikira nguva imwe, nguva mbiri, nehafu yenguva. apo simba revatsvene richaputswa uye zvinhu zvose zvikaitika.” ( Dhanieri 12:7 )

2 mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe
Kubva panguva yokubviswa kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nokumiswa kwechinonyangadza chinoparadza, zvichaita mazuva ane chiuru chimwe namazana maviri namakumi mapfumbamwe. ( Dhanieri 12:11 )

bvunza: Makore mangani mazuva churu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe?
mhinduro: makore matatu nehafu → Kunyangadza kwekuparadzwa" mutadzi “Zvino zvinoratidzwa kuti kana chipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose chabviswa, chinonyangadza chinoparadza chamiswa, zvichava mazuva ane chiuru chimwe namazana maviri namakumi mapfumbamwe, ndiyo nguva, nenguva, nehafu yenguva, makore matatu nehafu “Punzai simba revatsvene uye mutambudze maKristu.

3 Mazuva ane chiuru chimwe namazana matatu namakumi matatu namashanu

bvunza: Mazuva ane chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemashanu anomirirei?
mhinduro : Inofananidzira kuguma kwenyika nekuuya kwaJesu Kristu .
Wakaropafadzwa unomirira kusvikira pazuva rechuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matatu neshanu. Chirevo (Danieri 12:12)

【Zvakazarurwa】

【 Zvakazarurwa 13:1 】 Zvino ndakaona chikara chichikwira chichibva mugungwa, chine nyanga gumi nemisoro minomwe, nepamusoro penyanga dzacho korona dzine gumi, nepamusoro pemisoro yacho zita rekunyomba. .

1 nyanga gumi nemisoro minomwe

4 yakaita sembada

6 Muromo seshumba; .

[ Zvakazarurwa 13:3-4 ] Uye ndakaona kuti mumwe wemisoro minomwe yechikara wakaita sowaiva neronda rinouraya, asi vanga rorufu rakanga rapora. Vanhu vose venyika vakashamiswa, vakatevera chikara, vakanamata zibukanana, nokuti rakanga rapa simba kuchikara; vakanamata chikara, vachiti: Ndiani wakafanana nechikara ichi, uye ndiani angarwa? naye?"

bvunza: " mhuka "Ko kukuvara kana kufa zvinorevei?"
mhinduro: Jesu Kristu akamuka kubva kuvakafa → akakuvadzwa” nyoka “Musoro wechikara, vanhu vazhinji vanotenda muvhangeri uye vanotenda muna Jesu Kristu!

bvunza: Izvo" mhuka “Zvinorevei kuporeswa pasinei nokuti wafa kana kuti wakuvadzwa?
mhinduro: Chizvarwa chekupedzisira chakatambura " nyoka “Kunyengera kwechikara, (zvakadai tsamba Buddhism, Islam kana zvimwe zvitendero zvechipegani, nezvimwewo), vanhu vazhinji vakasiya Mwari wechokwadi uye havatendi kuevhangeri kana kuna Jesu. Vanhu vose vari panyika vanotevera chikara uye vanonamata chikara.” Idol ", namatai dhiragoni →" Mutadzi mukuru anooneka "saka" mhuka “Vakafa nevakakuvadzwa vakaporeswa.

[ Zvakazarurwa 13:5 ] Uye chakapiwa muromo wokutaura zvinhu zvikuru nokumhura, uye simba rakapiwa kwachiri kuita sezvachaida kwemwedzi makumi mana nemiviri.

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuita sezvaunoda kwemwedzi makumi mana?
mhinduro: Vatsvene vanonunura" mhuka "ruoko【 makore matatu nehafu 】 → Zvino wakachipa icho kuti chiite hondo nevatsvene, nekuvakunda, uye akachipa simba pamusoro pemarudzi ose, nendimi, nerudzi. Mumwe nomumwe anogara panyika achachinamata, vana mazita asina kunyorwa mubhuku youpenyu yeGwayana rakabayiwa kubva pakusikwa kwenyika. (Zvakazarurwa 13:7-8)

5. Chikara chenyika

mhinduro: " mhuka "Kune nyanga mbiri dzakafanana Zvakafanana negwayana , nechiso chomunhu uye nomwoyo wemhuka, inoparidza nzira yavamwari venhema uye inonyengera avo vanogara panyika inotaura sedhiragoni uye inoita kuti munhu ari wose anamate mufananidzo wechikara , zvinovauraya, zvinoitawo kuti munhu wese agamuchire ". mhuka "mark ye 666 . 6. Chakavanzika, Bhabhironi Guru

(1)Hure hombe

mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 Kereke inoshamwaridzana nemadzimambo enyika - kuita upombwe . (Verenga Zvakazarurwa 17:1-6.)
2 Ani naani ane nheyo yokuchengeta murayiro . (Ona VaGaratia chitsauko 3 ndima 10 uye VaRoma chitsauko 7 ndima 1-7)
3 Shamwari dzenyika, vanotenda vamwari venhema, vanonamata vamwari venhema . (Verenga Jakobho 4:4.)

(2)Chikara chakatasva hure guru

[Ngirozi inotsanangura chiratidzo]

Iwe wakati mumwoyo mako: ‘Ndichakwira kudenga; ndichasimudza chigaro changu choushe pamusoro penyeredzi dzavamwari; Ndinoda kugara pagomo repati , kuchamhembe kwakanyanyisa. Chirevo ( Isaya 14:13 )

Uye ndakanzwa inzwi richibva kudenga richiti, “Vanhu vangu! Buda muguta iro , kuti murege kugoverana muzvivi zvaro ndokutambura madambudziko aro ( Zvakazarurwa 18:4 )

(4)Guta guru reBhabhironi rakawa

Shure kwaizvozvo, ndakaona mumwe mutumwa achiburuka kudenga ane simba guru, uye nyika ikapenya nokubwinya kwayo. Akadanidzira nenzwi guru. “Guta guru reBhabhironi rawa! ! articles.title: Zviratidzo zvekudzoka kwaJesu (Mufananidzo 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Mateo Chitsauko 24 uye ndima 32 tiverenge pamwe chete: “Izvi zvamungadzidza pamuonde: Kana matavi ava manyoro achimera mashizha, munoziva kuti zhizha rava pedyo. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Zviratidzo zveKudzoka kwaJesu" Aihwa. 5 Ngatinamatei: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Vana vaMwari vese ngavanzwisise mufananidzo wemuonde unotungira nekumera mashizha madiki.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Jesu akavaudza mumwe mufananidzo akati, “Tarirai muonde nemimwe miti yose; kumera Paunoiona, unongoziva kuti zhizha rava kusvika. …Saka, sezvamunoona zvinhu izvi zvichiitika zvishoma nezvishoma, muchaziva kuti umambo hwaMwari hwava pedyo. ( Ruka 21:29, 31 )

Mufananidzo wemuonde (Kumera)

1. Chirimo

articles.title: Zviratidzo zvekudzoka kwaJesu (Mufananidzo 4)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Mateo chitsauko 24 ndima 15 tiverenge pamwe chete: “Munoona ‘nyangadzi yokuparadza,’ yakataurwa nomuprofita Dhanieri, imire panzvimbo tsvene (vanoverenga rugwaro urwu vanofanira kunzwisisa) .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Zviratidzo zveKudzoka kwaJesu" Aihwa. 4 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Kuti vana vaMwari vese vanzwisise zviratidzo zvevatadzi nevasina mutemo .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Chinyangadzo chokuparadza

(1) Mbavha

bvunza: Ndiani anonyangadza kuparadza?
mhinduro: " mbavha ” → “ nyoka “Satani dhiyabhorosi.

Ishe Jesu vakati → Ndini mukova; Kana mbavha dzichiuya dzinoda chete kuba, uraya, kuparadza Ndakauya kuti makwai (kana kuti anoshandurwa kuti: vanhu) ave noupenyu, uye ave nohwakawanda. Chirevo (Johani 10:9-10)

(2)Gava

bvunza: Gava rinoparadza chii?
mhinduro: " gava ” inoreva dhiabhorosi, Satani, uyo achaparadza munda wemizambiringa waShe.
RWIYO RUKURU RWARUSAREMA 2:15 Tibatirei makava, makava maduku, anoparadza minda yemizambiringa; nokuti mazambiringa edu otunga.

(3) Mambo weBhabhironi akaparadza temberi (kekutanga)

bvunza: Ndiani anogona kuita →nyangadzi yokuparadza?
mhinduro: mambo weBhabhironi →Nebhukadhinezari

2 Madzimambo 24:13 BDMCS - Mambo weBhabhironi akatora pfuma yose yeimba yaJehovha nomumuzinda wamambo, uye akaparadza midziyo yose yegoridhe yakanga yavakwa naSoromoni mambo weIsraeri mutemberi yaJehovha. sezvakanga zvarehwa naJehovha;
2 Makoronike [36:19] vaKaradhea vakapisa temberi yaMwari, vakakoromora masvingo eJerusarema, vakapisa dzimba dzoumambo muguta nomoto, uye vakaparadza midziyo inokosha yaiva muguta.

(4) Jerusarema (rechipiri) kuvakwazve kwetemberi

bvunza: Zvakatora makore mangani kuti temberi yomuJerusarema ivakwezve pashure pokunge yava dongo?
Mhinduro: 70 makore

Dhanieri (Chitsauko 9:1-2) Mugore rokutanga rokutonga kwaDhariusi mwanakomana waAhashivheroshi muMedhia, iro raiva gore rokutanga rokutonga kwake, ini Dhanieri ndakadzidza kubva mubhuku. kumuporofita Jeremiya pamusoro pamakore okuparadzwa kweJerusarema; Makore makumi manomwe ndiwo magumo .

1 Kubva pamurayiro wokuvakazve Jerusarema

Mugore rokutanga raKoreshi mambo wePezhia, kuti mashoko akanga ataurwa nomuromo waJeremiya azadziswe, Jehovha akamutsa mwoyo waKoreshi mambo wePezhia uye akaita kuti ape chirevo kunyika yose achiti, Koreshi mambo wePezhia anoti: ‘Jehovha, Mwari wokudenga, akarayira kuti ndudzi dzose dzipiwe kwandiri, uye akandirayira kuti ndimuvakire imba muJerusarema muJudha vanhu vanokwira kuJerusarema raJudha. Kuvakazve temberi yaJehovha Mwari waIsraeri muJerusarema (Iye oga ndiye Mwari). Mwari ave naye murume uyu. Chirevo ( Ezra 1:1-3 )

2 Temberi yakavakwa mugore rechitanhatu ramambo Dhariusi

Vakuru vaJudha vakavaka temberi nokuda kwamashoko okukurudzira akataurwa nomuprofita Hagai naZekariya mwanakomana waIdho, uye zvinhu zvose zvikabudirira. Vakaivaka maererano nomurayiro waMwari waIsraeri nomurayiro waKoreshi, Dhariasi naAtazekisesi, madzimambo ePezhia. Negore rechitanhatu ramambo Dhariusi, nezuva retatu romwedzi wokutanga waAdhari, temberi iyi yakapera kuvakwa. . Chirevo ( Ezra 6:14-15 )

3 Nezuva ramakumi maviri namashanu romwedzi weEruri, mambo Aritashasita, rusvingo rwakapera.

Pazuva ramakumi maviri namashanu romwedzi weEruri, rusvingo rwakapera, uye akatora mazuva makumi mashanu namaviri achiruvaka. Vavengi vedu vose nevemamwe marudzi vakatipoteredza pavakanzwa izvi vakatya uye vakaunyana, nokuti vakaona kuti basa rakanga rapera nokuti rakanga rabva kuna Mwari wedu. ( Nehemiya 6:15-16 )

2. Jesu akafanotaura kuparadzwa kwetemberi (kechipiri)

(1) Jesu akaprofita kuti temberi yaizoparadzwa

Jesu paakanga oswedera pedyo neJerusarema, akaona guta racho akarichema, achiti: “Dai waiziva nhasi rugare rwako rwakakunakira; murwi wakakupoteredza, unokupoteredza pamativi ose, vachakuparadza iwe navana vako vari mukati mako, hakuna ibwe richasara pabwe rako, nokuti hauzivi nguva yokushanyirwa kwake.” ( Evhangeri yaRuka Chitsauko 19 ndima 41-44)

(2) Jesu akafanotaura kuti temberi yaizovakwa mumazuva matatu

bvunza: Jesu akashandisa chii pakuvaka temberi mumazuva matatu?
Mhinduro: Ita muviri wake temberi
Jesu akapindura akati kwaari: Paza tembere iyi; Ndichaivakazve mumazuva matatu . Naizvozvo vaJudha vakati: Makore makumi mana nematanhatu tembere iyi ichivakwa, zvino iwe uchaimutsa nemazuva matatu here? " Asi Jesu akataura izvi nomuviri wake setemberi . Saka mushure mokunge amuka kubva kuvakafa, vadzidzi vakarangarira zvaakanga ambotaura uye vakatenda Bhaibheri uye zvakataurwa naJesu. Reference ( Johani 2:19-22 )

(3) Temberi yepanyika yakaputswa muna 70 AD

bvunza: Chinyangadzo chekuparadza →Ndiani akaparadza temberi kechipiri?
mhinduro: Mukuru wehondo yeRoma → Tito .

Cherechedza: Jesu Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa akatizvarwa patsva, ndizvo zvakataurwa naIshe Jesu. mazuva matatu ) uye akasimbiswa zvakare mukereke, achiita muviri wake temberi, temberi yoMweya Mutsvene, kwete temberi yakaitwa nemaoko → Kubva panguva iyoyo, kereke yeJerusarema yakatangwa “Stefano” akaurayirwa kutenda nokuda kwaShe, chechi yaiva muJerusarema yakatambudzwa zvakakomba navaJudha, uye evhangeri yaShe Jesu Kristu yakaparadzirwa kunyika yokunze→” Mukati meimwe kana manomwe , achaita sungano yakasimba nevazhinji” → “ Andiyoki "... uye nezvimwe zvakawanda ( Vemamwe Marudzi ) chechi yakatangwa.
Vaapostora vose nevadzidzi vanonzwisisa kuti vose itemberi dzakavakwa naIshe Jesu Kristu mumazuva matatu, kwete temberi dzakaitwa nemaoko. Jerusarema rechiJudha itemberi yakaitwa nemaoko, “mumvuri”, kwete mufananidzo wechokwadi, kureva kuti, Nzvimbo Tsvene yechokwadi inopinda muNzvimbo Tsvene yechokwadi, temberi isingazomboparadzwi → iJerusarema riri kudenga! Ameni

(4) Nhoroondo yeJerusarema mushure me70 AD

Zvinyorwa zvenhoroondo zvinoratidza kuti muna AD 70 Tembere yeJerusarema yakatorwa ikakoromorwa nemukuru weuto reRoma Titus → Achizadzisa mashoko aJehovha anoti, “Hakuna ibwe rakasara pamusoro pebwe risingazoputsirwi; Kwasara rusvingo rwokumavirira chete ( Wailing Wall ), zvizvarwa zvinotevera chete ndizvo zvichaziva iyi nhoroondo.

bvunza: Ndeipi nhoroondo yawakasangana nayo mushure mekuparadzwa kweTemberi Yechipiri?
mhinduro: Kutanga kubva munhoroondo ye70 AD→→

1 Mukuru mukuru weRoma “Tito” naMambo weBhabhironi vose vakanga vari vanhu vakaipa vakaita ruparadziko runonyangadza Pashure pokunge Mutungamiriri wehondo Titus aparadza nokupisa Tembere Yechipiri, akavaka tembere yamwari mukurusa weRoma “Jupiter” pamatongo etembere akatumidza dunhu reJudha kuPalestine.

2 Muna 637 AD, humambo hweIslam hwakasimuka uye mushure mekutora Palestine, (nyangadzi yekuparadza) yakavaka "Al-Aqsa Mosque" panzvimbo yetemberi uye "Aqsa Mosque" iri padyo nayo, iyo ichiripo nhasi muna 2022. AD.

3 Musi waChivabvu 14, 1948 AD, Israeri yakanzi nyika;
Guta Idzva reJerusarema rakawanwazve pana February 24, 1949 mukati meHondo yeMiddle East yokutanga;

4 Nyika yeIsrael nePalestine, nekuda kwe " Jerusarema "Nyaya dzevaridzi dzinowanzobatanidza kushandiswa kwezvombo. Pakazosvika 2021, Israel ichava imwe yehegemons yakasimba muMiddle East maererano nemauto uye nyika kudzivirira, hupfumi, teknolojia, uye mararamiro ehupenyu.
ikozvino ( Wailing Wall ) Nzvimbo yakavhurika ndiyo iyo vaIsraeri vanonyengetera, vanopfidza, vanochema, uye vanonyunyuta kuna Mwari kwaanopfuura makore ane chiuru Iye zvino vadzokera kunyika yavo uye vanoonga. Vari ( Wailing Wall ) Nyengeterera rugare, namatira tariro ( Mesiya ) kuponesa nokumutsiridza rudzi rwaIsraeri uye kuvaka imba yokunamatira yemarudzi ose sa“Soromoni”.

3. Kuuya kwaJesu ( mberi ) chiratidzo chezvinhu zvichauya

" mirai panzvimbo tsvene "

achava pakati pegungwa negomo dzvene rokubwinya gadzirira Iye akafanana neimba yamambo tabhenakeri ; asi kana kuguma kwake kwasvika, hakuna ungamubatsira. ” Dhanieri 11:45

(3)Chiratidzo chechitatu

→→Vatadzi vakuru nevasina mutemo vanoratidzwa, kunyange Agere muimba yaMwari anozviti ndiMwari (2 VaTesaronika 2:3-4)

Temberi neatari yaMwari , uye vose vainamata mutemberi vakayerwa. Asi ruvazhe ruri kunze kwetemberi ngarurege kuyerwa, nokuti ndorwavaHedheni. vachatsika-tsika guta dzvene Mwedzi makumi mana nemiviri. Chirevo (Zvakazarurwa 11:1-2)

(6) Vanhu vari munyika yose vanotevera chikara uye vanogamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara pamaoko kana pahuma dzavo (666) --Verenga Zvakazarurwa 13:16-18

Cherechedza: pamusoro (6 chiratidzo ) vane hukama neJerusarema" Nzvimbo Tsvene "Zvakabatana, kubva AD 70 ( Tembere yaparadzwa ) kusvika muna 2022, apo Israeri yakadzorerwa kuhurumende muna 1948, uye muJerusarema pasi pano nhasi, vaIsraeri chete ( Wailing Wall )......!

Rudo rwavazhinji runotonhora zvishoma nezvishoma nokuda kwokuwedzera kwokusateerera mutemo. Asi unotsungirira kusvikira pakuguma, ndiye uchaponeswa . ( Mateu 24:12-13 )
Cherechedza: VaKristu vanogara vari vatorwa kana kuti vanoparidza evhangeri yechokwadi mumazuva okupedzisira → vachavengwa nenyika, inoumbwa nevaprofita venhema nehama dzenhema, uye vachasangana nematambudziko akawanda → kunyange vabereki venyu, vanun’una, hama neshamwari vachakuitai vakuru vakuru; newewo uchatengeswa naivo Vakaurawa. Muchavengwa nevanhu vese nekuda kwezita rangu, asi hapana kana bvudzi remusoro wenyu richaparara. Kana mukaramba muchitsungirira, muchachengetedza mweya wenyu. . (Ruka 21:16-19)

(9) Evhangeri iri kuparidzwa munyika yose, uye mugumo hausati wasvika

【 vhangeri rekudenga 】 Evhangeri iyi youshe hwokudenga ichaparidzwa panyika yose, igopupura kumarudzi ose; Ipapo mugumo unouya . (Verenga Mateu 24:14).
【 vhangeri risingaperi 】 Zvino ndakaona umwe mutumwa achibhururuka mumhepo, ane evhangeri yekusingaperi, kuti aiparidzire vose vanogara panyika, kumarudzi ose, nedzinza, nendimi dzose, nevanhu. Akadanidzira nenzwi guru kuti: “Ityai Mwari mumupe mbiri! Nokuti awa yokutonga kwake yasvika.

(10) Kusvikira zuva rekunze rapera

bvunza: Zvinorevei kusvikira nguva dzavaHedheni dzazadziswa?
mhinduro: " yakazara "Zvinoreva kuguma. Jerusarema rakatsikwa-tsikwa nevaHedheni, sezvakangoita temberi pagomo yakagarwa nevaHedheni nevahedheni. Kusvikira pakuguma kwenguva iyo vaHedheni vakatsika Tembere → ivo vachawa munondo uye uchatapwa kumarudzi ose. kusvikira nguva dzavaHedheni dzazadziswa . (Ruka 21:24)

(11) Mirira kusvikira nhamba yevokunze yazara

bvunza: Zvinorevei kumirira kuzara kwemaHedeni?
mhinduro: Vemamwe Marudzi ( tsamba )Evhangeri uponeswe Nhamba yacho yakazadzwa;( Usazvitenda ) uye nhamba yevhangeri yakawedzerwa → VaIsraeri vose vakaponeswa → Hama, handidi kuti murege kuziva chakavanzika ichi (kutyira kuti munofunga kuti makachenjera), kuti vaIsraeri vane mwoyo mikukutu yakati; kusvikira uwandu hwevaHedheni hwazara . zvino Israeri wose achaponeswa . Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Muponesi achabva muZioni kuti abvise chivi chose cheimba yaJakobho.” ( VaRoma 11:25-27 )

(12) Kuva muranda uye kuurayiwa kunozadzisa nhamba

bvunza: ( kuurayiwa ) Vanhu vanosangana nenhamba ndivanaani?
mhinduro: Zvinoreva kuti nhamba yevaranda vakaparidza evhangeri yezita raJesu uye vakatsigira chokwadi vakatambudzwa uye vakaurayiwa navo → Pandakazarura chisimbiso chechishanu, ndakaona pasi peatari vamwe vanhu vakaurayiwa nokuda kweshoko raMwari uye nokuda kwouchapupu hwavo. Mweya yavo yakadanidzira nenzwi guru ichiti, “Ishe, mutsvene uye wechokwadi, kusvikira riniko muchitonga avo vanogara panyika nokutsiva ropa redu.” Ipapo akaudza mumwe nomumwe wavo nguo chena kuti vazorore kwechinguva, vakamirira varanda pamwe chete navo nehama dzavo kuti vaurawe saivo, kuti uwandu huzadziswe . Chirevo (Zvakazarurwa 6:9-11)

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. articles.title: Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu (2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 1 VaTesaronika chitsauko 1 ndima 1 tiverenge pamwe chete: Pauro, Sirasi naTimoti vakanyorera kukereke yeTesaronika muna Mwari Baba naIshe Jesu Kristu. Nyasha norugare ngazvive zvenyu!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana pamwe chete “Chechi munaShe Jesu Kristu” 2 Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Vakadzi Vakanaka Kereke muna Ishe Jesu Kristu inotuma vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nokubwinya, norudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Hwisisa kuti hwaro hwekereke muna Ishe Jesu Kristu ndiJesu Kristu pachake sedombo guru repakona, uye vaapositori, vaporofita, nevatsvene vakavakwa padombo remweya! Ameni. Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu

Pauro, Sirasi, uye Timotio vakanyorera vaTesaronika Chechi muna Mwari Baba naIshe Jesu Kristu . Nyasha norugare ngazvive zvenyu! ( 1 VaTesaronika 1:1 )

(Chechi muna Mwari Baba naIshe Jesu Kristu)

Inogona kupfupikiswa ku: kereke yajesu kristu

2. Mamiriro ezvinhu ekereke munaShe Jesu Kristu

bvunza: Chechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu →Machechi api aripo?
mhinduro: Chechi yekutanga yakatangwa →

1 Jerusarema church
2 Chechi yeAndiyoki
3 Chechi yeKorinde
4 Chechi yeGaratia
5 Chechi yeEfeso
6 Chechi yeFiripi
7 chechi yeRoma
8 Tesaronika Church...


【Makereke manomwe eZvakazarurwa】

Makereke manomwe aya anomiririra
Mamiriro ezvinhu ekereke mumazuva ekupedzisira:

(1) Chechi yeEfeso

→Kusiya rudo rwekutanga

(Rudo rwekutanga → Kururama kwaMwari Ehe Kubva pakutenda, kunotungamirira kukutenda ;

【 Kubva pakutenda 】Mweya Mutsvene unoruramiswa nokutenda, ukaponeswa nokutenda, unogamuchira zvipikirwa nokutenda;

【 kuitira kuti tsamba 】Sezvo tichirarama noMweya Mutsvene, tinofanirawo kufamba noMweya Mutsvene, nokuti tsamba Kuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene act Wana mbiri, wana mubairo, wana korona.

Uponeswe na ( tsamba ), kukudzwa kuchiri kutsamira pa ( tsamba )→ Rudo rwekutanga rwekereke yeEfeso Ehe【 Kubva pakutenda ], Zvadaro vimba nemabasa enyama kuti uipedze ; Hazvivimbiki Mweya Mutsvene anovandudza nekugonesa → Yakasiiwa【 kuitira kuti tsamba 】→ kuruboshwe ( tsamba ) achangobva ( mwari ), kusiiwa Mweya Mutsvene , ruboshwe( mwari ) ndiko kusiya ( kufanana ), nokuti ( mwari ) ndizvo ( kufanana )! Saka kereke yakasiya rudo rwayo rwekutanga. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(2) Chechi yeSmirna

→Gara pachokwadi uye utambure

(3) Chechi yePergamo

→Ndakateerera dzidziso dzaBharami ndikaumba zvikwata nemakakatanwa
(Kuteerera dzidziso yaBharami kuda mari; kuteerera dzidziso yevaNikoraiti kuita mapoka nemakakatanwa)

(4) Chechi yeTiatira

→Rega Jezebheri, mukadzi anozviti muprofita, adzidzise
(“Muporofita Mukadzi Jezebheri” zvinoreva kutenda kwehupombwe, kereke yehuhure → 1 Kurara nemadzimambo enyika (ona Zvakazarurwa 17:1-6). 2 Kubva pakuchengeta mutemo (ona VaRoma 7:1-6), 3 Ita hushamwari nenyika (ona Jakobo 4:4)

(5) Chechi yeSardhisi

→Chechi yezita iri kuderera
(Iyo chechi yezita: ichiti mupenyu asi akafa chaizvo)

(6) Chechi yePhiladelphia
→Chechi inotsigira chokwadi uye inoparidza evhangeri yechokwadi

(7) Chechi yeRaodhikia

→Kudziya, kupfuma nemari, kutopfuma, kugara zvakanaka nekuda kwemamiriro ehupfumi, chechi ine vanhu vakapfuma vakawanda →Asi havazivi kuti “” hupenyu hwemweya “Ivo varombo, vanonzwisa tsitsi, varombo, mapofu, uye vakashama. Havana kupfeka munhu mutsva nokupfeka Kristu. Somuenzaniso, Vatican Catholic Church nhasi, uye machechi akawanda akapfuma muEurope neAmerica machechi eLaodikia.

3. Kutangwa kwekereke

(1)Ibwe repakona

bvunza: Chii chinonzi dombo rekona?
mhinduro: Munguva dzekare, pakuvaka nekuvaka dzimba, "matombo emakona nematombo" aishandiswa senheyo yekutanga yekudzikamisa imba.
Nokuti isu tiri vashandi pamwe chete naMwari; imi muri munda waMwari nechivako chake. Nekuda kwenyasha dzaMwari dzandakapiwa, somutariri wakachenjera, ndakaronga nheyo, uye vamwe vakavaka pamusoro padzo; asi mumwe nomumwe ngaachenjere kuti unovaka sei pamusoro padzo. ( 1 VaKorinte 3:9-10 )

[Jesu Kristu] Iye amene ndiye dombo rekona

1 VaKorinde 3:11 Nokuti hakuna mumwe angaronga dzimwe nheyo kunze kwenheyo dzakarongwa kare, inova Jesu Kristu.
makavakwa pamusoro penheyo dzevaapositori nevaporofita, Kristu Jesu pachake ari mbiru yepakona (VaEfeso 2:20).

(2) Dombo, dombo romudzimu

Mateo 16:18 Ndinoti kwauri, ndiwe Petro, paruware urwu ndichavaka kereke yangu, namasuwo eHadhesi haangaikundi.

bvunza: Chechi yakavakirwa padombo iri →Dombo rinorevei?
mhinduro: " rock ” zvinoreva Kristu

Cherechedza: " rock ” haritauri nezvematombo ari pasi;
Dombo remweya rinobva kudenga →“ dombo remweya ” → izvozvo Dombo ndiKristu ! Ameni.
Vose vakabhabhatidzwa muna Mosesi mugore nomugungwa vakadya zvokudya zvomudzimu zvimwe chete uye vakanwa mvura yomudzimu yakafanana. Zvavakanwa zvakabva padombo romweya rakavatevera; Dombo iroro ndiKristu . ( 1 VaKorinte 10:2-4 )

(3) Vaapostora, vaprofita, uye vatsvene vakavakwa padombo

bvunza: VaKristu vanovakwa sei panheyo?
mhinduro: Nekuti takamushandisa kaviri ( ruponeso pamuchinjikwa waKristu ) akafuridzirwa noMweya Mutsvene ( Inwa mvura yemweya imwe cheteyo → Vakazvarwa nemvura neMweya Mutsvene ), kuwana kuna Baba. Naizvozvo, hamusisiri vaeni navatorwa, asi vobwo pamwe chete navatsvene, nemitezo yeimba yaMwari, makavakwa pamusoro penheyo dzavaapositori navaporofita, Kristu Jesu amene ari mbiru yepakona, mumwe nomumwe kubudikidza naye imba inovakwa. yakanyatsobatanidzwa uye zvishoma nezvishoma inova temberi yaShe. Maari nemiwo muri kuvakwa pamwe chete kuti muve ugaro hwaMwari noMweya Mutsvene. Chirevo ( VaEfeso 2:18-22 )

4. Kereke muviri wake

(1)Kereke muviri wake
VaEfeso 1:23 Kereke ndiwo muviri wake, kuzara kwaiye anozadza zvose mune zvose.

(2) Ndiye musoro wekereke
VaKorose 1:15-18 Mwanakomana Anodikanwa ndiye mufananidzo waMwari asingaonekwi, dangwe zvisikwa zvose zvisati zviri. Zvinhu zvose zvakasikwa naye, zvingava zviri kudenga kana panyika, zvinoonekwa kana zvisingaonekwi, kana zviri zvigaro zvoushe kana ushe, kana ukuru, kana masimba; Ndiye unotangira zvinhu zvose, uye zvinhu zvose zvinosimbiswa maari. Ndiyewo musoro womuviri wekereke. Ndiye wokutanga, ndiye wokutanga kumuka kuvakafa, kuti ave mukuru pazvinhu zvose.

5. Isu tiri mitezo yomuviri wake

(1)Imi muri nhengo dzomuviri wake

1 VaKorinde 12:27 Imi muri muviri waKristu, uye mumwe nomumwe wenyu inhengo.

(2)Isu tiri mapfupa nenyama yomuviri wake

VaEfeso 5:30 Nokuti isu tiri mitezo yomuviri wake (mamwe magwaro anowedzera: mapfupa ake nenyama yake).

bvunza: Tinoziva sei kuti tiri mapfupa ake nenyama yake?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Jesu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa → muviri wemweya (1 VaKorinde 15:44)
2 Muviri wemweya unooneka → une nyama nemapfupa ( Ruka 24:38-39 )
3 isu ( tarisa ) muviri unoonekwa → ibhonzo nenyama yaAdhamu
4 isu ( tarisa )Muviri usipo → ipfupa nenyama yaJesu
5 Muviri wakamutswa naKristu → muviri wemweya
6 Akazvarwa naMwari, muviri wemweya → akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari (VaKorose 3:3)
7 Kristu achaonekwa zvakare → Miviri yedu yemweya ichaonekwa uye ichaonekwa pamwe chete naKristu mukubwinya! Ameni

6. Kubatana kwekereke nekugadzwa kwemuviri waKristu

bvunza: Ungavaka sei muviri waKristu?
mhinduro: Kubatanidzwa mukutenda, kubatana kwechechi kubatana kwemuviri waKristu →→ Shandisai chisungo cherugare kune mumwe nemumwe, uye edza kuchengetedza kubatana kwemoyo kunopiwa neMweya Mutsvene. Kune muviri mumwe noMweya mumwe, sezvamakadanirwa kutariro imwe. Ishe mumwe, nokutenda kumwe, norubhabhatidzo rumwe, Mwari mumwe naBaba vavose, pamusoro pavose, kubudikidza navose, uye muna vose. Akapa vamwe vaapostora, vamwe vaporofita, vamwe vaevhangeri, vamwe vafudzi navadzidzisi, kuti vatsvene vashongedzerwe basa rokushumira, nokuvaka muviri waKristu, kusvikira tose tasvika pahumwe hwokutenda, tichiziva. Mwanakomana waMwari achiiswa pamunhu akakwana, asvika paukuru hwokuzara kwaKristu,...asi tichitaura chokwadi murudo, tikure pazvinhu zvose muna Kristu, iye Musoro, kunobva kwaari zvinhu zvose. Muviri wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete, uye mutezo wose pabasa rawo wakafanira, kubudikidza nekubatsirana maererano nebasa remuviri umwe neumwe, muviri uchakura nekuzvivaka murudo. Reference ( VaEfeso 4, ndima 3-6, 11-13, 15-16 )

7. Chechi ndiye mukadzi waKristu

VaEfeso 5:30-32 Nokuti isu tiri mitezo yomuviri wake (mamwe magwaro anowedzera: mapfupa ake nenyama yake). Nokuda kwaizvozvi, murume achasiya baba namai vake uye asanganiswe nomukadzi wake, uye vaviri ava vachava nyama imwe. Chakavanzika ichi chikuru, asi ndinotaura zvaKristu nekereke.

Cherechedza: Chechi ndiyo yakapfimbwa naJesu Kristu,” fiancée "Rinoreva mudzimai waJesu asina kuroorwa, uyo ari mhandara yakachena. Mhandara yakachena inokura →" kuva musikana akanaka ” Kureva, kumutswa kwemuviri wakanaka → Kana Kristu achidzoka kuzotora mukadzi, ndiye kereke ! Ameni

【 Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene 】

→→Chiratidzo chaJesu Kristu cherudo kune mwenga wake ( mhete yekubatana ): Ndapota ndichengete mumwoyo mako sechisimbiso ( Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene ), zvipfekedze paruoko rwako sechisimbiso. Nokuti rudo rune simba sorufu, uye godo rine utsinye semheni yomoto, murazvo womoto waJehovha. Rudo harugoni kudzimwa nemvura zhinji, uye harugoni kunyudzwa namafashamo. Kana munhu akatsinhanisa pfuma yose yemhuri yake nokuda kworudo, iye achazvidzwa. Chirevo ( Rwiyo rwaSoromoni 8:6-7 )

8. Chirairo cheMuchato weGwayana

【 jesu kristu anoroora church 】

Ipapo ndakanzwa inzwi remvura zhinji, inzwi rokutinhira kukuru richiti, “Hareruya! (Mucheka wakanaka ndiwo kururama kwavatsvene.) Mutumwa akati kwandiri, Nyora, uti: Vakaropafadzwa vakakokwa kuchirayiro chomuchato weGwayana! ” ( Zvakazarurwa 19:6-9 )

articles.title: Ruponeso rweMweya (Chidzidzo 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 1 VaKorinte 12, ndima 10, tiverenge pamwe chete: Akapa munhu mumwe simba rokuita zvishamiso, kuva muporofita, kunzwisisa mweya, kutaura nendimi, nokududzira ndimi.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Ruponeso rweMweya" Aihwa. 7 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Kumbira Ishe kuti vape vana vako vose zvipo zvemweya → kugona kuona mweya ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Mweya waBaba Vokudenga

(1)Baba vemweya yose

Baba vedu venyama vanoramba vachitiranga kwenguva duku maererano nokuda kwavo; ( VaHebheru 12:10 )

bvunza: vanhu zviuru gumi ( mweya ) kubva kunaani?
mhinduro: Kubva kuna Baba →Zvinhu zvese zvinozvarwa kana kugadzirwa zvinobva kuMweya waMwari! Ameni

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mweya wakazvarwa?
mhinduro: Mweya weMwanakomana waBaba ndiwo Mweya wakazvarwa
Pangirozi dzose, ndeipi iyo Mwari asina kumboti: “Ndiwe Mwanakomana wangu, nhasi ndakubereka”? Ndoupi waanonongedzera ndokuti: “Ndichava Baba vake, uye iye achava mwanakomana wangu”? Reference (VaHebheru 1:5)

bvunza: Mwari wakati kuna ani, Ndiwe mwanakomana wangu?
mhinduro: Adhamu --Verenga Ruka 3:38
Adhamu wekare akasikwa nemufananidzo uye akafanana naMwari → saka Adhamu aive “ Shadow "→ Adhamu wokupedzisira ndiye Adhamu wokutanga" Shadow "Muviri chaiwo, Ying'er muviri chaiwo ratidza → kureva Wokupedzisira Adhamu Jesu , Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari! Ameni
Vanhu vose vakabhabhatidzwa, uye Jesu akabhabhatidzwa. Ndichiri kunyengetera, denga rakazaruka. Mweya Mutsvene akauya pamusoro pake nomufananidzo wenjiva, inzwi rikabva kudenga, richiti: Ndiwe mwanakomana wangu wandinoda, ndinofara newe . (Ruka 3:21-22)

(2)Mweya munaBaba Vokudenga

bvunza: Mudzimu uri muna Baba Vokudenga →Mudzimu Chii?
mhinduro : Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJehovha, Mweya Mutsvene, Mweya wechokwadi! Ameni.
Asi kana Munyaradzi asvika, iye wandichatuma kubva kuna Baba, Mweya wechokwadi, unobuda kuna Baba, uchapupura nezvangu. Reference (Johani 15:26)

2. Mweya waJesu

bvunza: Mweya uri muna Jesu chii?
mhinduro: Mweya waBaba, Mweya waMwari, Mweya Mutsvene! Ameni.
Vanhu vose vakabhabhatidzwa, uye Jesu akabhabhatidzwa. Ndichiri kunyengetera, denga rakazaruka. Mweya Mutsvene akauya pamusoro pake , rakaumbwa senjiva, uye inzwi rakabva kudenga, richiti: Ndiwe mwanakomana wangu wandinoda, ndinofara newe . ” ( Ruka 3:21-22 )

3. Mweya Mutsvene

bvunza: Mudzimu uri muna Baba Vokudenga →Mudzimu Chii?
mhinduro: Mweya Mutsvene!

bvunza: Mudzimu uri muna Jesu →Mudzimu Chii?
mhinduro: Zvakare Mweya Mutsvene!

bvunza: Mudzimu Mutsvene ndewaani?
mhinduro: Mweya waBaba Vekudenga uye Mweya weMwanakomana anodiwa Jesu!

【 Mweya Mutsvene 】 Ehe Mudzimu waBaba, Mudzimu waMwari, Mudzimu waJehovha, Mudzimu woMwanakomana anodiwa Jesu, uye Mudzimu waKristu zvose zvinobva → “mweya mumwe” Mudzimu Mutsvene!
1 VaKorinde 6:17 Asi uyo akasanganiswa naShe ndiye Ivai mweya mumwe naShe . Jesu akanga akabatana naBaba here? vane! Rudyi! Jesu akati → Ndiri muna Baba uye Baba vari mandiri → Ini naBaba tiri vamwe. (Johani 10:30)
Sezvazvakanyorwa →Kune muviri mumwe noMweya mumwe, sokudanwa kwamakaitwa mutariro imwe. Ishe mumwe, nokutenda kumwe, norubhabhatidzo rumwe, Mwari mumwe naBaba vavose, pamusoro pavose, kubudikidza navose, uye muna vose. Chirevo ( VaEfeso 4:4-6 ). Saka, unonzwisisa here?

4. Mweya waAdamu

Shoko raJehovha pamusoro paIsraeri. Zvanzi naJehovha, iye akatatamura denga rose, akasimbisa nheyo dzenyika, nokuumba mweya mukati momunhu; (Zekaria 12:1)
bvunza: Ndiani akasika munhu mukati →( mweya )?
mhinduro: Jehovha!
bvunza: Jehovha Mwari haasiriye mukuru ( akatsamwa ) mumhino dzaAdhamu? Nenzira iyi, mudzimu uri maari hausi Mwari.” mbishi "? Genesisi 2:7
mhinduro: furidza" akatsamwa “Akava munhu mupenyu nomudzimu (“mudzimu” kana kuti “mudzimu”) ropa ”) → mweya waAdamu ( ropa ) munhu mupenyu.
(1) Muviri waAdhamu → wakaitwa neguruva (Ona Genesi 2:7)
(2) Mweya waAdhamu → wakasikwawo (Verenga Zekaria 12:1.)
(3) Mweya weAdhamu → zvakasikwa (Verenga 1 VaKorinde 15:44.)
Saka Adam" muviri wemweya “Zvose zvakasikwa naMwari!
Cherechedza:
1 Kana Adam" mweya "Zvanga zviri born mweya, ipapo mukati make" mweya ” kunyange Mweya waShe, Mweya waJesu, Mweya Mutsvene → haazove “ nyoka “Dhiyabhorosi Satani akundwa, ( Ropa ) mweya hauzosvibiswa.
2 Kana Adhamu mweya ari kuva born Mweya, vazukuru vake mweya waJehovha, mweya waJesu, Mweya Mutsvene haudi kuburuka; mweya ) pavazukuru vaAdhamu → Numeri 11:17 Ndichauya ndichitaura newe, uye ndichataura newe. ipai kwavari Mweya wakaburukira pamusoro penyu , vachagoverana basa iri rinokosha rokutarisira vanhu pamwe chete newe, kuti urege kutakura uri woga. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

5. Mweya weVana vaMwari

(1) Muviri wevana vaMwari

bvunza: Ko avo vakaberekwa nenyama vana vaMwari here?
mhinduro: akaberekwa nenyama Aihwa Vana vaMwari (VaRoma 9:8)

Chete
1 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya ,
2 makaberekwa nechokwadi chevhangeri.
3 Akaberekwa naMwari → Muviri wemweya mwana waMwari , nongedzera kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:44

(2) Ropa revana vaMwari

bvunza: Vana vanozvarwa nenyama → "mukati" Ropa "Iropa raani?"
mhinduro: Ndeya tateguru Adamu" Ropa ", pfuti" nyoka "Kubatwa Ropa ;

bvunza: vana vaMwari ( Ropa )ropa raani?
Mhinduro: ZvaKristu Ropa ! Kuchena, kusina gwapa, kutsvene Ropa ! Ameni →→Neropa rinokosha raKristu, seregwayana risina gwapa kana gwapa. (1 Petro 1:19)

(3) Mudzimu wevana vaMwari

bvunza: Mudzimu wakaberekwa nenyama →Mudzimu waani?
mhinduro: Mweya waAdamu munhu mupenyu wenyama neropa!

bvunza: Mudzimu Wevana vaMwari → Mudzimu Waani?
Mhinduro: Mweya waBaba Vekudenga, Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJesu, uye Mweya Mutsvene! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Reference (VaRoma 8:9)

6. Kukwanisa mweya yevakarurama

bvunza: Chiiko chokururamisa mweya womunhu akarurama?
mhinduro: Jesu Kristu ( mweya ) mushure mokunge basa rokudzikinura rapera, akati: Ndapedza ! "Akadzikisa musoro, Ipa mweya wako kuna Mwari . Reference (Johani 19:30)

bvunza: Ndivanaani vanoruramisa mweya yevakarurama?
mhinduro: Pavakanga vari vapenyu panyama, nokuti ( tsamba ) Vanhu vanoruramiswa naMwari → Sezvakanyorwa munguva yeTestamente Yekare, vanosanganisira: Abheri, Enoki, Noa, Abrahama, Roti, Isaka, Jakobho, Josefa, Mosesi, Gidheoni, Bharaki, Mwanakomana waKamu, Jefta, Dhavhidhi, Samueri, uye vaporofita ... nezvimwewo. " Testamende yekare “Pavakanga vari vapenyu, nokuti ( tsamba ) akaruramiswa naMwari,” Testamende Itsva “Nokufira kwaJesu Kristu zvivi zvedu, kuvigwa kwake, uye nokumuka kwake pazuva retatu mweya ) Basa rokudzikinura rakapedzwa →→ makuva akazarurwa, uye miviri mizhinji yavatsvene vakarara yakamutswa. Pashure pokunge Jesu amutswa, vakabuda muguva ndokupinda muguta dzvene uye vakazviratidza kuvanhu vazhinji. ( Mateu 27:52-53 )

7. Mweya wakaponeswa

bvunza: Mweya yakaponeswa chii?
mhinduro: 1 Semuyenzaniso, munguva yaNowa munguva dzakare muTesitamende yekare, kunze kwenhengo sere dzemhuri yaNowa dzakapinda muareka, hakuna vamwe vanhu vakapinda muareka miviri yavo yakatongwa ikaparadzwa nemafashamo, asi (mweya) yavo yakaponeswa nokutenda muevhangeri →→( Jesu ) yaakaenda nayo akanoparidzira mweya yaiva mujeri, iyo yakanga isina kuteerera Mwari panguva iyo Noa achigadzira areka uye Mwari akamirira nemwoyo murefu. Panguva iyoyo havasi vanhu vazhinji vakapinda muareka uye vakaponeswa mumvura, vasere chete...Nechikonzero ichi, kunyange vakafa vakanga vaparidzirwa evhangeri, kuti vagotongwa maererano nenyama yavo. Hupenyu hwavo hwepamweya hunotsamira pana Mwari . Reference (1 Petro chitsauko 3 ndima 19-20 uye 4 ndima 6)

2 Paivawo nenyaya yemhombwe mukereke yeKorinde kureva kuti munhu atora mai vake vekurera "Paul" akati →Munhu akadai ngaaendeswe kuna satani kuti ashatise nyama yake. kuti mweya wake ugoponeswa pazuva raShe Jesu . Chirevo ( 1 VaKorinte 5:5 ).

Cherechedza : Mweya wakaponeswa pano → unongoponeswa, usina kubwinya, mubairo kana korona. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

8. Mudzimu weNgirozi

bvunza: Ngirozi dzakasikwa naMwari here?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Bindu reEdheni Kudenga →Mwari vakasika ngirozi
2 Bindu reEdheni panyika → Mwari akasika Adamu

Wakanga uri mubindu reEdheni, uye wakanga wakashongedzwa namarudzi amabwe anokosha anoti: rubhi, nerubhi, nedhaimani, nebheriri, neonikisi, nejasipa, nesafiri, nekamaradhi, nekoriori, nendarama, napapi napapi paune ngoma nedare , varipo vese zuva rawakasikwa Yakagadzirirwa zvakanaka. Chiratidzo ( Ezekieri 28:13 )

bvunza: Ngirozi dzinogona kuonekwa neziso romunhu here?
mhinduro: Meso evanhu anongoona zvinhu zviri munyika, miviri yengirozi →Ehe muviri wemweya , tisingaoneki nemaziso edu. Muviri wemweya wengirozi unooneka uye unogona chete kuonekwa nemaziso evanhu. Kungofanana nemhandara Maria yakaona ngirozi Gabrieri iyo yakazivisa chiziviso, uye vafudzi vakaona ngirozi dzose apo Kristu akaberekwa → Sezvinongoita kumuka kwomuviri wemweya waKristu kwakaonekwa, vadzidzi vese vanogona kuzviona, Kristu akakwira kudenga! Vose vakaona ngirozi yakanga yauya nemashoko akanaka. Tarisa kuna Mabasa 1:10-11

bvunza: Ngirozi dziri mubindu reEdheni ndivanaani?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Michael → Inomiririra ngirozi huru inorwa ( Dhanieri 12: 1 )
2 Gabrieri →Inomiririra ngirozi inounza mashoko akanaka (Ruka 1:26)
3 Lucifer → Inomiririra kurumbidza ngirozi ( Isaya 14:11-12 )

(1)Kudonha Ngirozi

bvunza: Ndiani ngirozi yakawa?
mhinduro: Lucifer →Rusifa
“Iwe nyeredzi inopenya, Mwanakomana wamambakwedza, wawa seiko uchibva kudenga?

bvunza: Vatumwa vangani vakatevera “Rusifa” vakadonha?
mhinduro: Chetatu chengirozi chakawa
Chimwe chiratidzo chakaonekwa kudenga: dhiragoni huru tsvuku ine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi, uye korona nomwe pamisoro yayo nomwe. Muswe wayo wakakweva chetatu chenyeredzi mudenga ndokudzikandira pasi. ...Chiverengo (Zvakazarurwa 12:3-4)

bvunza: "Nyeredzi Inopenya, Mwanakomana weMangwanani" Mushure mekudonha kwaLucifer →Zita rake ndiani?
mhinduro: Dhiragoni, zibukanana ziguru dzvuku, nyoka yekare, inonzi dhiabhorosi, inonziwo Satani, Bheerizebhubhi, mambo wemadhimoni, Bheriari, munhu wechivi, Antikristu. .

Zvino ndakaona mutumwa achiburuka kubva kudenga ane kiyi yegomba risina chigadziko, neketani huru muruoko rwake. Yakabata dhiragoni, nyoka yekare, inonziwo Dhiyabhorosi, inonziwo Satani, ikamusunga kwemakore ane chiuru ( Zvakazarurwa 20:1-2 )

(2)Mweya wengirozi yakawa

bvunza: Mweya wengirozi yakawa → Mweya upi?
mhinduro: Mweya wadhiabhorosi, mweya wakaipa, mweya wekukanganisa, mweya waantikristu .
Iyo mweya yemadhimoni inoita zvishamiso uye inoenda kumadzimambo ose enyika kuti iungane nokuda kwehondo pazuva guru raMwari Wamasimba Ose. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 16:14)

(3) Mweya yakaputsika yechikamu chimwe muzvitatu chengirozi

bvunza: Mweya wakaputsika wechikamu chimwe muzvitatu chengirozi → Mweya upi?
mhinduro: Uyewo mweya yemadhimoni, mweya yakaipa, mweya yetsvina .
Zvino ndakaona mweya yetsvina mitatu yakaita sematafi ichibva mumuromo weshato nemumuromo wechikara, nemumuromo wemuporofita wenhema; Reference (Zvakazarurwa 16:13)

(4) Anopesana naKristu, mweya wemuporofita wenhema

bvunza: Ungaziva sei mweya wevaporofita venhema?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Shoko rakabuda mumuromo mavo →

1 Semweya wetsvina we“datya”
2 Dzivisai Kristu, dzivisai Mwari, dzivisai chokwadi, nyonganisai nzira yechokwadi, uye paridzai nzira yahongu uye kwete.
3 Kuroverera patsva Mwanakomana waMwari uye nokumunyadzisa pachena zuva nezuva, gore negore kusvikira kumagumo, kuti abvise zvitadzo zvaKristu ropa rinokosha ) sechinhu chakajairika, uye vanonyomba Mweya Mutsvene wenyasha.
Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Hama dzenhema chii?
mhinduro: Pasina huvepo hweMweya Mutsvene → Kunyepedzera kuva vana vaMwari .

bvunza: Kuudza sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Aihwa Ziva Jesu (ona Johani 1:3:6)
2 Pasi pemutemo (ona VaG. 4:4-7)
4 Aihwa Nzwisisa kupona kwemweya muna Kristu
5 Aihwa Nzwisisa chokwadi chevhangeri
6 Munyama yaAdamu, kwete muna Kristu
7 Aihwa kuberekwa patsva
8 Aihwa Hakuna Mweya waBaba, hakuna Mweya waJehovha, hakuna Mweya waMwari, hakuna Mweya weMwanakomana anodiwa Jesu, hakuna Mweya Mutsvene.
Saka, unonzwisisa here? Unoziva here kuziva midzimu?

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

articles.title: Ruponeso rweMweya (Chidzidzo 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 1 VaKorinte 15 uye ndima 44 tiverenge pamwe chete: Unodyarwa muviri wenyama, unomutswa muviri womweya. Kana kune muviri wenyama, panofanirawo kuva nemuviri wemweya.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Ruponeso rweMweya" Aihwa. 6 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakagoverwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Ngatitendei kuevhangeri tiwane mweya nomuviri waJesu! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vanakomana nevanasikana vakaberekwa naMwari

---Tora Muviri waKristu---

1. Tenda ugare naKristu

bvunza: sei ( tsamba ) vakamutswa pamwe chete naKristu?
mhinduro: Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana nerwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye pakumuka kwake ( VaRoma 6:5 )

bvunza: Nzira yekubatana naye mumuviri?
mhinduro: Muviri waKristu unoturikwa pahuni,

( tsamba ) Muviri wangu wakarembera pahuni,
( tsamba Muviri waKristu muviri wangu,
( tsamba Kristu paakafa, muviri wangu wechivi wakafa.
→→izvi Batana naye muchimiro chorufu ! Ameni
( tsamba ) Kuvigwa kwomuviri waKristu ndiko kuvigwa kwangu mumuviri.
( tsamba ) Kumuka kwemuviri waKristu ndiko kumuka kwemuviri wangu.
→→izvi kuti abatanidzwe naye muchimiro chokumuka ! Ameni
Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Kana tikafa pamwe chete naKristu, tinotenda kuti tichararama pamwe chete naye. Reference (VaRoma 6:8)

2. Kristu akamuka kubva kuvakafa akatimutsa patsva

bvunza: Tinozvarwa patsva sei?
mhinduro: Tenda vhangeri →Nzwisisa chokwadi!

1 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya --Verenga Johani 3:5
2 Vakazvarwa kubva pachokwadi chevhangeri —Verenga 1 VaKorinde 4:15
3 Akaberekwa naMwari --Verenga Johani 1:12-13
Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Maererano nengoni dzake huru, akatiitazve tariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa ( 1 Petro 1:3 )

3. Kumuka kuvakafa muviri wemweya

bvunza: Takamutswa pamwe chete naKristu muviri wenyama Rumuko?
mhinduro: Rumuko ndirwo muviri wemweya ; Aihwa kumuka kwenyama .

Unodyarwa muviri wenyama, unomutswa muviri womweya. Kana kune muviri wenyama, panofanirawo kuva nemuviri wemweya. ( 1 VaKorinte 15:44 )

bvunza: Chii chinonzi muviri wemweya?
Mhinduro: Muviri waKristu → muviri wemweya!

bvunza: Muviri waKristu wakasiyana nesu here?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Kristu ndiye ( road ) takava nyama;
2 Kristu ndiye ( mwari takava nyama;
3 Kristu ndiye ( mweya isu tiri nyama neropa
4 muviri waKristu Haafi ; miviri yedu inoona kuora
5 muviri waKristu Kusaona rufu ;Miviri yedu inoona rufu.

bvunza: Tiri papi zvino nemiviri yedu yakamutswa muchimiro chaKristu?
Mhinduro: Mumwoyo yedu! Mweya yedu nemiviri zvakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari →Mweya Mutsvene unopupura nemoyo yedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari. Ameni! Tarisa kuna VaRoma 8:16 naVaKorose 3:3

bvunza: Sei tisingagoni kuona muviri wakaberekwa naMwari?
mhinduro: Muviri wedu wakamutswa naKristu → Hongu muviri wemweya , isu ( murume mukuru ) ziso rakashama Handisi kuona ( Newcomer ) muviri wemweya wega.

Sezvakataurwa naApostora Pauro → Naizvozvo, hatiori mwoyo. ( zvinooneka ) Kunyange zvazvo muviri wekunze wakaparadzwa, muviri wemukati ( mutsva asingaoneki ) iri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Kutambura kwedu kwechinguvana uye kwakareruka kuchatiitira huremu husingagumi hwekubwinya kunopfuura kuenzanisa kwese. Zvinoitika kuti hatisi izvo zvakaonekwa naGu Nian ( Muviri ), asi kuva nehanya nezvisingaonekwi ( muviri wemweya ); nokuti zvinoonekwa ndezvenguva duku ( Muviri unozodzokera kuguruva ), izvo zvisingaoneki ( muviri wemweya ) nokusingaperi. Saka, unonzwisisa here? ( 2 VaKorinte 4:16-18 )

bvunza: nei vaapostora ziso rakashama Muviri wakamutswa waJesu unooneka?
mhinduro: Muviri wakamutswa waJesu ndiwo muviri wemweya →Muviri wemweya waJesu hauganhurirwi nenzvimbo, nguva, kana zvinhu zvinooneka kuhama dzinopfuura 500 panguva, kana kuti unogona kuvanzwa mumaziso avo asina kupfeka →Maziso avo akasvinudzwa, uye vakamuziva. Pakarepo Jesu akanyangarika. Nongedzero ( Ruka 24:3 ) uye 1 VaKorinte 15:5-6

bvunza: Muviri wedu wemweya unoonekwa rini?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Zuva richadzoka Kristu!

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Chirevo ( VaKorose 3:3-4 )

2 Unofanira kuona chimiro chake chechokwadi

Munoona kuti rudo rwakadini Baba rwavakatipa, kuti tinzi vana vaMwari; Ndosaka nyika isingatizive ( akazvarwa patsva munhu ), nokuti handina kumbomuziva ( Jesu ) Hama dzinodikanwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichazova zvichigere kuratidzwa;

→→ Cherechedza: “Kana Ishe achionekwa, tichaona chimiro chake chechokwadi, uye patichaonekwa naye, tichaonawo miviri yedu pachedu yemweya”! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here? ( 1 Johani 3:1-2 )

Chechina: Tiri nhengo dzomuviri wake

Hamuzivi here kuti muviri wenyu itemberi yoMweya Mutsvene? Mweya Mutsvene uyu unobva kuna Mwari unogara mamuri, uye imi hamuzi venyu.

bvunza: Miviri yedu itemberi yeMweya Mutsvene here?
mhinduro: Akazvarwa naMwari ( asingaonekwi ) → " muviri wemweya “Itemberi yaMweya Mutsvene.

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Nekuti muviri unooneka →unobva kuna Adhamu, muviri wekunze uchaipa zvishoma nezvishoma, worwara uye wofa →homwe iyi yewaini itsva haigoni kuchengeta waini itsva. Mweya Mutsvene ), inogona kubuda, saka nyama yedu haisi temberi yeMweya Mutsvene;

【 temberi yomudzimu mutsvene 】Ehe Zvinoreva zvisingaonekwi → muviri wemweya , ndiwo muviri waKristu, isu tiri nhengo dzomuviri wake, iyi itemberi yaMweya Mutsvene! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

→Nokuti isu tiri mitezo yomuviri wake (mimwe mipumburu yakare inowedzera: Mafupa ake nenyama yake). Reference (VaEfeso 5:30)

【 chibayiro chipenyu (VaRoma 12:1) Naizvozvo ndinokumbira zvikuru kwamuri, hama dzangu, netsitsi dzaMwari, kuti mupe miviri yenyu sechibayiro chipenyu.

bvunza: Chibayiro chipenyu chinoreva muviri wangu wenyama here?
mhinduro : Chibairo chipenyu zvinoreva kuberekwa patsva " muviri wemweya ” → Muviri waKristu chibayiro chipenyu, uye isu tiri nhengo dzomuviri wake zvibayiro zvipenyu → Zvitsvene uye zvinofadza Mwari, iri ibasa renyu remweya

Cherechedza: Kana iwe usinganzwisisi kuberekwa patsva uye kunzwisisa, iwe uchapa muviri wako → Uyu muviri unobva kuna Adhamu, une tsvina uye hauna kuchena, unotarisana nekuora uye rufu, uye chibayiro cherufu.
Kana ukapa chibayiro chipenyu chinodiwa naMwari, unenge uchipa chibayiro chakafa. Rudyi! Nokudaro, unofanira kuziva kuva mutsvene.

5. Idya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru uye upupurire kugamuchira muviri waShe

Ko, mukombe watinovonga haazi mugovani weropa raKristu here? Chingwa chatinomedura hachidyiwi muviri waKristu here? ( 1 VaKorinte 10:16 )

bvunza: ( tsamba ) akamutswa naKristu, anga asati atova nemuviri waKristu here? Sei uchiri kuda kugamuchira muviri wake?
mhinduro: ini ( tsamba ) kuti tiwane muviri wemweya waKristu, tinofanirawo chapupu Wana muviri waKristu uye uchave nezvakawanda mune ramangwana ruzivo Kuratidzwa kwemweya kwenyama →Jesu anoonekwa neziso rakashama” cake “Panzvimbo yemuviri wake (chingwa choupenyu), mumukombe” muto wemazambiringa "Panzvimbo pezvake Ropa , hupenyu , mweya →Idya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru Chinangwa ari kutidana chengeta chivimbiso , zvichengetere zvimwe zvinangwa Ropa wakasimbiswa nesu Testamende Itsva , chengetedza nzira, shandisa ( chivimbo ) chengeta icho chakaberekwa naMwari mukati ( muviri wemweya )! Kusvikira Kristu adzoka uye muviri chaiwo unoonekwa → Unofanira kuzviongorora kuti uone kana une kutenda, uye uzviedze iwe pachako. Hamuzivi here kuti kana musina kurashwa, muna Kristu Jesu mamuri? Saka, unonzwisisa here? ( 2 VaKorinte 13:5 )

6 Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mumwoyo yenyu, hamungavi venyama.

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. (VaRoma 8:9)

bvunza: Mweya waMwari unogara mumoyo, saka sei isu tisiri venyama?
mhinduro: Kana Mweya waMwari wagara mumoyo mako, unova munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva. Newcomer )Ehe asingaonekwi → ndizvo" muviri wemweya "Iwe wakazvarwa naMwari" Newcomer “Muviri wemweya hausi we ( murume mukuru )nyama. Muviri wemunhu wekare wakafa nekuda kwechivi, uye mweya wake ( muviri wemweya ) anorarama achiruramiswa nokutenda. Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Kana Kristu ari mamuri, muviri wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya mupenyu nokuda kwokururama. Reference (VaRoma 8:10)

7. Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi

1 Johane 3:9 Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari;

bvunza: Sei avo vakaberekwa naMwari vasingatadzi?
mhinduro: Nokuti shoko raMwari (zvinyorwa zvepakutanga zvinoreva "mbeu") riri mumoyo make, haagoni kutadza →
1 Kana Shoko raMwari, Mweya waMwari, uye neMweya Mutsvene waMwari zvagara mumoyo mako, unozvarwa patsva ( Newcomer ),
2 Munhu mutsva muviri wemweya ( haisi yake ) mutana akatadza panyama,
3 Mweya nemuviri wemunhu mutsva zvakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari Kristu aripi zvino? Kudenga! Munozvarwa patsva sezvisikwa zvitsva kudenga. Kristu ari kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba, uye muri kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba! Ameni – tarisa VaEfeso 2:6
4 Rufu rwemuviri wemunhu wekare kubudikidza nechivi, murufu rwaKristu, rwakadzimwa nekuvigwa muguva. Handichisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anoraramira ini. Mutsva" Chivi chipi chingaitwa muna Kristu? Uri right here? Naizvozvo Pauro akati → Iwewo unofanira kupa ruremekedzo rwako kuchivi ( tarisa ) iye pachake akafa, nguva dzose ( tarisa ) kutozosvikira muviri wake une chivi wadzokera kuguruva, iye achafa ndokuwana rufu rwaJesu. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna VaRoma 6:11

8. Ani naani anotadza haana kuziva Jesu

1 Johane 3:6 Ani nani unogara maari haatadzi;

bvunza: Sei vanhu vanotadza vasingambozivi Jesu?
mhinduro: mutadzi, mutadzi →

1 Handina kumbomuona, kana kumboziva Jesu ,
2 Kusanzwisisa ruponeso rwemweya muna Kristu,
3 Hauna kugamuchira humwanakomana hwaMwari ,
4 Vanhu vanoita zvivi → havaberekwi patsva .
5 Vanhu vanopara mhosva ndevezera renyoka → ivo vana venyoka nadhiyabhorosi .

Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi; ( 1 Johani 5:18 )

Cherechedza: Akazvarwa naMwari →" muviri wemweya “Yakavigwa muna Mwari pamwe chete naKristu. Kristu zvino ari kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba kudenga. Hupenyu hwako hwakazvarwa patsva huripowo. Wakaipa ari panyika uye shumba inodzvova inofamba-famba. Ingakukuvadza sei? Ndizvozvo! Saka Pauro Iti → Mwari worugare ngaakuitei vatsvene zvakazara, uye mweya wenyu nomweya nomuviri ngazvichengetwe zvisina mhosva pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, iye unokudanai akatendeka, achazviita. Chirevo ( 1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24 )

articles.title: Ruponeso Rwemweya (Chidzidzo 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Johane chitsauko 6 ndima 53 tiverenge pamwe chete: Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musingadyi nyama yoMwanakomana woMunhu nokunwa ropa rake, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi pakupedzisira. zuva randichamumutsa

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Ruponeso rweMweya" Aihwa. 5 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Ngatitendei vhangeri uye tigowana Jesu Ropa. Upenyu.Mweya! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

---Muviri wemweya wemwana akazvarwa kubva kuna Mwari---

1: Basa rekusika rakapedzwa

bvunza: Basa rokusika richapedzwa rini?
mhinduro: Mwari akasika denga nenyika nezvinhu zvose zviri panyika nemazuva matanhatu, uye akazorora nezuva rechinomwe!
→ → Zvese zvakagadzirira. Pazuva rechinomwe, basa raMwari rokusika zvisikwa rakanga rapera, saka akazorora pabasa rake rose nezuva rechinomwe. Chirevo (Genesi 2:1-2)

2: Basa rekudzikinura rinopedzwa

VaHebheru Chitsauko 4:3 Asi isu vakatenda tinogona kupinda muzororo iroro, sokutaura kwakaita Mwari, kuti: “Ndakapika pakutsamwa kwangu, ndichiti: Havangapindi muzororo rangu! wakakwaniswa kubva panyika ino.

bvunza: Ungapinda sei muzororo raKristu?
mhinduro: ( tsamba ) Basa raKristu rokudzikinura rinopedzwa

Jesu akati aravira vhiniga, akati. Ndapedza ! "Akadzikisa musoro, Ipa mweya wako kuna Mwari . Reference (Johani 19:30)

Cherechedza: Jesu akati: " Ndapedza "! Akakotamisa musoro wake. Ipa mweya wako kuna Mwari . Ameni! Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti azotiitira izvi →【 ruponeso rwemweya 】Yapedzwa uye yapinzwa muzororo! →→Sezvo Mwari akapedza basa rake rokusika mumazuva matanhatu, Mwari akazorora pabasa rake rose ndokuzorora pazuva rechinomwe. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: sei ( tsamba ) muzororo raKristu?
mhinduro: ( tsamba ) akafa, akavigwa, uye akamutswa pamwe chete naKristu → kuberekwazve, akaberekwa naMwari, get Mweya wake muviri! iwe get Mweya wemuviri waKristu mwana akaberekwa naMwari → Zvino watova mukati ( Kristu ), kwete mu ( Adhamu )ri →→ Uku kupinda mukuzorora kwaKristu . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Chechitatu: Wana ropa rinokosha raJesu

-------( hupenyu, mweya )-------

bvunza: Ropa rinokosha raJesu tingariwana sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Jehovha akadzima kutadza kwavanhu vose; return ) muna Jesu

Isu tose takanga takarasika samakwai; Jehovha akaisa pamusoro pake kuipa kwedu tose. Magwaro ( Isaya 53:6 )

bvunza: Jehovha anounza chivi chei? return ) muna Jesu?
mhinduro: (The Sin of All) Tsananguro yakadzama pazasi

1 Chivi (chakaiswa) pana Jesu ,
2 Chivi (kuisa) pana Jesu ,
3 Chivi (chakaiswa) pana Jesu . Ameni

Cherechedza: Jehovha Mwari anoita kuti vanhu vose vave “chivi”, “chivi” uye “chivi” → → ( return ) munaJesu→→Norufu rwaJesu, zvitadzo zvavanhu vose→→

1 "mira" chivi,

2 “Bvisai” chivi,
3 “Kuyananisira” zvivi, Hapana kana donhwe rechivi rinosara mumunhu wese → daidzirai rudzikinuro ;
4 Nhanganyaya (Yongyi) Ucharuramiswa nokusingaperi uye uchava noupenyu husingaperi! Ameni.

Ukasiya zvimwe" Bastard Mamuri, muchatadza; zvino Kusuma Shoko raMwari ( Kururamiswa. Mbeu youtsvene ) huri mumwoyo mako, haungambotadzi. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Ona 1 Johane 3:9.
“Vhiki dzine makumi manomwe dzakatemerwa vanhu vako neguta rako dzvene, kupedzisa kudarika, nokugumisa zvivi, nokuyananisira zvakaipa, nokuuyisa kururama kusingaperi, nokunamatidza chiratidzo nechiporofita, nokuzodza Iye Mutsvene; kana: Dudziro) Reference (Danieri 9:24).

(2) Kristu akarovererwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu

bvunza: Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu →Chinangwa ndechei?
mhinduro: " Chinangwa "kupera ( Adhamu ) muviri wechivi ndiko kuparadzwa kwe ( isu ) muviri wechivi → unotisunungura kubva kuchivi, kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwemurairo, uye kubva kumunhu wekare waAdhamu.
→→Zvinoitika kuti rudo rwaJesu runotikurudzira. Nekuti isu tinofunga kuti munhu" nokuti “Kana vanhu vose vafa, vose vanofa (ona 2 VaKorinde 5:14) Vaya vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi (ona VaRoma 6:7) → Kubva tsamba )Munhu wese akafa, saka zvinofanira kudaro ( tsamba ) uye munhu wose akasunungurwa pachivi, kubva pamurayiro nepakutuka kwomurayiro, uye akabvisa munhu wekare. Ameni

(3) Kristu ( Ropa ) kubuda

Asi pavakasvika kuna Jesu vakamuwana afa, havana kuvhuna makumbo ake. Asi mumwe murwi akabaya rutivi rwake nepfumo, uye pakarepo mumwe munhu Ropa uye mvura ikabuda . Magwaro ( Johani 19:33-34 )

(4)Isu( Ropa ) naKristu ( Ropa ) inoyerera pamwe chete

bvunza: isu Ropa sei naye Ropa Kunze pamwe chete?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Jehovha akaisa pamusoro pake zvivi zvavanhu vose → Ndiwo mweya nemuviri wemunhu wese ( return ) muna Jesu Kristu,
2 Jesu akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa →Ndisu takarovererwa pamuchinjikwa,
3 Jesu ( Ropa ) kubuda → Ndeyedu ( Ropa ) inoyerera,
4 Ropa )ndizvo hupenyu, mweya ! Jesu akarega ( hupenyu ) → Ndisu Ramwa Hupenyu kubva kuna Adhamu →" kurasikirwa "hupenyu," kurasikirwa “Mweya waAdhamu unetsvina netsvina,
5. "Kurasikirwa" hupenyu nemweya wemunhu →" Pfeka " Wana hupenyu nemweya waJesu → → Ndizvozvo Akaponesa hupenyu hwangu nemweya wangu ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake (kana kuti kushandurwa so: mweya; iwowo pazasi) ucharashikirwa nahwo; 35)

(5) Uye akavigwa

Cherechedza: Jesu akafa nokuturikwa pamuti → ndiko kuti, muviri wedu wechivi wakafa, uye muviri wechivi wakavigwa → kureva kuti, muviri wedu wechivi wakavigwa, uye isu” huruva “Muviri unouya pakupedzisira unodzokera kuguruva uye unodzokera kuguva. Tarisa kuna Genesi 3:19; Ropa ) haana kuvigwa, asi akarasika, akasiiwa, uye akayerera pasi pemuchinjikwa. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(6) Kumutswa pazuva rechitatu

Kumuka kwaKristu → Tiruramise , Kumuka kuvakafa, kuberekwa patsva, ruponeso, kugamuchirwa sevanakomana, Mweya Mutsvene akavimbiswa, uye upenyu husingaperi naye. ! Ameni.
Jesu akasunungurwa nokuda kwekudarika kwedu uye akamutsirwa kururamiswa kwedu (kana kududzirwa: Jesu akaiswa nokuda kwokudarika kwedu uye akamutsirwa kururamiswa kwedu). Reference (VaRoma 4:25)

Cherechedza: Takamutswa pamwe chete naKristu → kuzvarwa patsva mutsva " Pfeka " Mweya waKristu · Ropa ·Hupenyu·Mweya neMuviri ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Vana vakaberekwa naMwari:

1 Vokutanga zvizvarwa zvavanhu; ikozvino vazukuru vevakadzi
2 Kare vana vaAdhamu; ikozvino ndezvaKristu vana
3 Kare waiva mweya waAdamu; ikozvino ndezvaKristu mweya
4 Pane imwe nguva rakanga riri ropa raAdhama; ikozvino ndezvaKristu Ropa
5 Hupenyu hwaAdhama hwakanga huripo; ikozvino ndezvaKristu hupenyu
6 Mweya waAdamu ;zvino ndezvaKristu mweya
7 Wokutanga waiva muviri waAdhamu; ikozvino ndezvaKristu Muviri

Cherechedza: machechi akawanda dzidziso Iko kukanganisa ndiko ( mix ) haigone kuparadzaniswa, ivo vacha →→
1 Mweya wenyama waAdama neMweya waKristu mix nokuda kwomweya
2 Mweya wemudhara wedu naMweya Mutsvene mix nokuda kwomweya
3 Ropa remunhu wedu wekare neropa raKristu mix Ropa rimwe
kana chete (sanganisa) Kuparidza kunogona kukanganisa, uye makereke mazhinji “ Ndizvo zvakakanganisika "Kubatanidza mweya wemurume wedu wekare neMweya Mutsvene ( mix ) mweya.

nokuti Mudzimu uri muna Baba ndiwo Mweya Mutsvene, mweya uri muna Jesu Mweya Mutsvene, uye mweya uri muvana vakazvarwa patsva ndiwowo Mweya Mutsvene → Vese vanobva kumweya mumwe (Mweya Mutsvene) !

Sezvo simbi nemadhaka zvisingagoni kusanganiswa, mafuta nemvura hazvigoni kusanganiswa. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(7) Idya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru uye upupurire kugamuchira ropa raJesu

bvunza: Jesu anoita sei sungano itsva nesu?
mhinduro: Jesu akashandisa yake ( Ropa ) anoita sungano itsva nesu
Ruka 22:20 Nenzira imwe cheteyo vakati vapedza kudya, akatora mukombe akati, “Mukombe uyu ndiwo ndishandise Ropa sungano itsva , zvako yakayerera ichibuda .

bvunza: Togamuchira sei ropa raJesu
Mhinduro: Tenda muvhangeri ! Kuberekwazve, kumutswa, uye kugamuchirwa sevanakomana vaMwari →→ Idya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru ( Idyai muviri waShe , Inwai kubva kuna Jehovha Ropa ) ndiko kupupura nokugamuchira Muviri waIshe, ropa raIshe, hupenyu hwaIshe, mweya waIshe ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Mweya miviri yevana vakazvarwa naMwari

1. Kuwana Mweya waJesu

bvunza: muna Jesu( mweya ) → Mweya upi?
mhinduro: muna Jesu( mweya )→Mudzimu waBaba Vokudenga, Mudzimu waJehovha, Mudzimu waMwari →Ndiwo Mweya mumwe ( Mweya Mutsvene )!
Cherechedza: kuwana ( Mweya Mutsvene ), ndiko kuti, kuwana →Mudzimu waJesu, Mudzimu waBaba Vokudenga, Mudzimu waJehovha, Mudzimu waMwari! Ameni. Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

bvunza: Ungawana sei Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa naMwari?
Mhinduro: Tenda muvhangeri!
Mako 1:15 [Jesu] akati, “Nguva yakwana, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tenda kuevhangeri ! "

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: sezvakaita vaapostora ( Paul ) Evhangeri kuvaHedheni
Zvino ndinokuzivisai, hama, evhangeri yandakakuparidzirai, ramakagamuchirawo, neyamumire mairi; vachaponeswa nevhangeri iri . ( 1 VaKorinte 15:1-2 )

bvunza: Unofanira kuponeswa nokutenda muvhangeri iri.
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 Vakorinde 15:3 Nokuti zvandakakupaiwo ndezvokuti: Kutanga, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu, sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro;

bvunza: Kristu akagadzirisa dambudziko ripi paakafira zvivi zvedu?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Tisunungurei muchivi

Kristu nokuda kwedu" mhosva "Akarovererwa uye akafa → Kristu oga" nokuti "Kana vose vanofa, vose vanofa (ona 2 VaKorinte 5:14) → Avo vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi (ona VaRoma 6:7)
Cherechedza: Kristu munhu mumwe chete" nokuti “Apo vose vanofa, vose vanofa → Iye akafa anosunungurwa pachivi, uye vose vanofa, ( tsamba ) uye munhu wose akasunungurwa kubva kuchivi. Ameni

(2) Kusununguka kubva pamurairo nekutuka kwemurairo
Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro unotisunga. Zvino wasunungurwa pamurairo , achitikumbira kuti tishumire Jehovha maererano noutsva hwomudzimu (mweya: kana kuti rinoshandurwa soMudzimu Mutsvene) uye kwete maererano netsika dzekare. Chirevo (VaRoma 7:6) navaGaratiya 3:13

【1 Vakorinde 15:4】Akavigwa

(3) Bvisa mukweguru nemaitiro ake
Musareverana nhema;
Cherechedza: Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa → ndakasunungurwa kubva mumuviri werufu. Ona VaRoma 7:24-25

1 Vakorinde 15:4 BDMCS - uye akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neBhaibheri.

(4) Kumuka kwaKristu → kunotiita kuti tiruramiswe, timutswa pamwe chete Naye, tiberekwe patsva, tiponeswe, tigamuchirwe sevanakomana, tigamuchire Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa, uye tive noupenyu husingaperi! Ameni.
Jesu akaiswa nokuda kwokudarika kwedu akamutswa nokuda kwokururamiswa kwedu Takamutswa kuti tiruramiswe ) Reference (VaRoma 4:25)

(5)Vakapukunyuka pasimba rerima reHadhesi
Akatinunura pasimba rerima akatiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda ( VaKorose 1:13 )

(6) Mu (nyoka, dhiragoni) dhiabhorosi Satani
Ndinokutuma kwavari, kuti meso avo asvinudzwe, vatendeuke kubva murima vauye kuchiedza; Bvisa simba raSatani uende kuna Mwari Uye kubudikidza nokutenda mandiri munogamuchira kanganwiro yezvivi uye nenhaka pamwe chete navose vakaitwa vatsvene. ’” (Mabasa 26:18)

(7) Kubva munyika

ndakavapa shoko renyu. Uye nyika inovavenga, nekuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. Reference (Johani 17:14)

(8) Tifambisei kuumambo hweMwanakomana wedu anodiwa uye nyora mazita edu mubhuku roupenyu
Akatinunura pasimba rerima akatiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda ( VaKorose 1:13 )

Cherechedza: Mwari akatitamisa kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa → mazita akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu anoreva kuti akatiendesa kuumambo hwaJesu noumambo hwaMwari → hunova umambo hwokudenga! Ameni

Gamuchira zvakavimbiswa【 Mweya Mutsvene 】 ndicho chiratidzo
Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Reference (VaEfeso 1:13)

bvunza: Shoko rechokwadi chii? Vhangeri rinotiponesa?
mhinduro: Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu, akavigwa, akamukazve nezuva retatu sezviri muBhaibheri!

1 Tisunungurei kubva kuchivi
2 Kusununguka kubva pamurayiro uye pakutukwa kwawo
3 Bvisai mutana netsika dzake
4 Kumuka kwaKristu → kunotiita kuti tiruramiswe, timutswa pamwe chete Naye, tizvarwe patsva, tiponeswe, tigamuchirwe sevanakomana, tigamuchire Mweya Mutsvene akavimbiswa, uye tive neupenyu husingaperi! Ameni
5 Makapukunyuka pasimba rerima reHadhesi
6 Kusunungurwa kubva (nyoka, dhiragoni) dhiabhorosi

7 kunze kwenyika
8 Mazita edu ngaaendeswe kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wedu anodiwa uye anyorwe mubhuku roupenyu! Ameni
Iri ishoko rechokwadi, Evhangeri yeruponeso rwenyu, iye wamakatenda maari, wamakagamuchira chivimbiso kwaari. Mweya Mutsvene 】Yechiratidzo! Ameni.
( Cherechedza: " tsamba "Vanhu veevhangeri iyi → Akaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene akavimbiswa ;" Usazvitenda "Vanhu veevhangeri iyi → Hatigoni kuwana chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene . ) Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Cherechedza: Akagamuchira zvakavimbiswa【 Mweya Mutsvene 】yemucherechedzo → kureva get Mweya waJesu, Mweya waBaba ! Ameni.
VaRoma 8:16 Mweya Mutsvene unopupurirana nemweya wedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari, ndiro tikiti redu rekupinda muumambo hwekudenga, uye humbowo nehumbowo hwekuti tine nhaka yaBaba vedu vekudenga → Uyu Mweya Mutsvene umboo hwenhaka yedu (rugwaro rwekutanga rubatso), kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (vanhu: chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa, kuti mbiri Yake igorumbidzwa. Reference (VaEfeso 1:14), unonzwisisa izvi here?

OK! Nhasi tinoongorora, kuyanana, uye nekugovera kuti tingagamuchira sei Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso →Kugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa kugamuchira Mweya waJesu neMweya waBaba Vekudenga ! Ameni

Pfuurira kugoverana muchinyorwa chinotevera: Ruponeso rwomweya

2 Ungawana sei mutumbi waJesu
