articles.title: Ruponeso rweMweya (Chidzidzo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Mateo Chitsauko 1 uye ndima 18 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kuberekwa kwaJesu Kristu kwakanyorwa seizvi: Maria, mai vake vakanga vatsidzirana naJosefa, asi vasati varoorana, Maria akava nepamuviri noMweya Mutsvene. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Ruponeso rweMweya" Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya: kunzwisisa. Mweya nemuviri waJesu Kristu! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Adhamu Wokupedzisira: Mweya waJesu Muviri

1. Mweya waJesu

(1)Mweya waJesu mupenyu

bvunza: Jesu akazvarwa kunaani?
mhinduro: Jesu akaberekwa naBaba Vokudenga → → pakava nenzwi rakabva kudenga richiti: “Uyu ndiye Mwanakomana wangu unodiwa, wandinofarira kwazvo.” ( Mateu 3:17 ) → Ngirozi dzose, Mwari anadzo nguva dzose akati kuna Ndeupi anoti: "Ndiwe mwanakomana wangu, nhasi ndakubereka"? Ndoupi waanonongedzera ndokuti: “Ndichava Baba vake, uye iye achava mwanakomana wangu”? Reference (VaHebheru 1:5)

bvunza: Jesu mweya Iri mbishi here? Kana kugadzirwa?
mhinduro: Sezvo Jesu akaberekwa naBaba, mweya ) vanozvarwawo naBaba Vokudenga, kwete saAdhama akasika munhu. mweya ".

(2)Mweya waBaba Vokudenga

bvunza: Jesu mweya → Mweya waani?
mhinduro: ZvaBaba Vekudenga mweya →Kureva kuti, Mudzimu waMwari, Mudzimu waJehovha Mwari, uye Mudzimu woMusiki → Pakutanga, Mwari akasika denga nenyika. Nyika yakanga isina kugadzirwa uye isina chinhu, uye rima rakanga riri pamusoro pegomba risina chigadziko; mweya wamwari Kumhanya pamusoro pemvura. ( Genesi 1:1-2 ).

Cherechedza: mweya wajesu →Mudzimu waBaba, Mudzimu waMwari, Mudzimu waJehovha, Musiki →→ Nyangwe Mwari vane mweya Ane simba rakakwana rokusika vanhu vakawanda Haana kusika munhu mumwe chete here? Sei kusika munhu mumwe chete? Ndiye anoda kuti vanhu vave nevana vanotya Mwari...Reference (Maraki 2:15)

(3) Mudzimu waBaba, Mweya weMwanakomana, uye Mweya Mutsvene → mweya mumwe

bvunza: Zita reMweya Mutsvene ndiani?
mhinduro: Inonzi Munyaradzi, inonziwo kuzodza → Ndichakumbira Baba, uye vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi (kana Shanduro: Munyaradzi; iyeyu pazasi), kuti ave nemi nokusingaperi, Mweya wechokwadi... Reference (Joh. 14:16-17) na1Johani. 2:27.

bvunza: Mweya Mutsvene Zvakabva kupi?
Mhinduro: Mweya Mutsvene unobva kuna Baba Vekudenga →Asi ndichakutumirai Mubatsiri anobva kuna Baba, ivo varipo Mweya wechokwadi anobva kuna Baba ; Reference (Johani 15:26)

bvunza: muna Baba ( mweya ) → Mweya upi?
mhinduro: muna Baba ( mweya ) → ndizvo Mweya Mutsvene !

bvunza: muna Jesu( mweya ) → Mweya upi?
mhinduro: muna Jesu( mweya ) → Uyewo Mweya Mutsvene
→ Vanhu vose vakabhabhatidzwa, uye Jesu akabhabhatidzwa. Ndichiri kunyengetera, denga rakazaruka. Mweya Mutsvene akauya pamusoro pake , chakaita senjiva, uye inzwi rakabva kudenga, richiti: “Ndiwe Mwanakomana wangu, unodikanwa, wandinofarira kwazvo.” ( Ruka 3:21-22 )

Cherechedza:

1 Maererano ne (mweya):
Mudzimu muna Baba Vokudenga, Mudzimu waMwari, Mudzimu waJehovha → ndiwo Mweya Mutsvene !
Mweya unogara muna Jesu, Mweya waKristu, Mweya waShe → Uyewo Mweya Mutsvene !
Mweya Mutsvene Iwo Mweya waBaba neMweya waJesu Vese vanobva kune mumwe, uye “. Mweya mumwe ” → Mweya Mutsvene . ( 1 VaKorinde 6:17 )

2 Maererano (munhu):
Kune marudzi akasiyana ezvipo, asi Mweya mumwe.
Kune hushumiri hwakasiyana, asi Ishe mumwe.
Kuna marudzi akasiyana amabasa, asi ndiMwari mumwe, iye anoita zvose muvanhu vose. ( 1 VaKorinte 12:4-6 )

3 Taura maererano (zita)
Baba, Mwanakomana, naMweya Mutsvene →Zita raBaba rinonzi Baba Jehovha, zita roMwanakomana rinonzi Jesu Mwanakomana, uye zita roMweya Mutsvene rinonzi Munyaradzi kana kuti kuzodza. Tarisa kuna Mateo Chitsauko 28 Ndima 19 uye Chibvumirano Chitsauko 14 Ndima 16-17.
【1 Vakorinde 6:17】Asi wakasanganiswa naShe ndiye Ivai mweya mumwe naShe . Jesu akanga akabatana naBaba here? vane! Rudyi! Jesu akati →Ndiri muna Baba uye Baba vari mandiri → Baba vangu neni tiri vamwe . (Johani 10:30)
Sezvazvakanyorwa, saizvozvo →Kune muviri mumwe noMweya mumwe, sezvamakadanirwa kutariro imwe. Ishe mumwe, nokutenda kumwe, norubhabhatidzo rumwe, Mwari mumwe naBaba vavose, pamusoro pavose, kubudikidza navose, uye muna vose. Chirevo ( VaEfeso 4:4-6 ). Saka, unonzwisisa here?

2. Mweya waJesu

(1) Jesu Kristu haana chivi

bvunza: Jesu akazvarwa pasi pemurairo here?
mhinduro: Hapana mutemo wakatyorwa! Ameni

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Nokuti pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika, uye hapana kudarika mutemo → Nokuti mutemo unomutsa hasha. Reference (VaRoma 4:15)

Cherechedza: Kunyange zvazvo Jesu Kristu akaberekwa pasi pomutemo, haasi womutemo → Akava muprista, kwete maererano nezviga zvenyama (mutemo), asi maererano nesimba roupenyu husingagumi (hwepakutanga, husingaparadzwi) (kushumira Mwari ). Reference (VaHebheru 7:16). SaJesu mu" Sabata "Rapa vanhu maererano nemutemo wenyama. → Jesu akatyora "Sabata" mu "Mitemo Gumi" yemutemo, saka vaFarisi vechiJudha vakaedza nzira dzose kuti vabate Jesu uye vaparadze Jesu! Nokuti akatyora mutemo "Mutemo haina kuteverwa" Sabata ". Reference ( Mateu 12:9-14 )

VaGaratia [5:18] Asi kana muchitungamirirwa noMweya, hamuzi pasi pomurayiro
Jesu akatungamirirwa neMweya Mutsvene →Kunyangwe akaberekwa pasi pemurairo, haana kushumira Mwari maererano nemirairo yenyama, asi maererano nesimba rehupenyu husingagumi, Kwete pano Mutemo unotevera:

1 Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika —Verenga VaRoma 4:15
2 Kana pasina murayiro chivi chakafa; —Verenga VaRoma 7:8
3 Pasina murayiro chivi hachisi chivi —Verenga VaRoma 5:13

[Jesu] Mutemo usina zviga zvenyama hausi pasi pemurairo; Sabata Kurapa zvirwere zvevanhu, maererano nemutemo, " Verenga mhosva ”, asi haana mutemo → Chivi hachisi chitadzo . Kana pasina mutemo, hapazovi nekutyorwa kwemutemo; Uri right here? Kana uine mutemo → tonga uye upe mhosva maererano nemutemo. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Ona VaRoma 2:12 .

1 Jesu haana kutadza

Nokuti muprista wedu mukuru haagoni kutinzwira tsitsi pautera hwedu. Akaedzwa pazvinhu zvose sesu. Kungoti haana kupara mhosva . ( VaHebheru 4:15 ) uye 1 Petro 2:22

2 Jesu haana chivi
Mwari anoregerera vasina chitadzo Uyo akanga asingazivi chivi akava chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari. ( 2 VaKorinte 5:21 ) uye 1 Johane 3:5 .

(2)Jesu mutsvene

Nokuti zvakanyorwa kuti: “Ivai vatsvene, nokuti ini ndiri mutsvene . ( 1 Petro 1:16 )
Zvakafanira kuti tive nomuprista mukuru akadai, mutsvene, asina chaangapomerwa, asina kusvibiswa, akaparadzaniswa navatadzi, ari pamusoro pamatenga. ( VaHebheru 7:26 )

(3) Kristu ( Ropa ) isina kukanganisa, isina kusvibiswa

1 Petro 1:19 Asi neropa rinokosha raKristu, seregwayana risina charingapomerwa kana gwapa.

Cherechedza: Kristu" ropa rinokosha "Isina mhosva, isina kusvibiswa → hupenyu aripo Ropa pakati →izvi hupenyu Ndizvo → mweya !
Mweya waJesu Kristu → Haina gwapa, haina kusvibiswa, uye itsvene! Ameni.

3. Muviri waKristu

(1)Shoko rakazova nyama
Shoko rakava nyama , anogara pakati pedu, azere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. ( Johani 1:14 )

(2) Mwari akava munhu wenyama
Johani 1:1-2 Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari; Shoko ndiMwari . Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga.
Cherechedza: Kwaiva neTao pakuvamba, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari → Tao akava nyama → Mwari akava nyama! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(3) “Mudzimu” wakava nyama
Cherechedza: Mwari "Mweya" →" mwari "akava nyama → ndiye" mweya "Iva nyama!→→ Mwari mweya (kana kuti haana shoko) , naizvozvo vanomunamata vanofanira kumunamata mumweya nomuzvokwadi. Reference (Johani 4:24) → Kubata pamuviri kwemhandara Mariya kwakabva ku“Mweya Mutsvene”! Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna Mateo Chitsauko 1 Ndima 18

(4) Nyama yaKristu haiori

bvunza: Sei muviri waKristu ( Aihwa ) kuona kuora?
mhinduro: Nokuti Kristu munyama ndiye → 1 kuva munhu , 2 nyama youmwari , 3 Muviri wemweya ! Ameni. Naizvozvo, muviri wake hauori → Dhavhidhi, ari muprofita uye achiziva kuti Mwari akanga apika kwaari kuti mumwe wevazukuru vake aizogara pachigaro chake choumambo, akafanoona izvi uye akataura nezvokumuka kwaKristu, achiti: ‘ Mweya wake hausiyiwi muHadhesi; . ’ (Mabasa 2:30-31)

(5) Jesu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa uye aisagona kusungwa norufu

Mwari akatsanangura marwadzo erufu uye akamumutsa, nokuti aisagona kusungwa nerufu. . Nhungamiro ( Mabasa 2:24 )

bvunza: Sei muviri wedu wenyama uchiona kuora? Vachachembera, vacharwara, kana kuti vachafa here?
mhinduro: Nokuti tose tiri zvizvarwa zvatateguru wedu Adhamu.

Muviri waAdamu waive "" huruva "Yakagadzirwa →
Uye miviri yedu zvakare" huruva “Akasikwa;
Adhamu paakanga ava munyama, akanga atova “ Sell "wakapiwa chivi,
Miviri yedu inewo" Sell "Ipa mhosva
nekuti【 mhosva 】Mutengo webasa ndewe kufa →Saka muviri wedu wenyama unoora, uchachembera, ucharwara, uchafa, uye pakupedzisira uchadzokera kuguruva.

bvunza: Miviri yedu ingava sei isina kuora, zvirwere, kusuwa, kurwadziwa, uye rufu?

mhinduro: Ishe Jesu vakadaro → Unofanira kuberekwa patsva ! Ona Johani 3:7.

1 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya
2 Vakazvarwa kubva pachokwadi chevhangeri
3 Akaberekwa naMwari
4 Kuwana Mwanakomana waMwari
5 Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa
6 Torai mutumbi waJesu
7 Uyo akawana Jesu Ropa (hupenyu, mweya)
Nenzira iyi chete ndipo patinogona kugara nhaka yehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni

( Cherechedza: Hama nehanzvadzi! 1 Kuwana Kristu" mweya Ndiko kuti, Mweya Mutsvene, 2 Tora Kristu" Ropa "Izvozvi hupenyu, mweya , 3 Wana muviri waKristu →Vanonzi vana vakazvarwa naMwari! zvimwe iwe Vanyengeri, vanonyepedzera kuva vana vaMwari, semhuka netsoko dzinonyepedzera kuva vanhu. Mazuvano, vakuru vemakereke, vafundisi, nevaparidzi havanzwisisi ruponeso rwemweya muna Kristu, uye vose vari kuita sevana vaMwari.
Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Zvinhu zvose ndezvangu nevhangeri ( kurasikirwa ) yehupenyu → kurasikirwa Mweya wako ndiwo muviri wako Wana mweya nemuviri waKristu → Unofanira kuchengetedza hupenyu ,ndizvo Wakaponesa mweya wangu muviri ".)

bvunza: Nzira yekuwana sei muviri wemweya waKristu?

mhinduro: Pfuurira kugoverana muchinyorwa chinotevera: Ruponeso rwomweya

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Sezvazvakanyorwa muBhaibheri: Ndichaparadza uchenjeri hwevakachenjera uye ndicharasa kunzwisisa kwevakachenjera - ivo iboka revaKristu vanobva kumakomo vane tsika shoma uye zvishoma zvidzidzo , achivadana kuti vaparidze vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Zekaria chitsauko 12 ndima 1 tiverenge pamwe chete: Shoko raJehovha pamusoro paIsraeri. Zvanzi naJehovha, iye akatatamura denga rose, akateya nheyo dzenyika, nokuumba mweya mukati momunhu;

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Ruponeso rweMweya" Aihwa. 2 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa muviri wemweya watateguru Adamu.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Adhamu, tateguru wevanhu→→muviri wemweya

1. Mweya waAdamu

(1) Mweya waAdhamu (mudzimu) wakasikwa

bvunza: Mudzimu waAdhama wakasikwa here? Zvichiri mbishi?
mhinduro: Adam" mweya "yakagadzirwa → → 【 Ndiani akasika mweya mukati memunhu 】→→Ndiani akasika munhu? mweya ” → → → Zvanzi naJehovha → pamusoro paIsraeri, tambanudza matenga uye muvake nheyo dzenyika Ndiani akasika mweya mukati memunhu Jehovha anoti: Reference (Zekaria 12:1)

(2) Ngirozi (midzimu) inosikwawo

bvunza: Ko “midzimu” yengirozi yakasikwawo here?
mhinduro: "Nyeredzi inopenya, mwanakomana wemambakwedza", makerubhi anofukidza areka yesungano → makerubhi ndiwo " Angel "→ ngirozi" muviri wemweya “Zvose zvakasikwa naMwari→ kubva pazuva rawakasikwa Iwe wakanga wakakwana panzira dzako dzose, asi ipapo kusarurama kwakawanikwa pakati pako. ( Ezekieri 28:15 )

(3) Nyama neropa zvaAdhamu (mudzimu).

bvunza: Adam" mweya "Kubva kupi?"
mhinduro: “Mukati meKusikwa kwoMunhu” mweya “The →→Jehovha Mwari achazviita” akatsamwa “Furidzira mumhino dzake, uye achava chimwe chinhu ( mweya ) zvomunhu mupenyu anonzi Adhamu! →→Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mumhino dzake mweya woupenyu, akava munhu mupenyu anonzi Adhamu. Chirevo (Genesi 2:7)

bvunza: “Mweya” waAdhamu wenyama here?
mhinduro: Adam" mweya ” Zvakasikwa →→ Saka zvakanyorwa kuti: “Munhu wokutanga Adhamu, akava mudzimu ( Mweya: kana kuturikirwa seropa "Munhu mupenyu"; Adhamu wokupedzisira ndiye mweya unoraramisa vanhu. Asi wemweya hauzi wekutanga; Zvakasikwa zvinouya pekutanga , uye ipapo pachava nevemweya. ( 1 VaKorinde 15:45-46 )

2. Mweya waAdhamu

(1) Adhamu akatyora chibvumirano

---Idya kubva pamuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa---

Jehovha Mwari akamurayira achiti, "Ungadya hako miti yose yomunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usadya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo." Genesisi Chitsauko 2) Ndima 16-17)
bvunza: Adhamu akaputsa sei sungano?
mhinduro: Saka mukadzi (Evha) paakaona kuti muchero womuti wakanga wakanakira kudya, unofadza meso, uye unofadza meso, uye nokuchenjedza vanhu, akatora muchero akaudya, akaupa kumurume wake. Adam). Chirevo (Genesi 3:6)

(2) Adhamu akatukwa nomutemo

bvunza: Ndeipi yaiva miuyo yokuputsa sungano kwaAdhama?
mhinduro: Pasi peKutukwa kweMutemo →" Chero bedzi uchiudya uchafa zvirokwazvo. "
Jehovha Mwari →→ Zvino akati kuna Adhamu, "Zvawakateerera mukadzi wako, ukadya muti wandakakuraira kuti usaudya, ivhu ratukwa nokuda kwako; unofanira kubata mazuva ose oupenyu hwako kuti uwane chokudya. kubva pairi. minzwa norukato zvichakumera iwe; uchadya miriwo yesango; uchadya zvokudya zvako neziya rechiso chako, kusvikira wadzokera kuguruva; refer to ( Genesisi 3:17-19 )

(3) Mweya waAdhamu wakasvibiswa

bvunza: Vazukuru vaAdhamu (mweya) vakasvibiswawo here?
mhinduro: Adam" mweya ” → Iva Nyoka.Dhiragoni.Dhiyabhorosi.Satani.Nsvina. . Isu vanhu tose tiri vazukuru vedu Adhamu, uye mudzimu unoyerera matiri ndiwo Ropa "→ Yatova isina kuchena, isina kuchena kana kuchena," hupenyu "Izvozvi" mweya "zvose zvakakanganiswa" nyoka "Tsvina.
Sezvazvakanyorwa →Hama dzinodiwa, zvatine zvipikirwa izvi, Zvichenesei kubva kutsvina yese yemuviri nemweya , ityai Mwari uye muitwe vatsvene. (2 VaKorinde 7:1)

3. Muviri waAdamu

(1)Muviri waAdamu

…yakagadzirwa neguruva...

bvunza: Mutumbi watateguru wekutanga Adhamu wakabvepi?
mhinduro: " huruva “Akasika → Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, uye zita rake rainzi Adhamu! →→ Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira upenyu mumhino dzake, akava munhu mupenyu, womudzimu, uye zita rake ainzi Adhamu. Uye isu vanhu tose tiri vazukuru vaAdhama, uye miviri yeduwo ndeyepasi. → Munhu wokutanga akabva panyika uye akanga ari wepasi;...Nongedzero ( 1 VaKorinde 15:47 )

(2) Adhamu akatengeswa kuchivi

bvunza: Adhamu akatyora chibvumirano akatengesera ani?
mhinduro: "Adam" 1 Zvenyika, 2 Zvenyama neropa, 3 Pataiva munyama, takatengeswa mhosva ” → Isu tose tiri zvizvarwa zvake, uye takatengeswa kwaari tichiri panyama. mhosva ” → Tinoziva kuti murairo ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama; Yakatengeswa kuzvivi . Reference (VaRoma 7:14)

bvunza: Chii chiri mubairo wechivi?
mhinduro: Ehe kufa →→Nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu; asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. ( VaRoma 6:23 )

bvunza: Rufu runobvepi?
mhinduro: kufa kubva mhosva Hunouya → Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, Adhamu, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, naizvozvo rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose nokuti munhu wose akaita chivi. ( VaRoma 5:12 )

bvunza: Vanhu vose vachafa here?
mhinduro: Nokuti munhu wose akatadza uye akasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari
→" mhosva "Mubayiro rufu → Zvakatemerwa kuti vanhu vose vafe kamwe chete, uye pashure pacho kutongwa. Reference (VaHebheru 9:27)

bvunza: Vanhu vanoendepi kana vafa?
mhinduro: vanhu" kufa "Pachava nekutongwa gare gare → Muviri wemunhu ndewenyika, uye muviri uchadzokera kuvhu mushure mekufa; kana munhu akasadaro" tsamba "Ruregerero rwaJesu Kristu, rwemunhu" mweya "zvichaita → 1 “kuburukira kuHadhesi”; 2 Kutonga Kwezuva Rekupedzisira → zita Kwete kurangarirwa bhuku roupenyu Kana akasimuka, achakandwa mudziva remoto → Iri dziva remoto ndiro rokutanga rufu rwechipiri , “Mweya” unoparara nekusingaperi . →→Ipapo ndakaona vakafa, vakuru navaduku, vamire pamberi pechigaro choumambo. Mabhuku akazarurwa, nerimwe bhuku rikazarurwa, iro bhuku roupenyu. Vakafa vakatongwa maererano nezvakanyorwa mumabhuku aya uye maererano nemabasa avo. Naizvozvo gungwa rakabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri, norufu neHadhesi zvikabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri; Rufu neHadhesi zvakakandwawo mudziva remoto; Kana zita remunhu risina kunyorwa mubhuku reupenyu, uchakandirwa mudziva remoto. Reference (Zvakazarurwa 20:12-15), unonzwisisa izvi here?

(3) Muviri waAdhamu uchaora

bvunza: Chii chinoitika kumuviri wepanyika?
mhinduro: Sezvakaita iye wevhu, ndizvo zvakaitawo vose vepanyika; Chirevo ( 1 VaKorinte 15:48 ).

Cherechedza: ndezvenyika Muviri wako uri sei? →Kubva pakuzvarwa kusvika pakuchembera, kuberekwa, kuchembera, kurwara uye kufa →Muviri wepanyika unoramba uchiipa zvishoma nezvishoma, uye pakupedzisira wodzokera kuguruva →→Uchatofanira kudikitira kumeso kwako kuti uwane chokurarama nacho kusvikira wadzokera kuvhu, nokuti makaberekwa kubva panyika. Iwe uri guruva, uye kuguruva uchadzokera. (Genesi 3:19)

(Cherechedza: Hama nehanzvadzi! Kunzwisisa muviri wemweya waAdhamu kutanga → ndiko kunzwisisa muviri wedu wemweya chete mune inotevera "Chinyorwa Chekuparidza" ndipo paunogona kunzwisisa kuti Jesu Kristu anoponesa sei mweya yedu. )

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Ruponeso rweMweya" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Mweya unotaura

(1) Mweya waAbheri unotaura

Nerutendo Abheri wakabayira kuna Mwari chibayiro chakanaka pane chaKaini chaakapa; naizvozvo wakagamuchira uchapupu hwekururamiswa kwake, uchapupu hwechipo chake; Kunyange zvazvo akafa, akaramba achitaura nokuda kwokutenda uku. ( VaHebheru 11:4 )
bvunza: Abheri akafa panyama asi achiri kutaura? Chii chiri kutaura?
mhinduro: Mweya unotaura, mweya waAbheri unotaura!

(2) Ropa raAbheri rakachema kuna Mwari

bvunza: Mweya waAbheri unotaura sei?
mhinduro: Jehovha akati, “Waitei (Kaini)? Ropa romunun’una wako (Abheri) rinochema kwandiri nenzwi rinobva muvhu.

bvunza: Ropa rine inzwi rinodanidzira kuna Mwari richibva muvhu nenzira iyi, “ropa” rinewo inzwi rokutaura here?
mhinduro: nekuti" Ropa "Mune hupenyu mariri, muropa." hupenyu ” Kutaura → Revhitiko 17:11 Nokuti upenyu hwechisikwa chipenyu huri muropa randinokupai kuti riyananisire mweya yenyu paatari. nokuti Ropa Mune hupenyu mariri , kuti zviyananisire zvivi.

------ -Hupenyu hwemunhu Ropa pakati -------

bvunza: " Ropa "Mune hupenyu mune izvi" hupenyu "Ndiyo mweya here?"
mhinduro: " hupenyu ": Kana kuti rakashandurwa somweya, Ropa Hupenyu huri mukati mweya →→ Nekuti, chero munhu anoda kuponesa hupenyu hwake ( Hupenyu: kana kushandurwa somweya; ) ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu achahuwana. ( Mateu 16:25 )

bvunza: " Ropa "Pane izwi ririkutaura, mweya urikutaura here?"
mhinduro: zvevanhu" Ropa "Mairi mune hupenyu, mukati Ropa "mu hupenyu "Ndemunhu" mweya ” → “ Ropa "Pane inzwi riri kutaura, kureva" mweya "Taura!"

2. Mweya unogona kutaura usina muviri

(1)Mweya unotaura zvinonzwika

Zvakazarurwa 6:9-10 Akati azarura chisimbiso chechishanu, ndakaona pasi pearitari mweya yaavo vakanga vaurayiwa nokuda kweshoko raMwari uye nokuda kwouchapupu; danidzira nenzwi guru “O Ishe, mutsvene wechokwadi, zvichatora nguva yakareba sei kuti mutonge avo vanogara panyika nokutsiva ropa redu?

bvunza: Ndivanaani vakaurayiwa nokuda kweshoko raMwari?
mhinduro: mutsvene! Vakaurayiwa panyama nokuda kwevaKristu vaichengeta chokwadi uye vakapupura nezvaJesu. mweya “Wakaparadzaniswa nomuviri,” ndizvo. mweya “Kutsiva ropa raMwari. Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Musatya vanouraya muviri asi vasingagoni kuuraya mweya; ” Chirevo ( Mateu 10:28 )

(2) Incorporeal " mweya “Taura, hatisi kunzwa

bvunza: " mweya "Kutaura → Nzeve dzevanhu dzinozvinzwa here?"
mhinduro: chete" mweya "Kutaura, hakuna munhu anogona kuzvinzwa! Somuenzaniso, kana iwe ukataura chinyararire mumoyo mako: "Mhoro" → iyi " mweya wehupenyu "Taura! Asi izvi" mweya "Pakutaura, kana inzwi rikasapfuura nemiromo yenyama, nzeve dzevanhu hadzigoni kunzwa, chete" mweya wehupenyu “Apo manzwi anobudiswa norurimi nemiromo, nzeve dzomunhu dzinogona kuanzwa;
Mumwe muenzaniso ndewekuti vanhu vazhinji vanotenda kuti " kunze kwemuviri "nharo, rinhi" mweya "Kusiya muviri," mweya "Muviri wako unogona kuona. Asi muviri wemunhu ziso rakashama Handisi kuona" mweya ", haigone kubata" mweya ", haigone kushandiswa ne" mweya "Taura uye hausi kunzwa" mweya "Inzwi rekutaura.

Nokuti Mwari mweya →→Saka ndinogona kunzwa zvaAbheri “ mweya "Manzwi ekutaura, uye avo vakaurayiwa nekuda kweshoko raMwari" mweya "Inzwi rekutaura. Asi nzeve dzedu dzenyama hadzigoni kunzwa kutaura kwemweya, uye mweya haugoni kuonekwa neziso rakashama, uye haugoni kubatwa nemaoko.

Kana vari vasingatendi kuti kuna Mwari , havadaviri kuti vanhu vane mweya, uye vanodavira kuti izvi zvose kuziva nezvishuvo zviri mumuviri womunhu .

chaizvo" mweya "Uyo anogona kurarama ari oga pasina muviri anogona achiri kutaura! Sezvazvakanyorwa → Taura zvinhu zvemweya kuvanhu vemweya; asi vanhu venyama havanganzwisisi kana kunzwisisa. Nenzira iyi, unoinzwisisa here?

3. Muviri usina mweya wakafa

Jakobho 2:26 Sezvo muviri usina mweya wakafa, saizvozvo kutenda kusina mabasa kwakafawo.

bvunza: Chii chaizoitika dai muviri usina mweya?
mhinduro: Muviri wakafa usina mweya →→Hupenyu hwevanhu huri mu "ropa", " hupenyu ” → iri “ mweya "," Ropa Inoyerera kumutezo mumwe nomumwe womuviri, uye mitezo ine upenyu. Ropa “Pasina kuyerera kuenda kunhengo dzemuviri, panova nechiveve uye kurasikirwa nepfungwa, uye muviri unofira panzvimbo iyoyo. Somuenzaniso, vamwe vanhu vanotambura nehemiplegia, kureva hemiplegia, uye chimwe chikamu chemuviri chinenge chatadza kuziva. . Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumai vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu, nekubwinya, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kutivhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya→ Hwisisa kuti kutenda muna Mwari pasina kutenda muna Muponesi Jesu uye kutenda kusina kuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene kwakafa.

1. Kusatya uye Kuzvibata

(1) VaJudha vanotenda muna Mwari asi kwete Jesu, uye mufambiro wavo wokuchengeta mutemo wakafa

Jakobho 2:19-20 Iwe unotenda kuti kuna Mwari mumwe chete, uye unotenda kwazvo mazviri; Iwe munhu dununu, unoda kuziva here kuti kutenda kusina mabasa kwakafa?

bvunza: Sei hunhu hwemaJuda hwekuchengeta mutemo hwakafa?
mhinduro: "muJudha" chivimbo → Tenda muna Mwari, Asi usatenda muna Jesu ! James akati → Iwe unotenda kuti kuna Mwari mumwe chete Unozvitenda nemazvo.

articles.title: Jesu ndiani?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
bvunza: Jesu ndiani?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari Wokumusorosoro

---*Ngirozi dzinopupura: Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari*---
Mutumwa akati kwaari: Usatya Maria; wanzwirwa nyasha naMwari; uchava nemimba, ugozvara mwanakomana, ugomutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu; iye uchava mukuru, uchanzi Mwanakomana weWokumusoro-soro; Mwari achamupa chigaro choumambo chababa vake Dhavhidhi, uye achatonga pamusoro peimba yaJakobho nokusingaperi, uye umambo hwake hahuzogumi.” Mariya akati kumutumwa: “Izvi zvingaitika sei kwandiri nokuti handina kuroora? Akapindura akati: Mweya Mutsvene uchauya pamusoro pako, nesimba reWokumusoro-soro richakudzikatira; naizvozvo icho chitsvene chichaberekwa chichanzi Mwanakomana waMwari. Mwanakomana waMwari) (Ruka 1:30-35).

(2)Jesu ndiMesiya

Johani 1:41 Akatanga kuenda kumunun’una wake Simoni akati kwaari, “Tamuwana Mesiya” (zvinoshandurwa kuti Mesiya.)
Johani 4:25 Mukadzi akati, “Ndinoziva kuti Mesiya anonzi Kristu ari kuuya, uye paanouya achatiudza zvinhu zvose.”

(3)Jesu ndiye Kristu

Jesu akati asvika munharaunda yeKesaria Firipi, akabvunza vadzidzi vake akati, “Vanoti ndini ani, Mwanakomana woMunhu?” Vamwe vanoti Johani Mubhabhatidzi; kana mumwe wavaprofita Jesu akati: “Munoti ndini ani. Ndimi Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu . ” ( Mateu 16:13-16 )

Marita akati, “Ishe, hongu, ndinotenda kuti ndimi Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, waizouya panyika.” ( Johane 11:27 )

(4)Jesu: “Ndiri zvandiri”!

Mwari akati kuna Mosesi: “Ndini iye wandiri” uye akatiwo: “Uti kuvaIsraeri: ‘Iye ariko akandituma kwamuri.’” ( Eksodho 3:14 ) Jehovha akati kuna Mosesi:

Zvino ndakati ndichimuona, ndakawira patsoka dzake sewakafa; akaisa ruoko rwake rworudyi pamusoro pangu akati: Usatya, ndini wokutanga nowokupedzisira, ndinorarama; ndakanga ndafa, zvino tarira, ndiri mupenyu nokusingaperi-peri; .” uye kiyi dzeHadhesi ( Zvakazarurwa 1:17-18 ).

Ipapo akati kwandiri, “Zvaitwa!
“Tarirai, ndinokurumidza kuuya! Mubayiro wangu ndinawo, wokupa mumwe nomumwe sezvaakabata. Ndini Arfa naOmega; ( Zvakazarurwa 22:12-13 )

mhinduro: Mhandara Mariya yakava nepamuviri poMweya Mutsvene, nokuti pamuviri pairi pakabva paMweya Mutsvene → Kuberekwa kwaJesu Kristu kwakanyorwa pasi apa: Amai vake Mariya vakanga vavimbiswa kuroorwa naJosefa, asi vasati varoorana, Mariya akava nepamuviri poMutsvene. Mweya . ...Achiri kufunga izvozvo, mutumwa waShe akazviratidza kwaari mukurota akati, "Josefa, mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, usatya hako, Tora Maria, ave mukadzi wako, nokuti mimba yake yabva kwaari; Mweya Mutsvene.”— Mateu 1:18, 20;

bvunza: Mhandara yakabata pamuviri paMweya Mutsvene.
mhinduro: Ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari, Wokumusorosoro → Maria akati kungirozi, “Handina kuroora, izvi zvingaitika seiko?” achakufukidza, kuti Mutsvene achazvarwa achanzi Mwanakomana waMwari (Ruka 1:34-35).

(3) Kuti mashoko emuprofita azadzike, mhandara ichabata pamuviri uye ichabereka mwanakomana

Iye achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti Jesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Zvinhu izvi zvose zvakaitika kuti zvizadzise zvakarehwa naIshe kubudikidza nemuporofita achiti: Tarira, mhandara ichava nemimba, ichabereka mwanakomana, vachatumidza zita rake Emanueri. ” (Emanueri anoshandura se“Mwari anesu.”) ( Mateu 1:21-23 )

bvunza: Zita rake Jesu! Zita rokuti Jesu rinorevei?
mhinduro: Zita [raJesu] rinoreva kuti achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Imanueri zvinorevei?
mhinduro: Imanueri inoturikira ichiti “Mwari anesu”!

bvunza: Mwari anesu sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Unofanira kuberekwa patsva

1 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya --Tarisa kuna Johane 3 ndima 5-7
[Mudzimu Mutsvene] Ivai nesu nokusingaperi→→ndichakumbira Baba, uye Baba vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi (kana Shanduro: Munyaradzi; iyeyu pazasi), kuti ave nemi nokusingaperi, iye Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi. , Ichi chinhu chisingagone kugamuchirwa nenyika nokuti haimuoni kana kumuziva. Asi imi munomuziva, nokuti agere nemi uye achava mamuri. ( Johani 14:16-17 )

2 Vakazvarwa kubva pachokwadi chevhangeri --Onai 1 VaKorinte 4:15 naJakobho 1:18

3 Akaberekwa naMwari --Verenga Johani 1:12-13

(2) Kudya nokunwa muviri neropa raShe

Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi, uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira. Nyama yangu chikafu zvirokwazvo, neropa rangu chimwiwa. Unodya nyama yangu nekumwa ropa rangu, unogara mandiri, neni maari. ( Johani 6:54-56 )

(3)Isu tiri muviri waKristu

1 VaKorinde 12:27 Imi muri muviri waKristu, uye mumwe nomumwe wenyu inhengo.
VaEfeso 5:30 Nokuti isu tiri mitezo yomuviri wake (mamwe magwaro anowedzera: mapfupa ake nenyama yake).

Cherechedza: " Emanueri "."Mwari anesu"→→nokuti takaberekwa naMwari" Mutsva" Iwo muviri waShe noupenyu, mapfupa ake nenyama yake, uye mitezo yomuviri waKristu, saka “ Imanueri Mwari vanesu nguva dzose "Saka wanzwisisa here?
→→ Mweya Mutsvene Garai mumuviri waKristu, unova temberi, isu tiri nhengo, uye kunyange kune mitezo mizhinji, kune muviri mumwe chete - tarisa kuna 1 Vakorinde 12:12 → → Nekuti chero kune vaviri kana vatatu muzita rangu " chechi “Pavanoungana pamwe chete, ndiripo pakati pavo.” ( Mateu 18:20 )

(Mazuvano, vatendi vazhinji vasinganzwisisi kuberekwa patsva vanotenda kuti kana ndaita chitadzo, Mwari ari kure neni; kana ndisina kutadza, Mwari uneni, saka vanogara vachinamata kuna Mwari." Uya “Iva neni” → Vanonzwisisa kuti “Mwari anesu” kureva → kuti vanhu vanenge vari pamwe chete kana kuti vakaungana pamwe chete kana vanhu vachienda, vanenge vasisipo, sekuti mudzimai womurume aenda musha wokuberekerwa, murume nomudzimai havachipo; vamwe vanhu vanodavira kuti Mwari anopfuura nguva nenzvimbo, kuti Mwari ane chechi apo nyika dzakapoteredza pasi rose dzinoungana, uye Mwari anobva pashure pokunge chechi yaungana →→Maonero avanhu aya haanzwisiswi. Emanueri ” Huvepo hwaMwari.

Nokuti Mwari wedu mukuru kune nyika → 1 Johani 4:4 Vana vaduku, imi, muri vaMwari, makavakunda;
Avo vakaberekwa naMwari vanogara muna Kristu → ndivo mapfupa omuviri wake, nyama yake, uye isu tiri muumambo hwaMwari, saka Mwari anesu nokusingaperi! Ameni. Vanofarira" Emanueri "Ini handisi kunzwisisa, nekuti handisi kunzwisisa" kuberekwa patsva "Ini handisi kunzwisisa chikonzero), saka, unozvinzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Gamuchira hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kutsvaga nebrowser yako - kereke munashe Jesu Kristu -Batana nesu mushande pamwe chete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

articles.title: wedzinza remukadzi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
1: Jesu muzukuru wemukadzi

bvunza: Jesu aive muzukuru wemurume here kana wemukadzi?

Mhinduro: Jesu ndiye mbeu yemukadzi

(1) Jesu akaberekwa nemhandara yanambwa noMweya Mutsvene

Kuberekwa kwaJesu Kristu kwakanyorwa seizvi: Maria, mai vake vakanga vatsidzirana naJosefa, asi vasati varoorana, Maria akava nepamuviri noMweya Mutsvene. …nokuti icho chakaitwa maari chakabva kuMweya Mutsvene. ( Mateu 1:18, 20 )

(2) Jesu akaberekwa nemhandara

1 Chiporofita cheKuberekwa kweMhandara →→Naizvozvo Ishe amene achakupai chiratidzo: Mhandara ichava napamuviri, ndokubereka mwanakomana, uye achanzi Emanueri (kureva kuti Mwari anesu). ( Isaya 7:14 )

2 Kuzadzikiswa kweKuberekwa kweMhandara →→Achiri kufunga pamusoro paikoku, ngirozi yaJehovha yakazviratidza kwaari muchiroto ndokuti: “Josefa, mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, usatya! Tora Maria mudzimai wako, nokuti icho icho pamuviri paari chinobva muuranda hwemimba. Mweya Mutsvene.” Uya. Achazvara mwanakomana. Unofanira kumupa zita. Zita rake ndiJesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo.” Izvi zvose zvakaitwa kuti zvizadzise zvakataurwa naShe kubudikidza nomuprofita achiti: “Tarirai, mhandara ichava napamuviri, ichabereka mwanakomana, uye vachamutumidza zita rokuti ” Manuel” (yakashandurwa kuti “Emmanuel”) Mwari anesu.” ( Mateo 1:20-23 )

(3) Jesu akaberekwa nemhandara noMweya Mutsvene

bvunza: Jesu akaberekwa naBaba here?
mhinduro: Mwari Baba Mudzimu here? Ehe! →→Mwari mweya (kana kuti haana shoko), saka vanomunamata vanofanira kumunamata mumweya nechokwadi. ( Johane 4:24 ), Mweya waBaba Mweya Mutsvene here? Ehe! Mudzimu waJesu Mudzimu Mutsvene Here? Ehe! Mudzimu waBaba, Mweya weMwanakomana, uye Mweya Mutsvene chimwe chete here? Inobva kumweya mumwe here? Ehe. Naizvozvo, chose chinozvarwa noMweya Mutsvene uye chakazvarwa noMweya chinozvarwa naBaba uye chinozvarwa naMwari. Saka, unonzwisisa here? →NezveMwanakomana wake Jesu Kristu Ishe wedu, akaberekwa nembeu yaDhavhidhi panyama; uye akaziviswa kuva Mwanakomana waMwari nesimba maererano nomudzimu woutsvene nokumuka kubva kuvakafa. ( VaRoma 1:3-4 )

2: Tinotenda kuti Jesu ndiyewo mbeu yemukadzi

bvunza: Vazukuru vaani isu panyama takazvarwa nevabereki vedu?
mhinduro: Ivo vazukuru vevarume→Chinhu chose chinoberekwa nekubatana kwemurume nemukadzi chinobva pamurume. Somuenzaniso, Adhamu akarara nomudzimai wake (Evha) zvakare, uye akabereka mwanakomana akamutumidza kuti Seti, zvinoreva kuti: “Mwari andipa mumwe mwanakomana pachinzvimbo chaAbheri, nokuti Kaini akamuurayawo akabereka mwanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Enoshi. Panguva iyoyo vanhu vanodana kuzita raJehovha. ( Genesisi 4:25-26 )

bvunza: Mudzinza raani watinotenda muna Jesu?
mhinduro: vazukuru vevakadzi ! Sei? →→Jesu muzukuru wemukadzi here? Ehe! Zvino tinoberekwa naani kana tichitenda muna Jesu Kristu?

2 vakaberekwa nechokwadi chevhangeri ,

... Ishe, uye isu tiri Mitezo yomuviri wake upenyu hwake → sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: ““Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi (ndiko kuti, uyo ane upenyu hwaJesu ane upenyu husingaperi) . uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rekupedzisira. ( Johani 6:54 ) Unonzwisisa izvi here?

articles.title: Vazukuru vevarume
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vazukuru vevarume

bvunza: Vazukuru vaani isu panyama takazvarwa kubva kuvabereki vedu?
mhinduro: Vazukuru vevarume ,

Vana vose vanoberekwa nekubatana kwemurume nomukadzi vazukuru vomurume, vakadai sevana vakazvarwa na“tateguru” Adhamu nomudzimai wake Evha → Rimwe zuva, murume “Adhamu” akarara nomudzimai wake Evha. , Evha ndokubata mimba, ndokubereka Kaini (kureva kuwana), ndokuti: Jehovha wandipa murume. Abheri akanga ari mufudzi wemakwai, Kaini akanga ari murimi. ( Genesisi 4:1-2 )
Adhamu akararazve nomukadzi wake, akabereka mwanakomana, akamutumidza zita rokuti Seti, zvichireva kuti, Mwari andipa mumwe mwanakomana pachinzvimbo chaAbheri, nokuti Kaini akamuberekerawo mwanakomana. akamutumidza zita rinonzi Enoshi. Panguva iyoyo vanhu vanodana kuzita raJehovha. ( Genesisi 4:25-26 )

bvunza: "Tateguru wekutanga wevanhu" Adhamu "Yabvepi?"
mhinduro: Inobva kuguruva !

(1) Jehovha Mwari akasika munhu neguruva

Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mweya woupenyu mumhino dzake, akava mweya mupenyu; zita rake rainzi Adhamu. ( Genesisi 2:7 )

(2) Adhamu aiva munhu chaiye

Bhaibheri rinonyorawo ikoku, kuti: “Munhu wokutanga, Adhama, akava munhu mupenyu nomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa senyama)”; ( 1 VaKorinte 15:45 )

(3) Akaberekwa neguruva achadzokera kuguruva

bvunza: Nei vanhu vachiguma panyika?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Nokuti vanhu vakadarika murayiro, vakatadza, vakadya muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa.

Jehovha Mwari akaisa munhu mumunda weEdheni kuti aurime nokuuchengeta. Jehovha Mwari akamurayira kuti: “Ungadya hako miti yose yomumunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo! 2:15) -17 mapfundo)

2 Kutyora chibvumirano uye kupara mhosva, kugamuchira chituko chemurairo

Zvino akati kuna Adhamu: Nekuti wakateerera mukadzi wako, ukadya muti wandakakuraira kuti urege kuudya, nyika yatukwa nokuda kwako; iwe unofanira kubata mazuva ose oupenyu hwako kuti uwane chokudya pauri. ." zvinofanira minzwa norukato zvichakurikira iwe; uchadya miriwo yesango; ( Genesisi 3:17-19 )

(4) Munhu wese anofa

Zvinoenderana nezvinozoitika, munhu wese akatemerwa kufa kamwe chete, uye mushure mekufa pachava nekutongwa. ( VaHebheru 9:27 )

(5) Kuchava nekutongwa pashure porufu

Cherechedza: Vose vanakomana nevanasikana vedzinza romunhu vakatadza, vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari, uye vari pasi pechituko chemurairo → Vanhu vose vakatemerwa kufa kamwe chete, uye vachafa, uye pashure porufu pachava nokutongwa; uye vacharangwa maererano nezvavakaita pasi pomutemo Kutonga→→ndiko kuparadzwa kwechipiri--tarira kuna Zvakazarurwa 20:13-15

Ipapo ndakaona vakafa, vakuru navaduku, vamire pamberi pechigaro choushe. Mabhuku akazarurwa, nerimwe bhuku rikazarurwa, iro bhuku roupenyu. Vakafa vakatongwa maererano nezvakanyorwa mumabhuku aya uye maererano nemabasa avo. Naizvozvo gungwa rakabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri, norufu neHadhesi zvikabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri; Rufu neHadhesi zvakakandwawo mudziva remoto; Kana zita remunhu risina kunyorwa mubhuku reupenyu, uchakandirwa mudziva remoto. Tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa Chitsauko 20

(6)Jesu akati! unofanira kuberekwa patsva

bvunza: Nei tichifanira kuberekwa patsva?
mhinduro: Kana munhu asina kuberekwa patsva, haangaoni umambo hwaMwari, uye haangapindi muumambo hwaMwari. Kana munhu asina kuberekwa patsva, achatambura kutongwa kwezuva rokupedzisira → achikandwa mudziva remoto, runova rufu rwechipiri (ndiko kuti, rufu rwemweya). Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo Jesu akapindura kuti: “Chokwadi, chokwadi ndinoti kwauri, Kana munhu asingaberekwi kutsva, haangaoni umambo hwaMwari.” Jesu akati: “Chokwadi, chokwadi ndinoti kwauri, kana munhu asingaberekwi. nemvura noMweya Kana wakaberekwa nenyama, haugoni kupinda muumambo hwaMwari.

articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 1 Timotio chitsauko 3 ndima 15 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kana ndikanonoka, iwe uchadzidza kuzvibata muimba yaMwari. Iyi ndiyo kereke yaMwari mupenyu, mbiru nenheyo yezvokwadi .

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora, kuyanana, uye kugovera " Mhosho muKudzidzisa kweKereke Nhasi "(Aihwa. 2 ) Taura uye unamate: “Abba Baba voKudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose”! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka" chechi "Tumai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro ndiro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu uye vhangeri rekupinda muumambo hwekudenga! Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kuvonga, nemaropafadzo zviri muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Chechi yeimba

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mhuri?
mhinduro: Mhuri inoreva mubatanidzwa wehupenyu hwemagariro wakaumbwa pahwaro hwewanano, hukama hweropa kana hukama hwekurerwa, nemanzwiro sechisungo nehukama hwehukama.

bvunza: Chechi chii?
mhinduro: Kereke ndiwo muviri waKristu, uye maKristu inhengo dzaKristu. Reference VaEfeso

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mhuri?
mhinduro: Mhuri inotaura nezveupenyu → zvinhu zvinokosha pakurarama panyika, uye mafambisirwo anoitwa upenyu.

bvunza: Chechi ndeyei?
mhinduro: Chechi inotaura nezvehupenyu → Hupenyu hwakazvarwa patsva, hwekudenga” Hembe Pfekai mucheka wakanaka, pfekai Kristu; Zvokudya “Inwai mvura yomudzimu, idyai zvokudya zvomudzimu,” live “Garai muna Kristu,” OK “Mweya Mutsvene unoshanda matiri uye unobata basa ravo rokuvaka muviri waKristu Amen

1 TIMOTI 3:15 Asi kana ndikakunonotsa, uchaziva kuti unofanira kuzvibata sei mumba maMwari. Imba iyi ikereke yaMwari mupenyu, mbiru nenheyo yechokwadi.

bvunza: Chechi yaMwari mupenyu chii?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Kereke muna Ishe Jesu Kristu → Pauro, Sirasi, uye Timotio vakanyorera kukereke muna Mwari Baba vedu naShe Jesu Kristu paTesaronika. Chirevo (2 VaTesaronika Chitsauko 1:1)
2 Chechi mumba →Chechi muimba yaPrisira naAkwira Reference (VaRoma 16:3-5)
3 Kereke kumba →Kwazisai hama naNimifasi weRaodhikia, nekereke iri mumba make. Chirevo (VaKorose 4:15)
4 Kereke yako →uye Afia hanzvadzi yedu, naArkipo murwi pamwe chete nesu, nekereke iri mumba mako. Chirevo ( Firimoni 1:2 )

bvunza: Bhaibheri rinonyora kereke yaMwari mupenyu→→ 1 Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu, 2 kuchechi kumba, 3 kuchechi kumba, 4 Chechi yako yekumba.

Ndeupi musiyano uripo pakati pemakereke aya nemakereke (eimba)?
Mhinduro: Chechi yaMwari Asingagumi Ehe Taura nezvehupenyu →Rega vanhu vawane hupenyu, vaponeswe, uye vawane hupenyu husingaperi! ;

uye ( mhuri )Ehe Taura nezvehupenyu →" chechi yemba ”→Zvinoreva kutaura nezvemararamiro, akadai sekutenda neupenyu→ Dana vanhu kuti vatende muna Kristu Kurarama kunoreva kudya zvakanaka, kurarama zvakanaka, uye kuita zvakanaka Uchapupu hwoupenyu, kwete uchapupu hwoupenyu.

" chechi yemba " Ndizvo zvakakanganisika → foundation Inovakwa nehupenyu, Haina kuvakirwa pahupenyu , nokudaro zvichitungamirira kupasi rose " chechi yemba "Kuvhiringidzika kwedzidziso nemhosho → Kuvhiringidzika kwedzidziso kunopinda mumanomano adhiabhorosi naSatani, ayo anobereka dzidziso dzakatsauka dzakawanda navaporofita venhema. VanaKristu venhema vakauya, uye vaivapowo muchechi yokutanga, uye zvino varipowo muChina → zvakadai seMabvazuva. Mheni, Mwari Wemasimbaose, Vanopururudza, Chemera Vanyengeri sekuzvarwa patsva, zvemweya, makwai akarasika, evhangeri yenyasha, Korean Mark Tower, nezvimwe.

Mubvunzo: Ndedzipi dzidziso dzisina kururama dzekereke “dzemhuri”?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kuramba ropa raKristu ( kamwe ) inosuka zvitadzo zvavanhu

Vanofunga kuti Kristu anochenesa vatendi chete ( Pamberi uye tenda munaShe () pashure ) zvitadzo hazvisati zvaitwa zvakaita sezvitadzo zvanhasi, zvamangwana, zvitadzo zvamangwana, zvitadzo zvepfungwa, zvekupika, nezvimwewo. Kana vangoitwa, vanotanga kureurura zvitadzo zvavo votendeuka vonamata Kristu” Ropa "Huyai kuzosuka zvitadzo, kudzima zvitadzo, nokuzvifukidza zvakasimba. Kana muchiita zvitadzo zuva nezuva, zvisukei zuva nezuva mozvizora zuva nezuva. Kubva pakutanga kwegore". wash “Pakupera kwegore.

bvunza: Ndeipi mibairo kana ukachenesa zvivi zvako kakawanda?

mhinduro: Kana ukasuka zvitadzo kakawanda, Kristu achadeura ropa rake kakawanda;

1 ( negative ) Kristu akashandisa “ Ropa " kamwe Kupinda muNzvimbo Tsvene kunonatsa vanhu pazvivi zvavo
akapinda panzvimbo tsvene kamwe chete, kwete neropa rembudzi neremhuru, asi neropa rake pachake, akawana kuyananiswa kusingaperi. (VaHebheru 9:12)

articles.title: Mibvunzo neMhinduro: Nzira yeHongu uye Kwete
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 2 VaKorinte Chitsauko 1, ndima 18, tiverenge pamwe chete: NaMwari akatendeka, ndinoti, shoko ratinokuparidzirai harizi hongu nakwete; .

Nhasi tinodzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera maziviro ekuonesa "Nzira Yokururama Nechakaipa" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai kukereke ye“Mukadzi Wekukudzwa” nekutumira vashandi kuti vagovere shoko rechokwadi kuburikidza nemashoko akanyorwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri rinotigonesa kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yedu iregererwe. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso emweya yedu uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Dzidzisa vana vaMwari kuziva → nzira yechakanaka nechakaipa . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Hongu uye kwete

【Magwaro】
2 VaKorinde 1:18 Nokuti Mwari akatendeka, ndinoti kwamuri, kuparidza kwedu kwamuri kwakanga kusiri hongu nakwete. .

bvunza: Chii chinonzi → → hongu uye kwete?
mhinduro: Hongu uye kwete
Dudziro yeBhaibheri: Rinoreva chakanaka nechakaipa chakaerekana chambotaurwa kuti ". Ehe ", ndokubva ati " Aihwa "; asati ataura" rudyi ", ndokubva ati " zvakaipa "; asati ataura" chisimbiso, kuzivikanwa "; gare gare akati" Zvisinei, ramba ”, taura kana kuparidza → chakanaka nechakaipa, zvisingaenderani .

2. Nzira yezvakanaka nezvakaipa

bvunza: Chii chinonzi → → nzira yekuti hongu uye kwete?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) negative Mukristu Ropa anonatsa zvivi zvavanhu

bvunza: Ropa raShe ( kangani ) kuchenesa vanhu pazvivi zvavo?
mhinduro: " kamwe →→yaKristu Ropa Pane kungocheneswa kumwe chete kwezvivi, kwete kucheneswa kuzhinji kwezvitadzo.

1 Kristu akashandisa zvake Ropa , kamwe chete
akapinda panzvimbo tsvene kamwe chete, kwete neropa rembudzi neremhuru, asi neropa rake pachake, akawana kuyananiswa kusingaperi. ( VaHebheru 9:12 )

2 mupe muviri wake kamwe chete zvachose
Nekuda uku takaitwa vatsvene kubudikidza nekubayirwa kwemuviri waJesu Kristu kamwe. ( VaHebheru 10:10 )

3 Akapa chipiriso chezvivi;
Asi Kristu akapa chibayiro chimwe chete chisingaperi chezvivi uye akagara kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari. ( VaHebheru 10:12 )

4 ZvaJesu Ropa tichenese kubva kuchivi chose
Kana tichifamba muchiedza, saMwari ari muchiedza, tinowadzana nomumwe nomumwe wedu, uye ropa raJesu, Mwanakomana wake, rinotinatsa pazvivi zvose. ( 1 Johani 1:7 )

5 kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nokusingaperi
Nokuti nechibayiro chake chimwe chete anoita kuti vaya vanoitwa vatsvene vakwanise kusingaperi. ( VaHebheru 10:14 )

Cherechedza: Mukristu Ropa Chete" kamwe "Kana achenesa munhu kubva pazvivi zvake → anoita uyo anoitwa mutsvene akakwana nokusingaperi → mutsvene nokusingaperi, asina chivi, uye anoruramiswa! Ameni. Haanaki zvivi kakawanda; kufanana Kuti asuke zvitadzo kakawanda, Kristu aizodeura ropa kakawanda, Kristu aizofanira kutambura nokuuraiwa kakawanda →→ Kana ukamukumbira kuti ashambidze zvivi zvakare, uri kuuraya Jesu zvakare ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari, Gwayana. Ropa "Ita semazuva ese. Wazvinzwisisa here?

bvunza: Nzira yekuziva sei →" Hongu uye kwete "Kucheneswa kwezvivi?"
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Inoti “chenesa” pamberi;
(VaHebheru 1:3) Ndiye kupenya kwokubwinya kwaMwari, mufananidzo chaiwoiwo wokuvapo kwaMwari, uye anotsigira zvinhu zvose nomurayiro wake une simba. Akachenesa vanhu kubva kuzvivi zvavo , agere kuruoko rworudyi rwaChangamire kumusoro.

Cherechedza: Akadaro kare wash "; gare gare akati" negative ” → shandisa “ gare gare "Mashoko okuramba" Mberi “Zvaakataura → Vaparidzi vakawanda nhasi vanongozvitaura vachimonyorora miromo yavo → ( Akadaro kare )Jesu anotisuka pazvivi zvose; asi ) Ndinotenda muna Ishe” pashure “Zvitadzo zvamangwana, zvitadzo zvezuva rinotevera, zvitadzo zvendangariro, uye zvokutaura nemiromo hazvisati zvaitwa. ropa raJehovha ) kushambidza zvivi, kudzima zvivi, nokuzvifukidza →→Izvi ndizvo zvavanoparidza→” Nzira yehongu uye kwete ". Akati kare ( Ehe gare gare( Aihwa ), shandisa mazwi anotevera kuramba zvakataurwa kare.

(2) negative vakasununguka kubva pamurayiro

bvunza: Nzira yekupukunyuka sei kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwawo?
mhinduro: Nokufa pamwe chete naKristu nomuviri wake, takafa kumutemo unotisunga, uye zvino tasunungurwa pamutemo Ishe maererano nehutsva hwemweya (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene), kwete maererano nenzira yekare yetsika. ( VaRoma 7:6 ) uye vaGaratiya 3:13 .

bvunza: Nzira yekuziva →→" Hongu uye kwete "Kubva pamurairo?"
mhinduro: ( Akadaro kare Zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo nekutuka kwawo; Gare gare ) Kana tikadzokera tochengeta mutemo, tinenge taita senguruve yasukwa yodzokera mumatope. break away "Mutemo," akadaro gare gare Ngwarira "Mutemo → zvinoreva kuti hauna kusununguka pamutemo, asi uchiri kutyora mutemo pasi pemutemo. Kutyora mutemo chivi. Kana ukaramba uchityora mutemo, hauna kusununguka kubva pauri → → Izvi ndizvo izvo zvinoparidzwa nevaparidzi vavo vasina kururama. Nzira yehongu uye kwete ".

(3) negative Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi

bvunza: Vana vakazvarwa patsva vangatadza here?
mhinduro: Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; ( 1 Johani 3:9 )
Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi; ( 1 Johani 5:18 )

bvunza: Nzira yekuziva →→" Hongu uye kwete "Kuberekwazve?"
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatongotadzi; →(Zvakanaka)
2 Umwe neumwe akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi; →(Zvakanaka)
3 Ani nani anogara maari haatadzi→ (Chokwadi)

bvunza: Sei avo vakaberekwa naMwari vasingatadzi?
mhinduro: Nekuti shoko (mbeu) yaMwari riri mumoyo make, haangatadzi.

bvunza: Zvakadini kana mumwe munhu akapara mhosva?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 Ani nani unotadza haana kumuona — 1 Johani 3:6
2 Ani naani anotadza haana kumuziva ( Kusazwisisa kupona kwaKristu )--1 Johani 3:6
3 Umwe neumwe unoita chivi unobva kuna dhiabhorosi; —1 Johani 3:8

bvunza: Vana vasingatadzi ndevaani? Vana vatadzi ndevaani?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
【1】Vana vakaberekwa naMwari→→havazombotadzi!
【2】Vana vakazvarwa nenyoka→→chivi.
Kubva pane izvi zvinoratidzwa vana vaMwari uye vana vadhiabhorosi. Ani naani asingaiti zvakarurama haazi waMwari, uyewo ani naani asingadi hama yake. (1 Johani 3:10)

Cherechedza: VaKristu vanozvarwa naMwari → havazotadza → Ichokwadi cheBhaibheri Munhu wose anoita chivi ndewadhiyabhorosi → ichokwadiwo chemubhaibheri.

Makereke mazhinji nhasi anodavira zvisizvo kuti: Mushure mokunge munhu atenda munaShe uye aponeswa, kunyange zvazvo ari munhu akarurama, anenge avewo mutadzi. Vanoti vaKristu havarambi vachiita zvitadzo zvepabonde uye havana kujaira zvitadzo → vaKristu vakarurama uye vatadzi panguva imwe chete; dhiyabhorosi panguva imwe chete → Vanobva vagadzira izwi rimwe chete: hafu chipoko hafu mwari “Vanhu vakabuda votaura nyaya Pakarepo chakarurama uye dzimwe nguva chakaipa Tao, rudzi urwu rwokutenda rwunonzi rwakafa kana kuti kwete→→Izvi imhaka yokuti havanzwisisi.” kuberekwa patsva "Yakataurwa nemuparidzi akatsveyama→→ Nzira yehongu uye kwete . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Zvina, negative Mweya Mutsvene vanogara newe

bvunza: Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose here?
mhinduro: Ndichakumbira Baba, uye vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi (kana Shanduro: Munyaradzi; iyeyu pazasi), kuti ave newe nokusingaperi , iwo Mweya wechokwadi, uyo nyika isingagoni kugamuchira, nokuti haimuoni kana kumuziva. Asi imi munomuziva, nokuti agere nemi uye achava mamuri. Reference ( Johani 14:16-17 )

bvunza: Pese panoungana kereke, vanonamata → kuti Mweya Mutsvene uuye kereke yakadaro ine huvepo hweMweya Mutsvene here?
mhinduro: Nenzira iyi chechi ine chete " rambi "Aihwa" Mafuta ", ndizvo Hakuna huvepo hweMweya Mutsvene → Saka kumbira kuti Mweya Mutsvene auye nguva dzese dzatinoungana .

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuzadzwa noMweya Mutsvene?
mhinduro: Mweya Mutsvene ndivo vari kuita basa rekuvandudza mukati, vachiratidza zano reMweya Mutsvene, njere, njere uye simba! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Mateo 5:37 ( Ishe Jesu vakati) Kana ukati hongu, taura hongu, kana ukati kwete, uri wowakaipa "
saka ( Paul ) akati: Zvirokwazvo Mwari akatendeka, shoko ratinokuparidzirai harina hongu nakwete. Nokuti Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, wandakaparidza pakati penyu ini naSirasi naTimotio, ndakanga ndisina hongu nakwete, asi maari mumwe bedzi, hongu. Zvipikirwa zvaMwari, zvisinei nekuti zvingani, ndihongu muna Kristu. Naizvozvo zvinhu zvose kubudikidza naye ndezvechokwadi (chaiyo: ameni murugwaro rwapakuvamba), kuti Mwari akudzwe kupfurikidza nesu. ( 2 VaKorinte 1:18-20 )

bvunza: Pane machechi anoparidza zvakanaka nezvakaipa here?

mhinduro: Seventh-day Adventist, maCatholic, Samaj Family, True Jesuit, Charismatics, Evangelicals, Grace Gospel, Lost Sheep, Mark House of Korea... nemamwe makereke akawanda.

Kugovera zvinyorwa, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

articles.title: FAQ: Mako kweChikara
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzose, Ameni!

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Zvakazarurwa chitsauko 13 ndima 16 toiverenga pamwe chete: Inoitawo kuti munhu wose, mukuru nevadiki, mupfumi nomurombo, akasununguka nenhapwa, apiwe chiratidzo kuruoko rwavo rworudyi kana pahuma dzavo.

Nhasi tichaongorora, kuyanana, uye kugovana pamwechete "Chiratidzo chechikara" Namata uchiti: “Vanodiwa Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose”! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka" chechi “Tumai vashandi, neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nokubwinya, norudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. vhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, tinogona kunzwa nekuona chokwadi chemweya→ Nzwisisa kuti chiratidzo chechikara chii . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kuvonga, nemaropafadzo zviri muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

chiratidzo chechikara

1. Mhuka dzisina mudzimu

(1) Vanhu vemhuka

Mapisarema 92:6 Zvikara hazvinzwisisi, uyewo mapenzi haazvinzwisisi.
Mapisarema 49:20 Munhu anoramba ari muchiremera asina kumuka akafanana nechikara chakafa.

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mhuka?
mhinduro: “Umudzimu hwomunhu” hwakafanana nouhwo hwezvipfuyo havatendi muna Mwari wechokwadi. Vanobvuma kuti vakabva kumhuka inyoka, shato, nguruve, imbwa nezvimwewo. Rudzi rwevanhu urwu runonzi vanhu vemhuka.
Zvinoita sokuti kutsamwa kwaMwari kunoratidzwa kuchibva kudenga pamusoro pavanhu vose vasingadi Mwari navasina kururama, avo vanoita zvisakarurama uye vanodzivisa chokwadi. Zvinozivikanwa pamusoro paMwari zvinoratidzwa mumwoyo yavo, nokuti Mwari akazvizivisa kwavari. Kubva pakusikwa kwenyika, simba raMwari risingagumi noumwari zvave zvichinyatsozivikanwa, kunyange zvazvo zvisingaoneki, zvinogona kunzwisiswa kuburikidza nezvinhu zvakasikwa, zvichisiya munhu asina pembedzo. Nokuti, kunyange zvazvo vaiziva Mwari, havana kumukudza saMwari kana kumuonga. Pfungwa dzavo dzakava dzisina maturo uye mwoyo yavo isina zivo yakasvibiswa. Vachizviti vakachenjera, vakava mapenzi uye vakashandura kubwinya kwaMwari asingafi vakakuita mifananidzo yakaitwa somunhu anoora, shiri, mhuka nezvinokambaira. Chirevo ( VaRoma 1:18-23 )

(2) Mhuka dzisina mudzimu

2 Petro Chitsauko 2 Ndima 12 Asi kunoratidzika kuti ava vanhu havana mudzimu uye vanoberekwa semhuka dzinofanira kubatwa ndokuurawa. Pavanochera zvinhu zvavasingazivi uye vachishatisa vamwe, ivo pachavo vachatambura uori.
Judha 1:10 Asi vanhu ava vanochera zvavasingazivi. Vaiziva nomusikirwo zvinhu zvakafanana nemhuka dzisina mweya, uye muna ikoku vakazvishatisa vamene.

2. Namata mufananidzo wechikara uye utevere chikara

bvunza: Mufananidzo wechikara chii?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kare, vaIsraeri vaiumba mhuru dzendarama

Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, Buruka, nekuti vanhu vako, vawakabudisa munyika yeEgipita, vaora, vakurumidza kutsauka panzira yandakavaraira, vakazviitira mhuru yakaumbwa, vakainamata. Baira zvibayiro uti, ‘Uyu ndiye mwari wako, iwe Israeri, akakubudisa munyika yeIjipiti.’” Eksodho 32:7-8 .

(2) Chifananidzo chendarama cheBhabhironi

“Mambo, makarota chifananidzo chikuru, chifananidzo chacho chakanga chakareba kwazvo uye chaipenya zvikuru, chakanga chimire pamberi penyu uye chaityisa kwazvo. uye dumbu racho nechiuno zvakanga zviri zvendarama yakanatswa, makumbo akanga ari edare, uye tsoka dzakanga dziri pamwe dare pamwe ivhu ( Dhanieri 2:31-33 .

(3) Zvidhori zvenhema zvakaitwa nevanhu

Vakatsinhanisa zvokwadi yaMwari nenhema, vakanamata nokushumira zvisikwa panzvimbo yoMusiki. Jehovha ngaakudzwe nokusingaperi-peri. Ameni! VaRoma 1:25

(4) Ita kuti mufananidzo wechikara uve mupenyu uye ukwanise kutaura

Uye simba rakapiwa kwachiri kuti chipe mweya kumufananidzo wechikara kuti utaure, uye kuti auraye vose vasinganamati mufananidzo wechikara. Zvakazarurwa 13:15

bvunza: “Chikara” ichi chakabva kupi?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Zvino chimwe chikara chakakwira chichibva mugungwa;

Zvino ndakaona chikara chichikwira chichibva mugungwa, chine nyanga gumi nemisoro minomwe, nepamusoro penyanga dzacho korona dzine gumi, nepamusoro pemisoro yacho zita rekunyomba. Zvakazarurwa 13:1

Cherechedza: Chikara chinobuda mugungwa chinoreva → munhu wechivi anooneka → uye anotanga kugamuchira chiratidzo.

2 Chimwe chikara chakakwira chichibva panyika;

Zvino ndakaona chimwe chikara chichikwira chichibva panyika, chine nyanga mbiri segwayana, chichitaura seshato. Zvakazarurwa 13:11

Cherechedza: Chikara chinokwira chichibva panyika chinoreva muprofita wenhema anouya munyika kuzonyengera vanhu.

bvunza: “Chikara” ichi chinomirirei?
mhinduro: “Chikara” chinomirira umambo hunomirira nyika.

→→Mhuka ina huru idzi ndidzo madzimambo mana achamuka munyika. Tarisa kuna Dhanieri Chitsauko 7 Ndima 17
→→Izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa nomushandi: “Mhuka yechina ndihwo umambo hwechina huchauya munyika, uye huchasiyana nohumwe umambo hwose huchaparadza nyika yose nokuitsika-tsika pasi petsoka dzayo :23

bvunza: Nyanga gumi dze“chikara” ichi dzinorevei?
mhinduro: Madzimambo gumi akabuda mu“umambo” uhwu.
→→Nyanga dzine gumi dzaunoona ndiwo madzimambo ane gumi; Zvakazarurwa 17:12
→Kana dziri nyanga dzine gumi, paumambo uhwu pachamuka madzimambo ane gumi, Pashure mumwe mambo akamuka , kusiyana nevekutanga; Dhanieri 7:24

bvunza: “Chikara” chine misoro minomwe chinorevei?
mhinduro: makomo manomwe
→→Mwoyo wakachenjera unogona kufunga pano. Misoro minomwe makomo manomwe paive pakagara mukadzi, Zvakazarurwa 17: 9 (kuti uwane tsananguro ine udzame, ndapota tarisa kumusoro "Muono weChikara").

bvunza: “Mufananidzo wechikara” uyu ungataura sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Vazhinji vacharidzidza nokushingaira, uye zivo ichawanda.
Danieri, vanza shoko iri uname bhuku iri kusvikira pakuguma kwenguva. Vazhinji vachange vachimhanya uko neuko (kana kuturikirwa se: kudzidza nemoyo wose), uye ruzivo ruchawedzera. —Dhanieri 12:4
2 Artificial intelligence inogadzira zvikara nezvidhori zvechikara
3 Ane maziso emunhu —Dhanieri 7:8
4 Kuva nechiremera, simba, uye mano okutaura.
5 Vanhu vari munyika yose vanotevera “chikara” uye vanonamata “mufananidzo wechikara” — Zvakazarurwa 13:15
6 Chiratidzo cheChikara “Munhu nomuchina zvinova chinhu chimwe.”

3. Mucherechedzo wechikara 666

(1) Wakagamuchira mucherechedzo paruoko rwerudyi kana pahuma

Kunoitawo kuti vanhu vose, vakuru navaduku, vapfumi navarombo, vakasununguka nenhapwa, vapiwe chiratidzo paruoko rwavo rworudyi kana pahuma dzavo. ( Zvakazarurwa 13:16 )

(2) Vanhu vose venyika vakatevera chikara uye vakanamata zibukanana

... nyika yose ikashamiswa ikatevera chikara, vakanamata zibukanana, nokuti rakapa simba kuchikara; vakanamata chikara, vachiti: Ndiani wakafanana nechikara ichi, ndiani angarwa nacho? Zvakazarurwa Chitsauko 13 Ndima 3-4

bvunza: Nei vanhu vose vari panyika vakatevera chikara ndokunamata dhiragoni panguva iyoyo?
mhinduro: Sokutaura kunoita bhuku raDaniel “ Kunyatsotsvakurudza ”→ungwaru hwekugadzira( Kubatanidzwa kwevanhu-muchina ) ichaonekwa, uye vanhu pasi rose vachafanira kuvimba ne "zvikara" pazivo, sezvakangoita nhasi muna 2022 AD, vanhu vanonyanya kuvimba ne "smartphones". Semuenzaniso, kana vanhu vachida kudzidza "Chirungu", saka vanongoda kukopa "ndangariro" yakaunganidzwa mu "monster" kune "imprint" yakagamuchirwa nemunhu pamaoko avo kana pahuma kudzidza "Chirungu" zvakaoma. Rudzi urwu rwekugona mutauro → "Zivo ichakura." Panguva iyoyo, avo vakagamuchira “chiratidzo chechikara” vachava nezivo yakawanda ndokuva “vakachenjera” avo vasina kugamuchira chiratidzo chechikara vachasarira shure, nokuti hakusati kuchizova nokutengeserana kwemari yepepa panguva iyoyo; nguva Kana iwe usingagamuchiri "chiratidzo chechikara", iwe haungakwanisi kuita bhizinesi , ivo vachafunga kuti iwe unoshamisa, kukutambudza kana kutokuuraya. Saizvozvowo chikara chinoita kuti vose, vakuru navaduku, vapfumi navarombo, vakasununguka nenhapwa, vapiwe chiratidzo kuruoko rwavo rworudyi kana pahuma dzavo. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa 13:16

(3) Avo vane mazita asina kunyorwa mubhuku roupenyu

Gamuchira chiratidzo chechikara → Munhu wose anogara panyika achachinamata, ane mazita asina kunyorwa mubhuku roupenyu reGwayana rakabayiwa kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika. Une nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe. Ani naani anobira vanhu achabatwa; ani naani anouraya nomunondo achaurayiwa nomunondo. Uku ndiko kutsungirira nokutenda kwavatsvene. ( Zvakazarurwa 13:8-10 )

(4) Nhamba yechiratidzo chechikara imazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nenhanhatu

Hakuna unogona kutenga kana kutengesa, kunze kwaiye une mucherechedzo, kana zita rechikara, kana nhamba yezita rechikara. Hehwuno njere: Ani naani anonzwisisa ngaaverenge nhamba yechikara, nokuti inhamba yomunhu, uye nhamba yacho ndimazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nenhanhatu. ( Zvakazarurwa 13:17-18 )

bvunza: 666 inorevei?
mhinduro: Nhamba yevanhu vanogamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara.

" 7 " Rinoreva zvakakwana uye rinomiririra Mwari!
(1) Kuberekwa nemvura noMweya
(2) Akazvarwa kubva mushoko rechokwadi revhangeri
(3) Akaberekwa naMwari
Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva akaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene ndiye " 7 "→ Inomiririra vana vaMwari, saka" 7 ” rinoreva zvakakwana;

uye" 6 “Zvinoreva kusakwana; kugamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara” 666 "Zvakafanana nehafu yedare nehafu yevhu. Vanhu vanoda chaizvo kuidzidza. Hungwaru hwekugadzira hunoita semubatanidzwa wemashini emunhu." Hafu-mhuka, hafu-munhu ", ita sechikara, izvi hazvisi izvo Mwari akasika kubva muguruva" Adhamu “Zvakafanana neizvi → Sezvamakaona simbi yakavhenganiswa nevhu, rudzi rwacho ruchavhenganawo nemarudzi ose avanhu, asi havazovhengana, sezvinoita simbi isingasangani nevhu.” ( Dhanieri 2 . 43)

bvunza: “Chikara” chinomiririrei?
mhinduro: “Chikara” chinomirira nyoka yekare, dragoni, dhiabhorosi, Satani, uye muporofita wenhema.
Zvino ndakaona mutumwa achiburuka kubva kudenga ane kiyi yegomba risina chigadziko, neketani huru muruoko rwake. Yakabata dhiragoni, nyoka yekare, inonziwo Dhiyabhorosi uye Satani, ikamusunga kwemakore ane chiuru ( Zvakazarurwa 20:1-2 )
Chikara chakabatwa, uye muprofita wenhema, akaita zvishamiso pamberi pacho kuti atsause vaya vakagamuchira chiratidzo chechikara uye vaya vanonamata mufananidzo wacho, akabatwa pamwe chete nechikara. Uye vose vari vaviri vakakandwa mudziva romwoto unopfuta nesarufa vari vapenyu ( Zvakazarurwa 19:20 )

bvunza: Kuziva sei kana chiri chiratidzo chechikara?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1Kusatenda muna Jesu,
2 vasingatendi vhangeri rechokwadi.
3Asina kuberekwa naMwari,
4 Pasina chisimbiso choMweya Mutsvene,
5 Pasina mucherechedzo waJesu.
6 Pasina chisimbiso chaMwari,

Avo vane mazita asina kunyorwa mubhuku roupenyu kubva pakusikwa kwenyika → Vakatevera chikara uye vakanamata dragoni, uye " mweya" Kureva, mweya yemadhimoni, mweya yakaipa, uye mweya isina kuchena → mukati paruoko kana mukati huma akagamuchira mucherechedzo , kubatanidzwa kwevanhu-muchina" Hafu-mhuka, hafu-munhu “Ichi ndicho chiratidzo chechikara;

(1) Avo vari vaJesu Kristu → vanoiswa chisimbiso noMweya Mutsvene, vanoiswa chisimbiso naJesu, uye vanoiswa chisimbiso naMwari ;

(2) Avo vari venyoka → vanogamuchira chiratidzo chenyoka, vanogamuchira chiratidzo chaSatani dhiabhorosi, vanogamuchira chiratidzo chechikara → “chiratidzo chechikara” uye nhamba yacho ndiyo mazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu namatanhatu. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Nziyo: Akanunurwa kubva kuMasimba eRima eHadhesi

OK! Nhasi tichaongorora, kuyanana, uye kugovera pano.

articles.title: FAQ: Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzose, Ameni!

Ngativhurei kumabhaibheri edu, VaEfeso 1:13: Mushure mekunge manzwa shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yeruponeso rwenyu, uye nokutenda muna Kristu, makasimbiswa neMweya Mutsvene wechivimbiso maari.

Nhasi tichaongorora, kuyanana, uye kugovana pamwechete "Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene" Namata uchiti: “Vanodiwa Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose”! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka" chechi "Tumai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, iro ndiro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu uye vhangeri rekupinda muumambo hwekudenga! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso emweya yedu uye azarura pfungwa dzedu. kunzwisisa Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe, Ona chokwadi chemweya→ Nzwisisa kuti ungagamuchira sei Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kuvonga, nemaropafadzo zviri muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1: Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene

bvunza: Chii chinonzi chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

( 1 ) akaberekwa nemvura noMweya --Verenga Johani 3:5
( 2 ) vakaberekwa nechokwadi chevhangeri --Onai 1 VaKorinte 4:15 naJakobho 1:18
( 3 ) akaberekwa naMwari --Verenga Johani 1:12-13

Cherechedza: 1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 vakazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri. 3 Akaberekwa naMwari Tine mukati [ Mweya Mutsvene 】 Ingozvigamuchira Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here? (Verenga VaRoma 8:9, 16.)

2: Nzira dzekusunganidzwa naMweya Mutsvene

bvunza: Akaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene→ nzira Chii ichochi?
mhinduro: Tenda kuevhangeri!

[Jesu] akati: “Nguva yakwana, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Tenda kuevhangeri ! ” Chirevo (Mako 1:15)

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: Ini (Pauro) ndakakupfuudzawo: kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, uye kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neMagwaro. Vakorinde 1 Tomasi 15:1-4).

Cherechedza: Mupostori Pauro akaparidza vhangeri roruponeso kuvaHedheni→kereke yevaKorinde Pauro akati uchaponeswa nokutenda muvhangeri iri! Pakati peVaapositori vaneGumi neVaviri, Pauro akasarudzwa pachake naIshe Jesu kuti ave muapositori uye akatumwa zvakananga kuti ave chiedza cheVaHedheni.

bvunza: Kutenda vhangeri sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Chekutanga, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neBhaibheri

(1) tsamba takasunungurwa kubva kuchivi
Kristu paakafira vanhu vose, vose vakafa → nokuti uyo akafa asunungurwa pachivi - tarisa VaRoma 6:7 → Vose vakafa, uye vose vanosunungurwa pachivi → tsamba Vanhu vake havapiwi mhosva (ndiko kuti,” tsamba “Kristu akafira vose, uye vose vakasunungurwa pachivi)→ tsamba Vose vakasunungurwa pachivi → Uyo asingatendi atopiwa mhosva nokuti haana kutenda muzita roMwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga waMwari【 Jesu 】→ zita raJesu Zvinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo . Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:14 uye Chibvumirano 3:18

(2) tsamba Wakasununguka kubva pamurairo nekutukwa kwawo

1 Wakasununguka pamurairo
Asi sezvo takafa kumurairo wakanga wakatisunga, zvino isu; vakasununguka kubva pamurayiro , achitikumbira kuti tishumire Jehovha maererano noutsva hwomudzimu (mweya: kana kuti rinoshandurwa soMudzimu Mutsvene) uye kwete maererano netsika dzekare. Reference (VaRoma 7:6)
2 Kununurwa kubva muKutukwa kweMurairo mumwechete
Kristu akatidzikinura nokuva chituko nokuda kwedu Wakasununguka kubva pakutukwa kwemurairo ; Nokuti zvakanyorwa kuti: “Munhu wose anoturikwa pamuti akatukwa.” ( VaGaratiya 3:13 )

Uye kuvigwa!

(3) tsamba Bvisa murume mukuru nemaitiro ake ekare
musareverana nhema; Yakatobviswa Munhu wekare nezviito zvake, chirevo (VaKorose 3: 9)

(4) tsamba Kusunungurwa kubva “kunyoka” dhiyabhorosi.Satani
Ndinokutuma kwavari, kuti meso avo asvinudzwe, vatendeuke kubva murima, vaende kuchiedza, nokubva pasimba raSatani, vauye kuna Mwari; vanoitwa vatsvene. ’” (Mabasa 26:18)

(5) tsamba Kusunungurwa kubva pasimba rerima neHadhesi
Akatinunura pasimba rerima akatiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda ( VaKorose 1:13 )

Uye maererano neBhaibheri, akamutswa pazuva rechitatu!

(6) tsamba Mwari akaendesa mazita edu kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda →Tarisa kuna VaK. 1:13
(7) tsamba Kumuka kwaKristu → Ehe Tiruramise ! ndizvo Ngatizvarwe patsva, tigomutswa pamwe chete naKristu, tiponeswe, tigamuchire Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa, tigamuchire huvanakomana, uye tive noupenyu husingaperi! Ameni . Saka, unonzwisisa here? Ona VaRoma 4:25 .

3. Kuiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa

(1)Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene

Rwiyo Rukuru 8:6 Ndapota ndiisei mumwoyo mako sechisimbiso, uye nditakure sechisimbiso paruoko rwako.

bvunza: Ungaiswa chisimbiso sei neMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa?
Mhinduro: Tenda vhangeri uye unzwisise chokwadi!
Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. ( VaEfeso 1:13 )

Cherechedza: Nokuti makanzwa shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yeruponeso rwenyu → sevaapositori " Paul "Paridza vhangeri roruponeso kuvaHedheni, uye unonzwa chokwadi cheevhangeri → Kutanga, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neBhaibheri → 1 Kutenda kunosunungura kubva kuchivi; 2 Kutenda kunosunungurwa kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwawo; uye kwakavigwa → 3 Kutenda kunobvisa munhu wekare nemaitiro ake; 4 Kutenda kunotiza (nyoka) Satani; 5 Kutenda kwakapukunyuka simba rerima neHadhesi akamutswa pazuva rechitatu → 6 Kutenda kunoendesa mazita edu kuumambo hweMwanakomana wake anodiwa; 7 Tenda muKumuka kwaKristu→ Ehe Tiruramise ! ndizvo Ngatizvarwe patsva, tigomutswa pamwe chete naKristu, tiponeswe, tigamuchire Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa, tigamuchire huvanakomana, uye tive noupenyu husingaperi! Ameni. →Iniwo ndaitenda muna Kristu Sezvo ndaitenda maari, ndakaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa! Ameni . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

【 Mweya Mutsvene 】Ndiro tikiti redu rekupinda muumambo hwekudenga, uye ndihwo humbowo nehumbowo hwekuwana nhaka yaBaba Vokudenga → Uyu Mudzimu Mutsvene umboo (chitsidzo murugwaro rwekutanga) chenhaka yedu kusvika vanhu vaMwari (vanhu:) nhaka muzvinyorwa zvepakutanga) vakaregererwa, Kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe. Reference (VaEfeso 1:14)

(2)Mucherechedzo waJesu

VaGaratia 6:17 Kubva zvino zvichienda mberi, ngakurege kuva nomunhu anonditambudza, nokuti ndine chiratidzo chaJesu .

(3) Chisimbiso chaMwari

Zvakazarurwa 9:4 Akavarayira akati, “Musatadzira uswa huri panyika, kana chirimwa chipi zvacho chinyoro, kana muti upi zvawo, kunze kwamapundu ari pahuma yenyu. Chisimbiso chaMwari .

Cherechedza: Sezvo makatendawo muna Kristu, pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yoruponeso rwenyu→ Akasimbiswa neMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa → Kubva zvino zvichienda mberi isu" Chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene "Ndizvo chiratidzo chaJesu , chiratidzo chamwari → Isu tose tinobva kuMweya mumwe, Ishe mumwe, uye Mwari mumwe ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Chirevo ( VaEfeso 4:4-6 )

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu! Ameni. →Seizvo VaFiripi 4:2-3 inotaura, Pauro, Timotio, Yuodhia, Sintike, Kremendi, uye vamwe vakashanda naPauro, mazita avo ari mubhuku roupenyu hwakakwirira. Ameni!

Rugwaro runova hupenyu hwako → Iye ndewako ! Usatarise zvakanyanya kumabhuku emweya kana zviitiko zveuchapupu zvevamwe vanhu → mabhuku asiri eBhaibheri. articles.title: Maonero EvaKristu Pakutarisana Nenjodzi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri pana Eksodho chitsauko 5 ndima 3 tiverenge pamwe chete: Vakati, "Mwari wavaHebheru akasangana nesu; ngatifambe rwendo rwamazuva matatu murenje, tindobayira Jehovha Mwari wedu, arege kutirova nedenda kana nomunondo."

Nhasi tinoongorora, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Maonero EvaKristu Pakutarisana Nenjodzi 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Mazvita "Cathedral Women's Church" nekutumira vashandi kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri rinotigonesa kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yedu iregererwe munyika ino yakakombama, inopandukira, uye ine zvitadzo. Nzira yekubatirira pachokwadi nemoyo murefu uye nekutenda uye kupedza nguva yako yese panyika . Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Hondo, nzara, denda, kusanaya kwemvura, mvura zhinji, chimvuramabwe nenjodzi dzemoto

bvunza: Ndiani ane mhosva yehondo, nzara, denda nedzimwe njodzi?
mhinduro: Mhando dzose dzenjodzi nemadambudziko zvinobva kuna Mwari.

bvunza: Tinoziva sei kuti dambudziko racho rinobva kuna Mwari?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Matambudziko muEgipita yekare

Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, Enda kuna Farao, uti kwaari, Zvanzi naJehovha, Mwari wavaHebheru: Tendera vanhu vangu kuenda vandondinamata; ucharamba uchivamanikidza, ruoko rwake ruchava pamusoro pezvipfuwo zveminda yako, napamusoro pamabhiza, napamusoro pembongoro, napamusoro pangamera, napamusoro penzombe, napamakwai. denda . ...kana ndikatambanudza ruoko rwangu ndikarushandisa denda Enda iwe navanhu vako, uye ungadai wakaparadzwa kubva panyika kare. ( Eksodho 9:1-3, 15 )

(2) Matambudziko akasangana nevaIsraeri muTestamende Yekare

1 kutyorwa kwechibvumirano

Ndichauyisa munondo kuzokutsivai nokuti makaputsa sungano; Tumai denda pakati penyu , uye vachakuisa mumaoko avavengi vako. ( Revhitiko 26:25 )

2 Ufeve, kunyunyuta nekusangana

Panguva iyoyo Akafa nedenda , nevanhu 24 000. ( Numeri 25:9 )
Kunze kweavo vakafa nokuda kwaKora. Akafa nedenda , vanhu vanokwana 14 700. ( Numeri 16:49 )

3 Migumisiro yokusateerera

“Kana ukasateerera inzwi raJehovha Mwari wako, ukasangwarira kutevera mirairo yake yose nezvaakatema →( Testamente Yekare inoreva murayiro; ), sezvandinokuraira nhasi, kutukwa uku kunotevera kuchakutevera, nokukuwira: Wakatukwa kana uchibuda, uye uchatukwa kana uchipinda. … Jehovha achakunamatidza denda , kusvikira akuparadza panyika yamakapinda kuti ive yenyu. Jehovha achakurova norukosoro, nefivha, nomoto, nemarariya, nomunondo, nokusanaya kwemvura, nokuvhuvha. Izvi zvose zvichakutevera kusvikira waparadzwa. ( Dhuteronomi 28:15, 19, 21-22 )

(3) Chii chakaitika kuna Dhavhidhi pashure pokunge averenga vanhu

Saka, Jehovha anotumira matambudziko Uye pamwechete navana vaIsiraeri, kubva mangwanani kusvikira panguva yakatarwa, vanhu vane zviuru zvina makumi manomwe vakafa kubva paDhani kusvikira paBheerishebha. ( 2 Samueri 24:15 )

2. Mwari anotumira njodzi dzinoparadza vakaipa

bvunza: Nei Mwari achitumira njodzi nemadambudziko?
mhinduro: Mwari anotumira njodzi kune vaya vanopikisa Mwari, vanodzivisa vanhu kuziva Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye vanodzivisa vanhu kunamata Mwari wechokwadi, vakadai saFarao weIjipiti yekare Ishe neavo vasingatendi munzira yechokwadi yevhangeri, uye vachipara mhosva dzakaipa Matambudziko anotumirwa naMwari anogadzirirwa nevanhu kuti vaparadze vakaipa. zvino vakawanda christian Zvose hazvina simba. Kune maporofita enhema akawanda mukereke arikuparadzira hosha nekudzinga njodzi nezita raJehovha, nezita raJesu, uye nezita raMweya Mutsvene vatungamiriri mapofu here? Vanoverenga Bhaibheri here?

(1) Mwari anoranga Sidhoni
Ndichauyisa denda muSidhoni uye ndichateura ropa munzira dzaro. Vakaurawa vachawira pasi mukati maro, munondo uchauya pamusoro paro kumativi ose; zvino vachaziva kuti ndini Jehovha. ” ( Ezekieri 28:23 )
(2) Mwari anoparadza vakaipa
Uti kwavari, zvanzi naIshe Jehovha, Noupenyu hwangu, vari murenje vachaurawa nomunondo; mumapako, muchafa nedenda. ( Ezekieri 33:27 )
(3) Mwari anoranga Gogi
Ndichamuranga nehosha yakaipa neropa. ndichatumawo mvura, nechimvuramabwe, nemoto, nesarufa pamusoro pake, pamusoro pehondo yake, napamusoro pavanhu vose vaanavo. ( Ezekieri 38:22 )

3. Maonero evaKristu nezvenjodzi (denda)

2 VaTesaronika 1:4 Kunyange isu tiri mukereke dzaMwari tinozvirumbidza pamusoro penyu nokuda kwokutsungirira kwenyu uye nokutenda kwenyu pasinei nokutambudzwa uye nokutambudzika kwamakava nazvo.

(1) Kurwa "Miaomiao"

bvunza: "Miaomiao" inogona kudzivirira denda here?
mhinduro: Haikona kungwarira pazviri.

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Ndokuziva manje" Bvisa denda “NdezvaMwari, akamutswa naMwari, uye hapana chikonzero chokuti vazvidzivirire → Sezvazvakanyorwa - Ezekieri 33:27... Vaya vari munhare nomumapako vachatambudzwa ndokufa. → "Munhare ”→ Ndizvozvo vakaipa Avo vaivimba ne "Miao Miao" sechidziviriro chekuzvidzivirira kana kuzvidzivirira, uye avo vakavanda mumapako, vaizotambura nedenda uye kufa.

Zvakazarurwa 20:11 denga nenyika zvakatiza pamberi pake. Denga kana kuti pasi hazvigoni kunzvenga kutonga kwaMwari ), iyo isingachaoneki. Iwe unofunga kuti Miaomiao inogona kukudzivirira here? Rudyi! Vamwe vanhu vane maitiro emuviri wavo wese mushure mekutora "Miao Miao", uye vamwe vanhu vanotofa mushure mekutora "Miao Miao" kana iwe ukatora "Miao Miao", kusadzivirirwa kwemuviri wako kuchaderedzwa uye iwe uchanyanya kubatwa nehutachiona; , uye unogona kufa.

Naizvozvo, kana dzatarisana nenjodzi kana kuti matambudziko, zvakanaka kuti hama nehanzvadzi dzisazvisarudzire, nokuti muviri wako NdiIshe Jesu akashandisa" Ropa “Makatengwa nomutengo, munoiswa murufu rwaKristu. Iwe hauzofa nedenda rehutachiona ), tora muchinjikwa wako utevere Jesu, uchifa naye vhangeri raKristu Uyo anopupura. Unonzwisisa here?

articles.content:
Ngatienderere mberi nefundo yedu ya1 Johane 1:10 tivhure pamwe chete: Kana tichiti hatina kutadza, tinoita Mwari murevi wenhema, neshoko rake harisi matiri.


1. Munhu wose akatadza

bvunza: Isu takambotadza here?
mhinduro: " have ”→ Nokuti vose vakatadza vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari (VaRoma 3:23)

2. Chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwechete

bvunza: Chivi chedu chinobvepi?
mhinduro: Kubva kumunhu mumwe (Adhamu) → Izvi zvakafanana nechivi chakapinda munyika nemunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, saka rufu rwakauya kumunhu wese nekuti munhu wese akatadza. ( VaRoma 5:12 )

3. Kana tichiti hatina kutadza

bvunza: Kana "isu" tichiti hatina kutadza → "isu" zvinoreva tisati tazvarwa patsva? Kana kuti mushure mokuberekwazve?
mhinduro: pano" isu "Ehe Zvinoreva zvaakataura asati azvarwa patsva ; tsamba ) akauya kuna Jesu uye akanzwisisa chokwadi cheevhangeri, ( kuberekwa patsva ) akadaro mutsvene mushure.

Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu → handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama (vanhu vanozviruramisa, vanozviruramisa uye vasina zvivi), asi vatadzi → 1 Timotio 1:15 “Kristu Jesu akauya munyika kuzoponesa vatadzi.” Mashoko aya anovimbika uye anoyemurika zvikuru. Ndini mukuru wevatadzi. zvinoonekwa" Sauro "Vasati vaberekwazve, vakatambudza Jesu nevaKristu; mushure mokunge vavhenekerwa naKristu." Paul "Zivai → Ini pakati pevatadzi" Sauro “Ndiye mukuru ane mhosva.
