mhinduro: Aihwa! →Nokuti muprista wedu mukuru haakwanisi kutinzwira tsitsi pakusava nesimba kwedu. Akaedzwa pazvinhu zvose sesu, asi asina chivi. ( VaHebheru 4:15 )

bvunza: Isu takaberekwa naMwari takambotadza here?
mhinduro: Aihwa !
bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; (1 Johani 3:9 uye 5:18)

Cherechedza: Saka pano" isu "Inoreva zvakataurwa kusati kwazvarwa patsva, sezvazviri" isu “Kare, ndakanga ndisati ndanzwa evhangeri, ndakanga ndisingazivi Jesu, uye ndakanga ndisina ( tsamba )Jesu, asina kuzvarwa patsva kuti atevere ( Chiedza ) vanhu uye" iwe ” vakafanana → vose vari pasi pomutemo, vadariki vomutemo, uye varanda vechivi.
Johane ndiye ( Nyora ) kune avo vanotenda muna Mwari, asi ( Usazvitenda ) Hama dzaJesu dzechiJudha dzakati dzakanga dzisina murevereri, Jesu Kristu! ivo ( tsamba chengeta murayiro, uye ufunge kuti hauna kutadza.
Mashoko aJohani ekukurudzira zvinyoro anotaurwa “ ivo "Iti →" isu “Kana tichiti hatina kutadza, tinoita Mwari murevi wenhema, neshoko rake harisi matiri.
Zvino 1 Johane chitsauko 2 ndima 1 inotanga na“Johani” kubva pa“ isu "Chinja toni kuti" iwe ”→Vakomana vangu vaduku, ndichakuudzai mashoko aya Nyora Kwauri (ndiko kuti pass Vhangeri rakapiwa kwavari) kuti murege kutadza. Kana munhu achitadza, tine Murevereri kuna Baba, Jesu Kristu wakarurama.

mhinduro: Johane akavaudza kuti vazive Jesu Kristu → tenda muna Jesu →Kuzvarwa patsva, kumuka, kuponeswa, hupenyu husingaperi!

Zivai kuti Jesu Kristu akatumwa kubva kuna Baba, akanga ari rudzikinuro rwezvivi zvedu uye akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, kuti isu Pasina kubata ( mhosva ), Pasina kubata ( mutemo )→

articles.title: Mibvunzo neMhinduro: Kana tikareurura zvivi zvedu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ngatienderere mberi nezvidzidzo zvedu zve 1 Johane 1:9.

1. Pfuura mhosva

bvunza: Kana tikareurura zvivi zvedu → “isu” zvinoreva tisati tazvarwa patsva? Kana kuti mushure mokuberekwazve?
mhinduro: pano" isu ” zvinoreva asati azvarwa patsva , vakanga vasingazivi Jesu, havana ( tsamba ) Jesu haana kunzwisisa chokwadi chevhangeri paakanga ari pasi pemutemo.

bvunza: sei pano" isu "Zvinoreva here kusati kwazvarwa patsva?"
mhinduro: Nokuti tisati tazvarwa patsva, taisaziva Jesu kana kunzwisisa dzidziso yechokwadi yevhangeri tiri pasi pemutemo Vanhu → kureurura zvivi zvavo.

2. Kureurura pasi pemutemo

(1) Akani anobvuma mhosva → Joshua akati kuna Akani, "Mwanakomana wangu, ndinokumbira kuti, ikudze Jehovha, Mwari waIsraeri, ureurure zvivi zvako pamberi pake. Ndiudze chawaita, uye usandivanzira Akani." Joshua akati, “Ndakatadzira Jehovha, Mwari waIsraeri.

Cherechedza: Akani akareurura mhosva yake → uchapupu hwemhosva yake hwakasimbiswa, uye akatakwa nematombo kusvikira afa maererano nomutemo → Munhu aityora mutemo waMosesi, kunyange nezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu, haana kunzwirwa ngoni ndokufa. ( VaHebheru 10:28 )

(2) Mambo Sauro akareurura mhosva yake → 1 Samueri 15:24 24 Sauro akati kuna Samueri: “Ndatadza.

Cherechedza: Kusateerera → kunoreva kutyora chibvumirano (“sungano” mutemo) → Chivi chokusateerera chakafanana nechivi chouroyi; Nekuti wakaramba murayiro waJehovha, Jehovha wakuramba kuti uve mambo. ” ( 1 Samueri 15:23 )

(3) Dhavhidhi akareurura →Pandakaramba ndakanyarara ndikasareurura zvivi zvangu, mapfupa angu akasvava nokuti ndakagomera zuva rose. …Ndinokuzivisai zvivi zvangu, uye handivanzi zvakaipa zvangu. Ndakati, "Ndichareurura zvivi zvangu kuna Jehovha." ( Pisarema 32:3, 5 ) (4) Dhanieri anoreurura zvivi zvake v vakaita zvakaipa nekukumukirai, takatsauka pamirairo yenyu nezvakatonga, .. Isiraeri yose yakadarika murayiro wenyu, uye yakatsauka, uye haina kuteerera inzwi renyu; Mozisi muranda wenyu akadururirwa pamusoro pedu, nokuti takatadza Mwari (Danieri 9:4-5,11)

(5)Simoni Petro anoreurura zvivi zvake → Simoni Petro paakaona izvi, akawira pamabvi aJesu akati, “Ishe, ibvai kwandiri, nokuti ndiri mutadzi!” ( Ruka 5:8 )
(6) Kumbira mhosva kune nhoroondo yemutero →Muteresi akamira kure, asingatongotyi kusimudza meso ake kudenga, Akangozvirova chipfuva akati, "Mwari, ndinzwirei tsitsi, ini mutadzi!" (Ruka 18:13)
(7) Munofanira kureurura zvivi zvenyu kune mumwe nemumwe → Naizvozvo reururiranai zvivi zvenyu uye munyengetererane, kuti muporeswe. Munyengetero womunhu akarurama une simba guru. ( Jakobho 5:16 )
(8) Kana tikareurura zvivi zvedu , Mwari akatendeka uye akarurama, uye achakanganwira zvivi zvedu nokutinatsa pakusarurama kwose. ( 1 Johani 1:9 )

3. Ndisati ndazvarwa patsva" isu "" iwe “Zvose zviri pasi pomurayiro

bvunza: Munofanira kureurura zvivi zvenyu kune mumwe nemumwe → Izvi zviri kureva ani?
mhinduro: MaJuda! Tsamba yaJakobho ikwaziso (tsamba) yakanyorwa naJakobho, munun'una waJesu, kuvanhu → vemarudzi gumi nemaviri akapararira - tarisa kuna Jakobho Chitsauko 1:1.

VaJudha vaishingairira murayiro (kusanganisira Jakobho pachake panguva iyoyo) - pavakanzwa izvi, vakakudza Mwari uye vakati kuna Pauro: “Hama, ona kuti zviuru zvingani zvevaJudha vakatenda munaShe, uye vose vanoshingaira. nokuda kwomurayiro.”—Mabasa 21:20.
Heino bhuku raJames → " iwe “Reururiranai zvivi zvenyu → kunoreva kuti vaJudha vaishingairira mutemo, uye ivo ( tsamba Mwari, Dhani ( Usazvitenda ) Jesu, kushaya ( murevereri ) Jesu Kristu Muponesi! Vaive vasina kusununguka kubva pamurairo, vaive vachiri pasi pemurairo, maJuda aityora mutemo nekutyora mutemo. Saka Jakobho akati kwavari → " iwe “Reururiranai zvivi zvenyu munyengetererane, kuti muporeswe. chirwere chinorapwa ) Nzwisisa ruponeso → Tenda muna Jesu → Nemavanga ake, uchaporeswa → Poreswa chaiko → kuzvarwa patsva uye kuponeswa !

bvunza: Kana tikareurura zvivi zvedu → " isu "Rinoreva ani?"
mhinduro: " isu ” zvinoreva kuti munhu asati aberekwazve, akanga asingazivi Jesu uye akanga asina ( tsamba ) Jesu, paakanga asina kuzvarwa patsva → akamira pamberi pemhuri yake, vanun’una nehanzvadzi uye akashandisa → “isu”! Izvi ndizvo zvakare zvakataurwa naJohani kuhama dzake dzechiJudha, nokuti tsamba Mwari, asi ( Usazvitenda ) Jesu, kushaya ( murevereri ) Jesu Kristu Muponesi! Vanofunga kuti vakachengeta mutemo uye havana kutadza, uye havafaniri kureurura → zvakadai se " Paul “Unokumbira sei munhu kuti areurure zvitadzo zvake iye akachengeta mutemo asina chaangapomerwa? Hazvibviri kuti areurure zvivi zvake, handiti! Mushure mekuvhenekerwa naKristu, Pauro akasvika pakuziva kwake chaiko. murume mukuru “Usati wazvarwa patsva, uri mukuru wevatadzi.

articles.title: Mibvunzo neMhinduro: Kana tichiti hatina mhosva
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
[Rugwaro] 1 Johani (Chitsauko 1:8) Kana tichiti hatina chivi, tinozvinyengera, uye chokwadi hachisi matiri.

Nhanganyaya: Aya mavhesi matatu muna 1 Johane 1:8, 9, ne10 ndiwo mavhesi ane gakava guru mukereke nhasi.

bvunza: Nei iri ndima ine gakava?
mhinduro: 1 Johani ( Chitsauko 1:8 ) Kana tichiti hatina chivi, tinozvinyengera uye chokwadi hachisi matiri.
uye 1 Johane (5:18) Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari haatongotadzi…! Panewo Johani 3:9 inoti “Hamuzotadza” uye “Musatadza” → Tichitarisa pamashoko (anopokana) → “ Akadaro kare “Kana tichiti hatina zvivi, tinozvinyengera, nechokwadi hachizi matiri; Taura nezvazvo gare gare “Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari haatongotadzi; haatadzi kana kutadza Iti "hapana mhosva" katatu akatevedzana ! Inzwi rinosimbisa kwazvo. Naizvozvo, hatigoni kududzira Bhaibheri zvichibva pamashoko chete. Tinofanira kunzwisisa kuda kwaMwari, nokuti mashoko aMwari mweya noupenyu! Kwete mashoko. Taura zvinhu zvemweya kuvanhu vemweya, asi vanhu venyama havangazvinzwisisi.

bvunza: Pano panotaurwa kuti “isu” tinotadza, asi “isu” hatizotadzi.
1 →" isu "Mhosva? Kana kuti haana mhosva?;
2 →" isu "Uchapara mhosva here? Kana kuti hausi kuzopara mhosva?"
mhinduro: Tinotanga kubva ku【 kuberekwa patsva 】 Vanhu vatsva vanotaura nevanhu vakuru!

1. Jesu, akaberekwa naMwari Baba, akanga asina chivi

bvunza: Jesu akazvarwa kunaani?
mhinduro: Baba vakazvarwa naMwari → Akaberekwa kuburikidza nemhandara Mariya → Ngirozi yacho yakapindura kuti: “Mudzimu Mutsvene uchauya pamusoro pako, uye simba roWokumusorosoro richakufukidza, naizvozvo mutsvene achaberekwa achanzi Mwanakomana waMwari Mwanakomana waMwari) (Ruka 1:35).

bvunza: Jesu aiva nechivi here?
mhinduro: Ishe Jesu havana zvivi →Munoziva kuti Ishe wakazviratidza kuti abvise zvivi zvavanhu, nokuti maari hamuna zvivi. ( 1 Johane 3:5 ) uye 2 VaKorinte 5:21 .

2. Isu takazvarwa naMwari (munhu mutsva) hatinawo zvivi

bvunza: isu tsamba Pashure pokudzidza nezvaJesu uye kunzwisisa chokwadi → Akazvarwa kubva kunaani?
mhinduro:
1 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya — Johani 3:5
2 Akazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri — 1 VaKorinte 4:15
3 Akaberekwa naMwari → Vose vakamugamuchira, Akavapa simba rokuti vave vana vaMwari, kuna avo vanotenda kuzita rake. Ava ndivo vasina kuberekwa neropa, kwete neruchiva, kana nechido chemurume, asi vakaberekwa naMwari. Reference ( Johani 1:12-13 )

bvunza: Pane chitadzo here pakuzvarwa naMwari?
mhinduro: asina mhosva ! Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangatadzi → Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haangatadzi; wakaipa haangagoni kumukuvadza. ( 1 Johani 5:18 )

3. Isu takazvarwa neropa ( murume mukuru ) mhosva

bvunza: Isu, takabva kuna Adhamu uye takaberekwa nevabereki, tine mhosva here?
mhinduro: mhosva .
bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Izvi zvakafanana nechivi kubva ( Adhamu ) Munhu mumwe chete akapinda munyika, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, uye rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakanga vatadza. ( VaRoma 5:12 )

4. “Isu” na“Iwe” muna 1 Johane

1 Johani 1:8 Kana tichiti hatina chivi, tinozvinyengera uye chokwadi hachizi matiri.

bvunza: Ndiani anonzi "isu" pano?
mhinduro: Aihwa" tsamba "Jesu, akataurwa nevanhu vasina kunzwisisa nzira yechokwadi uye vasina kuberekwa patsva! Somuenzaniso, patinoparidza evhangeri kunhengo dzemhuri, hama, shamwari, vaunodzidza navo, uye vatinoshanda navo → tichashandisa " isu “Ivai nehukama hwepedyo navo,” akadaro isu "→ Kana iwe ukati hauna mhosva, uri kuzvinyengera! Iwe haungashandisi mazwi ekupomera." iwe ".

Muna 1 Johane, “Johane” ari kutaura kuhama dzake vaJudha, vaJudha, tsamba ) Mwari → Asi ( Usazvitenda Jesu, anoshayiwa" murevereri "Vatendi nevasingatendi havagoni kusungwa pamwe chete pajoko zvakaenzana," Johani "Haungagone kuyanana navo nekuti havakuzive." chiedza chechokwadi “Jesu, mapofu uye vanofamba murima.

Ngatitsvagei zvakadzama [1 Johane 1:1-8]:

(1)Nzira youpenyu

Ndima 1: Nezveshoko rekutanga reupenyu kubva pakutanga, ratakanzwa, kuona, kuona nemeso edu, uye kubata nemaoko edu.
Ndima 2: (Upenyu uhwu hwakaratidzwa, uye takahuona, uye zvino tinopupura kuti tinokupai upenyu husingaperi hwaiva naBaba uye hwakaonekwa nesu.)
Ndima 3: Tinokuparidzirai zvatakaona nezvatakanzwa, kuti nemiwo muyanane nesu. Kuyanana kwedu naBaba uye neMwanakomana Wavo, Jesu Kristu.
Ndima 4: Tinonyora zvinhu izvi kwamuri, kuti mufaro wenyu uve wakaringana.

Cherechedza:
Chikamu 1 → Munzira yehupenyu,
Chikamu 2 → Pfuura ( Vhangeri ) upenyu husingaperi kwamuri,
Vhesi 3 → Kuti muve nokuyanana nesu nokuyanana naBaba noMwanakomana wavo Jesu Kristu.
Chikamu 4 → Tinoisa mazwi aya ( Nyora ) kwauri,
(“ isu ” zvinoreva tsamba Vanhu vaJesu;" iwe ” zvinoreva vanhu vasina kutenda muna Jesu)

(2)Mwari chiedza
Ndima 5: Mwari chiedza, uye maari hamuna rima zvachose. Iri ndiro shoko ratakanzwa kubva kuna Jehovha uye ratidzosa kwamuri.
Vhesi 6: Kana tichiti tinoyanana naMwari asi tichifamba murima, tinoreva nhema, hatisi kufamba muchokwadi.
Ndima 7: Kana tichifamba muchiedza, saMwari ari muchiedza, tinowadzana, neropa raJesu Mwanakomana wake rinotinatsa pazvivi zvose.
Ndima 8: Kana tichiti hatina zvivi, tinozvinyengera, nechokwadi hachizi matiri.

Cherechedza:
Ndima 5 → Mwari chiedza, " isu "Inoreva avo vanotenda muna Jesu uye vanotevera chiedza, uye vanowana mubairo" iwe “Mharidzo inoreva kuti kuparidza evhangeri hakuiti ( tsamba Jesu haana kutevera” Chiedza "vanhu,

Chikamu 6 → " isu “Zvinoreva kutenda muna Jesu nokumutevera” Chiedza "vanhu," kufanana ” zvinoreva kufungidzira kana tikati kuna Mwari ( Chiedza ) yakatarisana, asi ichiri kufamba murima ( isu uye" Chiedza "Tine kuyanana asi tichiri kufamba murima. Tiri kureva nhema here? Hatichaiti chokwadi.)
Nemhaka yokuti tine ruwadzano nechiedza, hazvibviri kuti tirambe tichifamba murima kana tichiri kufamba murima, kunoratidza kuti hatina kuwadzana nechiedza → zvinoreva kuti tinonyepa uye hatiiti chokwadi; . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Chikamu 7 → Isu → ( kufanana fambai muchiedza, saMwari ari muchiedza, tichiyanana nomumwe nomumwe wedu, uye ropa raJesu, Mwanakomana wake, rinotinatsa pazvivi zvose.

Chikamu 8 → Isu → ( kufanana ) Kutaura kuti hatina mhosva kuzvinyengera, uye chokwadi hachisi mumwoyo medu.

mhinduro: pano" isu ” zvinoreva Akadaro asati azvarwa patsva
bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: nekuti" isu "uye" iwe "Kureva, ivo → havazivi Jesu! Aiwa ( tsamba )Jesu asati aberekwa patsva→ akanga ari mutadzi mukuru pakati pevatadzi nomutadzi→【 isu “Hamuzivi Jesu, musamuziva ( tsamba )Jesu asati azvarwa patsva → panguva ino【 isu 】 Kana tichiti hatina mhosva, tiri kuzvinyengera, uye chokwadi hachisi mumwoyo medu.

isu ( tsamba )Jesu, nzwisisai chokwadi chevhangeri! ( tsamba )Ropa raJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, rinotinatsa pachivi chose→Takazvarwa patsva” Newcomer "Ndiwe chete unogona kuva nekuyanana naMwari, kutaurirana nechiedza, uye kufamba muchiedza, saMwari ari muchiedza. Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

Hymn: Nzira Yemuchinjikwa

articles.title: Trivia: Mufaro muChivi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Vahebheru 11:24-25 BDMCS - Nokutenda Mozisi akati akura, akaramba kunzi mwanakomana womwanasikana waFaro. Angatofarira kutambura pamwe chete navanhu vaMwari pane kufadzwa kwenguva duku namafaro echivi.


bvunza: Chii chinofadza chivi?
mhinduro: Munyika yezvivi, kunakidzwa nechivi kunonzi kunakidzwa nechivi.

bvunza: Nzira yekusiyanisa sei kufara kwechivi kubva kune mufaro wekufarira Mwari?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1. Nyama yakatengeswa kuzvivi

Tinoziva kuti murayiro ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa kuzvivi. Nongedzero (VaRoma 7:14) → Somuenzaniso, Mosesi muEgipita akanga ari mwanakomana wavana vaFarao, uye Egipita inomirira nyika, nyika inotadza. MuIsraeri Mosesi paakakura, akaziva kuti akanga ari vanhu vakasarudzwa vaMwari, rudzi rutsvene rwakasarudzwa. Akaramba kunzi mwanakomana wevana vaFarao uye kunakidzwa nepfuma yeEgipita → kusanganisira ruzivo rwese, kudzidza, chikafu, kunwa uye mafaro zveEgipita. Aizofarira kutambura pamwe chete nevanhu vaMwari pane kumbonakidzwa nekunakidzwa kwechivi. Paakaona kutambura kwevanhu, akaona kunyadziswa kwaKristu → Akaramba kuva mwanakomana wevana vaFarao akatizira kuEgipita kurenje. 40. Pashure pamakore 40 okufudza makwai muMidhiani, akakanganwa kuzivikanwa kwake somwanakomana nomwanasikana waFarao weEgipita, uye akakanganwa zivo yose, kudzidza namano muEgipita apo bedzi akanga ava namakore 80 okukura apo Mwari akamudana kuti atungamirire vaIsraeri kubva muIjipiti. Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, Ani naani asina kufanana nomwana haangagoni kupinda muumambo hwaMwari chete Mwari akashandisa Mosesi kuti adzokere kumufananidzo womwana mwana utera uye haatsamiri pazivo yenyika nokudzidza nouchenjeri, achivimba bedzi nouchenjeri hwaMwari. Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Mosesi mwanakomana wavana vaFarao, uyo anofananidzira nyama yakatengeswa kuchivi, nenyama inofarira pfuma yamambo weEgipita anotadza nezvokudya zvose, zvokunwa, kutamba, uye mafaro. Kunakidzwa kwenyama kwemafaro aya → kunonzi kunakidzwa nekunakidzwa kwechivi!
Naizvozvo, Mosesi akaramba kuva mwanakomana wevana vaFarao, asi akanga achida kutambura panyama nevanhu → nokuti uyo akatambura panyama akarega chivi. Reference (1 Petro Chitsauko 4:1), unonzwisisa izvi here?

2. Avo vakaberekwa naMwari havasi venyama

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Reference (VaRoma 8:9)
bvunza: Sei zvinhu zvakazvarwa naMwari zvisiri zvenyama?
mhinduro: Mweya waMwari, Mweya waBaba, Mweya waKristu, uye Mweya weMwanakomana waMwari “mweya mumwe” uye ndiwo Mweya Mutsvene! → kureva kuti, Mweya Mutsvene unogara muna Kristu (tiri nhengo dzomuviri wake), Sezvo uri muviri waKristu, hausi wenyama "yaAdhamu" yeMweya Mutsvene Kristu ari mamuri, (muviri waAdamu hausi wedu) muviri wakafa nekuda kwechivi, asi mweya (Mweya Mutsvene) unorarama kubudikidza nekururama. ( VaRoma 8:10 ) Unonzwisisa izvi here?

3. Mufaro wechivi nemufaro wekunakirwa naMwari

bvunza: Nzira yekusiyanisa sei kufara kwechivi kubva kune mufaro wekufarira Mwari?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kunakidzwa nechivi

1 Nyama yakatengeswa kuzvivi —Verenga VaRoma 7:14
2 Kufunga kwenyama rufu —Verenga VaRoma 8:6
3 Zvokudya idumbu, uye dumbu ndiro zvokudya, asi Mwari achaparadza zvose zviri zviviri. —Verenga 1 VaKorinde 6:13

Cherechedza: Patakanga tiri munyama, takanga tatotengeswa kuchivi → Kana iwe uchitevera nyama uye uine kufunga kwenyama, irwo rufu, nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu. Zvokudya idumbu, uye dumbu renyama nderezvokudya → → Unofunga nezvenyama, idya zvakanaka nguva dzose, inwa zvakanaka, tamba zvakanaka, uye unakidzwe nezvinofadza zvenyama → → kunakidzwa nokunakidzwa nechivi! Somuenzaniso, kana ukashanda nesimba kuti uwane mari, unogara uchidya zvakanaka nokuda kwomuviri wako, uchipfeka zvakanaka nokuda kwomuviri wako, uye unotenga imba yokugara zvakanaka Kana muviri wako uchinakidzwa norudzi urwu rwemafaro, unenge uchinakidzwa nokunakidzwa nechivi . Kunewo mitambo, mitambo yezvidhori, mitambo, kutamba, hutano hwehutano, runako, kufamba ... nezvimwe! Zvinoreva kuti iwe [unogara] muna Adhamu, mumuviri waAdhamu, mumuviri waAdhamu [wechivi] → kunakidzwa nokunakidzwa nokunakidzwa kwe[muviri unotadza]. Uku kutevera nyama uye kuva nehanya nezvinhu zvenyama → mufaro wechivi. Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Munhu mutsva watakazvarwa naMwari haasi wenyama. Zvinhu zvemuviri → Kana muchine zvokudya nezvokupfeka, munofanira kugutsikana . (1 Timotio 6:8)

(2)Iva nemufaro waMwari

1 nziyo dzemweya dzekurumbidza — VaEfeso 5:19
2. Nyengetera kakawanda — Ruka 18:1
3 Ndinokutendai kazhinji — VaEfeso 5:20
muchivonga Mwari Baba pazvinhu zvose, muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
4. Iva nechido chekupa kuvashandi kuti vafambise evhangeri uye vaunze vhangeri reruponeso kuvanhu. — 2 VaKorinte 8:3
5 Isa zvipo nepfuma kudenga — Mateu 6:20
6 Vashandi vanogashira machaneli efax → “Munhu wose anokugamuchirai anogamuchira ini anogamuchira iye akandituma
7 Takura muchinjikwa wako, uparidze vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga — Mako 8:34-35 . Kunyange zvazvo tichitambura uye tichitambura munyama nokuda kweshoko raMwari, tichine mufaro mukuru mumweya yedu. Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Hymn: Ndimi Mambo weKubwinya

horaiti! Ndizvo zvatagoverana nhasi. Dai nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye kufemerwa kweMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi nguva dzose! Ameni

articles.title: Mibvunzo neMhinduro: Mhosva Yemaune (Chidzidzo 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Kutsvaga kwepakati, traffic, kugovera FAQs "Mhosva Yemaune" Aihwa. 2 Kutaura kudai Mwari vatipe moyo wakanyarara, kuti zvisinei nezvatinoona kana kunzwa, tinzwisise kuda kwenyu! Ameni

5. Zvisikwa zvose zvine zvishuvo zvoudyire

(1) Chivi chaAdhamu chakabva kupi?

bvunza: Adam" mhosva "Kubva kupi?"
mhinduro: Adhamu naEvha

1 Kushaya simba kwenyama ( nokuti ) Murayiro woMutemo → "Asi usadya muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa, nokuti nomusi waunoudya chokwadi uchafa."
2 →( nyoka ) akanyengera mukadzi Evha,
3 →Evha akaedzwa, wenyama" nokuti "Mutemo ( born )Zvido zvakaipa zvishuwo zvoudyirewo.
4 →Adhamu naEvha pavakabata kuchiva kwenyama, ivo " kudya “Muchero womuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa;
5 → Chete ( born ) akabuda muchivi, uye kana chivi chakura.
6 →Nezuva raunoudya chokwadi uchafa, uye chivi kutyora mutemo - wakarurama zvara kufa Uya.
saka" kufa "kubva" mhosva "Huya;" mhosva "Nenyama ( nokuti ) akaberekwa nomurayiro. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(2) "Nyeredzi Inopenya, Mwanakomana weMangwanani" Mhosva

bvunza: Satani" mhosva "Kubva kupi?"
mhinduro: (nyoka) Satani anoita zvinhu zvakaipa →

1 ( Ezekieri 28:15 ) Wakanga wakakwana panzira dzako dzose kubvira pazuva rawakasikwa, asi kusarurama kwakawanikwa mauri → Kusarurama kwose chivi. ( 1 Johani 5:17 )
2 ( Ezekieri 28:16 ) Nokuti unotengeserana zvikuru, wakazadzwa nechisimba. Nemamwe mashoko, Satani akava nepamuviri paakazadzwa nezvishuwo zvake. 】, zvinotungamirira kukuparwa kwemhosva【 bereka chivi 】 naizvozvo ndichakudzingai pagomo raMwari nekuti makamhura nzvimbo tsvene. Imi makerubhi akafukidza areka yesungano, ndakakuparadzai pamabwe anokosha anopenya somoto.

Cherechedza: Mwari haaponesi ngirozi dzakatadza dzikawa, saka hatingazvidzidze kana kuzvitsanangura pano. Hama nehanzvadzi, ndapota tarisai kuna (VaHebheru 2:16) uye (Zvakazarurwa 20:7-10)

6. Kudzikinura vari pasi pomurayiro

(1)Kusunungurwa kubva kumutemo

bvunza: Sei uchityora mutemo?
mhinduro: Mutemo ndiwo nokuti Nyama haina simba uye haigoni kuita chero chinhu →→Patinenge tiri munyama, hatigoni kuita zvakarurama zvinodiwa nomutemo, uye nyama inodaro ( nokuti )Mutemo → Kuberekwa kwechishuvo chakaipa kuchiva, kuchiva kunobereka chivi kana chanambwa, uye chivi, kana chakura kwazvo, chinobereka rufu → → Saka Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake kuti ave chibayiro chezvivi, achipa mhosva nyama – yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa Mwari, tiponesei pamurairo norufu. Tarisa kuna VaRoma chitsauko 8 ndima 3 uye chitsauko 7 ndima 6

(2) Kusunungurwa kubva muchituko chemurairo

Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo nokuva chituko nokuda kwedu;

(3) Dzikinura avo vari pasi pomutemo

→→Ngatitorei kuva vanakomana vaMwari!

Vhura (VaGaratia 4:4-7) uye muverenge pamwe chete: Asi nguva yakati yakwana, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nomukadzi, akaberekwa pasi pomurairo, kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti isu gamuchira umwanakomana. Sezvo muri vanakomana, Mwari akatuma Mweya woMwanakomana wake mumwoyo yenyu (yekutanga: yedu) achidanidzira achiti, “Abha, Baba!” uye sezvo uri mwanakomana, unovimba nomudyi wenhaka yaMwari.

bvunza: Pamurairo pane kuva vanakomana here?
mhinduro: Avo vari pasi pomurairo varanda, varanda vechivi → Sezvo vari “varanda”, havasi vanakomana. Sezvakataurwa naIshe Jesu → Muranda haagoni kugara mumba nokusingaperi; Reference ( Johane 8:35 ), unonzwisisa here?

7. Kana tadzidza chokwadi

bvunza: Tinodzidzei chokwadi?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Akadzidza → Kana tiri munyama, imhaka yokuti “ mutemo "uye【 born 】Kuchiva kwakaipa, ndiko kuti, kuchiva, kunobata mumitezo yedu, kana kuchiva kwenyama kuchinge kuchiitika, kunobereka chivi; VaRoma 7:5 naJakobho 1:18)
(2) Akadzidza → Sezvo mutemo wakanga usina simba nokuda kwenyama uye waisagona kuita chimwe chinhu, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake amene mumufananidzo wenyama inotadza kuti ave chibayiro chezvivi, achipa mhosva chivi munyama ( VaRoma 8:3 ).
(3) Akadzidza →Kubva mumutemo! Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro wakanga unotisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe nomweya mutsva (mweya: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare tsika. ( VaRoma 7:6 )
(4) Akadzidza →Apukunyuka pakutuka kwemurairo! Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, nokuva chituko nokuda kwedu;
(5) Akadzidza → Kristu akaberekwa pasi pomurairo kuti adzikinure avo vakanga vari pasi pomurairo kuti isu tigamuchire uvanakomana ! ( VaGaratiya 4:4-7 )

8 Kana ukatadza nobwoni, hapachazovi nechipiriso chezvivi;

Nokuti kana tichitadza nobwoni, kana tagamuchira kuziva zvokwadi, hakuchisina chibayiro chezvivi;

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mhosva yeune?
mhinduro: Nokuti mushure mokunge tawana nzira yechokwadi, tinoziva zvakajeka: 1 Kana tiri munyama, nyama ( nokuti )Mutemo→ born Kuchiva, kuchiva, kunobereka chivi, kunobereka chivi, uye chivi kana chakura kwazvo, chinobereka rufu.

2 Sezvo mutemo usina simba nekuda kwenyama, haugoni kuita chimwe chinhu → kururama kwemurairo kunogona kuita chivi chete;

3 Kristu akava chipiriso chedu chezvivi, akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa akafa;

4 Tisunungurei pamurairo nokutukwa kwawo;

5 kuti adzikinure vari pasi pomurayiro, uye kuti atiise vanakomana →→【 Kana usingatendi 】 Iyi ndiyo nzira yechokwadi, Call

Mhosva yeune.

bvunza: Sei mushure mekudzidza nzira yechokwadi, Kana iwe usingatendi muchokwadi Imhosva yemaune chete?
mhinduro: Nokuti pasi pomurayiro uri muranda, muranda wechivi, uye nyama ichazviita nokuti Murairo wakabereka chivi. Unoda uye nemaune pasi pemutemo → kutyora mutemo uchiziva, kusateerera mutemo, kutyora mutemo chivi → ichi chinonzi chivi nemaune . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Kana ukatadza nobwoni, hachichazovi nechipiriso chezvivi here?
mhinduro: Pane chipiriso chezvivi chimwe chete! Hapana kuregererwa kwechipiri kana kuwanda.

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 Kristu chete kamwe Shoko rakava nyama, rakaberekwa pasi pomurairo - vaG. 4:4-7
2 Kristu chete kamwe Ipa chipiriso chezvivi— VaHebheru 10:10-14
3 Akafa kuchivi, chete kamwe —VaRoma 6:10
4 Kristu chete kamwe Kudeurwa kweropa kunobvisa zvivi zvevanhu - VaHebheru 9:12-14

Nokuti mushure mokunge tagamuchira ruzivo rwechokwadi, hapana kudzikinurwa kwezvivi kunze kwaKristu Muponesi wedu; Kana iwe usingatendi! Hapasisina chipiriso chezvivi .
Dai Kristu akayananisira zvivi kakawanda, aifanira kufa kakawanda ;
Dai Kirisito akasuka zvitadzo kakawanda, aitofanira kudeura ropa rake kakawanda ;
Kana zvakadaro, anofanira kunge akatambura kakawanda kubva pakusikwa kwenyika - ona VaHebheru 9:25-26.

Asi Kristu, uyo akafa kuchivi, chete kamwe , akudzikinurei pasi pomurairo, akakusunungurai pamurairo→ Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika . Kana ukadzokera shure wochengeta mutemo uye uchida kuva muranda pasi pomutemo, uchava muranda wechivi → Uchava sembwa inotendeuka yodya zvokudya zvayarutsa, kana kuti nguruve yasukwa. ndokuumburuka mumatope. saka, Kana usingatendi chokwadi uye wakasiya Muponesi Jesu Kristu, hapachazovi nechibayiro chezvivi. → Ingomirira nekutya kutonga uye moto unoparadza uchapedza vavengi vese (mutongo wekupedzisira). ( VaHebheru 10:27 ) Unonzwisisa izvi here?

Kugovera zvinyorwa zvevhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari, vashandi vaJesu Kristu: Hama Wang*yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen - nevamwe vashandi, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. articles.title: Mibvunzo neMhinduro: Mhosva Yemaune (Chidzidzo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna VaHebheru Chitsauko 10, ndima 26-27, tiverenge pamwe chete: Kana tikatadza nemaune mushure mekuziva chokwadi, mupiro wezvitadzo unopera.

Nhasi ngatitsvagei, tichiyanana, uye tigovane chii "Mhosva Yemaune" Aihwa. ( 1 ) Anotaura nekupa munamato: Mazvita, Abha, Baba Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, uye ndinokutendai, Mweya Mutsvene, nekugara munesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi vanonyora nemaoko avo uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu vaite basa rakanaka mukereke, vadambure ngetani nezvipingamupinyi zvose zvemuvengi, uye atungamirire vana vose kudzokera kuchechi kuti vanzwisise chokwadi cheBhaibheri. Muponesi anogara achivhenekera maziso emwoyo yedu uye anovhura pfungwa dzedu - tinogona kunzwisisa Bhaibheri → kukwanisa kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti mhosva yeune chii !

Ishe ngavapindure minamato yedu, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo nemuzita raIshe Jesu! Ameni

1. Mhosva nemaune

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mhosva yeune?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) " nemaune "Cantonese" Rambi rakakosha, rambi rakakosha “Zvinoreva nemaune, nemaune, nemaune, nemaune;
(2) " mhosva ” zvinoreva kuti kutyora murairo nekutyora mirairo nemirairo yemurairo chivi;
(3) " mhosva yeune "Zvinoreva "chiedza chakakosha" icho chiri nemaune, nemaune, uye uchiziva → uchiziva kuti kutyora mutemo uye kutyora mirairo yemutemo chivi → kutyora nemaune mirairo nemitemo yemutemo → kunonzi kutadza nemaune. Nenzira iyi , unonzwisisa zvakajeka?

2. Tsanangudzo ye”chivi” → kutyora mutemo

bvunza: Chivi chii?
mhinduro: Kutyora mutemo chivi → Munhu wose anotadza anotyora mutemo chivi. (1 Johani 3:4)

3. Kusapara mhosva sei

bvunza: Kusapara mhosva sei?
mhinduro: Hakuna mutemo!

bvunza: Sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
(1) Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika —Verenga VaRoma 4:15
(2) Pasina mutemo, chivi hachinzi chivi —Verenga VaRoma 5:3
(3) Pasina mutemo, chivi chakafa —Verenga VaRoma 7:8

" Ukama huri pakati pemutemo nechivi” : Sezvakataurwa naPauro → Tingati kudii? Murairo chivi here? Kwete! Kungoti dai pasina murayiro, ndingadai ndisingazivi chinonzi chivi → (Kureva kuti, dai waisava nomutemo, ndingadai ndisingazivi chinonzi chivi, nokuti mutemo ita kuti vanhu vazive nezvechivi - tarisa vaRoma 3:21). Mutemo unoti, "Usachiva" → " Usave nemakaro "Ndiwo murairo wokupedzisira pakati peMirairo ineGumi yeMutemo. → Ndakanga ndisingazivi kuti kukara kungava chii. Zvisinei, chivi chakatora mukana wokushandisa murairo "murairo" kumutsa marudzi ose okukara mandiri. Nokuti ini haana kuenda kumutemo, Chivi chakafa Pauro akati → Ini ndakanga ndiri mupenyu ndisina murayiro; 1 Nokuti pasina murayiro hapana kudarika; 2 Hakuna mutemo, uye chivi haisi mhosva mitemo ye "kurambidza kutema matanda Kana ukakwira mugomo kunotema huni, uri kutyora mutemo wesango uye mutemo, uye unenge uine mhosva nekukwira mumakomo kunotema miti. Unonzwisisa here? 3 Pasina mutemo, chivi chakafa → Pano mutemo, chivi chinorarama , waisa" mhosva “Kana uchida kurarama, unofanira kufa ," mhosva "Nomutemo nemirayiro makaurayiwa. Saka, munoti kwamuri → Zviri nani kuva nomutemo here? Kana kuti kusava nomutemo? Reference ( VaRoma 7:7-13 )

4. Muviri nokuti Murairo wakabereka chivi

VaRoma (Chitsauko 7:5) Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, kuchiva kwakaberekwa nomurayiro kwakanga kuchibata mumitezo yedu, uye kwakabereka chibereko chorufu.

(1) Nyama nokuti kuchiva kwakaipa kunobva pamurayiro

bvunza: Zvishuvo zvakaipa chii?
mhinduro: " zvakaipa Ndiko kuti, zvivi, namabasa akaipa, nemirangariro yakaipa; kuda Ndiko kuti, kuchiva, kuchiva, kuchiva kwenyama. zvishuvo zvakaipa ” zvinoreva maitiro emabasa akaipa, pfungwa dzakaipa uye zvido zvenyama.

bvunza: nyama nokuti Ko murayiro unomutsa kuchiva kwakaipa here?
mhinduro: Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, izvozvo nokuti Zvido zvakaipa zvinoberekwa nemurairo zvinobatiswa mumitezo yedu, zvichiguma nechibereko chorufu → ndiko kuti, izvo zvenyama. nokuti →【 mutemo 】→“ born "Mabasa akaipa, pfungwa dzakaipa, uye kuchiva kwenyama" zvishuvo zvakaipa "Ipapo kuchiva kwenyama kunoshanda mumitezo yedu → kuchiva kwenyama kunoshanda pakubata pamuviri uye kunobereka" mhosva "Uyai → mubereke chibereko cherufu."

(2) Nhumbu yechishuvo choudyire kuberekwa kwechivi.

( Jakobho 1:15 ) Kana kuchiva kwakura, kunobereka chivi;

Cherechedza: Pataiva munyama, izvozvo nokuti " mutemo "uye【 born 】Kuchiva kwakaipa, ndiko kuti, kuchiva, kunobata mumitezo yedu, kana kuchiva kwenyama kuchinge kuchiitika, kunobereka chivi;

bvunza: " kufa "Kubva kupi?"
mhinduro: " kufa" →Inobva “kuchivi”-- VaRoma 5:12

bvunza: “Chivi” chinobvepi?
mhinduro: "Chivi" → kubva panyama ( nokuti) mutemo→ born Zvishuvo zvakaipa, zvishuvo zvakaipa zvishuvo zvoudyire pazvinongonambwa→ born Buda nemhosva.

Saka "hukama huri pakati penyama, mutemo, chivi, uye rufu": 【Nyama】→ Nokuda kwe【Mutemo】→ Bereka 【Chivi】→ Bereka 【Rufu】 .

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. . Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

articles.title: FAQ: Iwe haugone kuita kuti vazvidembe zvakare
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
【Rugwaro】 VaHebheru 6:6 kana vakatsauka padzidziso, hazvingagoni kuvadzosa pakutendeuka. Nokuti vakaroverera patsva Mwanakomana waMwari pamuchinjikwa, vachimunyadzisa pachena.


1. Kana ukasiya chokwadi

bvunza: Inheyo dzipi dzatinofanira kusiya?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kusunungurwa padzidziso yechivi

Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu (pamuchinjikwa)-- Tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4
Kana munhu mumwe akafira vose, ipapo vose vanofa - ona 2 VaKorinte 5:14
Avo vakafa vakasunungurwa kubva kuchivi – tarisa VaRoma 6:7

Cherechedza: Kusunungurwa kubva padzidziso yechivi → Kristu oga” nokuti “Kana vanhu vose vafa, vose vanofa, uye vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi. → Kana vose vafa, vose vanosunungurwa pachivi. Ani naani anotenda maari haapiwi mhosva. Avo vasingatendi mu“kusunungurwa pachivi” , mhosva yatongwa. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna Johani 3:18

(2) Chibayiro chimwe chete chaKristu chinoita kuti vaya vakatsveneswa vave vakakwana nokusingaperi

Nekuda uku tinochenurwa nekubayirwa kwemuviri waJesu Kristu kamwechete kwenguva dzose, uye avo vakaitwa vatsvene vanoitwa vakakwana nekusingaperi, vakaruramiswa nekusingaperi, vasina chitadzo nekusingaperi, uye vatsvene nekusingaperi. ( VaHebheru 10:10-14 )

(3)Ropa raJesu rinosuka zvitadzo zvedu zvose

Kana tichifamba muchiedza, saMwari ari muchiedza, tinowadzana nomumwe nomumwe wedu, uye ropa raJesu, Mwanakomana wake, rinotinatsa pazvivi zvose. Reference (1 Johane 1:7)

(4) Kusiya dzidziso yomutemo

Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro wakanga unotisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe nomweya mutsva (mweya: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare tsika. Reference (VaRoma 7:6)

(5) Bvisa nheyo dzomunhu akwegura nomufambiro wake

Musareverana nhema;

(6) Kupukunyuka pasimba repasi rerima raSatani

Akatinunura pasimba rerima akatiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda ( VaKorose 1:13 )

(7) Dzidziso inotigonesa kururamiswa, kumutswa, kuzvarwa patsva, kuponeswa, uye kuva nehupenyu husingaperi.

Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Maererano nengoni dzake huru, akatiitazve tariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa ( 1 Petro 1:3 )

2. Hatigoni kuita kuti vazvidembe zvakare.

bvunza: Unorevei nekusakwanisa kuvaita kuti vatendeuke zvakare?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

( VaHebheru 6:4 ) Pamusoro paavo vakavhenekerwa, vakaravira chipo chokudenga, uye vakava vagovani voMweya Mutsvene.

bvunza: Chiedza chipi chakagamuchirwa?
mhinduro: Kuvhenekerwa naMwari nekuvhenekerwa kwevhangeri→ Kubva pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi→ Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu, akavigwa, akamukazve nezuva retatu→ 1 Kusunungurwa kubva padzidziso yechivi. 2 Akabayira chibayiro kamwe chete, achitsvenesa dzidziso yokukwana kusingaperi. 3 Ropa rake rinosuka munhu kubva pachivi chose. 4 Wakasununguka padzidziso yomurayiro. 5 Kubvisa mutana netsika dzemafambiro ake; 6 Kusunungurwa kubva pamitemo yerima uye nesimba reHadhesi. 7 Kuti ururamiswe, ugomutswa, ugozvarwa patsva, uponeswe, ugogamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa, uye uve noupenyu husingaperi! →Ndiro vhangeri raunogona kuponeswa naro, uye kuravidza chipo chokudenga, uye uve vagovani veMweya Mutsvene.

( VaHebheru 6:5 ) Avo vakaravira shoko rakanaka raMwari uye vanoziva simba renguva inouya.

bvunza: Ndeipi nzira yakanaka?
mhinduro: " nzira yakanaka ” → Imi makanzwa shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yoruponeso rwenyu → inova nzira yakanaka uye imi makaravira shoko rakanaka raMwari mukaziva simba renguva inouya → Mweya Mutsvene unoruramisa, unomutsa. , anovandudza, anoponesa, uye anogamuchira zvipikirwa, vanhu vane upenyu husingaperi.

( VaHebheru 6:6 ) Kana vakasiya dzidziso yacho, havangagoni kudzorerwa kukupfidza. Nokuti vakaroverera patsva Mwanakomana waMwari pamuchinjikwa, vachimunyadzisa pachena.

bvunza: Kana tikasiya chokwadi → ndeipi musimboti watiri kusiya?
mhinduro: Kusiya zvataurwa pamusoro apa" seven o'clock "Chisungo→【 chokwadi cheruponeso 】Kristu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu, achitisunungura pachivi → Kana iwe " Usazvitenda "Kuva wakasununguka kubva padzidziso yezvivi, dzidziso yemurairo, kusiya dzidziso iyi. Semuyenzaniso, makereke mazhinji nhasi anodzidzisa kuti Jesu akasuka zvitadzo ndisati ndatenda muna Jehovha, zvitadzo zvamangwana, zvitadzo zva zuva rakatevera mangwana, uye zvivi zvepfungwa hazvina kusukwa → Iyi ndiyo ". kusiiwa “Chibayiro chimwe chete chaKristu chinoita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nokusingaperi, uye ropa rake rinovachenesa pachivi chose→ Chokwadi ichi . Kune vamwewo vanodemba mabasa avo akafa zuva nezuva, vachireurura zvivi zvavo nekutendeuka zuva nezuva, uye vachinyengeterera ropa raJehovha zuva nezuva kuti ribvise zvivi zvavo uye risuke zvivi zvavo → cherechedza ropa resungano rakamutsvenesa. senguva dzose → vanhu ava vakasindimara, vanopanduka, uye havatendeuke, uye vanova musungo waSatani kusiiwa Dzidziso yeruponeso rwaKristu ndeye chokwadi; Sezvinoita imbwa inotendeuka ichidya chainorutsa; Kutenda kwavo kutsauka pachokwadi cheruponeso → Hatigoni kuita kuti vazvidembe zvakare. , nokuti vakarovererazve Mwanakomana waMwari pamuchinjikwa, vachimunyadzisa pachena. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Hymn: Ndinotenda muna Ishe Jesu Rwiyo

articles.title: Mibvunzo neMhinduro: Kunze kwekuti muve sevana, hamungambopindi muumambo hwekudenga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzose, Ameni!

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Mateo Chitsauko 18 Ndima 3 toiverenga pamwe chete. Jesu akati, “Ndinokuudzai chokwadi kuti, kana musingashanduki mukava savana vaduku, hamungatongopindi muumambo hwokudenga.

Nhasi tinotsvaga, kutaurirana uye kugovana pamwe chete "Kana mukasadzokera mumufananidzo wevana, hamungatongopindi muushe hwekumatenga." Namata uchiti: “Abba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose”! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka “kereke” inotumira vashandi kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri reruponeso rwedu nekupinda muumambo hwekudenga! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso emweya yedu uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa kuti Mweya Mutsvene anotitungamirira sei tose kuti tidzokere pakufanana nevana uye kutizarurira chakavanzika chekupinda muvhangeri rehumambo hwekudenga. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kuvonga, nemaropafadzo zviri muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mateo 18:1-3 BDMCS - Panguva iyoyo vadzidzi vakauya kuna Jesu uye vakamubvunza kuti, “Ndiani mukuru kuna vose muumambo hwokudenga?” Jesu akadana mwana muduku, akamumisa pakati pavo, akati: “Chokwadi ndini ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musingashanduki, mukava sevacheche, hamungatongopindi muushe hwekumatenga.

1. Chimiro chemwana

bvunza: Chii chinonzi mwana style?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Tarisa kutaridzika kwemwana zvichienderana nechiso chake : Runako → Munhu wese anoruda kana achizviona.
2 Tarisa maitiro emwana zvichibva pamwoyo : Hakuna kunyengera, kusarurama, uipi, ruvengo, hapana upombwe, utere, kunamata zvifananidzo, uroyi, umhondi, udhakwa, bongozozo, nezvimwe.
3 Tarisa maitiro emwana kubva pakuvimba nawo : Vimba nevabereki vako nguva dzose, vimba nevabereki vako, uye usambozvivimba iwe pachako.

2. Vana havana mitemo

bvunza: Pane mitemo yevana here?
mhinduro: Hapana mutemo wevana.

1 Sezvazvakanyorwa → Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha; Reference (VaRoma 4:15)
2 Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika → Nokuti pasina mutemo, kudarika hakurangarirwi kudarika, sezvinoita vabereki vanoona vana vavo vachidarika kwete kudarika.
3 Testamente Itsva Baba Vekudenga havazoyeuki kudarika kwako → nekuti hakuna mutemo! Baba vako vokudenga havazoyeuki kudarika kwenyu kana vasina murayiro vasingakupi mhosva. ivo.” Ipapo akati, “Handicharangaririzve zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo.” Zvino zvivi izvi zvakanganwirwa, hapasisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi. ( VaHebheru 10:16-18 )

bvunza: Isai mutemo mumwoyo yavo, ko ivo havana mutemo here?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Kuguma kwemurairo ndiKristu →Ona VaRoma 10:4 .
2 Murayiro mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka; →Sezvo mutemo uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvichauya, hausi iwo mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chacho--ona VaHebheru 10:1.
3 Mufananidzo wechokwadi nechimiro chemurairo ndiKristu →Tarisa kuna VaK. 2:17 . Neiyi nzira, Mwari akaita sungano itsva navo, achiti: “Ndichanyora mirairo yangu pamwoyo yavo, ndichaiisa mukati mavo → ndiko kuti, Mwari [ Kristu 】Zvakanyorwa pamwoyo yedu, seRwiyo Rwonziyo Chitsauko 8:6 Ndapota ndiisei mumwoyo mako sechisimbiso, uye nditakure sechisimbiso paruoko rwako...! Uye achaiisa mukati mavo → Mwari achazviita hupenyu hwaKristu 】Zviise mukati medu. Neiyi nzira, unonzwisisa here sungano itsva iyo Mwari akaita nesu?

3. Vana havazivi chivi

bvunza: Sei vana vasingazivi chivi?
mhinduro : Nokuti vana havana mutemo.

bvunza: Basa remutemo nderei?
mhinduro: Basa remutemo ndere Rongedza vanhu nezvechivi →Naizvozvo namabasa omurairo hakuna nyama ingaruramiswa pamberi paMwari, nokuti Mutemo unoitirwa kuti vanhu vazive zvivi zvavo . Reference (VaRoma 3:20)

Ndiwo murayiro wokuita kuti vanhu vazive zvivi zvavo. nekuti vacheche havana murairo, havazivi chivi;

1 Nokuti pasina murayiro hapana kudarika —Verenga VaRoma 4:15
2 Pasina murayiro chivi hachisi chivi —Verenga VaRoma 5:13
3 Pasina murayiro chivi chakafa; — VaRoma 7:8, 9

Zvikamu zvakaita se " Paul "Achiti → Ini ndaiva mupenyu ndisina murayiro; asi murayiro womurayiro pawakasvika, chivi chakavapozve → "Mubayiro wechivi rufu," uye ini ndakafa. Unoda mutemo here? → rarama muzvivi, enda ubvise " mhosva "Kana ukararama → uchafa. Unonzwisisa here?"
Naizvozvo, kana mwana asina murayiro, haana kudarika, kana mwana asina murayiro, chivi hachinzi chivi, kana mwana asina murayiro, haazivi chivi; haigoni kupa mhosva mwana. Enda unobvunza nyanzvi yegweta kana mutemo unokwanisa kupa mwana mhosva. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

4. Kuberekwazve

bvunza: Ndingadzokera sei kuchimiro chemwana?
Mhinduro: Kuberekwazve!

bvunza: Sei kuberekwa patsva?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Tateguru Adhamu akasika munhu
Nokuti Jehovha Mwari akasika “Adhamu” neguruva, uye Adhamu akanga ava munhu mukuru asina “ born ". Uye isu tiri vazukuru vaAdamu, uye muviri wedu wenyama unobva kuna Adamu. Maererano ne " created "Kutaura kuti miviri yedu iguruva → haina kupfuura" born "Inyaya yevakuru" huruva “. (Izvi hazvina kuvakirwa parondedzero yeroorano nokuberekwa kwaAdhama naEvha, asi “guruva” rokusika. Naizvozvo, unonzwisisa here?

(2) Muviri waAdhamu wakatengeswa kuchivi

1 Chivi chakapinda munyika kubudikidza naAdhamu chete
Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza. Reference (VaRoma 5:12)
2 Nyama yedu yakatengeswa kuzvivi;
Tinoziva kuti murayiro ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa kuzvivi. Reference (VaRoma 7:14)
3 Mubairo wechivi rufu
Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. Chirevo (VaRoma 6:23) → Naizvozvo muna Adhamu vose vakafa.

bvunza: Tingaberekwazve sei sevana?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kuberekwa nemvura noMweya — Johani 3:5
(2) Akazvarwa kubva mushoko rechokwadi revhangeri -- 1 VaKorinte 4:15 naJakobho 1:18
(3) Kubva kuna Mwari — Johani 1:12-13

Cherechedza: Iye akambosikwa "Adhamu" aive wepasi → akasikwa ari murume mukuru; magumo zve" Adhamu "Jesu akaberekwa mumudzimu uye aiva mwana! Aiva mwana akazova Shoko, Mwari, uye Mudzimu → 【 Mwana 】Hapana mutemo, hapana zivo yechivi, hapana chivi → → Adhamu wokupedzisira Jesu haana chivi” Kusaziva mhosva ” → Mwari anomuita asina chivi ( Haana mhosva: chinyorwa chekutanga kusaziva mhosva ) akava chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari. Chirevo (2 VaKorinde 5:21)→→Saka isu 1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 vakazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri. 3 Akaberekwa naMwari →→ ndiye Adhamu muduku wokupedzisira → → haana mutemo, haazivi chivi, uye haana chivi → → akafanana nemwana!

Izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa naIshe Jesu: “Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, Kana mukasatendeuka mukava savana vaduku, hamungatongopindi muumambo hwokudenga→→ Chinangwa chekutanga chekudzoka muchimiro chemwana ndeche 【 kuberekwa patsva 】→→Ani nani akazvarwa nemvura noMweya Mutsvene, akazvarwa neshoko rechokwadi reevhangeri, kana akazvarwa naMwari anogona kupinda muumambo hwekudenga. Reference (Mateo 18:3), unonzwisisa izvi here?

saka" Ishe vakadaro “Ani naani anozvininipisa somwana muduku uyu” Tenda kuevhangeri “Ndiye mukuru muumambo hwokudenga. Ani naani anogamuchira mwana muduku souyu nokuda kwezita rangu. Vana vakaberekwa naMwari, varanda vaMwari, vashandi vaMwari; Kungondigamuchira chete . ( Verenga Mateu 18:4-5 )

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. . Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

articles.title: Mibvunzo Nemhinduro: Vanhu vose ava vakafa vaine kutenda uye havana kugamuchira zvipikirwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
VaHebheru 11:13, 39-40 Vose ava vakafa vachitenda, vasina kugamuchira zvipikirwa, asi vakazviona zviri kure uye vachizvigamuchira nomufaro, uye vachipupura pachena kuti vakanga vari vaeni munyika, utorwa.

… Ava ndivo vose vakagamuchira humbowo hwakanaka kuburikidza nerutendo, asi havasati vagamuchira chivimbiso;

1. Vanhu vekare vakagamuchira uchapupu hunoshamisa kubva mutsamba iyi

1 Kutenda kwaAbheri

Nokutenda Abheri wakabayira kuna Mwari chibayiro chakanga chakanaka kupfuura chaKaini, akagamuchira uchapupu hwokururamiswa kwake, uchapupu hwaMwari pamusoro pechipo chake. Kunyange zvazvo akafa, akaramba achitaura nokuda kwokutenda uku. ( VaHebheru 11:4 )
bvunza: Abheri akafa panyama asi achiri kutaura? Chii chiri kutaura?
mhinduro: Mweya unotaura, mweya waAbheri unotaura!
bvunza: Mweya waAbheri unotaura sei?
mhinduro: Jehovha akati, “Waitei (Kaini)? Ropa romunun’una wako (Abheri) rinochema kwandiri nenzwi rinobva muvhu.
bvunza: Ropa Inzwi rakadaidzira kuna Mwari richibva panyika, sezvizvi. Ropa "Pachava nemanzwi anotaurawo here?"
mhinduro: " Ropa “Ndihwo upenyu, nokuti muropa ndimo mune upenyu → Revhitiko 17:11 11 Nokuti upenyu hwezvisikwa zvipenyu huri muropa. Hupenyu, saka hunogona kuyananisa zvitadzo.
bvunza: " Ropa "Mune hupenyu mairi → "Upenyu" uhwu mweya?
mhinduro: vanhu" Ropa "Imo mune hupenyu mairi," hupenyu hweropa "Ndiyo mweya wemunhu →" Ropa "Pane inzwi riri kutaura, kureva" mweya "Kutaura! Incorporeal" mweya "Unogonawo kutaura!"
bvunza: " mweya "Taura → Nzeve dzevanhu dzinozvinzwa here?"
mhinduro: chete" mweya "Kutaura, hakuna munhu anogona kuzvinzwa! Somuenzaniso, kana iwe ukataura chinyararire mumoyo mako: "Mhoro" → iyi " mweya wehupenyu "Taura! Asi izvi" mweya "Pakutaura, kana inzwi rikasapfuura nemiromo yenyama, nzeve dzevanhu hadzigoni kunzwa, chete" mweya wehupenyu “Apo manzwi anobudiswa norurimi nemiromo, nzeve dzomunhu dzinogona kuanzwa;
Mumwe muenzaniso ndewekuti vanhu vazhinji vanotenda kuti " kunze kwemuviri "nharo, rinhi" mweya "Kusiya muviri," mweya "Muviri wako unogona kuona. Asi muviri wemunhu ziso rakashama Handisi kuona" mweya ", handigone kubata nemaoko" mweya ", haigone kushandiswa ne" mweya "Taura uye hausi kunzwa" mweya "Izwi rinotaura. Nokuti Mwari mweya →→Saka ndinogona kunzwa zvaAbheri “ mweya “Inzwi rekutaura harinzwiki nenzeve dzedu dzenyama uye harioneki nemaziso edu.

Kana vari vasingatendi kuti kuna Mwari, havadaviri kuti vanhu vane mweya, vanodavira kuti izvi zvose kuziva uye zvishuwo zviri mumuviri womunhu, kana pfungwa iyi yapera, muviri unofa wodzokera kuguruva, uye vanhu vanopera, semhuka dzisina. Zvemweya zvakafanana. chaizvo" mweya "Vanogona kusiya muviri vogara vega vanogonawo kutaura! Unonzwisisa here izvi? Okay! About" mweya "Ndizvo zvekugovana. Ndichazvigovera nguva inotevera【 ruponeso rwemweya ] Ngatitaurei nezvazvo zvakadzama.
(1) Upenyu kana mweya →→Onai Mateu 16:25 Nokuti munhu wose anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake ( Hupenyu: kana mweya ; zvakafanana pazasi) acharashikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu achahuwana.
(2) Mweya unotaura kuti ururamisire →→Tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa 6:9-10 Parakazarura chisimbiso chechishanu, ndakaona pasi peatari vaya vaiurayiwa nokuda kweshoko raMwari uye nokuda kwouchapupu. Mweya, unodanidzira zvikuru “O Ishe, mutsvene wechokwadi, zvichatora nguva yakadii kuti mutonge avo vanogara panyika nokutsiva ropa redu?

2 Kutenda kwaEnoki

Nokutenda Enoki akatorwa kuti arege kuona rufu, uye hapana akamuwana, nokuti Mwari akanga amutora kare; (VaHebheru 11:5)

3 Kutenda kwaNoa

Nokutenda Noa, uyo akayambirwa naMwari pamusoro pezvinhu zvaakanga asati aona, akaita nokutya uye akagadzira areka kuti mhuri yake iponeswe. Naizvozvo akapa mhosva chizvarwa ichocho, uye iye pachake akava mugari wenhaka yokururama kunobva pakutenda. ( VaHebheru 11:7 )

4 Kutenda kwaAbrahamu, Isaka, naJakobho

Nokutenda Abhurahama akateerera murayiro uye akabuda akaenda kunzvimbo yaaizodanwa kuti ive nhaka yake paakabuda, akanga asingazivi kwaaienda. Nokutenda akagara somueni munyika yechipikirwa, sapanyika yavamwe, achigara mumatende, saIsaka naJakobho, vakanga vari mitezo yechipikirwa chimwe; ( VaHebheru 11:8-9 )

2. Vanhu ava vose vakafa mukutenda uye havana kugamuchira zvakanga zvavimbiswa.

Cherechedza: SaAbrahama, Mwari akavimbisa kuti vana vake vaizowanda senyeredzi dzokudenga uye vasingaverengeki sejecha riri pamhenderekedzo yegungwa → asi haana kuona vana vake achiri mupenyu, uye vakafa vakawanda senyeredzi dziri mugungwa. denga. →→Kutenda kwaSara, Mosesi, Josefa, Gidheoni, Bharaki, Samusoni, Jefta, Dhavhidhi, Samueri, uye vaprofita... Vamwe vakatsunga kusekwa, kurohwa, ngetani, mutorongo, nemimwe miedzo, vakatakwa namabwe kusvikira vafa, vakatemwa nejeko kusvikira vafa, vakaidzwa, vakaurawa nomunondo, vakafamba vakafuka matehwe amakwai nembudzi, vakatambudzika nourombo, nokutambudzika, nokukuvadzwa; vachidzungaira murenje, makomo, mapako, uye mapako ari pasi pevhu, vanhu vasina kufanirwa nenyika. →→
Vanhu ava vanotenda chipikirwa chaMwari munyika, asi vanochiona chiri kure uye vanochigamuchira nomufaro. Avo vanotaura zvinhu zvakadai vanoratidza kuti vanoda kuwana musha kudenga, vanotsungirira kusekwa, kurohwa, ngetani, mutorongo, nemiedzo yemarudzi ose, kutakwa namabwe kusvikira vafa, nokuchekwa namajeko, nokuidzwa, nokuuraiwa pamwe chete norufu. vanodzungaira vakafuka matehwe embudzi, vachitambura nourombo , kutambudzika, kutambura, kudzungaira murenje, makomo, mapako, nemapako ari pasi pevhu → Nokuti havasi venyika uye havakodzeri kuva munyika, vanofa vasina kuwana chinhu munyika → Vanhu ava vose vanoponeswa wakafa mukutenda haana kugamuchira chivimbiso. ( VaHebheru 11:13-38 )

3. Kuti varege kuva vakakwana kunze kwekunge vazvigamuchira pamwe chete nesu

Vanhu ava vose vakagamuchira uchapupu hwakanaka nokutenda, asi havasati vagamuchira zvakavimbiswa, nokuti Mwari akatigadzirira zvinhu zviri nani, kuti varege kuva vakakwana kunze kwokunge vazvigamuchira pamwe chete nesu. ( VaHebheru 11:39-40 )

bvunza: Chii chiri nani icho Mwari akatigadzirira?
mhinduro: ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu →→ Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu Kristu, uyo akava nyama → Akarovererwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu, akavigwa, uye akamukazve pazuva rechitatu. →→ Ngatiruramiswe, tizvarwe patsva, timutswe, tiponeswe, tiwane muviri waKristu, tiwane hupenyu hwaKristu, tiwane uhwana hwaMwari, tiwane Mweya Mutsvene akavimbiswa, uye tiwane hupenyu husingaperi! Mwari haangotipi vana chete, asi anotipawo rumuko runotipa mbiri, mibayiro, korona, uye muviri wakanaka zvikuru! Ameni.
Vanhu vakare muTesitamende yekare vose vakafa nokutenda, asi havana kugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa naMwari pavakafa! Pasina Mweya Mutsvene, hakuna humwanakomana hwaMwari. Nokuti panguva iyoyo ndiJesu Kristu basa rokudzikinura 】Hazvisati zvapera → MuTesitamende yekare, kunyange kana Mweya Mutsvene uchigona kufamba mumunhu, Mambo Sauro muenzaniso. Mweya Mutsvene haagari mumuviri wedehwe rewaini remunhu wakare; Mweya Mutsvene anogara mumuviri mutsva wedehwe rewaini waKristu, uye muviri waKristu itembere yoMweya Mutsvene. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Vanhu veTestamente Itsva, avo vanotenda muna Jesu muchizvarwa chedu ndivo vakakomborerwa zvikuru→→【 Basa raKristu rokudzikinura rakapera 】→→ Ani naani anotenda muna Jesu anodya muviri wake—anotora muviri wake, anonwa ropa Rake—anowana ropa Rake rinokosha, anowana mweya noupenyu hwaKristu, anowana umwanakomana waMwari, uye anowana upenyu husingaperi! Ameni

Vanhu vomutestamende yekare vakagamuchira uchapupu hwakanaka nokutenda, asi havana kugamuchira zvakavimbiswa, kuti kana vakasazvigamuchira pamwe chete nesu, varege kuva vakakwana. Naizvozvo, Mwari vachatendera zvirokwazvo avo vari muTestamente Yekare vanotenda muna Mwari kuti varopafadzwe sesu uye vagogara nhaka yehumambo hwekudenga pamwechete. Ameni!

saka" Paul "Iti → Kana tichitenda kuti Jesu akafa akamukazve, Mwari achaunzawo avo vakavata muna Jesu pamwe chete naJesu uye votorwa pamwe chete nesu mumakore, kuti mweya yavo nemiviri yavo zvichengetedzwe uye miviri yavo igoregererwa. muviri wechokwadi anooneka , sangana Ishe mumhepo, uye nenzira iyi, tichava naShe nokusingaperi. Ameni ! Saka, unonzwisisa here? Chirevo ( 1 VaTesaronika 4:14-17 )

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu ndiro vhangeri rinoita kuti vanhu vaponeswe, vapiwe mbiri, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe. Ameni

Hymn: Ishe! Ndiri pano

Mabhuratha nemasisita akawanda anogamuchirwa kushandisa browser yavo kutsvaga - Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu - kuti tibatane nesu uye tishande pamwechete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

OK! Ndizvo zvatiri kugovera nhasi.

articles.title: Kufambira Mberi KwemuKristu Mupilgrim (Hurukuro 8)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Ruka chitsauko 23 ndima 42-43 todziverenga pamwe chete: Akati kwaari: Jesu mundirangarire kana masvika muushe hwenyu. Jesu akati kwaari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, nhasi uchava neni muParadhiso.

Nhasi tinodzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera Kufambira mberi kwePilgrim pamwe chete “Rufu Rwakakwana, Pamwe Chete muParadhiso” Aihwa. 8 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kutivhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya→ Takura muchinjikwa wako zuva nezuva Uyo anorasikirwa neupenyu hwake nokuda kwaShe uye nevhangeri achaponesa upenyu hwake! Chengetedza upenyu kuupenyu husingaperi → rufu rwakakwana uye kugara muparadhiso naShe → gamuchira mbiri, mubairo, nekorona. Ameni !

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

bvunza: Chii chinonzi paradhiso? Paradhiso iri kupi?
mhinduro: Musha wekudenga une mufaro, Testamente Yekare inofananidzira Kenani, nyika inoyerera mukaka neuchi; Mwanakomana, uye musha unoshamisa wekumusha.

Reference Scripture:

Akati, “Jesu, mundirangarirewo kana masvika muumambo hwenyu.” Jesu akati kwaari, “Ndinokuudza chokwadi, nhasi uchava neni muParadhiso

Ndinoziva munhu ari muna Kristu, wakakwidzwa kudenga rechitatu makore anegumi namana apfuura (kana akanga ari mumuviri, handizivi, kana kana akanga ari kunze kwomuviri, handizivi, Mwari oga ndiye anoziva. Ndinoziva munhu uyu (kana akanga ari mumuviri kana kunze kwomuviri, handizivi, Mwari oga ndiye anoziva.) Akatorwa akakwidzwa muParadhiso akanzwa mashoko akavanzika asingagoni kutaurwa nomunhu. 2 VaKorinte 12:2-4

Une nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya Mutsvene kukereke. Kuno uyo anokunda, ndichapa kuti adye kubva pamuti woupenyu muParadhiso yaMwari. Zvakazarurwa 2:7

【1】Kuparidza vhangeri roruponeso

Naizvozvo musavatya; nekuti hakuna chakavigwa chisingazobudiswi pachena, kana chakavigwa chisingazozikamwi. Zvandakataura pakavanda, taurai pachena; nezvamunonzwa munzeve dzenyu, taurai pachena. Paridzai muri mumba, musatya vanouraya muviri, asi vasingagoni kuuraya mweya;

Cherechedza: Jesu akatiudza “zvakavanzika zvakavanzwa nokusingaperi” uye akaparidza vhangeri roruponeso! Ameni. Usatya vanouraya muviri asi vasingagoni kuuraya mweya → Asi Mwari anogona kusimbisa mwoyo yenyu maererano neevhangeri yandakaparidza uye naJesu Kristu wandakaparidza, uye maererano nezvakavanzika zvakavanzwa kubva nokusingaperi. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 16:25

Zvapupu zvakawanda zvakafira kutenda

Cherechedza: Sezvo tine zvapupu zvizhinji zvakatikomberedza segore, ngatibvisei zvose zvinoremedza nechivi chinongotinamatira nyore, uye ngatimhanye nokutsungirira nhangemutange yatakaisirwa, tichitarira kuMuvambi noMuvambi wokutenda kwedu. .Jesu Wokupedzisira (kana shanduro: kutarisa kuna Jesu anova muvambi nomukwanisi wezvokwadi). nokuda kwomufaro wakaiswa pamberi pake akatsunga pamuchinjikwa, akazvidza kunyadziswa kwawo, uye akagara kuruoko rworudyi rwechigaro choushe chaMwari. VaHebheru Chitsauko 12 Ndima 1-2 → Vakadai saAbheri, Noa, Abrahama, Samusoni, Danieri... uye vamwe vaporofita vakapfidza vakarovererwa pamwe chete naJesu, Stefano, James Brothers, Vaapostora, vaKristu Nokutenda, vakakunda umambo hwavavengi, vakaita zvakarurama, vakawana zvipikirwa, vakadzivira miromo yeshumba, vakadzima simba romwoto, vakapukunyuka munondo unopinza, utera hwavo hukava nesimba, vakava noushingi pakurwa, uye vakakunda vatorwa . Mumwe mukadzi akamutswa kubva kuvakafa wake. Vamwe vakatsungirira chitambudzo chakakomba uye vakaramba kusunungurwa (rugwaro rwapakuvamba rwakanga rwuri rudzikinuro) kuti vawane rumuko rwuri nani. Vamwe vakatsunga kusekwa, kurohwa, ngetani, mutorongo, nemimwe miedzo, vakatakwa namabwe kusvikira vafa, vakatemwa nejeko kusvikira vafa, vakaidzwa, vakaurawa nomunondo, vakafamba vakafuka matehwe amakwai nembudzi, vakatambudzika nourombo, nokutambudzika, nokukuvadzwa; vachidzungaira murenje, makomo, mapako, uye mapako ari pasi pevhu, vanhu vasina kufanirwa nenyika. Vanhu ava vose vakagamuchira uchapupu hwakanaka nokutenda, asi havasati vagamuchira zvakavimbiswa, nokuti Mwari akatigadzirira zvinhu zviri nani, kuti varege kuva vakakwana kunze kwokunge vazvigamuchira pamwe chete nesu. VaHebheru 11:33-40

[2] Tora muchinjikwa wako mazuva ese utevere Jesu

Jesu akabva ati kuboka revanhu: “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake zuva rimwe nerimwe, anditevere. Upenyu; ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake “nokuda kwangu” achaponesa upenyu hwake kana akawana nyika yose asi iye pachake achizvitadzira?

1 Takura muchinjikwa wako, utevedzere Kristu
VaFiripi 3:10-11 kuti ndizive Kristu nesimba rokumuka kwake, uye kuti nditambure pamwe chete naye uye ndifanane norufu rwake, kuti ndiwanewo kumuka kubva kuvakafa, irwo rudzikunuro rwoupenyu hwangu. muviri."

2 Kurwa kurwa kwakanaka
Sezvakataurwa na“Pauro” → Ndiri kudururwa sechipiriso chinonwiwa, uye nguva yokuenda kwangu yasvika. Ndarwa kurwa kwakanaka, ndapedza nhangemutange, ndachengeta kutenda; kubva zvino, ndakachengeterwa korona yokururama, yandichapiwa naShe, unotonga zvakarurama, nezuva iro; Tarisa kuna 2 Timotio Chitsauko 4 Ndima 6-8

3 Yasvika nguva yokubuda mutende
Sokutaura kwakaita “Petro” → ndakafunga kuti zvakakodzera kukuyeuchidzai uye kukukurudzirai ndichiri mutende rino ndichiziva kuti nguva iri kuuya yokuti ndibve mutende iri, sezvandakaratidzwa naShe wedu Jesu Kristu. Uye ndichaita zvose zvandinogona kuti zvinhu izvi zvirambe zviri chirangaridzo chenyu shure kwokufa kwangu. 2 Petro 1:13-15

4 Vakaropafadzwa vanofira muna She
Ndakanzwa inzwi richibva kudenga richiti, Nyora, uti: Kubva zvino, vakafa muna She vakaropafadzwa; ” Zvakazarurwa 14:13

【3】 Kufambira mberi kwePilgrim kwapera, tiri pamwe chete muParadhiso

(1) VaKristu vanotiza pamba

VaKristu vanotora muchinjikwa wavo uye vatevere Jesu, vanoparidza evhangeri yeumambo hwekudenga, uye vanomhanya Kufambira mberi kwePilgrim:

danho rokutanga " Tenda murufu “Vatadzi” vanotenda mumunhu wekare vachafa;
danho rechipiri " Ona rufu Tarirai, vatadzi vanofa; tarirai, vatsva vanorarama;
Danho rechitatu " Kuvenga rufu “Venga upenyu hwako, uhuchengete kuupenyu husingaperi.
Danho rechina " Kuda kufa “Roverwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu kuti aparadze muviri wechivi uye urege kuvazve muranda wechivi.
danho rechishanu " kudzokera kurufu “Nokubhabhatidzwa imi makabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo worufu rwake, uye imiwo muchabatanidzwa naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake.
Danho rechitanhatu " launch Rufu” rinoratidza hupenyu hwaJesu.
Danho rechinomwe " kusangana nerufu “Kana ukatambudzika pamwe chete naKristu padanho reevhangeri, uchakudzwa pamwe chete naye.
Danho rechisere " Kufa kwakakwana “Tende renyama rakaputswa naMwari → ipapo mbiri , mubayiro , korona Takachengeterwa isu → muParadhiso naKristu. Ameni!

(2)Kuva naShe muparadhiso

Johane 17 Vhesi 4 Ndakakukudzai panyika, ndapedza basa ramakandipa kuti ndiite.
Ruka 23:43 Jesu akati kwaari, “Ndinokuudza chokwadi, nhasi uchava neni muParadhiso.
Zvakazarurwa 2:7 Kuno uyo anokunda, ndichamupa kuti adye kubva pamuti woupenyu, uri muparadhiso yaMwari. "

(3) Mweya, mweya uye muviri zvinochengetedzwa

Mwari pachake achakukwanisai: Mwari wenyasha dzose, iye akakudanirai kukubwinya kwake kusingaperi muna Kristu, mushure mokutambura kwenguva duku, iye pachake achakukwanisai, achakusimbisai uye achakusimbisai. Simba ngarive kwaari nokusingaperi-peri. Ameni! 1 Petro 5:10-11

Mwari worugare ngaakuitei vatsvene zvakazara! Uye ndinovimba wako Mweya, mweya uye muviri zvinochengetedzwa , vasina chavangapomerwa pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Iye unokudanai akatendeka uye achazviita. 1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu. Ameni! →Seizvo VaFiripi 4:2-3 inotaura, Pauro, Timotio, Yuodhia, Sintike, Kremendi, uye vamwe vakashanda naPauro, mazita avo ari mubhuku roupenyu hwakakwirira. Ameni!

articles.title: Kufambira Mberi KwemuKristu Mupilgrim (Hurukuro 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna 1 VaKorinte 15 ndima 3-4 todziverenga pamwe chete: Iniwo ndakakumikidza kwamuri, pakutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, uye kuti akavigwa uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro gara naye 2 Timotio 2:11

Nhasi tinodzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera Kufambira mberi kwePilgrim pamwechete nguva nenguva "Kusangana nerufu, hupenyu hunotanga mauri" Aihwa. 7 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akarurama [kereke] anotuma vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu, nokubwinya kwenyu, norudzikinuro rwomuviri wenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kutivhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya→ Nzwisisa kuti tinotora muchinjikwa wedu tigosangana nerufu kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwe matiri! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita dzvene raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Handichisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anoraramira ini.

Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri, uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino munyama, ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. VaGaratia 2:20
Nokuti kwandiri, kurarama ndiKristu, uye kufa kupfuma. VaFiripi 1:21 .

bvunza: Zvino handisisiri ini ndinogara → Ndiani anorarama?
mhinduro: NdiKristu anogara mandiri → “anorarama” nokuda kwangu → nokuti ndinorarama ndiKristu → ndinorarama naAdhamu, mutadzi, uye muranda wechivi Kristu “anoraramira” ini, achirarama noutsvene hwahwo; Kristu kubva mukubwinya kwaMwari Baba. Ameni! →Saka “Pauro” akati muna VaFiripi 1:21 →Kuti ini ndirarame ndiKristu, uye kufa kupfuma. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mbiri: Tinotambudzika pamwe chete naye, uye tichakudzwa pamwe naye

bvunza: "Vanotambura naKristu" Chinangwa "Chii ichochi?"
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Takarongerwa kutambura nhamo

Tinofanira kupinda nemumatambudziko akawanda kuti tipinde muumambo hwaMwari. Mabasa 14:22
Kuti parege kuva nomunhu anozununguswa nokutambudzika kwakasiyana-siyana. Nekuti imwi mumene munoziva kuti zvakatemerwa isu kutambudzika. 1 VaTesaronika 3:3

(2) Mufaro mukuru pakati pemarudzi ose emiedzo

Zvitorei semufaro chete pamunosangana nemiedzo mizhinji yemhando dzose, muchiziva kuti kuidzwa kwokutenda kwenyu kunobereka kutsungirira. Asi kutsungirira ngakuve nepundutso, kuti imwi muve vakakwana nekukwana, musingashaiwi chinhu. Jakobho 1:2-4
Farai mutariro; tsungirirai pakutambudzika; VaRoma 12:12

(3) Kutambura muviri wenyama uye kubva pachivi

Sezvo Ishe akatambura panyama, nemiwo munofanira kushandisa mafungiro akadai sechombo, nokuti uyo akatambura panyama akarega chivi. Chirevo (1 Petro Chitsauko 4:1)

(4) Ngatikudzwe!

Kana vari vana, saka vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. VaRoma 8:17

Cherechedza: Kana iwe uchitambura munyika nekuuraya vanhu, kudongorera, kuita zvakaipa, uye nekuva neshungu, iwe uri kutambura iwe pachako kuderera hakusi kutambura nekuda kwenzira yaIshe . Saka, zvakajeka here?
Asi ngakurege kuva nomumwe wenyu anotambudzika nokuda kwokuti anouraya, kana achiba, anoita zvakaipa kana kuti asingateereri. ( 1 Petro 4:15 )

3. Pfekai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari

Shongai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, kuti mugone kumira muchirwa namano adhiabhorosi. …

1 use chokwadi sebhanhire rinosunga chiuno;
2 use kururamisira Ishandise senhovo yechipfuva kuvhara chipfuva chako,
3 Shandisa zvakare Safety Vhangeri rinofanira kupfekedzwa patsoka dzako seshangu kukugadzirira kufamba.
4 Mukuwedzera, kubata Kutenda Senhovo inodzima miseve inopfuta yowakaipa;
5 uye pfeka ruponeso ngowani,
6 bata Mweya Mutsvene Munondo wake ishoko raMwari;
7 Vachivimba neMweya Mutsvene, vakagadzirira nguva dzose munzira dzose nyengetererai rindai uye murege kuneta pazvinhu izvi, muchinyengeterera vatsvene vose. Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 6:10-18

4. Ziva nzira yaIshe → Hupenyu huchatanga mauri

(1) Tenda muvhangeri roruponeso
Zvandakagamuchirawo ndikazvipa kwamuri: Kutanga, kuti Kristu wakafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, asunungurwa pachivi, napamurairo, napachituko chomurairo, akavigwa, achibvisa munhu wekare, chituko chemurairo. Kuzvibata kwomunhu wekare; Ameni! 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4

(2) Tendai kuti harahwa yafa

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. VaKorose 3:3-4

(3)Uzive nzira yaIshe

" kufa "Rambai matiri,
" born "Asi inoshanda mamuri. Reference (2 VaKorinde 4:10-12)

Simudza muchinjikwa wako zuva nezuva utevere Jesu:
1 tora nzira yomuchinjikwa → Kuparadza muviri wechivi,
2 Tora nzira yemweya →Taura nezvezvinhu zvemweya,
3 Tora nzira inoenda kudenga →Paridza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga.
danho rokutanga " Tenda murufu Tenda kune mutadzi, ufe; tenda kune zvitsva, rarama,
danho rechipiri " Ona rufu Tarirai, mutana anofa; tarira, munhu mutsva anorarama;
Danho rechitatu " Kuvenga rufu “Venga upenyu hwako uhuchengete kuupenyu husingaperi;
Danho rechina " funga kufa "Kuda kubatanidzwa panyama naKristu uye kurovererwa kuti uparadze muviri wechivi,
danho rechishanu " kudzokera kurufu “makavigwa pamwe chete naye mukubhabhatidzwa murufu.
Danho rechitanhatu " kutanga kufa ". Kuzivisa hupenyu hwaJesu,
Danho rechinomwe " ruzivo Rufu". Hupenyu huri kushanda mauri.
"" kusangana nerufu "→→"Muviri unotadza" wemurume wekare wakatanga kuipa zvishoma nezvishoma uye muviri wekunze wakaparadzwa nekuda kwezvishuvo zvoudyire.
" Sangana nehupenyu " Newcomer “Muna Kristu” mwoyo uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva uye uri kukura kuva munhu mukuru, uzere nechimiro chaKristu! Ameni!

【 Cherechedza: 】 →→ Danho rechinomwe ndiro danho rekuparidza evhangeri nekuparidza chokwadi.

bvunza: sei kwete. nomwe Danho ndiro danho reevhangeri?
mhinduro: Kuparidza evhangeri panguva iyi "kusangana nerufu"; " tsamba "kufa" kuti " ruzivo "Rufu" → Hakuchina iwe, iwe chete Ishe! tsamba Rarama*ku" ruzivo "Rarama" → Pfuma inoiswa mumudziyo wevhu kuti iratidzwe, kuratidza hupenyu hwaJesu. Mweya Mutsvene “Iise mumudziyo wevhu kuti uparidze evhangeri uye nefax shoko! Mweya Mutsvene “Uchapupu hwaJesu, uye ndihwo hupenyu hwaJesu hunoratidzwa→→ Rega vanhu vatende muvhangeri uye vawane upenyu husingaperi ;kwete kuratidza kuchiva kwenyama yako, njere, njere, nekugona kutaura.
Nenzira iyi, mwana" Mweya Mutsvene "Evhangeri yakaparidzwa chete ndiyo ine simba uye nzira yechokwadi inogona kuratidzwa! Kana wanyatsonzwisisa pfungwa dzako, unozokwanisa kusiyanisa zvakanaka nezvakaipa→→Hauchavhiringikazve ne"chivi", kana nadhiabhorosi. manomano nezvitsinga zvounyengeri, kana nezvinhu zvose zvenyika zvinozungunuswa nedzidziso, nemhepo dzenhema, nedzidziso dzakatsauka.

Kana ruzivo rwako rwenzira yekutenda yaIshe isati yasvika padanho rino uye usati waenda kunoparidza evhangeri, avo vanoparidza “ via "Kushandisa dzidziso dzenyika nouzivi hwevanhu kuchakupikisa, zvichikusiya usina remuromo, uye vhangeri raunoparidza richashaya basa. Kana vari vatendi vatsva vanoda kutungamirira mhuri dzavo, shamwari, uye vavanoshanda navo kuti vazive Jesu Kristu, Zvakanakisisa kuvaunza. kukereke muna Ishe Jesu Kristu uye regai vashandi vakatumwa nekereke vadzidzise uye nokuvatungamirira kuti vazive nzira yechokwadi yevhangeri Ameni.

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

Hymn: Jehovha ndiye nzira, chokwadi, uye upenyu

Mabhuratha nemasisita akawanda anogamuchirwa kushandisa browser yavo kutsvaga - Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu - kuti tibatane nesu uye tishande pamwechete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

Bata QQ 2029296379

OK! Nhasi tichadzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni
