articles.title: Kufambira Mberi KwemuKristu Mupilgrim (Hurukuro 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 2 VaKorinte 4, ndima 7 ne12, todziverenga pamwe chete: Pfuma iyi tinayo mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kwatiri. …Saizvozvo kufa kunobata matiri, asi upenyu hunobata mamuri.

Nhasi tinodzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera Kufambira mberi kwePilgrim pamwe chete “Kutanga Rufu Kuti Uratidze Upenyu hwaJesu” Aihwa. 6 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akarurama [kereke] anotuma vashandi: neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu, nokubwinya kwenyu, norudzikinuro rwomuviri wenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti kufa kwaJesu kunoshanda matiri kubvisa kudzingiswa kweruchiva; Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita dzvene raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Isa pfuma mumudziyo wevhu

(1)Mwana

bvunza: Chii chinonzi "mwana" chinorevei?
mhinduro: “Pfuma” inoreva Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi, Mweya waJesu, uye neMweya waBaba Vekudenga!
Uye ini ndichakumbira Baba, uye vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi kuti agare nemi nokusingaperi, iye Mweya wechokwadi, uyo nyika yausingagoni kumugamuchira, nokuti haimuoniwo. Asi imi munomuziva, nokuti agere nemi uye achava mamuri. Tarisa kuna Johani 14:16-17
Nokuti muri vanakomana, Mwari akatuma Mweya woMwanakomana wake mumwoyo yenyu (pakutanga) achidanidzira achiti, “Abha, Baba!” ( VaGaratia 4:6 )
Uyo anochengeta mirairo yaMwari anogara muna Mwari, uye Mwari anogara maari. Tinoziva kuti Mwari anogara matiri nokuda kwoMweya Mutsvene waakatipa. Tarisa kuna 1 Johane 3:24

(2)Chiumbwa chehari

bvunza: Shoko rokuti "hari" rinorevei?
mhinduro: Midziyo yevhu midziyo yakagadzirwa nevhu
1 vane" Ndarama nesirivha ” → Semudziyo unokosha, dimikira remunhu anozvarwa patsva uye akaponeswa, munhu akaberekwa naMwari.
2 vane" midziyo yevhu ”→Semudziyo unozvininipisa, dimikira remunhu anozvininipisa, harahwa yenyama.
Mumhuri yakapfuma, hamuna midziyo yegoridhe neyesirivha chete, asiwo midziyo yemapuranga nemidziyo yevhu; Kana munhu achizvinatsa pazvinhu zvisizvo, achava mudziyo unokudzwa, wakaitwa mutsvene, wakabatsira Ishe, wakagadzirirwa basa rose rakanaka. Tarisa kuna 2 Timotio 2:20-21;
Mwari achaedza imba yemunhu mumwe nemumwe nemoto kuti aone kana ichigona kumira - tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 3:11-15.
Hamuzivi here kuti muviri wenyu itemberi yoMweya Mutsvene? Tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 6:19-20.

[Cherechedza]: Kusunungurwa pazvinhu zvisina maturo → kunoreva munhu wekare akaparadzaniswa nenyama, nokuti munhu wekare akaberekwa naMwari haasi wenyama → kureva VaRoma 8:9; mudziyo wokukudzwa, wakacheneswa, wakakodzera kushandiswa naShe, uye wakagadzirirwa kufamba marudzi ose emabasa akanaka →【 midziyo inokosha ] zvinoreva muviri waShe Kristu, [ zvevhu 】 Zvinorevawo muviri waKristu → Mwari "achachengeta" Mweya Mutsvene "isa" zvevhu "Muviri waKristu → unoratidza hupenyu hwaJesu! Sezvo rufu rwaJesu pamuchinjikwa rwakakudza Mwari Baba, kumuka kwaKristu kubva kuvakafa kunotiberekazve → Mwari achazviitawo" mwana “yakaiswa kwatiri isu vakaberekwa naMwari semidziyo yokukudzwa” zvevhu “Nokuti tiri mitezo yomuviri wake. mwana “Simba guru rinobva kuna Mwari, kwete kwatiri,” mwana “Kuzivisa hupenyu hwaJesu! Amen. Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

2. Chinangwa chaMwari chokutanga rufu matiri

(1) Mufananidzo wetsanga yegorosi

Ndinokuudzai chokwadi, kana tsanga yegorosi ikasawira muvhu ikafa, inongoramba ichingova tsanga imwe chete; Ani naani anoda upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; ani naani anovenga upenyu hwake munyika ino achahuchengetera upenyu husingaperi. Johani 12:24-25

(2)Wakatofa

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. VaKorose 3:3-4

(3) Vakaropafadzwa vanofira muna She

Vakaropafadzwa vanofira muna She! “Hongu,” akadaro Mweya Mutsvene, “vakazorora pakubata kwavo, uye zvibereko zvebasa ravo zvakavatevera. ” Zvakazarurwa 14:13.

Cherechedza: Chinangwa chaMwari chekuunza rufu matiri ndechekuti:

1 Kudzingiswa kubvisa nyama: Kristu "anobvisa" kudzingiswa kwenyama - ona VaKorose 2:11.
2 Inokodzera kushandiswa kukuru: Kana munhu achizvinatsa pazvinhu zvisizvo, achava mudziyo unokudzwa, wakaitwa mutsvene, wakabatsira Ishe, wakagadzirirwa basa rose rakanaka. Tarisa kuna 2 Timotio chitsauko 2 ndima 21. Unonzwisisa here?

3. Kurarama handichisiri ini, ndichiratidza hupenyu hwaJesu

(1) Kurarama handichisiri ini

Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri, uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino munyama, ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. Tarisa kuna VaGaratiya Chitsauko 2 Ndima 20
Nokuti kwandiri, kurarama ndiKristu, uye kufa kupfuma. Tarisa kuna VaFiripi 1:21

(2) Mwari akaisa “pfuma” mu“mudziyo wevhu”

Tine “pfuma” iyi yoMweya Mutsvene yakaiswa “mumudziyo wevhu” kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari, kwete kwatiri. Tinokomberedzwa navavengi kumativi ose, asi hatina kubatwa nemisungo, asi hatinyadziswi, asi hatina kurashwa; Tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 4:7-9

(3) Rufu runoita kuti tiratidze upenyu hwaJesu

Tinogara takatakura rufu rwaJesu nesu kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri. Nokuti isu vapenyu tinogara tichiiswa kurufu nokuda kwaJesu, kuti upenyu hwaJesu huratidzwe mumiviri yedu inofa. Ona 2 VaKorinte 4:10-11 .

Cherechedza: Mwari anoita kuti rufu ruve matiri kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwe mumiviri yedu inofa → kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kubva kwatiri → nenzira iyi, rufu runobata matiri → vapenyu Handisi ini → “Jesu anoratidzwa” → paunoona Muponesi, tarira kuna Jesu, tenda muna Jesu → born Asi rinoshanda mauri . Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Mwari anomutsa rufu matiri uye anoona "shoko raShe" → Munhu wese anogamuchira chipo chekutenda zvakasiyana, vamwe vakareba kana vapfupi, vamwe vanhu vane nguva pfupi, uye vamwe vanhu vane nguva refu kwazvo, makore matatu, gumi. makore, kana kuti makumi emakore . Mwari akaisa “pfuma” mu“midziyo yedu yevhu” kuratidza kuti iri simba guru rinobva kuna Mwari → Mudzimu Mutsvene unooneka mumunhu wose nokuda kwezvakanaka → Akapa vamwe vaapostora, vamwe vaprofita, uye vamwe Vaya vanoparidza evhangeri vanosanganisira vafundisi nevadzidzisi. → Murume uyu akapiwa mashoko ouchenjeri noMweya Mutsvene, uye mumwewo murume akapiwa kutenda noMweya Mutsvene, uye mumwezve akapiwa chipo chokuporesa noMweya Mutsvene. Mumwe munhu anogona kuita minana, mumwe munhu anogona kuva muporofita, mumwe munhu anogona kuona mweya, mumwe munhu anogona kutaura nendimi, uye mumwe munhu anogona kududzira ndimi. Zvose izvi zvinoitwa noMweya Mutsvene uye zvinogoverwa kumunhu mumwe nomumwe maererano nokuda kwake. Tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 12:8-11

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. . Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

Rwiyo: Pfuma inoiswa mumidziyo yevhu

Mabhuratha nemasisita akawanda anogamuchirwa kushandisa browser yavo kutsvaga - Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu - kuti tibatane nesu uye tishande pamwechete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

Bata QQ 2029296379

OK! Nhasi tichadzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: Kufambira Mberi KwemuKristu Mupilgrim (Hurukuro 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna VaRoma Chitsauko 6 ndima 4 Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tirarame upenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba.

Nhasi tinodzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera Kufambira mberi kwePilgrim pamwechete nguva nenguva “Murufu rwaKristu Nokubhabhatidzwa” Aihwa. 5 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya → Kubhabhatidzwa murufu kunoita kuti kufamba kwedu kwose kufananidzwe noupenyu hutsva. ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita dzvene raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) murufu nokubhabhatidzwa

Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tirarame upenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. Kana takabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo worufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake; ona VaRoma 6:3-5

bvunza: Chii "chinangwa" chekubhabhatidzwa murufu rwaKristu →?
mhinduro: "Chinangwa" →

1 Batana naye muchimiro cherufu → paradza muviri wechivi;
2 Batana naye muchimiro chekumuka → tipe hupenyu hutsva mukufamba kwese! Ameni.

Cherechedza: Akabhabhatidzwa “murufu” → murufu rwaKristu, achifa naye, Kristu akasiya pasi uye akaturikwa pamuti ndiye “ kufa wakamira ” → Irwo rufu rune mbiri vaKristu vanobhapatidzwa, uye ndiMwari anoita kuti tive vaKristu havafi naAdhamu vachiwira pasi kana kuvata pasi, zvinova rufu runonyadzisa Kristu Zvakakosha kuti vatendi “vabhabhatidzwe” murufu rwaKristu kuti muve nokukudzwa.

(2) Kubatanidzwa naye muchimiro cherufu

Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana nerwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye pakumuka kwake ( VaRoma 6:5 )
bvunza: Kubatanidzwa naye sei mukufanana kwerufu rwake?
mhinduro: “Ubhabhatidzwe”! Unosarudza “kubhabhatidzwa” → kubhabhatidzwa murufu rwaKristu → ndiko kubatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana nerufu rwake → kurovererwa! Wakabhabhatidzwa, “mu” rufu rwaKristu! Mwari vanozokutendera kuti uroverwe pamwe chete navo . Naizvozvo Ishe Jesu akati → Takurai joko rangu mudzidze kwandiri, nokuti joko rangu hariremi uye mutoro wangu wakareruka → “Wakabhapatidzwa” murufu rwake, uye wakaverengerwa sowakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa naKristu, hazvisi nyore here kubatanidzwa naye norufu here? Mutoro wakareruka here? Hongu, ndizvo! Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Verenga VaRoma 6:6 : Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vezvivi;

(3) Kubatanidzwa Naye mukufanana kwekumuka kwake

bvunza: Ungabatanidzwa sei naye murumuko rwake?
mhinduro: Idya uye inwa Chirairo chaShe! Usiku uhwo Ishe Jesu hwaakapandukirwa, akatora chingwa, uye akati avonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa imi. Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu. ”→Uyo anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu anogara mandiri, neni maari.

Cherechedza: Idya uye inwa zvaIshe Nyama uye Ropa →→Muviri waShe une chimiro here? Ehe! Patinodya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru, tinodya nokunwa ne“ chimiro "Muviri neropa raIshe? Hongu! →→ Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi, uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira ( Johani 6:54 ) Naizvozvo, patinodya chirayiro chaShe uye patinonwa muviri neropa raShe →→ achamutswa kuvakafa. Takabatanidzwa naye muchimiro Chake nguva dzose, tinodya chirayiro chaShe nguva dzose, izvo zvinowedzera kutenda kwedu kubva pakutenda kuenda kukutenda, simba kubva kusimba kusvika pakubwinya, uye noupenyu hutsva zuva nezuva nzira, wazvinzwisisa.

(4) Tipei musambo mutsva mukufamba kwese kwatinoita

Kana munhu ari muna Kristu, ava chisikwa chitsva; Tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:17
Vandudzwei mundangariro dzenyu, uye mufuke munhu mutsva, akasikwa akafanana nomufananidzo waMwari mukururama kwechokwadi noutsvene. Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 4:23-24

(5) Inwai Mweya Mutsvene mumwe chete uye muve muviri mumwe

Sezvo muviri uri mumwe asi une mitezo mizhinji, uye kunyange zvazvo mitezo mizhinji, iwo muviri mumwe chete, ndizvo zvakaitawo Kristu. Tingava vaJudha kana vaGiriki, varanda kana vakasununguka, isu tose takabhabhatidzwa noMweya mumwe chete, tikava muviri mumwe, uye tinonwa Mweya Mutsvene mumwe chete. Tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 12:12-13

(6) Vaka muviri waKristu, batanidzwa mukutenda, ukure, uye zvivake iwe umene murudo.

Akapa vamwe vaapositori, vamwe vaporofita, vamwe vaevhangeri, vamwe vafudzi navadzidzisi, kuti vatsvene vashongedzerwe basa rokushumira, nokuvaka muviri waKristu, kusvikira tose tasvika pahumwe hwokutenda nokuziva Mwari. Mwanakomana wake akakura kusvika pamurume mukuru, akasvika paukuru hwekuzara kwaKristu,...kuburikidza naye muviri wose unobatanidzwa zvakanaka, nomutezo wose uchishanda pachinangwa chawo, uye mutezo mumwe nomumwe uchitsigirana maererano nebasa re muviri wose, kuti muviri ukure, uye muzvivake murudo. Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 4:11-13,16

[Cherechedza]: Takabatanidzwa naKristu kupfurikidza no“rubhapatidzo” → kupinza rufu ndokuvigwa Naye → Kana takabatanidzwa Naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana kwokumuka kwake → Nokuda kwechiito chose chatakaita. Pane zvitaera zvitsva. SaKristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. →Pfeka munhu mutsva, pfekai Kristu, inwai Mweya Mutsvene mumwe chete, muve muviri mumwe →Iyo "Kereke yaJesu Kristu" →Idya zvokudya zvomudzimu uye inwa mvura yomudzimu muna Kristu, uye ukure kuva murume akakura mumudzimu, akaguta. yokukura kwokuzara kwaKristu → Naye muviri wose wakanyatsobatanidzwa pamwe chete, uye mutezo mumwe nomumwe une basa rawo, uye uchibatsirana maererano nebasa remutezo mumwe nomumwe, kuti muviri ukure nokuzvivaka mu rudo. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(7) Tevedzera tsoka dzaIshe

Kana maKristu achimhanyisa Kufambira Mberi kwemuPilgrim, haamhanyi ari ega, asi anobatana neuto guru, Munhu wese anobatsirana uye anodanana muna Kristu uye anomhanya pamwe chete → tarisa kuna Jesu, muvambi nemupedzisi wekutenda kwedu → mhanya wakananga pamuchinjikwa. , uye tinofanira kugamuchira mubairo wekudana kwepamusoro kwaMwari muna Kristu Jesu. Ona VaFiripi 3:14 .

Zvakaita seRwiyo Rwokuimbira 1:8 Imi makanaka kupfuura vakadzi →" mukadzi "Kureva chechi, watova muchechi yaJesu Kristu" → Kana usingazivi, ingotevera tsoka dzemakwai...!

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. . Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

Hymn: Atofa, atovigwa

Mabhuratha nemasisita akawanda anogamuchirwa kushandisa browser yavo kutsvaga - Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu - kuti tibatane nesu uye tishande pamwechete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

Bata QQ 2029296379

OK! Nhasi tichadzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi: nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, nembiri yedu, nerudzikinuro rwemiviri yedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira

Zvinoitika kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira nokuti "ndinoda" kubatanidzwa naye muchimiro cherufu - kurovererwa, kufa uye kuvigwa pamwe chete → kutisunungura kubva kuchivi, kubva kumurairo uye chituko chemurairo. , uye kubva kumunhu wekare Uye maitiro emunhu wekare, kuitira kuti kufamba kwose kwatinoita kune maitiro matsva! Ameni

bvunza: Chii chinonzi rudo rwaKristu?
mhinduro: Kristu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu → akatisunungura pachivi, pamurayiro uye pakutuka kwomurayiro, uye akavigwa → akabvisa munhu wekare nezviito zvake, uye akamutswa pazuva rechitatu → kutiita kuti tiruramiswe "Jesu Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa uye akatibereka patsva → kuti tigamuchire kugamuchirwa sevanakomana vaMwari uye tive neupenyu husingaperi! Mwari anotida uye akatuma Mwanakomana wake kuti ave rudzikunuro rwezvivi zvedu.

2. Nokuti tinoda kubatanidzwa naye muchimiro chorufu

bvunza: Nokuti tinofungei?
mhinduro: Nokuti tinoda kubatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake→“Kristu” munhu mumwe chete” nokuti “Vose pavanofa, vose vanofa → vose vanofa → vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi → saka vose vanosunungurwa pachivi - Ona VaRoma 6:7.
uye iye" nokuti "Vanhu vose vakafa," nokuti "Kuvigwa nevose → "akamutswa kubva kuvakafa" → zvakare" nokuti "Munhu wese anorarama! Ameni. → Kuti avo vanorarama havachazviraramire ivo pachavo." murume mukuru “Raramai nokuda kwaShe uyo akafa akamumutsa zvakare nokuda kwavo.” ( VaGaratia 2:20 )

3. Kubatana Naye muchimiro chokumuka

bvunza: Tiri kuraramira Ishe zvino here? Kana kuti Kristu anotiraramira here?
mhinduro: Kristu kwete chete nokuti "Tinofa," nokuti "Takavigwa zvakadaro" nokuti "Tinorarama! Hupenyu hwangu hutsva hunozorora muna Kristu! Ameni → Semuyenzaniso, "Kristu ndiye mudzi weupenyu, uye isu tiri matavi ake akabatanidzwa kumudzi → iwo mudzi." bata “Sematavi anorarama, matavi ngaabereke zvibereko zvakawanda zveMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

Cherechedza: Kwete ini" nokuti "Jehovha mupenyu, asi Jehovha" nokuti "Ndinorarama; kwete bazi" nokuti "Midzi yemuti mipenyu → ndiyo midzi yemuti" let "Matavi anorarama uye anobereka michero yakawanda. Zvakajeka zvakakwana!"
Unotarisa makereke mazhinji nhasi" shandisa simba "Nyika inofanira kurarama kuna Jehovha, kwete" shandisa simba "Tendai kuti Ishe vane" nokuti "Tinorarama. → Kana ndichirarama, rarama saAdhamu, rarama ndiri mutadzi; Kristu anoraramira ini → rarama Kristu, rarama maererano nekubwinya, kururama, ngoni uye utsvene hwaMwari Baba. → Sezvakataurwa nomuapostora "Pauro" Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu; handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu ari mandiri. zvangu “Mupenyu; tarisa kuna VaGaratiya 2:20
Saka zvino ndinonzwisisa ruponeso rwaKristu → Handisiri ini ndinorarama, ndiKristu." nokuti "Tinorarama → nokuti tinoda kubatanidzwa naye mumuchinjikwa wake, rufu uye kuvigwa → kuparadza muviri wechivi uye tirege kuvazve varanda vechivi. Pfekai munhu mutsva uye mubvise munhu wekare.

Uku ndiko Kufambira mberi kwemupilgrim wechiKristu" Iva neruzivo rwenzira yaIshe " Danho rechina : Nokuti rudo rwaKristu runotimanikidza; nokuti tinorangarira kuti, sezvo mumwe akafira vose, vose vakafa Kuda kufa "→ Kuda kubatana naye muchimiro cherufu :

danho rokutanga " tsamba "Rufu" zvinoreva kuti mutana anofa,

(1) Kana uchigara muna Kristu, hauzopiwi mhosva

Ikozvino hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu: Hapachina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu. Nekuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu. (VaRoma 8:1-2)

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. (VaKorose 3:3-4)

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uri kuparadzwa, asi womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. --Chiverengo (2 VaKorinte 4:16)

articles.title: Kufambira Mberi KwemuKristu Mupilgrim (Hurukuro 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 3 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Ameni!

Nhasi ndichadzidza, nekuyanana, uye nekugoverana newe - Kufambira mberi kweChristian Pilgrim Avo vanotenda muvatadzi vanofa, avo vanotenda kune vatsva vanorarama "Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotumira vashandi, avo vanonyora nemaoko avo uye vachitaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu, nembiri yenyu, nerudzikinuro rwomuviri wenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuitira kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa Kufambira Mberi KwemuKristu: Tenda mumunhu wekare ugofa naKristu; ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

bvunza: Chii chinonzi Progress yePilgrim?

mhinduro: "Kufambira mberi kwePilgrim" kunoreva kutora rwendo rwemweya, nzira yemweya, nzira yekudenga, kutevera Jesu uye kutora nzira yemuchinjikwa → Jesu akati: "Ndini nzira, nechokwadi, noupenyu; Enda kuna Baba - Johane 14:6.

bvunza: Jesu ndiye nzira→Tinofamba sei munzira iyi yemweya nemumugwagwa wekudenga?
mhinduro: Shandisa nzira yekutenda munaShe【 chivimbo 】Famba! Nekuti hapana akafamba munzira iyi, hauzive mafambiro , naizvozvo Jesu akati: “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere; anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa→→ tora nzira yomuchinjikwa , Iyi ndiyo nzira yemweya, nzira yekudenga, nzira yekudenga →→Akatizarurira nzira itsva uye mhenyu, inopfuura nomuvheiri, unova muviri wake. Reference (VaHebheru 10:20) uye (Mako 8:34-35)

Cherechedza: Munhu wekare akasikwa kubva muguruva ndiye “mutadzi” uye haagoni kutora nzira yemweya kana nzira yokuenda kudenga anogona “kuwana” muviri noupenyu hwaKristu – ndiko kuti, akaberekwa naMwari. Newcomer "Ndiwe chete unogona kutora nzira yemweya uye nzira yekudenga→→Kana Jesu Kristu akamutswa uye akakwira kudenga, iyi ndiyo nzira yekudenga! Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

Kufambira Mberi KwemuKristu Mupilgrim

【1】Kutenda mumunhu wekare zvinoreva rufu se "mutadzi"

(1) Tendai kufa kwemudhara

Kristu “akafira” vose, uye “vose” vanobatanidza avo vakafa, avo vari vapenyu, uye avo vasati vaberekwa → ndiko kuti, “vose” vakabva mumuviri waAdhama vakafa, uye vatana. Chokwadi, vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi. → Rudo rwaKristu runotigombedzera;

(2) Tendai mudhara muroverwe pamwe chete naye

Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe → Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vechivi; nekuti uyo wakafa wasunungurwa pachivi. —VaRoma 6:6-7

(3) Tenda kuti munhu akwegura afa

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Reference-VaKorose Chitsauko 3 Ndima 3

bvunza: Unorevei nokuti wakafa?

mhinduro: Mudhara wenyu afa.

bvunza: Mudhara wedu akafa rinhi?
mhinduro: Kristu akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu→ Kristu chete" nokuti “Kana vanhu vose vafa, vose vanofa → Iye akafa anosunungurwa pachivi, uye vose vanofa → Vose vanosunungurwa muchivi. →” tsamba Munhu wake"→ ndiye tsamba Kristu chete" nokuti “Munhu wose anofa, uye munhu wose “anosunungurwa pachivi” uye haapiwi mhosva; vanhu vasingatendi , akanga atopiwa mhosva nokuti haana kutenda muzita roMwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga waMwari. " zita raJesu “Zvinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Jesu Kristu akapa upenyu hwake kuti akuponese kubva kuzvivi zvako. . Saka, unonzwisisa here? Chirevo - Johane 3:18 naMateo 1:21

[2] Rarama nokutenda mu“munhu mutsva” → kugara muna Kristu

(1) Tenda mumunhu mutsva uye urarame uye ugomutswa pamwe chete naKristu

Kana tikafa pamwe chete naKristu, tinotenda kuti tichararama pamwe chete naye. Reference (VaRoma 6:8)
Makanga makafa mukudarika kwenyu nokusadzingiswa kwenyama, asi Mwari wakakuitai vapenyu pamwe naKristu, akukanganwirai (kana kududzira: zvedu) kudarika kwose;

(2) Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mamuri, hamusi wenyama

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. (VaRoma 8:9)
Sezvakataurwa na "Paul" → ndakasuwa! Ndiani angandiponesa pamuviri uyu worufu? Mwari ngaavongwe kuti tinogona kupukunyuka kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Kubva pakuona uku, ndinoteerera mutemo waMwari nemoyo wangu, asi nyama yangu inoteerera mutemo wechivi. (VaRoma 7:24-25)

(3) Hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu

Nekuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu. (VaRoma 8:1-2)

(4) Upenyu hwomunhu mutsva hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari, anova ndiye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. (VaKorose 3:3-4)

[Cherechedza]: 1 tsamba murume mukuru “Ndiko kuti, vatadzi” vakarovererwa uye vakafa pamwe chete naKristu, uye “vakabhapatidzwa” murufu rwake-rufu nokuvigwa, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe. 2 tsamba" Newcomer “Anomutswa pamwe chete naKristu → “Munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari anogara muna Kristu - nokuti → vakasunungurwa pachivi, pamutemo uye pakutukwa kwomutemo, pamunhu wekare nezviito zvawo, uye murima renhema. Satani kubva pasimba renyika → nekuti iwe hausi wenyika, akazvarwa patsva "munhu mutsva" akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari, idya chikafu chemweya uye inwa mvura yemweya! zvemuchinjikwa → → Ndizvozvo kufa Kubatanidzwa naKristu kare ( Tenda mutana ufe ), uye maari rumuko akabatana naye muchimiro ( Tenda muhupenyu hutsva ) Munhu mutsva anogara muna Kristu, akadzika midzi uye akavakwa muna Kristu, anokura, uye anozvisimbisa murudo rwaKristu → Kana Kristu aonekwa, yedu " Newcomer “Uye akaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya

articles.title: Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaEfeso chitsauko 4 ndima 22 tiverenge pamwe chete, Bvisai munhu wekare pamufambire wenyu wokutanga, uyo unoramba uchiipa nokunyengera kwokuchiva;

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu "Aihwa. 5 Taura uye unamate: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi ye“mukadzi akarurama” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri nenguva, kuitira kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma uye tichakura kuva vatsva uye vakakura zuva nezuva! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise mavambo edzidziso inofanira kusiya Kristu: Hwisisa kuti ungasiya sei munhu wekare, ubvise munhu wekare pahunhu nekuchiva kwenyama ;

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Rarama neMweya Mutsvene uye uite neMweya Mutsvene

Kana tichirarama noMweya, tinofanirawo kufamba noMweya . (VaGaratiya 5:25)

bvunza: Chii chinonzi hupenyu neMweya Mutsvene?
mhinduro: " Zvitsamira pa "Zvinoreva kuvimba, kuvimba! Tinovimba: 1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya. 2 Akazvarwa kubva pachokwadi cheevhangeri. 3 Akazvarwa naMwari. Vose noMweya mumwe, Ishe mumwe, uye Mwari mumwe! Ndiko kumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa kunotibereka patsva → tinorarama neMweya Mutsvene, shoko rechokwadi raJesu Kristu, uye tinozvarwa kubva kuna Mwari! Unofanira kupinda muChechi yaJesu Kristu uye kuvaka Muviri waKristu. Unofanira kudzika midzi uye kuvakwa muna Kristu uye murudo rwaMwari kuzara kwaKristu... Muviri wose wakabatanidzwa naye kana nhengo dzakabatana, nhengo imwe neimwe ine basa rayo, uye nhengo imwe neimwe inobatsirana maererano nebasa rayo, muviri unokura zvishoma nezvishoma uye unozvivaka murudo. . Reference (VaEfeso 4:12-16), izvi zviri pachena kwauri here?

bvunza: Zvinorevei kufamba noMweya?

mhinduro: " Mweya Mutsvene “Itai matiri vandudza Basa rake nderekufamba noMweya → Anotiponesa kwete nemabasa ekururama atakaita, asi maererano netsitsi dzake, kuburikidza nekushambidzwa kwekuzvarwa patsva nekuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene. (Tito 3:5) Pano” kuberekwa patsva Rubhabhatidzo rubhabhatidzo rweMweya Mutsvene. tsamba Rarama neMweya Mutsvene, ita uchivimba neMweya Mutsvene, uye Mweya Mutsvene anoita basa rekuvandudzwa:

1 Pfeka munhu mutsva, vandudza zvishoma nezvishoma → Pfeka munhu mutsva. Munhu mutsva anovandudzwa muzivo mumufananidzo woMusiki wake. Chirevo (VaKorose 3:10)
2 Muviri wekunze wemunhu wekare unoparadzwa, asi munhu wemukati wemunhu mutsva anovandudzwa zuva nezuva kuburikidza ne "Mweya Mutsvene" → Naizvozvo, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uri kuparadzwa, asi womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. ( 2 VaKorinte 4:16 )
3 Mwari akatigadzirira kuita mabasa akanaka → Nokuti tiri basa rake, takasikwa muna Kristu Jesu kuti tiite mabasa akanaka, akagara agadzirwa naMwari kuti tiite mabasa akanaka. (VaEfeso 2:10), Mwari akatigadzirira “basa rose rakanaka” mukereke yaJesu Kristu→ 1 “Kunzwa shoko” kunovandudzwa pashoma napashoma muzivo, kunwa mukaka wakachena wemweya uye kudya zvokudya zvomudzimu, kukura kuva murume mukuru, uye kukura muchimiro chaKristu; 2" "Pita" Mweya Mutsvene zviitei patiri vandudza basa" inonzi xingdao ” Mashoko anofamba noMweya Mutsvene mumwoyo yedu, mashoko anofamba naKristu mumwoyo yedu, mashoko ayo Baba Mwari vanofamba mumwoyo yedu → izvi inonzi xingdao ! Mweya Mutsvene anotiparidzira evhangeri, vhangeri roruponeso→ inonzi xingdao ! Kuparidza vhangeri rinoponesa vanhu zvinoreva kuita marudzi ose emabasa akanaka kana ukasaparidza vhangeri, harisi basa rakanaka havazorangariri mabasa akanaka awakaita kwavari. Kutsigira vhangeri, kuparidza evhangeri, uye kurishandisa pavhangeri ndiwo mabasa akanaka . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(2) Pfekai munhu mutsva uye mupfeke Kristu

Vandudzwei mundangariro dzenyu, uye mufuke munhu mutsva, akasikwa akafanana nomufananidzo waMwari mukururama kwechokwadi noutsvene. ( VaEfeso 4:23-24 )
Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu. ( VaGaratiya 3:26-27 )

Cherechedza: Imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Munobhabhatidzwa muna Kristu uye mukapfeka munhu mutsva, anova munhu akazvarwa patsva Kupfeka Kristu uye kupfeka muviri waKristu wakamuka. Kuburikidza nekuvandudzwa kwe“Mweya Mutsvene”, munhu mutsva “achakushandura” Newcomer "Iyo" pfungwa Change Imwe itsva→

1 Zvaiva muna Adam" Change “Muna Kristu,

2 Ava mutadzi" Change Iva wakarurama,

3 Zvinoitika kuti mukutukwa kwemurairo " Change “Mukuropafadzwa kwenyasha,

4 Pakutanga muTestamende Yekare " Change “MuTestamente Itsva,

5 Zvakaitika kuti vabereki vangu vakabereka " Change "Wakaberekwa naMwari,

6 Zvinoitika kuti pasi pesimba rerima raSatani " Change “Muumambo hwechiedza chaMwari.

7 Yakava yakasviba uye isina kuchena” Change “Pane chokwadi pakururama noutsvene. Ameni!

"Pfungwa" Change Chitsva, chinodiwa naMwari ndechenyu” Mwoyo ",iwe tsamba" hana "Neropa raJesu" kamwe "Wakachena, hauchanzwa uine mhosva! Zvinoitika" mutadzi “Aripiko akazvarwa patsva ini! munhu akarurama ", kururama noutsvene hwechokwadi! Ndizvo here? Munhu mutsva ane chivi here? Haana chivi; angatadza here? Reference (1 Johane 3:6-10)

(3) Bvisa mukweguru pamaitiro ako ekare

Paunodzidza nezvaKristu, hazvina kudaro. Kana makanzwa shoko rake, mukagamuchira kuraira kwake, mukadzidza zvokwadi yake, zvino munofanira kubvisa munhu wenyu wekare, unoodza nokunyengera kwechishuvo chake.

bvunza: Kana tichitenda muna Jesu, hatina kutobvisa munhu wekare nemaitiro ayo here? Sei zvichitaura pano (bvisa nzira yako yekare yekuita zvinhu?) VaKorose 3:9
mhinduro: Makadzidza nezvaKristu, makanzwa shoko rake, makagamuchira dzidziso yake, uye makadzidza chokwadi chake → Pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yoruponeso rwenyu, uye mukatenda muna Kristu, makagamuchira chipikirwa “ Mweya Mutsvene "Ndiwo mucherechedzo we"kuzvarwa patsva", munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva, munhu wemweya Ndiko kuti, vanhu vomudzimu, vanhu vokudenga” haisi yake "Mudhara wepanyika uye mutana" mutadzi "Mabasa→ Naizvozvo, sezvo makatenda muna Jesu Kristu," kare "Bvisa mukweguru nemaitiro ake ekare; ingozvibvisa →" ruzivo "Bvisa murume wekare pamafambiro ako ekare (somuenzaniso, mukadzi ane pamuviri, ane hupenyu hutsva mudumbu rake - mucheche here? Mwana anofanira kubva mudumbu raamai, kuona kuparadzana kubva mudumbu raamai, uye kuberekwa uye kukura?), unofanira Izvi ndizvo zvinoreva kubvisa mutana mumufambiro wako wekare.

Mabasa enyama ari pachena: upombwe, netsvina, novutere, nokunamata zvifananidzo, nouroyi, noruvengo, nokukakavara, negodo, nokutsamwa, nokupesana, nedzidziso dzakatsauka, negodo. Ndakagara ndakuudzai, uye ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. ( VaGaratiya 5:19-21 )

2 kuchiva kwenyama

yamakafamba mairi nemafambiro enyika ino, muchiteerera muchinda wesimba rekudenga, iwo mweya unoshanda zvino muvana vekusateerera. Isu tose takanga tiri pakati pavo, tichiita kuchiva kwenyama, tichitevera kuchiva kwenyama nokwomwoyo, uye pakuzvarwa kwedu takanga tiri vana vokutsamwirwa savamwe vanhu. ( VaEfeso 2:2-3 )

(Sezvakataurwa naPauro) Ndine nhamo sei! Ndiani angandiponesa pamuviri uyu worufu? Mwari ngaavongwe kuti tinogona kupukunyuka kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Kubva pakuona uku, ndinoteerera mutemo waMwari nemoyo wangu, asi nyama yangu inoteerera mutemo wechivi. (VaRoma 7:24-25)

2 Kubvisa munhu wekare nekubatanidzwa naKristu murufu rwake nokubhabhatidzwa

Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tirarame upenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. Reference (VaRoma 6:4)

3 Kristu anokudzingisai nokubvisa kutadza kwenyama

Nemiwo makadzingiswa maari nokudzingiswa kusingaitwi namaoko, kwamakaitwa kuti mubvise kunyama kwenyama nokudzingiswa kwaKristu; Makavigwa pamwe chete naye pakubhabhatidzwa, pamakamutswawo pamwe chete naye nokutenda kushanda kwaMwari akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa. ( VaKorose 2:11-12 )

Cherechedza: Kutenda nokubhabhatidzwa zvinokubatanidzai kuna Kristu→ 1 Chimiro cherufu chakabatanidzwa naKristu, 2 murufu rwaKristu, 3 vigai mudhara mubvise mudhara nemaitiro ake.
Imi mose" tsamba "Kristu" akabhabhatidzwa “Endai kurufu, mugobatanidzwa naye mukufanana kworufu, uyewo kuti muwe pamwe chete naye mukufanana kwokumuka kwake, kwamakanga madzingiswa nako nokudzingiswa kwenyama yenyama. Izvi zvinozoburitsa zvinotevera :

(1) Jesu kufa Shingairira mumunhu wedu wekare → "Muviri wekunze wekare unoparadzwa, chikamu chekunze chinoora, uye munhu wekare zvishoma nezvishoma anova akaipa nekuda kwekunyengera kwezvido zveudyire."
(2) Jesu born Zvinoratidzwa mumunhu mutsva Mwari ari mumoyo yedu → Munhu mutsva ari mumoyo yedu kuburikidza nekuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene. Mwoyo unovandudzwa zuva nezuva mukaka uye anodya zvokudya zvemweya uye anokura kuva murume akura zvishoma nezvishoma, uzere nechimiro chaKristu, uchizvivaka pachawo murudo, uye kuva nehupenyu hwakawanda.

Naizvozvo, tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso yaKristu → kubvisa munhu wekare, kupfeka munhu mutsva, kusiya munhu wekare mumufambiro, kuzvivaka uye kukura muna Kristu uye murudo rwekereke yaJesu Kristu. . Ameni!

OK! Nhasi taongorora, takayanana, uye tikagovera pano Ngatigoveranei muchinyorwa chinotevera: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu, Hurukuro yechitanhatu

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu! Rangarirwa naShe. Ameni!

articles.title: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 4)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 9 muBhaibheri tiverenge pamwe chete: Musareverana nhema;

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu "Aihwa. 4 Taura uye upe munamato: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi ye“mukadzi akarurama” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga kubva kure, uye zvinopiwa kwatiri munguva yakafanira, kuitira kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma, uye huchava hutsva zuva nezuva! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise mavambo edzidziso inofanira kusiya Kristu: muchiziva kusiya munhu wekare, mufuke munhu mutsva, mufuke Kristu, mumhanye kunharidzano; .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Wabvisa mudhara

VaKorose 3:9 Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare namabasa awo.

bvunza: Taive rinhi" kare “Kubvisa mudhara nemaitiro ake ekare?
mhinduro: Kuberekwazve! Jesu Kristu paakamutswa kubva kuvakafa, isu takazvarwa patsva munhu akazvarwa patsva akabvisa munhu wekare uye maitiro ake - tarisa kuna 1 Peter 1: 3 kana iwe ukanzwa shoko rechokwadi uye unonzwisisa kuti Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa vakafa, ndiro Evhangeri yoruponeso rwenyu, yamakatenda nayo muna Kristu, mukagamuchira chivimbiso [ Mweya Mutsvene 】Kuchisimbiso→Mweya Mutsvene umboo hwe“kuzvarwa patsva” uye humbowo hwekugamuchira nhaka yaBaba Vekudenga. Iwe wakazvarwa neMweya Mutsvene, nechokwadi cheevhangeri, yaMwari! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here? →Pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu, uye mukatenda muna Kristu, makaiswa chisimbiso maari noMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa. ( VaEfeso 1:13 )

1 Akazvarwa nemvura noMweya
Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kana munhu asina kuberekwa nemvura noMweya, haangagoni kupinda muumambo hwaMwari.
bvunza: Zvinorevei kuzvarwa nemvura nemweya?
mhinduro: “Mvura” imvura mhenyu, mvura yechitubu choupenyu, mvura mhenyu iri kudenga, nzizi dzemvura mhenyu dzinoyerera dzichienda kuupenyu husingaperi → kubva mudumbu raJesu Kristu - kureva ( Johane 7:38-39 uye Zvakazarurwa 21:6 );
" Mweya Mutsvene “Mudzimu waBaba, Mudzimu waJesu, Mudzimu wechokwadi yaJohane 15:26), unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

2 Akazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri

Imi munodzidza pamusoro paKristu mugova navadzidzisi zviuru gumi, asi vanababa vashoma, nokuti ini ndakakuberekai kubudikidza neevhangeri muna Kristu Jesu. ( 1 VaKorinte 4:15 )

bvunza: Vhangeri rinotibereka! Izvi zvinorevei?
mhinduro: Sezvakataurwa naPauro! Ini ndakakuberekai kubudikidza neevhangeri muna Kristu Jesu; Vhangeri "Ndakakubereka → Chii chinonzi evhangeri?" Vhangeri Sezvakataurwa naPauro: Nokuti zvandakakumikidzaiwo: Kutanga kwazvose, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neMagwaro (VaK. 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4)
bvunza: Zvinorevei kuti Shoko rechokwadi rakatibereka?
mhinduro: Maererano nokuda kwake, akatibereka mushoko rechokwadi, kuti tive sechibereko chokutanga chezvisikwa zvake zvose. ( Jakobho 1:18 )
“Shoko rechokwadi” → Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari, uyo ari Mwari akaitwa nyama → Zita rake ndiJesu. Jesu akati: “Ndini nzira, nezvokwadi, noupenyu” - Nhungamiro ( Johane 14:6 ), Jesu ndiye zvokwadi nenzira yechokwadi → Mwari Baba vakamuka kubva kuvakafa kupfurikidza na“Jesu Kristu” mukuwirirana neZvake kuda
born Kwatiri, chokwadi chevhangeri born Tawana isu! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

3 Akaberekwa naMwari

Vose vakamugamuchira, akavapa simba rokuti vave vana vaMwari, kuna avo vanotenda muzita rake. Ava ndivo vasina kuberekwa neropa, kwete neruchiva, kana nechido chemurume, asi vakaberekwa naMwari. ( Johani 1:12-13 )
bvunza: Kugamuchira Jesu sei?
mhinduro: Unodya nyama yangu nekumwa ropa rangu, unogara mandiri, neni maari. (Johani 6:56) →Jesu ndiMwari here? Ehe! “Mwari” mweya! Jesu akaberekwa neMweya here? Ehe! Jesu aiva womudzimu here? Ehe! Patinodya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru, tinodya nekunwa muviri waShe wemweya neropa remweya → tiri "kugamuchira" Jesu, uye isu tiri nhengo dzake, handiti? Ehe! Mwari Mweya → Ani naani anogamuchira Jesu ndiye: 1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 vakazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri. 3 Akazvarwa naMwari! Ameni.
izvi" kuberekwa patsva “Munhu mutsva haana kugadzirwa nevhu raAdhamu, haana kuberekwa neropa revabereki vedu, kwete nokuchiva, kwete nokuda kwomunhu, asi akaberekwa naMwari. “Mwari” mweya → isu vakaberekwa naMwari a" munhu wemweya ", izvi zvitsva ini" munhu wemweya "Muviri wemweya →" mweya “Mudzimu waJesu,” mweya "Mweya waJesu," muviri "Ndiwo muviri waJesu → unogara muna Kristu, wakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari, uye mumwoyo yedu. Kana Kristu aonekwa, uyu munhu mutsva" munhu wemweya ” akazviratidza pamwe chete naKristu mukubwinya. Unozvinzwisisa here?

(2) Kana mweya waMwari uchigara mauri, hauzove wenyama

bvunza: Mudzimu waMwari unorevei?
mhinduro: Mweya waMwari Mweya waBaba, Mweya waJesu, uye Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi! Reference (VaGaratiya 4:6)
bvunza: Zvinorevei kuti Mweya waMwari, “Mweya Mutsvene,” ugare mumwoyo yedu?
mhinduro: Mweya Mutsvene “unogara” mumwoyo yedu → kureva kuti, “takazvarwa patsva” 1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 vakazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri. 3 Akazvarwa naMwari.
bvunza: Ko Mweya Mutsvene “haugari” munyama yedu here?
mhinduro: Mweya Mutsvene haungagari munyama yedu, nyama yedu inobva kuna Adamu, yakaumbwa neguruva, uye inoberekwa nevabereki, munhu akwegura, mutadzi, uye muviri wokunze unoparadzwa nokuora Waini itsva haigoni kuiswa mariri.
saka" Mweya Mutsvene "Haagari muhombodo tsaru dzewaini, munyama inoparara → muviri wekare "nyama" inoparadzwa uye inoparadzwa nekuda kwechivi, asi mweya "ndiko kuti, Mweya Mutsvene unogara mumwoyo yedu" unorarama uchiruramiswa nokutenda → Kana Kristu mumwoyo yenyu muviri wenyu wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya wenyu mupenyu nokuda kwokururama (VaRoma 8:10). Mweya Mutsvene "Haugari munyama yedu inoonekwa, asi Mweya waMwari unogara mukati mako, iwe wakazvarwa patsva". munhu wemweya “Hazvizi zvenyama, asi zvoMweya. Munozvinzwisisa here izvi?

bvunza: Jesu akanga asina muviri wenyama neropa here? Inewo muviri wenyama here? Asi Mweya Mutsvene anogona kugara maari!
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 Jesu akaberekwa nemhandara Mariya uye ari wedzinza remukadzi;
2 Jesu akaburuka kubva kudenga uye akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene.
3 Jesu ndiye Shoko rakaitwa nyama, Mwari akaitwa nyama, Mweya akaitwa nyama, uye nyama yake ndeyemweya, isu takaberekwa nemukadzi, neruchiva, nekuda kwevanhu, neropa, uye tiri vepanyika uye venyama → Saka , icho chinoberekwa; nenyama inyama; Reference (Johani 3:6)
4 Muviri wenyama waJesu hauoni kuora kana kuparadzwa, uye muviri wake wenyama hauoni rufu, zvisinei, muviri wedu wenyama hauoni kuora, uye muviri wekunze unoderera zvishoma nezvishoma, uye pakupedzisira uchadzokera kuvhu uye kufa.

Kana tichidya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru, tinodya nyama yaShe uye nekunwa ropa raShe → tinozvarwa patsva matiri. munhu wemweya ” womudzimu uye wokudenga, nokuti tiri
nhengo dzaKristu→Mweya Mutsvene ndi“ kugara mukati “Muna Jesu Kristu, watiri mitezo yake,” Mweya Mutsvene "Unogarawo mukuzvarwa kwedu" munhu wemweya "Pamuviri. Amen! Mweya Mutsvene" Haagaremo "Pamuviri unoonekwa weharahwa (nyama) Unonzwisisa here izvi?

Naizvozvo, sevanhu vatsva vakazvarwa naMwari vanorarama noMweya Mutsvene, tinofanira kufamba noMweya→ siya chivi, siya Zvidemba zvawakaita. siya Chikoro chepuraimari chinotya uye chisingabatsiri, siya Mutemo usina simba uye usina maturo uye usina chaunowana; siya old man; kupfeka Vatsva, Phi kupfeka kristu . Aya ndiwo mavambo edzidziso yaKristu. Ameni!

OK! Nhasi taongorora, takayanana, uye tikagovera pano Ngatigoveranei muchinyorwa chinotevera: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu, Hurukuro yechishanu

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu. Kristu. Paridza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe Mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku reupenyu. Ameni! →Seizvo VaFiripi 4:2-3 inotaura, Pauro, Timotio, Yuodhia, Sintike, Kremendi, uye vamwe vakashanda naPauro, mazita avo ari mubhuku roupenyu hwakakwirira. Ameni!

articles.title: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 8)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Mateo Chitsauko 11 uye ndima 12 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kubva panguva yaJohane Mubhabhatidzi kusvikira nhasi, umambo hwekudenga hwakapindwa nekushanda nesimba, uye avo vanoshanda nesimba vachahuwana.

Nhasi ticharamba tichidzidza, tichiyanana, uye tichigoverana pamwe chete "Kutanga Kusiya Dzidziso yaKristu" Aihwa. 8 Taura uye unamate: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Kereke “yemukadzi akanaka” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rataurwa mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu, kubwinya, nokuregererwa kwemuviri. Zvokudya zvinounzwa kubva kure mudenga, uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kutiita munhu mutsva, munhu womudzimu, munhu womudzimu! Iva munhu mutsva zuva nezuva, uchikura mukukura kuzere kwaKristu! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise mavambo edzidziso inofanira kusiya Kristu: Umambo hwekudenga hunopindwa nekushanda nesimba, uye avo vanoshanda nesimba vachahuwana! Ngatiwedzere kutenda pakutenda, nyasha pamusoro penyasha, simba pamusoro pesimba, nekubwinya pamusoro pekubwinya. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

bvunza: Unofanira kushanda nesimba kuti upinde muUmambo hweKudenga here?

mhinduro: “Shanda nesimba” → Nekuti avo vanoshanda nesimba vachawana.

bvunza:

1 Humambo hwekudenga hahuonekwe kana kubatwa neziso, saka toshanda nesimba sei? Kupinda sei?
2 Tinoudzwa here kuchengeta mutemo uye kushanda nesimba kukudziridza miviri yedu inotadza kuti ive isingafi kana kuti maBuddha? Uri kuedza kukudziridza muviri wako kuva munhu yemweya here?
3 Ndinoshanda nesimba here kuti ndiite mabasa akanaka uye ndive munhu akanaka, ndichizvibayira kuti ndiponese vamwe, uye ndishande nesimba kuti ndiwane mari yekubatsira varombo?
4 Ndinoshingairira kuparidza muzita raShe, nokudzinga madhimoni muzita raShe, nokuporesa vanorwara, nokuita zvishamiso zvizhinji muzita raShe here?

mhinduro: “Havasi vose vanoti kwandiri, ‘Ishe, Ishe,’ vachapinda muumambo hwokudenga, asi uyo chete anoita kuda kwaBaba vangu vari kudenga ndiye achapinda.” ( Mateu 7:21 )

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuita kuda kwaBaba Vokudenga? Kuita kuda kwaBaba Vekudenga? Somuenzaniso ( Pisarema 143:10 ) Ndidzidzisei kuita kuda kwenyu, nokuti ndimi Mwari wangu. Mweya wenyu wakanaka; nditungamirirei munyika yakati chechetere.
mhinduro: Kuita kuda kwaBaba Vekudenga kunoreva: Tenda muna Jesu! Teererai shoko raJehovha! → ( Ruka 9:35 ) Inzwi rakabva mugore, richiti: “Uyu ndiye Mwanakomana wangu, musanangurwa wangu (kune mipumburu yekare: Uyu Mwanakomana wangu wandinoda), inzwai iye.”

bvunza: Baba Vekudenga vanotiudza kuti titeerere kumazwi eMwanakomana wedu anodiwa Jesu! Jesu akati chii kwatiri?
mhinduro: “Jesu” akati: “Nguva yakwana, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera.

bvunza: " Tenda kuevhangeri “Mungapinda muumambo hwokudenga here?
mhinduro: izvi【 Vhangeri ] Isimba raMwari roruponeso kumunhu wose anotenda... Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” (VaRoma 1:16-17)

Cherechedza:

1 【 Kururama uku kunobva pakutenda 】izvi" Vhangeri “Isimba raMwari rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda →
" Tenda kuevhangeri "Kururamiswa, kugamuchira kururama kwaMwari pachena! Reference (VaRoma 3:24)
" Tenda kuevhangeri “Wanai kuva vanakomana vaMwari! ( VaG. 4:5 )
" Tenda kuevhangeri "Pindai muumambo hwokudenga. Ameni! Reference (Mako 1:15) → Kururama uku kunobva pakutenda, nokuti " tsamba “Vakarurama vachaponeswa nazvo” tsamba "Rarama → Iva nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni;

2 【 kuitira kuti tsamba 】→Kuponeswa uye kugamuchira hupenyu husingaperi kunobva pakutenda;kugamuchira mbiri,mubairo, nekorona→kwakavakirwa pakutenda! Ruponeso noupenyu husingaperi zvinotsamira pa” tsamba "; Kuwana kubwinya, mibairo, uye korona zvichiri kutsamira pa" tsamba “Ameni! Saka, manzwisisa here?
Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu kuna “Tomasi”: “Nokuti wandiona, watenda; vakaropafadzwa vasina kuona asi vakatenda.

Saka, izvi【 Vhangeri 】Isimba raMwari rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda. Kururama uku kunobva pakutenda kuenda pakutenda 1 ) tsamba patsamba, ( 2 ) Nyasha pamusoro penyasha, ( 3 ) simba pamusoro pechisimba, ( 4 ) kubva pakubwinya kuenda kune kumwe kubwinya!

bvunza: Tinoedza sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Imwe: Effort【 Tenda kuevhangeri 】Poneswa uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi

bvunza: Kururama kwaMwari kunobva “nekutenda.” Munhu angaponeswa sei nokutenda?
mhinduro: Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda. Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

( 1 ) Kutenda kunosunungura kubva kuchivi
Kristu chete" nokuti “Kana vanhu vose vafa, vose vanofa, uye vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi—ona VaRoma 6:7; sezvo vose vachifa, vose vanosunungurwa pachivi. Ona 2 VaKorinde 5:14 .
( 2 ) Kutenda hakuna murairo
Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro wakanga unotisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe nomweya mutsva (mweya: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare tsika. ( VaRoma 7:6 )
( 3 ) Kutenda kunopunyuka simba rerima neHadhesi
Akatinunura kubva pasimba rerima uye akatiendesa kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda, watine dzikinuro maari uye nokuregererwa kwezvivi. ( VaKorose 1:13-14 )
semupostori" Paul "Paridza vhangeri roruponeso kuvaHedheni → Zvandakagamuchira ndikapfuudza kwamuri: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu (akatisunungura kubva mazviri) uye akavigwa (akabvisa zvitadzo zvedu) maererano neMagwaro munhu wekare) ; uye akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neBhaibheri ( Kururamiswa, kumuka, kuzvarwa patsva, ruponeso, hupenyu husingaperi ), ameni! ( 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4 )

Chechipiri: Shanda nesimba【 Tenda kuMweya Mutsvene 】Basa rekuvandudza rine mbiri

bvunza: Kukudzwa ndiko “kutenda” → Kutenda nekukudzwa?
mhinduro: Kana tichirarama noMweya, tinofanira kufambawo noMweya. (VaGaratiya 5:25)→“ tsamba “Baba vokudenga vari mandiri,” tsamba "Kristu mandiri," tsamba “Mweya Mutsvene ngavakudzwe uchiita basa rekuvandudza mukati mangu! Ameni.

bvunza: Ungavimba sei nebasa roMweya Mutsvene?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Tenda kuti rubhabhatidzo rwunopinda murufu rwaKristu

Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tirarame upenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. Kana takabatanidzwa naye pakufanana norufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye pakumuka kwake;

(2) Kutenda kunobvisa murume mukuru nemaitiro ake

Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wenyu wekare namabasa ake uye mukafuka munhu mutsva. Munhu mutsva anovandudzwa muzivo mumufananidzo woMusiki wake. ( VaKorose 3:9-10 )

(3) Kutenda kwakasununguka pazvishuvo zvakaipa nezvishuvo zvomunhu akwegura

Avo vari vaKristu Jesu vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa nyama nokuchiva kwayo uye nezvainoshuva. ( VaGaratiya 5:24 )

(4) Pfuma yokutenda inoratidzwa mumudziyo wevhu

Pfuma iyi tinayo mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kwatiri. Tinokomberedzwa navavengi kumativi ose, asi hatina kubatwa nemisungo, asi hatinyadziswi, asi hatina kurashwa; ( 2 VaKorinte 4:7-9 )

(5) Tenda kuti kufa kwaJesu kunoshanda matiri uye kunoratidza hupenyu hwaJesu

“Handichisiri ini ndinorarama” nguva dzose inotakura rufu rwaJesu nesu, kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri. Nokuti isu vapenyu tinogara tichiiswa kurufu nokuda kwaJesu, kuti upenyu hwaJesu huratidzwe mumiviri yedu inofa. ( 2 VaKorinte 4:10-11 )

(6) Kutenda mudziyo unokosha, wakakodzera kushandiswa naShe

Kana munhu achizvinatsa pazvinhu zvisizvo, achava mudziyo unokudzwa, wakaitwa mutsvene, wakabatsira Ishe, wakagadzirirwa basa rose rakanaka. ( 2 Timotio 2:21 )

(7) Tora muchinjikwa wako uparidze vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga

Ipapo Jesu akadana vanhu vazhinji navadzidzi vake akati kwavari: Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere, nokuti ani nani unoda kuponesa upenyu hwake; mweya; zvakafanana pazasi)) acharasikirwa noupenyu hwake;
Isu tinorarama noMweya, ngatifambewo noMweya → Mweya unopupurirana nomweya wedu, kuti tiri vana vaMwari; Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. Saka, unonzwisisa here? ( VaRoma 8:16-17 )

Chechitatu: Kutarisira kudzoka kwaKristu uye kuregererwa kwemiviri yedu

bvunza: Kutenda mukuregererwa kwemiviri yedu
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

( 1 ) Tenda mukudzoka kwaKristu, tarisira kudzoka kwaKristu

1 Ngirozi dzinopupurira kudzoka kwaKristu
“Varume vokuGarireya, makamirirei makatarira kudenga? Uyu Jesu, akatorwa kubva kwamuri achikwidzwa kudenga, uchadzokazve sezvamamuona achienda kudenga.” ( Mabasa 1:11 ) Chokwadi, Jesu akakwidzwa kudenga?
2 Ishe Jesu vanovimbisa kuuya nokukurumidza
“Tarirai, ndinokurumidza kuuya!
3 Anouya ari pamakore
“Kana kutambudzika kwemazuva iwayo kwapera, zuva richasviba, uye mwedzi hauzopi chiedza chawo, uye nyeredzi dzichawa kudenga, uye masimba okumatenga achazungunuswa Munhu achaonekwa kudenga, uye mhuri dzose dzepanyika dzichachema dzose dzichaona Mwanakomana woMunhu achiuya ari pamakore okudenga nesimba nokubwinya kukuru (Mateo 24:29-30 naZvakazarurwa 1:7). .

( 2 ) Tinofanira kuona chimiro chake chechokwadi

Hama dzinodikanwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichazova zvichigere kuratidzwa; ( 1 Johani 3:2 )

( 3 ) Mweya yedu, mweya uye muviri zvinochengetwa

Mwari worugare ngaakuitei vatsvene kwazvo kwazvo! Mweya wenyu, nomwoyo uye nomuviri zvichengetwe zvisina mhosva pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Iye unokudanai akatendeka uye achazviita. ( 1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24 )

Cherechedza:

1 Kana Kristu achidzoka, tichasangana naShe mumhepo togara naShe nokusingaperi - chirevo (1 VaTesaronika 4:13-17);

2 Kana Kristu achizovonekwa, tinoonekwa naye mukubwinya - Chiverengo (VaKorose 3:3-4);

3 Kana Ishe achionekwa, tichafanana naye uye tichamuona sezvaari - (1 Johane 3:2);

4 Miviri yedu yakaderera “yakaitwa nevhu” inoshandurwa kuti ive yakafanana nomuviri wake une mbiri - Chiverengo ( VaFiripi 3:20-21 );

5 Mweya yedu, mweya uye muviri zvinochengetedzwa - Reference (1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24) → Tinozvarwa neMweya nemvura, takazvarwa nokutenda kweevhangeri, kubva muupenyu hwaMwari hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari, uye naKristu. Panguva iyoyo isu (muviri wakaberekwa naMwari) tichaonekwawo mukubwinya. Panguva iyoyo tichaona chimiro Chake chechokwadi, uye tichazviona pachedu (chimiro chechokwadi chakazvarwa naMwari), uye mweya wedu, mweya, uye muviri zvichachengetwa, ndiko kuti, muviri ucharegererwa. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Kubva panguva yaJohane Mubhapatidzi kusvikira zvino, ushe hwokudenga hunopinzwa nokushanda nesimba, uye avo vanoshanda nesimba vachahuwana. . ( Mateu 11:12 )

bvunza: kushanda nesimba" tsamba "Vanhu vanowanei?"
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 kushanda nesimba" tsamba “Evhangeri ichatungamirira kuruponeso,
2 kushanda nesimba" tsamba “Kuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene kunobwinyiswa,
3 kushanda nesimba" tsamba "Kristu anodzoka, tichitarisira kudzoka kwaKristu uye kuregererwa kwemiviri yedu. → kuedza muchipinda pasuwo rakamanikana, pfuurirai kusvika pakukwaniswa, tichikanganwa zviri shure, tichisveeredza mberi; uye mumhanye nhangemutange yatakaisirwa, takatarira kuna Jesu, muvambi nemupedzeredzi werutendo rwedu. cross ndinoshingairira kumubairo wekudana kwekumusoro kwaMwari muna Kristu Jesu → zana Nguva, hongu makumi matanhatu Nguva, hongu makumi matatu nguva. edza kutenda →Kutenda pakutenda, nyasha pamusoro penyasha, simba pamusoro pesimba, kubwinya pamusoro pokubwinya. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

OK! Mukuongorora uye kuyanana kwanhasi, tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso yaKristu tovavarira kufambira mberi kusvika pakukwana! Yakagoverwa pano!

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu! Ameni. →Seizvo VaFiripi 4:2-3 inotaura, Pauro, Timotio, Yuodhia, Sintike, Kremendi, uye vamwe vakashanda naPauro, mazita avo ari mubhuku roupenyu hwakakwirira. Ameni!

Ndine mamwe mazwi ekupedzisira: iwe unofanirwa " tendai Jehovha “Ivai nesimba munaShe, nomusimba rake guru. ...Naizvozvo torai zvose zvaMwari. zvemweya Chionioni, kuti mumirire muvengi pazuva rekutambudzika, uye mapedza zvose, munogona kuramba makamira. Saka mirai makasimba!

( 1 ) kushandisa chokwadi sebhanhire rinosunga chiuno;
( 2 ) kushandisa kururamisira Ishandise senhovo yechipfuva kuvhara chipfuva chako,
( 3 ) inoshandiswa zvakare vhangeri rorugare Pfeka patsoka dzako seshangu dzakagadzirira kufamba.
( 4 ) Mukuwedzera, kubata kutenda Senhovo inodzima miseve inopfuta yowakaipa;
( 5 ) ndokupfeka ruponeso ngowani,
( 6 ) bata bakatwa romweya , iro Shoko raMwari;
( 7 ) zembera Mweya Mutsvene , mapati akawanda chero nguva nyengetererai 22 Rindai naizvozvo murege kuneta pachinhu ichi, muchinyengeterera vatsvene vose, neni kuti ndigone kutaura ndisingatyi. Tsanangura chakavanzika chevhangeri , nongedzero ( VaEfeso 6:10, 13-19 )

Hondo yatanga...parira hwamanda yekupedzisira.

Humambo hwekudenga hunopindwa nekushanda nesimba, uye avo vanoshanda nesimba kuti vatende vachahuwana! Ameni
