articles.title: Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane chitsauko 17 ndima 14 tiverenge pamwe chete: ndakavapa shoko renyu. Uye nyika inovavenga, nekuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika .

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu "Aihwa. 7 Taura uye unamate: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi ye“mukadzi akarurama” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinounzwa kubva kure mudenga, uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kutiita munhu mutsva, munhu womudzimu, munhu womudzimu! Iva munhu mutsva zuva nezuva, uchikura mukukura kuzere kwaKristu! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso dzaKristu: nzwisisa nzira yekusiya nyika uye kupinda mukubwinya! Tipeiwo nyasha pamusoro penyasha, simba pamusoro pesimba, mbiri pamusoro pekubwinya .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Nyika dzakasikwa kuburikidza nemashoko aMwari

Mwari, uyo akataura kumadzitateguru edu munguva dzakare kubudikidza navaprofita panguva zhinji uye nenzira dzakawanda, akataura kwatiri zvino mumazuva ano okupedzisira kubudikidza noMwanakomana wake, waakagadza mugari wenhaka yezvinhu zvose uye waakasika nyika yose kubudikidza naye. ( VaHebheru 1:1-2 )
Nokutenda tinoziva kuti nyika dzakasikwa neshoko raMwari, zvokuti zvinhu zvinoonekwa hazvina kusikwa kubva pane zviri pachena. ( VaHebheru 11:3 )

bvunza: Nyika dzakasikwa kuburikidza ne“shoko raMwari”?
mhinduro: Mwari akasika denga nenyika mumazuva matanhatu uye akazorora nezuva rechinomwe! Nokuti paakati ndizvo, zvakanga zviripo; ( Pisarema 33:9 )

1 Nezuva rekutanga Mwari akati: Ngakuve nechiedza, chiedza ndokuvapo. ( Genesisi 1:3 )
2 Pazuva rechipiri Mwari akati, "Ngapave nemukaha pakati pemvura kuti iparadzanise chikamu chepamusoro nechepazasi."
3 Pazuva rechitatu Mwari akati, "Mvura iri pasi pedenga ngaiungane panzvimbo imwe chete, uye pasi pakaoma ngapaonekwe." Mwari akatumidza pasi pakaoma kuti, "nyika" uye muunganidzwa wemvura kuti "gungwa." Mwari akaona kuti zvakanga zvakanaka. Mwari akati, "Nyika ngaimerese uswa, miriwo inobereka mbeu nemiti inobereka michero ine mhodzi mukati mayo, maererano nemhando dzayo." ( Genesisi 1:9-11 )
4 Zvino nezuva rechina Mwari akati: Ngakuve nezviedza kudenga, kuti zviparadzanise masikati kubva pausiku, uye zvive zviratidzo zvemwaka, nemazuva, nemakore, kuti zvive zviedza kudenga, kuti zvipe chiedza panyika; ” Uye zvakaitwa. Saka Mwari akasika zviedza zvikuru zviviri, chiedza chikuru kuti chitonge masikati, uye chiedza chiduku kuti chitonge usiku (Genesisi 1:14-16).
5 Pazuva rechishanu, Mwari akati, “Mvura ngaibereke zvipenyu, uye shiri ngadzibhururuke pamusoro penyika napamusoro pedenga.” ( Genesisi 1:20 )
6 Nezuva rechitanhatu Mwari akati, "Nyika ngaibereke zvisikwa zvipenyu zvine marudzi azvo, nemombe, nezvinokambaira, nemhuka dzesango, dzine marudzi adzo." ... Mwari akati: Ngatiite munhu nemufananidzo wedu, akafanana nesu, uye ngaave nesimba pamusoro pehove dzegungwa, napamusoro peshiri dzedenga, napamusoro pezvipfuwo zviri panyika, napamusoro penyika yose, napamusoro pehove dzegungwa. chose chinokambaira chinokambaira panyika ” Mwari akasika munhu nomufananidzo wake, akasika murume nomukadzi; ( Genesisi 1:24, 26-27 )
7 Pazuva rechinomwe, zvinhu zvose zviri kudenga nepanyika zvakapera. Pakasvika zuva rechinomwe, basa raMwari rokusika zvisikwa rakanga rapera, saka akazorora pabasa rake rose nezuva rechinomwe. ( Genesisi 2:1-2 )

(2) Chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, Adhamu, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, saka rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose.

bvunza: " vanhu "Wafirei?
mhinduro: " kufa ” uye akabva kuchivi, naizvozvo rufu rwakasvika kuvanhu vose

bvunza: " munhu wose “Chivi chinobvepi?

mhinduro: " mhosva “Kubva kuna Adhamu munhu mumwe chete akapinda munyika, uye vose vakatadza.

bvunza: Nemhaka yei Adhama akava nemhosva?
mhinduro: nekuti" mutemo ", Kutyora mutemo, kutyora mutemo, chivi → Chero munhu anotadza anotyora mutemo; kutyora mutemo chivi. Reference (1 Johane 3: 4) → Chero ani anotadza pasina mutemo achatyorawo mutemo. Mutemo unoparara. Ani naani anotadza pasi pomurayiro achatongwa nomurayiro (VaRoma 2:12). Cherechedza: Avo vasina mutemo havazopiwi mhosva maererano nemutemo, avo vanotyora mutemo vachatongwa, nekutongwa uye nekuparadzwa maererano nemutemo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Mutemo waAdamu" murayiro "Chii ichochi?"
mhinduro: Usadya muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa → Jehovha Mwari akamurayira, achiti: “Ungadya hako muti upi noupi womumunda wakasununguka, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya. , nokuti nezuva raunoudya zvirokwazvo Ufa!” ( Genesi 2:16-17 )

bvunza: Ndiani akaedza Evha naAdhamu kuti vatadze mutemo?
mhinduro: " nyoka “Dhiyabhorosi akaedza—Evha naAdamu vakatadza.
Izvi zvakangofanana nechivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, Adhamu, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, saka rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose nokuti munhu wose akatadza. ( VaRoma 5:12 )

Cherechedza: Munhu mumwe akatadza, uye akaunza chivi kuna vose, uye vose vakatadza, uye vose vakatukwa nomutemo, uye vose vakatukwa nomutemo Adhamu nokuti nyika yakatukwa, haichashandiri vanhu kubereka minzwa noutumbambeva. "Vanhu vari pasi pechituko chemutemo" → Rudzi rwomunhu ruchafanira kushanda nesimba uye dikita panyika kuti riwane chokurarama nacho kusvikira parufu uye kusvikira rwadzokera kuguruva. ( Genesisi 3:17-19 )

(3) Nyika yakashatiswa pamberi paMwari

1 Kaini akauraya munun'una wake Abheri → Kaini akanga achitaura nomunun'una wake Abheri; Kaini akasimuka akarova munun'una wake Abheri, akamuuraya. ( Genesisi 4:8 )

2 Nyika yakaora pamberi paMwari.

(1) Mafashamo akazadza nyika akaparadza nyika
Jehovha akaona kuti kuipa kwomunhu kwakanga kuri kukuru sei panyika, uye kuti mifungo yake yose yakanga yakaipa nguva dzose...Nyika yakanga yakaora pamberi paMwari, uye nyika yakanga izere nokumanikidzana. Mwari akatarisa nyika uye akaona kuti yakanga yakaora; Ipapo Mwari akati kuna Noa: “Kuguma kwenyama yose kwasvika pamberi pangu; nokuti nyika izere nokumanikidzana kwavo; nyika ikaparadza nyika yose; zvipenyu zvose zvaiva nenyama nokufema zvakaparadzwa ( Genesi 6:5, 11-13.17 ).
(2) Pakuguma kwenyika, ichapiswa uye ichanyungudutswa nemoto
Vanokanganwa nemaune kuti kubvira kare, matenga aivapo nomurayiro waMwari, uye pasi rakabuda rikakwereta mvura. Naizvozvo, nyika panguva iyoyo yakaparadzwa nemvura. Asi denga razvino nenyika zvichiripo nemugumo kusvikira zuva iro vasingadi Mwari vachatongwa, nokuparadzwa, nokupiswa nomoto. …Asi zuva raShe richauya sembavha. Pazuva iroro, matenga achapfuura nokutinhira kukuru, uye zvinhu zvose zvinooneka zvichapiswa nomoto, uye nyika nezvose zviri mairi zvichapiswa. ( 2 Petro 3:5-7, 10 )

(4) Hatisi venyika

1 Avo vakazvarwa patsva havasi venyika

ndakavapa shoko renyu. Uye nyika inovavenga, nekuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. ( Johani 17:14 )
bvunza: Zvinorevei kuva wenyika?
mhinduro: Nyika ndeyanyika, guruva nderonyika. Adhamu, wakaitwa neguruva, ndowenyika; nenyama yedu, yakaberekwa navabereki vaAdhamu, yakabva panyika.

bvunza: Ndiani asati ari wenyika?
mhinduro: " kuberekwa patsva "Vanhu vasiri venyika!"

1 Vakazvarwa nemvura noMweya,
2 Akazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri ,
3 Akaberekwa naMwari!

Icho chakaberekwa noMweya mweya. Reference (Johani 3:6) → Mweya Munhu! Zvemweya, zvekudenga, zvehumwari; kuberekwa patsva "Avo vakafa havasi venyika ino. Manzwisisa here?"
Chakazvarwa nenyama inyama. Vaya vanozvarwa nemuviri wenyama vachafa here? achafa. Zvose zvinoberekwa nenyama, zvose zvakaitwa neguruva, zvose zviri zvenyika zvichapiswa nokuparara;
Chete " mweya "mbishi" munhu wemweya "Hauzombofi! → Sezvakataurwa naIshe Jesu: "Ani naani anorarama uye anotenda mandiri haangatongofi. Unozvitenda here izvi? “Chiratidzo ( Johani 11:26 ), Avo vanorarama uye vanotenda muna Jesu” muviri wenyama "Achafa here? Achafa, handiti! Jesu akamutsa Razaro akanga avigwa muguva kwemazuva mana. Muviri wake wenyama uchafa here? Achaora here? Achaora, ofa uye odzokera kuguruva. Rudyi! → Chii Chete Mwari akamumutsa haana kuona kuora (Mabasa 13:37). akaberekwa naMwari , kusaona kuora, kunoreva munhu iyeye here? Zvinoreva kuzvarwa patsva" munhu wemweya Kana kuti munhu wenyama neguruva here? Akaberekwa naMwari. munhu wemweya →Jesu akataura izvi achireva izvo kuberekwa patsva zve" munhu wemweya "Usafe! Unonzwisisa here izvi?

2 Mwari achaputsa matende edu panyika

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuputsa matende ari panyika?
mhinduro: " tende panyika ” inoreva nyama yakagadzirwa neguruva romunhu wekare → Rufu rwaJesu runoshandiswa matiri kuti ruparadze uyu muviri worufu, muviri uri kuderera zvishoma nezvishoma, kuti upenyu hwaJesu hugokura ndokuoneka matiri nzira yekuparadza nyama inorwadza asi moyo unofara. Munhu mutsva ari kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva uye achikura zuva nezuva Naizvozvo hatiori mwoyo, kunyange zvazvo kunze tichiparadzwa, asi mukati tiri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva nyika ino kana ikaparadzwa, ichadzorerwa Imba yakaitwa naMwari, isina kugadzirwa namaoko, iri kudenga nokusingaperi mutende iri, musingadi kubvisa ichi, asi kupfeka icho, kuti ichi chinofa chimedzwe noupenyu ( 2 VaKorinte 4:16. 5:1-4 ) Zvikamu.

3 kubva munyika uye pakubwinya

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. ( VaKorose 3:3-4 )

bvunza: Inoti pano → Nekuti "wakatofa", isu takatofa here? Munondiona sei ndichiri mupenyu?
mhinduro: Iwe hausisiri mupenyu zvino, wakafa! iwe" Newcomer "Upenyu hwako hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. maona “Muviri wechivi wakafa pamwe chete naKristu, iye akafa → Nokuti hatitariri zvinoonekwa, asi zvisingaonekwi; nokuti zvinoonekwa ndezvenguva duku, asi zvisingaonekwi zvinongogara zviripo. nokusingaperi.” ( 2 VaKorinte 4 ndima 18 .

Cherechedza: Zvauri kutaura manje maona "Muviri wemuviri wemunhu ndewenguva pfupi. Muviri wezvivi uyu uri kushata zvishoma nezvishoma uchadzokera kuguruva uye wakafa mumeso aMwari. Mushure mekunge tatenda muna Jesu, tinofanirawo kuita tarisa ndakafa, zvino handichisiri mupenyu; Handisi kuona “Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari. Kristu ndiye hupenyu hwedu. Kana Kristu achiuya zvakare, paachaonekwa! (Zvisingaoneki Newcomer Ipapo ndipo paunoona, chimiro chaKristu chechokwadi chichaonekwa, uye chimiro chako chechokwadi chichaonekwawo) , uye nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

OK! Nhasi taongorora, takayanana, uye tikagovana pano Ngatigoveranei muchinyorwa chinotevera: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu, Hurukuro yechisere

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu! Rangarirwa naShe. Ameni!

Hymn: Hatizi venyika ino

Mabhuratha nemasisita akawanda anogamuchirwa kushandisa bhurawuza kutsvaga - Chechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu - kubatana nesu uye kushanda pamwe chete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

Bata QQ 2029296379

Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

2021.07.16

articles.title: Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei kuBhaibheri, Johane Chitsauko 1, ndima 17: Murayiro wakapiwa kubudikidza naMozisi; nyasha nechokwadi zvakauya kubudikidza naJesu Kristu .

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu "Aihwa. 6 Taura uye upe munamato: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi ye“mukadzi akarurama” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinounzwa kubva kure mudenga, uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kutiita munhu mutsva, munhu womudzimu, munhu womudzimu! Kuva munhu mutsva zuva nezuva! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise mavambo edzidziso inofanira kusiya Kristu: Kusiya Testamente Yekare uye Kupinda muTestamente Itsva ;

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Testamende Yekare

Kubva kuna Genesisi... Maraki → Testamende Yekare

1 Mutemo waAdhamu

Bindu reEdheni: Mutemo waAdamu → Murairo "Usadya" chibvumirano
Jehovha Mwari akamurayira kuti: “Ungadya hako miti yose yomumunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo! 2 Chitsauko 16) -17 mapfundo)

2 Mutemo waMosesi

Gomo reSinai (Gomo reHorebhi) Mwari akaita sungano nevaIsraeri
Mozisi akadana vaIsraeri vose pamwe chete akati kwavari, “Imi vaIsraeri, inzwai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa zvandiri kukuudzai nhasi kuti muzvidzidze nokuzviita. Jehovha Mwari wedu akaita sungano nesu paGomo reHorebhu. Sungano iyi haisi iyo yakagadzwa nemadzitateguru edu yakatangwa nesu isu vapenyu nhasi (Deuteronomio 5:1-3).

bvunza: Mutemo waMosesi waisanganisirei?
mhinduro: Mirairo, mirau, zvisungo, mitemo, nezvimwe.

1 command : Mirairo Gumi--Chiverengo ( Eksodho 20:1-17 )
2 mitemo : Mitemo yakatemwa nomutemo, yakadai semirau yezvipiriso zvinopiswa, zvipiriso zvezviyo, zvipiriso zvokuyananisa, zvipiriso zvezvivi, zvipiriso zvemhosva, zvipiriso zvinotsaurwa uye zvinozunguzirwa...nezvimwewo! Tarisa kuna Revhitiko naNumeri 31:21
3 Mitemo nemitemo: Kuitwa uye kushandiswa kwemitemo nemirau, zvakadai semirau yokuvaka nzvimbo tsvene, areka yesungano, tafura yechingwa chokuratidzira, marambi, maketeni nemaketeni, atari, nguo dzevapristi, nezvimwewo. → ( 1 Madzimambo 2:3 ) Cherekedza murayiro waJehovha Mwari wako, ufambe munzira yake, sezvazvakanyorwa pamurayiro waMozisi, uchengete zvaakatema, nezvaakaraira, nezvaakatonga, nezvipupuriro zvake. Nenzira iyi, zvisinei nezvaunoita, zvisinei kuti unoenda kupi, uchabudirira.

(2) Testamende Itsva

Mateo…………Zvakazarurwa→Testamende Itsva

mutemo chakapiwa kubudikidza naMozisi; nyasha nechokwadi Zvose zvinobva kuna Jesu Kristu. Reference (Johani 1:17)

1 Testamende Yekare: Mutemo wakapiwa kubudikidza naMosesi
2 Testamende Itsva: Zvose nyasha nechokwadi zvinobva kuna Jesu Kristu Testamente Itsva inoparidza nyasha nechokwadi chaJesu Kristu, kwete murairo. Sei “Testamente Itsva” isingaparidzi Mitemo ineGumi, zvimiso, zvisungo, nemitemo zveTestamende Yekare? Tichataura nezvazvo pazasi.

bvunza: Paridza nyasha dzaJesu Kristu! Nyasha chii?
mhinduro: Avo vanotenda muna Jesu vanoruramiswa pachena uye vanogamuchira upenyu husingaperi mahara → izvi zvinonzi nyasha! Chiratidzo ( VaRoma 3:24-26 )
Avo vanoshanda vanogamuchira mubairo kwete sechipo, asi somubairo → Kana ukachengeta mutemo uri woga, uri kushanda here? Ibasa. Kana ukachengeta murayiro, uchawana mubayiro upi? Rusununguko kubva pakutongwa uye kutukwa kwemutemo → Chero ani zvake anobva pakuita kwemutemo anotukwa. Kana ukachengeta mutemo nokuuita, “ungauchengeta here? Kana usingaukwanisi, uchawana mubayiro wei? → Mubayiro waunowana chituko. Reference (VaGaratia 3:10-11) Unonzwisisa izvi here? ?
Asi kune usingaiti mabasa, asi unotenda kuna Mwari unoruramisa usingadi Mwari, kutenda kwake kuchanzi ndiko kururama. Cherechedza: " Chete "Zvinoreva zviri nyore, vimba nokutenda chete, tenda chete →" Kururamiswa nokutenda →Mwari uyu akarurama Kunobva pakutenda uye kunotungamirira kukutenda! Mwari anoruramisa munhu asingadi Mwari, uye kutenda kwake kunonzi ndiko kururama. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Chirevo ( VaRoma 4:4-5 ). Nyasha dzinouya nokutenda; Naizvozvo, sezvo zviri zvenyasha, hazvibvi pamabasa; Reference (VaRoma 11:6)

bvunza: Chokwadi chii?

mhinduro: Jesu ndiye chokwadi ! " chokwadi ” Izvo hazvingochinji, ndezvekusingaperi → Mweya Mutsvene ichokwadi, Jesu ichokwadi, mwari baba Ichokwadi! Jesu akati: “Ndini nzira, nezvokwadi, noupenyu; hapana anouya kuna Baba asi nokwandiri.” ( Johane 14:6 ) Unonzwisisa here?

(3) Testamende Yekare yaishandisa mombe nemakwai Ropa Ita sungano

Naizvozvo sungano yokutanga haina kuitwa pasina ropa, nokuti Mosesi paakapa mirayiro yose kuvanhu maererano nomurayiro, akatora mucheka mutsvuku nehisopi, akasasa mabhuku acho neropa remhuru nembudzi pamusoro pavanhu vose, achiti, “Ropa iri rubatso rwesungano yaMwari nemi.” ( VaHebheru 9:18-20 )

(4) Testamende Itsva inoshandisa yaKristu Ropa Ita sungano

Zvandakaparidza kwamuri ndizvo zvandakagamuchira kubva kuna She nousiku hwaakapandukirwa, Ishe Jesu akatora chingwa, akavonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa. iwe." Mipumburu: yakaputsika), iwe unofanirwa kuita izvi kurekodha ndirangarireiwo.” Mushure mokudya, akatorawo mukombe akati, “Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu, nguva ipi neipi yamunonwa mauri, itai izvi muchindirangarira.” Pose patinodya chingwa ichi nokunwa mukombe uyu , tiri kuratidzira rufu rwaShe kusvikira auya. ( 1 VaKorinte 11:23-26 )

bvunza: Sungano itsva yakatangwa naJesu neropa rake pachake! →Kundirangarira! Hoyo " rangarira "Chiratidzo here sechiyeuchidzo? Kwete.
mhinduro: " rangarira "Ingorangarira," verenga "Ingorangarira uye yeuka! → Pose paunodya uye kunwa muviri neropa raIshe," rangarira "rangarira, funga Zvanzi naJehovha! Ishe Jesu vakati chii kwatiri? → 1 Jesu ndiye chingwa cheupenyu, 2 Kudya uye kunwa nyama neropa raShe kunotungamirira kuupenyu husingaperi, uye tichamutswa pazuva rokupedzisira, kureva kuti, muviri uchadzikinurwa → Jesu akati: “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kunze kwokunge musiri kutongwa. anodya nyama yoMwanakomana woMunhu nokunwa ropa roMwanakomana woMunhu, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Nyama yangu ndicho chokudya chaicho, neropa rangu rinomwa zvirokwazvo, rinogara mandiri, neni maari. Reference (Johani 6:48.53-56) uye Reference
( Johani 14:26 ) Asi Mubetseri, Mweya Mutsvene, uyo Baba vachatuma muzita rangu, iye achakudzidzisai zvinhu zvose uye achakutungamirirai. ndakudaidza funga zvese zvandakakuudza . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(5) Mombe nemakwai muTestamente Yekare Ropa Haungagoni kubvisa chivi

bvunza: Ropa remombe nemakwai ringabvisa zvitadzo here?
mhinduro: Chivi hachimbobviswi, chitadzo hachigoni kubviswa.
Asi zvibayiro izvi zvaiva chirangaridzo chegore negore chezvivi, nokuti ropa renzombe nerembudzi rakanga risingagoni kubvisa zvivi. … Mupristi wose anomira zuva nezuva achishumira Mwari, achipira chibayiro chimwe chete kakawanda, haangagoni kubvisa zvivi. ( VaHebheru 10:3-4, 11 )

(6) Kristu muTestamente Itsva Ropa Chete kamwe Inosuka zvitadzo zvavanhu uye inobvisa zvitadzo zvavanhu

bvunza: Ropa raJesu Kristu rinobvisa zvitadzo kamwechete kwenguva dzose here?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Jesu akashandisa zvake Ropa ,Chete" kamwe “Pindai muNzvimbo Tsvene kuti muyananisirwe kusingaperi - VaHebheru 9:12
2 Nekuti iye chete" kamwe “Zvipe iwe uye zvichaitwa.”— VaHebheru 7:27
3 Zvino zvave kuoneka mumazuva ekupedzisira" kamwe “, uchizvipa iwe sechibayiro chokubvisa zvivi.”— VaHebheru 9:26
4 Kubva Kristu" kamwe “Akapiwa kuti atakure zvivi zvevazhinji – VaHebheru 9:28
5 Kuburikidza naJesu Kristu chete" kamwe “Ape muviri wake kuti uitwe mutsvene.”— VaHebheru 10:10
6 Kristu akapa" kamwe “Chibayiro chisingaperi chezvivi chakagara kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari wangu - VaHebheru 10:11
7 Nekuti iye" kamwe “Zvibayiro zvinoita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nekusingaperi – VaHebheru 10:14

Cherechedza: Chidzidzo cheBhaibheri kumusoro nomwe mumwe" kamwe ","" nomwe "Kukwana here kana kuti kwete? Pedzisa! → Jesu akashandisa Yake Ropa ,Chete" kamwe “Pindai munzvimbo tsvene, muchichenesa vanhu kubva pazvivi zvavo, uye muchipedzisa kuyananisira kusingaperi, muchiita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nekusingaperi. Nenzira iyi, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

bvunza: zvino izvo tsamba Jesu Ropa " kamwe "Anochenesa zvivi zvevanhu → Sei ndichigara ndichinzwa ndine mhosva? Chii chandinofanira kuita kana ndatadza?"
mhinduro: Sei uchinzwa uine mhosva? Imhaka yekuti vakuru ivavo venhema, vafundisi venhema, nevaparidzi venhema havana kunzwisisa ruponeso rwaKristu uye havana kunzwisisa “ruponeso” rwaKristu. ropa rinokosha “Sezvo ropa remombe nehwai muTesitamende yekare rinosuka zvitadzo, ndinokudzidzisai → ropa remombe nemakwai harigoni kubvisa zvitadzo, saka unogara uchinzwa uine mhosva zuva nezuva, ureurura zvivi zvako uye utendeuke zuva nezuva, upfidze mabasa ako akafa, uye namatira tsitsi dzake zuva nezuva. Ropa Shambai zvivi, bvisai zvivi. Geza nhasi, geza mangwana, geza zuva rinotevera mangwana → "sungano yekutsvenesa Ishe Jesu" ropa rinokosha "Semazuva ose, nekuita izvi, uri kushora Mweya Mutsvene wenyasha here? Hautyi here? Ndinotya kuti wakatevera nzira yenhema! Unonzwisisa here? Reference (VaHebheru 10, ndima 29).

Cherechedza: Bhaibheri rinonyora kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vachava vakakwana nokusingaperi (VaHebheru 10:14); nzira dzokunyengera vanhu. kuvhiringa nemaune Uchatora Ishe Jesu” ropa rinokosha "Ita semazuva ese. Wanzwisisa here?"

bvunza: Ndoita sei kana ndapara mhosva?
mhinduro: Kana uchitenda muna Jesu, hausisiri pasi pemutemo, asi pasi penyasha → Muna Kristu wakasunungurwa kubva pamurairo, uye hapasisina chero mutemo unokupa mhosva. Sezvo pasina mutemo, chivi hachiverengwi sechivi. Pasina murayiro chivi chakafa uye hachiverengwi sechivi. Unonzwisisa here? Reference (VaHebheru 10:17-18, VaRoma 5:13, VaRoma 7:8) → Reference” Paul "Matidzidzise sei kubata nekudarika kwenyama →" Nyama nemweya zvinorwa “Vengai upenyu hwechivi uye muchengete upenyu hutsva kuupenyu husingaperi mhosva Uyewo kana tarisa pachako ari kufa kuna Mwari muna Kristu Jesu. tarisa pachako ari live ye. Reference (VaRoma 6:11), unonzwisisa izvi here?

(7) Mutemo weTestamende yekare mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvichauya

1 Mutemo wakanga uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya (VaHebheru 10:1).
2 Mitemo nemirau mumvuri wezvinhu zvichauya (VaKorose 2:16-17)
3 Adhamu akanga ari mufananidzo womunhu aizouya— ( VaRoma 5:14 )

(8) Mufananidzo wechokwadi wemutemo weTestamente Itsva ndiKristu

bvunza: Kana murayiro uri mumvuri wechinhu chakanaka, wakafanana naniko?
mhinduro: " chinhu chepakutanga "Zvinoita senge Kristu ! Izvozvo muviri Asi ndizvo Kristu , zvepamutemo Pfupisa ndizvo Kristu ! Adamu mufananidzo, mumvuri, mufananidzo → Kristu ndiye mufananidzo chaiwo wekuvapo kwaMwari!

1 Adhamu ndiye mufananidzo, uye Adhamu wokupedzisira “Jesu” ndiye mufananidzo wechokwadi;
2 Murayiro mumvuri wechinhu chakanaka, chinova Kristu chaiye;
3 Mitemo nemirayiro mumvuri wezvinhu zvichauya, asi chimiro ndiKristu;

Kururama kunodiwa nomurayiro rudo! Murayiro mukuru wemutemo ndewokuda Mwari uye kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita. Jesu akada Baba, akada Mwari, uye akada muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita nhengo dzomuviri wake Jesu Ida isu sezvaunozviita iwe! Naizvozvo, pfupiso yomurairo ndiKristu, uye mufananidzo wechokwadi womurairo ndiKristu! Saka, unonzwisisa here? Reference (VaRoma 10:4, Mateo 22:37-40)

(9) Mitemo yeTestamente Yekare yakanyorwa pamahwendefa ematombo

EKSODO 24:12 Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, Kwira kwandiri pagomo, ugare pano, ndikupe mahwendefa amabwe, iwo murayiro wangu, nemirairo yangu, yandakanyora, kuti udzidzise vanhu. ."

(10) Mitemo yeTestamente Itsva yakanyorwa pamahwendefa emwoyo

“Iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita navo shure kwemazuva iwayo, ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe, Ndichanyora mirairo yangu pamwoyo yavo, ndichaiisa mukati mavo” (VaHebheru 10:16).

bvunza: Mu“Testamente Itsva” Mwari anonyora “mutemo” pamwoyo yedu ndokuuisa mukati medu → Ikoku hakusi kuchengeta mutemo here?
mhinduro: Pfupiso yemurairo ndiKristu, uye mufananidzo wechokwadi wemurairo ndiKristu! Mwari anonyora mutemo pamwoyo yedu uye anouisa matiri → Anoisa [Kristu] matiri Kristu ari mandiri uye ini ndiri muna Kristu.

(1) Kristu akazadzisa mutemo uye akachengeta mutemo → ini ndazadzisa mutemo uye ndakachengeta mutemo pasina kutyora kana mumwe.
(2) Kristu haana chivi uye haagoni kutadza → Ini, uyo akaberekwa naMwari, shoko raKristu, Mweya Mutsvene nemvura, handina chivi uye handigoni kutadza. Aninani akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi (1 Johane 3:9 na5:18)

1 Ndinonzwa Shoko, ndinotenda, uye ndinochengeta Shoko → road “NdiMwari. Jesu Kristu ndiMwari! Ameni
2 ndinochengeta" road ", akarindwa zvakasimba noMweya Mutsvene" nzira yakanaka ",ndizvo Chengeta Kristu, chengeta Mwari, chengeta Shoko ! Ameni
3 Pfupiso yemutemo ndiKristu, uye mufananidzo wechokwadi wemutemo ndiKristu → muna Kristu chengeta Kristu, chengeta Tao, ndizvo Gara wakachengeteka Ndine mutemo. Ameni! Hapana joti rimwe kana joti rimwe remutemo rinogona kubviswa, uye zvese zvinofanirwa kuzadzikiswa → Isu tinoshandisa " tsamba "Nzira yaIshe, shandisa" tsamba “Kuchengeta mutemo, kusatyora mutsara mumwe chete, zvese zvichazadziswa Amen!

Isu tinoshandisa" tsamba "Mutemo waJehovha, mutemo nemirairo hazvina kuoma kuchengeta, kwete kuoma! Ndizvo here? → Tinoda Mwari kana tichichengeta mirayiro yake, uye mirayiro yake haina kuoma kuchengeta. ( 1 Johane 5 ) Chitsauko 3 . , unonzwisisa here?
Kana ukaenda" chengeta "Yakanyorwa pamahwendefa" mashoko Kuchengeta mutemo kwakaoma here kuti uchengete kutuka kwomurayiro, nokuti murayiro wakanyorwa mumvuri. Shadow "Haina chinhu, uye haugone kuibata kana kuibata. Wanzwisisa here?"

(11) Sungano yapfuura yasakara, ichiri kuchembera uye ichiderera, uye ichakurumidza kunyangarika.

Zvino zvatichitaura nezvesungano itsva, sungano yokutanga inosakara; (VaHebheru 8:13)

(12) Kristu akazvishandisa kuita sungano isingagumi Ropa Ita sungano itsva nesu

Dai pasina kukanganisa musungano yekutanga, pangadai pasina nzvimbo yekutsvaga chibvumirano chekupedzisira. ( VaHebheru 8:7 )
Asi kuna Mwari worugare, wakamutsa Ishe wedu Jesu kuvakafa, Mufudzi mukuru wamakwai, neropa resungano isingaperi (VaHebheru 13:20).

bvunza: Sungano yokutanga ndiyo sungano yekare, saka inonzi Testamende Yekare → Ndedzipi zvikanganiso?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Sungano yekutanga mumvuri, Adamu mufananidzo, nyika mufananidzo, uye mimvuri yose inofanira kupfuura. Pakuguma kwenyika, zvinhu zvichasakara uye zvichaparara.
2 Mutemo wekutanga wesungano wakanga usina simba uye usina maturo chikoro chekutanga-- (VaGaratiya 4: 9).
3 Mitemo nemitemo yesungano yekutanga yakanga isina simba uye isina maturo uye haina kuwana chinhu - (VaHebheru 7: 18-19)
Haana kungoti " Testamende Itsva 》Kana iri sungano yekare, yasakara uye yava kuora, yava kuda kunyangarika, Testamente Yekare mumvuri, chikoro chepuraimari chisina simba uye chisingabatsiri, chisina simba uye chisingabatsiri → Jesu Kristu akaunza tariro iri nani → Jesu Kristu. akazvishandisa nokusingaperi Ropa resungano rinogadza sungano itsva nesu! Ameni.

OK! Nhasi taongorora, takayanana, uye tikagovera pano Ngatigoveranei muchinyorwa chinotevera: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu, Hurukuro yechinomwe

Kugovera zvinyorwa zvevhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari, vashandi vaJesu Kristu: Hama Wang*yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen - nevamwe vashandi, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu! Rangarirwa naShe. Ameni!

Nziyo: "Nyasha dzinoshamisa" kubva muTestamente Itsva

articles.title: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna VaHebheru Chitsauko 6, ndima 2, tiverenge pamwe chete: Rubhabhatidzo, kuturika maoko, nekumuka kwevakafa, nekutongwa kusingaperi .

Nhasi tichaenderera mberi nekudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu "Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi ye“mukadzi akarurama” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakakodzera, kuitira kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma uye hutsva zuva nezuva! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuzarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya, uye tinzwisise mavambo edzidziso inofanira kusiya Kristu. Siya tsamba, mutemo, mumvuri, mutemo wekupomerwa .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

bvunza: Sei uchisiya → dzidziso dzerubhabhatidzo, kuturika maoko, kumuka kwevakafa, uye kutongwa kusingaperi?
mhinduro: 1 “Rubhabhatidzo” → Tinobhabhatidzwa murufu rwaKristu kamwe chete;

2 Kuturika maoko, kumuka kwevakafa → Tinofa, tinovigwa, uye tinomuka zvakare naKristu kamwe chete;

3 Uye dzidziso yekutonga kusingaperi kwematanho ese → Kristu akatongwa nemutemo kamwe chete nekuda kwezvivi zvedu, uye akazadzisa mutemo kamwe chete → Takafa pamwe chete naKristu uye takatongwa kamwe chete, hapangavi nekutonga kwakawanda kana kutonga kusingaperi kune imwe neimwe nhanho. chidzidzo. Saka aya ndiwo matangiro uye vese vanofanirwa kuenda → Unonzwisisa here izvi?

murayiro usina mumvuri, mitemo, netsamba, nezviga zvenyama;

(1) Jesu akatidzikinura kubva pasi pemutemo

Asi nguva yakati yakwana, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nomukadzi, akaberekwa pasi pomurairo, kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vanakomana. VaGaratia 4:4-5

bvunza: Ko avo vari pasi pomurairo vane vana vaMwari here?
mhinduro: Aihwa . Mutemo we "tsamba, mitemo, kana mitemo" inoshora vanhu, uye tsamba dzinouraya vanhu → Tsamba dzemutemo, nokuti handigoni kuchengeta mitemo, dzinondipomera, dzinondituka, uye dzinonditonga. Naizvozvo rugwaro runopa rufu, uye murayiro unotungamirira rufu, uye kana uri pasi pomurayiro, uri munhu akafa uye hausi vana vaMwari. Unonzwisisa here?

(2) Jesu akadzima murau, akaubvisa akauroverera pamuchinjikwa

...wakakuitai vapenyu muna Kristu, akadzima rugwaro rwakanyorwa, rwaipikisana nesu, rwaipesana nesu, achivabvisa panzira, achiaroverera pamuchinjikwa. VaKorose 2:13-14

bvunza: Zvinorevei kudzima mutemo, kuutora nekuuroverera pamuchinjikwa?
mhinduro: Akakuitai vapenyu pamwe chete naKristu → "vakazvarwa patsva, vanakomana vaMwari, vakarurama uye vokudenga, kwete varanda" → Akadzimawo "mitemo" inova mitemo yakanyorwa mumutemo, iyo inotirwisa "Uchapupu hwemapepa" yaititadzisa → hwaiva humbowo, humbowo hwakandirwisa nekunditonga nekundipomera, hwakabviswa ndokurovererwa pamuchinjikwa. Unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo, mabhii emurairo ndeorufu, uye zvisungo zvemurairo nezvisungo zvenyama → ndezvemunhu wekare. muranda "Hazvina kugadzirirwa vatadzi" munhu akarurama “Yakagadzwa noMwanakomana— nongedzera kuna 1 Timotio ganhuro 8 ndima 9 . Kristu akadzima mitemo nemirau nokuda kwedu “akaberekwa patsva naMwari.” Jesu aitya kuti taizowana matsamba emitemo nemirau zvokuchengeta, naizvozvo iye akadzimwa uye akaabvisa pamuchinjikwa . . . . . Pane kudarika murairo, chivi hachinzi chivi kana pasina mitemo nemirayiro, haugoni kupiwa mhosva, naizvozvo chivi hachinzi chivi, nokuti munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi kana achigara muna Kristu , kunyange iye haaiti chivi.

(3) Kusununguka pamutemo

bvunza: Sei uchityora mutemo?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika - VaRoma 4:15
2 Kana pasina mutemo, chivi hachinzi chivi - VaRoma 5:13
3 Nokuti kunze kwomurayiro chivi chakafa - VaRoma 7:8

Sezvakataurwa naPauro → Saka, tingati chii? Murairo chivi here? Kwete! Asi dai pasina murayiro, handizaiziva kuti chivi chii. Kunze kwekunge mutemo unoti, “Usachiva,” handingazivi kuti kukara chii. Zvisinei hazvo, chivi chakawana mukana wokuita kuti ndive noruchiva kubudikidza nomurayiro; Ndisati ndave mupenyu kunze kwemurairo; Tarisa kuna VaRoma 7:7-9. Cherechedza: Kana murairo wemurairo uchisvika, chivi chinorarama zvakare → pasina mutemo, chivi chakafa kana iwe uchida mutemo uye uchichengeta mutemo → unofanira " mhosva "zvose live Kana ukafa uchafa. Unonzwisisa here zvakataurwa naMwari achishandisa Pauro?

bvunza: Kutiza mutemo sei?
mhinduro: Kununurwa kubva kumurairo nemuviri waKristu wakarovererwa → Kristu chete nokuti Kana vose vakafa, vose vakafa → Naizvozvo, hama dzangu, nemiwo makafa kumurayiro nomuviri waKristu... VaRoma 7:4 → Asi sezvo tichisunga murayiro wedu Zvatakafa kumurayiro, zvino tasunungurwa murayiro kuitira kuti tigoshumira Jehovha ( Avo chete vakasunungurwa kubva pamurayiro uye vari vanakomana vanogona kushumira Jehovha kana usina kusunungurwa pamurairo, uye uri muranda wechivi, haungagoni kubatira Ishe, nohutsva hwomweya (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene), kwete maererano nakare kose; nzira yetsika. Tarisai kuna VaRoma 7:6, unonzwisisa here?

(4) Mitemo nemirau zvikoro zvepuraimari zvisina simba uye zvisina basa

bvunza: Sei chikoro chepuraimari chine humbwende uye chisina basa?
mhinduro: Nokuti pane mirau mumutemo, hatigoni kuichengeta nokuvimba nenyama, uye mutemo uchanditonga nokunditongera rufu, saka chikoro choumbwende uye chisingabatsiri → Zvino zvawava kuziva Mwari, uye zvinogona kuva zvikanzi iwe unozivikanwa namwari, uchiri kudii kudzokera kuchikoro cheumbwende uye chisina basa, wazvipira kuita muranda wake futi? Tarisa kuna VaGaratiya Chitsauko 4 Ndima 9

(5) Mutemo unobva washaya chauchaita

bvunza: Nei zvichinzi mutemo hauna chawakaita?
mhinduro: Nokuti hatigoni kuchengeta mitemo yomurayiro, haina simba uye haina maturo, chikoro choumbwende uye chisina maturo sezvo murayiro usingashandi uye usingabudiriri chinhu, Jesu “akaudzima, akaubvisa, akauparadza” norufu. Saka, unonzwisisa here? →Murau wokutanga, usina simba uye usingabatsiri, wakabviswa (mutemo wakanga usina chawakaita), uye tariro iri nani yakatangwa, yatinogona kusvika nayo kuna Mwari. (Verenga VaHebheru 7:18-19).

(6) Murairo mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya

Sezvo murayiro uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya uye usati uri mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chacho, haungakwanisi kuperedzera avo vanoswedera pedyo nokupa chibayiro chimwe chete gore rimwe nerimwe. VaHebheru 10:1

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuti mutemo mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya?
mhinduro: “Adhamu” muna Genesi akasikwa nomufananidzo uye akafanana na“Jehovha Mwari”? Ehe! Naizvozvo “Jesu” ndiMwari Wamasimba ose, Baba Vasingagumi, uye Muchinda woRugare here? Jesu akati kuna Firipi! Aona ini aona Baba - tarisa kuna Johane 14:9-11. “Adhamu” anonzi munhu nokuti akasikwa nomufananidzo nomufananidzo wa“Jesu” uyo akanga asati ava munhu, handiti? saka" Adhamu "The premonition ndeyechokwadi uye mumvuri! Mufananidzo chaiwo ndewe" Jesu ", anonzi Adhamu wokupedzisira! Rudyi? Ipapo mutemo mutemo wenyama, wakagadzirirwa vanhu venyama → VaHebheru 7:16 " Jesu “Akave muprista, kwete maererano nezvisungo zvenyama, asi maererano nesimba roupenyu husingagumi (hwepakutanga, husingaparadzwi). → Naizvozvo, “Adhamu akanga ari mufananidzo, mumvuri, uye mutemo wakanga uri mumvuri, runako runouya. Mumvuri wezvinhu. Adamu nemutemo zvese" Shadow “, mumvuri uchafamba nokufamba kwenguva, uchava usina chinhu, uye uchadzokera pasina. Adhama nomutemo, ndiko kuti, Testamende Yekare, zvichasakara zvishoma nezvishoma ndokuva pasina → Ona VaHebheru 8:13 , saka haugoni kuchengeta mutemo. , pakutanga yaive " Shadow “Murayiro mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya, kwete mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chacho.

(7) Pfupiso yomutemo ndiKristu, uye mufananidzo wechokwadi ndiKristu

bvunza: Sezvo murairo uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya, ndiani mufananidzo chaiwo wemurairo?
mhinduro: Mufananidzo wemurairo ndiKristu, uye kuguma kwemurairo ndiKristu → Kuguma kwemurairo ndiKristu, kuti ani nani anotenda maari awane kururama. Nongedzera kuna VaRoma 10:4; Mitemo nemirayiro yomurairo ipfungwa yeshure, asi chimiro chacho zvirokwazvo chakafanana naKristu → Naizvozvo, ngaparege kuva nomunhu anokutongai, kana panhau dzezvokudya kana dzokunwa, kana pamitambo, pakugara kwomwedzi; kana maSabata. Iyi mimvuri yezvinhu zvichauya; asi chimiro ndiKristu. Ona VaKorose 2:16-17 .

Cherechedza: Paunogara muna Kristu, uri mumufananidzo wechokwadi, chinhu, uye mufananidzo wechokwadi wemurairo → Kristu anozadzisa murairo, uye isu tinozadzisa mutemo Kristu haana chivi, uye isu hatina chivi. Usatyora mutemo nechivi. Nokuti iwe hausi mu "mumvuri" mutemo, iwe haungaputsi murairo kana uri muna Adhamu, uri mumumvuri, " nyoka “Kukuedza iwe, unotyora mutemo, kutyora mutemo, uye kutyora mutemo chivi. Saka, iwe unonzwisisa here?

Kurudziro:

Naizvozvo, tinofanira kusiya kutanga kwedzidziso yaKristu→ 1 ibva pamabasa anozvidemba uye akafa. 2 Siyai mbwende nechikoro chepuraimari chisina basa, siyai mutemo usingaite chinhu, mhanya wakananga kuchinangwa, uye shingairira kusvika pakukwana; handidi Ndichingotanga chikoro chepuraimari, ndaireurura zvitadzo zvangu uye ndichipfidza zuva nezuva ndichidemba zvakaipa zvandaiita; handidi Akadzokera kuchikoro chepuraimari chisina simba uye chisingabatsiri chemitemo nemitemo, uye anoda kuva muranda wake zvakare. handidi Sembwa inorutsa, inotendeuka yoidya zvakare; Nguruve haina kuchena kwamuri nekuti ine mahwanda akaparadzana maviri asi haidzeyi. " nguruve ” inoreva vaya vasina kuchena kunyange zvazvo vachiziva kusiyanisa Testamente Yekare neTestamende Itsva, havadzeyi. Kushaya kutenda kunoenderana nezvaunonzwa Jehovha, hazvina zvazvinobatsira, saka ngavagare vasina kuchena. Nongedzera kuna Revhitiko chitsauko 11 ndima 7 uye 2 Petro chitsauko 2 ndima 22. Unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

OK! Nhasi tapedza ongororo yedu, kuyanana, nekugovana pano Ngatigoveranei muchinyorwa chinotevera: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu, Hurukuro 4 “Siya Munhu Akwegura Ufuke Munhu Mutsva”.

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvichisundwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu. Kristu. Paridza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe Mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku reupenyu. Ameni! →Seizvo VaFiripi 4:2-3 inotaura, Pauro, Timotio, Yuodhia, Sintike, Kremendi, uye vamwe vakashanda naPauro, mazita avo ari mubhuku roupenyu hwakakwirira. Ameni!

articles.title: Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna VaHebheru Chitsauko 6, ndima 1, tiverenge pamwe chete: Naizvozvo, tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso yaKristu tovavarira kufambira mberi kusvika pakukwana, tisingavaki dzimwe nheyo, dzakadai sokutendeuka kubva pamabasa akafa uye kuvimba naMwari.

Nhasi ndicharamba ndichidzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu "Aihwa. 2 Taura uye unamate: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi ye“mukadzi akarurama” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga kubva kure, uye zvinopiwa kwatiri munguva yakafanira, kuitira kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma, uye huchava hutsva zuva nezuva! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa kuti tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso dzaKristu, sekuti → kupfidza mabasa akafa uye kuvimba naMwari. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Kutenda muvhangeri raJesu Kristu kunotisunungura kubva kuchivi

---Ivhangeri yaJesu Kristu---

(1) Kutanga kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu

bvunza: Kutanga kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu chii?
mhinduro: Kutanga kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari— Marko 1:1 . Jesu ndiye Muponesi, Mesiya, uye Kristu, nokuti anoda kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Ameni! Saka Jesu Kristu ndiye mavambo evhangeri Unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna Mateu 1:21

(2) Kutenda muvhangeri kunotisunungura kubva kuchivi

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: Zvandakagamuchirawo ini Pauro, ndinopa kwamuri: kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, uye kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro Bhuku 15 ndima 3-4. Iri ndiro vhangeri rakaparidzwa nemupostori “Pauro” kuvaHedheni “kereke yeKorinde” kuti vanhu vaponeswe. tsamba "Nevhangeri iri, uchaponeswa. Ndizvo here?"

(3) Jesu Kristu akafira vanhu vose

bvunza: Ndiani akafira zvivi zvedu?
mhinduro: Zvinoitika kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira; Kristu "Munhu mumwe nokuti Apo vazhinji vanofa, vose vanofa; ona 2 VaKorinte 5:14 . Izvi ndizvo zvakafira Kristu zvivi zvedu sezviri muBhaibheri, handiti? →1 Petro 2 Chitsauko 24 Iye wakatakura amene zvivi zvedu pamuviri wake pamuti, kuti isu tife kuzvivi tiraramire kururama...! Jesu Kristu akafira vose, uye vose vakafa, tose tiri isu, kuti isu takafa kuchivi tiraramire kururama. Ameni! Rudyi? Ndiko kutsiviwa kwa“isu” “Jesu” akarurama vasina kururama → Mwari akaita Uyo akanga asingazivi chivi (asina chivi: chinyorwa chepakutanga ndechokuti kusaziva chivi) kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwechivi. Mwari maAri. Tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:21.

(4) Vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi

bvunza: Tinotiza sei chivi?
mhinduro: nokuti Vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi . Nongedzera kuna VaRoma 6:7 → Pano panoti “vakafa vakasunungurwa pachivi.” Ndinofanira kumirira kusvikira ndafa here kuti ndisunungurwe kubva kuchivi? Aiwa, somuenzaniso, pane imwe nguva kwaiva nababa vane mwanakomana akaita chivi ndokutongerwa rufu mukuwirirana nomutemo! Baba vemwanakomana vakakurumidza kuenda kunotsvaga mirau yose nemashoko anogumbura mumutemo waipomera mwanakomana wavo mhosva, ndokuidzima nokuibvisa ipapo baba vakatongwa nomutemo nokuda kwomwanakomana wavo, vakava chivi, ndokufira mwanakomana wavo . Kubva ipapo mwanakomana akasunungurwa kubva pachivi uye kubva pakutongwa kwemurairo. Zvino mwanakomana ava munhu akarurama! Kwete vatadzi, vatadzi vari pasi pemurairo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Zvimwe chetezvo ndezvechokwadi nokuda kwaJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waBaba Vokudenga → Jesu, Mwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe bedzi uye anodiwa waBaba Vokudenga, akava nyama.” nokuti “Patakava chivi, takava vakarurama” nokuti “Kuvasina kururama, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari → Munhu mumwe, Kristu” nokuti "Munhu wose anofa, munhu wose anofa → Munhu wose anosanganisira iwe neni here? Zvinosanganisira, kusanganisira vanhu vomuTestamende Yekare, vanhu vomuTestamende Itsva, vanhu vanoberekwa, vanhu vasati vaberekwa, vose vakabva panyama yaAdhamu, uye kudarika kwose vakafa → vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi. tsamba “Jesu Kristu akafa, uye ndiye munhu wangu wekare ( tsamba ) akafa, handichisiri mupenyu! ( tsamba ) tose takafa → Iye akafa asunungurwa pachivi, uye vose vakasunungurwa pachivi. Anotenda maari haapiwi mhosva, asi ani naani asingatendi atopiwa mhosva nokuti haatendi muzita roMwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga waMwari → Zita roMwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga waMwari ndiJesu, " zita raJesu "Zvinoreva kuponesa vanhu vako pazvivi zvavo. Tarisa kuna Johane Chitsauko 3 Ndima 7-18 naMateo Chitsauko 1 Ndima 21. Jesu Kristu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu → akakuponesa kubva kuzvivi zvako. Kana iwe " Usazvitenda “vachatongwa nomurayiro, saka” mhosva "Zvasarudzwa. Saka, wanzwisisa here?

(5) Kristu anotidzikinura kubva kuchivi chose

1 Ropa raJesu rinotinatsa kubva kuzvivi zvose - Tarisa kuna Johane 1:7
2 Jesu anotidzikinura kubva kuzvitadzo zvose- Tarisa kuna Tito 2:14
3 Mwari vakakuregerera (isu) kudarika kwedu kwose - tarisa VaKorose 2:13

Dzinotevera idzidziso dzisina kururama dzekereke yepasi rose nhasi

bvunza: Vakuru nevafundisi vazhinji zvino vanodzidzisa:
1 Ropa raJesu rinondichenesa kubva pazvivi zvangu “zvandisati ndatenda”;
2 Handisati ndaita zvitadzo “mushure mokunge ndatenda”, kana kuti handina kupara zvitadzo zvanhasi, mangwana kana kuswera mangwana?
3 Nezvivi zvangu zvakavanzwa, zvivi zviri mumoyo mangu
4 Pose pandinotadza, ndinocheneswa Ropa raJesu rine simba risingaperi → Unotenda izvi here? Dzidziso dzavo dzinotsauka sei pachokwadi cheBhaibheri chakafuridzirwa naMwari?
mhinduro: Mwari akatifemera kuburikidza neBhaibheri uye akati, “Tsanangura zvakadzama pasi apa.”
1 Ropa roMwanakomana wake “Jesu” rinotisuka pazvivi zvose – 1 Johane 1:7
2 Jesu anotidzikinura kubva kuzvitadzo zvose- Tarisa kuna Tito 2:14
3 Mwari vakakuregerera (isu) kudarika kwedu kwose - tarisa VaKorose 2:13

Cherechedza: Chokwadi cheBhaibheri chakafuridzirwa naMwari chinoti kudii → 1 Ropa raJesu Mwanakomana wake rinotichenesa zvose chivi, 2 Anotidzikinura kubva zvose chivi, 3 Mwari vanokuregerera (isu) zvose Kudarika → chenesa pazvivi zvose, sunungurwa pazvivi zvose, kanganwira kudarika kwose → Jesu’ Ropa " suka zvitadzo zvose “Hazvisanganisi here zvitadzo ndisati ndatenda muna Jesu uye zvitadzo mushure mokunge ndatenda muna Jesu? Zvinosanganisira zvitadzo zvakavanzwa uye zvitadzo zviri mumwoyo mangu here? Zvinosanganisira zvose here? Somuenzaniso, kubva munaGenesi. .. → kusvika kuna Maraki Bhuku..."Kristu Akarovererwa", zvitadzo zvevanhu vomuTesitamende yekare zvakasukwa here? Testamente Itsva yakasukwa here? Hongu. Wakaonekwa rini muna Genesisi, kwete! , ndiko kuguma kwenyika, uye imi hamuna kubatanidzwa munguva iyoyo yenhau, handiti?

Saka Jesu akati: “Ndini wokutanga nowokupedzisira; ndini wokutanga nowokupedzisira; Mwari vanoona chiuru chemakore sezuva rimwe chete, Iye wash Akanganwira zvivi zvomunhu, akagara kuruoko rworudyi rwoMukuru mudenga - nongedzera kuna VaHebheru 1:3. Ndakachenesa vanhu pazvivi zvavo ndisina kukubvunzai. , rudyi? Wakambozvichenesa here pazvivi zvawakaita mukati memakore zana kana kupfuura ekuonekwa kwako kwemuviri munhoroondo? Yakagezwa yose, handizvo here? Saka isu tinofanira kubatanidzwa naKristu → mukufanana kwerufu rwake, uye mukufanana nekumuka kwake → saka, Jesu akati! Iwe wanga uneni kubva pakutanga - ona Johane 15:27.

Kubva pakusikwa kusvikira kumagumo enyika, Jesu anesu anochenesa vanhu kubva kuzvivi zvavo → tose tiri vatsvene, takachenurwa, uye tinoruramiswa tisati tapinda muumambo hwake.

Kana iwe uri "kupfidza, kureurura, uye kupfidza zuva nezuva kumabasa akafa", ndinokutya iwe → nekuti zvirokwazvo uchabvunza Jesu " Ropa “Chenesa zvitadzo zvako zuva nezuva uye uchagamuchira zvaJesu. Ropa “seropa remombe nemakwai kuti risuke zvivi nokutsvenesa sungano yaKristu” Ropa "Sezvazvinoita, unofunga kuti kusukwa kwezvivi nenzira iyi kunonzwa kufara uye nekunamata. Nekuita izvi, uri kushora Mweya Mutsvene wenyasha. Unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo, unofanira kubuda mukukanganisa kwavo wodzokera kuBhaibheri. Unonzwisisa here? Ona VaHebheru 10:29

(6) Kana takabatanidzwa naKristu mukufanana norufu, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake.

bvunza: “Takatenda” kuti Kristu akafa, asi zvino tichiri vapenyu here? Saka ticharamba tichipara mhosva! Hauna kusununguka kubva kuchivi here? Ndoita sei kana ndapara mhosva? Ndiro dambudziko here?
mhinduro: Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? ... Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye pakumuka kwake; Tiri " akabhabhatidzwa “Kuiswa murufu rwaKristu ndiko kuti tinoverengwa sei pamwe chete naKristu” joint "Akarovererwa → akabatanidzwa kwaari mumufananidzo werufu, unoshandisa" chivimbo "Ne" akabhabhatidzwa "Kubatanidzwa naKristu murufu rwake → kuti iwe" tsamba “Imi pachenyu makafa! Munhu wekare wakafa, mutadzi akafa! → Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari. Ona VaKorose 3:3.

Unotenda here kuti harahwa yakafa uye mutadzi afa? Zvino handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu unorarama mandiri. Kristu" nokuti "Isu takafa, takamutswa kubva kuvakafa uye "takazvarwa patsva" isu, uye " nokuti "Tinorarama → Kurarama handisi ini, ndinorarama kunze kwaAdhamu, ndinorarama kunze kwevatadzi; Kristu nokuti Ndinorarama, ndinorarama kunze kwaKristu, ndinorarama nekubwinya kwaMwari Baba! Zvino zvandava muna Kristu, mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi kana kutadza. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here? Sezvakataurwa naPauro → Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri; Ndinozviramba. VaGaratia 2:20 .

(7) Tarisa chivi uye iwe wakafa

bvunza: Kana tatenda muna Jesu uye tazvarwa patsva, chii chatinofanira kuita pamusoro pekudarika kwedu kwekare?
mhinduro: Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. VaRoma 8:9 → Mweya waMwari, Mweya Mutsvene, unogara mumwoyo yedu, kureva kuti, tinomutswa pamwe chete naKristu uye tinozvarwa patsva mumunhu mutsva. mutsva ini ", munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari" munhu wemweya "Kwete kwemudhara wenyama. Akazvarwa naMwari." Handisi kuona "Munhu mutsva, wakavigwa naKristu munaMwari, uri mamuri; kubva kuna Adhamu, wakaberekwa nababa namai." zvinooneka "Muviri wemunhu wekare wechivi wakafa nekuda kwechivi, uye muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa → Kristu chete" nokuti “Kana vose vachifa, vose vanofa → Kana Kristu ari mamuri, muviri wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mudzimu mupenyu nokuda kwokururama. VaRoma 8:10, Kristu ari matiri anoberekwa patsva, asi muviri wakafa nokuda kwokururama. chivi, naizvozvo Pauro akati “muviri worufu, muviri wokuora” uye hausi womunhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari mumwoyo! munhu wemweya Izvozvi" mutsva ini "Rarama nekururama kwaMwari." asingaonekwi “Wakaberekwa naMwari, wakavigwa muna Mwari” mutsva ini ", hazvisi zve" zvinooneka ", kubva kuna Adhamu kusvika kuvabereki" chembere ini "Hupenyu hwekupara mhosva → Saka" Testamende Itsva 》Mwari vakati haucharangariri kudarika kwenyama yemurume mukuru afa! Mwari haazorangariri → Ipapo achati, “Handichayeukizve zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo.” Zvino zvivi izvi zvaregererwa, hapasisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi. Tarisa kuna VaHebheru 10: 17-18 → Mwari akaita sungano itsva nesu kuti tisarangarira kudarika kwenyama yemunhu wekare, uye isu hatizozvirangariri. Kana ukazviyeuka, zvinoratidza kuti watyora chibvumirano uye watyora chivimbiso . Unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Zvakadiniko nokudarika kwenyama yomukweguru?
mhinduro: Ngatitarisei dzidziso dzaPauro muBhaibheri → Iwe ndiwe “wakazvarwa patsva naMwari” → “kutadza” tarisa ”→Iye pachake, kureva kuti, “munhu wekare akaberekwa naAdhamu” akafa, isu” tsamba “Kristu akafira vose, uye vose vakafa, (sezvo zviri” Tenda murufu ", mune inotevera chiitiko chiitiko" Ona rufu ") Saka hupenyu hunotadzira murume mukuru" tarisa "Yafa," tarisa “Munhu wekare wakafa kukudarika kwenyama; asi kuna Mwari uri muna Kristu, ndiye wakaberekwa naMwari. mutsva ini → Asi kana " tarisa "Ndiri mupenyu. Ameni! (pakutanga) tsamba "Kugara naKristu, gare gare" Newcomer "Iva muna Kristu pakati pechiitiko" tarisa "Iye mupenyu) → Nokuti anoziva kuti sezvo Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, haachazofizve, uye rufu haruchazovi nesimba paari. Paakafa, akafa kuchivi kamwe chete; paakararama; akararamira Mwari saizvozvi, zvitii imi makafa kuchivi, asi muri vapenyu kuna Mwari muna Kristu Jesu.

(8) Siya mabasa akafa anodemba uye vimba naMwari

bvunza: Kudemba mabasa akafa chii?
mhinduro: “Kutendeuka” zvinoreva kutendeuka,
Jesu akati, "Mazuva azadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera! Tendeukai mutende evhangeri." tendeukai uye mutende muvhangeri "uye" Tendeuka pamabasa akafa uye uvimbe naMwari “Zvinoreva zvimwe chetezvo. Ndakambotaura kuti utendeuke uye ipapo. Tenda kuevhangeri ”→ Kutenda muvhangeri kunoreva kutendeuka here? Ehe ! Iwe tenda vhangeri NdiMwari vanopa hupenyu hwako Change Chitsva → Ichi ndicho " kutendeuka "Chirevo chechokwadi → Saka evhangeri iyi isimba raMwari → Tenda muevhangeri uye hupenyu hwako huchashandurwa, pfeka munhu mutsva uye upfeke Kristu! Unonzwisisa here?

bvunza: Chii chinonzi “kupfidza” kwemabasa akafa uye “kupfidza”?
mhinduro: Ndiwo maitiro emunhu akafa ," mutadzi "Munhu akafa here? Hongu → nokuti mubayiro wechivi rufu, mukuona kwaMwari, Vatadzi vakafa → Mateu 8:22 Jesu akati, “Rega vakafa vavige vakafa vavo;
Saka" kuzvidemba "," kutendeuka "Ndiyo maitiro emutadzi, maitiro emunhu akafa? Hongu; sei uchifanira "kupfidza uye kupfidza"? Nokuti chivi chako chinobva kuna Adhamu, uye iwe uri mutadzi → pasi pemutemo uye pasi pokutongwa. Ivo. vari vatadzi vari pasi pechituko chemurairo, vakamirira kufa ikoko, vasina tariro → saka vanofanira " kuzvidemba , kutendeuka "Kutarira kuna Mwari" Vimba muna Mwari uye tenda muvhangeri "Ruponeso rwaIshe Jesu Kristu. Unorunzwisisa here?"

iwe" tsamba "Vimba naMwari," tsamba “Vhangeri ndiro tendeukai, tendeukai →Evhangeri isimba raMwari, Tenda kuevhangeri Mwari vanokupa hupenyu" Change "Chitsva.

1 Mutadzi wekutanga" Change Iva wakarurama
2 Zvakava zvisina kuchena” Change “Tvenesai
3 Zvinoratidza kuti mutemo uri pazasi " Change "pasi penyasha"
4 Zvinoitika kuti mukutuka " Change "Chengcifuli
5 Zvinoitika kuti muTestamente Yekare " Change ” muTestamende Itsva
6 Zvinoratidza kuti murume mukuru " Change "Iva munhu mutsva
7 Zvakaitika ndezvokuti Adam" Change “Muna Kristu
saka" Tendeuka, tendeuka pamabasa akafa "Mabasa evakafa, mabasa evatadzi, mabasa asina kuchena, mabasa ari pasi pemurairo, mabasa ari pasi pechituko, mabasa emunhu wekare muTestamende Yekare, mabasa aAdhamu → unofanira kusiya kutanga kwe dzidziso yaKristu → semu" Zvidemba zvawakaita "→ Mhanyai kuchinangwa. Naizvozvo, tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso yaKristu uye tivavarire kufambira mberi kusvika pakukwana pasina kuisa nheyo, sezvakaita vaya vanopfidza mabasa akafa uye vachivimba naMwari. Ona VaHebheru 6:1 , saka , unonzwisisa here?

OK! Nhasi taongorora, takayanana, uye tikagovana pano Tichazvigovera muchinyorwa chinotevera: Kutanga kweDzidziso yekusiya Kristu, Hurukuro yechitatu

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Bhuratha Wang*Yun, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni, mazita avo akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu. Ameni! →Seizvo VaFiripi 4:2-3 inotaura, Pauro, Timotio, Yuodhia, Sintike, Kremendi, uye vamwe vakashanda naPauro, mazita avo ari mubhuku roupenyu hwakakwirira. Ameni!

articles.title: Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu (Chidzidzo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzose mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaHebheru Chitsauko 6, ndima 1-2, todziverenga pamwe chete: Naizvozvo tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso yaKristu uye tipfuurire mberi mukukwana, tisingateyi dzimwe nheyo, dzakadai sokutendeuka kubva pamabasa akafa, kuvimba naMwari, rubhabhatidzo rwose, nokuiswa maoko pamusoro, nokumuka kwevakafa. uye kutonga kusingaperi, nezvimwewo chidzidzo.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana newe "Kutanga Kusiya Dzidziso yaKristu" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi ye“mukadzi akarurama” inotumira vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakakodzera, kuitira kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma uye hutsva zuva nezuva! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa kuti tinofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso yaKristu tovavarira kufambira mberi kusvika pakukwana .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Kusiya Mavambo eDzidziso yaKristu

bvunza: Ndeapi mavambo ekutsauka kubva padzidziso yaKristu?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Kutanga kweShoko Dzvene Primary School - VaHebheru 5:12
(2) Patakanga tiri vana, taitongwa nezvikoro zvepuraimari zvenyika - VaG
(3) Kubva pachikoro chepuraimari chenyika - VaKorose 2:21
(4) Nei uchida kudzokera kuchikoro chepuraimari chine mbwende uye chisingabatsiri woda kuva muranda wake zvakare? -Ona kuwedzera chitsauko 4, ndima 9

Cherechedza: Chii chiri kutanga kwedzidziso yaKristu? Kubva muna Genesisi “Mutemo waAdhamu, Mutemo waMosesi” kusvika kuBhuku raMaraki, i“Testamende Yekare” → Mutemo wakapfuudzwa nokuna Mosesi, uye akanga asiri Mosesi akaparidza mutemo kubva muEvhangeri yaMateo kuBhuku raZvakazarurwa, i“Testamente Itsva” Nyasha nechokwadi zvose zvinouya nokuna Jesu Kristu - ona Johane 1:17. Saka chii chiri kutanga kwedzidziso yaKristu? Testamende Yekare inoparidza mutemo, nepo Testamente Itsva ichiparidza Jesu Kristu - nyasha nechokwadi → Kutanga kwedzidziso yaKristu ndiko → Kubva muTestamende Yekare 'sungano yomurayiro' kuenda kuTestamente Itsva 'sungano yenyasha nechokwadi.' Uyu anonzi Kristu Unonzwisisa here kutanga kwechokwadi?

(Semuenzaniso, A…………B………………C)
→Kubva pane A...→Poindi B ndiyo "Testamente Yekare-Sungano yeMutemo" kubva papfungwa B...→Pfungwa C inoti "Testamende Itsva-Sungano yeNyasha". Point B inooneka! "Poindi B ndiko kutanga → kutanga kwedzidziso yaJesu Kristu, kubva B kunongedza nzira yese kuna C Zvose Paridza nyasha, chokwadi neruponeso rwaJesu Kristu Kubva kuA...→B pasi pomurairo i“sungano yekare, munhu wekare, muranda, muranda wezvivi”, kubva paB...→C pasi penyasha “sungano itsva, munhu mutsva, a munhu akarurama, mwanakomana”! ibva" B Pfungwa yokuti “kuzvarwa patsva” Kusiya “poindi B” kunoreva munhu mutsva, munhu akarurama, mwanakomana waMwari mutsvene “muKristu” → Kana uri muKristu, haufaniri kusiya “pfungwa B”. → Enda kunongedzo C Ramba uchimhanya wakananga kuchinangwa, uye uchawana mbiri, mibairo, uye korona mune ramangwana. "→Pakutanga dzidziso dzaKristu, vanhu ava vane matambudziko nekutenda kwavo. Pasina kunzwisisa ruponeso rwaKristu, vanhu ava havana kuzvarwa patsva kana kukura. Ivo vatana, varanda, uye varanda vechivi. Ivo. vachatongwa nezuva rokupedzisira, sezvakarehwa naJehovha. Ona Zvakazarurwa 20:13 . Unozvinzwisisa here izvi? )

Kutanga Kwekusiya Dzidziso yaKristu:

1 siya Testamende yekare Enter Testamende Itsva
2 siya sungano yomurayiro Enter sungano yenyasha
3 siya murume mukuru Enter Munhu mutsva (ndiko kuti, pfeka munhu mutsva)
4 siya mutadzi Enter Wakarurama (ndiko kuti, unoruramiswa nokutenda)
5 siya Adhamu Enter Kristu (ndiko kuti, muna Kristu)
6 siya Ivhu Enter Akazvarwa neMweya Mutsvene (kureva kuzvarwa patsva)
7 siya nyika Enter Mukubwinya (kureva humambo hwaMwari)

Jesu akati, “Ndakavapa shoko renyu. Uye nyika inovavenga, nokuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika.” Ona Johani 17:14;
Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Tarisa kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 3-4 .

"Yambiro pamusoro pevakaramba kutenda":

VaHebheru 5:11-12, pano inoti, “Pamusoro paMerikizedheki tine zvizhinji zvokutaura, uye zvakaoma kunzwisisa” nokuti hauzvinzwisisi dzidziso iyi.” Ndima 12 inoenderera mberi ichiti: “Onai kuti munoshingaira sei kudzidza.” Vanowanzodzidzawo zvinodzidziswa neMutemo waMosesi muBhaibheri. Vanofanira kuva vadzidzisi → vanofanira kuva vadzidzisi vanoparidza evhangeri, asi vamwe vanhu vakaita sei vadzidzisi? VaRoma 2:17-20 “Mudzidzisi wamapenzi nomudzidzisi wavana Muri kuvarumbidza here kana kuti kutsvinya kwaPauro vatungamiriri mapofu? Zvakadini natenzi anotungamirira nzira uye ari benzi? Vanodzidzisa vamwe kuchengeta murayiro, asi havagoni kuchengeta kururama kunodiwa nomurayiro ivo pachavo, saka ivo vanodzidzisa vamwe kuchengeta murayiro chivi , mucharangwa avo vari pasi pechituko chomurairo → vanotarira kuna Mesia kuti avanunure pakutuka kwomurairo,” mutemo Chinokosha che "rudo → inoreva kuna Kristu, muponesi! Kuchengeta tsamba yemurairo kuchauraya vanhu, nokuti kana iwe ukakundikana kuchengeta mavara nemirairo yemurairo, iwe uchatongwa uye uchatukwa; Mweya wemurairo rudo - unongedza "mweya wemweya" waKristu uye unoraramisa vanhu . Mutemo haugone kukuponesa, ingori "mudzidzisi" kutitungamirira kuna Kristu, uye isu tinoruramiswa uye tinoponeswa nokutenda muna Kristu → VaG 3: 23-25 , uye tinochengetedzwa nemutemo pasi pemutemo, tichatenderera kusvikira nzira yechokwadi yeramangwana yaratidzwa. Nenzira iyi, murayiro ndiwo muperekedzi wedu, unotitungamirira kuna Kristu kuti tigoruramiswa nokutenda. Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

Asi zvino chokwadi choruponeso nokutenda chasvika, hatisisiri pasi po“mudzidzisi” womurayiro → murayiro ndiwo mudzidzisi wedu , wazvinzwisisa here?" Sezvo ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu rwasvika, hatisisiri pasi peruoko rwemudzidzisi "mutemo" → asi pasi peruvoko rworuponeso rwaKristu Takaregererwa uye takachengetedzwa muna Kristu → nenzira iyi, takaparadzaniswa here kana kuti tasiyiwa? Mudzidzisi "Mutemo, hongu! Unonzwisisa here?

Zvadaro, VaHebheru 5:12b →…Ndiani anoziva, mumwe munhu achakudzidzisai kutanga kwechikoro chokutanga cheshoko raMwari, uye muchava vaya vanoda mukaka uye vasingagoni kudya zvokudya zvikukutu.

Cherechedza:

1 Ndeapi aive matangiro eHoly Word Elementary School? Sezvambotaurwa → Kutanga ndiko kutanga kwe "B point", yekutanga → inonzi Shengyan Primary School
2 Patakanga tiri vana, takanga tisina kusiyana nevaranda.
3 Kuputsa “mitemo” yokutanga nemirau yenyika yakadai sokuti, “Usabata, usaravira, usabata.”— VaKorose 2:21 .
4 Sei ungada kudzokera kuchikoro chepuraimari chinotya uye chisina basa uye uchida kuva muranda wake zvakare? →"Chikoro chepuraimari chisina maturo" zvinoreva mitemo nemitemo yemutemo inobatsira here?

Parikunzi apa" Chikoro chepuraimari chisina basa uye chisina basa, handizvo here? “→ Murau wokutanga, wakanga usina simba uye usina zvibereko, wakabviswa (mutemo hauna chawakaita), uye tariro iri nani yakatangwa, yatinogona kusvika nayo kuna Mwari.”— VaHebheru 7:18 -Ndima 19 → Usava chinhu) Izvi ndizvo zvinotaura Mwari here? Kana kuti ndizvo zvinotaurwa naMwari here? Muri makwai aIshe here? → Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda vechivi - VaRoma 6:6

( 2 ) anoti: Handisisiri ini ndiri kurarama zvino

→Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri; uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino mumuviri ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu . Reference--VaGaratiya Chitsauko 2 Ndima 20

( 3 ) anoti: hatizi venyika

→Ivo havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. Johani 17:16 Asi ini handingazvirumbidzi kunze kwomumuchinjikwa waIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, uyo kubudikidza nawo nyika yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa kwandiri, uye ini kunyika yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa. VaGaratia 6:14

( 4 ) anoti: Hatisi venyama yekare yaAdhamu

→Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, hauchisiri wenyama, asi woMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Chirevo - VaRoma 8:9 → Nokuti imi (munhu wekare) makafa, asi upenyu hwenyu (munhu mutsva) hwakavigwa pamwe naKristu muna Mwari. Reference--VaKorose Chitsauko 3 Vhesi 3

( 5 ) anoti: Hatizi vezvivi

→ Achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti Jesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. "Mateo 1:21 → Nokuti rudo rwaKristu runotimanikidza; nokuti tinoti "Kristu" akafira vose, zvokuti vose vakafa; nokuti uyo wakafa asunungurwa pachivi. VaRoma 6:7 ndima 2 VaKorinte 5: 14

( 6 ) anoti: Hatisi pasi pomurayiro

→Chivi hachichazovi nesimba pamusoro penyu; nokuti hamusi pasi pomurairo, asi pasi penyasha. VaRoma 6:14 → Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro waitisunga, zvino tasunungurwa kubva pamurayiro --- VaRoma 7:6 → Kuti tidzikinure vari pasi pomurayiro, kuti tiwane vana. Reference--VaGaratiya Chitsauko 4 Vhesi 5

( 7 ) anoti: Kusunungurwa parufu, kusunungurwa pasimba raSatani, kusunungurwa pasimba rerima muHadhesi

VaRoma 5:2 chivi sezvachakatonga parufu, saizvozvo nyasha dzinobata ushe kubudikidza nokururama kuupenyu husingaperi kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
VaKorose 1:13-14 Anotiponesa Kununurwa kubva pasimba rerima , achitiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodikanwa, watine dzikinuro maari uye nokuregererwa kwezvivi.
Mabasa 26:18 Ndiri kukutuma kwavari kuti meso avo asvinudzwe uye vatendeuke kubva murima vauye kuchiedza. Bvisa simba raSatani uende kuna Mwari Uye kubudikidza nokutenda mandiri munogamuchira kanganwiro yezvivi uye nenhaka pamwe chete navose vakaitwa vatsvene. "

Cherechedza: " chinangwa chokubhabhatidzwa “Ndirwo rubhabhatidzo murufu rwaKristu, “rufu rusina kuverengerwa Adhamu,” rufu rune mbiri, rwakabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo worufu, tichiviga munhu wedu wekare; uye kuti tibatanidzwe naye mumufananidzo wokumuka. .

Ndiko kuti tifambe muhupenyu hutsva, saKristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba.

Chechitatu: Ngatikudzwe

Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tirarame upenyu hutsva, sokumutswa kwakaitwa Kristu kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? articles.title: “Kudya Kwemanheru” Kudya nokunwa Chirairo chaShe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure maBhaibheri edu kuna VaRoma 6:5 ne8 toaverenga pamwe chete: Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana naye, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake; , tinotenda kuti tichagara naye.

Nhasi ndichadzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana nemi mose "chisvusvuro" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】 Tumirai vashandi kuti vauye nezvokudya kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure uye vatipe nenguva, kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya→【 kudya kwemanheru 】 Ndicho chikafu chemweya chekudya nekunwa hupenyu hwaIshe! Kunwa ropa raShe nokudya muviri waShe ndiko kubatanidzwa naKristu muchimiro chokumuka! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

1. Jesu anoita sungano itsva nesu

bvunza: Jesu anoshandisei kuita sungano itsva nesu?
mhinduro: Jesu akashandisa zvake Ropa Ita sungano itsva nesu! Ameni.

1 Vakorinde 11:23-26... Shure kwokunge avonga, akachimedura akati, "Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa imi." “Mukombe uyu ndiwo wamuchaita nguva dzose kana muchinwa sungano itsva muropa rangu, muchindirangarira. “Nokuti nguva dzose kana muchidya chingwa ichi nokunwa mukombe uyu, munoparidza rufu rwaShe kusvikira achidzoka.

2. Mukombe nechingwa chakaropafadzwa

bvunza: Ko mukombe nechingwa zvinoropafadzwa chii?
mhinduro: wemukombe watakaropafadza muto wemazambiringa Ehe" Mukristu Ropa ", komborerwa na" cake " Iwo muviri waShe ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

1 Vakorinde 10:15-16 BDMCS - Seni ndiri kutaura kuna vanonzwisisa, nzverai mashoko angu. Ko, mukombe watinovonga haazi mugovani weropa raKristu here? Chingwa chatinomedura hachidyiwi muviri waKristu here? (Onai: Takomborera mukombe nechingwa → iropa raKristu nomuviri wake)

3. Jesu ndiye chingwa choupenyu

bvunza: Zvinorevei kudya nyama yaShe uye nokunwa ropa raShe?
mhinduro: Kana muchidya nokunwa nyama neropa raShe, muchava noupenyu hwaKristu, uye kana mune upenyu hwaKristu, muchava noupenyu husingaperi! Ameni.

Johani 6:27 Musashandira zvokudya zvinoparara, asi zvokudya zvinogara kuupenyu husingaperi zvamuchapiwa noMwanakomana woMunhu, nokuti Mwari Baba vakakuisai mucherechedzo.

Johani 6:48 Ndini chingwa choupenyu. Ndima 50-51 Ichi ndicho chingwa chakaburuka kubva kudenga, kuti kana muchidya hamungafi. Ndini chingwa chipenyu chakaburuka kubva kudenga; kana munhu akadya chingwa ichi, achararama nokusingaperi. Chingwa chandichapa inyama yangu, yandinopa upenyu hwenyika, ive upenyu hwenyika ino. Mauri hamuna hupenyu Ani naani anodya nyama yangu uye anonwa ropa rangu, ane upenyu husingaperi, ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira.

4. Kubatana naIshe muchimiro chekumuka

VaRoma 6:5 Nokuti kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana naye, tichabatanawo naye mukumuka kwake.

［ akabhabhatidzwa ] → Rubhabhatidzo rwemvura kubatanidzwa Naye murufu, kubhabhatidzwa murufu, uye kuvigwa naye → Mukweguru wedu akavigwa murenje.

［ kudya kwemanheru ] → Kudya kwemanheru kunofanira kubatanidzwa naShe murumuko: munhu mutsva akamutswa anopfeka muviri waKristu, anopfeka Kristu, uye anogamuchira chingwa choupenyu muchimiro chinobva kudenga.

(1) Tinotenda kuti takafa, takavigwa, uye takamutswa pamwe chete naKristu Uku ndiko kubatana kwedu naIshe mukutenda. chivimbo ) haina chimiro.

(2) Kutenda kwakaumbwa kwakabatanidzwa Naye → → Mukombe nechingwa zvinokomborerwa zvinoonekwa uye zviripo." chimiro “Muto wemazambiringa” uri mumukombe ndewaJehovha Ropa .Nechinhu chinooneka uye chinobatika" cake “Muviri waShe, gamuchirai muviri waShe uye Ropa Pane" chimiro “Kutenda kwakabatanidzwa naYe! Ameni. Saka, munonzwisisa here?

5. Ongorora uye Kusarura

bvunza: Ungasiyanisa sei pakati pekudya nekunwa ropa raIshe nemuviri?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Zvokudya zvemuviri

Kazhinji idya chikafu kubva pasi, chiri chikafu chinobva mudumbu remuviri.

(2) Usadya pamutambo wemadhimoni

Ndiko kuti, musabayira zvipoko kana kudya zvokudya zvezvifananidzo sechirairo chaShe.

(3) Mukombe nechingwa chakaropafadzwa

→→Iropa nomuviri waKristu.

(4) Kana munhu achidya chingwa chaShe, nokunwa mukombe waShe zvisina kufanira,

→→Kukanganisa muviri neropa raIshe.

(5) Zviongorore [ chivimbo ] kugamuchira muviri waShe uye Ropa

2 Vakorinde 13:5 “Zviedzei imi pachenyu” → zviedze imi pachenyu kana mune “kutenda” kana kuti kwete. Hamuzivi here kuti kana musina kurashwa, muna Kristu Jesu mamuri?

( alert : “Vakuru nevafundisi” vakawanda vanoudza hama nehanzvadzi kuti vaongorore zvivi zvavo, nokuti munhu wedu wekare, “muviri wechivi” wakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu uye wakaparadzwa kuburikidza ne "kubhabhatidzwa" uye akavigwa murenje.
Kwete pano ndakudaidza mhosva yekuongorora , nokuti munhu akaberekwa patsva haana chivi, uye munhu wose akaberekwa naMwari haambotadzi (ona 1 Johani 3:9).

Izvi ndezvokuti uedze kutenda kwako,” tendai “Mukombe wakaropafadzwa muto wemazambiringa Ehe Mukristu Ropa , chingwa chakakomborerwa chaiva muviri waKristu , gamuchirai zvaShe Ropa uye Muviri ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

→→( tendai ) ne" rubhabhatidzo “Kutenda kwakafa kuchivi, kwakafa kumurairo, kwakafa kumunhu wekare, kwakafa kusimba rerima, kutenda kwakafa kunyika, kutenda kwakafa kumunhu wekare;

→→( tendai ) Munhu anozvarwa patsva ndiye kuongorora Zvino handichisiri ini ndinorarama, asi kutenda kwaKristu kunorarama mandiri, kunotora mwoyo waKristu somwoyo wangu kuti ugamuchire chingwa choupenyu chokudenga. 【 kudya kwemanheru 】Munhu womudzimu ndiye anogamuchira zvokudya zvomudzimu. muviri waKristu uye Ropa ", munhu wemweya Idya ikoko" chimiro “Zvokudya zvomudzimu zvoupenyu hwokudenga, urwo rumuko” chimiro "Bata pamwe chete naShe! Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?"

Kusiyanisa: Dumbu renyama rinodya chikafu chevhu. Kana chirairo chaShe chikadyiwa mudumbu memurume mukuru wowira muchimbuzi, muviri waKristu hauzowanikwi mauri uye vachinwa zvivi zvavo? Vakuru ivavo nevafundisi vari kukukumbira here kuti ureurure zvivi zvako, utendeuke, uongorore zvitadzo zvako, udzime zvitadzo zvako uye uzvichenese? Zviri pachena kuti vanhu ava havanzwisisi muviri nehupenyu hwaKristu.

→ Hausati waziva here? Kana uchitenda zvamazvirokwazvo mukumutswa pamwe chete naKristu, chinogara mumoyo mako zvino ndihwo hupenyu hwaKristu! Chirevo - VaRoma 8, 9-10 naJohani 1, 3, 24.

Unodya zvokudya zvaShe "chisvusvuro" Zvimwe kuongorora Hupenyu hwaKristu mukati mako hutadzi here? Muviri waKristu chivi here? Kristu aiva nemhosva here? Uchiri kuda kudzima zvivi zvako nekuzvisuka here? Chokwadi hauzivi here? Nokuti nyama yedu yakare, kusanganisa kuchiva kwayo nezvishuwo, yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu uye muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa! Kuvigwa muguva! Unozvitenda here? Unonzwisisa here?

Avo vanodaidzwa kuti “Vakuru, Vafundisi neboka ravo havanzwisise zvachose” Bhaibheri 》Chokwadi, kana vasina kunzwisisa kuzvarwa patsva uye nekugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene, havana hupenyu hwaKristu. Vazhinji vakazadzwa nokurasika uye vachinyengerwa nomweya wokurasika vanhu ava vanokuchengetai muzvivi zvenyu, zvichiita kuti imi mose mudye nokunwa zvivi zvenyu.

(6) Kana musingazivi muviri waShe, muchadya nokunwa zvivi zvenyu

→Muri “kutongwa nokurangwa naShe” →Vazhinji vasina simba uye vanorwara, uye vazhinji vakafa - Reference (1 VaKorinte 11:29-32)

(7) Mudhara anodya nekunwa chikafu chevhu

【 murume mukuru ] → 1 VaKorinde 6:13 Zvokudya ndezvedumbu, uye dumbu nderezvokudya;

【 Newcomer 】→ munhu wemweya Izvozvi" Newcomer Pfekai Kristu, pfekai munhu mutsva → muve vatsvene, vasina chivi, vasina gwapa, vasina kusvibiswa, vasingaori mvura youpenyu!

articles.title: Rubhabhatidzo 3 Rubhabhatidzo rweMoto
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Ruka 12 ndima 49-50 tiverenge pamwe chete: "Ndauya kuzokanda moto panyika, dai wakanga wabatidzwa, handiti ndizvo zvandaida here? Rubhabhatidzo rwandinofanira kunge rwusati rwaitwa. Ndiri kukurumidza sei?

Nhasi ndichadzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana nemi mose "Kubhabhatidzwa kweMoto" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Kereke] inotumira vashandi ** neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu ~ kuti vauye nezvokudya zvinobva kunzvimbo iri kure mudenga, uye kuti zvigotipa isu nenguva yakafanira, kuti kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume zviri nani! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya→ Ngativakei padombo romudzimu raKristu, kuti kutenda kwedu kugopukunyuka muedzo womwoto uye kunokosha zvikuru kupfuura ndarama inoparara. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1. Kubhabhatidzwa nemoto

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri, Ruka 12, ndima 49-50, tiipenengure uye tiverenge pamwe chete: "Ndiri kuuya moto Kuikanda pasi, kana yatotsva, handiti ndizvo zvandinoda here? Rubhabhatidzo rwandinofanira kunge rwusati rwaitwa.

bvunza: Chii chinonzi kubhabhatidzwa nemoto?

mhinduro: Ishe Jesu vakati → ndiri kuuya ku " moto "Ikande pasi →" moto "Zvinoreva kuti Mwari anosimuka munzvimbo mune kutambura, kutambudzwa, kushorwa, uye vavengi kumativi ose, asi haana musungo →" chivimbo "pindana ne" moto “Kuedza kunokosha kupfuura goridhe rinoora.

Kana yatotanga → "Hongu" moto "Muyedzo wasvika", handiti ndizvo zvandirikuda here? Rubhabhatidzo rwandinofanira kunge rwusati rwaitwa.

bvunza: Jesu akabhabhatidzwa naJohane mubhabhatidzi →" Shamba nemvura "uye" rubhabhatidzo rwomudzimu mutsvene "→ Denga rakamuzarurirwa iye," Mweya Mutsvene "Zvaita sokuti njiva yaburukira paari! Chii chimwe?" wash "Hapana kubudirira?
mhinduro: " rubhabhatidzo rwemoto "→NdiIshe Jesu Kristu" nokuti "tese" enderera mberi “Muchinjikwa ndewedu mhosva ( tambura )→akafira zvivi zvedu,akavigwa,akamukazve nezuva retatu→Kristu akamuka kuvakafa" kuberekwa patsva "Wakatisunungura → akatisunungura kubva kuchivi, mutemo uye chituko chemurairo, munhu wekare nemabasa ake, uye simba rerima raSatani muHadhesi → kumuka kwaKristu kwakatiruramisa! Kuberekwazve, kumuka , kuponeswa, uye kuva neupenyu husingaperi. Ameni! iye ) Upenyu husingaori, husingasvavi, husina kusvibiswa, husingaperi! Izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa naJesu: “Rubhabhatidzo rwandakafanirwa narwo harwusati rwaitwa. Ndiri kukurumidza sei?

2. Jesu akabhabhatidzwa nemoto

→Tinotambura naye" rubhabhatidzo rwemoto "
→Tinaye tambura ,
→ndichavawo naye kudzwai !

(Vadzidzi) Vakati, “Tinogona.” Jesu akati kwavari, “Nemiwo munofanira kunwa mukombe wandinonwa ini; Norubhabhatidzo rwamakabhabhatidzwa narwo, muchabhabhatidzwawo ;Reference-Mako Chitsauko 10 Ndima 39

Kana vari vana, saka vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. kana tinaye tambura , uye vachakudzwa pamwe chete naye . —VaRoma 8:17

bvunza: Kukudzwa pamwe chete naKristu sei?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Siya zvese shure
2 zvirege iwe
3 Teverai Jesu muparidze vhangeri rehumambo hwekudenga
4 Kuvenga hupenyu hwekare
5 Takura muchinjikwa wako
6 Rasa hupenyu hwekare
7 Dzorera hupenyu husingaperi hwaKristu! Ameni

Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Ipapo akadana vanhu vazhinji pamwe chete navadzidzi vake akati kwavari, “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere. Nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa mweya wake acharasikirwa nawo, asi ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa. Ameni!
→Kana isu tinaye chimiro chakafa naye joint , maariwo chimiro chekumuka naye joint . Aya ndiwo maitiro ekukudzwa pamwe chete naKristu. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Reference (Mako 8:34-35 uye VaRoma 6:5)

3. Kuvimba ndiko " moto "Kuedza kunokosha kupfuura goridhe rinoora."

(1) Kutenda kunoedzwa nemoto

Kuti “kutenda” kwenyu, pashure pokunge “kwaedzwa,” kuve kunokosha kupfuura ndarama “inoparara” kunyange ichiidzwa “nomoto,” kuitira kuti mugowana kurumbidzwa nokubwinya nokukudzwa pakuonekwa kwaJesu Kristu. . Chirevo - 1 Petro Chitsauko 1 Ndima 7

(2) Yakavakwa nendarama, sirivha, uye matombo anokosha

Kana munhu achivaka pamusoro penheyo iyi nendarama, nesirivha, namabwe anokosha, namatanda, namashanga, basa romumwe nomumwe richaratidzwa; Kana basa rinovaka pamusoro penheyo iyoyo richigara, achagamuchira mubayiro. Kana basa romunhu rikapiswa, ucharashikirwa, asi iye amene uchaponeswa, zvichava sapamoto; Chirevo - 1 VaKorinte 3:12-15

(3)Isa pfuma mumudziyo wevhu

Tinokomberedzwa navavengi kumativi ose, asi hatina kubatwa nemisungo, asi hatinyadziswi, asi hatina kurashwa; Tinogara takatakura rufu rwaJesu nesu kuitira kuti “upenyu hwaJesu” hugo“ratidzwa” matiri. → Kana munhu achizvinatsa pachinhu chakaderera, achava mudziyo unokudzwa, wakaitwa mutsvene uye unobatsira Ishe, wakagadzirirwa basa rose rakanaka.
