articles.title: Kubhabhatidzwa 2 Kubhabhatidzwa mumvura
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 6 ndima 3-4 todziverenga pamwe chete: Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe chete naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu kuitira kuti tifambe muupenyu hutsva, saKristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. .

Nhasi tinodzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana newe - bhabhatidzwa "Kubhabhatidzwa Mumvura" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Kereke] inotuma vashandi** namashoko akanyorwa mumaoko avo uye neshoko rechokwadi ravanoparidza, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu ~ kuti vauye nezvokudya zvinobva kure kudenga uye kutipa isu nenguva yakafanira kuti tingave tiri pamweya Hupenyu hwakawandisa! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya→ Hwisisa kuti kana vaHedheni “vabhapatidzwa mumvura” vanobhapatidzwa murufu rwaKristu, “vakabatanidzwa” naKristu murufu, kuvigwa nokumuka, uye vanobhapatidzwa mushure mokuzvarwa patsva uye nokuponeswa. Ameni Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

1. Rubhabhatidzo rwechiJudha

→→Bhabhatidzwa usati wazvarwa patsva

1 Rubhabhatidzo rwaJohane mubhabhatidzi → rubhabhatidzo rwekutendeuka

Mako 1:1-5... Sezvizvi, Johane akauya achibhabhatidza murenje, achiparidza rubhabhatidzo rwokutendeuka kuti vanhu varegererwe zvivi. Judhiya yose neJerusarema vakaenda kuna Johwani, vakareurura zvivi zvavo, vakabhabhatidzwa naye muna Joridhani.

2 Jesu akabhabhatidzwa →akagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene ;

Vanhu vose vakabhabhatidzwa → havana kugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene . Verenga Ruka 3 ndima 21-22

3 VaJudha → pashure po“rubhapatidzo rwokupfidza” → vakatenda muna Jesu soMuponesi, uye vaapostora “vakaisa maoko avo” ndokunyengetera, uye ipapo vakagamuchira “Mudzimu Mutsvene” --Verenga Mabasa 8:14-17;

4 VaHedheni →Kana uchigamuchira “rubhabhatidzo rwokutendeuka” rwakaitwa naJohane mubhabhatidzi →ndiko kuti, avo “vasina” kugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene nokuti havanzwisisi vhangeri vanobhabhatidzwa muzita raShe Jesu neremupostori Pauro "vanoisa maoko" pamisoro yavo → kuti vagamuchire Mweya Mutsvene - -Verenga Mabasa 19:1-7

2. Rubhabhatidzo rwevaHedheni

---Kubhabhatidzwa mushure mekuzvarwa patsva---

1 Vemamwe Marudzi →“Petro” akaparidza mumba maKoneriyasi, uye “vakanzwa” shoko rechokwadi, iro rinova evhangeri yoruponeso rwenyu→ uye vakaiswa chisimbiso noMweya Mutsvene wavakanga vapikirwa→ndiko kuti, “vakabhapatidzwa” pashure pokuzvarwa patsva. →Onai VaEfeso 1 Chitsauko 13-14 Mabasa 10:44-48 .

2 VaHedheni “Muchekwa” akanzwa Firipi achiparidza nezvaJesu→ akabhabhatidzwa ——Verenga Mabasa 8:26-38

3 Vemamwe Marudzi “vakabhabhatidzwa” →Kubatanidzwa naKristu murufu rwakafanana →na" rubhabhatidzo “Kuburukira murufu, tichiviga munhu wedu wekare naye—Verenga VaRoma 6:3-5

bvunza: Pasati pave" akabhabhatidzwa "→ Sezvakangoita "asati abhabhatidzwa", vakuru kana vafundisi vanodana vanhu kuti vatendeuke uye vareurura zvivi zvavo → ichi" rubhabhatidzo rwokutendeuka "Rubhabhatidzo rwaJohani→ Haana kutambura " Mweya Mutsvene “Ndiko kuti, rubhabhatidzo rusati rwaberekwazve;
Unoda kuzvigamuchira ikozvino →" kubhabhatidzwa mumvura "Kubatanidzwa naKristu, kufa uye kuvigwa naye →" rubhabhatidzo "Mucheka wemvere?

mhinduro: "Marudzi" akabhabhatidzwa "Kufanana norufu kubatanidzwa naye → Ndirwo rubhabhatidzo rwekubwinya, nokuti rufu rwaJesu pamuchinjikwa runokudza Mwari Baba → Kana muchidawo kukudzwa nokupiwa mubayiro saKristu! Kudzai Mwari Baba! → Unofanira kugamuchira izvo zvakarurama maererano neBhaibheri” akabhabhatidzwa "→ Chimiro cherufu naye" rubhabhatidzo rwakabatana ".

【 rubhabhatidzo ] haigoni kumanikidzwa, nokuti Rubhabhatidzo harwunei neruponeso ; Asi zvine chekuita nekukudzwa . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

[Cherechedza]: Munhu akazvarwa patsva → anoda kubhabhatidzwa mukubwinya kwekubatana naIshe kuti abhabhatidzwe muna Kristu. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

3. Rubhabhatidzo runorairwa naJesu

(1) Rubhabhatidzo runorayirwa naJesu —Verenga Mateu 28:18-20
(2) Mubhabhatidzi ihama yakatumwa naMwari-- Somuenzaniso, Johane mubhabhatidzi, Jesu akauya kwaari kuti abhabhatidzwe vapostori, Firipi, nezvimwewo vakatumwa naMwari
(3) Mubhabhatidzi anofanira kunge ari hama-- Tarisa kuna 1 Timotio 2:11-14 uye 1 VaKorinte 11:3
(4) Vakabhabhatidzwa vanonzwisisa dzidziso yechokwadi yevhangeri—- Tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4
(5) Avo vanobhapatidzwa vanonzwisisa kuti “rubhapatidzo” runofanira kubatanidzwa naKristu muchimiro chorufu—- Ona VaRoma 6:3-5
( 6) Nzvimbo yekubhabhatidzira yaive murenje.
(7) Bhabhatidzwa muzita raJesu Kristu— Ona Mabasa 10:47-48 naMabasa 19:5-6

4. Kubhabhatidzwa murenje

bvunza: kupi akabhabhatidzwa Mukuwirirana nedzidziso yeBhaibheri?
mhinduro: murenje

(1) Jesu akabhabhatidzwa muRwizi rwaJodhani murenje
Tarisa kuna Mako 1 Chitsauko 9
(2) Jesu akarovererwa paGorogota murenje
Tarisa kuna Johani 19:17
(3) Jesu akavigwa murenje
(Verenga Johani 19:41-42).
(4) “Kubhabhatidzwa” muna Kristu kubatanidzwa naye murufu rworufu, munhu wedu wekare anovigwa naye. .

" akabhabhatidzwa " Nzvimbo: Gungwa, nzizi huru, nzizi duku, madziva, hova, nezvimwewo murenje zvinongoda chete kuva nemvura yakakodzera "kubhabhatidzwa";

Hazvinei kuti kunaka kwakadii, usabhabhatidzwe “mudziva, bhavhu, bhaketi, kana dziva remukati” kumba kana mukereke, kana “bhabhatidza nemvura, geza mubhodhoro, geza mudhishi, geza. mupombi, kana kugeza nemvura” → nekuti izvi hazvienderane nedzidziso dzeBhaibheri dzerubhabhatidzo.

Kune vanhu vanoparidza vhangeri muzvipatara kana vasati vafa. Ivo tsamba Jesu! Ndovapa sei" akabhabhatidzwa "Mucheka wemvere?

articles.title: Rubhabhatidzo 1 Rubhabhatidzo rweMweya Mutsvene
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Mabasa Chitsauko 11, ndima 15-16 tiverenge pamwe chete: "Muapostora Petro akati," → Pandakangotanga kutaura, Mweya Mutsvene wakawira pamusoro pavo, sezvawakanga wawira pamusoro pedu. Ndakarangarira mashoko aShe: “Johane akabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imi munofanira kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene.” '

Nhasi ndichadzidza, nekuyanana, uye nekugoverana newe - kubhabhatidzwa "Rubhabhatidzo rweMweya Mutsvene" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi*, vhangeri reruponeso rwenyu, kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo! Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuzarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu! Ichokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa nzira yechokwadi, tenda evhangeri, uye ugamuchire rubhabhatidzo rweMweya Mutsvene → kuwana kuzvarwa patsva, kumuka, kuponeswa, uye hupenyu husingaperi. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

1. Unofanira kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge Mako 1:8 pamwe chete: Ini ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura; asi iye uchakubhabhatidzai noMweya Mutsvene .

Johane akabhabhatidza nemvura, asi mukati memazuva mashoma, Unofanira kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene . ”—Mabasa Chitsauko 1 Ndima 5

Ndichingotanga kutaura, Mweya Mutsvene akauya pamusoro pavo, sezvaakanga auya pamusoro pedu. Ndakarangarira mashoko aJehovha anoti: ‘ Johane akabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imi munofanira kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene . ’—Mabasa 11:15-16

[Cherechedza] Takanyora izvi nekuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa:

→ 1 Johani Mubhabhatidzi akati: “Ini ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura, asi Jesu achakubhabhatidzai nemvura. Mweya Mutsvene “Ndibhabhatidze
→ 2 Jesu akati, “Johani akabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imi munofanira kubhabhatidzwa.” Mweya Mutsvene " yekugeza
→ 3 Petro akati, "Ndinotanga nokuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu." Mweya Mutsvene ” uye yakasvika pavari “Vamarudzi,” sezvayakanga yatiwira pakutanga, Uye ndakarangarira mashoko aShe, anoti: ‘Johane akabhapatidza nemvura; Unofanira kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene . Ameni!

bvunza: Sezvo isu "Vemamwe Marudzi" → "tinonzwa chokwadi uye titende evhangeri" → kugamuchira " rubhabhatidzo rwomudzimu mutsvene "! Saka, tinonzwa sei shoko rechokwadi revhangeri?

mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

2. Inzwai nzira yechokwadi munzwisise nzira yechokwadi

bvunza: Ndeipi nzira yechokwadi?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Pakutanga kwaiva neTao, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. — Johani 1:1-2

(2)Shoko rakazova nyama

Shoko rakava nyama, zvinoreva kuti “Mwari” akava nyama!
Shoko rakazova nyama uye rakagara pakati pedu, rizere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. Reference (Johani 1:14)

(3)Zita rake ndiJesu

Akazvarwa neMweya Mutsvene uye akazvarwa neMhandara Maria!
Kuberekwa kwaJesu Kristu kwakanyorwa seizvi: Maria, mai vake vakanga vatsidzirana naJosefa, asi vasati varoorana, Maria akava nepamuviri noMweya Mutsvene. …Iye achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti Jesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. (Verenga Mateu 1:18, 21).

(4)Jesu ndiye chiedza choupenyu

Upenyu huri maari, uye upenyu uhu chiedza chomunhu.
Jesu akabva ati kuvanhu vazhinji, “Ndini chiedza chenyika. Ani naani anonditevera haangatongofambi murima, asi achava nechiedza choupenyu.” ( Johani 8:12;

(5)Nzira yehupenyu

Pamusoro peshoko rapakuvamba roupenyu kubvira pakutanga, izvi ndizvo zvatakanzwa, takaona, takaona nameso edu timene, uye zvatakabata namaoko edu. (Upenyu uhwu hwakaratidzwa, uye takahuona, uye zvino tinopupura kuti tinokupai upenyu husingaperi hwaiva kuna Baba uye hwakaratidzwa kwatiri.) ( 1 Johani 1:1-2 )

(6)Unofanira kuberekwa patsva

bvunza: Nzira yekuzvarwa patsva?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya — Johani 3:5-7
2 Akazvarwa kubva mushoko rechokwadi revhangeri - — 1 VaKorinte 4:15 naJakobho 1:18
3 Akazvarwa naMwari! Ameni
Vose vakamugamuchira, akavapa simba rokuti vave vana vaMwari, kuna avo vanotenda muzita rake. Vakadaro vasina kuberekwa neropa, kana neruchiva, kana nechido chemurume; akaberekwa naMwari . Reference ( Johani 1:12-13 )

(7) Jesu ndiye nzira, chokwadi, uye upenyu

Jesu akati: “Ndini nzira, nechokwadi, noupenyu; hapana anouya kuna Baba asi nokwandiri.

3. Tenda kuevhangeri—gamuchira chisimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene

Nokuti izvo zvandakakumikidzawo kwamuri, zvokutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva retatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro (1 Vakorinde 15 Chitsauko 3-4).

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: mupostori" Paul Paridza kuvaHedheni
→" Vhangeri roruponeso "!
→ Zvandakagamuchira ndikakupa ,
→ Kutanga, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neBhaibheri:
(1) Tiponesei pachivi —VaRoma 6:6-7
(2) Kusununguka pamutemo nokutukwa kwawo —VaR. 7:6;
Uye akavigwa →
(3) Bvisa mukweguru nemaitiro ake — VaKorose 3:9;
Uye maererano neBhaibheri, akamutswa pazuva rechitatu!
(4) Tiruramise! Iva nekumutswa, kuberekwa patsva, kuponeswa, uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi naKristu! Ameni .
Jesu akaiswa mumaoko evanhu nokuda kwekudarika kwedu; Jesu akamutsirwa Tiruramise (Kana kududzira: Jesu akasunungurwa nokuda kwekudarika kwedu uye akamutsirwa kururamiswa kwedu). Reference (VaRoma 4:25)

Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuti vakuunzirei zvokudya kubva kure mudenga kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye richitaurwa nemaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu mupfumi! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti Mwari akatisiira chivimbiso che "kupinda muna Kristu" zororo, nekuti avo vakatenda vanogona kupinda muzororo rake. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Imi mose makaneta makaremerwa, Jesu anokupai zororo

Uyai kwandiri mose makaneta makaremerwa, uye ini ndichakuzorodzai. Takurai joko rangu mudzidze kwandiri, nokuti ndiri munyoro uye ndine mwoyo unozvininipisa, uye muchawana zororo remweya yenyu. Nokuti joko rangu rakanaka uye mutoro wangu wakareruka. ”— Mateu 11 ndima 28-30

mhinduro: Mudzimu waMwari “Mudzimu Mutsvene” uye Mudzimu woMwanakomana Wake → “unogara” mumwoyo yenyu → kureva kuti, munhu mutsva “akaberekwa patsva” “haasi” womunhu akwegura, nyama yaAdhamu, asi ndewemunhu wekare. Mweya Mutsvene. → "Munhu mutsva" anogara muna Kristu nekuda kwekururama; "munhu wekare" anofa nekuda kwechivi. Nokudaro, "munhu mutsva" haasi we "munhu wekare" "munhu mutsva" "anoberekwazve" kuburikidza nechokwadi cheevhangeri → anoputsa kubva kumunhu wekare → munhu mutsva "akaparadzaniswa" kubva kune yekare; munhu; "munhu mutsva" akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari kusvikira Kristu adzoka → "Munhu mutsva" anooneka → anooneka naKristu mukubwinya. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo-VaKorose 3:3

"Mukuru"

Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare nemiitiro yawo - VaKorose 3:9

Kana makanzwa shoko rake, makagamuchira dzidziso yake, mukadzidza zvokwadi yake, munofanira kubvisa munhu wenyu wekare, unoodza nokunyengera kworuchiva

[Cherechedza]: Wakateerera mashoko ake, wakagamuchira dzidziso dzake, uye wakadzidza zvokwadi yake → wakanzwa “shoko rezvokwadi” Sezvo wakatenda muna Kristu, wakagamuchira “Mudzimu Mutsvene” wakapikirwa sechisimbiso → unoberekwazve! Ona VaKorose 1:13 . →Nenzira iyi, iwe "wabvisa" →"munhu wekare uye maitiro emunhu akwegura. Uyu murume wekare ari kuipa zvishoma nezvishoma nekuda kwekunyengera kwezvido zveudyire → muviri wekunze unoparadzwa."

1 Muviri we "munhu wekare" wakafa nekuda kwechivi → zvishoma nezvishoma wakaora, muviri wekunze wakaparadzwa, tende rakaputswa → uye pakupedzisira rakadzokera kuguruva.

2 "Munhu mutsva" anorarama nekururama kwaMwari → anovandudzwa uye akavakwa muna Kristu kuburikidza ne "Mweya Mutsvene", anovandudzwa zuva nezuva, uye "anokura" → azere nechimiro chaKristu → Kristu anodzoka uye anoonekwa mukati mbiri. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo - 2 VaKorinte 4:16-18

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: “Kuparadzana” Testamente Itsva inoparadzaniswa neTestamente Yekare
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 1 VaKorinte 11, ndima 24-25, tiverenge pamwe chete: Akati avonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu wakamedurirwa imi. “Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu. Nguva dzose kana muchinwa mauri, itai izvi muchindirangarira.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "siyana" Aihwa. 2 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi ** neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro riri vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti Ishe Jesu akashandisa ropa rake kugadzira “Sungano Itsva” nesu kuti tiruramiswe uye tigamuchire zita revanakomana vaMwari. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Testamende Yekare

( 1 ) Sungano yeMutemo waAdhamu → Sungano yeHupenyu neRufu

Jehovha Mwari akarayira Adhamu achiti, "Ungadya hako miti yose yomumunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo." — Genesisi 2:16-17

( 2 ) Sungano yaNoa yomurarabungu

Mwari akati: “Pane chiratidzo chesungano yangu isingaperi pakati pangu nemi nechisikwa chose chipenyu chinemi. Ndinoisa muraraungu mugore, uye uchava chiratidzo chesungano pakati pangu nenyika.”— Genesisi Genesisi Chitsauko 9 Ndima 12-13 Cherechedza: Chibvumirano chemurarabungu → isungano yerugare → "sungano isingaperi" → inomiririra "sungano itsva" iyo Jesu anoita nesu, inova sungano isingaperi.

( 3 ) Chibvumirano chaAbrahama cheKutenda

Jehovha akataurawo naye, akati, Munhu uyu haangavi mudyi wenhaka yako; "Iye akati kwaari, "Ndizvo zvichaita vana vako." Abhuramu "akatenda" Jehovha, Jehovha akamuti ndiko kururama kwake. — Genesisi 15:4-6 . Cherechedza: Sungano yaAbhurahama → sungano “yekutenda” → “chipikirwa” → “kururamiswa” ne“kutenda”.

( 4 ) Sungano yeMutemo waMosesi

Mirayiro Gumi, Mitemo, uye Mitongo” → Mosesi akashevedza “vaIsraeri vose” akati kwavari: “Haiwa vaIsraeri, inzwai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa zvandiri kukupai nhasi, kuti muzvidzidze nokuzviita. Jehovha Mwari wedu akaita sungano nesu paGomo reHorebhi “sungano” iyi haina kuitwa nemadzitateguru edu, asi nesu vapenyu nhasi uno— Dheuteronomio 5:1-3 .

[Cherechedza]: "Testamente Yekare" → inosanganisira 1 Chibvumirano cheMutemo waAdhamu, 2 Chibvumirano cheMuraravungu weRugare chaNowa chaimiririra Sungano Itsva, 3 Chibvumirano cheKutenda-Chipikirwa chaAbrahama, 4 Sungano yeMutemo waMosesi yakaitwa nevaIsraeri.

Nekuda kweutera hwenyama yedu, hatikwanisi kuzadzisa "kururama kwemurairo", ndiko kuti, "mirairo, zviga, nezviga" zvemurairo kutadza kuita izvi kutyora chibvumirano.

1 Mitemo yapfuura yakanga isina simba uye isina maturo → saka yakabviswa

Mitemo yekare yakabviswa nokuti yakanga isina simba uye isingabatsiri - VaHebheru 7:18 → Isaya 28:18 .

2 Mutemo hauna chaunowana → inofanira kuchinjwa

(Mutemo hauna chawakaita) nokudaro tichisuma tariro iri nani yatinogona kupinda nayo pamberi paMwari. VaHebheru 7:19 → Zvino upristi hwashandurwa, murairo unofanira kushandurwawo. — VaHebheru 7:12

3 Kukanganisa muchibvumirano chekare → Ita sungano itsva

Dai pasina kukanganisa musungano yekutanga, pangadai pasina nzvimbo yekutsvaga chibvumirano chekupedzisira. Naizvozvo, Jehovha akatsiura vanhu vake uye akati (kana kuti rakashandurwa: Naizvozvo Jehovha akanongedzera kukukanganisa kwesungano yokutanga): “Mazuva anouya andichaita sungano itsva neimba yaIsraeri uye neimba yaJudha; kwete sezvandakabata madzibaba avo noruoko ndikavatungamirira, ndakaita sungano navo pakubuda kwangu muEgipita, nekuti havana kuchengeta sungano yangu, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha.

Testamende Itsva

( 1 ) Jesu akaita sungano itsva nesu neropa rake

Zvandakaparidza kwamuri ndizvo zvandakagamuchira kubva kuna She nousiku hwaakapandukirwa, Ishe Jesu akatora chingwa, akavonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa. iwe.” Mipumburu yekare: yakaputsika) itai izvi muchindirangarira. Mushure mokudya, akatora mukombe, akati, "Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu. Izvi ndizvo zvamunofanira kuita nguva dzose kana muchiunwa, muchirangarira." ini. ”— 1 VaKorinde 11:23-25

( 2 ) Magumo emurairo ndiKristu

“Iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita navo mushure memazuva iwayo, ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe: Ndichanyora mirairo yangu pamwoyo yavo, uye ndichaiisa mukati mavo uye kudarika kwavo zvakanganwirwa, hapasisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi. -- VaHebheru 10:16-18 → Jehovha akatiwo: “Iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita neimba yaIsraeri shure kwemazuva iwayo: Ndichaisa mitemo yangu mukati mavo, uye ndichainyora pamwoyo yavo yavo Mwari; ivo vachava vanhu vangu; kusarurama, uye musarangarirazve zvivi zvavo.

Sezvo tichitaura nezve“sungano itsva”, tinorangarira “sungano yekare” se“yekare” asi chiri kuchembera nokuderera chichakurumidza kunyangarika. — VaHebheru 8:10-13

( 3 ) Jesu ndiye Murevereri weSungano Itsva

Nokuda kwechikonzero ichi, akava murevereri wesungano itsva. Ani naani anonyora wiri yenhaka anofanira kumirira kusvikira munhu akasiya chitenderano chacho afa; zvichabatsira here? — VaHebheru 9:15-17

Vana vangu vaduku, zvinhu izvi ndinokunyorerai kuti murege kutadza. Kana munhu achitadza, tine Murevereri kuna Baba, Jesu Kristu wakarurama . — 1 Johani chitsauko 2 ndima 1

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: Kuparadzana Chiedza nerima zvinoparadzana
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Genesisi Chitsauko 1, ndima 3-4, tiverenge pamwe chete: Mwari akati, "Chiedza ngachivepo," chiedza chikavapo. Mwari akaona kuti chiedza chakanga chakanaka, uye akaparadzanisa chiedza nerima.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "siyana" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi, iro rakanyorwa nokutaurwa nemaoko avo, vhangeri reruponeso nekubwinya kwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti chiedza chinoparadzaniswa nerima.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

chiedza nerima zvinoparadzana

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri, Genesisi Chitsauko 1, ndima 1-5, todziverenga pamwe chete: Pakutanga, Mwari akasika denga nenyika. Nyika yakanga isina kugadzirwa uye isina chinhu, uye rima rakanga riri pamusoro pegomba risina chigadziko, asi Mweya waMwari wakanga uri pamusoro pemvura. Mwari akati, "Chiedza ngachivepo," chiedza chikavapo. Mwari akaona kuti chiedza chakanga chakanaka, uye akaparadzanisa chiedza nerima. Mwari akatumidza chiedza kuti "masikati," uye rima akaritumidza kuti "usiku." Madekwana ariko, namangwanani aripo.

(1) Jesu ndiye chiedza chechokwadi, chiedza choupenyu hwomunhu

Jesu akabva ati kumapoka evanhu, “Ndini chiedza chenyika. Ani naani anonditevera haangatongofambi murima, asi achava nechiedza choupenyu.”— Johani 8:12

Mwari chiedza, uye maari hamuna rima zvachose. Iri ndiro shoko ratakanzwa kubva kuna Jehovha uye ratidzosa kwamuri. — 1 Johani 1:5

Maari maiva noupenyu, uye upenyu uhu hwaiva chiedza chavanhu. …Chiedza ichocho ndicho chiedza chechokwadi, chinovhenekera vose vanogara munyika. —Johani 1:4, 9

[Ona]: Pakutanga Mwari akasika denga nenyika. Nyika yakanga isina kugadzirwa uye isina chinhu, rima rakanga riri pamusoro pegomba risina chigadziko, asi Mweya waMwari wakanga uri pamusoro pemvura. Mwari akati: “Chiedza ngachivepo”, chiedza chikavapo → “Chiedza” zvinoreva upenyu, chiedza choupenyu → Jesu ndiye “chiedza chechokwadi” uye “upenyu” → Ndiye chiedza choupenyu hwomunhu, uye upenyu maari, uye upenyu uhu munhu Chiedza chaJesu → Chero ani anotevera Jesu haazombofambi murima, asi achava nechiedza cheupenyu → "upenyu hwaJesu"! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Saka Mwari akasika denga nenyika nezvinhu zvose → Mwari akati: “Ngakuve nechiedza”, uye chiedza chikavapo. Mwari akaona kuti chiedza chakanga chakanaka, akaparadzanisa chiedza nerima.

(2) Unotenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana weChiedza

Johane 12:36 Tendai kuchiedza muchinacho, kuti muve vana vechiedza. ” Jesu akati ataura izvi, akabva pavari akandohwanda.

1 VaTesaronika 5:5 Imi mose muri vana vechiedza, vana vamasikati. Hatizi veusiku, kana verima;

Asi imi muri rudzi rwakasanangurwa, uprista hwoumambo, rudzi rutsvene, vanhu vaMwari chaivo, kuti muparidze kunaka kwaiye akakudanai kuti mubve murima muuye kuchiedza chake chinoshamisa. —1 Petro 2:9

[Cherechedza]: Jesu “chiedza” → tinotevera “Jesu” → tinotevera chiedza → tinova vana vechiedza! Ameni. → Asi imi muri rudzi rwakasanangurwa, uprista hwamambo, rudzi rutsvene, vanhu vaMwari, kuti muparidze “evhangeri” kunaka kwaiye wakakudanai kuti mubve murima mupinde muchiedza chake chinoshamisa.

→Ishe Jesu Kristu ruponeso. → Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Ndakauya panyika sechiedza, kuti ani naani anotenda mandiri haangatongogari murima.”— Johane 12:46

(3)Rima

Chiedza chinovhenekera murima, asi rima harigamuchiri chiedza. — Johani 1:5

Kana munhu achiti ari muchiedza, asi achivenga hama yake, achiri murima. Uyo unoda hama yake unogara muchiedza, hapane chigumbuso maari. Asi uyo anovenga hama yake ari murima uye anofamba murima asingazivi kwaanoenda, nokuti rima rakamupofumadza. — 1 Johane 2:9-11

Chiedza chakasvika munyika, asi vanhu vakada rima panzvimbo yechiedza nokuti mabasa avo akaipa. Mumwe nomumwe anoita zvakaipa anovenga chiedza, uye haauyi pachiedza, kuti mabasa ake arege kutsiurwa. — Johani 3:19-20

[Cherechedza]: Chiedza chinopenya murima, asi rima harigamuchiri chiedza → Jesu ndiye "Chiedza". Kusagamuchira "Jesu" → zvinoreva kusagamuchira "chiedza" Vari kufamba mu "rima" uye havazivi kwavari kuenda. →Saka Ishe Jesu akati: "Meso ako mwenje pamuviri wako. Kana maziso ako akajeka →" maziso ako emweya akasvinudzwa → unoona Jesu", muviri wako wese uchapenya; kana maziso ako akasviba uye iwe " usina kuona Jesu”, muviri wako wose uchava nerima. . Naizvozvo zviongorore, kuti kurege kuva nerima mauri. Kana pane chiedza mumuviri wako wose, uye pasina rima zvachose, uchajeka kwazvo, sekupenya. remwenje.” Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here? Chirevo-Ruka 11:34-36

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: Kugadzirisa matambudziko: Pauro, Petro, Johani, Jakobho uye Mutemo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 7 ndima 6 tiverenge pamwe chete: Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro wakanga unotisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe nomweya mutsva (mweya: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare tsika.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana nevaHedeni "Siya Mutemo - kana Chengeta Mutemo" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi ** neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro riri vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti vose vaHedheni navaJudha vanofanira kuputsa murayiro uye vagofa kumurayiro;

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Jakobho neMutemo

1 Jakobho akanga achishingairira murayiro

Jakobho ... akati kuna Pauro, “Hama, ona kuti zviuru zvingani zvevaJudha vakatenda munaShe, uye vose “vanoshingairira murayiro.” Vakanzwa vanhu vachiti, “Iwe wakadzidzisa vaJudha vose kusiya Mosesi, uye imi makavadzidzisa. Akati, "Musadzingisa vana venyu, uye musatevera zvakatemwa. Munhu wose achanzwa kuti muri kuuya. Muchaita sei? - Mabasa 21, 20-22.

2 Jacob akapa 4 mirairo kuvaHedeni semaonero ake

“Naizvozvo → “Mukuona kwangu” musanetsa Vemamwe Marudzi vanoteerera Mwari; asi vanyorerei, muchivarayira kuti varege → 1 kusachena kwezvidhori, 2 upombwe, 3 mhuka dzakadzipwa, uye 4 ropa. Mabasa 15:19-20

3 Jakobho anoudza Pauro kuti ateerere mutemo

Ingoita sezvatinotaura! Isu tiri vana pano, uye tese tine zvatinoshuvira. Uvatore uende navo ugovachenesa pamwe chete navo. Nenzira iyi munhu wose achaziva kuti zvaakanzwa pamusoro pako inhema uye kuti iwe pachako uri munhu ane tsika dzakanaka uye anochengeta murayiro. — Mabasa 21:23-24

4 Kana ukatyora mutemo mumwe chete, unotyora mitemo yese.

Nokuti ani naani anochengeta murayiro wose asi akagumburwa pane chimwe chete ane mhosva yokudarika yose. Reference-James Chitsauko 2 Ndima 10

bvunza: Ndiani oga akaisa mutemo?

mhinduro: Panongova nemupi wemitemo uye mutongi mumwe chete, “Mwari akarurama” anogona kuponesa nekuparadza. Iwe ndiwe ani kuti utonge vamwe? Chirevo-Jakobho 4:12

bvunza: Nokuti Mweya Mutsvene anosarudza nesu? Kana kuti “Jakobo” akaisa mirairo mina kuvaHedheni maererano nemaonero ake?

mhinduro: izvo mudzimu mutsvene unotaura → Kwete zvisingaenderani

Mweya Mutsvene anotaura pachena kuti munguva dzinouya vamwe vachatsauka kubva pakutenda vagotevera mweya inonyengera nedzidziso dzamadhimoni. Izvi zvinokonzerwa nounyengeri hwevarevi venhema vane hana dzakapiswa nesimbi inopisa. Vanorambidza kuroorana uye vachirega kudya, izvo Mwari akasika kuti avo vanotenda uye vanoziva chokwadi vagamuchire nokuonga. Zvose zvakasikwa naMwari zvakanaka kana zvikagamuchirwa nekutenda, hapana chinogona kurambwa neShoko raMwari uye nemunamato wemunhu. Chirevo - 1 Timotio 4 Ndima 1-5 naVaKorose 2 Ndima 20-23

→Maererano nemaonero ake, Jakobho akagadza "mirayiro mina" yeVemamwe Marudzi → 3 yacho ine chekuita nekudya uye 1 ine hukama nenyama. →Pane zvinhu zvisingagone kuitwa nekuda kweutera hwenyama →Mwari havakumbire "maHedeni" vari vana vaMwari kuti "vachengete" mirairo yavasingagoni kuchengeta. "Jakobho" haana kuinzwisisa kare, asi gare gare mu → "Kunyora Bhuku raJakobho", akanzwisisa kuda kwaMwari → Kwakanyorwa kuti: "Unofanira kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita." mutemo. Ndiani akazadzisa murayiro? Ndiani anochengeta mutemo? Haazi Kristu here, Mwanakomana waMwari? Kristu akazadzisa murairo akachengeta murairo ini ndinogara muna Kristu ~ ndinotenda kuti kana akauzadzisa, isu tichauzadzisa, uye kana akauchengeta, isu tichauchengeta. Ameni, izvi zviri pachena kwamuri here? …Nokuti ani naani anochengeta murayiro wose asi akagumburwa pane chimwe chete ane mhosva yokudarika yose. --Chiverengo-Jakobho 2:8,10

【2】Petro neMutemo

---Musaisa joko risingagoni kutakura pamitsipa yevadzidzi venyu---

Mwari akapupurawo kwavari, iye anoziva mwoyo yavanhu uye akavapa Mweya Mutsvene sezvaakapawo kwatiri, uye akanatsa mwoyo yavo nokutenda, asingavatsauri pakati pavo nesu. Nei zvino muchiedza Mwari kuisa joko pamitsipa yevadzidzi vake risisingagoni kutakura madzibaba edu kana isu? Isu tinoponeswa nenyasha dzaIshe Jesu, saivo. ”Tora chikamu—Mabasa 15:8-11

bvunza: Chii chinonzi "joko risingatakurike"?

mhinduro: Vatendi vashomanana chete, avo vaiva nhengo dzeboka revaFarisi, ndivo vakasimuka vakati: “Munofanira kudzingisa → 1 Vemamwe Marudzi uye muvarayira → 2 “teererai mutemo waMosesi.” ( Mabasa 15:5 ) Nongedzero yaMabasa 15:5

【3】Johani nemurairo

--teerera mirairo yaMwari--

Tinoziva kuti tinomuziva kana tichichengeta mirayiro yake. Uyo anoti, “Ndinomuziva,” asi asingachengeti mirayiro yake, murevi wenhema, uye chokwadi hachizi maari. Chirevo - 1 Johane Chitsauko 2 Ndima 3-4

Kana tichida Mwari uye tichichengeta mirayiro yake, tichaziva kuti tinoda vana vaMwari. Tinoda Mwari nokuchengeta mirayiro yake, uye mirayiro yake hairemi. Chirevo - 1 Johane 5 ndima 2-3

[Cherechedza]: Tinoda Mwari kana tichichengeta mirairo Yake

bvunza: Mirairo chii? Mitemo ine Gumi yaMosesi here?

mhinduro: 1 Ida Mwari, 2 Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe → Iyi mirairo miviri ndiyo pfupiso yemutemo wese nevaporofita. "Nhungamiro - Mateo Chitsauko 22 Ndima 40 → Pfupiso yomutemo ndi" Kristu" - References VaRoma Chitsauko 10 Ndima 4 → Kristu ndi“Mwari” → Mwari ndiye “Shoko” → Pakutanga kwaiva ne“Shoko”, uye “Shoko” ndi“Mwari” → Mwari ndi“Jesu” → “Anoda muvakidzani wake sezvaanozviita” uye anotipa “nzira” youpenyu hwake Nenzira iyi, pfupiso yomutemo ndiKristu → patinochengeta mweya wemutemo → tinochengeta "nzira" → Ingoitevera “Mirairo” yaMwari → “Kuchengeta shoko” kunoreva “kuchengeta mirairo.” Vana vaMwari vakazvarwa patsva vanogara muna Kristu vari kuchengeta shoko, kwete mashoko anouraya vanhu/kune ani zvake ari pamurairo vose vakatukwa Ona vaGaratiya 3:10-11.

【4】Guarantee Ruo uye Mutemo

1 akafa kumurayiro

Saka, hama dzangu, “makafa kumurayiro” kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu, kuitira kuti mugova vamwe, kuna iye akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, kuti tiberekere Mwari zvibereko. —VaRoma 7:4

2 kufa kumurayiro

Nokuda kwomurayiro “ndakafa kumurayiro” kuti ndirarame kuna Mwari. — VaGaratiya 2:19

3 Vakafa kumutemo unotisunga → kusunungurwa kubva kumutemo

Asi sezvo takafa kumutemo waitisunga, zvino ta“sunungurwa pamurairo” kuti tigone kubatira Jehovha mukuwirirana nohutsva hwomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa soMudzimu Mutsvene) uye kwete mukuwirirana netsika yekare. Muenzaniso. —VaRoma 7:6

bvunza: Sei uchityora mutemo?

mhinduro: Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama → " kuchiva kwenyama "→" Ndizvo nokuti " mutemo "Uye →" born "Zvido zvakaipa zvinoiswa munhengo dzedu → "Kuzvida kunoitwa" → "mimba" inotanga → Kana zvishuvo zvoudyire zvave nepamuviri → "Chivi" chinoberekwa → "Chivi" chinokura → "Rufu" runoberekwa → kunotungamirira kumuchero yerufu.

Saka iwe unofanirwa kutiza →" kufa ", tinofanira kuenda →" mhosva "Unoda kuenda →" mhosva ", tinofanira kuenda →" mutemo “Munonzwisisa here izvi zvakajeka? Tarisai kuna VaRoma 7:4-6 naJakobho 1:15

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

2021.06.10

articles.title: (7) Kubva pauri
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 3-4 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kubatana" Aihwa. 7 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi, iro rakanyorwa nokutaurwa nemaoko avo, vhangeri reruponeso nekubwinya kwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti ndakaroverwa, ndikafa, ndikavigwa, uye ndikamutswa pamwe chete naKristu Nenzira iyi, ndakasiya munhu wangu wekare → zvino ndava kurarama naKristu. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

(1) Akaberekwa naMwari;

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Kana Kristu ari mamuri, muviri wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya mupenyu nokuda kwokururama. —VaRoma 8:9-10

[Cherechedza]: Kana Mweya waMwari, “Mweya Mutsvene” uchigara mukati memoyo yenyu, imi hamusi “wenyama inobva kuna Adhamu, yakaberekwa navabereki”;

bvunza: Chii chakaberekwa naMwari?

mhinduro: 1 kubva kuMweya Mutsvene, 2 vakazvarwa nechokwadi chevhangeri. 3 Akazvarwa naMwari. → Ava ndivo avo vasina kuberekwa neropa, kana nokuchiva, kana nokuda kwomunhu, asi naMwari. Chirevo - Johane 1:13

bvunza: Chii chinobva muupenyu?

mhinduro: Vazukuru vaAdhamu naEvha → Kubatanidzwa kwomurume nomukadzi “akaberekwa nevabereki vake” kunobva muupenyu hwomunhu. →Kubva mumuviri womunhu noupenyu, sezvakataurwa nomuapostora “Pauro” → muviri worufu, muviri unofa, muviri unoora, muviri usina kuchena uye usina kuchena wechivi → muapostora “Petro” akati → nokuti: “Nyama yose vose vachafanana nouswa; kunaka kwake kwose kwakafanana namaruva ouswa;

(2) Upenyu hwedu hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari

Nokuti “makafa” → “upenyu hwenyu” hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. — VaKorose 3:3-4

Hama dzinodiwa, isu tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichava munguva yemberi hazvisati zvaratidzwa; — 1 Johani 3:2

(3) Upenyu hwedu hunomutswa naKristu uye togara pamwe chete kudenga

Akatimutsa uye akatigarisa pamwe chete nesu munzvimbo dzokudenga muna Kristu Jesu, kuitira kuti kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera aratidze pfuma huru kwazvo yenyasha dzake, nounyoro hwake kwatiri muna Kristu Jesu. — VaEfeso 2:6-7

bvunza: Hupenyu hwedu hwekumuka naKristu huripi iko zvino →?

mhinduro: munaKristu

bvunza: Kristu aripi zvino?

mhinduro: "Kudenga, agere kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba" → Upenyu hwedu hwakamutswa naKristu kudenga, muna Kristu, uye hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari → Kristu agere kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba, uye isu tiri akagara naye muruoko rworudyi rwaBaba Mwari! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Chiverengo - VaKorose Chitsauko 3:4 → Vadikani, tiri vana vaMwari zvino, uye zvatichazova zvichigere kuratidzwa; Iye sezvaAri. Chirevo - 1 Johane 3:2

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

2021.06.09

articles.title: (6) Kubva munyika
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaGaratia chitsauko 6 ndima 14 tiverenge pamwe chete: Asi handingazvirumbidzi kunze kwomumuchinjikwa waIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, uyo kubudikidza nawo nyika yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa kwandiri, uye ini kunyika. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kubatana" Aihwa. 6 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka 【chechi】 Tumirai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Nyika yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa kwandiri; .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

(1) Nyika yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa

Asi handingazvirumbidzi kunze kwomumuchinjikwa waIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, uyo kubudikidza nawo nyika yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa kwandiri, uye ini kunyika. — VaGaratiya 6:14

Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu kuti atiponese kubva panguva ino yakaipa, maererano nokuda kwaMwari wedu uye Baba vedu. — VaGaratiya 1:4

Mubvunzo: Sei nyika yarovererwa pamuchinjikwa?

Mhinduro: Nokuti nyika yakasikwa “kuburikidza” naJesu, Ishe wezvisikwa, akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa → Nyika haina kurovererwa pamuchinjikwa here?

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. Zvinhu zvose zvakaitwa naye; kunze kwake hakuna kana chinhu chakaitwa pane izvo zvakaitwa. — Johani 1:1-3

Johani 1:10 Akanga ari munyika, uye kunyange nyika yakaitwa kubudikidza naye, nyika haina kumuziva.

1 Johane 4:4 Vana vaduku, imi, muri vaMwari, makavakunda; nokuti uyo, uri mamuri, mukuru kunaiye, uri munyika.

(2) Isu tiri vaMwari;

Tinoziva kuti tiri vaMwari uye kuti nyika yose iri musimba rowakaipa. — 1 Johani 5:19

Zvichenjererei kuti murege kuita sebenzi, asi sevakachenjera. shandisai nguva, nekuti mazuva ano akaipa. Usave benzi, asi nzwisisa kuti kuda kwaShe kwakadini. — VaEfeso 5:15-17

[Cherechedza]: Nyika yose iri musimba rowakaipa, uye nguva ino yakaipa; Chirevo - VaGaratiya Chitsauko 1 Vhesi 4

Ishe Jesu akati: “Isu “takaberekwa naMwari” hatisi venyika ino, saIshe asiri wenyika ino → ndakavapa “shoko renyu.” Uye nyika inovavenga, nokuti havasi venyika. Handisi wenyika, asi kuti muvabvise panyika, asi kuti muvadzivirire pane akaipa. Havazi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika . Chiverengo - Johane 17 14. -16 mapfundo

Imwi muri vaMwari vana vaduku, uye makavakunda, nekuti uyo, uri mamuri, mukuru kunaiye uri munyika. Ivo ndevenyika, naizvozvo vanotaura zvinhu zvenyika, uye nyika inovanzwa. Isu tiri vaMwari, uye vaya vanoziva Mwari vachatiteerera; Kubva pane izvi tinogona kuziva mweya wechokwadi uye mweya wekukanganisa. Chirevo-1 Johane 4:4-6

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

2021.06.11

articles.title: (5) Kupukunyuka pasimba repasi rerima raSatani
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaKorose chitsauko 1 ndima 13 tiverenge pamwe chete: Akatinunura pasimba rerima uye akatiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda;

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kubatana" Aihwa. 5 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi, iro rakanyorwa nokutaurwa nemaoko avo, vhangeri reruponeso nekubwinya kwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti rudo rwaMwari “runotiponesa” kubva kuna Satani nepasimba rerima neHadhesi, Tishandure muumambo hweMwanakomana wake waanoda . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

(1) Kusununguka pakufurirwa naSatani

Tinoziva kuti tiri vaMwari uye kuti nyika yose iri musimba rowakaipa. — 1 Johani 5:19

Ndinokutuma kwavari, kuti meso avo asvinudzwe, vatendeuke kubva murima, vaende kuchiedza, nokubva pasimba raSatani, vauye kuna Mwari; vanoitwa vatsvene. ’”— Mabasa 26:18

[Cherechedza]: Ishe Jesu akatuma “Pauro” kunoparidza evhangeri kuvaHedheni → kuti maziso avo asvinudzwe → kureva kuti “meso omudzimu akasvinudzwa” → kuona evhangeri yaJesu Kristu → kutendeuka kubva murima kuenda kuchiedza, kubva musimba raSatani kuna Mwari; uye nokuti Tenda muna Jesu uye ugogamuchira kanganwiro yezvivi uye ugovane nhaka naavo vose vakaitwa vatsvene. Ameni

bvunza: Kutiza sei simba raSatani?

mhinduro: Akatiwo, “Ndichavimba naye.” Akatiwo, “Tarirai, ini navana vandakapiwa naMwari, sezvo vana vachigoverana muviri mumwe chete wenyama neropa, naiyewo “iye akava” nyama neropa , kunyanya kuburikidza ne "rufu" → paradza uyo ane simba rerufu, kureva dhiyabhorosi, uye asunungure avo vakaiswa muuranda hupenyu hwavo hwose nekuda kwekutya rufu. Reference-VaHebheru Chitsauko 2 Ndima 13-15

(2) Kupukunyuka musimba rerima reHadhesi

Mapisarema 30:3 Haiwa Jehovha, makabudisa mweya wangu kubva muHadhesi uye makandichengeta ndiri mupenyu kuti ndirege kuburukira kugomba.

Hosiya 13:14 Ndichavadzikinura → “muHadhesi” uye ndichavadzikinura → “parufu.” Iwe rufu, njodzi yako iripiko? Iwe Sheori, kuparadza kwako kuripi? Hapana zvachose kuzvidemba pamberi pemaziso angu.

1 Petro 2:9 Asi imi muri rudzi rwakasanangurwa, uprista hwamambo, rudzi rutsvene, vanhu vaMwari chaivo, kuti muparidze shoko raiye wakakudanai kuti mubve murima muuye mukunaka kwake kunoshamisa.

(3) Kutiendesa kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa

Akatinunura kubva pasimba rerima uye akatiendesa ku“umambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda” maari tinoregererwa uye zvivi zvedu zvinoregererwa. Ameni! Reference-VaKorose Chitsauko 1 Ndima 13-14

bvunza: Iye zvino tave muumambo hweMwanakomana anodiwa waMwari here?

mhinduro: Ehe! “Upenyu hutsva” hwatakaberekwa naMwari → hwatova muumambo hwoMwanakomana anodiwa waMwari → Akatimutsa uye akaita kuti tigare pamwe chete munzvimbo dzokudenga naKristu Jesu. Nokuti wakafa “ndiko kuti, upenyu hwekare hwakafa” → upenyu hwako “hwakaberekwa naMwari” hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo - VaKorose 3:3-4 naVaEfeso 2:6

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

2021.06.08

articles.title: (4) Kubvisa zvishuvo zvakaipa nezvishuvo zvenyama yekare yomunhu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaGaratia chitsauko 5 ndima 24 tiverenge pamwe chete: Avo vari vaKristu Jesu vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa nyama nokuchiva kwayo uye nezvainoshuva.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kubatana" Aihwa. 4 Taura uye unamate: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi, iro rakanyorwa nokutaurwa nemaoko avo, vhangeri reruponeso nekubwinya kwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Avo vari vaKristu Jesu vakasunungurwa kubva pakuchiva nokuchiva kwenyama . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

(1) Bvisa zvishuvo zvakaipa nezvishuvo zvenyama yekare yomunhu

bvunza: Ndezvipi zvishuvo zvakaipa nezvishuvo zvenyama?

mhinduro: Mabasa enyama ari pachena: upombwe, netsvina, novutere, nokunamata zvifananidzo, nouroyi, noruvengo, nokukakavara, negodo, nokutsamwa, nokupesana, nedzidziso dzakatsauka, negodo. Ndakagara ndakuudzai, uye ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. — VaGaratiya 5:19-21

Isu tose takanga tiri pakati pavo, tichiita kuchiva kwenyama, tichitevera kuchiva kwenyama nokwomwoyo, uye pakuzvarwa kwedu takanga tiri vana vokutsamwirwa savamwe vanhu. — VaEfeso 2:3

Naizvozvo urayai mitezo yenyu iri panyika, inoti: upombwe, netsvina, nokusachena, nokuchiva, nokuchiva, nokuchiva, kwakafanana nokunamata zvifananidzo. Nokuda kwaizvozvi, kutsamwa kwaMwari kuchauya pamusoro pavanakomana vokusateerera. Iwe wakaita izvi pawaigara muzvinhu izvi. Asi zvino munofanira kuramba zvinhu izvi zvose, nokutsamwa, nehasha, nokuvenga, nokutuka, nokutaura zvinonyadzisa zvinobva pamiromo yenyu. Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare nemiitiro yawo - VaKorose 3:5-9

[Cherechedza]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti → Kupinda mukuchiva kwenyama uye kutevera kuchiva kwenyama nemwoyo nemasikirwo vana vehasha → Vaya vanoita zvinhu izvi havazogari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. →Apo Jesu akafira vose, vose vakafa →"vose vakabvisa" nyama yomunhu akwegura nezvishuvo zvayo zvakaipa nezvishuvo. Nokudaro, Bhaibheri rinoti “makabvisa” munhu wekare nezviito zvawo “Uyo anotenda” akabvisa kuchiva kwenyama nokuchiva kwenyama . Rugwarowo runoti: Ani naani anotenda kwaari atopiwa mhosva, asi ani naani asingatendi atotongwa. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Tarisa kuna Johani 3:18

(2) Munhu mutsva akazvarwa kubva kuna Mwari ; Kwete wemudhara wenyama

VaRoma 8:9-10 Kana Mweya waMwari uchigara mamuri, imi hamuchisiri venyama, asi voMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Kana Kristu ari mamuri, muviri wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya mupenyu nokuda kwokururama.

[Cherechedza]: Kana Mweya waMwari "uchigara" mumoyo mako → iwe uchazvarwa patsva uye nekumutswa pamwe naKristu! → "Munhu mutsva" akazvarwa patsva haazi wemunhu wekare Adhamu akauya kunyama →asi ndeweMweya Mutsvene, Jesu Kristu, uye Mwari. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Kana Kristu ari mauri, “muviri” wemunhu wekare wakafa nokuda kwechivi, uye “mweya” mwoyo nokuti “Mweya Mutsvene” unogara matiri, zvinoreva kuti unorarama nekururama kwaMwari. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Nokuti “munhu [wedu] mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari akavanzwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari → “munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari → “haasi wake” → Adhamu wekare uye zvishuvo zvakaipa uye kuchiva kwenyama yomunhu wekare → saka “tine " zvakaparadzaniswa kubva kare Zvishuvo zvakaipa uye zvishuwo zvemunhu uye mutana. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: (3) Bvisa mukweguru nemaitiro ake
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 9 tiverenge pamwe chete: Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare namabasa ake. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Bvisa" Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi, iro rakanyorwa nokutaurwa nemaoko avo, vhangeri reruponeso nekubwinya kwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, ndikafa, ndikavigwa pamwe chete naKristu → Ndakasiya munhu wekare nezviito zvake. Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

(1) Kubvisa murume mukuru

Mubvunzo: Takabvisa riini harahwa?

Mhinduro: Zvinoratidza kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira; Uye vose vakafa → uye vose vakasunungurwa pachivi. Saka Kristu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu uye akavigwa → 1 akasununguka kubva kuchivi, 2 akasununguka kubva pamurairo uye kutukwa kwemurairo, 3 kusunungurwa kubva muupenyu hwechivi hwemunhu wekare Adhamu. Naizvozvo, Jesu Kristu akarovererwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu uye akavigwa → Nenzira iyi, isu "takato" kubvisa munhu wekare. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Kusiya maitiro ekare

Mubvunzo: Ndeapi maitiro emudhara?

Mhinduro: Mabasa enyama ari pachena: hupombwe, netsvina, novutere, nokunamata zvifananidzo, nouroyi, noruvengo, nokukakavara, nogodo, nokutsamwa, nokupesana, nedzidziso dzakatsauka, nokugodorana. Ndakagara ndakuudzai, uye ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. Chirevo - VaGaratiya Chitsauko 5 Ndima 19-21

Mubvunzo: Tinobvisa sei maitiro emudhara?

Mhinduro: Avo vari vaKristu Jesu “vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa” nyama nokuchiva kwayo nokuchiva kwayo. →Izwi rokuti "kare" pano rinoreva kuti Kristu akarovererwa uye akafa. Sezvo zvakaitika → ndinotenda kuti takarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, takafa uye takavigwa pamwe chete naKristu → mufambiro wedu wekare uye wekare . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Verenga VaGaratiya 5:24

(3) Pfekai munhu mutsva uye mupfeke Kristu

Mubvunzo: Harahwa yaramwa, zvino pfeka → hupenyu hwemuviri waani?

Mhinduro: Pfeka “muviri usingaori neupenyu” hwaJesu Kristu

Pfeka munhu mutsva. Munhu mutsva anovandudzwa muzivo mumufananidzo woMusiki wake. Chirevo - VaKorose Chitsauko 3 Vhesi 10

Uye pfekai munhu mutsva, akasikwa nomufananidzo waMwari mukururama kwechokwadi noutsvene. Reference-VaEfeso Chitsauko 4 Vhesi 24

VaGaratia 3:27 Nokuti imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu.

[Cherechedza]: "Pfeka" itsva → "bvisa" yekare muviri mutsva nehupenyu hwaKristu → "Muviri wekare waAdhamu uye hupenyu hwakafanana nehwenyika, uye muviri wekunze unoshatiswa uye unoparadzwa zvishoma nezvishoma nekuda kweruchiva; ", uye pakupedzisira murume wekare "anoverengera" The shed "inobvisa pachayo uye inodzokera kuguruva."

Uye takapfeka " Newcomer "→ Hongu" live "Muna Kristu → Iye akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari, kuburikidza" Mweya Mutsvene "Kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva → Kristu paanoonekwa, hupenyu hwedu huchaonekwa naKristu mukubwinya. Ameni! Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here? Reference - 2 VaKorinte 4:16 naVaKorose 3:3

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: (2) Kusununguka kubva pamurairo nechituko chemurairo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 7 uye ndima 6 tiverenge pamwe chete: Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro wakanga unotisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe nomweya mutsva (mweya: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare tsika.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Detachment" Chapter 2 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka 【Chechi】Tumira vashandi kunze kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → 1 kusunungurwa kubva pamurayiro. 2 wakasununguka kubva kuchivi. 3 kubva pakurwadziwa kwerufu, 4 Akatiza pakutongwa kwekupedzisira. Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

(1) Kuchiva kwenyama → kunobereka chivi kuburikidza nemutemo

Ngatidzidzei muna VaRoma 7:5 muBhaibheri, nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, kuchiva kwakaberekwa nomurayiro kwakanga kuchishanda mumitezo yedu, kuchibereka chibereko chorufu.

Kana kuchiva kuchinge kwaumbwa, kunobereka chivi; — Jakobho 1:15

[Cherechedza]: Patinenge tiri munyama → “tinochiva” → “kuchiva kwenyama” kuchiva kwakaipa → nokuti → “mutemo” unoitwa munhengo dzedu → “kuchiva kunoitwa” → “pamuviri” panotanga, uye nokukurumidza kuchiva vanova nepamuviri → vanobereka kana chivi chasvika, chivi, kana chakura, chinobereka rufu, ndiko kuti, chinobereka chibereko chorufu. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Mubvunzo: “Chivi” chinobvepi?

Mhinduro: "Chivi" → patinenge tiri munyama → "kuchiva kwenyama" → nekuda kwe "mutemo", "kuchiva kunomutswa" munhengo dzedu → "kuchiva kunomuka" → kutanga "kuva nepamuviri" → sezvo kuchiva kunobata pamuviri → vanobereka chivi. "Chivi" "chakazvarwa" nekuda kweruchiva + mutemo →. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika kwomutemo; Ona VaRoma chitsauko 4 ndima 15, chitsauko 5 ndima 13 uye chitsauko 7 ndima 8 .

(2) Simba rechivi mutemo, uye rumborera rwerufu chivi.

Die! Simba rako rekukunda riripi?

Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi?

Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo. — 1 VaKorinte 15:55-56 . Cherechedza: Rumborera rwerufu → chivi, mubairo wechivi → rufu, uye simba rechivi → mutemo. Saka, unoziva here hukama huri pakati pevatatu ava?

Pane "mutemo" pane → "chivi", uye kana pane "chivi" pane → "rufu". Saka Bhaibheri rinoti → pasina mutemo, hapana “kudarika” → “pasina kudarika” → hapana kuputswa kwomutemo → hapana kuputswa kwomutemo → hapana chivi, “pasina chivi” → hapana rumborera rworufu “. , unonyatsonzwisisa here?

(3) Rusununguko kubva kumutemo uye chituko chemutemo

Asi sezvo takafa kumutemo waitisunga, zvino ta“sunungurwa pamurairo” kuti tigone kubatira Jehovha mukuwirirana nohutsva hwomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa soMudzimu Mutsvene) uye kwete mukuwirirana netsika yekare. Muenzaniso. —VaRoma 7:6

VaGaratia 2:19 Nokuti nomurayiro ndakafa kumurayiro, kuti ndirarame kuna Mwari. → nemiwo makafa kumurairo nomuviri waKristu, kuti muve vamwe, iye wakamutswa kuvakafa, kuti tiberekere Mwari zvibereko. —VaRoma 7:4

Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, nokuva chituko nokuda kwedu;

[Onai]: Muapostora Pauro akati: “Ndakafa kumutemo nokuda kwomutemo → 1 “Ndakafa kumutemo” nomuviri waKristu → 2 “Ndakafa kumutemo” → 3 mumutemo akandisunga Ndafa.

bvunza: “Chinangwa” chekufira mutemo ndechei?

mhinduro: Wakasununguka kubva pamurairo nekutukwa kwawo.

Mupostori “Pauro” akati → Ndakarovererwa uye ndikafa naKristu → 1 wakasununguka kubva kuchivi. 2 “Makasununguka pamurayiro nekutuka kwomurayiro here?

Saka pane chete: 1 kusunungurwa pamurairo → kusunungurwa pachivi; 2 Kusununguka kubva kuchivi → kusununguka kubva pasimba remutemo; 3 Kusunungurwa kubva pasimba remutemo → kusunungurwa kubva pakutongwa kwemutemo; 4 Kusunungurwa kubva pakutongwa kwemurairo → kusunungurwa kubva parumborera rwerufu. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

2021.06.05

Nhasi ndichadzidza, nekuyanana, nekugoverana nemi mose "Kubatana" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu nokubwinya. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Kunzwisisa vhangeri nemuchinjikwa waKristu → kunotisunungura kubva kuchivi. Mazvita Ishe Jesu nerudo rwunopfuura ruzivo!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

(1) Chivi chii?

mhinduro: 1 Kudarika murairo chivi; 2 Chinhu chose chisina kururama chivi.

Naizvozvo → kana tichirarama noMweya, ngatifambewo noMweya → na " Mweya Mutsvene “Urayai mabasa ose akaipa omuviri, kwete nokuchengeta murayiro. Munonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

(2) Mubairo wechivi rufu

Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. — VaRoma 6:23

Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza. … Sezvo chivi sezvachakatonga parufu, saizvozvo nyasha dzinotongawo kubudikidza nokururama kuupenyu husingaperi naJesu Kristu Ishe wedu. —VaRoma 5:12, 21

[Cherechedza]: " mhosva “Kubva kuna Adhamu wokutanga → Munhu mumwe akapinda munyika, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi → nokuti mubayiro wechivi rufu → “Chivi” chakatonga murufu → uye rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose, nokuti vose vakatadza; Nyasha dzinobata ushe kubudikidza nokururama kuupenyu husingaperi munaKristu norudzikinuro rwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.

(3) tsamba Vhangeri rinotisunungura kubva kuzvivi

Varoma 6:5-7 BDMCS - Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo pamwe chete naye mukumuka kwake, tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuitira kuti muviri wechivi ugopiwa simba. kuti tiparadzwe, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe.

articles.title: Nzombe yakagumburwa, uye Uza akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti atsigire areka yesungano
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 1 Makoronike 139 tiverenge pamwe chete: Pavakasvika paburiro reKetoni (Nagoni muna 2 Samueri 6:6), Uza akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti abate areka nokuti nzombe yakanga yagumburwa.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Nzombe yakagumburwa Usa Yi akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti abate Areka yesungano. 》Munamato: Baba voKudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. " Mukadzi ane hunhu “Tumirai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi, rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu rinounzwa kubva kudenga, richipiwa kwatiri nenguva yakafanira, kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu huwande. Jesu anogara achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye anovhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri nekutigonesa kuona nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya→ Nzwisisa yambiro yaUza uyo akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti atsigire areka yesungano mushure mokunge hando yagumburwa. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1 Makoronike 13:7, 9-11

Vakatora areka yaMwari kubva mumba maAbhinadhabhu vakaiisa pangoro itsva. Uza naAhio vakafambisa ngoro. … Pavakasvika paburiro reKetoni (ndiro Nagoni muna 2 Samueri 6:6), Uza akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti abate areka nokuti nzombe dzakanga dzagumburwa. Jehovha akamutsamwira, akamuuraya, nekuti akatambanudza ruoko rwake pamusoro peareka, akafa pamberi paMwari. Dhavhidhi akatambudzika nokuti Jehovha akanga auraya Uza, akatumidza nzvimbo iyo Perezi Uza kusvikira zuva ranhasi.

(1) VaIsraeri vaiva neMutemo waMosesi uye vaiita maererano nemitemo nemirau

bvunza: Nzombe yakagumburwa uye “yakakwakuka” → Zvakanga zvakaipa here kuti Uza atambanudzire Areka yesungano akabata Areka?
mhinduro: “Uza” haana kuteerera zvaidiwa noMutemo waMosesi → “akatakura areka yaMwari pamatanda nepamapfudzi” uye “akarangwa” → nokuti hamuna kutakura areka kare uye hamuna kubvunza Jehovha Mwari wedu maererano netsika yacho; saka iye Ranga (zvinyorwa zvekutanga ndezvokutiuraya) isu. Naizvozvo vapristi vaRevhi vakazvinatsa, kuti vakwire neareka yesungano yaJehovha, Mwari waIsiraeri; vanakomana vaRevhi vakatakura areka yaMwari pamafudzi avo namatanda, sezvakanga zvarairwa naJehovha nomuromo waMozisi. Chiverengo - 1 Makoronike 15 Chitsauko 13-15

bvunza: Uza aiva muzukuru waRevhi here?
mhinduro: Areka yaMwari “yakaiswa muimba yaAbhinadhabhi paGomo reKiriati-jearimi, mayakagara makore makumi maviri - verenga 1 Samueri 7:1-2, uye rakanga riri basa revaRevhi kuchengeta tabhenakeri ne“temberi”. 18 “Uza mwanakomana waAbhinadhabhi, uye mhuri yaAbhinadhabhi ine basa rokurinda Areka yeChipupuriro.

bvunza: “Areka yesungano” yakaiswa pa“ngoro itsva” no“kukweva nzombe” uye Uza akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti a“bate” Areka → Mitemoi yakatyorwa?
mhinduro: Asi ngoro kana nzombe hazvina kupiwa vanakomana vaKohati, nekuti vaibata basa reimba tsvene, vakatakura zvinhu zvitsvene pamafudzi avo. Verenga Numeri chitsauko 7 ndima 9 --- Nguva yokusimuka yasvika, Aroni nevanakomana vake vakanga vapedza kufukidza nzvimbo tsvene nemidziyo yayo yose batai zvinhu zvitsvene, kuti Zvirege kufa. Zvinhu izvi zvaiva mutabhenakeri zvaifanira kutakurwa nevanakomana vaKohati. Numeri 4:15→

Cherechedza: "Areka yeSungano" inomiririra Tsvene Tsvene uye chigaro chaMwari! Inofanira kukwidziridzwa, kusimudzwa pamatanda nemapfudzi ; Kana "Areka yeSungano" yaiswa pangoro itsva, vanhu vakareba kupfuura ngoro. Mwari akanyevera vaIsraeri naMambo Dhavhidhi kupfurikidza “nokutyisa” kwenzombe uye “kurangwa” kwaUza Pashure pechiitiko chaUza, Mambo Dhavhidhi akawedzera kuzvininipisa → Iniwo ndichazvininipisa ndokuzvininipisa mumeso angu pachangu - 2 Samueri Chitsauko 6. Vhesi 22. Saka Mwari akati, “Dhavhidhi murume anofarira mwoyo wangu—ona Mabasa 13 ndima 22 . Isu vateereri tinofanirawo kuzvininipisa uye hatigoni kuva pamusoro pevashandi vakatumwa naMwari!

(2) Vemamwe Marudzi vane mitemo yavo vamene, ndiko kuti, mitemo yehana yokuita nayo

bvunza: VaFiristia vakaisawo “Areka yeChipupuriro” pangoro itsva uye vakaidzosera kunzvimbo yayo yapakuvamba pamusoro penzombe. Panzvimbo pezvo, ngwavaira yakavasiya?
mhinduro: VaFiristia “ndiko kuti, vaHedheni” havana Mutemo waMosesi uye havafaniri kuita maererano nemirau yoMutemo waMosesi; , uye kuita zvinhu zvomutemo maererano nechimiro chazvo - nongedzera kuRoma Joshua 2:14 → Vakati, “Kana muchida kudzosa areka yaMwari waIsraeri, musaidzosa isina chinhu, asi mupei. chive chipo chokuyananisira, ipapo uchapora uye uchaziva kuti sei ruoko rwake rusina kukusiya. kuwanda kwamachinda evaFiristia, nokuti pakati penyu mose uye njodzi imwe cheteyo yakawira vatungamiri venyu ... Zvino itai ngoro itsva, musunge mhou mbiri dzisina majoko pangoro, uye regai mhuru dziende kumusha, muchisiya sungano yaJehovha. Isa areka pangoro, woisa chinopiwa chendarama mubhokisi, woiisa pedyo neareka, uye endesa areka yacho.

(3) Sezvo mutemo usina simba nokuda kwenyama, pane zvinhu zvausingagoni kuita

Sezvo murairo wakanga usina simba nokuda kwenyama, usingagoni kuita chinhu, Mwari wakatuma Mwanakomana wake amene nomufananidzo wenyama yezvivi, kuti ave chipiriso chezvivi, achipa mhosva zvivi munyama, kuti kururama kwomurairo kuzadziswe matiri isu. musararama maererano nenyama , chete avo vanotevera Mweya Mutsvene. VaRoma 8:3-4

Cherechedza: VaIsraeri vaiva neMutemo waMosesi, uye vaHedheni vaivawo nemitemo yavo → Asi munhu wose ari munyika akatadza uye akakundikana kusvika pakubwinya kwaMwari nokutyora mutemo - tarisa VaRoma 3:23. Nekuda kweutera hwenyama, munhu haana kukwanisa kuzadzisa kururama kwemurairo inogona kuzadzikiswa matiri isu vasingateveri venyama, avo chete vanotevera Mweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugovera kuyanana kwangu nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: Nadhabhi naAbhihu vakapisa moto wechienzi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Revhitiko Chitsauko 10, ndima 1-3, tiverenge pamwe chete: Zvino Nadhabhi naAbhihu, vanakomana vaAroni, vakatora mumwe nomumwe hadyana yake yezvinonhuhwira, vakaizadza nomoto, ndokuisa zvinonhuhwira pamusoro payo, vakauya pamberi paJehovha nomoto usina kutenderwa, wavakanga vasina kurairwa naJehovha.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Strange Fire" Namata: Baba voKudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi vanonyora nemaoko avo nekutaura shoko rechokwadi, rinova vhangeri reruponeso rwedu. Chingwa chinounzwa kubva kudenga uye chinopihwa kwatiri nenguva kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Unonzwisisa here zvinorehwa nokupisa moto usingazikanwi?

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Moto wakajairika, Rinodaidzwa kuti fán huǒ, ishoko rechiChinese rinoreva zvishuwo zvepfungwa zvevanhu venyika.

tsanangura : Zvido zvepfungwa zvevanhu vekunyika.

Kwakabva: Chitsauko chekutanga cheYuan Dynasty Zheng Tingyu's "Nin Zi Ji":"Kana mudzidzi wako asingashandisi mari nehutsinye, moto wakajairika unopisa mudumbu mangu. Ndichauviga muruoko rwangu mumhepo satenzi wangu, uye tevedzerai mwedzi unopenya watenzi wangu pamuromo wetsvimbo yake.

Revhitiko 10:1-3 BDMCS - Vanakomana vaAroni, Nadhabhi naAbhihu, vakatora mumwe nomumwe harana yake yezvinonhuhwira, vakaizadza nomoto, vakawedzera zvinonhuhwira, vakauya nomoto usina kufanira pamberi paJehovha; Budai pamberi paJehovha muvapise, uye vachafa pamberi paJehovha. Ipapo Mozisi akati kuna Aroni, “Zvanzi naJehovha, ‘Ndichava mutsvene pakati paavo vanoswedera kwandiri, uye ndichakudzwa pamberi pavanhu vose.’” Aroni akaramba anyerere.

Dudziro yeBhaibheri:

bvunza: Moto unoshamisa unorevei?

mhinduro: Moto unoshamisa unoreva moto wepanyika, kwete moto wakatsaurwa paatari yetabhenakeri → inonzi "moto usingazikanwi".

bvunza: Moto wechienzi unomirirei?

mhinduro: Moto unoshamisa unofananidzira kuchiva uye kuchiva kwenyama - yenyama, yenyika, isina kuchena, inotadza, isina kucheneswa → "Kana iwe nevanakomana vako muchipinda mutende rekusangana, hamufaniri kumwa waini kana zvinodhaka, kuti murege Kufa; izvi zvichava uve mutemo usingaperi kusvikira kumarudzi enyu ose, kuti mutsaure zvitsvene nezvisi zvitsvene, navakachena pane zvisina kunaka;

Cherechedza: Machechi akawanda nhasi haatsauri pakati pezvinhu zvitsvene nezvinhu zvenyika, zvinhu zvakachena nezvisina kuchena → vose vanopa “zvinhu zvakasvibiswa, zvakaviriswa nezvakasviba maererano nokuda kwavo, hapana musiyano pakati pesungano yekare nesungano itsva, uye pane hapana mutsauko pakati pezviri pasi pomurairo" Hapana mutsauko pakati penyasha nenyasha, hapana kupatsanurwa pakati pemunhu wekare nemunhu mutsva, hapana kupatsanurwa pakati pezviri zvaAdhamu nezvaKristu, hapana kupatsanurwa. pakati pevenyama nevemweya, hapana kupatsanurwa pakati pevatadzi nevakarurama, hapana kupatsanurwa pakati pechiedza nerima, hapana kupatsanurwa pakati pevakachena nevasina kuchena " kuna Mwari → sezvakangoita Nadhabhi naAbhihu vakapa Mwari "moto wechienzi" uyo Jehovha asina kuvarayira kuti vaite. Yakatsaurirwa kuna Mwari, "kuranga" kwaNadhabhi naAbhihu muenzaniso → kungomirira nekutya kutonga uye kutongwa. moto unoparadza uchapedza vavengi vose.

saka" Paul "Vachiti → Ndiitei mushumiri waKristu Jesu weVemamwe Marudzi, mupristi weevhangeri yaMwari, kuti chibayiro changu chevaHedheni chiitwe chitsvene noMweya Mutsvene → "Utsvene ndiuyo asina chivi" uye chingagamuchirwa → Kana ". mutadzi "Kupa → kupa" Moto wakajairika “Vakazvipira kuna Mwari, vaparidzi vakadaro ndi“Nadhabhi naAbhihu.” Unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Nongedzera kuna VaRoma 15:16

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugovera kuyanana kwangu nemi mose. Ameni
