articles.title: Chidzitiro chakafukidza chiso chaMosesi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri tiverenge 2 VaKorinte 3:16 pamwe chete: Asi kana mwoyo yavo ichingodzokera kuna Ishe, chifukidziro chinobviswa.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana “Chifukidziro chiri pachiso chaMosesi” Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. kutenda"" Mukadzi ane hunhu "Kutuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo → kutipa uchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari, chakanga chakavigwa munguva dzakapfuura, iro shoko rakafanotemerwa naMwari makore ose asati avapo nokuda kworuponeso rwedu nokubwinya! Kwatiri kubudikidza neMweya Mutsvene Zvakaratidzwa Amen! Nzwisisa mufananidzo waMosesi wakafukidza chiso chake nechifukidzo .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Eksodho 34:29-35

Mozisi paakaburuka muGomo reSinai akabata mahwendefa maviri omurayiro muruoko rwake, haana kuziva kuti chiso chake chaibwinya nokuti Jehovha akanga ataura naye. Aroni nevaIsraeri vose pavakaona kuti chiso chaMosesi chaibwinya, vakatya kuswedera pedyo naye. Mozisi akavadana kwaari, Aroni navatariri veungano vakauya kwaari, Mozisi akataura navo. Ipapo vaIsiraeri vose vakaswedera, iye akavaraira mashoko ose aJehovha aakataura kwaari pagomo reSinai. Mozisi akati apedza kutaura navo, akafukidza chiso chake nechifukidzo. Asi kana Mozisi asvika pamberi paJehovha kuti ataure naye, aibvisa chifukidzo, uye paaibuda, akaudza vaIsraeri zvakanga zvarayirwa naJehovha. VaIsraeri vakaona chiso chaMosesi chichipenya. Mozisi akafukidzazve chiso chake nechifukidzo, uye paakapinda kundotaura naJehovha, aibvisa chifukidzo.

bvunza: Nei Mosesi akafukidza chiso chake nechifukidziro?
mhinduro: Aroni navaIsraeri vose pavakaona kupenya kwechiso chaMozisi, vakatya kuswedera pedyo naye

bvunza: Nei chiso chaMosesi chakanaka chaipenya?
mhinduro: Nokuti Mwari chiedza, uye Jehovha akataura naye, uye akaita kuti chiso chake chipenye → Mwari chiedza, uye maari hamuna rima. Iri ndiro shoko ratakanzwa kubva kuna Jehovha uye ratidzosa kwamuri. 1 Johani 1:5

bvunza: Mosesi akafukidza chiso chake nechifukidziro chinomirirei?
mhinduro: “Mosesi akafukidza chiso chake nechidzitiro” kunoratidzira kuti Mosesi akanga ari mutariri womutemo wakanyorwa pamahwendefa amabwe, kwete mufananidzo chaiwoiwo womutemo. Inofananidzirawo kuti vanhu havagoni kuvimba naMosesi uye kuchengeta mutemo waMosesi kuti vaone mufananidzo wechokwadi uye vaone kubwinya kwaMwari → Mutemo wakatanga kuparidzwa kubudikidza naMosesi nyasha nechokwadi zvakabva kuna Jesu Kristu. Chirevo - Johani 1:17. “Mutemo” ndiye tenzi wekudzidzisa anotitungamirira ku“nyasha nechokwadi” chete “nekutenda” muna Jesu Kristu kuti tiruramiswe → tinogona kuona kubwinya kwaMwari! Ameni—ona VaG. 3:24 .

bvunza: Mutemo wakaita sei chaizvo?
mhinduro: Sezvo murayiro uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya uye usati uri mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chacho, haungakwanisi kuperedzera avo vanoswedera pedyo nokupa chibayiro chimwe chete gore rimwe nerimwe. VaHebheru Chitsauko 10 Vhesi 1 → “Chimiro chomurairo ndiKristu, uye pfupiso yomurairo ndiKristu. Chirevo - VaRoma Chitsauko 10 Ndima 4. Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

Kwakanga kune kubwinya muushumiri hworufu hwakanyorwa padombo, zvokuti vaIsraeri vakanga vasingagoni kutarira chiso chaMosesi nokuda kwokubwinya kwakanga kuri pachiso chake, icho chakanga chichipera zvishoma nezvishoma, 2 VaKorinte 3:7 .

(1) Hushumiri hwemutemo hwakanyorwa mudombo → ishumiro yerufu

bvunza: Sei mutemo wakanyorwa mumatombo hushumiri hwerufu?
mhinduro: Nemhaka yokuti Mosesi akabudisa vaIsraeri muimba youranda muEgipita, vaIsraeri vakawira murenje Kunyange iye amene akanga asingagoni ku“pinda” muKanani, nyika yaiyerera mukaka nouchi zvakapikirwa naMwari, naizvozvo mutemo wakavezwa padombo. Hushumiri hwake ishumiro yerufu. Kana musingakwanise kupinda muKenani kana kupinda muHumambo hweKudenga maererano neMutemo waMosesi, munogona kupinda chete kana Karebhu naJoshua vakavatungamirira “nekutenda”.

(2) Hushumiri hwemutemo hwakanyorwa mudombo → ishumiro yekutongwa

2 Vakorinde 3:9 Kana kushumira kunopa mhosva kuchibwinya, ushumiri hwokururamiswa hunobwinya zvikuru.

bvunza: Sei ushumiri hwomurayiro huri ushumiri hwokupa mhosva?
mhinduro: Mutemo unoitirwa kuti vanhu vazive nezvezvivi zvavo, kana uchiziva kuti une mhosva, unofanira kuyananisira zvivi zvako muTesitamende yekare, mombe nemakwai zvaiuraiwa kakawanda kuti zviyananisire zvivi zvako. murayiro unotaurwa kuna avo vari pasi pomurayiro, kuti vadzivise miromo yavose vari munyika. Verenga VaRoma 3:19-20; Naizvozvo, shumiro yomurayiro ishumiro yokupa mhosva. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(3) Hushumiri hwakanyorwa pahwendefa remwoyo ndihwo hushumiri hwokururamiswa

Mubvunzo: Ndiani mutariri wehushumiri hwekururamiswa?
Mhinduro: Ushumiri hwekururamisa, “Kristu”, ndiye mutariri → Vanhu vanofanira kutitora sevashumiri vaKristu uye vatariri vezvakavanzika zvaMwari. Chinodiwa kuti mutariri ave akatendeka. 1 VaKorinte 4:1-2 Makereke mazhinji nhasi “ Aihwa “Mutariri wezvakavanzika zvaMwari, Aihwa Vashumiri vaKristu→Vachaita Mutemo waMosesi~ Mutariri wekutongwa, ushumiri hwerufu →Kupinza vanhu muchivi uye vave vatadzi, vasingagoni kubuda mutorongo rechivi, vachitungamirira vanhu pasi pomutemo uye murufu, sezvakangoita Mosesi paakatungamirira vaIsraeri kubuda muIjipiti uye vose vakawira murenje pasi pomutemo gare gare vakanzi Vatariri vokururama → “Hapana anogona kushandira vanatenzi vaviri vakavimbika.

(4) Chero mwoyo wadzokera kuna Jehovha, chifukidziro chinobviswa

2 VaKorinde 3:12-16 Sezvo tine tariro yakadaro, tinotaura noushingi, kusiyana naMosesi aiisa chifukidziro pachiso chake kuti vaIsraeri varege kutarira mugumo woUyo aizoparadzwa. Asi moyo yavo yakaomeswa, uye nanhasi kana Testamente Yekare ichiverengwa, chidzitiro hachisati chabviswa. Chifukidziro ichi munaKristu Yakatobviswa . Kusvikira zuva ranhasi, kana bhuku raMozisi richiverengwa, chifukidziro chichiripo pamwoyo yavo. Asi kana mwoyo yavo ichingodzokera kuna Ishe, chifukidziro chinobviswa.

Cherechedza: Sei vanhu pasi rose vachivhara zviso zvavo nemavheiri nhasi? Haufaniri kungwarira here? Nokuti mwoyo yavo yakaoma uye isingade kudzokera kuna Mwari, vanonyengerwa naSatani uye vanoda kugara muTesitamende yekare, pasi pemutemo, pasi pehushumiri hwekutongwa, uye vari pasi pehushumiri hwerufu chokwadi uye kutendeukira kumashoko enhema. Fukidza chiso chako nechifukidziro → Zvinoratidza kuti havagoni kuuya Kuona kubwinya kwaMwari pamberi paMwari , havana zvokudya zvomudzimu kuti vadye, uye havana mvura mhenyu yokunwa → “Mazuva anouya,” ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe Jehovha, “andichatuma nzara panyika. vachava nenyota, kwete nokuda kwokushayiwa mvura, asi nokuti havazoteereri inzwi raJehovha. izvozvo. Amosi 8:11-12

(5) Nechiso chakazaruka muna Kristu, unogona kuona kubwinya kwaShe

Ishe ndiye Mweya; pane Mweya waIshe pane rusununguko. Isu tose, nechiso chakashama tichitarira sapagirazi kubwinya kwaShe, tinoshandurwa tichifanana nomufananidzo iwoyo kubva pakubwinya kuenda pakubwinya, sezvinobva kuMweya waShe. 2 VaKorinte 3:17-18

OK! Ndizvo chete zvekutaura kwanhasi uye nekugovana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye nekurudziro yeMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

2021.10.15

articles.title: (5) Tarira kuna Kristu nokuda kworuponeso;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri pana Isaya chitsauko 45 ndima 22 toverenga pamwe chete: Tarirai kwandiri, imwi migumo yose yenyika, mugoponeswa; nekuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Ruponeso neKubwinya" Aihwa. 5 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Kutenda ku "mukadzi akanaka" nekutumira vashandi kuburikidza ivo Shoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko uye rakataurwa → rinotipa huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa munguva yakapfuura, shoko iro Mwari akafanoronga kuti isu tiponeswe uye tikudzwe pamberi pekusingaperi! Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti tivhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → kunzwisisa kuti Mwari akafanoronga kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe nyika isati yasikwa! Kutarira kuna Kristu kuti tiwane ruponeso; ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Tarisa kuna Kristu kuti uwane ruponeso

Isaya Chapter 45 Vhesi 22 Tarirai kwandiri, imwi migumo yose yenyika, mugoponeswa; nokuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe.

(1) VaIsraeri muTestamente Yekare vaitarira kunyoka yendarira kuti vaponeswe

Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, "Gadzira nyoka ine uturu, ugoiturika padanda; ani naani anorumwa achatarira nyoka, achararama." hupenyu. Numeri Chitsauko 21 Ndima 8-9

bvunza: “Nyoka yendarira” inomirirei?
mhinduro: Nyoka yendarira inofananidzira Kristu uyo akatukwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu uye akaturikwa pamuti navatadzi namavanga ake makaporeswa. Reference--1 Petro Chitsauko 2 Vhesi 24

(2) Kutarira kuna Kristu kuti tiwane ruponeso muTestamente Itsva

Johani 3:14-15 BDMCS - Mozisi sezvaakasimudza nyoka murenje, saizvozvo Mwanakomana woMunhu anofanira kusimudzwawo, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari ave noupenyu husingaperi, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari ave noupenyu husingaperi. → Johane 12 Chitsauko 32: Kana ndikasimudzwa kubva panyika, ndichakwevera vanhu vose kwandiri. ” → Johani 8:28 Naizvozvo Jesu akati: “Pamuchasimudza Mwanakomana woMunhu, muchaziva kuti ndini Kristu → Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu.” Kana musingatendi kuti ndini Kristu, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu. ” Johani 8:24.

bvunza: Kristu anorevei?
mhinduro: Kristu Muponesi zvinoreva → Jesu ndiye Kristu, Mesiasi, uye Muponesi wehupenyu hwedu! Jesu Kristu anotiponesa: 1 wakasununguka kubva kuchivi. 2 Kusunungurwa kubva pamurayiro nokutukwa kwawo. 3 Akapunyuka kubva pasimba rerima raSatani muHadhesi, 4 kusunungurwa kubva mukutongwa nerufu; 5 Kumuka kwaKristu kubva kuvakafa kwakatibereka patsva, kunotipa chimiro chevana vaMwari nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni → Tinofanira kutarisa kuna Kristu uye kutenda kuti Jesu Kristu ndiye Muponesi uye Muponesi wehupenyu hwedu. Ishe Jesu vanoti kwatiri → Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu. Kana musingatendi kuti ndini Kristu, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo--1 Petro Chitsauko 1 Ndima 3-5

【2】Ivai pamwe naKristu uye mukudzwe

Kana takabatanidzwa naye pakufanana norufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye pakumuka kwake;

(1) Kubhabhatidzwa muna Kristu

bvunza: Ungabatanidzwa sei naKristu mukufanana kwerufu rwake?
mhinduro: “Kubhabhatidzwa muna Kristu” → Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Reference--VaRoma Chitsauko 6 Vhesi 3

bvunza: Chinangwa chokubhabhatidzwa ndechei?
mhinduro: 1 kuti tifambe muhupenyu hutsva → Naizvozvo takavigwa naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu, kuti tifambe muhupenyu hutsva, saKristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba. Magwaro—VaRoma 6:4;
2 Akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti isu tisunungurwe pachivi→ Kana takabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo worufu rwake... tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye. kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vechivi; Cherechedza: “Kubhabhatidzwa” zvinoreva kuti takarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu Unozvinzwisisa here izvi? Magwaro—VaRoma 6:5-7;
3 Pfekai munhu mutsva, pfekai Kristu → Vandudzwei mundangariro dzenyu uye mupfeke munhu mutsva, akasikwa mumufananidzo waMwari mukururama kwechokwadi noutsvene. VaEfeso 4:23-24 → Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu. VaGaratia 3:26-27

(2) Kubatanidzwa naKristu muchimiro chokumuka

bvunza: Ungabatanidzwa sei naye mukufanana nekumuka?
mhinduro: " Idyai Chirairo chaShe ” → Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, Kana musingadyi nyama yoMwanakomana woMunhu nokunwa ropa rake, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi, uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira. Nhungamiro--Johani 6:53-54→ Zvandakaparidza kwamuri ndizvo zvandakagamuchira kubva kuna She nousiku hwaakapandukirwa, Ishe Jesu akatora chingwa, akavonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa. iwe." Mipumburu: yakaputsika), iwe unofanirwa kuita izvi kurekodha ndirangarireiwo.” Mushure mokudya, akatorawo mukombe akati, “Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu, nguva ipi neipi yamunonwa mauri, itai izvi muchindirangarira.” Pose patinodya chingwa ichi nokunwa mukombe uyu , tiri kuratidzira rufu rwaShe kusvikira auya. Reference--1 Vakorinde 11 ndima 23-26

(3) Tora muchinjikwa wako utevere Ishe, Paridza vhangeri roumambo kudzwai

Saka akadana vanhu vazhinji navadzidzi vake kwavari akati kwavari, “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, ngaazvirambe, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere.”— Marko 8:34

bvunza: “Chinangwa” chokutakura muchinjikwa uye kutevera Jesu chii?
mhinduro: pass Taura nezvomuchinjikwa waKristu uye uparidze vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga

1 “Tendai” Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handichisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu “anorarama” nokuda kwangu → Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri ndinorarama zvino munyama, ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. Reference--VaGaratiya Chitsauko 2 Ndima 20
2 “Kutenda” Muviri wechivi unoparadzwa, uye tinosunungurwa pachivi → Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda. nekuti uyo wakafa wasunungurwa pachivi. VaRoma 6:6-7
3 "Kutenda" kunotisunungura kubva pamurairo nekutuka kwawo → Asi sezvo takafa kumutemo waitisunga, isu tasunungurwa kubva pamurairo, kuti tigone kushumira Ishe maererano nemweya (mudzimu: kana kushandurwa soMutsvene. Mweya) Nzira itsva, kwete maererano nenzira yekare. VaRoma 7:6 → Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, aitwa chakatukwa nokuda kwedu;
4 “Kutenda” kunobvisa murume mukuru nemaitiro ake – tarisa VaKorose 3:9
5 “Kutenda” kunopukunyuka dhiabhorosi naSatani → Sezvo vana vachigoverana mumuviri mumwe chete wenyama neropa, iye amene akapfekawo nyama imwe cheteyo neropa kuti kupfurikidza norufu aparadze uyo ane simba rorufu, iye amene. , dhiabhorosi, uye asunungure avo vanotya rufu upenyu hwavo hwose. VaHebheru 2:14-15
6 “Kutenda” kunopukunyuka simba rerima neHadhesi → Anotinunura musimba rerima uye anotiendesa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa;
7 "Kutenda" kwapukunyuka munyika → ndavapa shoko renyu. Uye nyika inovavenga, nekuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika. … sezvamakandituma munyika, neniwo ndakavatuma panyika. (Verenga Johani 17:14, 18).
8 " tsamba " Ndakafa pamwe chete naKristu uye ndicha“tenda” kuti ndichamutswa, ndigozvarwa patsva, ndigoponeswa, uye ndive noupenyu husingaperi naye, uye ndichagara nhaka youmambo hwokudenga! Ameni . Tarisa kuna VaRoma 6:8 na1 Petro 1:3-5

Izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa naIshe Jesu → Akati: "Nguva yazadziswa, uye umambo hwaMwari hwava pedyo. Tendeukai uye mutende evhangeri "Evhangeri youshe hwokudenga" → Nokuti ani nani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake ( Ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri acharasikirwa nahwo. Munhu achabatsirwei kana akawana nyika yose asi achirasikirwa noupenyu hwake? Chii chimwe chingapei munhu kuti chive muripo wemweya wake? Reference-Mako Chitsauko 8 Ndima 35-37 neChitsauko 1 Ndima 15

Hymn: Ndimi Mambo weKubwinya

OK! Ndizvo chete zvekutaura kwanhasi uye nekugovana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye nekurudziro yeMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: (4) Nzwisisa nzira yechokwadi uye iponeswe; hupfumi hunoratidzwa mumubatsiri wevhu uye hunokudzwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurirei maBhaibheri edu kuna 1 Timotio ganhuro 2 uye ndima 4 uye verenga pamwe: Anoda kuti vanhu vese vaponeswe uye vanzwisise chokwadi.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Ruponeso neKubwinya" Aihwa. 4 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinotenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kuzotipa huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa kare neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, rinova iro shoko ratakatemerwa naMwari kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe pamberi pavose. kusingaperi! Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye ovhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tione uye kunzwa chokwadi chekunamata → Kunzwisisa chokwadi uye kuponeswa; kuisa pfuma mumudziyo wevhu uye kuizarura uye kubudiswa ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Nzwisisa nzira yechokwadi uye uponeswe

1 Timoti 2: 4 Anoda kuti vanhu vese vaponeswe uye vasvike pakuziva chokwadi.

(1) Nzwisisa nzira yechokwadi

bvunza: Ndeipi nzira yechokwadi?
mhinduro: "Chokwadi" ichokwadi, "Tao" ndiMwari → Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. Zvinhu zvese zvakaitwa kubudikidza naye; kunze kwake hakuna kana chinhu chakagadzirwa. Chirevo--Johani Chitsauko 1 Ndima 1-3

(2) Shoko rakazova nyama

Shoko rakava nyama, rikagara pakati pedu, izere nenyasha nezvokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. …Hakuna akamboona Mwari, asi Mwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, ari pachifuva chaBaba, ndiye akamuratidza. Chirevo - Johane 1:14,18. Ongorora: Shoko rakava nyama →, Mwari akave nyama → akavezwa nemhandara Maria akazvarwa kubva kuMweya Mutsvene Zita raJesu → zvinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake kubva kuzvitadzo zvavo. Ameni! Hapana munhu akamboona Mwari, mumwe Mwanakomana mumwe chete "Jesu" Jesu "pachipfuva chaBaba, ndiko kuti, kuratidza Mwari naBaba! → Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu vakati: "Kana mukazondiziva, muchaziva Baba vangu. Kubva zvino pauri pamunomuziva uye wakamuona." Revhitiko - Johane 14: 7

(3) Nzira youpenyu

Nezve izwi repakutanga rehupenyu kubva pakutanga, izvi ndizvo zvatakanzwa, zvakaonekwa, takaonekwa nemeso edu, akabata namaoko edu. . vari kuyanana nesu. Kuyanana kwedu kuna Baba uye neMwanakomana wake, Jesu Kristu. 1 Johani 1:1-3

(4) Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu

Mutumwa akati kwaari: Usatya Maria; wanzwirwa nyasha naMwari. Uchava nemimba, ugozvara mwanakomana, uchamutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu; iye uchava mukuru, uchanzi Mwanakomana woMwanakomana woMunhu. Wokumusoro-soro; Ishe Mwari vachamuita kuti ave mukuru. Uye uchatonga pamusoro peimba yaJakobho nekusingaperi, uye ushe hwake hahuperi. Maria akati kumutumwa, "Izvi zvingaitika sei kana ndisina kuroora?" Simba reWekumusoro-soro richakufukidza, uye uya kuberekwa, anonzi Mwanakomana waMwari (Ruka 1:30). -35 mapfundo
Matewu 16:16 Simoni Petro akamupindura akati, "Ndimi Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu."

.

VaGaratia 4: 4-7 asi kana kuzara kwenguva refu, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nemukadzi, akaberekerwa pasi pemutemo, kudzikunura avo vaive pasi pemutemo, kuti tigamuchire zita ravanakomana. Sezvo muri vanakomana, Mwari akatuma Mweya woMwanakomana wake mumwoyo yenyu (yekutanga: yedu) achidanidzira achiti, “Abha, Baba!” uye sezvo uri mwanakomana, unovimba naMwari kuti ndiye mugari wenhaka yake.

(6) Gamuchira mweya mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso uye segwaro rekupinda muHumambo hweKudenga

VaEfeso 1: 13-14 maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pawakatenda muna Kristu pawakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, iyo evharo rekuponeswa kwako. Uyu Mweya Mutsvene rubatso (rugwaro rwekutanga: nhaka) yenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe.

(7) Nzwisisa nzira yechokwadi uye uponeswe

Johani Chitsauko 15 Ndima 3 "Zvino iwe wakachena nekuda kweshoko randakataura kwauri," akadaro Ishe Jesu.

1 Zvakatochena: Zvakachena zvinoreva Mutsvene, Asina zvivi Maari makatenda maari, pawakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, iyo evhangeri yekuponeswa kwenyu, uye makatenda maari, kuti maiva nemweya mutsvene wechipikirwa. "Sezvaakadaro Paul," kuti ndive a Muranda waKristu Jesu pamusoro pevahedheni. Kuti uve vapristi veevhangeri yaMwari, kuti zvibayiro zvevahedheni zvive zvakagamuchirwa, zvitsvenesvense noMweya Mutsvene. Reference - VaRoma 15:16
2 Yakatogezwa, yakacheneswa uye yakaruramiswa: Saka vaive vamwe vako; asi iwe wakashambwa, iwe wakacheneswa, iwe wakaruramiswa muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu uye neMweya waMwari wedu. Reference — 1 VaKorinte 6:11

(8) Jesu ndiye nzira, chokwadi, uye upenyu

6 Johani akatanga ndima 14 Ndima, chokwadi, neupenyu; hapana anouya kuna Baba asi nokwandiri. Mugwagwa wakapfuura nepakati pechidzitiro, icho chaive muviri wake. Ona VaHeberu 10:20.

【2】 Pfuma inoratidzwa uye inokudzwa kana ichiiswa mumubatsiri wevhu

(1) Pfuma iyi inoratidzwa mumudziyo wevhu

Tine pfuma iyi mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti iyi simba guru rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kubva kwatiri. ONA: " mwana "Ndizvozvo mweya wechokwadi , mwana ndiko Shoko raMwari , mwana ndiko Jesu Kristu ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? 2 Vakorinde 4: 7

(2) Rufu rwaJesu Rinomisa Zvedu Zvekare uye Inoita Kuti Hupenyu hwaJesu Kuratidze Mudu Muduku

我们四面受敌，却不被困住；心里作难，却不至失望；遭逼迫，却不被丢弃；打倒了，却不至死亡。 Isu tinogara tichitakura kufa kwaJesu nesu kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huve pachena mukati medu. Nekuti isu tiri vapenyu tinogara takakumikidzwa kurufu nekuda kwaJesu, kuti hupenyu hwaJesu hubudiswe mumiviri yedu inofa. Kubva mumaonero aya, rufu runoshanda matiri, asi hupenyu hunoshanda mauri. 2 VaKorinte 4:8-12

(3) Pfuma inoratidzwa inoita kuti tikwanise kuita huremu husingaenzaniswi hwekubwinya kusingaperi

Nokudaro, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uchiparadzwa, asi womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Matambudziko edu echinguvana uye akareruka achatiitira kubwinya kusingagumi kusingaenzaniswi. 2 VaKorinte 4:16-17

Hymn: Kuvandudzwa neMweya Mutsvene

OK! Ndizvo chete zvekutaura kwanhasi uye nekugovana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye nekurudziro yeMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: (3) Tenda muvhangeri ugoponeswa;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 1 VaKorinte 15, ndima 3-4, tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti icho chandakakumikidzawo kwamuri, pakutanga, ndechokuti, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Ruponeso neKubwinya" Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinotenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kuzotipa huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa kare neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, rinova iro shoko ratakatemerwa naMwari kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe pamberi pavose. kusingaperi! Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti Mwari akafanoronga kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe nyika isati yasikwa! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Vhangeri roruponeso

*Jesu akatuma Pauro kunoparidza vhangeri roruponeso kuvaHedheni*

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri yeruponeso?
mhinduro: Mwari akatuma muapostora Pauro kunoparidzira kuvaHedheni “evhangeri yoruponeso naJesu Kristu” → Zvino, hama, ndinokuzivisai evhangeri yandakakuparidzirai kare, ramakagamuchirawo, neyamumire mairi, Imi hamutendi pasina, asi kana mukabatirira pane zvandinokuparidzirai, muchaponeswa nevhangeri iri. Zvandakakupawo ndeizvi: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neMagwaro Matsvene 1-4

bvunza: Kristu akagadzirisei paakafira zvivi zvedu?
mhinduro: 1 Zvinoita kuti tive vakasununguka kubva muchivi → Zvinoratidza kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira; 6:7 → “Kristu” akafira vose, saka vose vakafa → “Iye akafa asunungurwa pachivi, uye vose vakafa” → Vose vakasunungurwa pachivi. Ameni! , unozvitenda here? Avo vanotenda havapiwi mhosva, asi avo vasingatendi vakatopiwa mhosva nokuti havatendi muzita roMwanakomana waMwari akaberekwa ari mumwe oga "Jesu" kuti aponese vanhu vake kubva kuzvivi zvavo → "Kristu" akafira vose, uye vose vakafa. . vose vakafa, uye vose vakasunungurwa pachivi.
2 Kusunungurwa kubva pamurairo nekutukwa kwawo-ona vaRoma 7:6 naGaratiya 3:12. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

bvunza: Uye kuvigwa, chii chakagadziriswa?
mhinduro: 3 Kusunungurwa kubva kumunhu wekare nemaitiro ake ekare - VaKorose 3:9

bvunza : Kristu akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neBhaibheri → Chii chakagadziriswa?
mhinduro: 4 "Jesu Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa" → akagadzirisa dambudziko rokuti "kutiruramisa" → Jesu akagamuchidzwa kuvanhu nokuda kwezvivi zvedu akamutswa nokuda kwokururamiswa kwedu (kana kuti kushandura: Jesu ndewekudarika kwedu akasunungurwa, uye iye akamutswa kuti tiruramiswe) Chirevo---VaRoma 4:25

Cherechedza: Izvi → Jesu Kristu akatuma Pauro kunoparidza [vhangeri roruponeso] kuvaHedheni → Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu → 1 Akagadzirisa dambudziko rechivi, 2 Yakagadziriswa Mutemo uye Nyaya dzekutuka; uye Kuvigwa → 3 Kugadzirisa dambudziko remurume akwegura uye maitiro ake akamutswa pazuva rechitatu→ 4 Inogadzirisa "matambudziko ekururamiswa, kuzvarwa patsva, kumuka, ruponeso, uye hupenyu husingaperi kwatiri." Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo--1 Petro Chitsauko 1 Ndima 3-5

【2】Pfeka munhu mutsva, abvise munhu wekare, akudzwe

(1) Kana Mweya waMwari wakagara mumwoyo yedu, hatisisiri venyama

VaRoma 8:9 Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mamuri, imi hamuchisiri venyama, asi voMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu.

bvunza: Seiko kana Mweya waMwari uchigara mumoyo yedu, isu hatisi venyama?
mhinduro: Nokuti “Kristu” akafira vose, uye vose vakafa → nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu “upenyu hunobva kuna Mwari” hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari. VaKorose 3:3 → Naizvozvo, kana Mweya waMwari uchigara matiri, tinozvarwa patsva mumunhu mutsva, uye “munhu mutsva” haasi we“munhu wekare wenyama” → Nekuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare. akarovererwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vechivi; rufu, muviri wekuora (kuora). Sezvakataurwa naPauro → ndakasuwa! Ndiani angandiponesa pamuviri uyu worufu? Mwari ngaavongwe kuti tinogona kupukunyuka kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Kubva pakuona uku, ndinoteerera mutemo waMwari nemoyo wangu, asi nyama yangu inoteerera mutemo wechivi. VaRoma 7:24-25, unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

(2) Kubvisa murume mukuru, kusangana nekubvisa murume mukuru

VaKorose 3:9 Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare namabasa awo.

bvunza: “Nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare namabasa ake.” Hakurevi here kuti “mabvisa” pano? Nei tichiri kuda kupinda nemuitiro wekubvisa zvinhu zvekare nemafambiro?
mhinduro: Mudzimu waMwari unogara mumwoyo yedu, uye hatisisiri munyama → Izvi zvinoreva kuti kutenda “kwabvisa” nyama yomunhu wekare → Hupenyu hwedu “hwemunhu hutsva” hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari; ” achiripo Idya, inwa uye ufambe! Bhaibheri rinoti sei “makafa” mumeso aMwari, “mukweguru” wenyu akafa munhu akwegura afa; munhu mutsva asingaoneki mupenyu → Saka Tinoda kusangana nekubvisa "munhu wekare anoonekwa" → Dai pasina "munhu wekare uye mutsva", munhu wemweya akaberekwa naMwari uye murume wenyama wekare akaberekwa naAdhamu, pangadai pasina "hondo pakati pemweya nenyama" sezvakataurwa naPauro nyama yepakutanga chete yaAdhamu haisati yasangana nekubvisa munhu wekare→ Kana iwe wakanzwa nzira yake, wakagamuchira dzidziso dzake, uye wakadzidza chokwadi chake, unofanira kubvisa unhu hwako hwekare mumufambiro wako wekare, uyo uri kuwedzera zvishoma nezvishoma nekuda kwekunyengera kweruchiva. Chirevo--VaEfeso Chitsauko 4 Ndima 21-22

(3) Kupfeka munhu mutsva uye kuona chinangwa chokubvisa munhu wekare kuti tikudzwe.

VaEfeso 4:23-24 Muitwe vatsva mundangariro dzenyu, uye mufuke munhu mutsva, akasikwa akafanana nomufananidzo waMwari mukururama kwechokwadi noutsvene. → Saka, isu hatiori moyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uchiparadzwa, asi womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Matambudziko edu echinguvana uye akareruka achatiitira kubwinya kusingagumi kusingaenzaniswi. Zviri pachena kuti hatina hanya nezvinhu zvinoonekwa, asi zvisingaonekwi; 2 VaKorinte 4:16-18

Hymn: Jehovha ndiye simba rangu

OK! Ndizvo chete zvekutaura kwanhasi uye nekugovana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye nekurudziro yeMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: (2) Tenda uye ubhabhatidzwe neMweya Mutsvene uye ugoponeswa muna Kristu uye upfeke Kristu kuti akudzwe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Marko chitsauko 16 ndima 16 tiverenge pamwe chete: Ani naani anotenda akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa;

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Ruponeso neKubwinya" Aihwa. 2 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo → achitipa huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa munguva dzakapfuura, shoko iro Mwari akagara aronga kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe makore ose asati avapo. ! NoMweya Mutsvene Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri Ameni! Hwisisa kuti Mwari akafanoronga kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe nyika isati yasikwa! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Uyo anotenda akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa

Mako 16:16 Ani naani anotenda akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa;

bvunza: Uyo anotenda uye akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa → Chii chaunotenda kuti uponeswe?
mhinduro: Tenda muvhangeri ugoponeswa! → Akati: "Nguva yakwana, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera. Pfidzai uye mutende evhangeri!"

bvunza: Chii chinonzi evhangeri?
mhinduro: Evhangeri Mwari akatuma muapostora Pauro kunoparidza “vhangeri roruponeso” kuvaHedheni akamutswa pazuva rechitatu. Reference--1 Vakorinde 15 ndima 3-4.

Cherechedza: Kana uchingotenda evhangeri iyi, unoponeswa. Iri ndiro vhangeri roruponeso! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

bvunza: Bhabhatidzwa nokutenda → izvi” akabhabhatidzwa “Rubhabhatidzo rweMweya Mutsvene here? Shamba nemvura
mhinduro: Uyo anotenda uye akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa → Izvi " akabhabhatidzwa "Ehe rubhabhatidzo rwomudzimu mutsvene nekuti chete" Kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene "Kuti muberekwe patsva, mumutswe, uye muponeswe! Ameni. Sokutaura kwakaita Johane Mubhabhatidzi → ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura, asi iye achakubhabhatidzai noMweya Mutsvene." Mako 1:8 → Mabasa 11:16 ndima, ndakarangarira mashoko aShe: "Johane akabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imi muchabhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene." ’; uye “kubhabhatidzwa mumvura” kunofanira kupinzwa murufu rwaKristu. Shamba nemvura "Kusina hanya nekubvisa tsvina yenyama - ona 1 Petro 4:21." kubhabhatidzwa mumvura ” haisi mamiriro eruponeso, Chete " Kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene " Ipapo ndipo paunogona kuzvarwa patsva uye nekuponeswa .

bvunza: Ungagamuchira sei rubhabhatidzo rweMweya Mutsvene?
mhinduro: Tenda kuevhangeri, nzwisisa chokwadi, uye ugosimbiswa neMweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa → Nemiwo makatenda maari, pamakanzwa shoko rezvokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu, mukatenda maari, makaiswa chisimbiso noMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa. Uyu Mweya Mutsvene rubatso (rugwaro rwekutanga: nhaka) yenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe. Chirevo - VaEfeso 1:13-14. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

【2】Mubhabhatidzwe muna Kristu, pfekai Kristu, mugamuchire kukudzwa

VaRoma 6:5 Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake, tichabatanawo naye pakumuka kwake;

(1) Kana takabatanidzwa naye mukufanana norufu rwake

bvunza: Takabatanidzwa sei naKristu mukufanana kwerufu rwake?
mhinduro: Bhapatidzwa muna Kristu nemvura! Uku ndiko kubatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo werufu → Hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake - VaRoma 6:3

bvunza: Neiko “rubhapatidzo rwomumvura” rwuri rudzi rworufu nokubatana naKristu?
mhinduro: Nokuti Kristu akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu → Akanga ane chimiro uye muviri uye akaturikwa pahuni "Muviri wechivi" wakaturikwa pahuni ndiwo "muviri wedu wechivi" → Nokuti Kristu akatakura zvivi zvedu uye "akatsiva" "Vatadzi vedu. mitumbi yakaturikwa pamuti, uye Mwari akaita vasina chivi kuti “vatsive” zvivi zvedu nokuturikwa pamuti → Mwari akaita vasina chivi kuti vave zvivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari. Reference — 2 VaKorinte 5:21
Saka “kubhapatidzwa nemvura” murufu rwaKristu → kubatanidza miviri yedu yakaumbwa norubhapatidzo kumuviri wakaumbwa waKristu wakaturikwa pamuti → uku ndiko “kubatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo worufu rwake”. Kana “wakabhabhatidzwa mumvura” unenge uchizivisa nokupupura kunyika kuti wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu! "Joko" rekurovererwa naKristu riri nyore, uye "mutoro" wakareruka → idzi inyasha dzaMwari! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ndiko kusaka Ishe Jesu vakati: “Nokuti joko rangu rakanaka, nomutoro wangu wakareruka.”—Mateo 11:30

(2) Kubatanidzwa Naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake

bvunza: Ungabatanidzwa sei naKristu mukufanana nekumuka kwake?
mhinduro: Ku“dya nokunwa nyama neropa raShe” ndiko kubatanidzwa naKristu mukufanana nokumuka kwake → Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kana musingadyi nyama nokunwa ropa roumwari. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu uye anonwa ropa rangu achava noupenyu husingaperi mandiri, neni maari. - Johane 6:53-56.

(3) Idya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru

Zvandakaparidza kwamuri ndizvo zvandakagamuchira kubva kuna She nousiku hwaakapandukirwa, Ishe Jesu akatora chingwa, akavonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa. imi.” (Mapumburu ekare: Yakaputswa), itai izvi muchindirangarira, uye akatora mukombe, akati, “Mukombe uyu ndiwo sungano itsva muropa rangu muchindirangarira.” Nguva dzose kana muchidya chingwa ichi nokunwa mukombe uyu, munoparidza rufu rwaShe kusvikira achidzoka. 1 VaKorinte 11:23-26

【 3】Pfeka Kristu uye ugamuchire kukudzwa

Naizvozvo imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu. VaGaratia 3:26-27

bvunza: Zvinorevei kupfeka Kristu?
mhinduro: "Pfeka Kristu" → "Pfeka" zvinoreva kuputira kana kuvhara, "kupfeka" zvinoreva kupfeka, kupfeka → Patinopfeka mweya, mweya uye muviri zvaKristu "munhu mutsva," tinopfeka Kristu. ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? →Pfeka Ishe Jesu Kristu nguva dzose uye musaronga kuti nyama iite kuchiva kwayo. Chirevo - VaRoma 13:14. Cherechedza: Mwari chiedza, uye maari hamuna rima zvachose - 1 Johane 1:5 → Jesu akati kumunhu wose zvakare, "Ndini chiedza chenyika. Uyo anonditevera haangatongofambi murima, asi achava chiedza cheupenyu." Johane 8:12. Naizvozvo, kana tikapfeka munhu mutsva uye tikapfeka Kristu chete ndipo patinogona kupenya, kuva nembiri, uye kukudza Mwari! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Hymn: Ndiri pano

OK! Ndizvo chete nokuda kwekukurukurirana kwanhasi uye kugoverana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Ameni

articles.title: (1) Evhangeri yoruponeso inobva pakutenda;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma Chitsauko 1 uye ndima 17 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.”

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Ruponeso neKubwinya" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodikanwa Baba Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinotenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kuzotipa huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa kare neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, rinova iro shoko ratakatemerwa naMwari kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe pamberi pavose. kusingaperi! Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti Mwari akagara atitemera kuti tiponeswe uye tikudzwe nyika isati yavambwa!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Nhanganyaya: Vhangeri roruponeso rinoti "" Kubva pakutenda ", Evhangeri yekubwinya ichiri" tsamba ” → kuitira kuti tsamba . Ameni! Ruponeso ndirwo hwaro, uye kukudzwa kunobva paruponeso.

Handina nyadzi pamusoro pevhangeri, nokuti isimba raMwari roruponeso kuna ani naani anotenda, kumuJudha pakutanga, uye kumuGirikiwo. Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” ( VaRoma 1:16-17 )

【1】Evhangeri yoruponeso inobva nokutenda

bvunza: Vhangeri roruponeso rinobva pakutenda. Ivhangeri ripi iro munhu anotenda mariri kuti aponeswe?
mhinduro: Kutenda muna Iye akatumwa naMwari ibasa raMwari → Johani 6:28-29 Vakamubvunza kuti, “Tinofanira kuitei kuti tinzi tiri kuita basa raMwari?” Jesu akapindura kuti, “Kutenda muna Iye akatumwa naMwari ndiko kuita basa raMwari.”

bvunza: Unotenda kuti Mwari akatuma ani?
mhinduro: “Muponesi Jesu Kristu” nekuti achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo → Mateu 1:20-21
Achiri kufunga izvozvo, mutumwa waShe akazviratidza kwaari mukurota akati, “Josefa, mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, usatya hako, tora Maria mukadzi wako, nokuti icho chaakagamuchira kubva kuMweya Mutsvene. ." Iye achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti Jesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo.

bvunza: Ibasa ripi ratakaitirwa neMuponesi Jesu Kristu?
mhinduro: Jesu Kristu "akaita basa guru" kwatiri → "evhangeri yeruponeso rwedu", uye tichaponeswa nokutenda muevhangeri iyi →
Zvino ndinokuzivisai, hama, evhangeri yandakakuparidzirai, ramakagamuchira, ramakamira mairi, muchaponeswa nevhangeri iri. Chandakakumikidzawo kwamuri chaiva chokuti: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neMagwaro. Ameni! Ameni, saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Nongedzera kuna 1 VaKorinte ganhuro 15 ndima 1-3 .

Cherechedza: Vhangeri isimba raMwari, uye kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri. Kururama uku kunobva pakutenda yoruponeso kune vari kunze→ Chekutanga, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neBhaibheri. 1 tisunungurei kubva kuchivi. 2 kusunungurwa pamurairo nekutuka kwawo" ndokuvigwa " 3 “Akabva kumunhu akwegura nenzira dzake” uye maererano neBhaibheri, akamutswa pazuva rechitatu “ 4 Kuti tiruramiswe, tigozvarwa patsva, tigomutswa, tiponeswe, uye tive noupenyu husingaperi.” → Kana ukatenda, uchaponeswa nokutenda muvhangeri iri! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

【2】Evhangeri yekubwinya inotungamirira kukutenda

bvunza: Vhangeri rokubwinya nderomunhu anotenda → Ivhangeri ripi raanotenda kuti rikudzwe?
mhinduro: 1 Vhangeri isimba raMwari rokuponesa munhu wose anotenda mariri Ruponeso muvhangeri runobva pakutenda vanhu. Kana ukatenda, uchaponeswa nokutenda muvhangeri iri;
2 Evhangeri yekubwinya ichiri "kutenda" → kuitira kuti kutenda kunokudzwe . Saka ivhangeri ripi raungatenda mariri kuti ugamuchire mbiri? → Kutenda muna Jesu kunoda avo vakatumwa naBaba zve" Munyaradzi ",ndizvo" mweya wechokwadi ", kuita matiri" vandudza "basa, kuti tigokudzwa → "Kana muchindida, muchachengeta mirayiro yangu. Uye ndichakumbira Baba, uye vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi (kana kuti Munyaradzi; iye ari pasi apa), kuti ave nemi nokusingaperi, uyo ari Nyika haigoni kugamuchira. Mweya wazvokwadi; nokuti haumuoni, kana kumuziva, asi imi munomuziva, nokuti ugere nemi, uchava mukati menyu.

bvunza: Irudzii rwebasa rekuvandudza rinoitwa ne“Mweya Mutsvene” matiri?
mhinduro: Mwari kuburikidza nerubhabhatidzo rwekuzvarwa patsva uye nebasa rekuvandudza reMweya Mutsvene → Ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu nerudo rwaMwari Baba ngarudururwe zvakanyanya patiri nemumwoyo yedu →Akatiponesa, kwete nemabasa okururama atakaita, asi maererano netsitsi dzake, nokushambidzwa kwekuzvarwa patsva nekuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene. Mweya Mutsvene ndiwo wakadururwa patiri naMwari zvikuru kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, Muponesi wedu, kuti tiruramiswe nenyasha dzake uye tive vadyi venhaka mutariro youpenyu husingaperi (kana kushandurwa: nhaka youpenyu husingaperi mutariro). Tito 3:5-7 → Tariro haitinyadziswi, nokuti rudo rwaMwari rwakadururirwa mumwoyo yedu noMweya Mutsvene watakapiwa. Chirevo – VaRoma 5:5.

Cherechedza: Mweya Mutsvene wakapiwa kwatiri unodurura rudo rwaMwari mumwoyo yedu, uye rudo rwaMwari ruri matiri pachena Nekuda kwaKristu" kufanana “Kana tapedza murayiro, “tinotenda” kuti Kristu akazadzisa murayiro, kureva kuti tazadzisa murayiro, nokuti Kristu ari matiri. pachena , tinogara muna Kristu, Ipapo ndipo patinogona kukudzwa . Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Kugovera zvinyorwa zveEvhangeri, zvakafemerwa neMweya waMwari, Hama Wang*Yun, mushandi waJesu Kristu , Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen - nevamwe vashandi pamwe navo, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Vanoparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

Hymn: Ndinotenda, ndinotenda!

horaiti! Nhasi ndichataura uye ndichagoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye kufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: “Kutemerwa 3” Mwari akatitemera kuti tive nembiri
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 1 VaKorinte 2 Chitsauko 7 Zvatinotaura ndihwo huchenjeri hwaMwari hwakavigwa, uhwo Mwari akagara atemera nyika isati yavapo kuti tive kubwinya kwedu.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Chengetedza" Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinoonga Ishe nokutumira vashandi kuzotipa uchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa munguva yakapfuura, iro shoko iro Mwari akafanotemera kuti tive nembiri pamberi penguva, kupfurikidza neshoko rezvokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye “rakataurwa” →
Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti Mwari anotibvumira kuziva chakavanzika chekuda Kwake maererano nechinangwa Chake chakanaka → Mwari akafanoronga kuti tive nembiri pamberi pekusingaperi!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

[1] Muve makabatana naye mukufanana kwerufu, uye nemiwo muchabatanidzwa naye mukufanana kwekumuka kwake.

VaRoma 6:5 Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake, tichabatanawo naye pakumuka kwake;

(1) Kana takabatanidzwa naye mukufanana norufu rwake

bvunza: Ungabatanidzwa sei naKristu mukufanana kwerufu rwake?
mhinduro: “Kubhabhatidzwa murufu rwake” → Ko hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Reference--VaRoma Chitsauko 6 Vhesi 3

bvunza: Chinangwa chokubhabhatidzwa ndechei?

mhinduro: "Kupfeka Kristu" kunoita kuti tifambe muhupenyu hutsva → Naizvozvo, imi mose muri vanakomana vaMwari kubudikidza nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu. Imi mose makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu makapfeka Kristu. Chirevo - VaGaratia 3:26-27 → Naizvozvo takavigwa naye nokubhabhatidzwa murufu, kuti tifambe muhupenyu hutsva, saKristu akaberekwa kubva kuvakafa nokubwinya kwaBaba Mumwe chete nokumuka. VaRoma 3:4

(2) Kubatanidzwa Naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake

bvunza: Vakabatana sei mukufanana nekumuka kwaKristu?
mhinduro: "Idyai uye inwa Chirairo chaShe" → Jesu akati: "Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, Kana musingadyi nyama yoMwanakomana womunhu nokunwa ropa roMwanakomana womunhu, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Munhu anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi, uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira Maari Reference—Johani 6:53-56 uye 1 VaKorinde 11:23-26

【2】Simudza muchinjikwa wako utevere Jesu

Mako 8:34-35 BDMCS - Ipapo akadana vanhu vazhinji navadzidzi vake akati kwavari, “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake anditevere, nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake. (kana kuti: mweya; zvakafanana pazasi) acharasikirwa noupenyu hwake; asi ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa.

(1) Ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa.

bvunza: “Chinangwa” chokutakura muchinjikwa uye kutevera Jesu chii?
mhinduro: "Chinangwa" ndechekurasikirwa nehupenyu "hwekare" kuponesa hupenyu "hutsva" → Uyo anokoshesa hupenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; munhu” anorarama kuupenyu husingaperi. Chiratidzo - Johani 12:25

(2) Pfeka munhu mutsva uye ruzivo rwekubvisa murume wekare

bvunza: Pfeka munhu mutsva; Chinangwa "Chii ichochi?"
mhinduro: " Chinangwa "ndizvo" Newcomer "Zvishoma nezvishoma vandudza uye ukure;" murume mukuru “Achibvisa, achibvisa kushata → munhu mutsva ari kuvandudzwa muzivo, mumufananidzo woMusiki wake. References - VaKorose 3:10 → Bvisa munhu wekare nenzira yawakambozvibata nayo, uyu munhu akwegura nokuda kwokunyengera kwezvishuvo zvoudyire— VaEfeso 4:22

bvunza: Hatina "takatobvisa" murume wekare here? Sei uchiri kufanira kubvisa mudhara? → VaKorose 3:9 Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare nemiitiro yawo.
mhinduro: Tinotenda mukurovererwa, kufa, kuvigwa uye kumutswa pamwe chete naKristu → " Rutendo abvisa murume mukuru ", vanhu vedu vekare vachiripo uye vachiri kuonekwa → Ingoibvisa uye "experience kuibvisa" →Pfuma yakaiswa mumudziyo wevhu icharatidzwa, uye "munhu mutsva" acharatidzwa pashoma napashoma uye anokura neMweya Mutsvene kuti azere nechimiro chaKristu; kure, kushatiswa (kuora), kudzokera kuguruva, uye kudzokera kune zvisina maturo→ Naizvozvo, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo “munhu wekare” ari kuparara kunze, “munhu mutsva muna Kristu” ari kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva mukati. Matambudziko edu echinguvana uye akareruka achatiitira kubwinya kusingagumi kusingaenzaniswi. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Reference--2 Vakorinde 4 ndima 16-17

【3】Paridza vhangeri roumambo hwokudenga pamusana wako

(1) Kana tichitambudzika naye, uye vachakudzwa pamwe chete naye

VaRoma 8:17 Uye kana vari vana, naizvozvo vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye.
VaFiripi 1:29 Nokuti imi makapiwa kuti kwete kutenda muna Kristu bedzi, asi kuti mutambudzike nokuda kwake.

(2) Kuda kutambura

1 Petro 4:1-2 Sezvo Kristu akatambudzika panyama, Iwe unofanirwawo kushandisa rudzi urwu rwekushuvira sechombo , nokuti uyo akatambura panyama aregwa pachivi. Nomwoyo wakadaro, kubva zvino unogona kurarama nguva yasara munyika ino kwete nokuchiva kwavanhu asi maererano nokuda kwaMwari bedzi.
1 Petro 5:10 Mushure mokutambudzika kwechinguva chiduku, Mwari wenyasha dzose, akakudanirai kukubwinya kwake kusingaperi muna Kristu, iye pachake achakwanisa, anokusimbisai uye achakusimbisai.

(3) Mwari vakagara varonga kuti tikudzwe

Tinoziva kuti zvinhu zvose zvinobata pamwe kuti zvinakire avo vanoda Mwari, avo vakadamwa sezvaakafunga. avo vaakagara aziva Kugara akatsunga kutevedzerwa neMwanakomana wake~ " Takura muchinjikwa wako, utevere Jesu, uparidze evhangeri yeushe hwekudenga ” uye akaita mwanakomana wake dangwe pakati pehama zhinji. predetermined nevakange vari pasi ndivo vaakadana; Avo vaakaruramisa, ndivo vaakakudzawo; . Chirevo-VaRoma 8:28-30

Nyasha idzi dzakapiwa kwatiri naMwari nouchenjeri hwose nokunzwisisa kwose; maererano nokuda kwake , kuti tizive chakavanzika chokuda kwake, kuti pakuzara kwenguva zvinhu zvose zviri kudenga napanyika zvibatanidzwe muna Kristu. Maari tinewo nhaka, iye anoita zvinhu zvose nokuda kwokuda kwake. akagadzwa maererano nokuda kwake . Chirevo-VaEfeso 1:8-11→ Zvatiri kutaura nezvazvo ndizvo zvakavanzwa kare , uchenjeri hwakavanzika hwaMwari, hwakatemerwa kubwinya kwedu nokusingaperi. . Ameni! Chirevo - 1 VaKorinte 2:7

Titambire hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kutsvaga nebrowser yako - kereke munashe Jesu Kristu -Batana nesu mushande pamwe chete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

articles.title: “Kutemerwa 2” Mwari akafanosarudza kuti tiponeswe kubudikidza naJesu Kristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 1 VaTesaronika chitsauko 5 ndima 9 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti Mwari haana kutisarudza kuti tive vokutsamwirwa, asi kuti tiponeswe kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Chengetedza" Aihwa. 2 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo → kuti atipe huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakavigwa munguva yakapfuura, shoko iro Mwari akafanorongera kuti tive nembiri pamberi pemakore ose!

Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Nyengetera kuti Ishe Jesu arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya Mwari akatitemera kare kuti tiponeswe kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Munhu wose akanga atemerwa upenyu husingaperi akatenda

Mabasa 13:48 VaHedheni vakati vachinzwa izvi, vakafara uye vakarumbidza shoko raMwari uye vose vakanga vakagadzirirwa upenyu husingaperi vakatenda.
Mubvunzo: Munhu wese anotarisirwa kuwana hupenyu husingaperi anotenda sei kuti awane hupenyu husingaperi?
Mhinduro: Tenda kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu! Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Tenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu

Mutumwa akati kwaari: Usatya Maria; wanzwirwa nyasha naMwari. Uchava nemimba, ugozvara mwanakomana, uchamutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu; iye uchava mukuru, uchanzi Mwanakomana woMwanakomana woMunhu. Ishe Mwari achamuita mukuru uye achatonga pamusoro peimba yaJakobho nokusingaperi, uye umambo hwake hahungavi nomugumo simba roWokumusorosoro richakufukidza, uye uyo achaberekwa achava mutsvene, uye achanzi Mwanakomana waMwari. Ruka 1:30- Ndima 35 → Jesu akati, “Imi munoti ndini ani? Simoni Petro akamupindura, akati: Ndimi Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu. ” Mateu 16:15-16

(2) Tenda kuti Jesu iShoko rakava munhu

Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. ... Shoko rakava nyama (ndiko kuti, Mwari akava nyama, akabatwa pamuviri neMhandara Maria, akaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene, akanzi Jesu!- Ona Mateo 1:21), akagara pakati pedu, azere nenyasha nechokwadi. . uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. …Hakuna akamboona Mwari, asi Mwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, ari pachifuva chaBaba, ndiye akamuratidza. Johane 1:1, 14, 18

(3) Tenda kuti Mwari akagadza Jesu sechibayiro chokuyananisa

VaRoma 3:25 Mwari vakagadza Jesu kuti ave muyananisi kubudikidza neropa raJesu uye nokutenda, kuti aratidze kururama kwaMwari nokuti nokutsungirira kwake akakanganwira zvivi zvavanhu zvakaitwa kare, 1 Johane 4 Vhesi 10 Hakusi kuti tinoda Mwari, asi kuti Mwari anotida uye akatuma Mwanakomana wake kuti ave rudzikinuro rwezvivi zvedu , urwu ndirwo rudo → “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda maari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi … Anotenda muMwanakomana ane upenyu husingaperi Mwanakomana haangavi noupenyu husingaperi ( (chinyorwa chokutanga: haangaoni upenyu husingaperi), uye kutsamwa kwaMwari kunogara pamusoro pake.” Johane 3:16, 36 .

【2】Mwari vakatitemera kare kuti tive vanakomana

(1) Kudzikinura vari pasi pomutemo kuti tigamuchire kuva vanakomana

Asi nguva yakati yakwana, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nomukadzi, akaberekwa pasi pomurairo, kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vanakomana. Sezvo muri vanakomana, Mwari akatuma Mweya woMwanakomana wake mumwoyo yenyu (yekutanga: yedu) achidanidzira achiti, “Abha, Baba!” uye sezvo uri mwanakomana, unovimba naMwari kuti ndiye mugari wenhaka yake. VaGaratia 4:4-7 .

bvunza: Pane chinhu pasi pemurairo here? mwari Hukomana?
mhinduro: Aihwa. Sei? →Nokuti simba rechivi ndiwo murayiro, uye vari pasi pomurayiro varanda, muranda haazi mwanakomana, naizvozvo haana umwanakomana. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:56

(2) Mwari akafanosarudza kuti tive vanakomana kuburikidza naJesu Kristu

Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Akatiropafadza nokuropafadza kwose kwomweya munzvimbo dzokudenga muna Kristu: Mwari sezvaakatisarudza maari nyika isati yavambwa kuti tive vatsvene uye vasina chavangapomerwa pamberi pake nokuda kworudo rwake kwatiri, akatisarudza maari mukugamuchirwa sevanakomana kubudikidza naJesu Kristu maererano nezvaanoda nokuda kwake, VaEfeso 1:3–5

【3】Mwari wakatitemera kare kuti tiponeswe kubudikidza naIshe Jesu Kristu

(1) Tenda muvhangeri roruponeso

Muapostora Pauro akati → “Evhangeri” yandakakuparidziraiwo: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro → (1 kuti atisunungure pachivi; 2 kuti atisunungure pamutemo nomutemo Kutuka ) - tarisa kuna VaRoma 6:7, 7:6 uye vaGaratiya 3:13, uye kuvigwa (3 kuparadzaniswa nemunhu wekare nenzira dzake dzekare) - tarisawo VaKorose 3:9; takamutswa nezuva retatu (4 kuti tiruramiswe, tigozvarwa patsva, tiponeswe, uye tive noupenyu husingaperi! Ameni) - tarisa kuna VaRoma chitsauko 4 ndima 25, 1 Petro chitsauko 1 ndima 3-4 uye 1 VaKorinde 15 chitsauko 3- 4 Mutambo

(2) Mwari akafanosarudza kuti tiponeswe kubudikidza naIshe Jesu Kristu

1 VaTesaronika 5:9 Nokuti Mwari haana kutigadza kuti tive vokutsamwirwa, asi kuti tiponeswe kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
VaEfeso 2:8 Makaponeswa nenyasha kubudikidza nokutenda, uye izvi hazvibvi kwamuri, asi chipo chaMwari;
VaHebheru 5:9 akati akwaniswa, akazova muvambi woruponeso rusingaperi kuna avo vanomuteerera.

Titambire hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kutsvaga nebrowser yako - kereke yashe jesu kristu -Batana nesu mushande pamwe chete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

articles.title: “Kutemerwa 1” Kufanotemerwa kwaMwari
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure maBhaibheri edu kuna VaEfeso 1:8-10 toaverenga pamwe chete: Nyasha idzi dzakapiwa kwatiri kubudikidza naMwari muuchenjeri hwose nokunzwisisa kwose, maererano nokuda kwake kwakanaka, kwaakagara atemera kuti atizivise chakavanzika chokuda kwake, kuti pakuzara kwenguva aite kuti aite kuti nguva ikwane. zvinhu zvekudenga maererano nehurongwa hwake , zvese zviri panyika zvakabatana muna Kristu. Ameni

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Chengetedza" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinokutendai Jehovha nokutumira vashandi kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko ake → kuti atipe uchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa munguva dzakapfuura, iro shoko ratakarongerwa naMwari makore asati avapo kuti akudzwe. .
Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya→ Nzwisisa kuti Mwari anotitendera kuziva chakavanzika chekuda Kwake maererano nechinangwa Chake chakanaka chakafanotemerwa.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Kubhukha

1 bvunza: Kuchengetera chii?
mhinduro: Ziva pachine nguva, sarudza pachine nguva!

2 bvunza: Kufanoziva chii?
mhinduro: Zvinhu hazvina kuitika, ziva pamberi! →Mateu 24:25 Tarirai, ndafanokuudzai.

3 bvunza: Chii chinonzi uporofita?
mhinduro: Ziva mberi zvisati zvaitika, taura mberi!

4 bvunza: Chii chinonzi kufanotaura?
mhinduro: Ziva pachine uye uzvitaure! "Kufanana nemamiriro ekunze"

5 bvunza: Chii chinonzi mhando?
mhinduro: Kufanoziva, kuita kuti zvinhu zvizivikanwe, kuzvizivisa!

6 bvunza: Chii chinonzi kudzivirira?
mhinduro: Ziva pachine nguva, tora matanho ekuzvidzivirira pachine nguva

7 bvunza: Chii chinonzi shura?
mhinduro: Premonition, omen, omen, chiratidzo chinoonekwa chimwe chinhu chisati chaitika! →Mateu Chitsauko 24 Ndima 3 Jesu paakanga agere paGomo reMiorivhi, vadzidzi vake vakati vari voga: “Tiudzei, zvinhu izvi zvichaitika rini?

【2】Kufanoronga kwaMwari

(1) Mwari akafanosarudza Adamu kuti aponeswe

Jehovha Mwari akaitira Adhamu nomukadzi wake nguo dzamatehwe uye akavapfekedza. Genesisi 3:21 →---Adhamu mufananidzo wemunhu aizouya. VaRoma Chitsauko 5 Ndima 14 → Kwakanyorwawo muBhaibheri, kuti: “Munhu wokutanga, Adhama, akava munhu mupenyu nomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti rakashandurwa kuva nyama)”; 1 VaKorinte 15:45

bvunza: “Nguo dzematehwe” dzavanofanira kupfeka dzinomiririrei?
mhinduro: Nguo dzakagadzirwa nedehwe remhuka yainge yaurayiwa “gwayana” dzaiiswa paari → dzaifananidzira Kristu segwayana rakaurayirwa “Adhamu”, kureva kuti, zvivi zvedu akafira pamuchinjikwa, akavigwa, uye akamutswa pamuchinjikwa zuva rechitatu → Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa uye akazvarwa patsva kuti apfeke munhu mutsva, kuti apfeke Kristu. Kureva kuti, Adamu wekare aive" Preimage, mumvuri ", akamuka kubva kuvakafa" Kristu "Ndizvo Kufanana kwaAdamu chaiko → "" Kristu "Ndizvo adam chaiye saka anonzi " yekupedzisira adam “Mwanakomana waMwari – kureva dzinza raJesu muna Ruka 3:38, Isuwo tiri Adhamu wokupedzisira , nokuti tiri mitezo yomuviri waKristu! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Kuroorana kwaIsaka naRebheka kwakanga kwafanorongwa naMwari

Kana akati, Imwai henyu, ndichacherera makamera enyu mvura, iye ngaave mukadzi wakatsaurirwa mwanakomana watenzi wangu naJehovha; ’ Ndisati ndapedza kutaura zvaiva mumwoyo mangu, Rabheka akabuda aine chirongo chemvura papfudzi rake uye akaburuka kutsime kunochera mvura. Ndakati kwaari: ‘Ndapota ndipewo mvura. ’ Akakurumidza kubvisa bhodhoro papfudzi rake ndokuti, ‘Ndapota inwai! ndichanwisawo makamera enyu; ’ Naizvozvo ndakanwa; uye akapa ngamera dzangu chimwe chinhu kuti chinwe. Genesisi 24:44-46

(3) Kutonga kwaDhavhidhi samambo kwakafanotemerwa naMwari

Jehovha akati kuna Samueri, Uchachema Sauro kusvikira rinhiko, zvandakamuramba kuti asava mambo waIsiraeri? Zadza gonamombe rako namafuta okuzodza nawo, ndikutume kuna Jese muBheterehemu, nekuti ndiri pakati pavanhu vake; akagadza mambo pakati pavanakomana vake.” 1 Samueri 16:1 .

(4) Kuberekwa kwaKristu kwakafanotemerwa naMwari

Ishe vachatumawo Kristu (Jesu) akatemerwa kuti iwe uuye. Denga richamuchengeta kusvikira pakudzorerwa kwezvinhu zvose, zvakataurwa naMwari nomuromo wavaporofita vake vatsvene kubva pakusikwa kwenyika. Mabasa 3:20-21

(5) Kutambura kwaKristu nokuda kwezvivi zvedu kwakatemerwa kare naMwari

Kunyange zvazvo Mwanakomana woMunhu achafa sezvazvakatemwa, vane nhamo avo vanopandukira Mwanakomana woMunhu! Ruka 22:22 → Akatakura zvivi zvedu pamuviri wake pamuti, kuti isu, takafa kuzvivi, tiraramire kururama; namavanga ake makaporeswa. Makanga makaita segwai rakarasika, asi zvino madzokera kuMufudzi noMutariri wemweya yenyu 1 Petro 2:24-25.

Titambire hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kuti mushandise browser kutsvaga - Ishe kereke muna Jesu Kristu -Batana nesu mushande pamwe chete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

Bata QQ 2029296379 kana 869026782

OK! Ndizvo chete nokuda kwekutaura uye kugoverana nemi nhasi ndinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Ameni

articles.title: Vazhinji vakadanwa, asi vashoma vanosanangurwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Mateo Chitsauko 22 Ndima 14 Nekuti vazhinji vakadamwa, asi vashoma vanosanangurwa.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana “Vazhinji vakadanwa, asi vashoma vakasarudzwa” Namata: Baba voKudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo → kuti atipe huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakavigwa munguva yakapfuura, shoko iro Mwari akafanorongera kuti tive nembiri pamberi pemakore ose! Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti vazhinji vakadanwa, asi vashoma vanosanangurwa .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Vazhinji vanodaidzwa

(1) Mufananidzo weMuchato

Jesu akataurawo kwavari nemifananidzo achiti: “Umambo hwokudenga hwakafanana namambo akagadzirira mwanakomana wake mutambo wemuchato, Mateu 22:1-2

bvunza: Mabiko omuchato wamambo womwanakomana wake anofananidzirei?
mhinduro: Chirairo chomuchato chaKristu Gwayana→ Ngatifare uye timukudze. Nokuti muchato weGwayana wasvika, uye mwenga agadzirira, uye akapiwa nyasha kuti apfeke rineni yakanaka kwazvo inopenya, inopenya. (Mucheka wakanaka ndiwo kururama kwavatsvene.) Mutumwa akati kwandiri, Nyora, uti: Vakaropafadzwa vakakokwa kuchirayiro chomuchato weGwayana! ” Zvakazarurwa 19:7-9
Saka akatuma varanda vake kunokoka vaya vakanga vakokwa kumutambo, asi vakaramba kuuya. Mateu 22:3

bvunza: Tumira muranda Efa ndiani?
mhinduro: Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari → Muranda wangu achafamba akachenjera uye achakwidziridzwa uye achave wepamusoro-soro. Isaya 52:13 “Tarirai, muranda wangu, wandakasanangura, mudikamwa wangu, unofadza moyo wangu;
Ipapo mambo akatuma vamwe varanda, akati, Udzai vakakokerwa, kuti mutambo wangu wagadzirwa; nzombe nemhuru dzakakora zvabayiwa, uye zvose zvagadzirwa; ’—Mateu 22:4

bvunza: Ndiani akanga ari “mumwe muranda” mambo akatumwa?
mhinduro: Vaporofita vakatumwa naMwari muTesitamende yekare, vaapositori vakatumwa naJesu, maKristu, nengirozi, nezvimwewo.

1 Avo vakadanwa

Vanhu ivavo havana kumuteerera ndokuenda kumunda wake; mumwe wacho akaenda kunoita bhizimisi. yakazara; Vakadyarwa paminzwa ndivo vakanzwa shoko, asi gare gare kufunganya kwenyika nokunyengera kwemari zvakavhunga shoko, rikasagona kubereka zvibereko → ndiko kuti, harina kubereka “zvibereko * zvibereko zve Mweya.” Vanhu ava vakaponeswa chete, asi vakanga vasina kubwinya. , vasina mubayiro, kana korona. Reference-Mateo 13 Chitsauko 7, Ndima 22

2 Vaya vanoshora chokwadi

vakasara vakabata varanda, vakavanyomba, vakavauraya; Mambo akatsamwa kwazvo, akatuma varwi kundoparadza mhondi nokupisa guta ravo. Mateu 22:6-7

bvunza: Vamwe vose vakabata muranda ndivanaani?
mhinduro: Vanhu vaSatani nadhiyabhorosi → ndakaona chikara nemadzimambo enyika nemauto avo ose vakaungana kuti varwe naiye akanga akatasva bhiza jena neuto rake. Chikara chakabatwa, uye muprofita wenhema, akaita zvishamiso pamberi pacho kuti atsause vaya vakagamuchira chiratidzo chechikara uye vaya vanonamata mufananidzo wacho, akabatwa pamwe chete nechikara. Vaviri vavo vakakandwa mudziva remoto unopfuta nesarufa vari vapenyu; Zvakazarurwa 19:19-21

3. Kusapfeka zvipfeko zvepamutemo, munyengeri

Zvino akati kuvaranda vake: Mutambo wemuchato wagadzirwa, asi avo vakadamwa havana kufanira. Naizvozvo kwirai pamharadzano yenzira mundokokera kumutambo vose vamunowana. ’ Naizvozvo varanda vakabuda vakaenda kumugwagwa, vakaunganidza vose vavakasangana navo, vose vakanaka nevakaipa, uye mabiko acho akazadzwa nevaya vakanga vakokwa. Mambo paakapinda kuti atarise vakanga vakokwa, akaona mumwe munhu imomo akanga asina kupfeka hembe, saka akati kwaari, “Shamwari, wavingei pano usina kupfeka? ’ Murume wacho akashaya zvokutaura. Ipapo mambo akati kunhume yake, ‘Musungei makumbo nemaoko, mumukandire kurima rokunze; ’—Mateu 22:8-13

bvunza: Kusapfeka hanzu kunorevei?
mhinduro: Kwete “kuberekwa patsva” kupfeka munhu mutsva uye kupfeka Kristu → Kusapfeka rineni yakapfava, inopenya nechena (rineni yakanaka kwazvo ndiyo kururama kwevatsvene) Reference Bible - Zvakazarurwa 19:8

bvunza: Ndiani asina kupfeka zvipfeko zvepamutemo?
mhinduro: Kune “vaFarisi vanonyengera, vaprofita venhema nehama dzenhema muchechi, uye vanhu vasinganzwisisi shoko rechokwadi reevhangeri → Rudzi urwu rwevanhu vanoverevedza vachipinda mudzimba dzevanhu uye vachiisa mujeri vakadzi vasingazivi , Vachiedzwa nokuchiva kwakasiyana-siyana uye vachifunda nguva dzose, havasati vachizotongonzwisisa nzira yechokwadi— 2 Timotio 3:6-7 .

[2] Vanhu vashoma vanosarudzwa, kune zana, nguva makumi matanhatu, uye makumi matatu.

(1) Inzwa mharidzo vanhu vanonzwisisa

Nekuti vazhinji vakadamwa, asi vashoma vanosanangurwa. ” Mateu 22:14

Mubvunzo: “Vashoma vakasarudzwa” vanorevei?
Mhinduro: Uyo anonzwa shoko onzwisisa → Uye imwe inowira muvhu rakanaka ndokubereka zvibereko; zana Nguva, hongu makumi matanhatu Nguva, hongu makumi matatu nguva. Une nzeve dzekunzwa ngaanzwe! ” → Akadyarwa muvhu rakanaka ndiye anonzwa shoko orinzwisisa, obva abereka zvibereko, oita zana Nguva, hongu makumi matanhatu Nguva, hongu makumi matatu nguva. ” Nhungamiro-Mateo 13:8-9,23

(2) Avo vakadanwa maererano nechinangwa Chake, vakatemerwa kubwinya

Tinoziva kuti zvinhu zvose zvinobata pamwe kuti zvinakire avo vanoda Mwari, avo vakadamwa sezvaakafunga. Nekuti vaakagara aziva, wakagarawo avatemera kuti vafanane nemufananidzo weMwanakomana wake, kuti ave dangwe pakati pehama zhinji. Avo vaakagara atemerawo, ndivo vaakadanawo; Chirevo-VaRoma 8:28-30

OK! Ndizvo chete nokuda kwekukurukurirana kwanhasi uye kugoverana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Ameni

articles.title: Murairo ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 7 ndima 14 Tinoziva kuti murayiro ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa kuzvivi.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Mutemo ndeweMweya" Namata: Baba voKudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo → kuti atipe huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakavigwa munguva yakapfuura, shoko iro Mwari akafanorongera kuti tive nembiri pamberi pemakore ose! Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Munzwisise kuti murayiro ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa kuzvivi. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Mutemo ndewemweya

Tinoziva kuti murayiro ndowomweya, asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa kuzvivi. —VaRoma 7:14

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuti murairo ndewemweya?
mhinduro: Mutemo ndewemweya → “we” zvinoreva kuva, uye “wemweya” → Mwari mweya – kureva Johani 4:24, zvinoreva kuti mutemo ndewaMwari.

bvunza: Sei mutemo uri wemweya uye wehumwari?
mhinduro: Nokuti mutemo wakagadzwa naMwari → Pane mumwe chete mupi wemitemo uye mutongi, uyo anogona kuponesa uye kuparadza. Iwe ndiwe ani kuti utonge vamwe? Reference - Jakobho 4:12 → Mwari anodzika mitemo uye anotonga vanhu Kunongova naMwari mumwe chete anogona kuponesa vanhu kana kuvaparadza. Naizvozvo, “murairo ndowomweya nowaMwari”. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

bvunza: Mutemo wakatemerwa ani?
mhinduro: Mutemo hauna kuzviitira iye, kwete Mwanakomana, kana vakarurama, wakaitirwa "vatadzi" uye "varanda vezvivi" → nokuti murairo hauna kuitirwa vakarurama, asi vasingateereri mutemo, uye vasingateereri; vasingadi Mwari, navatadzi, navasingadi Mwari, naivo venyika, navaparadzi, nemhondi, nemhombwe, navaSodhoma, navapambi, navarevi venhema, navanopika nhema, kana chimwe chipi nechipi chinopesana nokururama. Cherechedza: Pakutanga kwaiva neTao, uye “Tao” ndiMwari → Mutemo wakagadzwa se“zvinhu zvinopesana nenzira yakarurama uye zvinopesana naMwari.” Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo - 1 Timotio Chitsauko 1:9-10 (Kusafanana navanhu mapenzi vari munyika vanofunga kuti vakachenjera, ivo vanogadza mutemo vamene, uye ipapo “kuisa” joko rinorema romurairo pamitsipa yavo. chivi → Kuzvipa mhosva, mubairo wechivi rufu, kuzviuraya)

(2) Asi ini ndiri wenyama

bvunza: Asi zvinorevei kuti ndiri wenyama?
mhinduro: Zvisikwa zvomudzimu zvinoshandurwawo sezvipenyu zvenyama uye zvipenyu zvenyama → Kwakanyorwawo muBhaibheri, kuti: “Munhu wokutanga, Adhama, akava munhu mupenyu nomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa senyama neropa)”; Adhamu akava mweya unopa upenyu. Reference - 1 VaKorinte 15:45 naGenesi 2:7 → Naizvozvo “Pauro” akati, Asi ini ndiri wenyama, munhu mupenyu womudzimu, chipenyu chenyama, chipenyu chenyama. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(3) Yakatengeswa kuchivi

bvunza: Nyama yangu yakatengeswa rinhi kuzvivi?
mhinduro: Nokuti kana tiri munyama, imhaka yokuti “ mutemo "uye" born "zve zvishuvo zvakaipa "ndizvo zvishuvo zvoudyire "inoshanda mumitezo yedu kuti ibereke chibereko chorufu → Kana kuchiva kuchinge kwaumbwa, kunobereka chivi; uye kana chivi chakura kwazvo, chinobereka rufu. Naizvozvo." mhosva " Ehe Uyo akaberekwa nomurayiro , saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Reference - Jakobho chitsauko 1 ndima 15 uye VaRoma chitsauko 7 ndima 5 → Izvi zvakangofanana nechivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, Adhamu, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, saka rufu rwakauya kumunhu wose nokuti munhu wose akatadza. VaRoma 5 ndima 12. Tose tiri vazukuru vaAdhamu naEvha Miviri yedu yakaberekwa nevabereki vavo saka yakatengeswa kuchivi. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(4) Kururama kwemurairo ngakuzadziswe matiri isu tisingateveri nyama asi tinotevera Mweya chete . —VaRoma 8:4

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuchengeta kururama kwemurairo kuti kusaenderane nenyama?
mhinduro: Mutemo mutsvene, uye mirayiro mitsvene, yakarurama, uye yakanaka - nongedzera kuna VaRoma 7:12 → Sezvo mutemo usina simba nokuda kwenyama, pane zvinhu zvausingagoni kuita → nokuti kana tiri munyama, kuti " nokuda kwomurayiro” “Mutemo” unobereka tsika dzakaipa, ndiko kuti, kuchiva kwoudyire.Kana kuchiva kwoudyire kuchinge kwave nemimba, kunobereka zvivi.“Kana muchiramba muchichengeta murayiro, zvivi zvinoberekwa. Mutemo ndewekuita kuti vanhu vazive nezvezvivi uye vazive zvakanaka nezvakaipa Mubairo wechivi kufa Kuziva Zvakanaka uye zvakaipa zvinofanira kufa , nokunaka” zvaidiwa nomutemo → Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake pachake kuti ave mufananidzo wenyama inotadza uye akava chibayiro chezvivi. Tarisa vaGaratiya 4:5 uye utaure nezvaVaRoma 8:3 → kuti kururama kwomutemo kuzadzike matiri, isu tisingararami maererano nenyama asi maererano nomudzimu. Ameni!

bvunza: Sei kururama kwemurairo kuchitevera avo vane Mweya chete?
mhinduro: Mutemo mutsvene, wakarurama, uye wakanaka→ kururama kunodiwa nomurayiro ndizvo Ida Mwari uye ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita! Munhu haagoni kutakura kururama kwomurairo nokuda kwokusava nesimba kwenyama, uye “kururama kwomurairo” kunogona bedzi kutevera avo vakazvarwa noMweya Mutsvene → Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati unofanira kuberekwa patsva kuti "kururama kwemurairo" kunogona kutevera vana vaMwari vakaberekwa neMweya Mutsvene → Kristu munhu mumwe " nokuti "Munhu wose akafa → Mwari akaita avo vakanga vasingazivi chivi, nokuti Takava chivi kuti tive kururama kwaMwari maari - tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:21 → Mwari akatiita muna Kristu → "Kururama kwaMwari". mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya uye hausi mufananidzo wechokwadi wechinhu → pfupiso yemurairo ndiKristu, uye mufananidzo wechokwadi wemurairo ndiKristu → kana ndikagara muna Kristu, ndinorarama mumufananidzo wechokwadi we mutemo; kana ndisingagari mu "" mumvuri womurayiro "Mukati - tarisa VaHebheru 10: 1 uye VaRoma 10: 4 → ndinogara mumufananidzo wemurairo: murairo mutsvene, wakarurama, uye wakanaka; Kristu mutsvene, akarurama, uye akanaka. Akanaka, ndinogara muna Kristu uye ndiri nhengo yemuviri wake, "pfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake" iniwo ndiri mutsvene, ndakarurama, uye akanaka → saka Mwari anoita " kururama kwomurayiro ” Izvi zvinozadziswa matiri isu tisingafambi maererano nenyama asi maererano neMweya.

Cherechedza: Mharidzo yaparidzwa muchinyorwa chino yakakosha zvikuru uye ine chekuita nekuti uri mumireniyamu here kana kuti kwete." mberi “Rumuko; Ndichiri MuMireniyamu” shure "Kumuka. Mireniyamu" mberi "Rumuko rune simba rokutonga → Sei une simba rokutonga? Nokuti uri mumufananidzo wechokwadi wemurairo, kwete mumumvuri wemurairo, saka une simba rekutonga → Agere pachigaro chikuru cheumambo. kutonga “ngirozi dzinoita zvakaipa dzakawa, mutongo Tongerai marudzi ose, vapenyu nevakafa” → Tonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru - nongedzera kuna Zvakazarurwa Chitsauko 20. Hama nehanzvadzi dzinofanira kubatisisa zvipikirwa zvaMwari uye dzisarasikirwa noudangwe hwadzo. saEsau.

OK! Ndizvo chete nokuda kwekukurukurirana kwanhasi uye kugoverana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Ameni
