articles.title: Murairo mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaHebheru chitsauko 10 ndima 1 tiverenge pamwe chete: Sezvo murayiro uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya uye usati uri mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu, haungakwanisi kuita avo vanoswedera pedyo nokupa chibayiro chimwe chete gore negore. .

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Murairo mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya 》Munamato: Baba voKudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo → Tipeiwo huchenjeri hwechakavanzika chaMwari chakanga chakavigwa kare, nzira iyo Mwari yaakatemera kare kuti tive nembiri pamberi pekusingaperi! Zvakaratidzwa kwatiri naMweya Mutsvene . Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti sezvo mutemo uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya, hausi mufananidzo wechokwadi wechinhu chaicho; Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Murairo mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya

Sezvo murayiro uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya uye usati uri mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chacho, haungakwanisi kuperedzera avo vanoswedera pedyo nokupa chibayiro chimwe chete gore rimwe nerimwe. VaHebheru 10:1

( 1 ) bvunza: Sei mutemo uripo?

mhinduro: Mutemo wakawedzerwa nokuda kwekudarika → Saka, sei mutemo uripo? Wakawedzerwa nokuda kwokudarika, uchimirira kuuya kwomwana akanga aitirwa chipikirwa, uye akasimbiswa nomurevereri kubudikidza navatumwa. Reference--VaGaratiya Chitsauko 3 Ndima 19

( 2 ) bvunza: Murayiro ndowowakarurama here? Kana kuti ndezvevatadzi here?
mhinduro: Nekuti murairo hauna kuitirwa vakarurama, asi vasingateereri murairo, nevasingateereri, vasingadi Mwari, nevatadzi, nevasingadi Mwari, nevenyika, nekuparadzwa nekuponda, nemhombwe, nemhombwe, nembavha, nevarevi venhema, nevanopika. nenhema, kana chimwe chipi nechipi chinopesana nokururama. Reference--1 Timotio Chitsauko 1 Ndima 9-10

( 3 ) bvunza: Sei mutemo uri mudzidzisi wedu?
mhinduro: Asi nheyo yoruponeso nokutenda haisati yasvika, uye tinochengetwa pasi pomurayiro kusvikira pakuzoratidzwa chokwadi. Nenzira iyi, murayiro ndiwo muperekedzi wedu, unotitungamirira kuna Kristu kuti tigoruramiswa nokutenda. Asi zvino nheyo yoruponeso nokutenda yasvika, hatisisiri pasi poruoko rwaTenzi. Chirevo - VaGaratiya Chitsauko 3 Ndima 23-25. Cherechedza: Mutemo mudzidzisi wedu unotitungamirira kuna Kristu kuti tiruramiswe nokutenda! Ameni. Zvino “nzira yechokwadi” zvayakazarurwa, hatichisiri pasi pemurairo “watenzi”, asi pasi penyasha dzaKristu. Ameni

( 4 ) bvunza: Sei mutemo uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya?

mhinduro: Pfupiso yemurairo ndiKristu - tarisa kuna VaRoma 10: 4 → Mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvichauya unoreva Kristu, " Shadow "Haisi mufananidzo wechokwadi wechinhu chekutanga." Kristu ” ndiwo mufananidzo wechokwadi → mutemo mumvuri, kana kuti mitambo, kugara kwomwedzi, nemaSabata zvinhu zvichauya. Shadow , asi chimiro ichocho ndiKristu - nongedzera kuna VaKorose 2:16-17 → Kungofanana ne“muti woupenyu”, zuva parinopenya zvisina kujeka pamuti, pane mumvuri pasi po“muti”, uri mumvuri wemuti. muti Mwanakomana, "mumvuri" hausi mufananidzo wechokwadi wechinhu chepakutanga "Muti weupenyu" mufananidzo wechokwadi, uye Kristu ndiye mufananidzo wechokwadi ndiwo mumvuri wechinhu chakanaka! Paunochengeta mutemo, iwe wakaenzana nekuchengetedza "mumvuri" unofungidzira uye hauna chinhu chechiedza chezuva. "Vana" vanozochembera uye nekuora uye nekukurumidza kunyangarika, kana ukachengeta mutemo, unozopedzisira wava "kushanda pasina, uchiedza kuchera mvura kubva mudengu remushenjere," uye hapana chauchawana panguva iyoyo. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ona VaHebheru 8:13

[2] Mumufananidzo wechokwadi wemutemo, une hukama nemireniyamu mberi rumuko

Mapisarema 1:2 Akaropafadzwa munhu anofarira murayiro waJehovha, anoufungisisa masikati nousiku.

bvunza: Mutemo waJehovha chii?
mhinduro: Mutemo waJehovha ndiwo “ mutemo waKristu "→"Mirayiro, mirau, nezvakatemwa" zvakanyorwa pamahwendefa ematombo oMutemo waMosesi zvose mimvuri yezvinhu zvakanaka mune ramangwana. Uchivimba ne“mumvuri”, unogona kuufunga siku nesikati→wana chimiro chacho. , tsvaga musimboti, uye tsvaga mufananidzo chaiwo→ Mufananidzo wechokwadi wemutemo Kamwe chete Ehe Kristu , chidimbu chomurayiro ndiKristu! Ameni. Naizvozvo, mutemo mudzidzisi wedu, unotitungamirira kuna Ishe Kristu uyo anoruramiswa nokutenda → kupukunyuka kubva " Shadow ", muna Kristu ! Muna Kristu ndiri “muna muviri Mune, mu Ontology Mune, mu Kuda chaiko Mu → mumutemo Kuda chaiko 里→Izvi zvinei newe kana Kumuka kuvakafa “pamberi” pemireniyamu, kana kuti “mumireniyamu” shure "Kumuka. Vatsvene vakamutswa" mireniyamu isati yasvika Iva nesimba rokutonga “Tongai vatumwa vakawa, mutonge marudzi ose” Kutonga naKristu makore ane chiuru → Ipapo ndakaona zvigaro zvoushe, navanhu vagere pazviri, uye vakapiwa simba rokutonga. Uye ndakaona kumuka kwemweya yevaya vakagurwa misoro nekuda kweuchapupu hwaJesu uye nekuda kweshoko raMwari, nevaya vasina kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho, kana kugamuchira chiratidzo pahuma dzavo kana pamaoko avo. uye vachatonga naKristu kwemakore ane chiuru. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo - Zvakazarurwa 20:4.

OK! Ndizvo chete zvekuyanana kwanhasi uye nekugovana nemi. Tinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutipa nzira ine mbiri. Ameni. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: “Kuchengeta Sungano” Kuvimba neMweya Mutsvene Kuchengeta Sungano Itsva Yakasimba
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Ngativhurei maBhaibheri edu pana 2 Timotio chitsauko 1 ndima 13-14 toaverenga pamwe chete. Chengeta mashoko mapenyu awakanzwa kwandiri nokutenda norudo zviri muna Kristu Jesu. Unofanira kuchengeta nzira dzakanaka dzawakapiwa naMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana "Kuchengeta Chivimbiso" Namata: Baba voKudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tenda Ishe nekutumira vashandi neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nekutaura nemaoko avo, rinova vhangeri reruponeso rwedu. Chingwa chinounzwa kubva kudenga uye chinopihwa kwatiri nenguva kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Kumbira Ishe kuti vatidzidzise kuchengeta Sungano Itsva zvakasimba nokutenda norudo, tichivimba noMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

[1] Kukanganisa muAntecedent Agreement

Ushumiri zvino hwakapiwa Jesu ndihwo huri nani, sezvaari murevereri wesungano iri nani, yakagadzwa pahwaro hwezvipikirwa zviri nani. Dai pasina kukanganisa musungano yekutanga, pangadai pasina nzvimbo yekutsvaga chibvumirano chekupedzisira. VaHebheru 8:6-7

bvunza: Ndezvipi zvinokanganisa muchibvumirano chakapfuura?
mhinduro: " kugadzwa kwapfuura "Pane zvinhu zvisingagone kuitwa nemurairo nekuda kweutera hwenyama - tarisa VaRoma 8: 3→ 1 Somuenzaniso, mutemo waAdhamu wokuti, “Usadya zvinobva pamuti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa; nezuva raunoudya chokwadi uchafa.”— Genesi 2:17 → Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, zvishuvo zvakaipa zvakaberekwa. Mutemo wakanga uri mumitezo yedu. Unoitwa kuti ubereke chibereko chorufu—Verenga VaRoma 7:5→ kuchiva kwenyama nokuti murairo uchazvara " mhosva "Uyai → Kuchiva kana kwakurirwa, kunobereka chivi; uye chivi, kana chakura kwazvo, chinobereka rufu. Jakobho 1:15 → Saka kuchiva kwenyama "kuchabereka chivi nomutemo, uye kuchiva kwenyama kunobereka chivi. uye chivi chichakura muupenyu nerufu. 2 Murayiro waMozisi: Kana ukachengeta mirayiro yose nokungwarira, ucharopafadzwa paunobuda uye ucharopafadzwa kana wadarika murayiro, uchatukwa paunobuda uye uchatukwa kana wadarika unopinda. →Munhu wose ari munyika akatadza uye akakundikana kusvika pakubwinya kwaMwari. Munhu wose ari munyika akadarika murayiro. Adamu naEvha havana kuchengeta murairo mubindu reEdeni uye vakatukwa - tarisa kuna Genesisi Chitsauko 3 ndima 16-19 Babironi - nongedzera kuna Danieri chitsauko 9 ndima 11 →Mutemo nemirairo zvakanaka uye zvitsvene, Zvakarurama uye zvakanaka, chero bedzi vanhu vachizvishandisa zvakakodzera, asi hazvisi zvose zvinobatsira mirairo yapfuura yakanga isina simba uye isina maturo → mutemo haugoni kuitwa nekuda kwekushaya simba kwenyama yevanhu, uye vanhu havagoni kuita kururama kunodiwa nemutemo. Mutemo Zvakazoitika kuti hapana chakaitwa - tarisa kuna Vahebheru 7: 18-19, saka " Kukanganisa muchibvumirano chekare ", Mwari anozivisa tariro iri nani → " Appointment gare gare 》Nenzira iyi, unonyatsonzwisisa here?

【2】Murairo mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya

Sezvo murayiro uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya uye usati uri mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chacho, haungakwanisi kuperedzera avo vanoswedera pedyo nokupa chibayiro chimwe chete gore rimwe nerimwe. VaHebheru 10:1

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuti mutemo mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya?
mhinduro: Pfupiso yomurairo ndiKristu--Tarira vaRoma 10:4→ zvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya zvinoreva Kristu Akati, " Kristu "Ndiwo mufananidzo wechokwadi, ndiwo mutemo Shadow , kana kuti mitambo, kugara kwomwedzi, maSabata, zvichingodaro, zvakanga zviri zvinhu zvaizouya. Shadow ,Izvozvo muviri Asi ndizvo Kristu --Ona VaKorose 2:16-17 → Kungofanana ne“muti woupenyu”, zuva parinopenya zvisingaite pamuti, pane mumvuri pasi po“muti”, unova mumvuri wemuti, “mumvuri” Haisi iyo yechokwadi mufananidzo wechinhu chepakutanga, icho " muti woupenyu "zve muviri Ndiwo mufananidzo wechokwadi nomutemo Shadow - muviri Ehe Kristu , Kristu Ndiko kutarisa chaiko Zvimwe chetezvo kune “murairo” wakanaka uye mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka! Kana ukachengeta mutemo → uchachengeta " Shadow "," Shadow "Haina chinhu, haina chinhu. Iwe haugoni kuibata kana kuichengeta. "Mvuri" uchachinja nenguva uye kufamba kwechiedza chezuva, " Shadow "Iyo inosakara, inopera, uye inokurumidza kunyangarika. Kana iwe ukachengeta mutemo, iwe uchaguma "kuchera mvura kubva mushengu bhasiki pasina, pasina mugumisiro, uye kushanda nesimba pasina. "Hapana chauchawana.

【3】Shandisa kutenda nerudo kubatirira zvakasimba kuSungano Itsva nekuvimba neMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri.

Chengeta mashoko mapenyu awakanzwa kwandiri nokutenda norudo zviri muna Kristu Jesu. Unofanira kuchengeta nzira dzakanaka dzawakapiwa naMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri. 2 Timotio 1:13-14

bvunza: “Chiyero chemashoko akanaka, nzira yakanaka” chinorevei?
mhinduro: 1 “Chiyero chemashoko akanaka” ivhangeri roruponeso rakaparidzwa naPauro kuvaHedheni → Sezvo makanzwa shoko rechokwadi, ivhangeri roruponeso rwenyu – tarisai VaEfeso 1:13-14 na1 VaKorinde 15:3. -4; 2 “Nzira yakanaka” ndiyo nzira yechokwadi! Shoko ndiMwari, uye Shoko rakava nyama, ndiko kuti, Mwari akava nyama *akanzi Jesu → Jesu Kristu akapa nyama yake neropa kwatiri, uye isu tine NeTao , Nehupenyu hwaMwari Jesu Kristu ! Ameni. Iyi ndiyo nzira yakanaka, sungano itsva yakaitwa naKristu kubudikidza neropa rake tsamba road chengeta mugwagwa, chengeta " nzira yakanaka ", ndizvo chengeta sungano itsva ! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

【Testamente Itsva】

“Iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita navo shure kwemazuva iwayo, ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe, Ndichanyora mirairo yangu pamwoyo yavo, ndichaiisa mukati mavo;

bvunza: Zvinorevei kuti mutemo wakanyorwa pamwoyo yavo uye wakaiswa mukati mavo?

mhinduro: Sezvo mutemo uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvichauya uye kwete mufananidzo wechokwadi wechinhu → "Kuguma kwemurairo ndiKristu" → " Kristu “Uyu ndiwo mufananidzo chaiwo wemurairo, mwari ndizvo Chiedza ! " Kristu "Zvinoratidzwa, ndizvo Kuda chaiko Zvakaratidzwa, Chiedza Zvakazarurwa → Pre-Testamende Mutemo" Shadow "Ingonyangarika," Shadow “Kukwegura nokuora, uye nokukurumidza kunyangarika kuva pasina.”— VaHebheru 8:13 . Mwari anonyora mutemo pamwoyo yedu → Kristu Zita rake rakanyorwa pamwoyo yedu. nzira yakanaka “Zvipise mumwoyo yedu; uzviise mazviri → Kristu" Zviise matiri → Kana tichidya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru, “tinodya nyama yaShe nokunwa ropa raShe” tine Kristu matiri! →Sezvo tine upenyu hwa“Jesu Kristu” matiri, tiri munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari, “munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari. Newcomer "kwete wenyama" murume mukuru “Zvinhu zvekare zvapfuura, uye isu tava chisikwa chitsva!-- Ona VaRoma 8:9 na 2                                                           17 ) Iyoyi yakabva yati: “Handicharangariri zvivi zvavo (zvemunhu wekare) nezvivi zvavo. ) kudarika. “Zvino zvivi izvi zvakanganwirwa, hapasisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi. VaHebheru 10:17-18 → Iyi ndiyo nzira iyo Mwari akanga ari muna Kristu achiyananisa nyika kwaari, asingaibvise. murume mukuru ) kudarika kwavo kunoverengerwa kwavari ( Newcomer muviri, uye akatipa shoko rokuyananisa → Paridza vhangeri raJesu Kristu! Vhangeri rinoponesa! Ameni . Chirevo-2 VaKorinte 5:19

【Tenda uye uchengete Sungano Itsva】

(1) Bvisa "mumvuri" wemurairo uye uchengete mufananidzo wechokwadi: Sezvo mutemo uri mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvichauya, hausi mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chaicho - tarisa kuna VaHebheru chitsauko 10 ndima 1 → Pfupiso yemutemo inoti Kristu , Mufananidzo wechokwadi wemutemo ndizvo Kristu , kana tichidya nokunwa nyama neropa raShe, tine upenyu hwaKristu matiri, uye tiri iye Pfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake inhengo dzake → 1 Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, uye takamutswa pamwe chete naye; 2 Kristu mutsvene, nesuwo tiri vatsvene; 3 Kristu haana zvivi, nesu hatina zvivi; 4 Kristu wakazadzisa murairo, asi isu tinozadzisa murairo; 5 Anotsvenesa uye anoruramisa → tinotsvenesawo uye tinoruramisa; 6 Anorarama nokusingaperi, uye tinorarama nokusingaperi→ 7 Kana Kristu achidzoka, tichaonekwa naye mukubwinya! Ameni.

Uyu ndiPauro anoudza Timotio kuti achengete nzira yakarurama → Chengeta mashoko akarurama awakanzwa kwandiri, nokutenda norudo, zviri muna Kristu Jesu. Unofanira kuchengeta nzira dzakanaka dzawakapiwa naMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri. Tarisa kuna 2 Timotio 1:13-14

(2) Garai muna Kristu: Hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu. Nekuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu. VaRoma 8:1-2 → Cherechedza: Avo vari muna Kristu havagone “ Zvirokwazvo "Kana uine mhosva, haugone kupa vamwe mhosva; kana iwe" Zvirokwazvo Kana une mhosva, ndizvo zvauri; Kwete pano Muna Jesu Kristu → Iwe uri muna Adhamu, uye mutemo ndewokuti vanhu vazive nezvechivi, uri muranda wechivi, kwete mwanakomana. Saka, wakajeka here?

(3) Akaberekwa naMwari: Umwe neumwe akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; Kubva pane izvi zvinoratidzwa vana vaMwari uye vana vadhiabhorosi. Ani naani asingaiti zvakarurama haazi waMwari, uyewo ani naani asingadi hama yake. 1 Johane 3:9-10 uye 5:18

horaiti! Nhasi ndichataura uye ndichagoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye kufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

2021.01.08

articles.title: “Sungano” Jesu anoita sungano itsva nesu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri [1 VaKorinte 11:23-25] tiverenge pamwe chete: Zvandakaparidza kwamuri ndizvo zvandakagamuchira kubva kuna She nousiku hwaakapandukirwa, Ishe Jesu akatora chingwa, akavonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa. iwe.” Mipumburu yekare: yakaputsika) “Munofanira kuita izvi muchindirangarira.” Mushure mokunge vadya, akatora mukombe akati, “Mukombe uyu ndiwo sungano itsva muropa rangu. ” VaHebheru 9:15 Nokuda kwaizvozvi akava murevereri wesungano itsva, kuti avo vakadanwa vagogamuchira nhaka yakapikirwa isingaperi, vakafa kuti vayananisire zvivi zvakaitwa pasi pesungano yokutanga. Ameni

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana pamwechete "Sungano" Aihwa. 7 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, mazvita Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka "Tumai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu! Tipeiwo zvekudya zvekudenga panguva yakafanira, kuti hupenyu hwedu huwedzerwe. Ameni! Ndapota! Ishe Jesu vanoenderera mberi vachitipa kuvhenekera maziso edu emweya, kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, kutigonesa kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya, uye kunzwisisa kuti Ishe Jesu akaita sungano itsva nesu kuburikidza neropa rake! Hwisisa kuti Ishe Jesu akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa uye akatambura kuti atitenge kubva musungano yedu yekare. Kupinda musungano itsva kunoita kuti avo vakadanwa vagamuchire nhaka isingagumi yakapikirwa ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Kondirakiti

Encyclopedia tsananguro: Kondirakiti pakutanga inoreva gwaro rine chekuita nekutengesa, zvikwereti, zvirendi, zvichingodaro. Kune zvibvumirano zvemweya uye zvibvumirano zvakanyorwa nenzira yezvibvumirano Zvinhu zvinogona kunge zvakasiyana-siyana, kusanganisira: vashandi vebhizimisi, shamwari dzepedyo, vanoda, nyika, nyika, vanhu vose, uye zvibvumirano iwe pachako, nezvimwewo. Unogona kushandisa "zvakanyorwa. zvibvumirano" kubvumirana, uye unogona kushandisa "mutauro" kubvumirana.Kuita chibvumirano, inogonawo kuva "chinyararire" chibvumirano. Zvakafanana ne "chibvumirano" chakanyorwa chibvumirano chakasainwa munzanga yanhasi.

【2】Ishe Jesu vanogadzira sungano itsva nesu

(1) Ita sungano nechingwa nemuto wemazambiringa mukapu
Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [1 VaKorinde 11:23-26], tivhure pamwe chete uye tiverenge: Zvandakaparidza kwamuri ndizvo zvandakagamuchira kubva kuna She nousiku hwaakapandukirwa, Ishe Jesu akatora chingwa, akavonga, akachimedura akati, “Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa. iwe.” Mipumburu yekare: yakaputsika), unofanira kuita izvi kunyora ndirangarireiwo.” Mushure mokudya, akatorawo mukombe akati, “Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu, nguva ipi neipi yamunonwa mauri, itai izvi muchindirangarira.” Pose patinodya chingwa ichi nokunwa mukombe uyu , tiri kuratidzira rufu rwaShe kusvikira auya. Uye tendeukira kuna [ Mateo 26:28 ] Nokuti iri iropa rangu resungano, rinodururirwa vazhinji kuti vakanganwirwe zvivi. Dzokerai kuna [VaHebheru 9:15] Nokuda kwaizvozvi akava murevereri wesungano itsva, kuti avo vakadanwa vagoigamuchira nokufa kuyananiswa kwezvivi zvavakaita pasi pesungano yokutanga yenhaka isingagumi yakapikirwa.

(2) Testamende Yekare ndiyo sungano yokutanga

(Cherechedza: Nokudzidza magwaro ari pamusoro apa, Ishe Jesu akaita “Sungano Itsva” nesu. Sezvo ichinzi sungano itsva, pachava ne“Sungano Yekare” inova sungano yekare. “Yakapfuura. Sungano" yakanyorwa muBhaibheri inonyanya kusanganisira: 1 Mwari akaita murairo naAdhama mubindu reEdheni, “sungano yokusadya zvinobva pamuti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa” iyo yakanga iriwo sungano yomutemo “womutauro”; 2 Sungano yorugare yo“muraraungu” yaNoa pashure pemafashamo makuru yaimirira sungano itsva; 3 “Chipikirwa” chisungo chokutenda kwaAbrahama chinofananidzira chisungo chenyasha dzaMwari; 4 Sungano yoMutemo waMosesi yakanga iri sungano yomutemo yakanyatsotaurwa nevaIsraeri. Tarisa kuna Dheuteronomio 5 ndima 1-3.

(3) Chivi chakapinda munyika kubva kuna Adhamu chete

Adhamu, tateguru wekutanga, akatyora mutemo uye akatadza uye akadya kubva pamuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa! Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye kubudikidza nechivi rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose, nokuti vose vakatadza. Zvisinei, kubva kuna Adhamu kusvika kuna Mosesi, rufu rwakabata ushe, uye kunyange avo vasina kutadza saAdhama vakanga vari pasi poutongi hwake - “Ndiko kuti, kunyange avo vasina kutadza saAdhama vakafanana nesu isu takafawo pasi pesimba”. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 5:12-14 mubairo wechivi rufu – tarisai vaRoma 6:23; Adamu Kana munhu akatyora chibvumirano uye akapara mhosva, anova a “Varanda vechivi”, vana vose vakaberekwa natateguru Adamu varanda ve“chivi”, nokuti simba rechivi ndiwo mutemo, vazukuru vaAdam vari pasi pomurairo “Musadya muti wokuziva zvakanaka. uye zvakaipa" Kutevera mutemo wemirairo. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(4) Ukama huri pakati pomutemo, chivi norufu

Sezvo “chivi” chichitonga, chichatukwa nomutemo, unotungamirira kurufu - nongedzera kuna VaRoma 5:21 → Nenzira yakafanana, nyasha dzinotongawo kupfurikidza no“kururama”, zvichiita kuti vanhu vawane ruponeso kupfurikidza naShe wedu Jesu Kristu upenyu husingaperi. Ameni! Nenzira iyi, tinoziva kuti “rufu” runobva “kuchivi” – “chivi” chinobva kumunhu mumwe, Adhamu, uyo akatyora sungano yomurayiro “chivi” – tarisa kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 3 ndima 3 . ［ mutemo ]--[ mhosva ]--[ kufa ] Zvitatu izvi zvinodyidzana kana muchida kutiza kubva “kurufu” munofanira kutiza kubva “kuchivi”, munofanira kutiza kubva mumutemo Sungano yenyu yomurayiro ngaitukwe. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Naizvozvo, “chisungo chokutanga” mutemo wechisungo chaAdhamu “kuti tisadya muti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa” Tinofanira kuvimba naIshe Jesu Kristu kuti tipukunyuke pairi. “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. Nokuti Mwari haana kutuma Mwanakomana wake munyika kuti atonge nyika. zvimwe chetezvo pazasi), kuti nyika iponeswe kubudikidza naye ani naani asingatendi atopiwa mhosva nokuti haana kutenda muzita roMwanakomana mumwe oga waMwari. ndima 16-18.

(5) Sungano yokutanga inosunungurwa nokutambura rufu rwaKristu

Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti ave munhu wenyama uye agoberekwa pasi pomutemo kuti adzikinure vari pasi pomutemo kuti tiwane zita rokuti vanakomana vaMwari! Ameni—ona VaG. 4:4-7. Sezvakanyorwa muna 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4, maererano neBhaibheri, Kristu akarovererwa uye akafa pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwe“zvivi” zvedu, 1 kuti atisunungure kubva muchivi-” nokuti Kana vose vafa, vose vanofa, nokuti avo vakafa vanosunungurwa kubva kuchivi - ona 2 VaKorinte 5:14 naVaRoma 6:7; :13; nokuvigwa, 3 kunotibvisa pamunhu wekare nenzira dzake dzekare - ona VaKorose 3:9 naVaGaratia 5:24. Akamutswa nezuva retatu, 4 kuti tiruramiswe - tarisa kuna VaRoma 4:25, maererano netsitsi dzake huru, Mwari akatibereka patsva nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa! Ngatiwane mukana kuTestamente Itsva. Ameni!

Nenzira iyi tinosunungurwa kubva kuzvivi zvakabva kuna tateguru wedu Adhamu, uye tinosunungurwa kubva mazviri kugadzwa kwapfuura “Sungano yekusadya zvemuti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa, kureva kuti Jesu akatifira pamuchinjikwa Simudza Chibvumirano Chekare - Chisungo chekutanga cheMutemo waAdhamu! Murume wedu wekare akabhabhatidzwa murufu rwaKristu, akafa, akavigwa, uye akamuka pamwe chete naye! Munhu mutsva azvarwa patsva haachisiri muhupenyu hwaAdhamu hunotadza, uye haasisiri " kugadzwa kwapfuura "Mutestamende yekare murairo wakatukwa, asi munyasha" Testamende Itsva 》Muna Kristu! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(6) Munhu akasiya sungano yokutanga anofa; Testamende Itsva Tora simba

VaIzirairi vaiva neMutemo waMosesi, uye nokutenda muMuponesi Jesu Kristu, vakasunungurwawo kubva kuchivi uye “pamumvuri” weMutemo waMosesi uye vakapinda muSungano Itsva- tarisa kuna Mabasa 13:39. Ngativhurei kuna VaHebheru chitsauko 9 ndima 15-17. Nokuda kwechikonzero ichi, “Jesu” akava murevereri wesungano itsva sezvo iye akafa uye “akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu” kuti aregerere zvivi zvakaitwa navanhu mukati me“sungano yakapfuura,” achaita kuti vakadanwa vawane. Mwari. Nhaka isingaperi yakavimbiswa. “Sungano itsva” ipi neipi iyo Jesu akasiya sungano yacho inofanira kumirira kusvikira munhu akasiya sungano (rugwaro rwapakuvamba rwakafanana nesungano) afa, ndiko kuti, Jesu Kristu oga. nokuti “Vose vakafa; vose vakafa” nokuti vose vakafa “Nokuti sezvatakabhapatidzwa muna Kristu, tikatenda kufa pamwe chete naye, saizvozvo isuwo "Regai kondirakiti yapfuura “Chibvumirano chepamutemo” neTestamende “ndiko kuti, sungano itsva iyo Jesu akatisiira neropa rake amene” zvinoshanda Testamende Itsva Inotanga kushanda zviri pamutemo Unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? ,

Kana munhu akasiya nhaka achiri mupenyu "Hauna munhu mukuru" Tenda murufu “Ivai vakafa pamwe chete naKristu, ndiko kuti, munhu wenyu wekare achiri mupenyu, achiri mupenyu muna Adhamu, achiri mupenyu pasi pomurayiro wesungano yokutanga”, sungano iyoyo “ndiko kuti – Jesu akavimbisa kusiya sungano”. Testamende Itsva "Zvinei newe here?" Uri right here? Munhu wese munyika anonzwisisa hukama huri pakati pe "contract and testament", haunzwisisi here?

(7) Kristu akaita sungano itsva nesu neropa rake

Zvino usiku uhwo Ishe Jesu hwaakapandukirwa, akatora chingwa, akavonga, akachimedura, akati: Uyu ndiwo muviri wangu, unopirwa imwi; itai izvi muchindirangarira akati: Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu. nguva dzose kana muchiunwa, itai izvi muchindirangarira. “Nguva dzose dzamunodya chingwa ichi nokunwa mukombe uyu, munopupura rufu rwaShe kusvikira achidzoka. Amen! Tinokutendai Ishe Jesu nekutidzikinura pamurairo we“sungano yokutanga” kuti tiwane Mwanakomana waMwari. Ameni akaita sungano itsva nesu kubudikidza neropa rake, kuti isu takadanwa tigogamuchira nhaka yakapikirwa isingaperi!

horaiti! Nhasi ndichataura uye ndichagoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye kufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: “Sungano” Testamente Yekare neTestamente Itsva
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri [VaHebheru 8:6-7, 13] toverenga pamwe chete: Ushumiri zvino hwakapiwa Jesu ndihwo huri nani, sezvaari murevereri wesungano iri nani, yakagadzwa pahwaro hwezvipikirwa zviri nani. Dai pasina kukanganisa musungano yekutanga, pangadai pasina nzvimbo yekutsvaga chibvumirano chekupedzisira. …Zvino zvatataura nezvesungano itsva, sungano yokutanga inosakara;

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Ita sungano "Aihwa. 6 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, mazvita Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka “Kereke inotumira vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Vachatipa zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga munguva yakafanira, kuti upenyu hwedu huwande. Ameni! Ishe Jesu vanoramba vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa chakavanzika kubva kuTestamente Yekare kusvika kuTestamente Itsva, uye unzwisise kuda Kwenyu . Namata nemuzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Kubva ku“Testamente Yekare” kuenda ku“Testamente Itsva”

Testamende Yekare

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [VaHebheru 7:11-12] uye tiverenge pamwe chete: Kare, vanhu vaigamuchira murairo pasi pouprista hwaRevhi, kana vaigona kukwaniswa kupfurikidza nechinzvimbo ichi, pakanga pasina chikonzero chokumutsa mumwe , nenhevedzano yerudzi rwaMerikizedheki, kana kwete nenhevedzano yaAroni? Sezvo uprista hwakashandurwa, murayiro unofanira kushandurwawo. Ndima 16 akava muprista, kwete nokurayira kwenyama, asi nesimba roupenyu husingapere. Ndima 18 Murau wokutanga wakabviswa nemhaka yokuti wakanga usina simba uye usingabatsiri Ndima 19 inozivisa tariro iri nani yatinogona kusvika nayo kuna Mwari.

(Cherechedza: Testamente Yekare ndiyo sungano yekutanga, 1 Sungano mubindu reEdheni kuti Adamu haafanire kudya kubva pa“Muti weZvakanaka neZvakaipa”; 2 Sungano yo“muraraungu” yaNoa inofananidzira sungano itsva; 3 Kutenda kwaAbrahama “musungano yechipikirwa” isungano yenyasha; 4 Sungano yeMutemo waMosesi. Kare vanhu vaisagona “kugamuchira murayiro” zvakakwana pasi pechinzvimbo che“vaprista vevaRevhi”, naizvozvo Mwari akamutsa mumwe muprista [Jesu] maererano nenhevedzano yaMerkizedeki! Merkizedeki anozivikanwawo saMambo weSaremu, zvinoreva kuti Mambo weRunako, Kururama uye Runyararo. Haana baba, haana mai, haana dzinza, haana mavambo oupenyu, haana mugumo woupenyu, asi akafanana noMwanakomana waMwari.

Naizvozvo sezvo uprista huchishandurwa, murayiro unofanira kushandurwawo. Jesu akava muprista, kwete maererano nezvisungo zvenyama, asi maererano nesimba rehupenyu husingagumi. Zvinoratidza kuti vaprista vechiRevhi vakanga vadziviswa norufu uye vakanga vasingagoni kugara kwenguva refu Mutemo wakagadza vanhu vasina simba savaprista kuti azadzise chibayiro che“chivi”. Kubva zvino, hatichapi zvibayiro zve "zvivi". Kubva zvino mazvarwa nerutendo rwevhangeri raKristu, chizvarwa chakasarudzwa uye nehupirisita hweumambo. Ameni

【2】---Pinda Testamente Itsva---

Ngatinzverei Bhaibheri [VaHebheru 8:6-9] uye tiverenge pamwe chete: Zvino Jesu ane ushumiri hunopfuvura nokunaka, sezvaari murevereri wesungano inopfuura nokunaka, yakasimbiswa nezvipikirwa zvinopfuvura nokunaka. Dai pasina kukanganisa musungano yekutanga, pangadai pasina nzvimbo yekutsvaga chibvumirano chekupedzisira. Naizvozvo, Jehovha akatsiura vanhu vake uye akati (kana kuti rakashandurwa: Naizvozvo Jehovha akanongedzera kukukanganisa kwesungano yokutanga): “Mazuva anouya andichaita sungano itsva neimba yaIsraeri uye neimba yaJudha; kwete sezvandakabata madzibaba avo noruoko ndikavatungamirira, ndakaita sungano navo pakubuda kwangu muEgipita, nekuti havana kuchengeta sungano yangu, handingavi nehanya navo, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha. “Iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita navo mushure memazuva iwayo, ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe: Ndichanyora mirairo yangu pamwoyo yavo, uye ndichaiisa mukati mavo uye kudarika kwavo zvakanganwirwa, hapasisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi.

(Cherechedzai: Maita basa nenyasha dzaShe! “Mukadzi Ane Chipo” akatumira Hama Cen, mushandi, kuti akutungamirirei kunzwisisa chakavanzika chevhangeri, kuteerera kuda kwaMwari, uye kubva mu“sungano yomurayiro” yekare. sungano ye“sungano yenyasha” musungano itsva!

1 Testamente Yekare ndiAdamu kutanga; Testamende Itsva Adhamu wokupedzisira ndiJesu Kristu
2 Munhu muTesitamende yekare akasikwa kubva muguruva; Testamende Itsva Avo vakazvarwa naMwari
3 Vanhu veTestamente Yekare vaive venyama; Testamende Itsva vanhu vaMweya Mutsvene
4 Vanhu veSungano Yekare vaive pasi pesungano yemurairo; Testamende Itsva munhu isungano yenyasha
5 Vanhu vemuTestamente Yekare vaive pasi pemurairo; Testamende Itsva naavo vakasunungurwa kubva kumurayiro kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu
6 Vanhu veTestamente Yekare vakatyora mutemo; Testamende Itsva naavo vakazadzisa murayiro kubudikidza norudo rwaKristu
7 Vanhu veTestamente Yekare vaive vatadzi; Testamende Itsva Munhu wacho akarurama
8 Munhu wemuTestamente Yekare aive muna Adamu; Testamende Itsva vanhu muna Kristu
9 Vanhu vemuTestamente Yekare vana vaAdama; Testamende Itsva vanhu vana vaMwari
10 Vanhu vemuTestamente Yekare vakarara musimba rewakaipa; Testamende Itsva vanhu vakapukunyuka mumusungo waSatani
11 Vanhu veTestamente Yekare vaive pasi pesimba rerima muHadhesi; Testamende Itsva Avo vari mubhuku roupenyu roMwanakomana anodiwa waMwari, umambo hwechiedza
12 Vanhu vemuTestamente Yekare vaive vemuti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa; Testamende Itsva Vanhu ndevemuti weupenyu!

Testamente Yekare isungano yemurairo; Testamente Itsva isungano yenyasha. Ameni, Sungano Itsva inoita Mwanakomana waMwari mushumiri mukuru. Sezvo vaprista vakashandurwa, murayiro unofanirawo kushandurwa, nokuti pfupiso yomurayiro ndiKristu, Kristu ndiMwari, uye Mwari rudo! Murairo waKristu rudo. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ona VaGaratiya chitsauko 6 ndima 1-2. Naizvozvo Ishe Jesu akati: “Ndinokupai murairo mutsva, Petro, wokuti mudanane; sezvandakakudai imi, nemiwo mudanane! Uyu ndiwo murairo wapakuvamba! Ameni. Ona Johane 13:34 uye Johane 1:2 Chitsauko 11

【3】Sungano yokutanga yava kukwegura nokuderera, uye ichakurumidza kupera

Zvino zvatinotaura nezvesungano itsva, sungano yokutanga inosakara; Nokudaro, Testamente Yekare "mumvuri", uye sezvo mutemo "mumvuri" wezvinhu zvakanaka uye kwete mufananidzo chaiwo wechinhu chekutanga, Kristu ndiye mufananidzo wechokwadi! Kungofanana ne "mumvuri" pasi pemuti, "mumvuri" pasi pemuti zvishoma nezvishoma unopera nekufamba kwechiedza uye nguva. Naizvozvo, sungano yokutanga-sungano yomurayiro ichakurumidza kupera. Ona VaHebheru 10:1 naVaKorose. 2:16 . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Zvino makereke mazhinji ari kukudzidzisai zvenhema kuti mudzokere mugochengeta Sungano Yekare – sungano yoMutemo waMosesi. Sezvakangoita mupostora “Pauro”, zvaisabatsira kuchengeta mutemo shora “Zvaaiti ifuma zvichanzi kurashikirwa mushure mokuziva Kristu, nokuti kana muchichengeta murayiro waMozisi, hamungagoni kuzviita nokuda kwokushayiwa simba kwenyama, kana musingagoni kuchengeta murayiro yakashorwa nomurayiro, saka Pauro akati kurasikirwa. , vaFarise navanyori vane hunyanzvi havagoni kuchengeta murairo, uye imi vaHedheni vasina mano hamugoni kuuchengeta munofunga kuti ndizvo here?

Saka unotanga kubva" Testamende yekare "Pinda" Testamende Itsva “, nzwisisai kuda kwaMwari, raramai muna Kristu, muumambo hutsvene hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa! Ameni

horaiti! Ndiri kugovera izvi nemi nhasi Mwari ngaaropafadze hama dzese! Ameni

articles.title: “Sungano” rudo rwaKristu runozadzisa mutemo kwatiri
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Shamwari inodiwa! Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri [VaRoma 13:8] tiverenge pamwe chete: Musava nechikwerete nomunhu, asi chokudanana; nokuti unoda mumwe, wazadzisa murairo.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Ita sungano "Aihwa. 5 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, tenda Jehovha! " mukadzi akanaka "Kereke inotumira vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko ake, iro ndiro vhangeri reruponeso rwedu! Achatipa chikafu chemweya chekudenga nekufamba kwenguva, kuti hupenyu hwedu huwande. Ameni! Ishe! Jesu Jesu! inoramba ichivhenekera maziso edu emweya, ichivhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, uye ichitigonesa kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa rudo rwenyu rukuru nokuda kworudo rwaKristu” nokuti “Isu takazadzisa murayiro, kuti kururama kwawo kuzadziswe matiri, isu tisingafambi maererano nenyama, asi maererano nemweya.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【 Poshi 】 Unoda wokwake wazadzisa murairo;

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [VaRoma 13:8-10] toriverenga pamwe chete: Musava nechikwereti nomunhu kunze kwokudanana, nokuti anoda muvakidzani wake azadzisa murayiro. Somuenzaniso, mirayiro yakadai sokuti, “Usaita upombwe, Usauraya, Usaba, Usachiva,” nemimwe mirayiro inoputirwa mumutsara uyu: “Ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe. Rudo haruitiri vamwe zvakaipa, saka rudo runozadzisa murayiro.

【 piri 】 Rudo rwaJesu runozadzisa mutemo kwatiri

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Mateo 5:17 ] torivhura pamwe chete toverenga: (Jesu) “Musafunga kuti handina kuuya kuzoparadza murayiro kana vaporofita kwamuri, kunyange denga nenyika zvapfuura, hapana vara rimwe kana vadi rimwe romurairo zvichapfuura, kusvikira zvose zvaitika.

[Johani 3:16] “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi (kana kududzira: kutonga nyika; zvakafanana pazasi) ndiko kuti nyika iponeswe kubudikidza naye

[VaRoma 8 Chitsauko 3-4] Sezvo mutemo wakanga usina simba nenyama uye wakanga usingagoni kuita chimwe chinhu, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake amene nomufananidzo wenyama yechivi kuti ave chipiriso chezvivi, achipa mhosva chivi munyama, kuti murayiro kururama kwaMwari kunozadziswa matiri isu tisingafambi nenyama asi noMweya.

[ VaGaratia 4:4-7 ] Asi nguva yakati yazara, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, wakazvarwa nomukadzi, akaberekwa pasi pomurairo, kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti isu tive vanakomana vanokudzwa. Sezvo muri vanakomana, Mwari akatuma Mweya woMwanakomana wake mumwoyo yenyu (yekutanga: yedu) achidanidzira achiti, “Abha, Baba!” uye sezvo uri mwanakomana, unovimba naMwari kuti ndiye mugari wenhaka yake.

( Cherechedza: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinoona kuti hamufaniri kuva nechikwereti naani zvake kunze kwokudanana. usaita upombwe, usaba, usakara, zvose zvakaputirwa mumashoko anoti “ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe”. Kuda nyika yose inhema, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Hakuna akarurama, kunyange nomumwe chete, nokuti munhu wose akadarika murayiro, uye kudarika murayiro chivi, uye munhu wose ari panyika akatadza uye akatadza kuna Mwari. kubwinya! Sezvo mutemo usina simba nokuda kwenyama, haugoni kuzadzisa kururama kwomurayiro. Zvino, nenyasha dzaMwari, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, Jesu, kuti ave nyama, akazvarwa pasi pomurairo, akapfeka mufananidzo wenyama yezvivi, akaitwa chipiriso chezvivi, achipa mhosva zvivi zvedu munyama, akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa. muchinjikwa. Akafa kuti atisunungure kubva kuchivi, nomurayiro, uye nokutukwa kwomurayiro. Ndiko kudzikinura avo vari pasi pomurayiro kuti isu tigamuchire zita rokuti vanakomana vaMwari, uye Mwari anotuma Mweya woMwanakomana wake mumwoyo yenyu , "kuzvarwa patsva"! Sezvo makaberekwa naMwari, muri vana vaMwari saKristu Jesu, munogona kudaidza Baba vari kudenga kuti, “Abha, Baba!” Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

【 tatu 】 kuti kururama kwemurairo kuzadziswe matiri isu tisingafambi nenyama, asi nemweya

Sezvo wakasunungurwa kubva pamurairo, Mwari akazadzisa "kururama" kwemurairo mukati medu isu tisingafambi maererano nenyama asi maererano ne "Mweya". Nemamwe mashoko, rudo rukuru rwaJesu rwakazadzisa zvinodiwa uye kururama kwemirairo, zvakatemwa, zvakatemwa uye tsika dzetsika dzakanyorwa mubhuku remurairo nokuda kwedu, kuti muna Kirisito Jesu, tirege kuzoraswa nemurairo. Nokuti murayiro woMweya woupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakatisunungura kubva pamurayiro wechivi norufu. Magumo emurairo ndiKristu --Tarisa kuna VaRoma 10 Chitsauko 4→ Isu tiri muna Kristu, uye Kristu anozadzisa murairo " akarurama ", Tisu tinozadzisa kururama kwemurairo! Kana achinge akunda, isu takunda, akasimbisa murairo, izvo zvinoreva kuti isu takaisa mutemo uye hatina kutyora mutemo kana mhosva ipi zvayo! Iye anoruramiswa ndiye akarurama; Akafanana nehama dzake pazvinhu zvose, akadini! Ndizvo zvatinoitawo, nokuti Kristu ndiye musoro wedu uye isu tiri muviri wake. chechi “Mitezo yomuviri wake ipfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake. ! Kana uchitenda muna Jesu uchiri mutadzi here? Iwe hausi nhengo yake uye hausati wanzwisisa ruponeso.

Ndiko kusaka Ishe Jesu vakati: “Musafunga kuti handina kuuya kuzoparadza Mutemo kana kuti vaporofita, asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kusvikira denga nenyika zvapfuura, kwete joti rimwe kana rimwe Yoti yomurairo ichaparadzwa, inofanira kuzadziswa.

horaiti! Ndiri kugovera izvi nemi nhasi Mwari ngaaropafadze hama dzese! Ameni

articles.title: “Sungano” Sungano yeMutemo waMosesi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Shamwari inodiwa! Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni

Takavhura Bhaibheri [ Dheuteronomio 5:1-3 ] ndokuverenga pamwe chete: Mozisi akadana vaIsraeri vose pamwe chete akati kwavari, “Imi vaIsraeri, inzwai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa zvandiri kukuudzai nhasi kuti muzvidzidze nokuzviita. Jehovha Mwari wedu akaita sungano nesu paGomo reHorebhu. . Sungano iyi haisi Yakasimbiswa nemadzitateguru edu yakagadzwa nesu vapenyu nhasi. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Ita sungano "Aihwa. 4 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, tenda Jehovha! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipei zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga munguva, kuti upenyu hwedu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa Mutemo waMosesi, inova sungano yaMwari yakanyorwa nevaIsraeri. .

---Mutemo wevaIsraeri---

【Poshi】 mirayiro yomurayiro

Ngatitarisei Bhaibheri [ Dheuteronomio 5:1-22 ] toirava pamwe chete: Ipapo Mosesi akaunganidza vaIsraeri vose, akati kwavari, “Haiwa imi vaIsraeri, inzwai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa zvandiri kukuudzai nhasi; sungano yakaitwa naJehovha Mwari wedu nesu paGomo reHorebhi, kwete nemadzitateguru edu, asi isu tiri vapenyu nhasi Jehovha aiita nemi takatarisana mugomo Mwari wakakubudisa panyika yeEgipita, paimba youranda;
1 Usava navamwe vamwari kunze kwangu.
2 Usazviitira mufananidzo wakavezwa, kana uri mufananidzo wechinhu chiri kudenga kumusoro, kana wechiri panyika pasi, kana wechiri pasi penyika, kana wechiri mumvura.
3 Usareva zita raJehovha Mwari wako pasina; nekuti Jehovha haangaregi kupa mhosva anoreva zita rake pasina.
4 Unofanira kuchengeta zuva resabata rive dzvene, sezvawakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wako. Ubate mazuva matanhatu, uite mabasa ako ose, asi zuva rechinomwe iSabata raJehovha Mwari wako; …
5 Kudza baba vako namai vako, sezvawakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wako, kuti zvikufambire zvakanaka, kuti mazuva ako ave mazhinji panyika yaunopiwa naJehovha Mwari wako.
6 Usauraya.
7 Usaita upombwe.
8 Usaba.
9 Usapupurira munhu nhema.
10 Usachiva mukadzi wowokwako; usachiva imba yowokwako, kana munda wake, kana muranda wake, kana murandakadzi wake, kana nzombe yake, kana mbongoro yake, kana chimwe chinhu chaanacho. “Ndiwo mashoko akataurwa naJehovha kwamuri, ungano yose pagomo, nenzwi guru richibva mumoto, mugore, napakati perima, haana kuwedzera mamwe mashoko pamusoro pawo mashoko awa pamahwendefa maviri amabwe akandipa iwo.

【piri】 mitemo yomurayiro

( 1 ) Mutemo wezvipiriso zvinopiswa

Revhitiko 1:1-17 BDMCS - Jehovha akadana Mozisi ari muTende Rokusangana akati kwaari, “Taura kuvaIsraeri uti kwavari, ‘Kana mumwe wenyu achiuya nechipo kuna Jehovha, anofanira kuuya nechipo chezviyo. Kana chipo chake chiri chipiriso chinopiswa chenzombe, anofanira kuuya nenzombe duku isina mhosva pamukova wetende rokusangana, kuti igamuchirwe pamberi paJehovha. Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni

Takavhura Bhaibheri [Genesi 15:3-6] ndokuverenga pamwe chete: Abhuramu ndokutizve: Hauna kundipa mwanakomana; uyo wakaberekerwa mumba mangu ndiye mudyi wenhaka yangu. Jehovha ndokuti kwaari: Uyu haangavi mudyi wenhaka yako; ” Ipapo akamubudisa panze akati, “Tarisa kumusoro kudenga ugoverenga nyeredzi.” Uye akati kwaari, “Ndizvo zvichaita Abhurama anotenda muna Jehovha ndiko kururama kwake .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " ita sungano "Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, tenda Jehovha! " Mukadzi ane hunhu "Tumirai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipeiwo zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu huwande. Ameni! Ishe Jesu Garai muchivhenekera meso edu omweya; kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, uye kutigonesa kuona nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya. Kuti titevedzere Abrahamu mukutenda uye tigamuchire sungano yechipikirwa !

Ndinonamata zviri pamusoro nemuzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【 Poshi 】 Sungano yaAbrahama yeChipikirwa chaMwari

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Genesi 15:1-6], vhura toverenga pamwe chete: Zvino shure kweizvi Jehovha wakataura kuna Abhuramu pachiratidzo achiti: Usatya Abhuramu, ini ndiri nhovo yako, uye ndichakupa mubayiro mukuru. Sezvo ndisina mwanakomana, uye Eriezeri weDhamasiko ndiye achagara nhaka yenhaka yangu. Mumwe wavo ndiye achava mudyi wenhaka yangu.” Ungaverenga nyeredzi here?” Akati kwaari, “Ndizvo zvichaita vana vako.” Abhurama akatenda Jehovha, uye Jehovha akamuti akarurama.
Chitsauko 22 Ndima 16-18 “ ‘Zvawakaita izvi, ukasanyima mwanakomana wako, mwanakomana wako mumwe chete,’ ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha, ‘Ndinopika neni pachangu, ndichakuropafadza zvikuru,’ ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha vana vako ndichawanza senyeredzi dzokudenga, nejecha riri pamahombekombe egungwa; uye nomumbeu yako ndudzi dzose dzenyika dzicharopafadzwa, nokuti wakateerera inzwi rangu. ." Tendeukirazve kuna VaG. 3:16. Mwari havati " vazukuru ", zvichireva vanhu vazhinji, zvinoreva" Mwana wako uyo ", Kunongedzera kumunhu, kureva Kristu .

( Cherechedza: Tinoziva kuti Testamente Yekare mufananidzo nemumvuri, uye Abrahama mufananidzo wa“Baba Vokudenga”, baba vekutenda! Mwari akavimbisa kuti avo chete vakaberekwa naAbrahama vaizova vadyi venhaka yake. Mwari haatauri kuti, “zvizvarwa zvako zvose,” zvichireva vanhu vazhinji, asi “mumwe wezvizvarwa zvako,” achireva munhu mumwe chete, Kristu. Tinozvarwa kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi revhangeri raJesu Kristu, takazvarwa neMweya Mutsvene, uye takazvarwa kubva kuna Mwari. . ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Mwari akavimbisa Abrahama kuti vazukuru vake vaizowanda senyeredzi dzokudenga uye sejecha riri pamhenderekedzo yegungwa! Ameni. Abhurahama “akatenda” muna Jehovha, uye Jehovha akati kwaari ndiko kururama. Iyi ndiyo sungano yechipikirwa chakaitwa naMwari naAbrahama ! Ameni)

【 piri 】 chiratidzo chesungano

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Genesisi 17:1-13] Abrama paakanga ava nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe, Jehovha akazviratidza kwaari akati, “Ndini Mwari Wemasimbaose, iva wakakwana pamberi pangu, uye ndichamuita kuti ave akakwana sungano newe kuti uwedzere vana vako. Mwari akatizve kwaari: Ndaita sungano newe: Uchava baba vemarudzi mazhinji; kubva zvino, zita rako harichazonzi Abhuramu, asi zita rako richanzi Abhurahamu; Ndichakuita baba vendudzi zhinji-zhinji. Ndichasimbisa sungano yangu newe, nembeu yako inokutevera kumarudzi avo ose, ive sungano isingaperi pakati pako navana vako vanokutevera. Mwari ndichapa nyika yose yeKenani yauri mutorwa iwe zvino, ive nhaka yako nezvizvarwa zvako nokusingaperi, uye ndichava Mwari wavo.

Mwari akatiwo kuna Abhurahama, "Iwe navana vako munofanira kuchengeta sungano yangu kusvikira kumarudzi enyu ose; vanhurume venyu vose vanofanira kudzingiswa; iyi ndiyo sungano yangu pakati pangu nemi navana vako, yamuchachengeta. Munofanira kudzingiswa mose. ( rugwaro rwekutanga runonzi kudzingiswa; ndima imwe cheteyo 14, 23, 24, uye 25 ); Ichi ndicho chiratidzo chesungano yangu newe: Munhurume wose akaberekwa mumhuri yako anofanira kudzingiswa pazuva rorusere mushure mokuberekwa kwake, angava akaberekwa mumhuri yako kana kuti akatengwa nemari kubva kune mumwe munhu asiri wembeu yako mari inofanira kudzingiswa. Ipapo sungano yangu ichasimbiswa panyama yenyu, ive sungano isingaperi.

( Cherechedza: Testamente Yekare Mwari akavimbisa Abrahama nevazukuru vake kuti vave vadyi venhaka, uye chiratidzo chechisungo chakanga chiri “kudzingiswa”, izvo pakutanga zvinoreva “kudzingiswa”, chinova mucherechedzo wakanyorwa pamuviri; Inofananidzira vana veTestamente Itsva vakazvarwa neshoko rechokwadi reevhangeri yaJesu Kristu, vakazvarwa neMweya Mutsvene, uye vakazvarwa naMwari! Vimbiso yekuiswa chisimbiso ne[Mweya Mutsvene] , kwete kunyorwa panyama, nokuti nyama inoora yaAdhamu haisi yedu. Kuchecheudzwa kwekunze hakusi kuchecheudzwa kwechokwadi, kunongoitwa nemukati chete. mweya "Izvozvi Mweya Mutsvene ! Nokuti muna Kristu kudzingiswa kana kusadzingiswa hazvina maturo, asi izvo zvinobata rudo. chivimbo "ndizvo tenda muna Jesu kristu “Inoshanda. Ameni! Munonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Tarisai vaRoma 2:28-29 naVaGaratiya 5:6

【tatu】 Tevedzera kutenda kwaAbrahamu uye uwane zvikomborero zvakavimbiswa

Tinonzvera Bhaibheri [VaRoma 4:13-17] nokuti Mwari akavimbisa Abrahama nezvizvarwa zvake kuti vachagara nhaka yenyika, kwete nomutemo asi nokururama kwokutenda. Kana vari vomurayiro chete vari vadyi venhaka, kutenda hakuna maturo uye nechipikirwa chichakoneswa. Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha; Naizvozvo, kubudikidza nokutenda, munhu akava mugari wenhaka, uye nokuda kwenyasha, kuti chipikirwa chigoitwa kuvana vose, kwete avo vari vomurayiro chete, asiwo nokuna vanotevedzera kutenda kwaAbhurahama. Abhurahama akatenda muna Mwari anomutsa vakafa uye anoita kuti zvinhu zvive pasina, uye anova Baba vedu vanhu pamberi paJehovha. Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Ndakakugadza uve baba vendudzi zhinji-zhinji, kunyange pakanga pasina tariro, akanga achine tariro nokutenda, uye akakwanisa kuva baba vendudzi zhinji, sezvakambotaurwa. Ndizvo zvichaita vana vako.

VaGaratia Chitsauko 3 Ndima 7:9.14 Naizvozvo unofanira kuziva: Avo vari vokutenda ndivo vana vaAbhurahama . … Zvinogona kuonekwa kuti vaya vari pakutenda vanokomborerwa pamwe chete naAbhurahama ane kutenda. ... kuti kuropafadzwa kwaAbrahama kusvike kuvaHedheni kubudikidza naKristu Jesu, kuti tigamuchire chipikirwa choMweya Mutsvene nokutenda uye tigogara nhaka youmambo hwokudenga. . articles.title: Sungano Sungano yaAdhamu Yekusadya
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hama dzinodikanwa, rugare kuhama dzose! Ameni

Takavhura Bhaibheri [Genesi 2:15-17] ndokuverenga pamwe chete: Jehovha Mwari akaisa munhu mumunda weEdheni kuti aurime nokuuchengeta. Jehovha Mwari akamurayira akati, “Ungadya hako miti yose yomunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usadya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo. "

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Sungano" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, tenda Jehovha! " Mukadzi ane hunhu "Kereke inotumira vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, rinova vhangeri reruponeso rwedu! Vachatipa chikafu chemweya chekudenga nekufamba kwenguva, kuti hupenyu hwedu huwande. Ameni! Ishe Jesu! Jesu inoramba ichivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri nekuona nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya: Nzwisisa sungano yaMwari yehupenyu-nerufu neruponeso naAdamu !

Minyengetero iri pamusoro apa, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, uye zvikomborero zvinoitwa muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【 Poshi 】 Mubindu reEdheni Mwari anoropafadza vanhu

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Genesi 2 Chitsauko 4-7] tiverenge pamwe chete: Mavambo okusikwa kwedenga nenyika, namazuva Jehovha Mwari akasika denga nenyika, zvakanga zvakadai; kwakanga kusina uswa mumunda, nemuriwo wesango wakange uchigere kumera; nekuti Jehovha Mwari wakange asati akura; yakanyorovesa nyika. Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mweya woupenyu mumhino dzake, akava mweya mupenyu; zita rake rainzi Adhamu. Genesisi 1:26-30 Mwari akati: “Ngatiite munhu nomufananidzo wedu, akafanana nesu, uye ngaave nesimba pamusoro pehove dzegungwa napamusoro peshiri dzedenga napamusoro pezvipfuwo zviri panyika nepamusoro pezvinhu zvose. nyika nezvinhu zvose zviri mairi “Mwari akasika munhu nomufananidzo wake, akasika murume nomukadzi; Mwari akavaropafadza, akati kwavari, Berekai, muwande, muzadze nyika, mubate ushe pairi; muve nesimba pamusoro pehove dzegungwa, napamusoro peshiri dzedenga, napamusoro pezvipenyu zvose zvinokambaira panyika. .” Mwari akati: Tarirai, ndakakupai miriwo yose inobereka mbeu, iri pachiso chenyika, nemiti yose inobereka michero ine mhodzi mukati mayo, kuti zvive zvokudya zvazvo, nemhuka dzenyika, neshiri dzokudenga; uye zvipenyu zvose zvinokambaira panyika uye ndakazvipa uswa hwakasvibirira kuti zvive zvokudya zvazvo.

Genesisi 2:18-24 Jehovha Mwari akati, "Hazvina kunaka kuti munhu agare ari oga; ndichamuitira mubatsiri Jehovha Mwari akaumba nevhu mhuka dzose dzesango neshiri dzose dzedenga akazviuyisa kumurume, muone kuti zita rake ndiani. Chipenyu chimwe nechimwe sezvachakatumidzwa nomunhu, ndiro zita racho. Zvipfuwo zvose, neshiri dzokudenga, nemhuka dzesango, zvikapa mazita kumunhu; Zvino Jehovha Mwari wakakonzera hope huru kuwira pamusoro pake, ndokuvata; Uye nerumbabvu urwo Jehovha Mwari akanga atora pamunhu akaumba mukadzi uye akamuunza kumurume. Murume akati, "Uyu ipfupa remafupa angu nenyama yenyama yangu. Ungamuti mukadzi, nokuti akatorwa pamurume." . Vaviri ava vaive vasina kupfeka panguva iyi uye vaisanyara.

【 piri 】 Mwari akaita sungano naAdamu mubindu reEdheni

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Genesisi 2:9-17] toriverenga pamwe chete: Jehovha Mwari akameresa miti yose kubva muvhu, yaiyevedza pakuona uye michero yayo yakanaka kudya. Mubindu makanga mune muti woupenyu nomuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa. Rwizi rwaidiridza bindu rwaiyerera ruchibva muEdheni, uye kubva ipapo rwakaparadzana rukava hova ina. Zita rowokutanga rainzi Pisoni, rakanga richipoteredza nyika yose yeHavhira. Pakanga pane goridhe, uye goridhe renyika iyoyo rakanga rakanaka; Zita rorwizi rwechipiri ndiGihoni, runopoteredza nyika yose yeKushi. Rwizi rwechitatu rwainzi Tigirisi, rwaiyerera kumabvazuva kweAsiria. Rwizi rwechina ndiYufuratesi; Jehovha Mwari akaisa munhu mumunda weEdheni kuti aurime nokuuchengeta. Jehovha Mwari akamurayira achiti, "Ungadya hako miti yose yomunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo." Cherechedza: Jehovha Mwari akaita sungano naAdhamu! Wakasununguka kuti udye kubva pamiti yose yaiva mubindu reEdheni , Asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya zvirokwazvo uchafa! ” )

【 tatu 】 Kutyorwa kwechibvumirano chaAdamu neruponeso rwaMwari

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Genesi 3:1-7] toivhura toverenga kuti: Nyoka yakanga ina manomano kupfuura zvisikwa zvose zvesango zvakanga zvaitwa naJehovha Mwari. Nyoka yakati kumukadzi, "Ichokwadi here kuti Mwari akati hamufaniri kudya muti upi zvawo uri mubindu?" pakati pomunda.” , Mwari akati, ‘Musaidya, kana kuibata, kuti murege kufa.’” Nyoka ikati kumukadzi, "Hamungafi zvirokwazvo, nokuti Mwari unoziva kuti nomusi wamunoudya nawo, meso enyu achasvinudzwa, muve saMwari, muchiziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa. Zvino mukadzi wakati achiona kuti muchero womuti wakange wakanaka kudyiwa, uye unoyevedza pameso, uye kuti waichenjedza vanhu, akatora umwe wemichero yawo akadya, ndokupa murume wake, naiye akaudyawo. . . Ipapo meso avo vari vaviri akasvinudzwa, uye vakaziva kuti vakanga vasina kusimira, uye vakazvirukira mashizha omuonde, vakazviitira nguo. Vhesi 20-21 Adhamu akatumidza mukadzi wake kuti Evha, nokuti ndiye mai vezvipenyu zvose. Jehovha Mwari akaitira Adhamu nomukadzi wake nguo dzamatehwe uye akavapfekedza.

( Cherechedza: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro, tinonyora, " Adhamu “Mufananidzo, mumvuri; Wokupedzisira "Adam" “Jesu Kristu” akafanana naye zvechokwadi! Mukadzi Evha mufananidzo chechi -" mwenga ", mwenga waKristu ! Evha ndiye mai vezvipenyu zvose, uye anofananidzira amai veJerusarema rokudenga reTestamente Itsva! Isu tinozvarwa kubudikidza nechokwadi chevhangeri raKristu, ndiko kuti, takazvarwa noMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa chaMwari, ndiye mai vedu! —Verenga VaG. 4:26. Ehe Inofananidzira kutumira kunoita Mwari Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu , kuva muzukuru waAdhamu zvinoreva kuti " chivi chedu "ita chipiriso chezvivi , tidzikinurei kubva kuchivi, pamurairo nepakutuka kwemurairo, bvisai munhu wekare waAdhamu, tiite vana vakazvarwa naMwari, tifuke munhu mutsva uye mupfeke Kristu, ndiko kuti, pfekai zvinopenya nekuchena zvipfeko Mai. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? --Tarisa kune zvakanyorwa muna Zvakazarurwa 19:9. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Tumirai vashandi kuti vatungamirire munhu wose kuti anzwisise kuti Mwari akatisarudza muna Kristu nyika isati yavambwa. Ameni

Ngatidzidzei Johane 3 Chitsauko 15-18 muBhaibheri toiverenga pamwe chete: Kuti ani nani anotenda maari ave noupenyu husingaperi (kana kududzirwa: kuti ani nani anotenda maari ave noupenyu husingaperi). “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. ( 2 ) Nehupenyu hweMwanakomana waMwari, kune hupenyu husingaperi

Uyu ndiye Jesu Kirisito akauya nemvura neropa; Kune zvitatu zvinopupura zvinoti: Mweya Mutsvene, nemvura, neropa, uye zvitatu izvi zvakabatanidzwa pachinhu chimwe. Uyu ndiye Mwari wechokwadi noupenyu husingaperi. — 1 Johane 5:13, 20

articles.title: Hupenyu Husingaperi 1 Poneswa uye uve nehupenyu husingaperi

articles.content:
Hama dzinodikanwa, rugare kuhama dzose! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Isaya Chitsauko 45 Ndima 21-22 Munofanira kutaura uye nokuisa pfungwa dzenyu, uye itai kuti varangane pakati pavo. Ndiani akazviratidza kubva panguva yekare-kare? Ndiani akazvitaura kubva kare? Handizini Jehovha here? Hakuna mumwe Mwari kunze kwangu; Tarirai kwandiri, imwi migumo yose yenyika, mugoponeswa; nekuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "hupenyu husingaperi" Aihwa. 1 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi, iro rakanyorwa nokutaurwa nemaoko avo, vhangeri reruponeso rwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Munhu wose ari kumigumo yenyika anofanira kutarisa kuna Kristu, uye achaponeswa uye achawana upenyu husingaperi ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

( 1 ) Tarisa kuna Kristu uye uchaponeswa

Haagoni kukunda nokuda kwavarwi vake vazhinji; Hazvina maturo kuvimba namabhiza kuti awane ruponeso; — Pisarema 33:16-17
Mapisarema 32:7 Imi muri utiziro hwangu; (Sera)
Mapisarema 37:39 Asi kuponeswa kwavakarurama kunobva kuna Jehovha;
Mapisarema 108:6 Tipindurei mutiponese noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, kuti vaya vamunoda vaponeswe.
Isaya Chitsauko 30 Ndima 15 Zvanzi naIshe Jehovha, Mutsvene waIsraeri: “Pakudzoka kwenyu nokuzorora ndipo panoruponeso rwenyu murugare norunyararo;
Isaya 45:22 Tarirai kwandiri, imwi migumo yose yenyika, mugoponeswa; nokuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe.
VaRoma 10:9 Kana uchipupura nomuromo wako kuti Jesu ndiye Ishe uye ukatenda mumwoyo mako kuti Mwari akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, uchaponeswa.
VaRoma 10:10 Nokuti munhu anotenda nomwoyo uye anoruramiswa, uye anopupura nomuromo uye anoponeswa.
VaRoma 10:13 Nokuti ani naani anodana kuzita raShe achaponeswa.
VaFiripi 1:19 Nokuti ndinoziva kuti izvi zvichabudirira muruponeso rwangu kubudikidza neminyengetero yenyu uye norubatsiro rwoMweya waJesu Kristu.

[Cherechedza]: Nokudzidza magwaro ari pamusoro apa, Mwari akati: “Tarirai kwandiri, imi migumo yose yenyika, ipapo muchaponeswa; nokuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe. Ameni! → “Pakudzoka kwako nokuzorora kwako zvichava zvako. ruponeso ruchava simba rako murugare; Unoramba “kuzorora, uve norugare” → kupinda muchipikirwa chake chokuzorora → kurovererwa, kuvigwa uye kumutswa pamwe chete naKristu kuti upinde muzororo muna Jesu Kristu, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Kana ukapupura nomuromo wako kuti Jesu ndiye Ishe uye ukatenda mumwoyo mako kuti Mwari akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, uchaponeswa → nokuti munhu anogona kururamiswa nokutenda nemwoyo wake uye nokuponeswa nokupupura nomuromo wake. “Ani naani anodana kuzita raShe achaponeswa. → Nokuti ndinoziva kuti kuburikidza neminyengetero yenyu uye nerubatsiro rweMweya waJesu Kristu, izvi zvichazonditungamirira kuruponeso rwangu. Ameni

( 2 ) Zvatinovimbiswa naIshe hupenyu husingaperi

“Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Kuti ani nani unotenda kwaari arege kuparara asi ave neupenyu hwusingaperi . Nokuti Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake munyika, kwete kuti ape nyika mhosva (kana kushandurwa se: kutonga nyika; iyo iri pasi), asi kuti nyika iponeswe naye. — Johani 3:16-17

Ani naani anotenda muMwanakomana ano upenyu husingaperi ;Uyo asingatendi muMwanakomana haangaoni upenyu husingaperi, asi kutsamwa kwaMwari kunogara pamusoro pake. ”—Johani 3:36
Johane 6:40 nokuti Baba vangu vanoda kuti ani naani anoona Mwanakomana uye achitenda kwaari ave noupenyu husingaperi , uye ndichamumutsa pazuva rokupedzisira. "
Johani 6:47 Ndinokuudzai chokwadi. Uyo anotenda ane upenyu husingaperi .
Johani 6:54 Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ano upenyu husingaperi , ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira.
Johani 10:28 uye ini ndinoapa upenyu husingaperi haingaparari nokusingaperi, uye hakuna angaabvuta muruoko rwangu.
Johani 12:25 Ani naani anoda upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; asi ani naani anovenga upenyu hwake munyika ino achahuchengetera upenyu husingaperi.
Johani 17:3 Zivai imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, uye Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi, muchiziva Jesu Kristu wamakatuma .

[Cherechedza] : Nekuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro, tinonyora kuti → Ishe vanotivimbisa hupenyu husingaperi! Nzira yekuwana sei hupenyu husingaperi→ 1 Uhu ndihwo upenyu husingaperi: kuti vakuzivei imi, Mwari wechokwadi chete, naJesu Kristu wamakatuma → 2 Uyo anotenda muMwanakomana ane upenyu husingaperi; asingatendi muMwanakomana haazogamuchiri upenyu husingaperi 3 Avo vanodya nyama ya“Jesu” nokunwa ropa ra“Jesu” vachawana upenyu husingaperi Jesu achatimutsa nezuva rokupedzisira 4 Ani nani anorasikirwa neupenyu hwake nekuda kwaJesu uye nevhangeri achaponesa hupenyu hwake uye kuwana hupenyu hwaJesu Kristu→ Chengetedza hupenyu kuhupenyu husingaperi ! articles.title: Kana wangoponeswa, haufe wakaparara, asi uve nehupenyu husingaperi

articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Johane Chitsauko 10 Ndima 27-28 Makwai angu anonzwa inzwi rangu, neni ndinoaziva, uye anonditevera. uye ini ndinoapa upenyu hwusingaperi;

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kana wangoponeswa, hupenyu husingaperi" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko ake, rinova vhangeri reruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya→ Avo vanonzwisisa kuti Jesu akapa chibayiro chechivi kamwe chete nokuda kwavose vanogona kuchenurwa nokusingaperi, vagoponeswa nokusingaperi, uye vave noupenyu husingaperi.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

( 1 ) Rudzikinuro rwaKristu rwezvitadzo kamwe chete runoita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nokusingaperi

VaHebheru 7:27 Haana kufanana navaprista vakuru vaifanira kutanga vabayira zvibayiro zuva rimwe nerimwe pamusoro pezvivi zvavo mushure mezvivi zvavanhu;
VaHebheru 10:11-12, 14 Muprista mumwe nomumwe anomira zuva rimwe nerimwe achishumira Mwari, achibayira kasingaperi, haangagoni kubvisa zvivi. Asi Kristu akapa chibayiro chimwe chete chisingaperi chezvivi uye akagara kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari. …Nokuti nechibayiro chimwe chete anoita kuti avo vanoitwa vatsvene vakwanise nokusingaperi.

[Cherechedza]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinogona kuona kuti Kristu akapa “chimwechete” chinopiwa chechivi chisingagumi, nokudaro achipedzisa “chinopiwa chezvivi” →

bvunza: Chii chinonzi kukwana?
mhinduro: Nokuti Kristu akapa rudzikinuro rusingaperi rwezvivi → nyaya yokuyananisira nezvibayiro → "akarega".
“Vhiki dzine makumi manomwe dzakatemerwa vanhu vako neguta rako dzvene, kugumisa zvivi, kunatsa, nokunatsa, nokuyananisira zvivi. kururama kusingaperi → "kusuma kururama kusingagumi kwaKristu noupenyu husina chivi", kuisa chisimbiso pachiratidzo nechiporofita, uye kuzodza Mutsvene (kana kuti: kana kuti shanduro) seizvi , unonzwisisa zvakajeka Reference - Dhanieri Chitsauko 9 Ndima 24
→ Nokuda kwa“Kristu,” chibayiro chake chimwe chete chinoita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nokusingaperi →

bvunza: Ndiani angaitwa mutsvene nokusingaperi?
mhinduro: Kutenda kuti Kristu akapa chipiriso chezvivi zvedu kuchaita kuti avo “vakachenurwa” vakakwana nekusingaperi → Sei? →Nekuti munhu wedu "akazvarwa patsva" ndiye "pfupa remapfupa nenyama yenyama" yaKristu, nhengo dzemuviri wake, muviri uye hupenyu hwaJesu Kristu! Hupenyu hwedu hwakaberekwa naMwari hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

( 2 ) Munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari → haasi wemunhu wekare

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaRoma 8:9 Kana Mweya waMwari uchigara mauri, iwe hauchisiri wenyama, asi woMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu.

[Cherechedza]: Kana Mweya waMwari “uchigara” mauri, kureva kuti, “munhu mutsva” akazvarwa naMwari, hausisiri munyama, zvichireva kuti “munhu wekare wenyama”. →“Munhu mutsva” wawakaberekwa naMwari haazi wo“munhu mutsva” wenyama; Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

→Uyu ndiye Mwari muna Kristu achiyananisa nyika kwaari, "asingaverengeri" →kudarika kwe "nyama yavo yemunhu wekare" ku "munhu mutsva" wavo wakaberekwa naMwari, uye achiisa kwavari shoko rekuyananisa Ameni! 5:19

( 3 ) Kana wangoponeswa, haufe wakaparara, asi uve nehupenyu husingaperi

VaHebheru 5:9 Zvino zvaakakwaniswa, anova muvambi wo“ruponeso rusingaperi” kumunhu wose anomuteerera.
Johani 10:27-28 BDMCS - Makwai angu anonzwa inzwi rangu, uye ini ndinoaziva, uye anonditevera. Uye ini ndinoapa upenyu husingaperi; “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi

[Cherechedza]: Sezvo Kristu akakwaniswa, akava muvambi woruponeso rusingagumi kuna avo vose vanoteerera “akarovererwa kamwe chete pamuchinjikwa, akafa, akavigwa, uye akamutswa pamwe chete naKristu. Ameni! →Jesu anotipawo hupenyu husingaperi →Avo vanotenda maari "havazombofi". Ameni! → Kana munhu ane Mwanakomana waMwari, ane upenyu kana asina Mwanakomana waMwari, haana upenyu. Ndanyora zvinhu izvi kwamuri imi munotenda muzita roMwanakomana waMwari, kuti muzive kuti mune upenyu husingaperi. Ameni! Chirevo-1 Johane 5:12-13

Shamwari inodiwa! Maita basa neMweya waJesu → Unodzvanya pachinyorwa chino kuti uverenge uye uteerere kumharidzo yevhangeri Kana uchida kugamuchira uye “kutenda” muna Jesu Kristu seMuponesi nerudo Rwake rukuru, tinganamata pamwechete here?

Mudikani Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinokutendai Baba voKudenga nokutumira Mwanakomana wenyu akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti afire pamuchinjikwa “nokuda kwezvivi zvedu” → 1 tisunungurei kubva kuchivi. 2 Tisunungurei pamurairo nokutukwa kwawo; 3 Kusunungurwa pasimba raSatani nerima reHadhesi. Ameni! Uye akavigwa → 4 Kubvisa murume wekare nezviito zvake akamutswa pazuva rechitatu → 5 Tiruramise! Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso, kuzvarwa patsva, kumutswa, kuponeswa, kugamuchira humwanakomana hwaMwari, uye kugamuchira hupenyu husingaperi! Mune ramangwana, tichagara nhaka yenhaka yaBaba vedu Vekudenga. Namata nemuzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

articles.title: “Ruponeso 2” Tenda muvhangeri ugoponeswa

articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Ndaponeswa" Aihwa. 2 Ngatinamatei: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【 Poshi 】 Chii chinonzi evhangeri?

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge Ruka 4:18-19 pamwe chete: “Mudzimu waShe uri pamusoro pangu, nokuti wakandizodza kuti ndiparidzire varombo mashoko akanaka, uye wakandituma kuti ndiparidzire vakatapwa kusunungurwa svinudza mapofu kuona, kusunungura vakamanikidzwa, nokuparidza gore rakanaka raMwari.”

Ruka 24:44-48 BDMCS - Jesu akati kwavari, “Izvi ndizvo zvandaikuudzai ndichinemi kuti: Zvinhu zvose zvakanyorwa muMurayiro waMozisi, naVaprofita nomuMapisarema pamusoro pamashoko angu zvinofanira kuitika.” - Biblics Ipapo Jesu akazarura ndangariro dzavo kuti vanzwisise Magwaro, akati kwavari: “Kwakanyorwa kuti Kristu achatambudzika agomuka kubva kuvakafa pazuva rechitatu, uye kuti vanhu vamunamate, iye ane zita rinoparidza kutendeuka nokumutswa uye nokumutswa kwake nezuva retatu. kukanganwirwa kwezvivi kumarudzi ose, kutanga paJerusarema.

[Cherechedza]: Uyu ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari→Jesu Kristu “achiparidza” vhangeri roumambo→ 1 “Vatapwa” vanosunungurwa, 2 "Mapofu" anofanira kuona, 3 Kusunungura avo "vakadzvinyirirwa" uye kuzivisa gore rinogamuchirika raMwari rejubheri. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

【 piri 】 Chinyorwa chikuru chevhangeri

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge 1 VaKorinde 15:3-4 pamwe chete: Nokuti zvandakakumikidzawo zvaiva: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu uye akavigwa maererano neMagwaro; Bhaibheri.
[Cherechedza] : Muapostora “Pauro” akati: “Evhangeri” yandakagamuchira uye yandakakuparidzirai: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neBhaibheri;

( 1 ) vakasununguka kubva kuchivi

Zvinoratidza kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira; nokuti tinofunga kuti sezvo “Kristu” akafira vose, vose vakafa → nokuti uyo akafa “akasunungurwa” muchivi → “vose” vakafa, “vose” Vose vakasunungurwa pachivi → chivi. VaRoma 7:4, 6 Hama dzangu, nemiwo makafa kumurayiro kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu, kuti muve vamwe... Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro uyo watakasungwa nawo. kuitira kuti tigone kushumira Ishe maererano nehutsva hwemweya (mweya: kana kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete maererano netsika yekare yetsika.
VaGaratia 3:13 Kristu akatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, aitwa chakatukwa nokuda kwedu;
Uye akavigwa →

VaKorose 3:9 Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare namabasa awo.
Avo vari vaKristu Jesu vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa nyama nokuchiva kwayo uye nezvainoshuva. — VaGaratiya 5:24
Uye akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neBhaibheri.

Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

( 1 ) Tichitarisa kuNyoka Yendarira yeRuponeso muTestamente Yekare

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri muna Numeri 21:8-9 Jehovha akati kuna Mosesi, “Gadzira nyoka yomoto ugoiturika padanda. Ani naani anorumwa nenyoka achararama kana akatarira nyoka yendarira.

[Cherechedza]: Pano tinotarira kumusoro ku“nyoka yendarira” → Mhangura: mhangura inopenya - nongedzera kuna Zvakazarurwa 1:15 . Inofananidzira ruponeso rwaKristu → Kristu "akafira isu akava chituko uye akaturikwa padanda. → Chero ani anotarisa kumusoro ku" nyoka yendarira" ari kutarisa kuMuponesi, uye "huturu hwenyoka" pamiviri yavo hunonzi hwakakonzerwa "Nyoka yendarira" yakatukwa nenzira iyi, vanhu vanorumwa nenyoka vachararama kana vakatarisa nyoka yendarira iyi.

( 2 ) Testamente Itsva Tarisa kuna Kristu kuti uwane Ruponeso

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Isaya Chitsauko 45 Vhesi 22 Ngavatarire kwandiri, ivo migumo yose yenyika, vaponeswe; nokuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe. 1 Timotio 2:4 Anoda kuti vanhu vose vaponeswe uye vasvike pakuziva chokwadi.

[Cherechedza]: Munhu wose ari kumigumo yenyika anofanira kutarisa kuMuponesi uye “kuziva chokwadi” uye achaponeswa. Ameni

bvunza: Chii chinonzi Tao?
mhinduro: Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye “Tao” akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga.

bvunza: Tinganzwisisa sei nzira yechokwadi?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi
“Shoko” rakava nyama, ndiko kuti, “Mwari” rakava nyama → rakanzi Jesu! Zita rokuti “Jesu” rinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Ameni! →Akaitwa pamuviri uye akaberekwa kubva ku“Mweya Mutsvene” nemhandara Mariya, uye ndiye mwanakomana waMwari Wokumusorosoro. Tarisa kuna Johani 1:1-2, 14 uye Mateu 1:21-23

Nokuti sezvo vana vari vagovani veropa nenyama, iyewo wakagovana navo pazviri, kuti kubudikidza norufu aparadze uyo ane simba rorufu, iye dhiabhorosi, agosunungura avo vakanga vari muuranda kwoupenyu hwavo hwose. kubudikidza nekutya rufu. →Ndi "Kristu" akarovererwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu → akatidzikinura uye akatisunungura: 1 wakasununguka kubva kuchivi. 2 Kusunungurwa kubva pamurayiro nokutukwa kwawo. 3 Akabvisa mutana nemararamiro ake akare akamutswa pazuva rechitatu → kutiita vakarurama! articles.title: Kudzingiswa Chii chinonzi kudzingiswa uye kudzingiswa kwechokwadi?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Shamwari dzinodiwa* Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 2 ndima 28-29 todziverenga pamwe chete: Nokuti ani naani ari muJudha nechokunze haazi muJudha, uye kudzingiswa hakuzi muJudha anoonekwa kunze. Avo chete vanoitwa nechomukati ndivo vaJudha vechokwadi; Kurumbidzwa kwomunhu uyu hakubvi kumunhu, asi kuna Mwari

Nhasi tinodzidza, kuyanana, uye nekugoverana mashoko aMwari pamwechete "Kudzingiswa uye kudzingiswa kwechokwadi chii?" 》Munamato: “Baba Vekudenga vanodikanwa, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ndinokutendai “mukadzi akanaka” nekutumira vashandi nemaoko avo vakanyora uye vakataura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri reruponeso rwenyu. Chingwa chinounzwa kwatiri kubva kudenga kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri nekuona nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya→ Kunzwisisa chinonzi kudzingiswa uye kudzingiswa kwechokwadi zvinoenderana nemweya .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kuvonga, uye maropafadzo akaitwa muzita dzvene raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

( 1 ) kudzingiswa chii

Genesisi 17:9-10 Mwari akatiwo kuna Abhurahama, “Iwe navana vako munofanira kuchengeta sungano yangu kusvikira kumarudzi enyu ose. Vanhurume venyu vose vanofanira kudzingiswa, iyi ndiyo sungano yangu pakati penyu navana vako.

bvunza: Chii chinonzi kudzingiswa?
mhinduro: “Kudzingiswa” kunoreva kudzingiswa → Imi “varume” munofanira kudzingiswa (chinyorwa chepakutanga chinoti kudzingiswa) uhwu ndihwo humbowo hwesungano pakati pangu nemi - tarisai kuna Genesi 17:11 .

bvunza: Varume vanochecheudzwa rinhi?

mhinduro: Pazuva rechisere pashure pokuberekwa → Vanhurume vose muzvizvarwa zvenyu muzvizvarwa zvenyu zvose, vangava vakaberekerwa mumhuri yenyu kana kuti vakatengwa nemari kumunhu wokunze asiri muzukuru wenyu, vanofanira kudzingiswa pazuva rechisere pashure pokuberekwa kwavo. Vose vakaberekerwa mumba mako naavo vaunotenga nemari yako vanofanira kudzingiswa. Ipapo sungano yangu ichasimbiswa panyama yenyu sesungano isingaperi - Ona Genesi 17:12-13

( 2 ) Chii chinonzi kudzingiswa kwechokwadi?

bvunza: Chii chinonzi kudzingiswa kwechokwadi?
mhinduro: Nokuti ani naani ari muJudha nechokunze haazi muJudha, uye kudzingiswa hakuzi muJudha anoonekwa kunze. Avo chete vanoitwa nechomukati ndivo vaJudha vechokwadi; Kurumbidzwa kwomunhu uyu hakuna kubva kuvanhu, asi kuna Mwari. VaRoma 2:28-29.

Cherechedza: Kudzingiswa kwokunze kwomuviri hakusi kudzingiswa kwechokwadi “Nei → Nemhaka yokuti kudzingiswa kwokunze kunovezwa panyama, nyama yomunhu yekare inoshatiswa zvishoma nezvishoma nokuda kwokunyengera kwezvishuvo zvoudyire ndokudzokera kuguruva, kusina maturo, uye kusava namaturo; kwete kudzingiswa kwechokwadi-- Tarisa VaEfeso 4:22

( 3 ) Kudzingiswa kwechokwadi ndiKristu

bvunza: Saka kudzingiswa kwechokwadi chii?

mhinduro: “Kudzingiswa kwechokwadi” zvinoreva kuti Jesu paakanga ava nemazuva masere okuberekwa, akadzingisa mwana akamutumidza kuti Jesu; Chirevo-Ruka 2:21

bvunza: Nei kudzingiswa kwa“Jesu” kuri kwechokwadi?

mhinduro: Nokuti Jesu iShoko rakava munhu uye Mweya uri munhu → Iye “ Lingcheng “Kana tichidya nokunwa kudzingiswa kwake Nyama uye Ropa isu tiri nhengo dzake. Paakadzingiswa, isu takadzingiswa! Nokuti tiri mitezo yomuviri wake . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Tarisa kuna Johani 6:53-57

vaJudha vakadzingiswa" Chinangwa "Kunoreva kutendeukira kuna Mwari, asi kudzingiswa panyama - nyama yaAdhamu inoparara nokuda kwokuchiva uye haigoni kugara nhaka youmambo hwaMwari, saka kudzingiswa munyama hakusi kudzingiswa kwechokwadi → nokuti avo vari vaJudha nechokunze havasi vaJudha vechokwadi; uye kudzingiswa hakuzi munyama yokunze. kudzingiswa Ungori mumvuri, mumvuri unotitungamira mukuzadzikiswa kwe " Mudzimu waKristu wakava muviri uye wakadzingiswa ”→ Tinopinza mweya mumutumbi waKristu wakadzingiswa mumoyo yedu →Jesu Kristu akatimutsa kubva kuvakafa. Nenzira iyi, tiri vana vaMwari, uye takadzingiswa zvechokwadi! Ipapo ndipo patinogona kudzokera kuna Mwari → Kune vose vanomugamuchira, kune avo vanotenda muzita rake, anopa kodzero yekuva vana vaMwari. Ava ndivo vasina kuberekwa neropa, kwete neruchiva, kana nechido chemurume, asi vakaberekwa naMwari. Johani 1:12-13

→ Saka" kudzingiswa kwechokwadi "Zviri mumwoyo nomumweya! Kana tichidya nokunwa nyama neropa raShe tiri mitezo yomuviri wake, ndiko kuti, takazvarwa navana vaMwari, uye takadzingiswa zvirokwazvo. Amen! → Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Chinoberekwa nenyama, chinoberekwa nenyama; chinoberekwa nomudzimu mweya - nongedzera kuna Johane 3 ndima 6 → 1 avo chete vakazvarwa nemvura noMweya. 2 vakazvarwa neshoko rechokwadi revhangeri. 3 akaberekwa naMwari Ndiko kudzingiswa kwechokwadi ! Ameni

“Kudzingiswa kwechokwadi” anodzokera kuna Mwari haazooni kuora uye anogona kugara nhaka youmambo hwaMwari → kutsungirira nokusingaperi uye kurarama nokusingaperi! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Naizvozvo mupositora Pauro akati → Nokuti ani naani ari muJudha nechokunze haazi muJudha wechokwadi, uye kudzingiswa hakusi kwekunze kwenyama. Avo chete vanoitwa nechomukati ndivo vaJudha vechokwadi; Kurumbidzwa kwomunhu uyu hakuna kubva kuvanhu, asi kuna Mwari. VaRoma 2:28-29

Shamwari inodiwa! Maita basa neMweya waJesu → Unodzvanya pachinyorwa chino kuti uverenge uye uteerere kumharidzo yevhangeri Kana uchida kugamuchira uye “kutenda” muna Jesu Kristu seMuponesi nerudo Rwake rukuru, tinganamata pamwechete here?

Mudikani Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinokutendai Baba voKudenga nokutumira Mwanakomana wenyu akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti afire pamuchinjikwa “nokuda kwezvivi zvedu” → 1 tisunungurei kubva kuchivi. 2 Tisunungurei pamurairo nokutukwa kwawo; 3 Kusunungurwa pasimba raSatani nerima reHadhesi. Ameni! Uye akavigwa → 4 Kubvisa murume wekare nezviito zvake akamutswa pazuva rechitatu → 5 Tiruramise! Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso, kuzvarwa patsva, kumutswa, kuponeswa, kugamuchira humwanakomana hwaMwari, uye kugamuchira hupenyu husingaperi! Mune ramangwana, tichagara nhaka yenhaka yaBaba vedu Vekudenga. Namata nemuzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni
