articles.title: “Kumuka kuvakafa” Handichisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anoraramira ini
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Shamwari dzinodiwa* Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaGaratia chitsauko 2 ndima 20 tiverenge pamwe chete: Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri, uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino mumuviri ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kristu vanoraramira ini 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka "Kutuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri reruponeso rwenyu. Chingwa chinounzwa kubva kure kudenga, uye chinopihwa kwatiri munguva yakafanira, kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hugowanda! Ameni Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuitira kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → kunzwisisa. "Ndinorarama" kuti ndirarame kunze kwaAdhamu, mutadzi, uye muranda wechivi Kristu "akandifira," "akavigwa" nokuda kwangu → Kristu akararama kunze kwemufananidzo waKristu; waKristu kubwinya kwaMwari Baba ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

Zvino handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu unoraramira ini

Hymn: Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu

( 1 ) Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu

VaRoma 6:5-6 Nokuti kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake, tichabatanawo naye mukumutswa kwake, tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi. kuti uparadzwe kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe.
VaGaratia 5:24 Avo vari vaKristu Jesu vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa nyama nokuchiva kwayo uye nezvainoshuva.

Cherechedza: Ndakabatanidzwa naKristu, ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, ndakafa, ndakavigwa uye ndakararamira chinangwa chimwe → 1 tisunungurei kubva kuchivi. 2 Kusunungurwa kubva pamurayiro nokutukwa kwawo. 3 Bvisai mutana netsika dzake dzekare; 4 Kuti tiruramiswe, tigamuchire kuitwa vana vaMwari. Ameni

( 2 ) Pinda Chivimbiso Chake cheZororo

Nokuti ani naani anopinda muzororo akazorora pamabasa ake, sezvo Mwari akazorora pane ake. VaHebheru 4 ndima 10 →

Cherechedza: Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu kuti "ndiparadze" muviri uye hupenyu hwakabva kuna Adhamu kusvika kuchivi → Uku ndiko kuzorora kubva pabasa rangu re "chivi", sezvakangoita Mwari akazorora kubva ku "basa rake rekusika" → kupinda muzororo!
Nokuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, akafa, uye akavigwa pamwe chete naKristu → "munhu wekare" muviri wezvivi wakapinda muzororo, takamutswa pamwe chete naKristu → "munhu mutsva" akapinda muna Kristu uye akawana zororo → "Mweya Mutsvene" wakavandudzwa; uye akavaka mandiri → hongu Kristu “akararamira” nokuda kwangu → nenzira iyi, panofanira kuva ne“imwe zororo reSabata” → yakachengeterwa vanhu vaMwari. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ona VaHebheru 4:9

Sezvo tasarirwa nevimbiso yokupinda muzororo rake, ngatitye kuti zvimwe mumwe wedu (pakutanga, imi) anoita seanosarira shure. Nokuti evhangeri yakaparidzirwa kwatiri, sezvakwakaitirwa ivo; asi shoko ravanonzwa haribatsiri kwavari, nekuti havana. chivimbo "nezvawanzwa" road “Vakavhengana. Asi isu vakatenda tinogona kuwana zororo irero, sezvinoreva Mwari, achiti: “Ndakapika pakutsamwa kwangu, ndikati: Havangapindi muzororo rangu; ’” Kutaura idi, basa rokusika rakapedzwa kubvira pakusikwa kwenyika—VaHebheru 4:1-3

( 3 ) Kristu anoraramira ini, ndinorarama saKristu

Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri, uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino munyama, ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. — VaGaratiya chitsauko 2 ndima 20
Nokuti kwandiri, kurarama ndiKristu, uye kufa kupfuma. — VaFiripi 1:21

[Cherechedza]: Sezvakataurwa nemuapostora Pauro → Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu, uye zvino handisisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri.

bvunza: Munhu wangu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, akafa, akavigwa pamwe chete naKristu;
mhinduro: Nokuti wakafa → “munhu wekare woupenyu afa” uye upenyu hwako → “akazvarwa patsva kumunhu mutsva woupenyu” hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Reference-VaKorose Chitsauko 3 Ndima 3-4

→NdiIshe Jesu Kristu" nokuti "Rufu kwatiri tose," nokuti “Tose takavigwa; Kristu “akaita patsva” isu nokumuka kwake kubva kuvakafa → uye zvino Achadaro” nokuti "Tese tinorarama → Kristu" nokuti "Munhu wose anorarama kunze kwaKristu nokubwinya kwaMwari Baba! Hakusi kuti "tinorarama" Kristu → "munorarama" → asi raramai Adhama, raramai vatadzi, raramai sevaranda vechivi, uye mubereke zvibereko zvechivi. .

Naizvozvo, kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye murumuko rwakafanana norumuko rwake → Ini zvino “ndinogara” uye ndinozorora muna Kristu → ndinovandudzwa muna Kristu no“Mweya Mutsvene. ” anogara mandiri Vaka→ Kristu” nokuti "Ndinogara → 1 Kristu anorarama kunze kwaMwari Baba “anowana” kukudzwa + ini “ndinowana” kukudzwa, 2 Kristu mupenyu "anowana" mubairo + zvinoreva kuti "ndinowana" mubairo, 3 Kuwana “korona” kwaKristu kunoreva kuti “ndinowana” korona. 4 Kristu “akararama” rumuko rwakanaka kwazvo kwandiri, ndiko kuti, kudzikinurwa kwomuviri + Kristu paanoonekwa kechipiri, miviri yedu ichamutswa nenzira yakanaka zvikuru! 5 Kristu anotonga + ndinotonga pamwe chete naKristu! Ameni! Hareruya! Saka, unoda here? Ndazviwana?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: Tsananguro yakaoma: Ani nani anorasikirwa neupenyu hwake nekuda kwangu uye nevhangeri achahuponesa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Shamwari dzinodiwa* Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Marko chitsauko 8 ndima 35 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa mweya wake acharasikirwa nawo, asi ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana pamwechete - tsananguro yemibvunzo yakaoma " Rashikirwa nehupenyu hwako; 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka "Tumai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu! Chingwa chinounzwa kubva kure kudenga, uye chinopiwa kwatiri nenguva yakafanira, kuti upenyu hwedu hwomweya hugowanda! Ameni Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

( 1 ) kuwana hupenyu

Mateo 16:24-25 Ipapo Jesu akati kuvadzidzi vake: “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere, nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake (kana kuti mweya wake; pazasi) acharasikirwa noupenyu hwake;

( 2 ) vakaponesa upenyu

Mako 8:35 Nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo, asi ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake nokuda kwangu uye nokuda kwevhangeri achahuponesa. —-Verenga Ruka 9:24

( 3 ) Chengetedza hupenyu kuhupenyu husingaperi

Johane 12 Vhesi 25 Ani naani anoda upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; asi ani naani anovenga upenyu hwake munyika ino achahuchengetera upenyu husingaperi.
1 Petro Chitsauko 1:9 Uye gamuchirai mibairo yekutenda kwenyu, uko → "ruponeso rwemweya yenyu." Pisarema 86:13 Nokuti rudo rwenyu rusingachinji rwakakura kwandiri;

[Cherechedza]: Ishe Jesu akati → Munhu wose anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake (upenyu: kana kuti rinoshandurwa se“mweya”) nokuda kwa“ini” uye “evhangeri” → 1 Uchava nehupenyu, 2 akaponesa hupenyu, 3 Chengetedza hupenyu kuhupenyu husingaperi. Ameni!

bvunza: Kurasikirwa nehupenyu → "upenyu" kana kushandurwa se "mweya" → kurasikirwa ne "mweya"? Haana here kuti aida “kuponesa” mweya? Nzira ye → "kurasikirwa nemweya wako"?
mhinduro: Sezvinotaura Bhaibheri → “kuwana upenyu” kunoreva “kuwana mweya,” uye “kuponesa upenyu” kunoreva “kuponesa mweya” → Kutanga tinofanira kudzidza Bhaibheri “mweya” waAdhamu Genesi 2:7 Akasika munhu uye akafemera mumhino dzake upenyu

Akava munhu mupenyu anonzi Adhamu. →Munhu mupenyu ane “mudzimu” (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa senyama)”; Adhama munhu mupenyu wenyama neropa. References - 1 VaKorinte 15:45 → Kuziviswa kwaJehovha pamusoro paIsraeri. Paradzai matenga muvake nheyo dzenyika → “Mudzimu wakaita munhu mukati” anodaro Jehovha, anonongedzera kuna—Zekaria Chitsauko 12 Vhesi 1 → Naizvozvo, "muviri wemweya" waAdamu wakasikwa, uye "muviri wemweya" waAdhamu wakasvibiswa ne "nyoka" mubindu reEdheni → uye wakatengeswa kuchivi - Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here? 7:14.

bvunza: Ishe Jesu vanoponesa sei mweya yedu?
mhinduro: "Jesu" → Ipapo akadana vanhu navadzidzi vake kwavari akati kwavari, "Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere → ndakabatanidzwa naKristu ndikarovererwa" Chinangwa ":"Upenyu Hwakarasika" → kureva, hupenyu hwekurasikirwa ne "mweya nemuviri" wekare Adhamu uye kuita chivi → nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake (kana kushandurwa se: mweya; zvakafanana pasi apa) acharasikirwa noupenyu hwake; ani nani anorasikirwa nehupenyu hwake nekuda kwe "ini" uye "evhangeri" Upenyu hwakarasika →

1 Uchava nehupenyu→

bvunza: Upenyu hwaani huchawanwa?

mhinduro: Kuwana hupenyu hwaJesu Kristu→upenyu(kana kuturikirwa se: mweya)→kuwana "mweya waJesu Kristu". Ameni! ;" Kwete zvakare “Kuwanazve” mweya wenyama waAdhamu, chisikwa. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

2 Kana ukaponesa upenyu hwako, uchaponesa mweya wako→ Kana munhu ane Mwanakomana waMwari, ano upenyu; kana asina Mwanakomana waMwari, haana upenyu. Nongedzo - 1 Johane 5:12 → Kureva kuti, kuva ne“upenyu hwaJesu” kuva → “mweya” waJesu → une “mweya waJesu Kristu” → kuponesa mweya wako! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Chenjedzo: Vanhu vazhinji havadi "mweya waKristu" vari kutarisa kwose kwose uye vachibvunza kwose kwose → Mweya wangu uripi? Haiwa Jehovha, mweya wangu uripi? kuita sei? Unofunga kuti vanhu ava imhandara dzakapusa Hazvinaki here kuti une “mweya waJesu Kristu”? Mweya wakasikwa naAdhamu wakanaka here?

bvunza: Ndoita sei nemweya wangu?

mhinduro: Ishe Jesu vakati → "Vakarasika, vakasiiwa, vakarasika"; mweya mutsva "→ Kristu" mweya ", muviri mutsva → muviri waKristu ! Ameni. →Nokuda kwe“mweya waKristu” norufu pamuchinjikwa →ndiwo “mweya wowakarurama” → Jesu paakaravira (akagamuchira) vhiniga, akati: “ Zvaitwa ! "Akatsikitsira ndokuti," mweya “Ipei kuna Mwari.”— Johane 19:30

Jesu Kristu achadaro mweya Baba Delivery iri → Pedzisa mweya wewakarurama “!Hauzvide here?

Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Ani naani anoda upenyu hwake acharasikirwa noupenyu hwake “hwakare,” asi ani naani anovenga upenyu hwake munyika ino achahuchengeta. itsva “Hupenyu kuupenyu husingaperi. Ameni

→ Mwari worugare ngaakuitei vatsvene zvakazara! Uye dai “mweya, mweya nomuviri” wako somunhu akazvarwa patsva ngauchengetedzwe usina chaungapomerwa pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Reference-1 VaTesaronika Chitsauko 5 Ndima 23

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

2021.02.02

articles.title: Tsananguro yakaoma: Kwakanga kuri kumuka kwemuviri unofa waAdhamu here kana kuti kumuka kwemuviri usingafi waKristu?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hama dzinodikanwa, rugare kuhama dzose! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 8 ndima 11 tiverenge pamwe chete: Asi kana Mweya waiye akamutsa Jesu kubva kuvakafa achigara mamuri, iye akamutsa Kristu kubva kuvakafa achapawo upenyu kumiviri yenyu inofa kubudikidza noMweya wake wakamutsa Kristu kubva kuvakafa. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, nekugovana mibvunzo nemhinduro pamwechete kuti miviri yenyu inofa imutswe 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka "Tumai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu! Chingwa chinotorwa kubva kure kudenga, uye chinopiwa kwatiri munguva yakafanira, kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huwedzerwe. !Ameni Hwisisa kuti “muviri unofa wakava mupenyu” ndiwo muviri waKristu;

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

( 1 ) kuti miviri yenyu inofa imutswe

bvunza: Chii chinonzi muviri unofa?
mhinduro: Muviri unofa → somupostora “Pauro” anodana → “muviri wenyama neropa, muviri wechivi, muviri unofa, muviri wetsvina, muviri wetsvina, muviri unogona kuora, kuparadzwa, uye kuremara" → unonzi muviri unofa. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 7:24 naVaFiripi 3:21+ nezvimwewo!

bvunza: “Muviri wenyama” unotadza, unofa, uye uri pasi perufu... Ko “muviri wenyama, muviri unofa” unova mupenyu zvakare here?
mhinduro: Kristu “akatora” muviri waAdhamu unofa akaushandura kuti ufanane nomuviri unotadza kuti ushande sechipiriso chezvivi - tarisa VaRoma 8:3 → Mwari akaita muviri usina chivi wa“Kristu” kupinda mumuviri unotadza wa“Adhamu” - reva 2 VaKorinde 5:21 naIsaya 53:6, mubairo wechivi rufu → “unonzi muviri unofa”, Kristu “akava muviri wechivi nokuda kwedu” Inofanira kufa kamwe chete →Nenzira iyi, kana Kristu auya, Yakapedzwa "Mutemo, mubairo wechivi rufu, uye nezuva raunoudya iwe zvechokwadi uchafa. Tarisai VaRoma 6: 10 uye Genesisi 2: 17. Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here? → Adhamu naEvha "Hamufaniri kudya chamunodya" Muchero wemuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa. Mukadzi Evha ndiye pfupa nenyama yaAdhamu. Mukadzi Evha anofananidzira kereke. “Kereke” yakafa iri munyama isina kudzingiswa. Jehovha Unonzwisisa zvakajeka here kuti Mwari akafemera “mweya woupenyu” mumuviri waAdhamu usina kudzingiswa - Verenga VaKorose 2:13 uye Genesi 2:7 .

( 2 ) Muviri wemweya ndiwo unomutswa

Uye "Adam" yakakushwa Muviri wenyama neropa,” kumutswa "Hongu →" muviri wemweya ". Kana kune muviri wenyama, panofanirawo kuva nemuviri wemweya. Reference - 1 VaKorinde 15:44 → "Muviri waJesu" iShoko rakazvarwa, rakanambwa uye rakaberekwa kubva ku" Mweya Mutsvene" nemhandara Mariya → Saka Jesu Kristu akafa kubva murufu Muviri wakamutswa muna Kristu "muviri wemweya" muviri wedu wakamutswa naKristuwo "muviri wemweya".

Pose patinodya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru, tinodya chingwa chaShe.” Muviri ", inwa kubva kuna Jehovha" Ropa “Hupenyu→Nenzira iyi tine muviri noupenyu hwaKristu, I Ndidzo nhengo dzomuviri wake→ Uyuwo muviri mutsvene, usina chivi, usina gwapa, usina kusvibiswa, uye usingaori muviri neupenyu → uhwu ndihwo "hupenyu hwangu hwakamutswa naKristu"! mukadzi manheru" chechi Vakafa mukudarika nokusadzingiswa kwenyama, asi muna Kristu. chechi “Vapenyuzve. Ameni! Muna Adhamu vose vakafa; muna Kristu vose vanoitwa vapenyu. Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

Naizvozvo → Iye akamutsa Kristu Jesu kubva kuvakafa achazviitawo live "Mumoyo mako" Mweya Mutsvene ", kuti miviri yenyu inofa imutsidzirwe → Muviri waKristu mupenyu zvakare! Ameni ; Haina kusikwa neguruva → "Muviri unofa, unofa, unoora, unotadza unoitwa kuti uve mupenyu zvakare. Unonzwisisa izvi here?"

Kana "muviri wakasikwa kubva muguruva ukauya kuupenyu" → ucharamba uchiora uye uchifa → chete izvo Mwari akamutsa haasati aona kuora → izvi hazvisi "zvinopesana" here? Unofunga kudaro here? Tarisa kuna Vaapositori 13:37

( 3 ) kududzira zvisizvo →Uye ita kuti miviri yako inofa ive mipenyu zvakare

---Kana hwaro hwekumuka kwako naKristu husina kururama~"unozotadza nhanho dzese dzenzira"---

Machechi mazhinji nhasi ane “kududzirwa zvisizvo kweichi chinyorwa chitsvene” uye pesvedzero yacho yakakura zvikuru → nokuti hwaro hwokumuka kwako naKristu hwakaipa → “nheyo yokumuka” haina kururama, uye “zviito” zvevakuru, vafundisi, uye vaparidzi ndizvo zvavanotaura uye zvavanoparidza Vachagara vasina kururama → Somuenzaniso, “Shoko rakava nyama”, vanoti Jesu akava nyama → Tinogona kuva nyama “munyama” nokuvimba ne“Mweya Mutsvene” → “nyama” " "Tao". Ungava sei Tao "Dzidziso dzavo" → Kuvimba nemutemo kukudziridza "nyama yaAdhamu" kuti ive yakanaka uye iite kunaka kwenyama nyama" uye kurarama noMweya Mutsvene. Kukwaniswa nenyama → kurasa "ruponeso rwaKristu, Shoko raMwari, chokwadi, uye upenyu" uye kuwa kubva panyasha. Nenzira iyi, unonzwisisa zvakajeka → sezvakataurwa na "Pauro"? →Matanga neMweya Mutsvene, muchiri kuvimba nenyama kuti mukwane here - VaGaratiya 3:3

Mumachechi akawanda nhasi, vanorondawo kushingairira → "shoko raMwari" uye "noupenyu", asi kwete maererano nezivo yechokwadi → nokuti "ivo" havazivi kururama kwaMwari uye vanoda kugadza kururama kwavo pachavo, asi havazviisi pasi pokururama kwaMwari . Kusiririsa kwakadini, kusiririsa kwakadini! Chirevo-VaRoma 10:3

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: “Muchinjikwa” Kana tikafa naKristu, tinotenda kuti tichararama naye
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Shamwari inodiwa! Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 6 uye ndima 8 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kana takafa naKristu, tinofanira kutenda kuti tichararama naye. VaEfeso 2:6-7 Akatimutsa uye akatigarisa pamwe chete nesu munzvimbo dzokudenga muna Kristu Jesu, kuti aratidze kuzvizvarwa zvinotevera pfuma huru yenyasha dzake, nounyoro hwake kwatiri muna Kristu Jesu.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "muchinjikwa" Aihwa. 8 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [chechi] anotuma vashandi kuti vatakure zvokudya kubva kumatenga ari kure neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rataurwa mumaoko avo *, uye anotigovera zvokudya nenguva kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti kana takafa naKristu, tichatenda kuti tichararama naye uye tigogara naye kudenga! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

Kana tichifa naKristu Xinbi gara naye

( 1 ) Tinotenda murufu, kuvigwa nekumuka pamwe chete naKristu

bvunza: Tinofa sei, tovigwa, uye tomuka sei pamwe chete naKristu?
mhinduro: Zvinoitika kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira; nokuti tinofunga kuti sezvo mumwe akafira vose, vose vakafa → "Kristu" akafa - "vose" vakafa → uku kunonzi kutenda "vakafa pamwe chete" uye Kristu "akavigwa" - " Vese” vakavigwa → uku kunonzi kutenda “kuvigwa pamwe chete”; Jesu Kristu “akamutswa kubva kuvakafa” → “vose” vakamutswawo → uku kunonzi kutenda “kugara pamwe chete”! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chirevo - 2 VaKorinte 5:14 → Kumuka naKristu "kumuka muna Kristu" kwete kumuka muna Adhamu. → Muna Adhamu vose vanofa; saizvozvo muna Kristu vose vachaitwa vapenyu. Chirevo - 1 VaKorinte 15:22

( 2 ) Miviri yedu yakamutswa nehupenyu zvakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari

bvunza: Miviri yedu yakamutswa neupenyu huri kupi iye zvino?
mhinduro: Tiri vapenyu naKristu “mumuviri noupenyu” → “takavigwa” muna Mwari naKristu, uye tigere pamwe chete kudenga kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? → Patakanga takafa mukudarika kwedu, akatiita vapenyu pamwe chete naKristu (makaponeswa nenyasha). Akatimutsawo uye akatigarisa pamwe chete munzvimbo dzokudenga naKristu Jesu - tarisa VaEfeso 2:5-6

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. --Verenga VaKorose 3:3-4

( 3 ) Muviri waAdhamu wakamutswa, dzidziso dzenhema
VaRoma 8:11 Asi kana Mweya waiye akamutsa Jesu kubva kuvakafa achigara mamuri, iye akamutsa Kristu kubva kuvakafa achapawo upenyu kumiviri yenyu inofa noMweya wake wakamutsa Kristu kubva kuvakafa mupenyu.

[Cherechedza]: Kana “Mudzimu waMwari” uchigara matiri, hausi wenyama, asi woMudzimu Genesisi 3:19 VaRoma 8:9-10 → “Mweya” “unoraramira” kwandiri nokuti Mweya waKristu unogara matiri! Ameni. → Sezvo isu "tisiri" vemuviri unotadza waAdhamu, hatisi muviri waAdhamu uyo wakava mupenyu zvakare.

bvunza: Zvaisareva here kuti miviri yenyu inofa yaizomutswa?

mhinduro: Muapostora “Pauro” akati → 1 Ndiani angandiponesa pamuviri uyu worufu - Rugwaro - VaRoma 7:24, 2 “Pfeka” muviri usingaori waKristu → Ipapo Rugwaro runoti, “Rufu rwakamedzwa mukukunda” ruchazadzika → kuti “rufu” urwu rumedzwe noupenyu “husingafi” hwaKristu.

bvunza: Chii chinonzi kusafa?
mhinduro: Iwo muviri waKristu → kufanoziva ikoku, achitaura nezvorumuko rwaKristu, iye akati: “Mweya wake hauna kusiiwa muHadhesi, uyewo nyama yake haina kuona kuora. Chirevo-Mabasa 2:31
Nokuti Mwari akaisa zvitadzo zve "vanhu vose" kuna Kristu, zvichiita kuti Jesu asina chivi "ave" "chivi" nokuda kwedu, paunoona "muviri waJesu" wakarembera pamuti → ndiwo "muviri wezvivi" wako → wakanzi To kufa pamwe chete naKristu nokuda kwe“zvinofa, zvinofa, zvinoora” uye kuvigwa muguva nomuguruva. → Naizvozvo, muviri wako unofa unoraramiswazve → Kristu ndiye “akatora” muviri waAdhamu → Unonzi muviri unofa, kureva kuti, Akafira “zvivi zvedu” kamwe chete, uye ndiwo muviri waKristu. anomutswa uye akamutswa; kwete guruva raAdhamu Kusikwa rinova mhenyu zvakare. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

→Kana tichidya nokunwa “nyama neropa raShe,” tine muviri noupenyu hwaKristu matiri → Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kana musingadyi nyama nokunwa ropa raShe. Mwanakomana woMunhu, hamuna upenyu mamuri, anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi, uye ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira.

Cherechedza: Dzidziso dzemachechi akawanda nhasi → Kutenda kuti "Adhamu akanga ari munhu anofa uye ane chivi uye akamutswa" - kukudzidzisa iwe, iyi idzidziso yakaipa kwazvo → Vanoda kushandisa "nyama kuti ive Tao" kana kuvimba nemutemo kurima. nyika yokunyika ye“nyama kuva Tao” Neo-Confucius nenheyo zvinokudzidzisa, naizvozvo dzidziso dzavo dzakafanana chaizvoizvo nedziya dzinoshandiswa neTaoism kuva isingafi nechiBuddha, zvakadai sokurima kwaSakyamuni kuti ave Buddha Saka, ita Unonzwisisa here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

2021.01.30

articles.title: “Muchinjikwa” Murume wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naye
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumabhuratha nemasisita angu anodikanwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 6 uye ndima 6 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vezvivi. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " cross "Aihwa. 6 Ngatinamatei: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] akatumira vashandi kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko ake uye “evhangeri yoruponeso yaakaparidza yakaunzwa kubva kure kudenga kuti igogovera kwatiri mumwaka, kuti isu upenyu hwoMweya zvakawandisa Amen! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya→ Hwisisa kuti munhu wedu wekare akabatanidzwa naKristu uye akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa kuti aparadze muviri wechivi kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda vechivi, nokuti vakafa vasunungurwa kubva kuchivi. Ameni !

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naye

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri pana VaRoma 6:5-7 toiverenga pamwe chete: Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana nerwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye pakumuka kwake kwakafanana, tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare wakavapo. akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye. Muchinjikwa unoparadza muviri wechivi, kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda vechivi;

[Cherechedza]: Kana takabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo werufu rwake

bvunza: Tingabatanidzwa sei mukufanana kwerufu rwaKristu?
mhinduro: Jesu iShoko rakava munhu → Iye "anobatika" sesu, muviri wenyama neropa! Akatakura zvivi zvedu pamuti → Mwari akaisa zvitadzo zvedu zvose pamusoro pake. Reference-Isaya Chitsauko 53 Ndima 6

Kristu akanga “nemuviri” paakaturikwa pamuti → kubatana kwedu naye ndiko → “kubhapatidzwa murufu rwake” → nokuti pataka“bhapatidzwa mumvura” takabhapatidzwa mu“miviri yenyama” → uku ndiko kuti “tiri mukati Kristu" akabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana → Hamuzivi here kuti isu takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake? Saka Ishe Jesu akati: “Nokuti joko rangu rakareruka, nomutoro wangu wakareruka rufu” → “kubhabhatidzwa mumvura” ndiko kubatanidzwa naye murufu! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Reference-Mateo 11:30 naVaRoma 6:3

bvunza: Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa sei naye?
mhinduro: shandisa" Tenda kuna She "Nzira → iyo kushandisa" chivimbo “Batana naye uye urovererwe pamuchinjikwa.

bvunza: Kristu akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa akafa muzana remakore rokutanga AD. Takanga tisina kuzvarwa panguva iyoyo sei?
mhinduro: Ishe Jesu akati: “Zvinhu zvose zvinogoneka kune anotenda” → Anoshandisa nzira yo“kutenda munaShe”, nokuti mumeso aMwari, nzira yo“kutenda munaShe” haina nguva kana kuti nzvimbo. , uye Ishe Mwari wedu anogara nokusingaperi! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Saka tinoshandisa" chivimbo “Ivai vakabatana naye, nokuti Mwari akaisa zvivi zvedu tose pamusoro pake → “muviri wechivi” umo Jesu akarovererwa → ndiwo “muviri wedu wechivi” → nokuda kwake” nokuti "Tinova →" mhosva "- kuva" muviri wechivi "Shape → Mwari akaita Uyo akanga asingazivi chivi (uyo akanga asingazivi chivi) kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari. Reference - 2 VaKorinte 5:21 naVaRoma 8 Chitsauko 3 .
→Paunotarisa "muviri waJesu" wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa →Unotenda →Uyu ndiwo "muviri wangu, muviri wangu unotadza" →Muviri wangu wekare "wakabatanidzwa" naKristu kuti uve "muviri mumwe" →Iwe shandisa Tarisa "kutenda kunooneka" uye tenda mu "asingaonekwi ini" Unoona Jesu akarembera pamuti → "tenda" kuti uyu "muviri wezvivi wemurume wangu wekare". Kana ukatenda nenzira iyi, uchabatanidzwa naKristu uye nokurovererwa zvinobudirira! Hareruya! Ndinokutendai Ishe! Vashandi vaMwari vanokutungamirira muchokwadi chose uye kunzwisisa kuda kwaMwari kubudikidza no“Mweya Mutsvene”. Ameni! →

Unhu hwedu hwekare hunobatana Naye nechinangwa:

Nokuti kana takabatanidzwa naye mumufananidzo worufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana nokumuka kwake, tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye. 1 “kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe,” 2 Kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda vechivi; 3 Nokuti "vakafa" → "vakasunungurwa pachivi". Kana tichifa naKristu. 4 Ingotenda uye uchagara naye. Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here - VaRoma 6: 5-8

Hama nehanzvadzi! Shoko raMwari rinotaurwa na“Mweya Mutsvene”, kwete neni. Somuenzaniso, “Pauro” akati ndakafa! Ndini ndinorarama asi ndisingaonekwe Kristu ndiye anogara mandiri. Ndinofanira kuiteerera kamwe kana kaviri ini pachangu, haufaniri kuiteerera kakati wandei kana usinganzwisise? Tsamba mashoko anokonzera rufu → mashoko erufu; kune vanhu vakawanda vanongotarisa "tsamba" uye vanovhara nzeve dzavo pasina kuzvininipisa → "teerera kuchokwadi" uye "kubvunza mibvunzo mitatu nemibvunzo mina". raMwari rinogona kunzwisiswa noku“teerera,” kwete noku“bvunza” “Nzwisisa, haufariri kunzwa izvo “Mudzimu Mutsvene” unotaura kuvanhu kupfurikidza neBhaibheri → Unonzwisisa sei kuda kwaMwari? Rudyi!

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: Muchinjikwa waKristu 5: Unotisunungura kubva pasimba rerima raSatani muHadhesi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaKorose chitsauko 1 ndima 13-14 tiverenge pamwe chete: Akatinunura pasimba rerima uye akatiendesa kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda, watine dzikinuro maari uye nokuregererwa kwezvivi. .

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " muchinjikwa waKristu "Aihwa. 5 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, mazvita Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura nemaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipei zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga munguva, kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya→ Kunzwisisa Kristu nekurovererwa kwake kunotisunungura kubva musimba rerima raSatani reHadhesi . Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Muchinjikwa waKristu unotisunungura kubva musimba rerima reHadhesi yaSatani

( 1 ) Nyika yose iri mumaoko ewakaipa

Tinoziva kuti tiri vaMwari uye kuti nyika yose iri musimba rowakaipa. 1 Johani 5:19
Mubvunzo: Sei nyika yese iri mumaoko ehuipi?
Mhinduro: Avo vanotadza ndevadhiabhorosi, nokuti dhiabhorosi akatadza kubva pakutanga. Mwanakomana waMwari akaonekwa kuti aparadze mabasa adhiabhorosi. 1 Johane 3:8 → Nokuti vose vakatadza vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari;
→Avo vanopara mhosva ndevadhiyabhorosi, uye munhu wese ari munyika ndewadhiyabhorosi, uye ari pasi pewakaipa, dhiyabhorosi.

( 2 ) Rumborera rwerufu chivi

Die! Simba rako rekukunda riripi? Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi? Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo. 1 VaKorinde 15:55-56 → Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu zvarwakapinda nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakapararira kune vose, nokuti vose vakatadza. Mutemo usati wavapo, chivi chakanga chava munyika, asi kana pasina murayiro chivi. Asi kubva kuna Adhamu kusvikira kuna Mosesi, rufu rwakabata ushe, kunyange vaya vasina kuita chivi chakafanana nechaAdhamu. Adamu aive mufananidzo wemunhu aizouya. VaRoma 5:12-14

3 ) Rufu neHadhesi

Mapisarema 18:5 Mabote eHadhesi akandikomba, uye misungo yorufu iri pamusoro pangu.
Mapisarema 116:3 Mabote orufu akandimonera;
Mapisarema 89:48 Ndiani angararama nokusingaperi akanzvenga rufu, uye achaponesa mweya wake pamasuo eHadhesi? (Sera)
Zvakazarurwa 20:13-14 Naizvozvo gungwa rakabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri, uye rufu neHadhesi zvakabudisa vakafa vakanga vari mazviri; Rufu neHadhesi zvakakandwawo mudziva remoto;

( 4 ) Kuburikidza nerufu, Kristu anoparadza dhiabhorosi ane simba rerufu

Akati, "Ndichavimba naye." Akati, "Tarirai, ini navana Mwari vaakandipa vanogovana." rufu kuti aparadze iye une simba rorufu, iye dhiabhorosi, uye kuti asunungure avo vakanga vari muuranda kwoupenyu hwavo hwose nokutya rufu. VaHebheru 2:13-15 → Pandakamuona, ndakawira patsoka dzake sokunge ndafa. akaisa ruoko rwake rworudyi pamusoro pangu akati: Usatya, ndini wokutanga nowokupedzisira, ndinorarama; ndakanga ndafa, zvino tarira, ndiri mupenyu nokusingaperi-peri, uye ndakabata rufu mumaoko angu. . uye kiyi dzeHadhesi Zvakazarurwa 1:17-18 .

( 5 ) Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, akatimutsa kubva kuvakafa akatiendesa kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda.

Akatinunura kubva pasimba rerima uye akatiendesa kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda, watine dzikinuro maari uye nokuregererwa kwezvivi. VaKorose 1:13-14
Somuapostora “Pauro” akatumwa naMwari → ndinokutumirai kwavari, kuti meso avo asvinudzwe, vatendeuke kubva murima vaende kuchiedza, uye vabve pasimba raSatani vauye kuna Mwari; vangagamuchira kuregererwa kwezvivi, uye vose vakaitwa vatsvene vanogovana nhaka. ’” Mabasa 26:18

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari Baba, uye nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni!

Shamwari inodiwa! Maita basa neMweya waJesu → Unodzvanya pachinyorwa chino kuti uverenge uye uteerere kumharidzo yevhangeri Kana uchida kugamuchira uye “kutenda” muna Jesu Kristu seMuponesi nerudo Rwake rukuru, tinganamata pamwechete here?

Mudikani Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinokutendai Baba voKudenga nokutumira Mwanakomana wenyu akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti afire pamuchinjikwa “nokuda kwezvivi zvedu” → 1 tisunungurei kubva kuchivi. 2 Tisunungurei pamurairo nokutukwa kwawo; 3 Kusunungurwa pasimba raSatani nerima reHadhesi. Ameni! Uye akavigwa → 4 Kubvisa mutana nezviito zvake akamutswa nezuva retatu 5 Tiruramise! Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso, kuzvarwa patsva, kumutswa, kuponeswa, kugamuchira humwanakomana hwaMwari, uye kugamuchira hupenyu husingaperi! Mune ramangwana, tichagara nhaka yenhaka yaBaba vedu Vekudenga. Namata nemuzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Muchinjikwa waKristu 4: Kubvisa murume wekare waAdamu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 9 tiverenge pamwe chete: Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare namabasa ake.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana pamwechete "Muchinjikwa waKristu" Aihwa. 4 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, mazvita Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka "Tumirai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipeiwo zvokudya zvemweya zvekudenga nenguva yakafanira kuti hupenyu hwedu huwande. Amen! Ndapota! Ishe Jesu vanoramba vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya, anovhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, uye kutigonesa kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya. Kunzwisisa Kristu nerufu rwake pamuchinjikwa nekuvigwa kwake kunotisunungura kubva kumunhu wekare uye nenzira dzake dzekare ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

1: Muchinjikwa waKristu → unoita kuti tibvise munhu wekare nemaitiro ake

( 1 ) Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe

Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vechivi; VaRoma 6 ndima 6-7. Cherechedza: Munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamwe chete Naye → "chinangwa" ndechokuparadza muviri wechivi kuitira kuti tisazovezve varanda vechivi, nokuti vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi → "ndokuvigwa" → kubvisa munhu wekare waAdhamu. . Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Nyama yakaroverwa pamuchinjikwa nezvishuwo zvayo zvakaipa nezvishuwo

Mabasa enyama ari pachena: upombwe, netsvina, novutere, nokunamata zvifananidzo, nouroyi, noruvengo, nokukakavara, negodo, nokutsamwa, nokupesana, nedzidziso dzakatsauka, negodo. Ndakagara ndakuudzai, uye ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari. …Avo vari vaKristu Jesu vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa nyama nokuchiva kwayo nokuchiva kwayo. VaGaratia 5:19-21, 24

(3) Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mumoyo yenyu , hausi wemudhara wenyama

Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. Kana Kristu ari mamuri, muviri wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya mupenyu nokuda kwokururama. VaRoma 8:9-10

(4) Nokuti “mudhara” wako akafa , Hupenyu hwako “hwemunhu mutsva” hwakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. VaKorose 3:3-4
Musareverana nhema, nokuti makabvisa munhu wekare namabasa ake. VaKorose 3:9

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugovera kuyanana kwangu nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: Muchinjikwa waKristu 3: Unotisunungura kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwawo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri [VaRoma 7:5-6] tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, kuchiva kwakaberekwa nomurayiro kwaibata mumitezo yedu, uye kwakabereka chibereko chorufu. Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro wakanga unotisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe nomweya mutsva (mweya: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare tsika.

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana pamwechete "Muchinjikwa waKristu" Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, mazvita Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi ravanonyora nokutaura nemaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipei zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga munguva, kuti upenyu hwedu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye kutivhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya uye nekunzwisisa Kristu uye kufa kwake pamuchinjikwa waKristu Wakafa, zvino Kusunungurwa kubva pamurairo uye nekutuka kwemurairo kunotibvumira kuwana chimiro chevanakomana vaMwari nehupenyu husingaperi! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mutemo weTestamente Yokutanga weBhaibheri

( 1 ) Mubindu reEdheni, Mwari akaita sungano naAdhama kuti asadya muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa.

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Genesisi 2:15-17] toriverenga pamwe chete: Jehovha Mwari akatora munhu akamuisa mumunda weEdheni kuti aurime nokuuchengeta. Jehovha Mwari akamurayira kuti: “Ungadya hako miti yose yomumunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo! : Nyoka yakaedza Evha ndokutadza nokudya muchero wemuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa akatadza. Mutemo usati wavapo, chivi chakanga chiri munyika; asi pasina mutemo, chivi chakanga chisingaverengwi sechivi , pasi pesimba rechivi, napasi pesimba rorufu.” Adhama mufananidzo wouyo aizouya, Jesu Kristu.

( 2 ) Mutemo waMosesi

Ngatitarisei Bhaibheri [ Dheuteronomio 5:1-3 ] toirava pamwe chete: Ipapo Mosesi akaunganidza vaIsraeri vose, akati kwavari, “Imi vaIsraeri, inzwai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa zvandiri kukupai nhasi; Jehovha Mwari wedu akaita sungano nesu paHorebhi, asi sungano iyi haina kuitwa namadzibaba edu, asi nesu vapenyu nhasi.

( Cherechedza: Sungano pakati paJehovha Mwari nevaIsraeri inosanganisira: Mirayiro Gumi yakanyorwa pamahwendefa ematombo, mirau, uye mirau, inokwana zvinhu 613 Isungano inonyatsoratidza mutemo. Kana ukachengeta nokuchengeta mirairo yose yomurayiro, ucharopafadzwa, kana uchibuda, ucharopafadzwa kana uchipinda. -Ona Dheuteronomio 28, ndima 1-6 uye 15-68)
Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [VaGaratiya 3:10-11] toriverenga pamwe chete: Munhu wose ari pamabasa omutemo akatukwa; Ngaatukwe munhu anoita zvinhu zvose zvakanyorwa mariri.” Zviri pachena kuti hapana munhu anoruramiswa nomurayiro pamberi paMwari, nokuti Rugwaro runoti, “Akarurama achararama nokutenda.”
Dzokerai ku[VaRoma 5-6] muverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, kuchiva kwenyama, kwakaberekwa nomurayiro, kwaibata mumitezo yedu, kuchibereka chibereko chorufu. Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro wakanga unotisunga, zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tishumire Ishe nomweya mutsva (mweya: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete nenzira yekare tsika.

( Cherechedza: Kupfurikidza nokunzvera magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinogona kuona kuti kupfurikidza nomuapostora [Pauro] uyo akanga ane unyanzvi zvikurusa mumutemo wechiJudha, Mwari akazivisa “mudzimu” wokururama kwomutemo, mirau, mirau norudo rukuru: Munhu upi noupi anotsamira pamuitiro wokururama. Nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “Ngaatukwe munhu asingarambiri maererano nezvose zvakanyorwa muBhuku roMurayiro. Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, kuchiva kwakaberekwa nomurayiro, “kuchiva” kuchiva kana kwaumbwa, kunobereka chivi; kusvika kuna Jakobho 1 chitsauko 15 Mutambo.

Unogona kuona zvakajeka kuti [chivi] chinoberekwa sei: “Chivi” chinokonzerwa nokuchiva kwenyama, uye kuchiva kwenyama “kuchiva kunoberekwa nomurayiro” kunotangira mumitezo, uye kuchiva kunotangira mumitezo. kana kuchiva kana kwakurirwa kunozvara chivi; Pamaonero aya, [chivi] chiripo nokuda kwo[mutemo]. Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

1 Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika - Ona VaRoma 4:15
2 Pasina mutemo, chivi hachinzi chitadzo - Ona vaRoma 5:13
3 Kana pasina murayiro chivi chakafa. Nokuti kana vanhu vakasikwa neguruva vakachengeta murairo, vanobereka chitadzo nokuda kwomurairo, ndipo pauchabereka zvivi zvizhinji mutemo. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

( 1 ) Sezvakangoita “Adhamu” mubindu reEdheni nokuda kwomurayiro wokuti “usadya muchero womuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa”, Adhamu akaedzwa nenyoka muEdheni, uye Evha akaedzwa nenyama yake. zvakaipa zvakazvarwa nomurairo" Anoshuva kushanda mumitezo yavo, anoda chibereko chakanakira kudya, meso anopenya uye anofadza meso, zivo yezvakanaka nezvakaipa, zvinhu zvinofadza pameso; zvinopa vanhu njere. Nenzira iyi, vakatyora mutemo uye vakatadza uye vakatukwa nemutemo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

( 2 ) Mutemo waMosesi isungano pakati paJehovha Mwari nevaIsraeri paGomo reHorebhi, inosanganisira mirayiro, mirau, nemirau 613 yose vaIsraeri havana kuchengeta mutemo, uye vose vakatyora mutemo vakatadza, uye vakatadza pasi pezvakanga zvakanyorwa muMutemo waMosesi, Kutuka nemhiko, uye ngwavaira dzose dzakadururirwa pavaIsraeri—ona Dhanieri 9:9-13 naVaHebheru 10:28 .

( 3 ) kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu uyo akafa kuti atisungire kumurayiro, zvino tasunungurwa kubva pamurayiro nokutukwa kwawo. Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaRoma 7:1-7 Hama, zvino ndinoti kuna avo vanonzwisisa murayiro, hamuzivi here kuti murayiro “unotonga” munhu achiri mupenyu? Nokuti “simba rechivi ndiwo mutemo. Paunenge uchirarama mumuviri waAdhamu, uri mutadzi. Pasi pomurayiro, mutemo unokutungamirira nokukudzivisa. Unonzwisisa here?

Muapostora “Pauro” anoshandisa [ Ukama huri pakati pechivi nemutemo ]mufananidzo[ hukama hwemukadzi nemurume ] Semukadzi une murume, wakasungwa nomurairo murume wake achiri mupenyu; asi kana murume afa, wasunungurwa pamurairo womurume. Naizvozvo, kana murume wake ari mupenyu, uye akawanikwa nomumwe, anonzi chifeve, kana murume wake afa, asunungurwa kubva pamurayiro wake, uye kunyange akava womumwe murume, haazi chifeve. Cherechedza: “Madzimai”, kureva kuti isu vatadzi, takasungwa ne“murume” kureva mutemo wokuroorana, murume wedu achiri mupenyu kana usina kusununguka pamutemo wewanano womurume wako, kana waroora mumwe munhu , iwe unonzi mhombwe, munhu wedu wekare ndiye " Mukadzi "nomuviri waKristu wakafira pamuchinjikwa kumurairo “Akafa” kumutemo, uye akamutswa kubva kuvakafa kuti tidzokere kune vamwe [Jesu] uye tibereke zvibereko zvomudzimu kuna Mwari kana usina “kufa” kumutemo, kureva kuti, hauna kuputsa kubva ku "murume" wemurairo, unofanira kuroora uye kudzokera kuna [Jesu], unoita upombwe uye unonzi chifeve [chihure chemweya]. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Saka “Pauro” akati: “Nemhaka yomurayiro ndakafa kumurayiro, kuti ndiraramire Mwari - tarisa VaG. 2:19. Asi sezvo takafa kumurairo wakanga wakatisunga, zvino tasunungurwa pamurairo wo“murume wesungano yokutanga”, kuti tigogona kubatira Jehovha mukuwirirana nohutsva hwomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa soMudzimu Mutsvene). “ndiko kuti, akaberekwa naMwari.” Munhu mutsva anobatira Jehovha “kwete nenzira yakare” zvinoreva kwete mukuwirirana nenzira yekare yavatadzi venyama vaAdhama.

Ndinokutendai Ishe! Nhasi maziso ako akakomborerwa uye nzeve dzako dzakakomborerwa Mwari akatumira vashandi kuti vakutungamirire kuti unzwisise chokwadi cheBhaibheri uye musimboti wemutemo werusununguko kubva ku“varume”, sezvakataurwa na“Pauro” → NeShoko muna Kristu neVhangeri " born “Kuti ndikupei kumurume mumwe, kuti akuisei kuna Kristu semhandara dzakachena.

horaiti! Nhasi ndichataura uye ndichagoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye kufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Muchinjikwa waKristu 2: Unotisunungura kubva kuchivi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hama dzinodikanwa, rugare kuhama dzose! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri [VaRoma 6:6-11] tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vechivi;

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana pamwechete "Muchinjikwa waKristu" Aihwa. 2 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, mazvita Ishe! Makatuma vashandi, uye kubudikidza nemaoko avo vakanyora uye vakataura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipei zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga munguva, kuti upenyu hwedu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa rudo rukuru rweMuponesi wedu Jesu Kristu, uyo akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu, achitisunungura kubva muzvitadzo zvedu. . Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu. Ameni

Muchinjikwa waKristu unotisunungura kubva kuchivi

( 1 ) vhangeri raJesu kristu

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [Mako 1:1] tovhura pamwe chete uye tiverenge: Kutanga kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari. Mateo 1:21 Iye achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti Jesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Johane Chitsauko 3 Ndima 16-17 “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. Nokuti Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake munyika, kwete kuti ape nyika mhosva (kana kushandurwa se: kutonga nyika; iyo iri pasi), asi kuti nyika iponeswe naye.

Cherechedza: Mwanakomana waMwari, Jesu Kristu, ndiye kutanga kwevhangeri → Jesu Kristu ndiye kutanga kwevhangeri! Zita [raJesu] rinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. Ndiye Muponesi, Mesiya, uye Kristu! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Semuenzaniso, zita rekuti "UK" rinoreva United Kingdom yeGreat Britain neNorthern Ireland, iyo ine England, Wales, Scotland neNorthern Ireland, iyo inonzi "UK" zita rekuti "USA" rinoreva United States of America; zita rekuti "Russia" rinoreva mubatanidzwa weRussia. Zita rokuti "Jesu" rinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake kubva kuzvivi zvavo → izvi ndizvo zvinoreva zita rokuti "Jesu". Unonzwisisa here?

Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga [Jesu], akanambwa noMweya Mutsvene nemhandara Mariya, akava munhu wenyama, uye akaberekwa pasi pomutemo kuti adzikinure vaya vaiva pasi pomutemo, ndiko kuti, kuti aponese vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. .Budai kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vana vaMwari! Ameni, saka zita [Jesu] ndiye Muponesi, Mesiasi, uye Kristu, kuti aponese vanhu Vake kubva muzvivi zvavo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

( 2 ) Muchinjikwa waKristu unotisunungura kubva kuchivi

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri pana VaRoma 6:7 toiverenga pamwe chete: Nokuti vakafa vakasunungurwa pachivi → “Kristu” akafira “mumwe” vose, saka vose vakafa → Uye kubudikidza norufu rwavo vose, vose "vakasunungurwa" vane mhosva". Ameni! Verenga 2 VaKorinde 5:14 → Jesu akarovererwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu, achitisunungura pazvivi zvedu . Nokuti hamutendi muMwanakomana waMwari akaberekwa ari mumwe oga” zita raJesu "→ Zviponesei pazvivi zvenyu , "Hauzvitendi"→iwe" mhosva “Zvitore mutoro wako, uye uchatongwa nokutongwa kwezuva rokupedzisira. Usazvitenda "Kristu" kare "Kununura kubva kuchivi chako → kukupa mhosva" chivi chokusatenda "→ Asi vanotya nevasingatendi... Munonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here? Tarisai kuna Zvakazarurwa Chitsauko 21 Ndima 8 naJohani Chitsauko 3 Ndima 17-18

→Nekuda kwe" Adhamu “Kusateerera kwomumwe kunomutsa vatadzi vazhinji; Kristu “Kuteerera kwomumwe kunoita kuti vose vakarurama. Sezvo chivi chakatonga parufu, saizvozvowo nyasha dzinobata ushe kubudikidza nokururama kuupenyu husingaperi kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu. Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

Tendeuka zvakare kuna [1 Pita 2-24] Akatakura zvivi zvedu pachake pamuti, kuti isu tife kuzvivi uye tiraramire kururama. namavanga ake makaporeswa. Cherechedza: Kristu akatakura zvivi zvedu uye akaita kuti tife kuzvivi → uye "kusunungurwa kubva kuzvivi" → Avo vakafa vakasunungurwa kubva kuzvivi, uye avo vakasunungurwa kubva kuzvivi → vanogona kurarama mukururama! Kana tisina kusununguka kubva kuchivi, hatingagari mukururama. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndichataura nekugoverana nemi mose muri pano. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: Muchinjikwa waKristu 1: Kuparidza Jesu Kristu uye Iye Akarovererwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hama dzinodikanwa, rugare kuhama dzose! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri [1 VaKorinte 1:17] tiverenge pamwe chete: Kristu haana kundituma kuti ndinobhabhatidza asi kuti ndiparidze evhangeri, kwete namashoko ouchenjeri, kuti zvimwe muchinjikwa waKristu ugova pasina. . 1 VaKorinte 2:2 Nokuti ndakasarudza kusaziva chinhu pakati penyu kunze kwaJesu Kristu, naiye akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa .

Nhasi tiri kudzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana pamwechete "Kuparidza Jesu Kristu uye Iye Akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, mazvita Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi vanonyora nemaoko avo uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipei zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga munguva, kuti upenyu hwedu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → Kuparidzira Kristu neruponeso rwake rwakarovererwa kuratidza nzira yeruponeso, chokwadi, uye upenyu kuburikidza nerudo rukuru rwaKristu uye nesimba rekumuka kana Kristu asimudzwa kubva panyika, achakwezva vanhu vose kuti vauye kwamuri. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro apa, mikumbiro, kureverera, zvikomborero, uye kutenda yakaitwa muzita dzvene raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

( 1 ) Nyoka yendarira yakaturikwa pahuni muTestamente Yekare inomiririra ruponeso rwemuchinjikwa waKristu.

Ngatitarisei Bhaibheri [Chitsauko 21:4-9] toriverenga pamwe chete: Ivo (ndiko kuti, vaIsraeri) vakasimuka paGomo reHori vakaenda vakananga kuGungwa Dzvuku kuti vapoterere nyika yeEdhomu. Vanhu vakanetseka kwazvo nokuda kwokuoma kwenzira, vakanyunyuta kuna Mwari naMosesi, vachiti, “Makatibudisireiko muIjipiti (nyika youranda) muchitiuraya (ndiko kuti, kufa nenzara) muIjipiti. (Nemhaka yokuti renje zhinji reSinai Peninsula irenje), hamuna zvokudya kana mvura pano, uye mwoyo yedu inovenga zvokudya izvi zvisina simba (panguva iyoyo, Jehovha Mwari akadonhedza “mana” kubva kudenga akazvipa kuna Jehovha. vaIsraeri sezvokudya, asi vakaramba vachivenga zvokudya zvishoma izvi)” Jehovha akatuma nyoka dzinopenga pakati pavanhu, dzikavaruma. Vanhu vazhinji vakafa pakati pavaIsraeri. (Saka Mwari haana kuzovadzivirira, nyoka dzinopenga dzakapinda pakati pavanhu, dzikavaruma, vakaiswa muchetura. Vanhu vazhinji pakati pavaIsraeri vakafa.) Ipapo vanhu vakauya kuna Mozisi vakati, “Tavauraya. ndakatadzira Jehovha nemi, kumbirai henyu Jehovha kuti abvise nyoka idzi kwatiri. Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, "Gadzira nyoka ine uturu, ugoiturika pamuti. Ani naani anorumwa achatarira nyoka, achararama." Achararama.

( Cherechedza: "Fire nyoka" zvinoreva nyoka ine uturu;" nyoka yendarira" zvinoreva nyoka isina uturu inoita senyoka asi isiri nyoka “Bronze” inomirira chiedza uye kusatadza – tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa 2:18 naVaRoma 8:3. Mwari akaita chimiro che“nyoka yendarira” zvinoreva kuti “isina uturu” uye zvinoreva kuti “isina uturu” kutsiva “chepfu yekudyara inoreva chivi” icho vaIsraeri vaiturikwa padanda kuti chive chinonyadzisa, chituko uye rufu rwomuchetura wenyoka. ." Uyu ndiwo mufananidzo waKristu anova chivi chedu. "Chimiro" chemuviri waishandiswa sechipiriso chezvivi. VaIsirayera pavakatarisa mudenga "nyoka yendarira" yakaturikwa padanda, "huturu hwenyoka" mumiviri yavo. akatamisirwa ku“nyoka yendarira” ndokuvaparadza ani naani akarumwa nenyoka aizorarama apo aitarira kunyoka yendarira Hongu vakagamuchira kuporesa noruponeso rwaMwari.

( 2 ) Paridza Jesu Kristu uye Iye akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa

Johane 3 Vhesi 14 Nokuti Mozisi sezvaakasimudza nyoka murenje, saizvozvo Mwanakomana womunhu uchasimudzwawo Johane 12 Vhesi 32 Kana ndichisimudzwa panyika, ndichakwevera vanhu vose kwandiri. " Mashoko aJesu aireva kufa kwaaizoita. Johani 8:28 Saka Jesu akati: “Pamuchasimudza Mwanakomana womunhu, muchaziva kuti ndini Kristu.

Isaya 45:21-22 BDMCS - Taurai uye mupe pfungwa dzenyu, uye ngadzitaurirane. Ndiani akazviratidza kubva panguva yekare-kare? Ndiani akazvitaura kubva kare? Handizini Jehovha here? Hakuna mumwe Mwari kunze kwangu; Tarirai kwandiri, imwi migumo yose yenyika, mugoponeswa; nekuti ndini Mwari, hakuna mumwe.

Cherechedza: Ishe Jesu akati: “Sezvo Mosesi akasimudza nyoka murenje, saizvozvo Mwanakomana woMunhu akasimudzwawo “akarovererwa.” Kana wasimudza Mwanakomana womunhu, uchaziva kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu uye Muponesi, uyo anotiponesa kubva kuchivi Mwari akasununguka kubva pakutuka kwemurairo uye asina rufu → Mwari akati kuburikidza nemuporofita: "Vanhu vari kumigumo yenyika vachaponeswa kana vakatarira kuna "Kristu" ." Ameni! Izvi zvakajeka here?

( 3 ) Mwari akaita uyo akanga asina chivi kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri [ 2 VaKorinte 5:21 ] Mwari akaita uyo akanga asingazivi chivi (asina chivi: chinyorwa chepakutanga chinoreva kusaziva chivi) kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari. 1 Petro 2:22-25 Haana kuita chivi, uye kunyengera hakuna kuwanikwa mumuromo make. Paakatukwa, haana kutsiva paakaitirwa zvakaipa, haana kumutyisidzira, asi akazviisa kuna iye anotonga zvakarurama. Akarembera pamuti uye akatakura zvivi zvedu pachedu kuti, takafa kuchivi, tiraramire kururama. namavanga ake makaporeswa. Makanga makaita samakwai akarasika, asi zvino madzokera kuMufudzi noMutariri wemweya yenyu. 1 Johani 3:5 Munoziva kuti Ishe akazviratidza kuti abvise zvivi kuvanhu, vasina chivi. 1 Johane 2:2 Ndiye mudzikinuri wezvivi zvedu, uye kwete wezvivi zvedu bedzi, asiwo wezvivi zvenyika yose.

( Cherechedza: Mwari akaita kuti Jesu akanga asina chivi ave chivi nokuda kwedu, iye pachake akatakura zvitadzo zvedu uye akaturikwa pamuti, ndiko kuti, “muchinjikwa” sechipiriso chezvivi, kuti sezvo takafa kuzvivi, tigoraramira kururama! Ndiye mudzikinuri wezvivi zvedu, kwete zvedu chete, asi wezvivi zvenyika yose. Kristu akapa muviri wake kamwe chete sechipiriso chechivi, nokudaro achiita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nokusingaperi. Ameni! Takanga takafanana namakwai akarasika, asi zvino tadzokera kuMufudzi noMutariri wemweya yenyu. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Naizvozvo Pauro akati: “Kristu haana kundituma kuti ndinobhabhatidza asi kuti ndiparidze evhangeri, kwete namashoko ouchenjeri, kuti muchinjikwa waKristu urege kuva usina maturo, nokuti shoko romuchinjikwa upenzi kunavanorashika; isu tiri kuponeswa, asi nokuda kwesimba raMwari, sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Ndichaparadza uchenjeri hwavakachenjera, uye ndichaparadza kunzwisisa kwavakachenjera. "VaJudha vanoda zvishamiso, uye vaGiriki vanotsvaka uchenjeri, asi isu tinoparidza Kristu akarovererwa, chinova chigumbuso kuvaJudha uye upenzi kuvaHedheni. Mwari anoshandura dzidziso ye "muchinjikwa" youpenzi kuita chikomborero, kuti tiponeswe. . kuti tiratidze rudo rukuru, nesimba, nouchenjeri hwaMwari, akatiita uchenjeri hwake, nokururama, nohutsvene hwake, norudzikinuro rwake, nokuti ini Pauro, ndakati ndisaziva chimwe chinhu kunze kwenyu.

Ndichiziva Jesu Kristu, naiye wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, mashoko andakataura, nemharidzo dzandakaparidza, dzakanga dzisiri mashoko enjere dzisina kururama, asi nokuratidza kwoMweya Mutsvene nokwesimba, kuti kutenda kwenyu kurege kuva panjere dzavanhu, asi panjere dzavanhu. simba raMwari. articles.title: Muchinjikwa｜Mavambo emuchinjikwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni. Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera kwakabva muchinjikwa

muchinjikwa wekare weRoma

kurovererwa , zvinonzi zvakakonzerwa ne vaFenikiya Invention, Humambo hweFenikiya ndiro zita rakajairika remadhorobha madiki-matunhu munzvimbo yekuchamhembe kwemahombekombe ekumabvazuva kweMediterranean yekare. Muchinjikwa wemudziyo wekutambudzira kazhinji waisanganisira masiteki maviri kana matatu emapuranga---kana kunyange mana kana ari muchinjikwa wemativi mana, ane zvimiro zvakasiyana. Zvimwe zvakaita T, zvimwe zvakaita X, uye zvimwe zvakaita Y. Chimwe chezvinhu zvikuru zvakagadzirwa nevaFenikiya kwaiva kuurayiwa kwevanhu nekurovererwa. Gare gare, Iyi nzira yakapfuudzwa kubva kuvaFenikiya kuenda kuvaGiriki, vaAsiriya, vaEgipita, vaPersia navaRoma. Kunyanya kufarirwa muHumambo hwePezhiya, Humambo hweDhamasiko, Judha Umambo, Umambo hwaIsraeri, Carthage, uye Roma yekare, dzaiwanzoshandiswa kuuraya vapanduki, vapanduki, varanda, uye vanhu vasina vagari venyika. .

Ichi chirango choutsinye chakabva padanda remuti. Pakutanga, musungwa wacho aisungirirwa padanda obva adzipwa kusvikira afa, izvo zvakanga zviri zvose zviri zviviri uye utsinye. Gare gare mafuremu emapuranga akaunzwa, aisanganisira michinjikwa, mafuremu akaita T uye mafuremu akaita X. Furemu yakaita X inodaidzwa zvakare kuti "Musande Andrew's frame" nekuti mutsvene akafa pafuremu yakaita X.

Kunyange zvazvo mashoko okuurayiwa achisiyana zvishoma munzvimbo nenzvimbo, mamiriro acho ezvinhu akafanana: musungwa anotanga kurohwa netyava ozomanikidzwa kutakura puranga remuti kuenda kwaanourayiwa. Dzimwe nguva furemu yemapuranga inorema zvekuti zvinonetsa kuti munhu mumwe chete aifambise. Asati aurayiwa, musungwa wacho akakururwa mbatya dzake, achingosara nechiuno chete. Pazasi pezvanza netsoka dzemusungwa pane chimuti chakaita seweji kuitira kuti muviri usatsvedzerere nekuda kwesimba rinokwevera zvinhu pasi. Zvadaro isa muchinjikwa muvhu rakagadzirirwa rakagadziriswa pasi. Kuti rufu rukurumidze, dzimwe nguva mitezo yomusungwa yaityoka. Kana kushivirira kwemusungwa kwakasimba, ndiko kurebesa kutambudzwa. Zuva raipisa zvisina tsitsi rakapisa ganda ravo rakanga risina chinhu, nhunzi dzakavaruma ndokusveta dikita ravo, uye guruva raiva mudenga rakavapedza simba.

Kurovererwa kwaiwanzoitwa mumapoka, saka michinjikwa yakawanda yaiwanzomiswa panzvimbo imwe chete. Pashure pokunge mutadzi aurawa, akapfuurira kurembera pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwokuratidzirwa kwavose, yakanga iri tsika yokuviga muchinjikwa pamwe chete nomutadzi. Kurovererwa kwakazovandudzwa, sekugadzirisa musoro wemusungwa papuranga, izvo zvaigona kuita kuti musungwa arasikirwe nokukasika uye kuderedza marwadzo omusungwa.

Zvakaoma kuti vanhu vemazuva ano vafungidzire marwadzo ekurovererwa, nokuti pamusoro pepamusoro, kungosunga munhu padanda hakuratidzi sechirango chakanyanya utsinye. Musungwa wepamuchinjikwa haana kufa nenzara kana nyota, kana kufa nekubuda ropa—zvipikiri zvakaroverwa pamuchinjikwa, musungwa akazofa nekudzipwa. Murume akanga arovererwa aingogona kufema nokutambanudza maoko ake. Zvisinei, muchimiro chakadaro, pamwe chete nekurwadziwa kwakanyanya kunokonzerwa nekurovera zvipikiri mukati, mhasuru dzose dzichakurumidza kubudisa simba rechisimba rekudzoka shure, saka mhepo yakazadzwa muchipfuva haigoni kubudiswa. Kuti rikurumidze kufema, zviremera zvinowanzoturikwa patsoka dzevanhu vakasimba zvikuru, zvokuti havachakwanisi kutambanudza maoko avo kuti vafeme. Kubvumirana pakati pevesainzi ndekwekuti kurovererwa kwaive nzira ine hutsinye husina kujairika nekuti yaitambudza munhu zvishoma nezvishoma kusvika afa mukati memazuva akati wandei.

Kurovererwa kwekutanga muRoma kunofanira kunge kuri panguva yekutonga kwaTargan pakupera kweMadzimambo manomwe. Roma pakupedzisira yakadzvinyirira kumukira kwevaranda kutatu. Uye kukunda kwose kwakaperekedzwa nokuponda kukuru, uye zviuru zvavanhu zvakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa. Vaviri vokutanga vaiva muSicily, imwe muzana remakore rokutanga BC uye imwe muzana remakore rokutanga BC. Wechitatu uye ane mukurumbira, muna 73 BC, akatungamirirwa naSpartacus uye vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu vakarovererwa. Michinjikwa yakamiswa kubva kuCabo kuenda kuRoma. articles.title: Siyanisa pakati pekuzvarwa patsva kwechokwadi nekwenhema
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure maBhaibheri edu kuna VaEfeso chitsauko 1 ndima 13 tiverenge pamwe chete: Pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu, uye mukatenda muna Kristu, maAri makaiswa chisimbiso noMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Nzira yekutaura sei mutsauko: kuberekwazve kwechokwadi uye kwenhema 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! [Mukadzi akanaka] akatuma vashandi namaoko avo, zvose zvakanyorwa uye zvakaparidzwa, neshoko rechokwadi, iro Evhangeri yoruponeso rwenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Dzidzisa vana vaMwari nzira yekusiyanisa kuzvarwa patsva kwechokwadi kubva pakuzvarwa patsva kwenhema kana vaine Mweya Mutsvene sechisimbiso chavo. ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

【1】Vakristu vakazvarwa patsva vanogara muna Kristu

---Rarama naMweya Mutsvene, famba noMweya Mutsvene---

- --Kusatya hunhu ---

VaGaratia 5:25 Kana tichirarama noMweya, ngatifambewo noMweya.

bvunza: Chii chiri kurarama ne“Mweya Mutsvene”?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya ~ tarisa kuna Johane 3 ndima 5-7;
2 Akazvarwa kubva muchokwadi chevhangeri ~ tarisa kuna 1 Vakorinde 4:15 naJakobho 1:18;
3 Akazvarwa naMwari ~ nongedzera kuna Johane 1:12-13

bvunza: “Ko” vaKristu vanorarama sei noMweya Mutsvene? Uye “sei” kufamba noMweya Mutsvene?
mhinduro: Tendai muna Iye akatumwa naMwari, iri ibasa raMwari → Vakamubvunza kuti, “Tinofanira kuitei kuti tinzi tiri kuita basa raMwari?” Mwari.”—Johani 6:28-29

【piri】 Tenda mubasa guru iro Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti aite nokuda kwedu

"Pauro" Ndinopa kwamuri izvo zvandakagamuchirawo: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamukazve pazuva retatu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro! 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4

(1) vakasununguka kubva kuchivi ~Tarisa kuna VaRoma 6:6-7 naVaRoma 8:1-2
(2) Wakasununguka kubva pamurairo nekutukwa kwawo ~Ona VaRoma 7:4-6 uye VaG 3:12
(3) Bvisa murume mukuru nemaitiro ake ekare~ Ona VaK. 3:9 naVaG. 5:24
(4) Kupunyuka kubva pasimba rerima repasi raSatani ~ Tarisa kuna VaKorose 1:13 akatinunura pasimba rerima akatiisa muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake waanoda uye naMabasa 28:18
(5) Kunze kwenyika ~ (Verenga Johani 17:14-16).
(6) kuzvidzora ~Ona VaRoma 6:6 uye 7:24-25
(7) Tiruramise ~Verenga VaRoma 4:25

【tatu】 Tenda muna Jesu uye unamatire Mweya Mutsvene wakatumwa naBaba kuti uite basa guru rekuvandudzwa

Tito 3:5 Akatiponesa, kwete namabasa okururama atakaita isu, asi nokuda kwetsitsi dzake, nokushambidzwa kwokuberekwa kutsva nokuvandudzwa noMweya Mutsvene.

VaKorose 3:10 Pfekai munhu mutsva. Munhu mutsva anovandudzwa muzivo mumufananidzo woMusiki wake.

(1) Nokuti murayiro woMweya woupenyu , wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi norufu muna Kristu Jesu ~ Tarisa kuna VaRoma 8:1-2
(2) Tora kugamuchirwa semwanakomana waMwari uye upfeke Kristu ~Ona VaG. 4:4-7, VaRoma 8:16, uye VaG
(3) Kururamiswa, kururamiswa, kucheneswa, kucheneswa. “Kururamiswa” kunoreva vaRoma 5:18-19... Nokuda kwe“chiito chimwe chokururama” chaKristu, vanhu vose vakaruramiswa uye vakava noupenyu “nokururamiswa” nokuda kwokusateerera kwomunhu mumwe, vanhu vose vakava vatadzi saizvozvo Kusateerera kwomunhu mumwe chete, vanhu vose vakaitwa vatadzi nokuteerera kwomunhu mumwe, “utsvene” hunoitwa vatsvene noMweya Mutsvene uye hunogamuchirika. Nokuti nechibayiro chake chimwe chete anoita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nokusingaperi-Ona VaHebheru 10:14
(4) Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatongotadzi; Nongedzera kuna Johane 1 ganhuro 3 ndima 9 ne5 ndima 18
(5) Kudzingiswa kubvisa nyama nenyama. Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu - Ona VaRoma 8:9 → Maari nemiwo makadzingiswa pasina maoko, pakudzingiswa kwaKristu nokubvisa kutadza kwenyama. VaKorose 2:11
(6) Pfuma iyi inoratidzwa mumudziyo wevhu : Tine pfuma iyi mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kwatiri. Tinokomberedzwa navavengi kumativi ose, asi hatina kubatwa nemisungo, asi hatinyadziswi, asi hatina kurashwa; Tinogara takatakura rufu rwaJesu nesu kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri. 2 VaKorinte 4:7-10
(7) Rufu rwuri kushanda matiri, hupenyu huri kushanda mauri : Nokuti isu vapenyu tinogara tichiiswa kurufu nokuda kwaJesu, kuti upenyu hwaJesu huratidzwe mumiviri yedu inofa. Saizvozvo kufa kunobata matiri, asi upenyu hunobata mamuri - Verenga 2 VaKorinte 4:11-12
(8) Vaka muviri waKristu uye kukura kuva vanhu vakuru ~Tarira VaEfeso 4:12-13→ Naizvozvo, hatiori mwoyo. Kunyange zvazvo muviri wokunze uri kuparadzwa, asi womukati uri kuvandudzwa zuva nezuva. Kutambura kwedu kwechinguvana uye kwakareruka kuchatiitira huremu husingagumi hwekubwinya kunopfuura kuenzanisa kwese. Tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinte 4:16-17

【Ina】 "Vakristu" vakazvarwa patsva zvenhema

---Kutenda maitiro uye maitiro---

(1) Pasi pemutemo: Nemhaka yokuti simba rechivi mutemo - nongedzera kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:56 → Avo vari pasi pomutemo varanda vechivi, pasina kusunungurwa kubva “kurufu”; kuva vanakomana vaMwari pasi pemutemo Hakuna Mweya Mutsvene uye hapana kuberekwa patsva → asi iwe". Kana "kutungamirirwa neMweya Mutsvene" , haazi pasi pomurayiro. Nongedzera kuna VaGaratia ganhuro 5 ndima 18 uye ganhuro 4 ndima 4-7
(2) Kubva pakuchengetwa kwemutemo: Mumwe nomumwe anoita maererano nomurayiro akatukwa, nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “Vakatukwa vose vasingarambi vachiita zvose zvakanyorwa mubhuku yomurayiro
(3) Muna Adamu "mutadzi": Mubairo wechivi rufu. Muna Adamu, munhu wese akafa, saka pakanga pasina Mweya Mutsvene uye pasina kuzvarwa patsva. —Verenga 1 VaKorinde 15:22
(4) Munyama "yepasi" yenyama: Jehovha anoti, "Nokuti munhu inyama, Mweya wangu haungagari maari nokusingaperi; asi mazuva ake achava makore ane zana namakumi maviri." mu "hombodo yekare yewaini" → kureva, "Mweya Mutsvene" hauzogari munyama nokusingaperi.
(5) Avo vanoreurura, vanochenesa, nekudzima zvitadzo zvenyama zuva nezuva →Vanhu ava vakatyora “Sungano Itsva” →VaHebheru 10:16-18... Pashure paizvozvo vakati: “Handichayeukizve zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo, nokuti zvivi zvavo zvaregererwa, hapana chikonzero chokudaro Havana kuzo“tenda” kuti munhu wavo wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu uye “muviri wechivi” wakanga waparadzwa, asi “vakaurangarira” zuva nezuva → vakareurura, vakashambidzwa, uye vakadzima zvivi zvavo nokuda kwezvivi zvavo. muviri uyu werufu, muviri unofa wechivi. Zvinongotyora Testamente Itsva
(6) Roverazve Mwanakomana waMwari pamuchinjikwa →Pavanonzwisisa nzira yechokwadi uye “vachitenda vhangeri”, vanofanira kusiya mavambo edzidziso yaKristu havadi kusiya “pakutanga” uye kunyange kudzokera kumutemo uye vanoda kuva nhapwa dzechivi vanonyengerwa uye vabatwa naSatani ne "chivi" uye havagoni kubuda →Nguruve dzinogezwa dzodzokera pakuumburuka mumatope; 2 Petro 2:22
(6) Bata “ropa rinokosha” raKristu semazuva ose : Reurura uye utendeuke zuva rega rega, bvisa zvitadzo, ugeze zvivi, uye utakure zvaShe " ropa rinokosha “Semazuva ose, harina kana ropa remombe nehwai.
(7) Kuseka Mweya Mutsvene wenyasha: Nokuda kwa“Kristu,” chibayiro chake chimwe chete chinoita kuti avo vakaitwa vatsvene vave vakakwana nokusingaperi. VaHebheru 10:14→ Nokuda kwe“kusatenda” kwavo kwemitsipa mikukutu. → Nokuti kana tichitadza noune pashure pokunge tagamuchira ruzivo rwechokwadi, hapachina chibayiro chezvivi, asi kumirira tichitya kutongwa nomoto unoparadza uchaparadza vavengi vedu vose. Kana munhu akadarika murayiro waMozisi akasanzwirwa ngoni uye akafa nokuda kwezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu, ko, achatsika Mwanakomana waMwari zvikuru sei uye akarangarira ropa resungano, rakamuita mutsvene sechinhu chisina maturo uye achizvidza Mwari. Mudzimu Mutsvene wenyasha Fungai pamusoro pekuti kurangwa kwaachazowana kunofanira kukwidziridzwa sei! VaHebheru 10:26-29

Cherechedza: Hama nehanzvadzi! Kana uine dzidziso dzakaipa dziri pamusoro, ndapota muka nekukurumidza uye rega kunyengedzwa nemanomano aSatani uye kushandisa "chivi" kukuisa mujeri. chivi , haigoni kubuda. Unofanira kudzidza kubva kwavari Wrong Liao Buda mukutenda kwako → pinda "Chechi yaJesu Kristu" uye uteerere kuevhangeri yechokwadi → iChechi yaJesu Kristu inokubvumira kuti uponeswe, ukudzwe, uye kuti muviri wako udzikinure → chokwadi! Ameni

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni
