articles.title: Tsananguro yedambudziko: Vanhu venyama vane Mweya Mutsvene here?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri pana Genesisi chitsauko 6 ndima 3 tiverenge pamwe chete: “Kana munhu ari nyama, Mweya wangu haungagari maari nokusingaperi,” ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha, “asi mazuva ake achava makore ane zana namakumi maviri.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete “Munhu wenyama haana Mweya Mutsvene” Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka akatumira vashandi nemaoko avo, zvose zvakanyorwa nezvakataurwa, neshoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yoruponeso rwenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti “Mweya Mutsvene” haugari pavanhu venyama .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

( 1 ) Mweya waMwari hauzogari nevanhu venyama nekusingaperi


bvunza: Ko Mweya Mutsvene anogara nemunhu wenyama “yepasi” nokusingaperi here?
mhinduro: “Kana munhu ari nyama,” ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha, “mweya wangu haungagari maari nokusingaperi, asi mazuva ake achava makore ane zana namakumi maviri.

Cherechedza: Tateguru “Adhama” akasikwa neguruva—Jehovha Mwari akasika munhu neguruva revhu ndokufemera upenyu mumhino dzake, uye akava munhu mupenyu, womudzimu anonzi Adhama. Genesisi Chitsauko 2 Ndima 7 → “Munhu mupenyu ane mudzimu” → Adhamu “munhu mupenyu wenyama neropa” → Ndizvo zvakanyorwa muBhaibheri kuti: “Adhamu, munhu wokutanga, akava mudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa kuti nyama neropa) “munhu mupenyu”; 1 VaKorinte 15:45

“Kana munhu ari nyama, Mweya wangu haungagari maari nokusingaperi,” ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha

1 Sezvakangoita “Mambo Sauro” muTesitamende yekare, muprofita Samueri akamuzodza nemafuta, uye aive nemweya waMwari! Mambo Sauro wenyama haana kuteerera murayiro waMwari→Mudzimu waShe” siya “Sauro, mweya wakaipa, wakabva kuna Jehovha, wakauya kuzomutambudza.”— 1 Samueri 16:14 .

2 Kuna “Mambo David” aitya zvikuru kuti Mwari aizobvisa mweya mutsvene nokuda kwekudarika kwenyama yake akaona nemeso ake kuti mweya waMwari wabva kuna mambo Sauro akanamata kuna Mwari muMapisarema → Regai kundirasha pamberi penyu; Pisarema 51:11

Saka muTesitamende yekare tinoona “vaprofita nevaya vanotya Mwari” Mweya waMwari unovakurudzira, asi hauzogari pavari nokusingaperi, nokuti vanhu venyama “yenyika” vane zvishuvo zvoudyire, uye nyama inochiva ichaita zvishoma nezvishoma. kuva akaipa, “Mweya waMwari” haugoni kugara mumuviri unoora. Vanhu venyama “yepasi” havagoni kupinza Mweya Mutsvene, sezvakangoitawo waini itsva isingaitwi muhombodo tsaru. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

( 2 ) Waini itsva haigoni kuiswa muhombodo tsaru

Ngatidzidzei pana Mateu 9:17: Hapana munhu anodira waini itsva muhombodo tsaru dzewaini; Kungoisa waini itsva muhombodo itsva ndiko chete kuchachengetwa. "

bvunza: Dimikira rekuti “waini itsva” rinorevei pano?
mhinduro: " waini itsva "zvinoreva" Mweya waMwari, Mweya waKristu, Mweya Mutsvene "Izvo ndizvo!

bvunza: Chii chiri dimikira re "kare waini bhegi"?
mhinduro: "Magumbeze ewaini akare" zvinoreva munhu wekare anobva kuna Adamu - munhu mupenyu akazvarwa kubva kuvabereki → we "nyika" nyama Akatengeswa kuzvivi, "mutadzi uye muviri wechivi". Zvishoma nezvishoma kuderera uye pakupedzisira kudzokera kuguruva→ saka Jesu akati! hombodo dzewaini dzakasakara "hadzigoni" kubata waini itsva, ndiko kuti, "munhu wekare" haangagoni kubata "Mweya Mutsvene", nokuti munhu wekare unoora uye unovunza, uye haugoni kuchengeta Mweya Mutsvene. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

bvunza: Dimikira rekuti “hombodo itsva yewaini” rinorevei?
mhinduro: Dimikira rekuti “hombodo itsva dzewaini” rinoreva muviri waKristu, muviri weShoko wakaitwa munhu, muviri wemweya wakazvarwa, muviri usingaori, uye muviri usingasungwi nerufu→” bhegi idzva reganda "Ehe Zvichireva muviri waKristu , “waini itsva” inoputirwa mu“hombodo itsva dzewaini,” ndiko kuti, “Mudzimu Mutsvene” “wakazara” ndiko kuti, unogara “mumuviri waKristu” → Izvi ndizvo zvatinotaura pakudya Kudya kwaShe Kwemanheru: Izvi muviri wangu "chingwa chisina mbiriso", isu kudya Ndizvo get Muviri waKristu, uyu ndiwo "muto wemazambiringa" mumukombe weropa rangu, unwe uye uchave nehupenyu hwaKristu! Ameni.

Munhu wedu mutsva akazvarwa patsva muviri noupenyu hwaKristu Mweya Mutsvene anogara muna Kristu uye isu tiri nhengo dzake. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

( 3 ) Kana Mweya waMwari achigara matiri, hatizi venyama

VaRoma 8:9-10 Kana Mweya waMwari uchigara mamuri, imi hamuchisiri venyama, asi voMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu. VaRoma 8:9.

Cherechedza: Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJesu, Mweya Mutsvene → Kana ikagara mauri, "munhu mutsva wakaitwa patsva" haachazovi wenyama asi weMweya Mutsvene. Nyama haisi yeMweya Mutsvene. Kana uri wenyama, hauna Mweya Mutsvene waKristu, haazi waKristu → Kana uri wenyama “yenyika” Munhu wenyama, munhu wenyama, mutadzi ari pasi pomurairo, muranda wechivi, iwe. Hauzi waKristu, hauna kuzvarwa patsva, uye hauna Mweya Mutsvene. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Shamwari inodiwa! Maita basa neMweya waJesu → Unodzvanya pachinyorwa chino kuti uverenge uye uteerere kumharidzo yevhangeri Kana uchida kugamuchira uye “kutenda” muna Jesu Kristu seMuponesi nerudo Rwake rukuru, tinganamata pamwechete here?

Mudikani Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Tinokutendai Baba voKudenga nokutumira Mwanakomana wenyu akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti afire pamuchinjikwa “nokuda kwezvivi zvedu” → 1 tisunungurei kubva kuchivi. 2 Tisunungurei pamurairo nokutukwa kwawo; 3 Kusunungurwa pasimba raSatani nerima reHadhesi. Ameni! Uye akavigwa → 4 Kubvisa murume wekare nezviito zvake akamutswa pazuva rechitatu → 5 Tiruramise! Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso, kuzvarwa patsva, kumutswa, kuponeswa, kugamuchira humwanakomana hwaMwari, uye kugamuchira hupenyu husingaperi! Mune ramangwana, tichagara nhaka yenhaka yaBaba vedu Vekudenga. Namata nemuzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

2021.03.05

articles.title: Tsanangudzo yedambudziko: Munhu wese akaberekwa naMwari haambotadzi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 1 Johane chitsauko 3 ndima 9 tiverenge pamwe chete: Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari;

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera tsananguro dzemibvunzo yakaoma pamwechete “Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi” Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” akatuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi, rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko ake, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari , 1 haangatadzi , 2 Hapana mhosva , 3 Haikona kupara mhosva → Nokuti akaberekwa naMwari → tsotsi Hausati wambomuona uye hauzive ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

( 1 ) Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi

Ngatidzidzei 1 Johane 3:9 uye tiiverenge pamwe chete: Uyo akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nokuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari uye haangatadzi, nokuti akaberekwa naMwari. Tichitendeukira kuChitsauko 5, ndima 18 , tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi; kusagona kumukuvadza .

[Cherechedza]: Nekuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro, tinonyora → Chero ani akaberekwa naMwari 1 Iwe haungambotadzi, 2 hapana mhosva, 3 Haugoni kutadza → zana muzana, zvachose, uye zvechokwadi haungatadzi → Izvi ndezvaMwari 【 chokwadi 】 Kwete "munhu" musimboti . →Chivi chii? Ani naani anotadza anotyora murairo chivi - tarisa kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 3 Ndima 4 → Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangaputsi murairo, uye kana akasatyora mutemo → "haazotadza". Ameni? Nenzira iyi, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Makereke mazhinji nhasi akadaro kududzira zvisizvo Mavhesi maviri aya akarasisa hama nehanzvadzi. Zvakadai seKuturikira Kutsva nedzimwe shanduro → zvinonzwisiswa kuti vatendi havazotadzi "nguva dzose kana kuti kuramba". Ingonzwisisa kuti “chokwadi” chaMwari chakakwana sechokwadi chine mwero. Nemhaka yokuti [chokwadi] hachienderani ne“munhu” → kufunga kune musoro, vanochinja “chokwadi chakakwana” chaMwari kuva “chokwadi chomunhu” → kungofanana ne“nyoka” “inoedza” Evha kuti adye “zvisingadyiki” muBindu re Edheni Muchero uri pamuti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa wakafanana → “Nezuva raunoudya chokwadi uchafa” → Izvi ndezvechokwadi uye zvakakwana "hama" imwe → "Unodya Kana ukafa, haungafi." Munoona, “nyoka” inoedzawo vanhu neiyi nzira, ichishandura “zvokwadi” yaMwari iri muBhaibheri kuva “dzidziso yavanhu” kuti ikudzidzise nokukutsausa kubva panzira yechokwadi yevhangeri. Unonzwisisa here?

( 2 ) Sei munhu akaberekwa naMwari asingatadzi?

Heino mhinduro yakazara:

1 Jesu akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu → kutisunungura kubva kuzvivi zvedu - tarisa VaRoma 6:6-7
2 Kusunungurwa kubva kumutemo nekutukwa kwawo→Ona VaRoma 7:6 naGaratiya 3:13
3 Kwete pasi pomutemo, uye pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika → Ona VaRoma 6:14 uye VaRoma 4:15 .
ndokuvigwa
4 Bvisa munhu akwegura nemaitiro ake→Ona VaKorose 3:9 uye VaEfeso 4:22
5 “Munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari haasi womunhu wekare → nongedzera kuna VaRoma 8:9-10 . Cherechedza: “Munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari akavanzwa muna Mwari pamwe chete naKristu uye “haasi” womunhu wekare akatadza muna Adhamu → Ndapota dzokera unotsvaga → “Munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari” wandakakuudza zvakadzama munyaya yapfuura haisi yevanhu vakuru.
6 Mwari akatamisa upenyu hwedu kuumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa → Ona VaKorose 1:13 → Havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika—Ona Johani 17:16.
Cherechedza: “Upenyu hutsva” hwedu hwatova muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa, uye hausi wemitemo yezviga zvenyama, uyewo hauputsi mitemo. Unonzwisisa here?
7 Tatova muna Kristu → Ikozvino hakuna kupiwa mhosva kune avo vari muna Kristu Jesu. Nokuti murayiro woMweya woupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurayiro wechivi norufu - Ona VaRoma 8:1-2 → Ndiani angapa mhosva vasanangurwa vaMwari? Mwari akavaruramisa here (kana kuti ndiMwari anovaruramisa) - VaRoma 8:33

[Cherechedza]: Isu tinorekodha kuburikidza nepamusoro 7 mapoinzi emagwaro ayo munhu wese akazvarwa kubva kuna Mwari→ 1 Iwe haungambotadzi, 2 hapana mhosva, 3 Haagoni kutadza nokuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari uye haangatadzi nokuti akaberekwa naMwari. Ameni! Ndinokutendai Ishe! Hareruya! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

( 3 ) Munhu wose anotadza haana kumuona kana kuziva Jesu

Unoziva here “zita raJesu”? →"Zita raJesu" rinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo! Ameni.

→ “Mwari akada nyika kwazvo zvokuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda maari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi nokuti Mwari haana kutuma Mwanakomana wake munyika kuti ape nyika mhosva (kana kuti atonge nyika). mumwe chete pazasi), kuti nyika iponeswe kubudikidza naye, asingatendi atopiwa mhosva, nokuti haana kutenda kuzita roMwanakomana waMwari akaberekwa ari mumwe oga : Rufu rwaJesu pamuchinjikwa rwakakudzikinura kubva kuchivi → Unozvitenda here? Kana ukasazvitenda, ucharangwa maererano nechivi chekusatenda kwako. Unonzwisisa here?

Naizvozvo zvinonzi pasi apa → Ani nani unogara maari haatadzi; Vana vangu vaduku, musaidzwa; Uyo anoita zvakarurama akarurama, saJehovha akarurama. Uyo unoita chivi unobva kuna dhiabhorosi, nekuti dhiabhorosi wakatadza kubva pakutanga. Mwanakomana waMwari akaonekwa kuti aparadze mabasa adhiabhorosi. Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; Kubva pane izvi zvinoratidzwa vana vaMwari uye vana vadhiabhorosi. Ani naani asingaiti zvakarurama haazi waMwari, uyewo ani naani asingadi hama yake. Tarisa kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 3 Ndima 6-10 naJohani Chitsauko 3 Ndima 16-18.

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

2021.03.06

articles.title: Mweya Mutsvene anopupura nemoyo yedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 8 ndima 16-17 todziverenga pamwe chete: Mweya Mutsvene unopupurirana nomweya wedu, kuti tiri vana vaMwari; Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete “Mweya Mutsvene anopupurirana nomweya wedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari” Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka “Tumai vashandi neshoko rechokwadi, rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Chingwa chinouyiswa kubva kure kudenga, uye chinopiwa kwatiri nenguva yakafanira, kuti upenyu hwedu hwomweya hugowanda. !Ameni Mweya Mutsvene anopupurirana nomweya wedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari;

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mweya Mutsvene anopupura nemoyo yedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari

( 1 ) Inzwai shoko rechokwadi

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge VaEfeso 1:13-14 pamwechete: Mushure mekunge manzwa shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yeruponeso rwenyu, uye makatenda muna Kristu, makagamuchirawo chivimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene. Uyu Mweya Mutsvene rubatso (rugwaro rwekutanga: nhaka) yenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe.

Cherechedza]: Ndakanyora nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa → Sezvo makanzwa shoko rechokwadi → Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. ..."Shoko rakava nyama" zvinoreva kuti "Mwari" akava nyama → akaberekwa nemhandara Mariya → uye akanzi [Jesu] akagara pakati pedu, azere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. …Hakuna akamboona Mwari, asi Mwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, ari pachifuva chaBaba, ndiye akamuratidza. Reference--Johani 1 Chitsauko 1-2, 14, 18. → Nezveshoko rekutanga roupenyu kubva pakutanga, ratakanzwa, kuona, kuona nemaziso edu, uye kubatwa nemaoko edu → “Ishe Jesu Kristu” anonongedzera kuna 1 Johane 1: Chitsauko 1 . →

【 Jesu ndiye mufananidzo wechokwadi wehunhu hwaMwari 】

Mwari, uyo akataura kumadzitateguru edu munguva dzakare kubudikidza navaprofita panguva zhinji uye nenzira dzakawanda, akataura kwatiri zvino mumazuva ano okupedzisira kubudikidza noMwanakomana wake, waakagadza mugari wenhaka yezvinhu zvose uye waakasika nyika yose kubudikidza naye. Ndiye kupenya kwekubwinya kwaMwari → "mufananidzo chaiwo wekuva kwaMwari" uye anotsigira zvinhu zvese nekuraira kwesimba rake. Shure kwokunge achenesa vanhu kubva kuzvivi zvavo, akagara pasi kuruoko rworudyi rwaChangamire kudenga. Sezvo zita raane zita rakanaka kupfuura mazita engirozi, anodzipfuura nokure. Chirevo - VaHebheru 1:1-4.

【 Jesu ndiye nzira, chokwadi, uye upenyu 】

Tomasi akati kwaari: Ishe, hatizivi kwamuri kuenda; ko tingaziva seiko nzira? Jesu akati kwaari: Ndini nzira, nechokwadi, noupenyu; Baba kunze kwekwandiri Endai

( 2 ) vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu

1 Vakorinde ndima 153-4 “Evhangeri yandakakuparidziraiwo: Kutanga, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu, akavigwa sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, uye kuti, sezvinoreva Magwaro, akamutswa kechipiri mumazuva matatu! Cherechedza: Jesu Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu → 1. Kusunungurwa pachivi, 2. Kusunungurwa pamutemo nekutuka kwomutemo, uye akavigwa → 3. Bvisa munhu wekare nezviito zvake → Kumuka pazuva rechitatu → 4. Tinoruramiswa uye tinogamuchira kugamuchirwa sevanakomana vaMwari! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

( 3 ) Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso

Pawakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwako, uye ukatenda muna Kristu, wakaiswa chisimbiso noMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa. Uyu Mweya Mutsvene rubatso (rugwaro rwekutanga: nhaka) yenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe. Chirevo - VaEfeso 1:13-14.

( 4 ) Mweya Mutsvene anopupura nemoyo yedu kuti tiri vana vaMwari

Nokuti hamuna kugamuchira mudzimu wouranda kuti murambe muchitya; vadyi venhaka, vadyi venhaka vaMwari uye vadyi venhaka pamwe chete naKristu. Kana tikatambudzika pamwe chete naye, tichakudzwawo pamwe chete naye. —VaRoma 8:15-17

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugovera kuyanana kwangu nemi mose. Ameni

articles.title: Tsananguro yakaoma: Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva haasi wemudhara
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 8 nendima 9 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri venyama, asi veMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugoverana pamwechete→Kutsanangura matambudziko akaoma “Munhu akaberekwa patsva haasi womukweguru” Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” akatumira vashandi nemaoko avo, zvose zvakanyorwa uye zvakaparidzwa, neshoko rechokwadi, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuzarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuitira kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → kunzwisisa kuti "munhu mutsva" akaberekwa naMwari haasi we "munhu wekare" waAdhamu. Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

“Munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari haasi womunhu wekare waAdhamu

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaRoma 8:9 Kana Mweya waMwari uchigara mauri, iwe hausisiri wenyama, asi woMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu.

[Cherechedza]: Mudzimu waMwari Mudzimu waMwari Baba → Mudzimu Mutsvene, Mudzimu waKristu → Mudzimu Mutsvene, Mudzimu weMwanakomana waMwari →wo Mweya Mutsvene, ose mudzimu mumwe → "Mudzimu Mutsvene"! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here? → Kana Mudzimu waMwari uchigara mauri → "unoberekwazve", uye "iwe" zvinoreva "munhu mutsva" akaberekwa kubva kuna Mwari → kwete nenyama → kureva, "kwete yemunhu wekare nyama yaAdhamu → asi zveMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?
Kuparadzaniswa kwevanhu vatsva kubva kune vekare:

( 1 ) kusiyaniswa nekuzvarwa patsva

Vatsva: 1 Avo vanozvarwa nemvura noMweya, 2 Vakazvarwa neevhangeri, zvokwadi munaKristu Jesu, 3 Vakaberekwa naMwari → vari vana vaMwari! Ameni. Tarisa kuna Johane 3:5, 1 VaKorinte 4:15, naJakobho 1:18.
Mudhara: 1 Vakasikwa neguruva, vana vaAdhamu naEvha, 2 vakaberekwa nenyama yevabereki vavo, 3 vakasikwa, vane chivi, vepanyika, uye pakupedzisira vachadzokera kuguruva → ivo vana vemunhu. Ona Genesi 2:7 na 1 VaKorinte 15:45

( 2 ) kubva mukusiyana kwemweya

Vatsva: Avo vari voMweya Mutsvene, waJesu, waKristu, waBaba, vaMwari → vakapfeka muviri noupenyu hwaKristu → vatsvene, havana chivi, uye havagoni kutadza, vasina gwapa, vasina kusvibiswa, uye havapararike Vanoora, havakwanisi. yokuora, kusagona kurwara, kusagona rufu. Ndihwo hupenyu husingaperi! Ameni - tarisa kuna Johane 11:26
Mudhara: Zvepanyika, zvaAdhamu, zvakaberekwa nenyama yevabereki, zvakasikwa → vatadzi, vakatengeswa kuchivi, vane tsvina uye vasina kuchena, vanoora, vanoora kuburikidza neruchiva, hunofa, uye pakupedzisira vachadzokera kuguruva. Ona Genesisi 3:19

( 3 ) Musiyanise pakati pe "anoonekwa" ne "asingaonekwi"

Vatsva: “Munhu mutsva” naKristu ChiTibetan Muna Mwari → Ona VaKorose 3:3 Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. →Zvino Ishe Jesu akamutswa atova kudenga, akagara kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba, uye “munhu wedu mutsva akaberekwa patsva” akavanzwawo ipapo, kuruoko rworudyi rwaMwari Baba! Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? →Tarisa VaEfeso 2:6 Akatimutsa uye akatigarisa pamwe chete munzvimbo dzokudenga naKristu Jesu. →Panoonekwa Kristu, anova ndiye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Tarisa kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 4 .

Cherechedza: Kristu ndiye" live "Mumoyo" wako, Kwete kurarama “Munyama yemunhu wekare waAdamu, “munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari muviri wemweya → Zvose zvakavanzwa, zvakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari → Pazuva iroro apo Jesu Kristu anouya zvakare, achaberekwa naMwari. mutsva " muviri wemweya Will oneka Buda uve naKristu mukubwinya. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Mudhara: “Munhu wekare” muviri unotadza wakabva kuna Adhamu, uye vamwe vanogona kuzviona iye muviri wenyama wenyama unobva kuna Adhamu. Mifungo yose, kudarika uye zvishuvo zvakaipa zvenyama zvicharatidzwa kuburikidza nemuviri uyu werufu. Asi “mweya nomuviri” zvomukweguru uyu zvakanga zviri pamuchinjikwa naKristu kurasika . Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Saka "muviri wemweya" wemudhara uyu haisi yake →Muviri wemweya we "munhu mutsva" wakazvarwa kubva kuna Mwari! → akaberekwa naMwari →" mweya “NdiMweya Mutsvene,” mweya "Ndiwo mweya waKristu," muviri “Ndiwo muviri waKristu! Kana tichidya chirayiro chaShe, tinodya nokunwa chaShe. muviri neropa "! Isu tinayo muviri waKristu uye hupenyu mweya . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Makereke mazhinji nhasi dzidziso Kukanganisa kuri mune izvi → Kwete kuenzanisa mweya wemuviri waAdamu nemweya wemuviri waKristu siyana , dzidziso yavo ndeyokuti →"ponesa"→mweya waAdhamu→kurisa muviri wenyama uye kuva muTao; →“muviri wemweya” waKristu wakaraswa .

Ngationei → zvakataurwa naIshe Jesu: “Ani naani anorasikirwa noupenyu hwake (upenyu kana mweya) nokuda kwangu nevhangeri → acharasikirwa ne“mweya” waAdhamu → uye “achaponesa” upenyu hwake → → “kuponesa mweya wake”; "ndeyemuzvarirwo" - nongedzera kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:45 → Naizvozvo, anofanira kubatanidzwa naKristu uye kurovererwa kuti aparadze muviri unotadza uye kurasikirwa noupenyu hwake → Kumuka nekuzvarwa patsva naKristu! Earned iri → "mweya" waKristu → ichi chi →" Wakaponesa mweya " ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ona Mako 8:34-35 .

Hama nehanzvadzi! Mubindu reEdheni Mwari vakasika “mweya” waAdamu semweya wenyama. Iye zvino Mwari ari kukutungamirira muchokwadi chese nekutumira vashandi → Nzwisisa kuti kana iwe "ukarasikirwa" mweya waAdhamu → uchawana mweya wa "Kristu", ndiko kuti, ponesa mweya wako! Iwe unozvisarudzira wega → Unoda mweya waAdamu here? Zvakadini nemweya waKristu? Sezvakaita → 1 Muti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa, “muti wakaipa” wakaparadzaniswa nemuti woupenyu, “muti wakanaka”; 2 Sungano Yekare neSungano Itsva zvakaparadzana", kungofanana nezvibvumirano zviviri"; 3 Sungano yemurairo inoparadzaniswa nesungano yenyasha;4 Mbudzi dzinoparadzaniswa namakwai; 5 Zvepanyika zvakaparadzaniswa nezviri kudenga; 6 Adhamu akaparadzaniswa kubva kuna Adhamu wokupedzisira; 7 Murume wekare akaparadzaniswa nemunhu mutsva → [Mudhara] Muviri wokunze unoderera zvishoma nezvishoma nemhaka yezvishuvo zvoudyire uye unodzokera kuguruva; [Mutsva] Kuburikidza nekuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene, tinokura kuva vanhu vakuru zuva nezuva, tizere nechimiro chekuzara kwaKristu, tichizvivaka pamwe chete naKristu murudo. Ameni! Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 4:13-16

Naizvozvo, “munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari → anofanira kusiya, kupfekenura, uye kusiya “munhu wekare” waAdhama, nokuti “munhu wekare” haasi wo“munhu mutsva” → zvivi zvaAdhamu. nyama yomunhu wekare haizoverengerwi ku“munhu mutsva” → Nongedzero 2 VaKorinte 5:19 → Pashure pokugadza sungano itsva, inoti: “Handicharangaririzve zvivi zvavo, nokudarika kwavo;"Ona VaHebheru 10:17 → Unofanira kuchengeta "Sungano Itsva" “Munhu mutsva” anogara muna Kristu → mutsvene, haana chitadzo, uye haangatadzi .

Nenzira iyi, "munhu mutsva" akaberekwa naMwari uye anorarama neMweya Mutsvene anofanira kuita neMweya Mutsvene → kuuraya mabasa ose akaipa emuviri wekare. Nenzira iyi “hauchareururi” zvitadzo zvako zuva nezuva nokuda kwezvitadzo zvenyama yomunhu wekare, uye wonamatira ropa rinokosha raJesu kuti rikuchenese uye ribvise zvitadzo zvako. Ndataura zvakawanda, ndinoshamisika kana iwe uchinzwisisa zvakajeka? Dai Mweya waIshe Jesu wakukurudzira → vhura pfungwa dzako kuti unzwisise Bhaibheri, Hwisisa kuti "munhu mutsva" akaberekwa naMwari haasi we "munhu wekare" . Ameni

articles.title: Kuberekwa patsva (Chidzidzo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare, shamwari dzinodikanwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Johane chitsauko 1 ndima 12-13 tiverenge pamwe chete: Vose vakamugamuchira, akavapa simba rokuti vave vana vaMwari, kuna avo vanotenda muzita rake. Ava ndivo vasina kuberekwa neropa, kwete neruchiva, kana nechido chemurume, asi vakaberekwa naMwari.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kuberekwa patsva" Aihwa. 3 Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka" chechi "Kutuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Chingwa chinounzwa kubva kure kudenga, uye chinopiwa kwatiri nenguva yakafanira, kuti upenyu hwedu hwomweya hugowanda! Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso emweya yedu uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → 1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 vakazvarwa nevhangeri rechokwadi. 3 Avo vakaberekwa naMwari→vose vanobva kune mumwe, uye vose vana vaMwari ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

1. Akaberekwa naMwari

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi kuberekwa kweropa, kuberekwa kwechido, uye kuberekwa kwekuda kwevanhu?
Mhinduro: Munhu wokutanga, Adhama, akava munhu mupenyu nomudzimu (“mudzimu” kana kuti “nyama”) - 1 VaKorinte 15:45 .

Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mweya woupenyu mumhino dzake, akava mweya mupenyu; zita rake rainzi Adhamu. Genesisi 2:7

[Cherechedza:] Adhamu, akasikwa neguruva, akava munhu mupenyu ane mudzimu, “ndiko kuti, munhu mupenyu wenyama neropa → ane muviri wenyama neropa, ane uipi zvido uye zvishuvo, uye Mwari anodana Adhamu "munhu" naizvozvo, vanhu vose kubva kuna Adhamu Zvose zvinobuda mumidzi → zvinoberekwa neropa, chido, uye kuda kwevanhu! Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

Mubvunzo: Chii chakazvarwa naMwari?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari - Johane 1:1
“Shoko” rakava nyama → kureva kuti, “Mwari” akava nyama, uye “Mwari” mweya → kureva kuti, “Mudzimu” wakava nyama, akaumbwa nemhandara noMweya Mutsvene uye akaberekwa, achinzi Jesu. Tarisa kuna Mateo 1:21, Johane 1:14, 4:24

Jesu akaberekwa naBaba Vokudenga → Pangirozi dzose, ndeipi iyo Mwari akamboti: Ndiwe Mwanakomana wangu, uye ini ndakubereka nhasi? Ndoupi wavo waakati: Ndichava Baba vake, naiye uchava mwanakomana wangu? VaHebheru 1:5

Mubvunzo: Tinomugamuchira sei Jesu?
Mhinduro: Tinotenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari Kana tikadya muviri wake uye tikanwa ropa raShe, tichava ne“upenyu hwaJesu Kristu” matiri! Verenga Johani 6:53-56

Baba Jehovha ndiMwari, Mwanakomana Jesu ndiMwari, uye Mweya Mutsvene Munyaradzi ndiMwariwo! Kana tichigamuchira Jesu, tinogamuchira Mwari Kana tichigamuchira uyo akatumwa naMwari, tinogamuchira Baba Vatsvene! Kugamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa kuva naJesu Kana uine Mwanakomana “Jesu”, una Baba. Ameni! Verenga 1 Johani 2:23

Naizvozvo, munhu wose anogamuchira Mweya Mutsvene akavimbiswa, anogamuchira Jesu, uye anogamuchira Baba Mutsvene! “Munhu mutsva” anozvarwa patsva mukati mako
Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

2. Akazvarwa kubva kuna Mwari (kwete we) muviri waAdamu

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaRoma 8:9 Kana Mweya waMwari uchigara mauri, iwe hausi wenyama, asi weMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu.

Cherechedza: "Mudzimu waMwari" → Mudzimu waJehovha, Mudzimu waBaba, Mudzimu waKristu, Mudzimu waJesu, Mudzimu Mutsvene, uye Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi! Inonziwo Munyaradzi uye Chizoro.

Kana Mweya waMwari, Mweya waKristu, Mweya Mutsvene achigara mauri! “Munhu” anozvarwa patsva mauri - ona VaRoma 7:22. “Munhu” uyu muviri waJesu, ropa raJesu, hupenyu hwaKristu, munhu wemweya uyu “munhu mutsva” muviri waKristu! Ameni

Iwe “munhu mutsva” hausi womuviri wenyama waAdhama, “munhu mutsva” usingafi, hausi we“munhu wekare” womuviri unoora waAdhama; “Munhu mutsva” wako akaberekwa patsva ndeweMweya Mutsvene, Kristu, naMwari Baba! Ameni

Kana Kristu ari mauri, “munhu wekare” ari mumuviri anofa nokuda kwechivi → akafa pamwe chete naKristu, asi mweya unoruramiswa uye unorarama ne“kutenda” → “munhu mutsva” anorarama naKristu! Saka, unonzwisisa here? Verenga VaRoma 8:9-10

3. Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi

Ngatiendei kuna 1 Johane 3:9 Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; uye haangatadzi, nekuti wakaberekwa naMwari.

Mubvunzo: Sei avo vakazvarwa naMwari vasingatadzi?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Nokuti shoko raMwari rinogara mumwoyo - Johane 3:9
2 Asi Mweya waMwari unogara mamuri, uye imi hamuzi venyama – VaRoma 8:9
3 Munhu mutsva akaberekwa naMwari anogara muna Jesu Kristu - 1 Johane 3:6
4 Mutemo weMweya weupenyu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu - VaRoma 8: 2
5 Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika - VaRoma 4:15
6 Vakashambidzwa, vakaitwa vatsvene, vakaruramiswa noMweya waMwari - 1 VaKorinte 6:11
7 Zvinhu zvakare zvapfuura;

“Munhu wekare” akarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu → zvinhu zvakare zvapfuura;

"Munhu mutsva" anogara naKristu, zvino anogara muna Kristu, akacheneswa, akacheneswa, uye akaruramiswa noMweya Mutsvene → zvinhu zvose zvava zvitsva (zvinonzi munhu mutsva)!

Mubvunzo: VaKristu (vatsva) vangatadza here?
Mhinduro: Hakuna munhu akaberekwa naMwari achatadza; Tarira 1 Johane 3:8-10, 5:18

Mubvunzo: Vamwe vaparidzi vanoti vaKristu vachiri kutadza.
Mhinduro: Vanhu vanoti ivo (vakaberekwa naMwari) vanogona kutadza havanzwisisi ruponeso rwaKristu vanonyengerwa nekukanganisa. Nokuti avo vanotadza havabarwi patsva; avo vasina kuberekwa patsva havana Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa! Ani naani asina Mweya waKristu haazi waKristu.

(Kana Kristu ari mamuri:)

1 Muviri we“munhu wekare” wakafa nemhaka yechivi → Iye “anotenda” kuti munhu wekare akafa asunungurwa pachivi—VaRoma 6:6-7
2 Kusunungurwa pamurairo → Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika - VaRoma 4:15
3 Bvisai munhu wekare nezviito zvake
4 Pasina mutemo, chivi hachiverengwe → “Testamende Itsva” Mwari haachayeuki zvivi zvako nokudarika kwako kwomunhu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu nokuti wakafa (ona VaK. Mwari havarangariri! — VaRoma 5:13, VaHebheru 10:16-18
5 Nokuti kunze kwomutemo chivi chakafa (VaRoma 7:8) → Makabviswa pachivi, nomutemo, uye kubva kumunhu wekare nemabasa ake nomuviri waKristu. Wakafa - vaKorose 3:3 "munhu mutsva" wako hausi wemabasa nekudarika kwenyama yemunhu wekare Mwari havacharangariri zvivi zvako nekudarika kwako, saka Pauro akati! Zvitorei semakafa kuchivi uye muri vapenyu kuna Mwari muna Kristu Jesu - VaRoma 6:11
6 Muviri wakafa nokuda kwechivi, asi mweya mupenyu nokuda kwokururama (VaRoma 8:10).

Mubvunzo: Muviri wechivi unofa sei?
Mhinduro: Tenda mukufa pamwe chete naKristu → kuona rufu rwemunhu wekare uye zvishoma nezvishoma uchirubvisa → kutora muviri wakafa, muviri unofa, unoora, uye muviri wekunze uchaparadza zvishoma nezvishoma uchiora (VaEfeso 4:21) -22) Muviri unotadza waAdhamu Unobva kuguruva uye kuguruva uchadzokera. —Verenga Genesisi 3:19

Mubvunzo: Vatsva vanorarama sei?
Mhinduro: Rarama naKristu → Munhu mutsva (munhu akaberekwazve mumweya) anogara muna Kristu Jesu, uye mamuri (munhu mutsva) ari kukura zuva nezuva kuva murume, achikura muchimiro chaKristu. Kana “pfuma” ikaiswa mumudziyo wevhu, zvicharatidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari Rinomutsa rufu rwaJesu uye rinoratidzawo upenyu hwaJesu → kuparidza evhangeri, kuparidza chokwadi, uye kutungamirira vanhu vakawanda. kururama! Inzwa kumuka naKristu uye nekuregererwa kwemuviri. Hupenyu hwepamweya hwe "munhu mutsva" huchawana huremu husingaenzaniswi hwekubwinya kusingaperi. Kana Kristu achinge aonekwa, muviri wako uchaonekwa (ndiko kuti, muviri unoregererwa), uye iwe uchamutswa zvakanyanya kunaka! Ameni. Verenga 2 VaKorinde 4:7-18

7 Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; 1 Johane 3:9, 5:18

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

OK! Nhasi tiri kugovera "Kuberekwazve" pano.
Ngatinamatei kuna Mwari pamwe chete: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Garai muchivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya, kunzwisisa Bhaibheri, uye kunzwisisa kuberekwa patsva, 1 akazvarwa nemvura nemweya, 2 akazvarwa neshoko rechokwadi reevhangeri, 3 akaberekwa naMwari! Uyo anogara muna Jesu Kristu mutsvene, haana chivi uye haatadzi. Hakuna munhu akaberekwa naMwari achatadza, nokuti tose takaberekwa naMwari. Ameni
Muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Vhangeri Rakatsaurirwa amai vangu vanodikanwa!

Gospel Transcript:

Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang*Yun, Sisita Liu, Sisita Zheng, Hama Cen... nevamwe vashandi vanotsigira nekubatsira basa revhangeri raKristu uye vashande pamwe chete neavo vanotenda muvhangeri rino! Mazita evatsvene vanoparidza nokugoverana kutenda uku akanyorwa mubhuku roupenyu! Ameni Chirevo VaFiripi 4:1-3

Hama nehanzvadzi Rangarira kuunganidza

Mufananidzo uri pazasi: Akazvarwa kuna Adhamu uye Adhamu wokupedzisira ( akaberekwa naMwari )

Shamwari inodiwa! Maita basa neMweya waJesu → Unodzvanya pachinyorwa ichi kuti uchiverenge uye uteerere kumharidzo yevhangeri kana uchida kuigamuchira uye" tendai “Jesu Kristu ndiye Muponesi nerudo Rwake rukuru, tonamata pamwechete here?

Mudikani Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Baba Vekudenga nekutumira Mwanakomana wenyu mumwechete, Jesu Akafira pamuchinjikwa "nokuda kwezvivi zvedu" → 1 tisunungurei kubva kuchivi. 2 Tisunungurei pamurairo nokutukwa kwawo; 3 Kusunungurwa pasimba raSatani nerima reHadhesi. Ameni! ndokuvigwa → 4 Bvisai mutana nemabasa ake; Akamutswa nezuva retatu → 5 Tiruramise! Gamuchira Mweya Mutsvene wakavimbiswa sechisimbiso, kuzvarwa patsva, kumutswa, kuponeswa, kugamuchira humwanakomana hwaMwari, uye kugamuchira hupenyu husingaperi! Mune ramangwana, tichagara nhaka yenhaka yaBaba vedu Vekudenga. Namata nemuzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Hymn: Anoshamisa Nyasha

Titambire hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kuti mushandise browser kutsvaga - Ishe kereke muna Jesu Kristu -Batana nesu mushande pamwe chete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Kuberekwa patsva (Chidzidzo 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese!

Nhasi tinoenderera mberi nekuongorora kugovera traffic "Kuberekwazve" 2

Chidzidzo Chechipiri: Shoko Rechokwadi reVhangeri

Ngativhurei kuna 1 VaKorinte 4:15 mumabhaibheri edu tiverenge pamwe chete: Imi munodzidza pamusoro paKristu mungava nevadzidzisi zviuru gumi asi vanababa vashoma, nokuti ndakakuberekai nevhangeri riri muna Kristu Jesu.

Dzokera kuna Jakobho 1:18 maererano nokuda kwake akatibereka mushoko rechokwadi, kuti tive sezvibereko zvokutanga pazvisikwa zvake zvose.

Mavhesi maviri aya anotaura nezvawo

1 Pauro akati! Nokuti ndakakuberekai kubudikidza neevhangeri muna Kristu Jesu

2 Jakobho akati! Mwari akatibereka nechokwadi

1. Takaberekwa tiine nzira yechokwadi

Mubvunzo: Ndeipi nzira yechokwadi?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Dudziro yeBhaibheri: “Chokwadi” ichokwadi, uye “Tao” ndiMwari!

1 Chokwadi ndiJesu! Ameni
Jesu akati, “Ndini nzira, nezvokwadi, noupenyu hapana anouya kuna Baba asi nokwandiri

2 “Shoko” ndiMwari – Johani 1:1-2

“Shoko” rakava nyama—Johani 1:14
“Mwari” akava nyama - Johane 1:18
Shoko rakava nyama, rakanambwa nemhandara uye rakaberekwa neMweya Mutsvene, uye rakanzi Jesu! Ameni. Verenga Mateu 1:18, 21
Naizvozvo, Jesu ndiMwari, Shoko, uye Shoko rechokwadi!
Jesu ndiye chokwadi! Chokwadi chakatibereka, Jesu ndiye akatibereka! Ameni.

Muviri wedu (wekare) wenyama wakambenge wazvarwa naAdama; Saka, unonzwisisa here?
Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. VaEfeso 1:13

2. Wakazvarwa nevhangeri muna Kristu Jesu

Mubvunzo: Evhangeri chii?
Mhinduro: Tiri kutsanangura zvakadzama

1Jesu akati, Mweya waShe uri pamusoro pangu, nokuti wakandizodza;
Ndidanirei kuti ndiparidze evhangeri kuvarombo;
Vakatapwa vanosunungurwa,
Mapofu anofanira kuona,
Kuti ndisunungure vakadzvinyirirwa.
Kuziviswa kwegore rinogamuchirika raMwari rejubheri. Ruka 4:18-19

2 Petro akati! Wakazvarwa patsva, kwete nembeu inoora, asi isingaori, neshoko raMwari benyu uye rinogara nokusingaperi. …Shoko raShe chete rinogara nokusingaperi. Iri ndiro vhangeri rakaparidzwa kwamuri. 1 Petro 1:23, 25

3 Pauro akati (muchaponeswa nokutenda vhangeri iri) zvandakakupaiwo: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu uye akavigwa sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro; 1 VaKorinte 15:3-4

Mubvunzo: Vhangeri rakatibereka sei?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

Kristu akafira zvitadzo zvedu sezviri muBhaibheri

(1) Kuti muviri wedu unotadza uparadzwe - VaRoma 6:6
(2) Nokuti vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi - VaRoma 6:7
(3) Kudzikinura avo vari pasi pomutemo - VaG
(4) Kusunungurwa kubva pamurairo nekutukwa kwawo - vaRoma 7:6, vaGaratiya 3:13

Ndokuvigwa

(1) Bvisa munhu wekare nemiitiro yawo - VaKorose 3-9
(2) Kupukunyuka pasimba raSatani murima reHadhesi - VaKorose 1:13, Mabasa 26:18
(3) Kubuda munyika - Johani 17:16

Uye akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neBhaibheri

(1) Kristu akamutswa kuti tiruramiswe - VaRoma 4:25
(2) Tinozvarwa patsva nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa - 1 Petro 1:3
(3) Kutenda muvhangeri kunoita kuti tizomutswa pamwe chete naKristu - VaRoma 6:8, VaEfeso 3:5-6
(4) Kutenda muvhangeri kunotipa kuva vanakomana - VaG. 4:4-7, VaEfeso 1:5
(5) Kutenda muvhangeri kunodzikinura miviri yedu - 1 VaTesaronika 5:23-24, VaRoma 8:23;
1 VaKorinte 15:51-54, Zvakazarurwa 19:6-9

saka,
1 Petro akati, “Takaberekwa patsva kutariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa, 1 Petro 1:3.

2 Jakobho akati! Maererano nokuda kwake, akatibereka mushoko rechokwadi, kuti tive sechibereko chokutanga chezvisikwa zvake zvose. Jakobho 1:18

3 Pauro akati! Imi munodzidza pamusoro paKristu mugova navadzidzisi zviuru gumi, asi vanababa vashoma, nokuti ini ndakakuberekai kubudikidza neevhangeri muna Kristu Jesu. 1 VaKorinte 4:15

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Ngatinamatei tichienda kumusoro kuna Mwari pamwechete: Tinokutendai Abba Baba Vekudenga, Muponesi wedu Jesu Kristu, uye tinotenda Mweya Mutsvene nekugara uchivhenekera maziso edu emweya, kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya, uye kutibvumira kunzwisisa kuzvarwa patsva! 1 Akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 muranda waMwari uyo akatibereka kubudikidza neevhangeri uye nokutenda muna Kristu Jesu kuti tigamuchirwe savanakomana vaMwari nokuregererwa kwemiviri yedu pazuva rokupedzisira. Ameni

Muzita raIshe Jesu! Ameni

Chinyorwa chevhangeri kubva:

kereke munashe Jesu Kristu

Vhangeri Rakatsaurirwa amai vangu vanodikanwa!
Hama nehanzvadzi! Rangarira kuunganidza.

Hymn: Mangwanani

Titambire hama nehanzvadzi dzakawanda kutsvaga nebrowser yako - kereke munashe Jesu Kristu -Batana nesu mushande pamwe chete kuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kushamwari dzangu dzinodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Johane chitsauko 3 ndima 5-6 tiverenge pamwe chete: Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kana munhu asingaberekwi nemvura noMweya, haangagoni kupinda muushe hwaMwari. Icho chakaberekwa nenyama inyama; Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Kuberekwa patsva" Munyengetero Wokutanga: Mudikani Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! 【Mukadzi akanaka】 chechi vakatuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. ( 1 ) Nei tichifanira kuberekwa patsva?

Ishe Jesu vakati: " unofanira kuberekwa patsva ",

bvunza: Chii chinonzi kuberekwa patsva?
mhinduro: "Kuberekwazve" kunoreva kumuka, hupenyu hwechipiri → kuwedzera kune kuberekwa kwepanyama kwevabereki vedu Mwari akatipa hupenyu hwechipiri → hunonzi "kuberekwazve".

bvunza: Nei tichifanira kuberekwa patsva? →
mhinduro: Jesu akapindura, "Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kana munhu asina kuberekwa patsva, haangaoni umambo hwaMwari." uye Mweya, haagoni kuona umambo hwaMwari kusvika kuna Johani 3:3, 5

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaRoma Chitsauko 9 Ndima 8 Izvi zvinoreva kuti vana vakaberekwa nenyama havasi vana vaMwari, asi vana vechipikirwa born Vana chete ndivo vazukuru.

bvunza: muviri wenyama born “Sei” vana vedu vasiri vana vaMwari?
Jesu Kristu haana kuuyawo munyama here?
mhinduro: pano" muviri wenyama “Vana vanoberekwa vanoreva vana vaAdhama vakasikwa neguruva, ndiko kuti, vana vakaberekerwa madzitateguru Adhama naEvha → Miviri yedu yenyama inoberekwa nevabereki vedu, uye miviri yenyama yevabereki vedu yakasikwa. kubva muguruva raAdam - tarisa kuna Genesisi 2 Chitsauko 7 Mutambo;

uye Jesu Kristu" zve" muviri wenyama "→ Hongu" kuva munhu "→ NeMhandara Mary “Uyo anonambwa noMweya Mutsvene anoburuka achibva kuna “Mai veJerusarema” kudenga! Ameni!” Ona Mateu 1:18, Johani 1:14 uye VaGaratiya 4:26 .

Isu "takazvarwa munyama" kubva kuvabereki vedu → tichaona kuora uye chikonzero Adhamu Chikonzero chakatengeswa kuchivi, icho chitadzo, chine tsvina, chinochembera, chinorwara, chinotowedzera, chinofa → gamuchira " Hazvidyike “Kutukwa kworufu kuchadzokera kuguruva pakupedzisira; tarisa kuna Genesi 3:17-19

uye Jesu Kristu zve" muviri wenyama "→ Kusingaonekwe nekuora, kutsvene, kusina chitadzo, kusingasvavi, kusasvibiswa, hupenyu husingazoperi . Ameni! Ona Mabasa 2:31

articles.title: “Kutendeuka 4” Kurovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu, kunoenzana nokutendeuka
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure maBhaibheri edu kuna Ruka chitsauko 23 ndima 41 tiverenge pamwe chete: Takafanirwa nazvo, nekuti chirango chedu chakakodzera mabasa edu, asi murume uyu haana kuita chinhu chakaipa.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "kutendeuka" Aihwa. Four Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotuma vashandi neshoko rechokwadi, rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko ake, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Hwisisa kuti “moyo wokutendeuka” zvinoreva kuti ndakaroverwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naKristu, nokuti zvatinotambura ndizvo zvakafanira zvatinoita! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu, akafanirwa nokutendeuka

(1) Kurovererwa pamwe chete naJesu, kupfidza kwemutadzi

Ngatidzidzei Ruka chitsauko 23 ndima 39-41 todziverenga pamwe chete: Mumwe wemakororo maviri akanga arovererwa pamwe chete akamuseka akati, “Ko, hausi iwe Kristu here, zviponese iwe nesu! . Sezvo uri pasi pechirango chimwe chete, hautyi Mwari here? Tinofanira, Nokuti zvatinogamuchira zvakakodzerwa nezvatinoita , asi munhu uyu haasati amboita chinhu chakaipa. "

Cherechedza: Matsotsi maviri akarovererwa pamwe chete naJesu “Vasungwa” vanoreva vanhu vanogona kuita zvitadzo. Ingozvitaura → isu tinofanira, nekuti izvo isu by nezvatiinazvo Do zve" proportion "→Izvi ndizvo zvinoreva kurovererwa pamwe chete naJesu →" Mwoyo wakakodzera kutendeuka ".Ichi chi" kutendeuka kwechokwadi ".→ Tenda kuEvhangeri ugoponeswa →Musungwa akati: "Jesu, kana umambo hwenyu hwasvika, ndapota mundirangarire!" Jesu akati kwaari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, nhasi uchava neni muParadhiso . "Nhungamiro-Ruka 23 ndima 42-43.

Mumwe musungwa akaseka Jesu akati, "Ko, ndiwe Kristu here? zviponese iwe nesu!" Nokudaro, avo vasingatendi kuti Jesu ndiye muponesi havagoni kuwana ruponeso rwaMwari → umambo hwaMwari husingaperi "Paradhiso" uye → avo vasingatendi kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu uye muponesi havazovi nemugove kudenga.

Chenjedzo:

Sezvo uchitenda muna Jesu saKristu uye Muponesi, Akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu → 1 Kukuponesa kubva kuchivi, unozvitenda here? 2 Iwe unotenda kuti wakasunungurwa pamurairo nekutuka kwemurairo here? ndokuvigwa, 3 Unotenda here kuti wakabvisa munhu wekare nehunhu hwekutadza hwemunhu wekare? →Nekuti munhu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu, muviri wechivi wakaparadzwa. 4 Kumuka pazuva rechitatu ~ tizvarwa patsva! Ameni! Unozvitenda here kana kuti kwete? Kana iwe usingatendi chimwe chezviri pamusoro apa? Ndokumbira ubvunze hana yako, sei uchitenda muna Jesu? →Ndeupi musiyano uripo pakati peizvi netsotsi rakanyomba Jesu saKristu? Iwe zvitaure! Rudyi?

Naizvozvo, mwoyo wekutendeuka wakaenzana, uye ndizvo zvakaitawo rutendo. → Unofanira kubereka zvibereko zvinoenderana nokutendeuka. Usati ini ndinongoda kutenda muna Jesu, asi usatenda maari kuti akuponese. -- 1 wakasununguka kubva kuchivi. 2 Kusunungurwa kubva pamurayiro nokutukwa kwawo. 3 Bvisa mutana netsika dzake dzekare. Zvikasadaro ungamutswa sei pamwe naKristu [ kuberekwa patsva ]Mucheka weshinda? Wakamboona mwedzi here? Reference-Mateo 3 ndima 8

Sokutaura kunoita mupostori Pauro mutsamba yake kuti: Kana takabatanidzwa naye murufu rwakafanana norufu rwake, tichabatanidzwawo naye mukufanana kwokumuka kwake, tichiziva kuti munhu wedu wekare wakarovererwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wedu wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye. zvechivi ngazvive kuparadzwa, kuti tirege kuzovazve varanda vechivi; Kana tikafa pamwe chete naKristu, tinotenda kuti tichararama pamwe chete naye. → Ndakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu, Handichisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu unorarama mandiri Uye upenyu hwandinorarama zvino mumuviri ndinorarama nokutenda muMwanakomana waMwari, akandida akazvipa nokuda kwangu. Reference-VaGaratiya 2:20 naVaRoma 6:5-8.

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni.
