Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Siya zvose shure

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge Ruka 5:8 pamwe chete: Simoni Petro paakaona izvi, akawira pamabvi aJesu akati, “ Ishe ndisiyei, ndiri mutadzi ! ^ ndima 10 Jesu akati kuna Simoni, “Usatya! Kubva zvino zvichienda mberi, uchakunda vanhu. Ndima 11 Vakasvitsa magwa maviri kumahombekombe, uye ipapo. siya shure “Vose, vakatevera Jesu.

(2) Kuzvinyima

Mateo 4:18-22 BDMCS - Jesu paakanga achifamba pedyo neGungwa reGarireya, akaona mukoma nomunun’una, Simoni anonzi Petro, nomunun’una wake Andireya, vachikandira mambure mugungwa. Jesu akati kwavari, “Uyai munditevere, uye ndichakuitai vabati vavanhu.” Uye “pakarepo vakasiya usvasvi hwavo” vakamutevera. Wakati achipfuurapo akaona vana vemunhu umwe vaviri, Jakobho mwanakomana waZebhedhi, naJohwani munin'ina wake, vari mugwa nababa vavo Zebhedhi, vachigadzira mimbure yavo, Jesu akadana kwavari; Abandon “Buda muigwa”, “onekana” kuna baba vake wotevera Jesu.

(3) Tora muchinjikwa wako

Ruka 14:27 “Hazvisi zvese” shure Kutakura muchinjikwa wako" kutevera uyewo havagoni kuva vadzidzi vangu.

(4) Tevedzera Jesu

Mako 8 34 Ipapo akadana vanhu vazhinji navadzidzi vake akati kwavari, “Kana munhu achida kunditevera, anofanira kuzviramba atakure muchinjikwa wake. kutevera I. Mateo 9:9 Jesu akati achipfuurira mberi achibva ikoko, akaona murume ainzi Mateo agere pahofisi yomutero akati kwaari, “Nditevere.”

(5) Venga upenyu hwechivi

Johani 12:25 Uyo anoda upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; asi “anovenga upenyu hwake” munyika ino → hate Kana ukaregera “hupenyu hwekare hwechivi”, unofanira kuchengetedza hupenyu hwako “hutsva” kuti uwane hupenyu husingaperi nenzira iyi unonzwisisa here?

(6) Kurasikirwa noupenyu hwokupara mhosva

Mako 8:35 Nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; kurasikirwa Uyo anoponesa upenyu achaponesa upenyu.

(7) Wana hupenyu hwaKristu

Mateo 16:25 Nokuti ani naani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; get hupenyu. Ameni!

[Cherechedza]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora → vadzidzi vaJesu” kutendeuka "Ehe tsamba Vhangeri! Tevera Jesu~ hupenyu Change itsva : 1 Siya zvese shure, 2 kuzviramba, 3 Takura muchinjikwa wako, 4 Tevera Jesu, 5 Venga hupenyu hwechivi. 6 Rasika hupenyu hwako hwekupara mhosva, 7 Wana hupenyu hutsva muna Kristu ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Aya ndiwo magumo eruwadzano rwangu uye kugoverana nemi nhasi Dai hama nehanzvadzi dzanyatsoteerera kunzira yechokwadi uye kugovera nzira yechokwadi zvakanyanya → Iyi ndiyo nzira yakarurama yokuti mufambe nayo. Iyi nzira yemweya ndeyekumutswa pamwe naKristu, kuti iwe ugozvarwa patsva, uponeswe, ukudzwe, upiwe mubairo, upfekedzwe korona, uye uve nekumuka kuri nani mune ramangwana Ivhangeri rekutonga naKristu. ! Ameni. Hareruya! Ndinokutendai Ishe!

Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: Tendeukai, handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama, asi vatadzi kuti vatendeuke
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Ruka 5 chitsauko 32 tiverenge pamwe chete: Jesu akati, “Handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama, asi vatadzi vauye mukutendeuka.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "kutendeuka" Aihwa. Poshi Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Chechi yaJesu Kristu inotumira vashandi vanonyora nemaoko avo nekutaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri reruponeso rwedu. Tipei zvokudya munguva uye taura zvinhu zvomudzimu kuvanhu vomudzimu kuti vateerere, kuti upenyu hwedu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti Jesu akauya kuzodana vatadzi kuti vatendeuke → Tendai muvhangeri uye mugamuchire umwanakomana waMwari! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge Ruka 5:31-32 pamwe chete: Jesu akati kwavari, “Vasingarwari havatsvaki chiremba, asi handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama vatadzi kuti vatendeuke.”

Mubvunzo: Chivi chii?

Mhinduro: Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro chivi . Chirevo - 1 Johane 3:4

Mubvunzo: Mutadzi chii?

Mhinduro: Avo vanotyora mutemo vopara mhosva vanonzi “vatadzi”.

Mubvunzo: Ndakava sei “mutadzi”?

Mhinduro: Nemhaka yokudarika kwomunhu mumwe, Adhamu → Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, naizvozvo rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose nokuti vanhu vose vakatadza. Chirevo-VaRoma 5:12

Mubvunzo: Vese vakatadza → Varanda vechivi here?

Mhinduro: Jesu akapindura akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Mumwe nomumwe anoita zvivi muranda wezvivi.”— Johane 8:34

Mubvunzo: Tese tiri “vatadzi” uye nhapwa dzechivi. Chii chiri mubairo we“chivi”?

Mhinduro: Nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu;

Naizvozvo, Ishe Jesu akati: “Ndinoti kwamuri, aiwa! Kana musingatendeuki, nemi mose muchaparara saizvozvo.”— Ruka 13:5

Mubvunzo: “Vatadzi” vangadzivisa sei “kufa” muzvivi zvavo?

Mhinduro: "Pfidzai" → "Tendai" kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu uye Muponesi → Jesu akati kwavari: "Imi munobva pasi, ini ndinobva kumusoro; imi muri venyika ino, asi ini handisi wenyika ino." . Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu kana musingatendi kuti ndini Kristu.”— Johani 8:23-24 .

Mubvunzo: “Mutadzi” “anotendeuka” sei?

Pindura: Tenda kuevhangeri. →Tenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari, Kristu, uye Muponesi! Mwari akafira "zvivi" zvedu kuburikidza neMwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu → 1 Anotisunungura kubva muchivi - tarisa VaRoma 6: 7, 2 Anotisunungura kubva pamurairo nekutuka kwemurairo - VaG 3 chitsauko 13 ndima, uye akavigwa → 3 Kubvisa munhu wekare nemabasa ake - nongedzera kuna VaKorose 3:9 , Kumutswa pazuva rechitatu → 4 Kutiruramisa - nongedzera kuna VaRoma 4:25 uye 1 VaKorinte 15 Chitsauko 3-4

[Cherechedza]: "Tendeuka"→"Kutenda"→"Evhangeri" →Ivhangeri isimba raMwari roruponeso kumunhu wose anotenda, nokuti mairi kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.”—VaRoma 1:16-17

Uku "kururama" kwakavakirwa pakutenda, kuti kutenda → "kutendeuka" → "kutenda" muevhangeri! Mwari vachakupa" mutadzi "Hupenyu - kuburikidza nerufu rwaKristu pamuchinjikwa (mutadzi, muviri wezvivi unoparadzwa) → Shandura ku →Kumuka kwaKristu kwatiberekera patsva kuti tiruramiswe uye tigamuchire " munhu akarurama " upenyu. Uku ndiko kutendeuka kwechokwadi, saka Ishe Jesu vakapedzisira vati pamuchinjikwa, "Zvapera! "→Jesu akauya kuzodana "vatadzi" kuti vatendeuke uye ruponeso rwakabudirira. mutadzi "→ nokutenda muvhangeri →Mwari akatora upenyu hwezvivi hwomukweguru wako→ Shandura ku → " munhu akarurama “Hupenyu hwemwana waMwari mutsvene, asina chivi! Ameni! Saka unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Hama nehanzvadzi! Ivai vakura muna Kristu, uye musava vana kunze, vakabatwa namanomano nounyengeri hwavanhu, vachikandwa kuno nekoko nemhepo ipi neipi youpegani, uye muchitevera dzidziso dzakatsauka dzose kutanga kusvika kumagumo → Nyatsoteerera kaviri uye uchanzwisisa ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu → Chii chinonzi kuberekwazve? Gamuchira korona, Kristu anodzoka Ishe nokusingaperi kudenga idzva nenyika itsva.

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ushamwari hwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari Baba, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: Matambudziko akatsanangura: Kusiyanisa mweya
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei maBhaibheri edu kuna 1 Johane chitsauko 4 ndima 1 tiverenge pamwe chete: Hama dzinodikanwa, musatenda mweya yose, asi edzai mweya kuti muone kana yakabva kuna Mwari, nokuti vaprofita vazhinji venhema vakabudira munyika. Mweya mumwe nomumwe unopupura kuti Jesu Kristu wakauya panyama, unobva kuna Mwari; 1 Vakorinde 12:10 Uye akaita kuti mumwe aite zviratidzo uye kuti ashumire somuprofita. Kunoitawo kuti munhu akwanise kuona midzimu , uye akaitawo kuti munhu mumwe agone kutaura nendimi, uye akaitawo kuti munhu mumwe agone kududzira ndimi.

Nhasi ndichadzidza, kushamwaridzana, uye kugoverana nemi mose "Mweya Inosiyanisa" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi ane hunhu [kereke] anotumira vashandi kuti vatakure chikafu kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure mudenga, uye agogovera chikafu kwatiri nenguva kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya, avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri, uye atigonese kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya → tidzidzise kushandisa Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi → kuziva mweya.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Nzvera mweya

(1) Mudzimu Mutsvene wechokwadi

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Johane 14:15-17 “Kana muchindida, muchachengeta mirairo yangu, ini ndichakumbira Baba, ivo vachakupai mumwe Munyaradzi (kana Shanduro: Munyaradzi; iyeyu pazasi), kuti ave. anemi nokusingaperi, Mweya wechokwadi, uyo nyika haigoni kumugamuchira, nokuti haimuoni kana kumuziva, asi imi munomuziva, nokuti anogara nemi uye achava mamuri.

[Cherechedza]: Ishe Jesu akati: “Kana muchindida, muchachengeta mirayiro yangu. Uye ndichakumbira Baba, uye vachakupai mumwe Mubetseri kuti ave nemi nokusingaperi, uyo ari Mudzimu wechokwadi → Mudzimu wechokwadi , Achakutungamirira mu“zvokwadi yose”!

Ungagamuchira sei Mweya Mutsvene? → Nemiwo makatenda maari, pamakanzwa shoko rezvokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu, mukatenda maari, makaiswa chisimbiso noMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa. — VaEfeso 1:13 . Cherechedza: Mushure mekunge "wanzwa" shoko rechokwadi → kunzwisisa chokwadi, evhangeri yeruponeso rwako → wakatenda muna Kristu uye wakagamuchira vimbiso【 Mweya Mutsvene ]! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

→ Ndakataura nemi kare kuti Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi → Mweya Mutsvene ndicho chokwadi! → Mwari mudzimu: “Mudzimu waMwari, Mudzimu waJehovha, Mudzimu waJesu, Mudzimu waKristu, Mudzimu woMwanakomana waMwari, Mudzimu waShe, uye Mudzimu wechokwadi “mudzimu mumwe” → kureva, Mweya Mutsvene wechokwadi! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Mudzimu womunhu

Genesisi Chapter 2 Vhesi 7 Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mumhino dzake mweya woupenyu, akava mweya mupenyu; zita rake rainzi Adhamu. → “Mweya” zvinoreva nyama neropa , “Mudzimu” uri muna Adhamu, tateguru wevanhu → mweya wechisikigo . Ona 1 VaKorinte 15:45 . →[Mudzimu womunhu] wakafa mukudarika kwake nenyama isina kudzingiswa, ndiko kuti, tateguru wokutanga Adhama akaputsa mutemo ndokutadza, uye “mudzimu womunhu” wakafa munyama yake isina kudzingiswa. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Muparidzi 3 Chitsauko 21 Ndiani anoziva kuti "mweya wemunhu" unokwira → "Mweya" wemunhu unosimuka semweya unotenda kuevhangeri uye ugoponeswa; kudzokera kuguruva, “midzimu” yavo iri mutorongo, ndiko kuti, Hadhesi→ Kristu kupfurikidza mweya ] Paridza evhangeri kumidzimu iri mutorongo, kunyange zvazvo nyama iri kutongwa, nokutenda muna Kristu. mweya “Kurarama naMwari, nokuti “evhangeri” ruponeso harwusati rwaratidzwa munguva dzakare.

(3) Mudzimu wengirozi yakawa

Isaya 14:12 “Iwe nyeredzi inopenya, Mwanakomana wamambakwedza, wawa seiko uchibva kudenga? chetatu chakawira pasi.

Cherechedza: "Nyeredzi inopenya, mwanakomana wemangwanani" mudenga uye akazvuva "chetatu" chengirozi → yakawira pasi → yakava "dhiragoni, nyoka, dhiabhorosi, Satani" uye chikamu chimwe muzvitatu chakawa chengirozi → akava" Mweya wekukanganisa , mweya waantikristu "- Tarisa kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 4 ndima 3-6," mweya wadhiabhorosi , Mweya wetsvina wemuporofita wenhema "- Ona Zvakazarurwa 16, ndima 13-14," Kuedza mweya yakaipa "-Verenga 1 Timotio chitsauko 4 ndima 1" mweya wenhema (Verenga 1 Madzimambo 22:23). Mweya wekukanganisa “Tarisa kuna Isaya 19:14. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

→ Kupi[ mweya ] Reurura kuti Jesu Kristu akauya ari panyama, ndiko kuti, achibva kuna Mwari, unogona kuziva kuti “Mweya waMwari” unobva kuMweya Mutsvene. Fani" mweya “Kana ukaramba Jesu, hausi waMwari mweya waantikristu . Tarisa kuna 1 Johane 4:2-3.

Chinhu chiri pachena zvikuru ndechokuti mumachechi akawanda nhasi → “midzimu” yevaprofita venhema inokudzidzisa kuti pashure pokunge “watenda” muna Jesu unofanira “kureurura zvivi zvako zuva nezuva nokukumbira ropa Rake rinokosha kuti risuke zvivi zvako → Verenga ropa resungano rakamutsvenesa sechinhu chisina maturo → Izvi ndizvo Mweya wekukanganisa . "Vatendi" vakadaro havasati vanzwisisa nzira yechokwadi yevhangeri uye vakanyengerwa nekukanganisa kwavo. Kana vaine “Mweya Mutsvene” mukati mavo, havambofi vakarangarira “ropa roMwanakomana waMwari” sechinhuwo zvacho; Rudyi? → Kana iwe "wakazvarwa patsva" → haudi vamwe kuti vakudzidzise, nekuti "kuzodza" kuchakudzidzisa zvekuita! Naizvozvo, unofanira kubva kwavari → "pinda" "chechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu" inoparidza evhangeri uye inotaura chokwadi → kuitira kuti iwe ugone: kumutswa, kuberekwa patsva, kuponeswa, kuva noupenyu, kugamuchira mbiri, kugamuchira mibayiro. , kugamuchira korona, uye mune ramangwana Rumuko rwakanaka zvikuru! Ameni. Unonzwisisa here? Chirevo - VaHebheru 10:29 naJohani 1:26-27.

(4) Mudzimu unoshumira wengirozi

VaHebheru 1:14 Angel Havasi vese here Mweya webasa , vakatumwa kuzoshumira avo vachagara nhaka yoruponeso?

Cherechedza: Jesu Kristu akaberekwa → Ngirozi dzakaunza mashoko akanaka kuna Maria nevafudzi apo Herodhi akatambudzwa, ngirozi dzakadzivirira Maria nemhuri yake kuti vatize, uye ngirozi dzakauya kuzomubatira; isu, uye ngirozi dzakawedzera simba Rake → nokuti tinotenda muvhangeri uye tinonzwisisa chokwadi → pashure pokuberekwazve noruponeso → inhengo dzomuviri wake, “pfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake”! Ameni. Tine muviri nehupenyu hwaKristu → "munhu wese" anorindwa nengirozi dzinoshumira. Ameni! Hareruya! Kana munhu asina muviri neupenyu hwaKristu, hapazovi nekuchengetwa kwengirozi. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Hama nehanzvadzi dzinofanira “kunyatsoteerera nokuteerera nokunzwisisa” - kuti dzinzwisise mashoko aMwari! horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Tsananguro yemibvunzo yakaoma: Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJesu, uye neMweya Mutsvene
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Mateo Chitsauko 3 uye ndima 16 tiverenge pamwe chete: Jesu akabhabhatidzwa uye pakarepo akabuda mumvura. Pakarepo denga rakamuzarukira, uye akaona Mweya waMwari achiburuka senjiva akagara pamusoro pake. naRuka 3:22 Mweya Mutsvene akauya pamusoro pake akaita senjiva; . "

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJesu, Mweya Mutsvene" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi ane hunhu [kereke] anotumira vashandi kuti vatakure chikafu kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure mudenga, uye agogovera chikafu kwatiri nenguva kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJesu, noMweya Mutsvene vose Mweya mumwe! Tose tinobhabhatidzwa noMweya mumwe chete, tova muviri mumwe, uye nokunwa Mweya mumwe! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJesu, Mweya Mutsvene

(1) Mudzimu waMwari

Vhura Johani 4:24 moverenga pamwe chete → Mwari mweya (kana pasina shoko), saka vanomunamata vanofanira kumunamata mumweya nomuzvokwadi. Genesi 1:2 ... Mweya waMwari wakanga uchigarira pamusoro pemvura. Isaya 11:2 Mweya waJehovha uchagara pamusoro pake, mweya wouchenjeri nokunzwisisa, mweya wamano nesimba, mweya wokuziva nokutya Jehovha. Ruka 4:18 “Mweya waShe uri pamusoro pangu, nokuti wakandizodza kuti ndiparidzire varombo Evhangeri; 2 VaKorinte 3:17 Ishe ndiye Mweya; uye pane Mweya waShe, pane kusununguka. .

[Cherechedza]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti → [Mwari] mudzimu (kana kuti haana shoko), kureva kuti, → Mwari mudzimu → Mudzimu waMwari unofamba pamusoro pemvura → basa rokusika. Nzvera muBhaibheri riri pamusoro apa rinoti “Mudzimu” → “Mudzimu waMwari, Mudzimu waJehovha, Mudzimu waShe → Ishe Mudzimu” → Mweya worudzii [Mudzimu waMwari]? → Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri zvakare, Mateu 3:16 Jesu akabhabhatidzwa uye pakarepo akabuda mumvura. Pakarepo denga rakamuzarukira, uye akaona mweya wamwari Zvakaita sokunge njiva yaburuka ndokumhara pamusoro pake. Ruka 2:22 Mweya Mutsvene akaburukira pamusoro pake nomufananidzo wenjiva; mvura, uye akapa Johane Mubhapatidzi saw → " mweya wamwari “Senjiva inoburuka, yakamhara pana Jesu; Ruka anonyora → “Mweya Mutsvene "Akawira paari muchimiro chenjiva → seizvi, [ mweya wamwari → Ndizvozvo "Mweya Mutsvene" ! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Mudzimu waJesu

Ngatidzidzei Mabasa 16:7 Pavakasvika kumuganhu weMisia, vaida kuenda kuBhitiniya, →” mweya wajesu “Asi havana kubvumirwa kuita saizvozvo.” 1 Petro 1:11 inonzvera mavari “Mweya waKristu” uyo unofanozivisa nguva nomutoo wokutambudzika kwaKristu nokubwinya kunozotevera.” VaGal 4:6 Sezvo uri Mwanakomana, Mwari akatuma "iye", Jesu →" mweya wemwanakomana “Pindai mumwoyo yenyu (pakutanga) mucheme kuti, “Abba! baba! "; VaRoma 8:9 kana" Mweya waMwari" Kana ikagara mauri, hausisiri wenyama asi we“Mweya”. Ani nani asina “waKristu” haazi waKristu.

[Cherechedza]: Ndakairekodha nokunzvera magwaro ari pamusoro apa → 1 " Mweya waJesu, Mweya waKristu, Mweya weMwanakomana waMwari → Huya mumwoyo yedu , 2 VaRoma 8:9 mweya wamwari "→ garai mumwoyo yenyu, 3 1 VaKorinte 3:16 Hamuzivi here kuti muri temberi yaMwari," mweya wamwari "→ Munogara mamuri here? 1 VaKorinte 6:19 Hamuzivi here kuti miviri yenyu itembere dzoMweya Mutsvene? Mweya Mutsvene ] anobva kuna Mwari → uye anogara mamuri → saka, “Mudzimu waMwari, Mudzimu waJesu, Mudzimu waKristu, Mudzimu woMwanakomana waMwari,” → ndiko Mweya Mutsvene ! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(3) Mweya Mutsvene mumwe chete

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Johane 15:26 Asi kana Munyaradzi asvika, wandichatuma kubva kuna Baba, Mweya wechokwadi, unobuda kuna Baba, uchapupura nezvangu. Chitsauko 16 Vhesi 13 Kana “Mweya wazvokwadi” wauya, uchakutungamirirai mu (pakutanga, mu) zvokwadi yose 1 Vakorinde 12 Ndima 4 Kune zvakasiyana-siyana zvezvipo, asi “Mweya mumwe chete; VaEfeso 4:4 Kune muviri mumwe chete no“Mweya mumwe,” sezvamakadanirwa kutariro imwe chete. 1 VaKorinde 11:13 vose vanobhabhatidzwa no“Mweya Mutsvene mumwe chete” vova muviri mumwe, vachinwa “Mudzimu Mutsvene mumwe chete” → Ishe mumwe, kutenda kumwe chete, rubhabhatidzo rumwe chete, Mwari mumwe chete, Baba vavose, ari pamusoro pavose, ari pamusoro pavose . munhu wose uye agere mumunhu wose. → 1 VaKorinte 6:17 Asi ani naani akasanganiswa naShe ava mweya mumwe naShe .

[Ona]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti → Mwari mudzimu → "Mweya waMwari, Mweya waJehovha, Mweya waIshe, Mweya waJesu, Mweya waKristu, Mweya weMwanakomana waMwari, Mweya wechokwadi" → Ndizvozvo" Mweya Mutsvene ". mudzimu mutsvene mumwe chete , tose takazvarwa patsva uye takabhabhatidzwa kubva ku“Mweya Mutsvene mumwe”, takava muviri mumwe chete, muviri waKristu, uye tikanwa kubva kuMweya Mutsvene mumwe → kudya nokunwa zvokudya zvomudzimu zvakafanana nemvura yomudzimu! → Ishe mumwe, nokutenda kumwe, norubhabhatidzo rumwe, Mwari mumwe naBaba vavose, pamusoro pavose, nomuna vose, nomuna vose. Chinotibatanidza naShe kuva mweya mumwe naShe → "Mweya Mutsvene" ! Ameni. → saka" 1 Mweya waMwari Mweya Mutsvene, 2 Mweya waJesu ndiMweya Mutsvene, 3 Mweya uri mumoyo yedu ndiwo Mweya Mutsvene” . Ameni!

Ziva kuti [hazvisi] kuti “mweya wenyama” waAdamu mumwe noMweya Mutsvene, kwete kuti mweya wemunhu ndimumwe noMweya Mutsvene Unonzwisisa here?

Hama nehanzvadzi dzinofanira “kunyatsoteerera nokuteerera nokunzwisisa” - kuti dzinzwisise mashoko aMwari! horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Tsanangudzo yemibvunzo yakaoma: Pakutanga, kwaiva neTao chii?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Johane chitsauko 1 ndima 1-2 tiverenge pamwe chete: Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Chii chinonzi Tao 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Vakadzi vakanaka [machechi] vanotumira vashandi - Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Pakutanga kwaiva neTao, uye Tao aiva naMwari, uye Tao aiva →Mwari. Shoko rakava nyama → rakanzi Jesu, iro vaapostora vakanzwa, vakaona, vakaona nameso avo vamene, uye vakaribata namaoko avo vamene → pakuvamba kwakanga kune shoko roupenyu, uye uhu upenyu hwakaziviswa kupfurikidza na“Jesu”! Ameni .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Pakutanga kwaiva neTao Chii chinonzi Tao?

(1) Tao ndiMwari

Ngatinzverei Johane 1:1-2 toiverenga pamwe chete: Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. Cherechedza: "Taichu" → yekare, yekare, yekutanga, yakazvimiririra, shandisa "Taichu" " iri → 【 Mwari]! Nemamwe mashoko, kwaiva naMwari “pakutanga”! Ameni. “Shoko” iri rakanga riina Mwari pakutanga→ “Pakutanga kusika, zvinhu zvose zvisati zvasikwa, ndakanga ndiripo . Kubva pakusingaperi, kubva pakutanga, Nyika isati yavapo, ndakasimbiswa. Chirevo - Zvirevo 8:22-23 . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Shoko rakazova nyama

Johane 1:14 Shoko rakazova nyama, rikagara pakati pedu, rizere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba.

(3) Shoko rakava nyama uye rakanzi Jesu Akaberekwa neMhandara Maria uye akaberekwa neMweya Mutsvene.

Mateo 1:20-21...nokuti icho chakaitwa maari chakabva ku“Mweya Mutsvene”. Iye achabereka mwanakomana, uye unofanira kumutumidza zita rokuti Jesu, nokuti ndiye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. "

(4) Hapana akamboona Mwari Mwari Baba vakazivisa Mwari kuburikidza neMwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga.

JOHANE 1:18 Hakuna akamboona Mwari, asi Mwanakomana Iye Mumwe Oga, ari pachifuva chaBaba, ndiye akamuratidza.

(5) Ngakuve nemararamiro

1 Johane 1:1-2 inotaura nezveshoko rokutanga roupenyu kubvira pakutanga, ratakanzwa, kuona, kuona nameso edu, uye kubatwa namaoko edu → “Upenyu” uhwu hwave huri kupfurikidza noMwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe bedzi [Jesu. ] vakaonekwa, vaapostora vakazvionawo, uye zvino vanopupura, vachikupa upenyu husingaperi hwaiva naBaba uye hwakaonekwa nesu! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(6) Upenyu huri maari, uye upenyu uhu chiedza chomunhu

Johwani 1 4 Maari maiva noupenyu, uye upenyu hwaiva chiedza chavanhu. Ndima 9 Chiedza ndicho chiedza chechokwadi, chinopa chiedza kumunhu wose anogara panyika → Jesu akati kumunhu wose, "Ndini chiedza chenyika. Ani naani anonditevera haangatongofambi murima, asi achava nechiedza choupenyu. " Reference - Johane Chitsauko 8 ndima 12.

(7) Jesu ndiye mufananidzo wechokwadi weunhu hwaMwari

Ndiye kupenya kwokubwinya kwaMwari, “mufananidzo waMwari wechokwadi,” uye anotsigira zvinhu zvose nomurayiro wake une simba. Shure kwokunge achenesa vanhu kubva kuzvivi zvavo, akagara pasi kuruoko rworudyi rwaChangamire kudenga. Chirevo - VaHebheru 1 ndima 3.

[Cherechedza]: Kupfurikidza nokunzvera zvinyorwa zvorugwaro zviri pamusoro apa → 1 Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga [ mwari ] → 2 Shoko rakava nyama, kureva kuti, “Mwari” akava nyama 【 Jesu 】 Zita rake rinoreva kuponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo. . Ameni! → Vose vaakagamuchira, akavapa simba rokuti vave vana vaMwari, kuna avo vakatenda kuzita rake. "Kugamuchirwa" → "Shoko" Jesu akava nyama! Ishe Jesu vakati, “Kana musingadyi nokunwa nyama neropa roMwanakomana woMunhu, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu ane upenyu husingaperi, uye ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira. → Kana tichidya nokunwa” Ishe “nyama” uye “ropa raShe”, tine “shoko” raJesu uye rakava muviri noupenyu hwakaitwa munhu → Tinopfeka muviri noupenyu hwaKristu → Vanhu ava haana kuberekwa neropa, kwete neruchiva Haana kuberekwa nekuda kwemunhu, asi "akazvarwa patsva" kubva kuna Mwari ? Chitsauko 1 ndima 12-13 uye chitsauko 6 ndima 53-56 .

Chenjedzo: " Kuvhenekerwa munyama "→ dzidziso yenhema , dzidziso zhinji dzechechi nhasi dzakavakirwa paidi rokuti muviri waAdhama wakasikwa neguruva, Kuvimba nomutemo kukudziridza nyama, regai nyama ive Tao uye ive mudzimu . Izvi ndizvo zvawakadzidziswa ne "hofori dzemweya" dzechizvarwa chakapfuura. →Kana zviri izvo, ndeupi musiyano uripo pakati peizvi naSakyamuni akatambura nekuomerwa uye akarima muviri wake kuti ave Buddha? Iwe zvitaure! Rudyi? Zviri pachena kuti iyi idzidziso yenhema. → Inzwa saka "shoko rechokwadi - uye unzwisise shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yeruponeso rwako! Gamuchira chipikirwa [ Mweya Mutsvene ]. Ameni! Pashure pokunge tazvarwa patsva, tinotsamira pa“Mweya Mutsvene” kuti tinzwisise → kuti ndeapi mashoko anobva kuna “Mwari” mashoko iwayo anobva kuna “Satani” kuti aedze vanhu; Budai mudzidziso dzavo dzenhema → kuti tirege kuzova vana, takabatwa namano nokunyengera kwavanhu, tichipeperetswa kuno nokoko nemhepo ipi neipi yechihedheni, nokutevera dzidziso dzakatsauka - VaEfeso 4 Chitsauko 14.

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaJesu: Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Marko 12:29-31 Jesu akapindura: “Chokutanga ndechokuti: ‘Inzwa, haiwa iwe Israeri; Jehovha Mwari wedu ndiIshe mumwe chete. Ida Ishe Mwari wako nomwoyo wako wose, nomweya wako wose, nokufunga kwako kwose, uye nesimba rako rose. ’ Chechipiri ndechekuti: ‘Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita. ’ Hakuna murayiro mukuru kupfuura iyi miviri. . "

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Jesu rudo "Aihwa. sere Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] inotumira vashandi kuti vatakure chikafu kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure mudenga, uye kutipa kwatiri panguva yakakodzera, kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Jesu rudo! Rudo ndirwo runoda muvakidzani sezvaunozviita → nokuti anoteerera mirairo yaBaba vake vokudenga → uye anotipa muviri wake usingaori noupenyu kuti tive nhengo dzomuviri wake → “pfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake” → anoona "Munhu mutsva" watakazvarwa naMwari → muviri wake! Saka rudo rwaJesu → "ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita" . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Rudo rwaJesu nderwekuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita

“Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita” zvinoreva kuda vamwe sezvaunozviita. Usati wada vamwe, unofanira kutanga wadzidza kuzvida. Kana kubata vamwe nenzira imwe cheteyo yaunozviita iwe, uye ida vamwe nenzira imwe cheteyo yaunozviita iwe. Nheyo yokuti “ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita” inoreva kuti haufaniri kuvenga vamwe, asi kuva nehanya nevamwe nguva dzose. Confucius akamboti: "Usaitira vamwe zvausingadi kuti vamwe vakuitire." Kubva pamaonero asina kunaka, Confucius aidavira kuti zvausingadi zvichange zvisingadiwi nevamwe, saka hauzvimanikidzi pane vamwe. Izvi zvinoda kuti vanhu vatange kubata vamwe zvakanaka, kuva nehanya nevamwe, uye kuda vamwe zvisinei nezvavanoita Uyu ndiwo musimboti wokuti “ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita”.

Jesu akati" Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe "Chokwadi → Jesu akateerera kuda kwomurayiro waBaba ndokupa" pachake" mutsvene, asina chivi, asina chaanopomerwa, asina kusvibiswa, asingaori uye asingasvavi "muviri" uye "upenyu" kwatiri → nenzira iyi, isu Nemuviri uye hupenyu hwe Jesu, inzvimbo inogarwa yoMweya Mutsvene, temberi yoMweya Mutsvene → Baba vari muna Jesu, uye Baba vari mandiri → Baba vari muvanhu vose uye vanogara muvanhu vose → Jesu “anoona” Muviri wedu uye upenyu “kuzvionera” muviri noupenyu hwomunhu! "?

(1) Baba vanondida, ndinoda Baba

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Johani 10:17 Baba vangu vanondida, nokuti ndinoradzika upenyu hwangu pasi kuti ndihutorezve. Johani 17:23 Ini mavari uye imi mandiri, kuti vave vamwe vakakwana, kuti nyika izive kuti makandituma, uye kuti makavada sezvamakandida ini. 26 Ndakavaratidza zita renyu, uye ndicharizivisa kwavari, kuti rudo rwamakandida narwo ruve mavari, neni mavari.

[Cherechedza]: Ishe Jesu akati: “Baba vangu vanondida,” nokuti ndinoradzika upenyu hwangu pasi kuti ndihutorezve Ndine simba rokuutora zvakare. Uyu ndiwo murairo wandakagamuchira kubva kuna "Baba vangu". " kwatiri kana kuva wavo kubudikidza naKristu. Chokwadi chevhangeri "chakazvarwa patsva" uye chine hupenyu hwenyama hwaJesu → Ndokusaka Jesu akanyengetera kuna Baba: "Ini mavari uye imi mandiri, kuti vave vakakwana. mumwe, kuti nyika izive kuti makatuma, Uyai kwandiri, muzive kuti munoda ivo sezvamunondida ini. Ndakavaratidza zita renyu, uye ndicharizivisa kwavari, kuti rudo rwamakandida narwo ruve mavari, neni mavari. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Mateu 22:37-40 toiverenga tose: Jesu akati kwaari, “Ida Ishe Mwari wako nomwoyo wako wose, nomweya wako wose, uye nepfungwa dzako dzose murayiro wechipiri wakafanana unoti, “Ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe.” Iyi mirayiro miviri ndiyo nheyo yomurayiro wose navaporofita muvakidzani sezvaunozviita.” Revhitiko 19:18 Usatsiva, kana kunyunyutira vanhu vokwako, asi ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe. ndini Jehovha.

[Cherechedza] : Nokudzidza magwaro ari pamusoro apa, Ishe Jesu akati: “Ida Ishe Mwari wako nomwoyo wako wose, nomweya wako wose, nokufunga kwako kwose. Ndiwo murayiro mukuru nowokutanga; , “Ida muvakidzani wako” “Sezvaunozviita” murayiro wokutanga munoda Jehovha Mwari wenyu; murayiro wechipiri Zvinoreva kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita! Ameni. Baba Vekudenga vanoda Jesu, uye Jesu anoda Baba → Nokuti Jesu anoteerera kuda kwaBaba Vekudenga uye anopa muviri neupenyu Hwake “hutsvene, husina chivi uye husingaori”! Akazvipa kuti “apiwe” kwatiri, kuti isu “tinotenda” maari, kureva vaya “vanoita” kuda kwake, tigamuchire uye tigamuchire muviri noupenyu hwaKristu, ndiko kuti, tipfeke hutsva. munhu ndokupfeka Kristu. Tarisa kuna Johani 1:12-13 uye VaG. 3:26-27 → “Munhu mutsva” wedu anopfekedzwa muviri noupenyu hwaKristu. →Iyi itemberi yeMweya Mutsvene uye nzvimbo yekugara yeMweya Mutsvene! Ameni. Mweya Mutsvene "hauzogari" mumuviri waAdamu - hombodo yekare yewaini unonzwisisa here? Dzidza zvakawanda ndapota Kudzokera kune zvandakambotaura [Waini itsva inoiswa muhombodo itsva]

→ Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu kuna Tomasi: “Aona ini aona Baba; ini ndiri muna Baba, uye Baba vari mandiri → Nokuti Mwari Baba vane ngoni norudo! Kuburikidza neshoko rechokwadi reevhangeri. kwaJesu Kristu-"kuzvarwa patsva" kwedu , kuti tive nomuviri noupenyu hwaKristu→Nenzira iyi, Baba vari muna Jesu uye matiri → "Mwari wedu ndiye Mwari mumwe chete wechokwadi." Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 4:6. →Apo Jesu "anoona" miviri yedu nekurarama, "anoona" muviri wake nehupenyu! Nokuti isu tiri nhengo dzomuviri wake → pfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake! Kristu anotida sezvaanozviita! Ameni → izvi Ichi ndicho chokwadi chezvakataurwa naJesu: “Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita. Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 5:30.

Iva wakangwarira “kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe” Jesu chete ndiye anogona kuratidza rudo rwaBaba. Adhamu, achidzidzisa hama nehanzvadzi mashandisiro anoita nyama yekare yomunhu ku- Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe, kwete maererano naKristu, sezvaunodzidziswa nedzidziso uye nounyengeri husina maturo → Chenjera kuti urege kudzidziswa nedzidziso uye nounyengeri husina maturo, kuti urege dzidziswai nedzidziso uye nekunyengera kusina maturo, kwete maererano naKristu, asi maererano netsika dzevanhu uye nedzidziso dzekutanga dzenyika. Vanondinamata pasina nokuti vanodzidzisa vanhu mirayiro yavo sedzidziso. ’” Nongedzera kuna Mateo 15:9 naVaKorose 2:8.

Ishe Jesu vanotipa murairo mutsva [ dananai ] Johane 13 Chitsauko 34-35 Murairo mutsva ndinopa kwamuri, kuti mudanane; sezvandakakudai, nemiwo mudanane. Naizvozvi vose vachaziva kuti muri vadzidzi vangu, kana mune rudo pakati penyu. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaKristu: asingadi kuti chero ani zvake aparare, asi kuti vose vaponeswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri tiverenge pamwe chete: 2 Petro chitsauko 3 ndima 9 Chipikirwa chaIshe hachisati chazadziswa, uye vamwe vanhu vanofunga kuti ari kunonoka, asi anoshivirira pamusoro pako, haadi kuti chero munhu aparare, asi anoda kuti munhu wese atendeuke ! Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Jesu rudo "Aihwa. nomwe Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [chechi] anotumira vashandi kuti vatakure zvokudya kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure mudenga, uye anotigovera zvokudya nenguva kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya! Rudo rwenyu rukuru runoratidzwa uye chokwadi cheevhangeri chinoratidzwa. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Rudo rwaJesu harudi kuti munhu aparare, Saka Vanhu vose ngavaponeswe

(1) Rudo rwaJesu harudi kuti chero ani zvake aparare

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge 2 Petro 3:8-10 pamwe chete Ishe havasati vazadzisa chivimbiso chavo, uye vamwe vanofunga kuti ari kunonoka, asi chokwadi haanonoki, asi ane mwoyo murefu nemi, asingashuvi kuti chero ani zvake aparare, asi kuti vose vasvike pakutendeuka. Asi zuva raShe richauya sembavha. Pazuva iroro matenga achapfuura nokutinhira kukuru, uye zvinhu zvose zvinooneka zvichapiswa nomoto, uye nyika nezvose zviri mairi zvichapiswa.

[Cherechedza]: Nokudzidza zvinyorwa zviri pamusoro apa, muapostora “Petro” akati: “Hama dzinodiwa, musakanganwa chinhu chimwe chete: kunaShe zuva rimwe rakaita sechiuru chamakore, uye chiuru chamakore chakaita sezuva rimwe chete → tinoona kuti muumambo hwaMwari, upenyu husingaperi. Kunenge kusisina kuchema, kunenge kusisina kurwara, kana kurwadziwa, →“Denga idzva nenyika itsva” zvakavimbiswa naJehovha hazvisati zvazadzika . Vamwe vanhu vanofunga kuti kunonoka, asi hakusi kunonoka, asi chishuwo → tenda muvhangeri "Vhangeri" richashandura hupenyu hwako, ugopfeka munhu mutsva uye ugova iye Vana vaMwari nenzira iyi chete mungagara nhaka umambo hwaMwari uye mugogara nhaka yaBaba vokudenga! muTestamende Yekare.” "→Nezuva iro denga richapfuura nokutinhira kukuru, uye zvinhu zvose zvichaparadzwa nomoto, uye nyika nezvose zviri mairi zvichapiswa. Asi isu "vakaberekwa naMwari" sezvaakapikira, Tichitarisira denga idzva nenyika itsva, kupinda muumambo husingaperi hwakavimbiswa naIshe → umo kururama kuchagara Ameni.

(2) Vanhu vose ngavaponeswe uye vanzwisise nzira yechokwadi

Ngatidzidzei 1 Timotio chitsauko 2 ndima 1-6 mubhaibheri uye tiverenge pamwe chete: Ndinokukurudzirai, kutanga kune zvese, kuti muite mikumbiro, minyengetero, kureverera uye kuvonga pamusoro pemunhu wese, kunyangwe kumadzimambo uye kune vese vane masimba kuti tirarame upenyu hwoumwari, nokururama, norugare. Izvi zvakanaka uye zvinogamuchirika pamberi paMwari Muponesi wedu. Anoda kuti vanhu vose vaponeswe uye vanzwisise nzira yechokwadi . Nokuti kunongova naMwari mumwe chete, nomurevereri mumwe chete pakati paMwari navanhu, ndiye munhu Kristu Jesu, akazvipa sorudzikinuro kuvanhu vose, sezvinoratidzwa panguva yakafanira. Johani 3:16-17 “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi (kana kududzira: kutonga nyika; zvakafanana pazasi) ndiko kuti nyika iponeswe kubudikidza naye.

[Cherechedza]: Nokudzidza magwaro ari pamusoro apa, muapostora “Pauro” akakurudzira Hama Timotio → ndinokukurudzira kuti utange wateterera, unyengetere, ureverere, uye uonge vanhu vose! Saizvozvovo madzimambo navose vane simba, kuti isu, vana vaMwari, tirarame upenyu hworugare nokunamata Mwari. Izvi zvakanaka uye zvinogamuchirika kuna Mwari. →Mwari wedu anoda kuti munhu wose atendeuke → kutenda vhangeri uye kunzwisisa chokwadi→anoda kuti munhu wose aponeswe. Ameni! Nokuti vhangeri isimba raMwari uye rinoda munhu wose anotenda! Ameni. →Mwari akada nyika zvokuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga “Jesu” kwavari, kuti ani naani anotenda maari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. Nokuti Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake “Jesu” munyika kuti arege kuzopa nyika mhosva (kana kushandurwa kuti: kutonga nyika; mumwe ari pasi apa), asi kuti nyika iponeswe kubudikidza naye. →Munhu wose atendeuke→Tendai evhangeri munzwisise chokwadi→Hama dzinodiwa naShe,tinofanira kugara tichitenda Mwari nokuda kwenyu,nekuti akakusarudzai kubva pakutanga kuti muitwe vatsvene noMweya Mutsvene nokutenda mukutenda,Mugoponeswa. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ona 2 VaT. 2:13.

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaJesu: Mwana anoratidza chokwadi chevhangeri
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:14-15 toiverenga pamwe chete: Nekuti rudo rwaKristu runotimanikidza; live.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Jesu rudo "Aihwa. nhanhatu Taura uye upe munamato: Vanodiwa Abba Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi ane hunhu [kereke] anotumira vashandi kuti vatakure chikafu kubva kure kuenda kudenga, uye agogovera chikafu kwatiri nenguva kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Zvinoratidza kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira! Nokuti tinofunga - sepfuma yakaiswa mumudziyo wevhu, "pfuma" icharatidza nzira yechokwadi yevhangeri, uye dai vanhu vose vaponeswa. ! Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Jesu kufanana excitation Isu, “Mwana” tinoburitsa chokwadi chevhangeri

Ngatidzidzei 2 VaKorinte 5:14-15 muBhaibheri uye tiiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti rudo rwaKristu runotimanikidza, nokuti tinorangarira kuti sezvo mumwe akafira vose, vose vakafa nokuda kwavose; uyo akavafira uye akamukazve nokuda kwavo. Uye 2 VaKorinde 4:7-10 pfuma iyi tinayo mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari kwete kwatiri. Tinokomberedzwa navavengi kumativi ose, asi hatina kubatwa nemisungo, asi hatinyadziswi, asi hatina kurashwa; Tinogara takatakura rufu rwaJesu nesu kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri.

[Cherechedza]: Nokudzidza magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinoona kuti rudo rwaKristu runotikurudzira; Ameni. Tine “pfuma” iyi yakaiswa mumidziyo yevhu kuratidza kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari, kwete kubva kwatiri, asi hatibatiswi, asi hatinyadziswi; , asi hatinyadziswi; Tinogara takatakura rufu rwaJesu nesu kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri. Ameni!

(1) Mucheche anozivisa vhangeri

Chii chinonzi evhangeri? Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Ruka 24:44-48 Jesu akati kwavari, “Izvi ndizvo zvandakakuvudzai ndichiri nemi: zvakanyorwa muMurayiro waMozisi, naVaprofita nomuMapisarema, kuti, “Zvose zvinotaurwa pamusoro pangu. zvinofanira kuitika.” Ipapo Jesu akazarura ndangariro dzavo kuti vanzwisise Magwaro, uye akati kwavari, “Kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: Kristu akatambudzika uye akamuka kubva kuvakafa pazuva retatu; yakaparidzwa muzita rake kumarudzi ose, kutanga paJerusarema, uye imi muri zvapupu zvezvinhu izvi, uye vhuraiwo kuna 1 VaKorinde 15:3-4, iyo yandakaparidzawo yenyu: Kutanga, Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neBhaibheri akavigwa, uye akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neBhaibheri.

[Cherechedza]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti “Ishe Jesu” pachake akati: “Zvose zvakanyorwa pamusoro pangu muMutemo waMosesi, naVaprofita, nomuMapisarema zvinofanira kuzadziswa maererano nezvakanyorwa mumagwaro, iye Kristu uchatambudzika agomuka kuvakafa nezuva retatu, uye kutendeuka nokuregererwa kwezvivi kuchaparidzirwa kumarudzi ose muzita rake, kutanga paJerusarema. Imi muri zvapupu zvezvinhu izvi! Ameni.

uye muapostora “Pauro” uyo akaparidza evhangeri yoruponeso kuvaHedheni → Zvandakakuparidziraiwo zvaiva: chokutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu maererano neMagwaro, → 1 kuti tisunungurwe pachivi, 2. Kuputsa murayiro nechituko chomurairo-ona vaRoma 6:6-7 naVaRoma 7:6. Uye akavigwa → 3 Kubvisa munhu wekare nezviito zvake - nongedzera kuna VaKorose 3:9; →kumuka kwaKristu kunotiruramisa! Ameni. Ona VaRoma 4:25 . Sezvinotaura Bhaibheri muna 1 Petro Chitsauko 1:3-5 - kuburikidza ne "kumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa", tinozvarwa patsva → "isu", Ameni! kuti tive netariro mhenyu, kuti tive nenhaka isingaori, isina kusvibiswa, isingasvavi, yakachengeterwa imwi kudenga. Iwe unochengetwa nesimba raMwari kubudikidza nokutenda uchagamuchira ruponeso rwakagadzirirwa kuratidzwa munguva yekupedzisira. Iri ndiro vhangeri rakaparidzwa naIshe Jesu → vaapositori Pauro, Petro nevamwe vaapositori. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Nzira yechokwadi yepfuma inoratidzwa

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Johane Chitsauko 1:1-2 Pakutanga Shoko rakanga riripo, uye Shoko rakanga riri kuna Mwari, uye Shoko rakanga riri Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riri kuna Mwari kubva pakutanga. Ndima 14 Shoko rakazova nyama, rikagara pakati pedu, rizere nenyasha nechokwadi. uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe woga waBaba. Vhesi 18 Hakuna wakatongoona Mwari, kunze kweMwanakomana wakaberekwa umwe woga, uri pachifuva chaBaba. 1 Johani 1:1-2 maererano neshoko roupenyu, rakanga riripo kubva pakutanga, ratakanzwa, nokuona, nokuona nameso edu, nokuribata namaoko edu. (Upenyu uhwu hwakaratidzwa, uye takahuona, uye zvino tinopupura kuti tinokuparidzirai upenyu husingaperi hwakanga huri kuna Baba uye hwakaonekwa nesu.) Maererano noMweya woutsvene, nokumuka kubva kuvakafa. Akaratidzwa kuva Mwanakomana waMwari nesimba guru. Ona VaRoma 1:4.

[Cherechedza]: Pakutanga kwakanga kune Tao, uye Tao akanga ana Mwari, uye Tao akanga ari Mwari. Shoko iri rakanga riina Mwari pakutanga → rakava nyama, rakanambwa neMhandara Maria uye rakaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene, uye rakanzi Jesu! Ameni. Akadaro muapostora Johani! Pamusoro pemararamiro apakuvamba kubva pakutanga, takanzwa, takaona, takaona nameso edu timene, uye kubata namaoko edu timene. (Upenyu uhwu hwakaratidzwa, takahuona, uye zvino ndinopupura kuti ndinopa kwamuri upenyu husingaperi, hwaiva kuna Baba, hukaonekwa kwatiri). Patakamutswa pamwe chete naKristu → takagamuchira muviri noupenyu zvaJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana anodiwa waMwari → tine “pfuma” iyi yakaiswa mumidziyo yevhu kuti “iratidze” kuti simba guru iri rinobva kuna Mwari, kwete kwatiri. …Tinogara tichitakura matiri rufu rwaJesu, kuti hupenyu hwaJesu huratidzwewo matiri. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ona 2 VaKorinte 4:7, 10.

OK! Apa ndipo pandinogovera kuyanana kwangu nemi nhasi. Unofanira kuimbawo nomweya wako, uchirumbidza nomweya wako, nokupa zvibayiro zvinonhuhwira kuna Mwari. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari Baba, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaKristu: kutiita vadyi venhaka yaBaba vedu Vekudenga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni. Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaHebheru chitsauko 9 ndima 15 Nokuda kwechikonzero ichi, akava murevereri wesungano itsva.

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Rudo rwaJesu" Aihwa. shanu Ngatinamatei: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! mukadzi akanaka [Chechi] inotumira vashandi kuti vauye nechikafu kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure uye kutipa kwatiri nenguva, kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Kristu akava murevereri wesungano itsva sezvo akafa kuti adzikinure avo vari musungano yokutanga ndokupinda musungano itsva, akaita kuti vakadanwa vagare nhaka yenhaka isingagumi yakapikirwa naAbha, Baba Vokudenga. . Ameni! Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Rudo rwaJesu runoita kuti tive vadyi venhaka yenhaka yaBaba isingaperi

(1) Nhaka yevanakomana haigoni kugara nhaka;

Tendeuka uverenge Genesisi 21:9-10 → Ipapo Sara akaona Hagari muIjipiti achiseka mwanakomana waAbrahamu, akati kuna Abrahamu, “Dzinga murandasikana uyu nomwanakomana wake! Isaka.” Zvino vhura VaGaratia chitsauko 4 ndima 30. Asi Bhaibheri rinotii? Inoti: "Dzinga murandakadzi nemwanakomana wake! Nokuti mwanakomana wemurandakadzi haangavi mudyi wenhaka pamwe nemwanakomana wewakasununguka."

Cherechedza: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti mwanakomana akaberekwa no“murandakadzi” Hagari akazvarwa maererano ne“ropa” mwanakomana akaberekwa nomukadzi akasununguka “Sarah” akaberekwa maererano nechipikirwa. Ava ndivo “vakadzi” vaviri vanova zvisungo zviviri → Testamende Yekare neTestamente Itsva. Testamende yekare →Vana vanoberekwa vanoberekwa ne“ropa”, uye pasi pomurairo, ivo “varanda, varanda vechivi” uye “havagoni” kugara nhaka, naizvozvo vana venyama vanofanira kudzingwa;

Testamende Itsva →Vana vanozvarwa ne "mukadzi akasununguka" vanozvarwa ne "chipikirwa" kana "kuberekwa neMweya Mutsvene". Vaya vanozvarwa maererano nenyama → “Nyama yedu yekare ndeyenyama” vachatambudza vaya vakaberekwa nomudzimu → “vakaberekwa naMwari”, saka tinofanira kudzinga vaya vakaberekwa nenyama uye regai avo “vakazvarwa nomukadzi akasununguka” ndiko kuti, The → “munhu mutsva” woMweya Mutsvene agare nhaka yaBaba. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Handinzwisise. Ndinofanira kuiteerera kakawanda! Ameni.

Nyama yedu yekare yohunhu inoberekwa navabereki vedu, yakasikwa neguruva sa“Adhama”, akaberekwa nenzira yenyama → akaberekwa nechivi, akaberekwa pasi pomutemo, tiri varanda vechivi, uye hatigoni kugara nhaka youmambo hwokudenga. . →Tarisa kuna Pisarema 51:5 ndakaberekerwa muchivi, amai vangu vakanga vari muchivi kubvira pandakanambwa. → Naizvozvo, munhu wedu wekare anofanira kubhabhatidzwa muna Kristu uye kurovererwa pamwe naye kuti aparadze muviri wechivi uye kutiza kubva mumuviri uyu werufu. Vakazvarwa no“mukadzi akasununguka” → 1 vazvarwe nemvura noMweya Mutsvene, 2 vazvarwe neevhangeri yaJesu Kristu, 3 vave “munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari, agare nhaka yaBaba Vekudenga. . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Zvakavakirwa pamurairo kwete pachipikirwa

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaGaratia 3:18 Nokuti kana nhaka ichibva kumurayiro, haibvi nokuda kwechipikirwa; naVaRoma 4:14 Kana vari vomurayiro vari vadyi venhaka, kutenda hakuna maturo, nechipikirwa chinokoneswa.

Cherechedzo: Zvinoenderana nemutemo kwete kubva pachivimbiso, ndakazvigovana nehama dzangu mumagazini yapfuura. Nhasi chinhu chikuru kuita kuti vakoma nehanzvadzi vanzwisise kuti vangagara sei nhaka yaBaba Vekudenga. Nemhaka yokuti mutemo unomutsa hasha dzaMwari, avo vakaberekwa nenzira yenyama varanda vechivi uye havagoni kugara nhaka yenhaka yaBaba bedzi → “vakaberekwa mukuwirirana nechipikirwa” kana kuti “vakaberekwa noMutsvene; Mweya" ndivo chete vana vaMwari uye vana vaMwari vanokwanisa kugara nhaka yaBaba vavo Vekudenga. Avo vari vemurairo varanda vechivi uye havagoni kugara nhaka → ivo vemurairo uye kwete vechipikirwa → avo vemurairo vanoparadzaniswa naKristu uye vanowa kubva panyasha → vakabvisa zvikomborero zvakavimbiswa naMwari. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(3) Isu tiri nhaka yaBaba vedu Vokudenga

Dhuteronomi 4:20 Jehovha akakubudisai kubva muIjipiti, muvira resimbi, kuti akuitirei vanhu venhaka yenyu sezvamuri nhasi. Chitsauko 9 Ndima 29 Zvirokwazvo, ndivo vanhu venyu nenhaka yenyu, vamakabudisa nesimba renyu noruoko rwakatambanudzwa. Vhura VaEfeso 1:14 zvakare uyu Mweya Mutsvene rubatso (rugwaro rwekutanga: nhaka) yenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe. VaHebheru 9:15 Nokuda kwaizvozvi akava murevereri wesungano itsva, kuti avo vakadanwa vagogamuchira nhaka yakapikirwa isingaperi, vakafa kuti vayananisire zvivi zvakaitwa pasi pesungano yokutanga.

Cherechedza: MuTesitamende Yekare → Jehovha Mwari akabudisa vaIsraeri muIjipiti uye muchoto chesimbi, varanda vechivi pasi pomutemo → kuti vave vanhu vanokosha venhaka yaMwari. vose vasingatendi vaiva Renje rokubhuroka → rinoshanda seyambiro kune avo vari mumazuva okupedzisira. Vana vatinobereka kubudikidza nechipikirwa cho“kutenda” → “Mudzimu Mutsvene” ufakazi hwenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari → nhaka yaMwari yadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe. Ameni! Nokuti Jesu ndiye murevereri wesungano itsva, akafira pamuchinjikwa nokuda kwezvivi zvedu → kuregererwa kwezvivi zvedu. kugadzwa kwapfuura “Ndiko kuti, sungano yomurayiro, iyo avo vakanga vari pasi pomutemo vakadzikinurwa nayo → kubva muchivi nomumutemo → uye avo vakadanwa vakabvumirwa kupinda. Testamende Itsva “Gamuchirai nhaka isingaperi yakavimbiswa . Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaJesu: kutipa ufana
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure maBhaibheri edu kuna VaEfeso 1:3-5 toaverenga pamwe chete: Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Akatiropafadza nokuropafadzwa kwose kwomweya munzvimbo dzokudenga muna Kristu: Mwari sezvaakatisarudza maari nyika isati yavambwa kuti tive vatsvene uye vasina chavangapomerwa pamberi pake nokuda kworudo rwake kwatiri, akatisarudza maari isu kuti tiitwe savanakomana kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, maererano nomufaro wokuda kwake. . Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Jesu rudo "Aihwa. 4 Ngatinamatei: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] inotumira vashandi kuti vatakure zvokudya kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure mudenga, uye kutipa zvokudya panguva yakafanira, kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa kuti Mwari vakatisarudza muna Kristu nyika isati yavambwa. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Tinowana sei kuva vanakomana vaMwari?

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaGaratia Chitsauko 4:1-7 Ndakati avo vanotora nhaka ye“umambo hwokudenga” kunyange zvazvo vari ivo varidzi venhaka yose, “pavakanga vari “vana” inoreva nguva yavakagara nhaka. vaiva pasi pemutemo uye vaiva varanda vechivi→- -Umbwende uye chikoro chepuraimari chisina basa, unoda here kuva muranda wake zvakare? 21 Asi hapana musiyano pakati pake nemuranda, asi tenzi ndiye “mutemo” uye mutariri ari pasi pake akamirira kusvikira baba vake vasvika panguva yakatarwa. Zvimwe chetezvo patakanga tiri "vana" uye taitongwa nechikoro chepuraimari → "mutemo". Apo kuzara kwenguva kwakasvika, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nomukadzi anonzi Mhandara Maria, uyo akaberekwa pasi pomutemo → Sezvo mutemo wakanga usina simba kupfurikidza nenyama uye waisagona kuita chimwe chinhu, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, uyo Akava Kufanana kwemuviri wechivi wakashanda sechipiriso chechivi uye chivi chakapomerwa panyama - tarisa vaRoma 8:3.

(2) Takaberekwa tiri pasi pomutemo, tichidzikinura vari pasi pomutemo kuti tigamuchire vanakomana

Kunyange zvazvo “Jesu” akaberekwa ari pasi pomurayiro, nokuti haana chivi uye mutsvene, haazi womutemo. Saka, unonzwisisa here? →Mwari akaita “Jesu” asina chivi kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu →kuti adzikinure vari pasi pomurairo kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vanakomana. →"Cherechedza: Kugamuchirwa sevanakomana ndiko 1 kusunungurwa pamurairo, 2 kusunungurwa pachivi, uye 3 kubvisa munhu wekare → Sezvo muri vanakomana, Mwari akatuma Mweya woMwanakomana wake; “Mudzimu Mutsvene” uri mamuri (chinyorwa chepakutanga ndisu) mwoyo unochema kuti: “Abha! Mwari! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa here? --Ona kuna 1 Petro chitsauko 1 ndima 3 . →Zvinogona kuonekwa kuti kubvira zvino, hauchisiri muranda, ndiko kuti, “muranda wechivi,” asi wava mwanakomana, uye zvauri mwanakomana, wava mudyi wenhaka kupfurikidza naMwari. “Rinda” kana usingatendi “Jesu akakudzikinura “pamurairo, napachivi, napamunhu wakare.” Nenzira iyi, “kutenda” kwako hakuna kuva vanakomana vaMwari, unonzwisisa here?

(3) Mwari akafanoronga kuti tigamuchire umwanakomana kuburikidza naJesu Kristu nyika isati yavambwa.

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri VaEfeso 1:3-9 Mwari ngaarumbidzwe, Baba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Akatiropafadza nokuropafadza kwose kwomweya munzvimbo dzokudenga muna Kristu: Mwari sezvaakatisarudza maari nyika isati yavambwa kuti tive vatsvene uye vasina chavangapomerwa pamberi pake nokuda kworudo rwake kwatiri, akatisarudza maari ndiwo, “wakatemerwa kare” kuti atigamuchire savanakomana kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, maererano nomufaro wokuda kwake, kuti rumbidzo yenyasha dzake dzinobwinya, dzaakatipa muMwanakomana wake waanoda “Jesu” wake. Tine rudzikinuro kubudikidza neropa reMwanakomana waanoda, iko kuregererwa kwezvivi zvedu, maererano nokupfuma kwenyasha dzake. Nyasha idzi dzakapiwa kwatiri dzakawanda naMwari muuchenjeri hwake hwose uye nokunzwisisa kwake kwose, zvose zvinoenderana nechinangwa chake chakanaka, kuti tigoziva chakavanzika chokuda kwake. --Verenga VaEfeso 1:3-9. Rugwaro rutsvene urwu rwakarujekesa zvikuru, uye munhu wose anofanira kurinzwisisa.

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaKristu: runotiita kururama kwaMwari
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure maBhaibheri edu kuna 2 VaKorinte 5 ndima 21 tiverenge pamwe chete: Mwari akaita kuti uyo akanga asingazivi chivi ave chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Jesu rudo "Aihwa. 3 Ngatinamatei: Anodiwa Abba, Baba Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene unesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Vakadzi vakanaka [makereke] vanotumira vashandi! Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Mwari akaita kuti uyo akanga asingazivi chivi ave chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari muna Kristu Jesu ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Rudo rwaJesu rwakava chivi nokuda kwedu kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari

(1) Mwari anoita kuti vasina chivi

Ngatitarisei pana 1 Johane 3:5 toiverenga pamwe chete → Munoziva kuti Ishe akazviratidza kuti abvise chivi chomunhu, icho musina chivi. Chirevo - 1 Johane 3:5 → Haana kuita chivi, kana kunyengera mumuromo make. Chirevo - 1 Petro Chitsauko 2 Ndima 22 → Sezvo tine muprista mukuru akakwira kudenga, Jesu, Mwanakomana waMwari, ngatibatisisei kupupura kwedu. Nokuti muprista wedu mukuru haagoni kutinzwira tsitsi pautera hwedu. Akaedzwa pazvinhu zvose sesu, asi asina chivi. Chirevo - VaHebheru 4 ndima 14-15. Cherechedza: Chirevo chepakutanga chezwi rokuti "kusava nezvivi" naMwari ndechokuti "kusaziva chivi", sezvakangoita mwana asingazivi chakanaka nechakaipa. Jesu iShoko rakava munhu → mutsvene, haana chivi, haana chaanopomerwa, uye haana kusvibiswa! Hapana mutemo wezvakanaka nezvakaipa → Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika! Saka haana kutadza, nokuti Shoko raMwari rakanga riri mumwoyo make, uye akanga asingagoni kutadza! Nzira yaIshe yakadzama uye inoshamisa! Ameni. Handizivi kana muchinzwisisa?

(2) Iva chivi nokuda kwedu

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge Isaya 53:6 pamwe chete → Isu tose takanga takarasika samakwai; → Akatakura zvivi zvedu pachedu pamuti kuti, kana tafa kuzvivi, tiraramire kururama. namavanga ake makaporeswa. Chirevo - 1 Petro 2:24 → Mwari akaita uyo akanga asingazivi chivi (uyo akanga asingazivi chivi) kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari. Chiratidzo— 2 VaKorinde 5:21 . Cherechedza: Mwari akaisa zvitadzo zvedu zvose pana Jesu “asina zvitadzo,” akava chitadzo nokuda kwedu, uye akatakura zvitadzo zvedu. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

(3) Kuti tive kururama kwaMwari maari

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri, VaRoma 3:25-26 Mwari akagadza Jesu sorudzikinuro kuburikidza neropa raJesu uye nokutenda kwomunhu kuratidza kururama kwaMwari; kuti aratidze kururama kwake panguva ino, kuti iye aratidzwe kuti wakarurama, uye unoruramisa vanotenda muna Jesu. →Chitsauko 5 Ndima 18-19 Naizvozvo vose zvavakapiwa mhosva nokudarika kumwe, naizvozvo vose vanoruramiswa nechiito chimwe chokururama, vave noupenyu. Sezvo vazhinji vakaitwa vatadzi kubudikidza nokusateerera kwomunhu mumwe chete, saizvozvo nokuteerera kwomunhu mumwe vazhinji vakaitwa vakarurama. → Ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita vamwe venyu; asi makashambidzwa, mukaitwa vatsvene, mukaruramiswa nezita raShe Jesu Kristu, noMweya waMwari wedu. Chiratidzo— 1 VaKorinde 6:11 .

Cherechedza: Mwari akagadza Jesu semuyananisi kuti akuchenesei pazvivi zvose ne“ropa” raJesu, Kubudikidza nokutenda kwomunhu, acharatidza kururama kwaMwari, kuti munhu azive kuti iye pachake akarurama uye kuti acharuramisawo avo vanoruramiswa. tenda muna Jesu. Nokuda kwokusateerera kwaAdhamu mumwe chete, vose vakaitwa vakarurama nokuda kwokuteerera kwomunhu mumwe chete. Saka Jehovha akatanga ruponeso rwake → Mwari akaita Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga “asina chivi,” Jesu, kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu → kuti aponese vanhu vake pachivi nokuvadzikinura pakutuka kwomutemo → 1 kusunungurwa pachivi, 2 Pashure pokunge asunungurwa. kubva pamurairo nekutuka kwawo, 3 mabvisa munhu wekare waAdhamu. kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vana vaMwari, kuti tive kururama kwaMwari muna Kristu Jesu. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaJesu: kuzadzikiswa kwemurairo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna Mateo 5:17-18 tiverenge pamwe chete: Musafunga kuti ndakauya kuzoparadza murairo kana vaporofita; handina kuuya kuzoparadza murairo, asi kuzouzadzisa. Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kusvikira denga nenyika zvapfuura, hapana jota rimwe kana vara rimwe richapfuura. Kupfuura Mutemo .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Rudo rwaJesu runozadzisa mutemo 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi ane hunhu [kereke] anotumira vashandi kuti vatakure chikafu kubva kure kuenda kudenga, uye agogovera chikafu kwatiri nenguva kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya hupfume! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise kuti rudo rwaJesu runozadzisa murairo uye runogonesa mutemo waKristu. Ameni

! Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Rudo rwaJesu runozadzisa uye runozadzisa mutemo

[Enisaikoropidhiya Tsanangudzo]

Pedzisa: chirevo chepakutanga kukwana, kubatsira vanhu kuziva zvavanoda

Pedzisa: zvakakwana, zvakakwana, zvakakwana, zvakakwana.

【Kuturikira Bhaibheri】

(1) Rudo rwaJesu “runozadzika” mutemo: Mwari haana mhosva, nokuti Takava chivi; nokuti vose vakatadza → mubairo wechivi rufu → uye sezvo Jesu akafira vose, vose vakafa. Nenzira iyi, hapana vara rimwe chete kana chidodzi chimwe chomurayiro chingabviswa nokuda kwaJesu” kufanana Murairo wazadziswa, munonzwisisa here?

(2) Rudo rwaJesu "runozadzisa" mutemo: Nokuti munhu wose anoda vamwe azadzisa mutemo → Mwari akada nyika zvokuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, ane zita rinonzi Jesu, nokuda kwevose vanotenda maari → 1 wakasununguka kubva kuchivi. 2 kusunungurwa kubva pamurayiro. 3 Bvisa murume mukuru, 4 Pfeka "munhu mutsva" uye pfeka Kristu →tamisa "munhu mutsva" wedu akaberekwa naMwari muumambo hweMwanakomana wake anodiwa. Nenzira iyi, hatisi kuzoputsa mutemo, kwete kunyange mutemo mumwe chete → Rudo rwaJesu → rudo rwe "kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita"! Nokuti akatipa muviri wake “usingaori” noupenyu! Ameni. Saka rudo rwaJesu “runopedzisa” mutemo . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri toverenga pamwe chete Mateu 5:17-18 inoti: “Musafunga kuti handina kuuya kuzoparadza Mutemo kana kuti Zvakanyorwa nevaprofita. asi kuti zvizadziswe, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kudenga napanyika zvose zvakapera, hapana vata rimwe kana vara rimwe romurayiro richapfuura, kusvikira zvose zvaitika.

[Cherechedza]: Nokuti vose vakatadza uye vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari - nongedzera kuna VaRoma 3:23 → Mubayiro wechivi rufu - kureva VaRoma 6 23 → "Cherechedza: Kudai Mwari akanga asina kutuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga Jesu kuti atiponese; isu tose tichava pasi pokutonga kwakarurama kwomutemo."→ Mwari akada nyika kwazvo. "Jehovha ndiye akatanga ruponeso rwake-- Pisarema 98:2"→ "Akavapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda maari haangaparari.” , asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. --Ona Johani 3:16 → Mwari akaita uyo akanga asingazivi chivi (mashoko ekutanga anoreva kusaziva chivi) kuti ave chivi nokuda kwedu --Ona 2 VaKorinde 5:21 → Jehovha achadzima zvivi zvavanhu vose - tarira kuna Isaya 53:6 → “Jesu Kristu” sezvo mumwe akafira vose, vose vakafa - nongedzera kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:14 → “pano “vose” vanobatanidza vose. vanhu" → akafa Avo vakasunungurwa kubva kuchivi, mutemo uye kutukwa - tarisa VaRoma 6:7 uye VaGaratia 3:13 → kudzikinura avo vari pasi pomutemo kuti tiwane uvanakomana vaMwari! Ameni- - Tarisa Kuwedzera chitsauko 4 ndima 4-7.

Izvi ndizvo zvakataurwa naJesu: “Musafunga kuti ndakauya kuzoparadza Murayiro kana Zvakanyorwa nevaprofita. handina kuuya kuzoparadza, asi kuzozadzisa. Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kusvikira denga nenyika zvapfuura, vara rimwe kana vara rimwe zvaro hazvingapfuuri pamurairo, kusvikira wose waitika. saka Rudo rwaJesu runozadzisa mutemo . Ameni! Nenzira iyi, unozvinzwisisa zvakajeka here? —Verenga Mateu 5:17-18

Ngatidzidzei VaRoma chitsauko 13 ndima 8-10 uye tiiverenge pamwe chete: Musava nechikwereti nemunhu kunze kwekudanana, uye nguva dzose muchizvitora sengava kwaari, nekuti uyo anoda muvakidzani wake azadzisa murairo. Somuenzaniso, mirayiro yakadai sokuti, “Usaita upombwe, Usauraya, Usaba, Usachiva,” nemimwe mirayiro inoputirwa mumutsara uyu: “Ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe. Rudo haruitiri vamwe zvakaipa, saka rudo runozadzisa murayiro.

[Cherechedza]: Hakusi kuti tinoda Mwari, asi kuti Mwari anotida uye akatuma Mwanakomana wake kuti ave rudzikinuro rwezvivi zvedu. .

Nongedzera kuna 1 Johani 4:10 → Maererano nengoni dzake huru, akatibereka patsva nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa → 1 kubva kuchivi, 2 kubva pamurayiro, 3 kubvisa munhu wekare, 4 kupfeka" The itsva munhu "unopfeka Kristu" → Mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nokuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; Nongedzera kuna 1 Johane ganhuro 3 ndima 9 na1 Petro ganhuro 1 ndima 3 → Mwari akatitamisa, “vanhu vatsva vakaberekwa naMwari,” muumambo hwoMwanakomana wake anodiwa. VaKorose 1:13 Kana pasina murayiro hapana kudarika. Nenzira iyi, hatizoputsi murairo nechivi, uye pasina chitadzo hatizotongwi.

--Ona kuna 1 Petro chitsauko 1 ndima 3 . Rudo rwaJesu → rudo rwe "kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita"! Nokuti akatipa muviri wake noupenyu husina chivi, hutsvene, uye husingaori, kuti tiwane upenyu hwaKristu uye tigowana upenyu husingaperi! Nenzira iyi, isu tiri pfupa remapfupa ake, nenyama yenyama yake → muviri wake pachake uye hupenyu hwake, naizvozvo, rudo rukuru urwo Jesu anotida nderwe "kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita" sezvaunoda muviri wako. Ameni! Unonzwisisa here? Rudo rwaJesu runozadzisa uye runozadzisa mutemo. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Rudo rwaKristu: Mwari rudo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 1 Johane chitsauko 4 ndima 7-8 tiverenge pamwe chete: Hama dzinodikanwa, tinofanira kudanana, nokuti rudo runobva kuna Mwari. Mumwe nomumwe anoda akaberekwa naMwari uye anoziva Mwari. Usingadi, haazivi Mwari, nokuti Mwari rudo .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Mwari rudo" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] inotumira vashandi kuti vatakure chikafu kubva kure kuenda kudenga, uye kutipa isu nenguva yakafanira, kuti hupenyu hwedu hwemweya huve hwakapfuma! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye kutivhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya, nekuti rudo runobva kuna Mwari, uye munhu wese anoda akaberekwa naMwari uye anoziva Mwari. Mwari anotida, uye tinozviziva uye tinozvitenda. Mwari rudo; unogara murudo, unogara muna Mwari, naMwari unogara maari. Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Rudo rwaJesu Kristu: Mwari Rudo

Ngatidzidzei 1 Johane 4:7-10 muBhaibheri toiverenga tose: Hama inodiwa, Tinofanira kudanana nokuti rudo runobva kuna Mwari . Mumwe nomumwe anoda akaberekwa naMwari uye anoziva Mwari. Usingadi, haazivi Mwari, nokuti Mwari rudo. Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga munyika kuti tive noupenyu kubudikidza naye. Hakusi kuti tinoda Mwari, asi kuti Mwari anotida uye akatuma Mwanakomana wake kuti ave rudzikinuro rwezvivi zvedu.

[Cherechedza] : Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, muapostora Johani akati: “Hama dzinodiwa, tinofanira kudanana, →_→ nokuti “rudo” runobva kuna Mwari; harubvi kuna Adhamu akasikwa neguruva. uye akazadzwa nokuchiva kwakaipa nokuchiva. Ndinokuudzai zvino kuti avo vanoita zvinhu zvakadai havangagari nhaka youmambo hwaMwari.

Saka pakanga pasina rudo muna Adamu, rudo rwenhema - rwehunyengeri. Rudo rwaMwari ndirwo: Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga munyika kuti tirarame kuburikidza naye →_→ kuburikidza naJesu Kristu akafira pamuti nokuda kwezvivi zvedu uye akavigwa pazuva rechitatu Akamutswa! Ameni. Kumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa →_→ kunotibereka patsva, kuti tirege kuberekwa naAdhamu, kwete nevabereki venyama →_→ asi 1 akaberekwa nemvura noMweya, 2 akaberekwa nokutenda kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu. , 3 vakaberekwa naMwari. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Rudo rwaMwari kwatiri runoratidzwa pano. Hakusi kuti tinoda Mwari, →_→ asi kuti Mwari anotida uye akatuma Mwanakomana wake kuti ave rudzikinuro rwezvivi zvedu. Chirevo - Johane 4 ndima 9-10.

Mwari anotipa Mweya wake (“Mweya” zvinoreva Mweya Mutsvene), kubva ipapo zvichienda mberi tinoziva kuti tinogara maari uye anogara matiri. Baba vakatuma Mwanakomana wavo kuti ave Muponesi wenyika; Ani nani unobvuma kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari, Mwari anogara maari, uye anogara muna Mwari. (Sezvazvakanyorwa - Ishe Jesu akati! Ini ndiri muna Baba uye Baba vari mandiri → Kana tikagara muna Kristu, kureva kuti, tinozvarwa patsva uye tinomutswa se "vanhu vatsva" nemuviri uye hupenyu hwaKristu. → Baba vanogara mandiri Ameni!

Mwari anotida, tinoziva uye tinotenda . mwari rudo Unogara murudo, unogara muna Mwari, naMwari maari. Nenzira iyi rudo ruchakwaniswa matiri, uye tichava nechivimbo pazuva rokutongwa. Nokuti sezvaari, ndizvo zvatiriwo munyika ino. →_→ Nemhaka yokuti tinoberekwazve uye tinomutswa, “munhu mutsva” inhengo yomuviri waKristu, “pfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake.” Saka isu hatityi mu "zuva iro" →_→ Sezvaari, ndizvo zvatiri munyika. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Chiratidzo— 1 Johani 4:13-17 .

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna Zvakazarurwa Chitsauko 17 Ndima 1-2 Mumwe wavatumwa vanomwe vakanga vane ndiro nomwe akauya kwandiri akati: Uya pano, ndichakuratidza kurangwa kwemhombwe huru igere pamusoro pemvura, madzimambo enyika akaita upombwe nayo. vanogara panyika vakadhakwa newaini youpombwe hwavo . "

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Mhando Matatu Emahure muBhaibheri 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [chechi] anotumira vashandi kuti vatakure zvokudya kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure mudenga, uye anotigovera zvokudya nenguva kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Nzwisisa mhando nhatu dze“mhombwe” dzinotaurwa muBhaibheri uye rayira vana vaMwari kuti vasiyane nekereke yehure remuBhabhironi. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Rudzi rwekutanga rwehure

---Chechi Yakabatana naMambo Wenyika---

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri muna Zvakazarurwa 17:1-6 Mumwe wengirozi nomwe dzakanga dzine ndiro nomwe akauya kwandiri akati, “Uya pano, uye ndichakuratidza kurangwa kwemhombwe huru igere pamusoro pemvura Madzimambo enyika akaita upombwe naro, uye vaya vanogara panyika vakadhakwa newaini youfeve hwaro.”… panyika.” “Mai vezvinyangadzo.” Uye ndakaona mukadzi akadhakwa neropa revatsvene uye neropa rezvapupu zvaJesu. Pandakamuona ndakashamiswa zvikuru. Cherechedza: Chechi umo mambo wenyika nechechi vakabatana → "chakavanzika"! Kunze kune "Chechi yechiKristu", uye haugoni kutaura chokwadi kubva kune venhema Inonzi "chakavanzika" → Asi mukati, madzimambo enyika ari kuita upombwe ne "iye", kereke, achibatana nayo. mumwe nomumwe, vachishandisa nheyo dzenyika nouzivi hwavanhu, uye havazviteveri dzidziso dzaKristu dzinodzidziswa kwamuri maererano netsika dzavanhu → Iyi “kereke” chakavanzika—kereke yemhombwe yeBhabhironi Guru.

Rudzi rwechipiri rwehure

---Shamwari dzenyika---

Jakobho 4:4 Imi mhombwe, hamuzivi here kuti ushamwari hwenyika hunovengana naMwari? Naizvozvo, ani naani anoda kuva shamwari yenyika muvengi waMwari.

[Cherechedza]: Rudzi rwemhombwe rwekutanga rwuri nyore kuziva, ndiko kuti, kereke namambo wepasi vari mumubatanidzwa kune mumwe nemumwe kuti vabatsirwe kunze, anopfeka zita rekereke ye "Kristu", asi pane mukati anoita upombwe namambo, achidanidzira kuti “Jesu” mumuromo make, asi kutaura idi musoro wake nechiremera ndimambo. Mumachechi mazhinjisa munyika, vanhu vazhinji vakadhakwa newaini youfeve hwake, hunova Neo-Confucianism yenyika uye nhema dzinotsausa dzechiConfucius. , ChiBhudha nedzimwe pfungwa nedzidziso dzakachena uye dzisina kuvhengana zvinopinzwa muchechi. Vazhinji vakagamuchira shoko remhombwe nemweya yemadhimoni, mweya yakaipa yakazvarwa na“amai” vezvinonyangadza. Vose vakanga vakadhakwa ipapo, uye havana kuziva chokwadi;

Rudzi rwechipiri rwemhombwe ishamwari yenyika, savanamati vezvifananidzo, novuroyi, novufeve, novutsvina, nokudhakwa, norukawo, nezvimwe zvakadaro, vanoda nyika; Bhaari , uye vakatevera vamwe vamwari vavakanga vasingazivi— nongedzera kuna Jeremia 7:9 .

Rudzi rwechitatu rwehure

---Kubva pakuchengetwa kwemutemo---

( 1 ) Mutemo unotonga vanhu uchiri mupenyu

Romans 7 Vhesi 1 Zvino ndinoti kwamuri, hama dzangu, munonzwisisa murairo, hamuzivi here kuti murairo unotonga munhu kana achiri mupenyu?

[Cherechedza]: Izvi zvinoreva kuti – patakanga tiri munyama, takanga tatotengeswa kuchivi – tarisa kuna VaRoma Chitsauko 7:14 → Naizvozvo, nyama yedu ichiri mhenyu, kureva kuti, “muviri wechivi” uchiri mhenyu, takasungwa uye takasungwa. tichirindwa nomurairo - VaG. 3 Chitsauko 22 - Ndima 23, nokuti simba rechivi murairo, kana tichirarama, ndiko kuti, kana "vatadzi" vachirarama, tinotongwa uye kudziviswa nemurairo. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

( 2 ) Ukama huri pakati pechivi nomutemo “hunofananidzwa” noukama huri pakati pomukadzi nomurume wake

VAROMA 7:2-3 Mukadzi sezvaano murume, wakasungwa nomurairo murume wake achiri mupenyu; asi kana murume afa, wasunungurwa pamurairo womurume. Naizvozvo, kana murume wake ari mupenyu, uye akawanikwa nomumwe, anonzi chifeve, kana murume wake afa, asunungurwa kubva pamurayiro wake, uye kunyange akava womumwe murume, haazi chifeve.

[Cherechedza]: Muapostora Pauro akashandisa [ chivi nomurayiro ] ukama enzanisa ne ［ mukadzi nemurume ]hukama! Kana murume achiri mupenyu, mukadzi akasungwa nomurayiro wokuwanana womurume wake, anenge achidarika murayiro wokuwanana naye, uye anonzi chifeve. Kana murume afa, mukadzi asunungurwa kubva pamurayiro wewaniso, kunyange akawanikwa nomumwe murume, haanzi chifeve. Kana mukadzi akasiya murume wake oroora mumwe mukadzi, anenge ava kuita upombwe. -- Mako 10:12 "Kuita upombwe hwenyama."
VaRoma 7:4 Saka, hama dzangu, nemiwo makafa kumurayiro kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu, kuti muve vamwe, kuna iye anorarama kubva kuvakafa, kuti tiberekere Mwari zvibereko.

( 3 ) Kana mukadzi “mutadzi” achirarama uye achiuya kuna Kristu, anenge ari mhombwe

" mutadzi "kuenzanisa" mukadzi "Kana mupenyu, hapana nzira" mutemo" Izvozvi murume kufa ," mutadzi "Aihwa" break away " Zvisungo zvemutemo wemurume, "Kana wadzoka" Kristu ",unofona chete" mhombwe "Ndizvo [ hure remweya ]. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Vanhu vazhinji vakaita se“nguruve” dzakacheneswa dzodzokera pakuumburuka mumatope, vanochema “Ishe, Ishe” nemiromo yavo votendeuka “mumwoyo yavo” vodzokera kumutemo weTestamende yekare. Nemamwe mashoko, kana une varume “vaviri” → murume mumwe weTestamende Yekare uye murume mumwe we“Testamende Itsva,” uri “mhombwe → mhombwe yemweya” “. VaGaratiya 4:5 Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga kuti adzikinure avo vakanga vari pasi po“mutemo” kuti muuye kunaShe Jesu Kristu; asi vazhinji “vakadzoka” uye vakada kuva varanda pasi pomurairo. Vanhu ava vari "kuita upombwe", "upombwe hwepamweya, uye vanonzi mhombwe pamweya." Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Ishe Jesu akati, “Seiko muchinditi, ‘Ishe, Ishe,’ asi musingateereri mashoko angu? Munoti! Ndizvo here? mutemo zvino "wakasununguka" kubva pamurairo, unotibvumira kushumira Jehovha "Vatadzi vasina kusununguka kubva pamurairo havagoni kushumira Ishe." seMweya Mutsvene) Nzira itsva, kwete nzira yekare maererano netsika.

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni
