articles.title: Ukama huri pakati pechivi nomutemo hunofananidzwa noukama huri pakati pomukadzi nomurume wake
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 7 ndima 1-3 todziverenga pamwe chete: Hama, zvino ndinoti kune vanonzwisisa murairo, hamuzivi here kuti murairo unotonga munhu paanenge ari mupenyu? somukadzi une murume, wakasungwa nomurairo murume wake achiri mupenyu; asi kana murume afa, wasunungurwa pamurairo womurume. Naizvozvo kana akawanikwa nomumwe murume, murume wake achiri mupenyu, anonzi chifeve;

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Ukama huri pakati pechivi nomutemo hunofananidzwa noukama huri pakati pomukadzi nomurume wake 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka【 chechi 】Tumirai vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, rinova vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Kuziva kuti “mutemo” unodzora vanhu tichiri vapenyu, tinofa kumutemo kupfurikidza nomuviri waKristu, uchitibvumira kudzokera kuna Ishe Jesu akamutswa! Kana “mutadzi” asina kufa ku“murairo” - achidarika murairo ndokutendeukira kune mumwe munhu, anonzi mhombwe - mhombwe yomudzimu. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Mutemo unotonga vanhu → paunenge uri mupenyu so“mutadzi”

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri pana VaRoma 7:1-3 toverenga pamwe chete: Hama dzangu, ndinoti kwamuri imi munonzwisisa murayiro, hamuzivi here kuti murayiro unobata munhu panguva yaanenge ari mupenyu? somukadzi une murume, wakasungwa nomurairo murume wake achiri mupenyu; asi kana murume afa, wasunungurwa pamurairo womurume. Naizvozvo, kana murume wake ari mupenyu, uye akawanikwa nomumwe, anonzi chifeve, kana murume wake afa, asunungurwa kubva pamurayiro wake, uye kunyange akava womumwe murume, haazi chifeve.

[Cherechedza]: Nokudzidza zvinyorwa zvemagwaro zviri pamusoro apa, muapostora “Pauro” akati: “Hama dzangu, zvino ndinoti kune vaya vanonzwisisa mutemo → kureva vaya vanonzwisisa “sungano yokutanga,” kureva mutemo weTestamende Yekare, don. Hamuzivi here kuti murayiro “unotonga vanhu” kunyange “mutadzi” ari mupenyu Ndizvo here? pasi pomurayiro, pasi pomurayiro. Hutongi hwemutemo ndizvo" mhosva ".Saka wanzwisisa here?

(2) Ukama huri pakati pechivi nomutemo hunofananidzwa noukama huri pakati pomukadzi nomurume wake

Pano muapostora “Pauro” anoenzanisa “ukama hwechivi nomutemo” ne“ukama hwomukadzi nomurume wake” →_ Kungofanana no“mukadzi” anofananidzwa no“mutadzi” ane “murume” anofananidzwa. Murume anofananidzwa nomurayiro panguva yose yaanenge ari mupenyu, mukadzi akasungwa nomurayiro “wokuroorwa” kana murume wake afa, mukadzi anosunungurwa kubva pamurayiro wewaniso. Naizvozvo, kana murume ari mupenyu uye ari womumwe munhu (ndiko kuti, “mukadzi” asati abuda muuranda hwomurayiro wewanano), kana ari womumwe munhu, anonzi “mhombwe” ; kana murume afa, wasunungurwa pamurairo womurume, kunyange ari womumwe munhu.

Saka hukama huripo pakati pe“vatadzi nomurayiro” hwakafanana :19 “Pauro” akati → ndakafa “kumurairo” nokuda kwomurayiro! Kuti muuyiswe kuna vamwe, kuna iye akamutswa kubva kuvakafa → [Ishe Jesu Kristu], kuti tiberekere Mwari chibereko “chomweya”.

(3) Kana mukadzi ari mupenyu so“mutadzi” uye achiuya kuna Kristu, anenge ari mhombwe

Kana imi “vatadzi” muchirarama “musingafi kumurairo, musina “kupukunyuka” pauranda hwomurairo, uye kana mukatendeukira kuna “Kristu” munozodaidza kuti “mhombwe” [hure romudzimu] . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Vanhu vazhinji vakaita se“nguruve” dzakacheneswa dzodzokera pakuumburuka mumatope; vanochema “Ishe, Ishe” nemiromo yavo votendeuka uye “mumwoyo yavo” vodzokera kumutemo weTestamente Yekare. kugadzwa kwapfuura Husband" date.Kureva kuti une "Vaviri" varume → murume mumwe weTestamende Itsva, uri "mhombwe yomudzimu" mumwe; “. Vanhu ava vari “kuita upombwe” uye “upombwe hwomweya” uye vanonzi mhombwe pamweya. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

articles.title: Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna VaRoma Chitsauko 4 uye ndima 15 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha; .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] anotumira vashandi - kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu → kuunza chingwa kubva kure kubva kudenga kuti chigotipa chikafu panguva yakafanira, kuti isu veMweya. hupenyu hwawanda! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione mashoko enyu, ari chokwadi chemweya→ Munzwisise kuti kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika; .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Ukama huri pakati pemutemo nechivi

Mubvunzo: Pane mutemo here "kutanga"? Kana kuti "yekutanga" ane mhosva?
Mhinduro: Kutanga kune murairo, tevere kune chivi. →Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika; Ameni! →"Nekuti simba rechivi mutemo" →Hutongi hwesimba remurairo [kudzora kudarika, zvivi, uye vatadzi] Unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? --Tarira kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:56 naVaRoma 4:15.

Mubvunzo: Chivi chii?
Mhinduro: Kutyora mutemo chivi → Ani nani anotadza anodarika murairo chivi; Tarisa kuna 1 Johane 3:4

Mubvunzo: Chikonzero che "chivi" chii?
Mhinduro: Patakanga tiri munyama, chivi “chakazvarwa” nokuda kwe“murairo”. →Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, kuchiva kwakaberekwa nomurayiro kwaibata mumitezo yedu, uye kwakabereka chibereko chorufu. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 7:5

→ "Kuchiva kwenyama, kuchiva, kunobata mumitezo" → Kana kuchiva kunogamuchirwa, kunobereka chivi; Tarisa kuna Jakobho 1:15

Mubvunzo: Muviri wedu wechivi unobvepi?
Mhinduro: Muviri wedu une chivi wakaberekwa kubva kuna tateguru wedu [Adhamu] → Izvi zvakangofanana nechivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe, Adhamu, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, saka rufu rwakauya kumunhu wose nokuti munhu wose akatadza. ... Asi kubva kuna Adhamu kusvikira kuna Mosesi, rufu rwakabata ushe, kunyange nevasina kutadza saAdhamu. Adamu aive mufananidzo wemunhu aizouya. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 5:12, 14

(2) Ukama huri pakati pomutemo, chivi norufu

Mubvunzo: Sezvo “rufu” ruchibva “kuchivi” tingapukunyuka sei kubva murufu?
Mhinduro: Kana uchida kutiza kubva murufu, unofanira kutiza kubva kuchivi → Kana uchida kutiza kubva muchivi, unofanira kutiza kubva pamurairo.

Mubvunzo: Ungatiza sei chivi?
Mhinduro: “Tendai” kuti munhu mumwe chete muna Kristu “akafira” vose, uye vose vakafa. →“Uyo anenge afa asunungurwa pachivi.”—Ona VaRoma 6:7

→"Tendai" uye vose vakafa, "tenda" uye vose vakaponeswa kubva kuchivi. Ameni!

Hatifambi nokuona, asi nokutenda Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ona 2 VaKorinte 5:14 .

Mubvunzo: Ungatiza sei mutemo?
Mhinduro: Isu takafa kumurairo wandakasungwa nawo nomuviri waKristu, uye zvino tasunungurwa pamurairo → Naizvozvo, hama dzangu, nemiwo makafa kumurairo nomuviri waKristu .Asi sezvo takafa kumurairo wakanga wakatisunga, zvino tasunungurwa pamurairo, kuti tigobatira Ishe nohutsva hwomweya (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa soMweya Mutsvene) uye kwete maererano nenzira yekare yomuitiro. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 7:4, 6

(3) Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika

1 Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika : Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha; VaRoma 4 ndima 15
2 nekuti kunze kwemurairo chivi chakafa; —VaRoma 7:8
3 Kana pasina murayiro chivi hachisi chivi : Mutemo usati wavapo, chivi chakanga chava munyika; VaRoma 5:13
4 Kana une murayiro, uchatongwa nomurayiro : Ani nani unoita chivi kunze kwemurairo, uchaparara asina murairo; VaRoma 2:12

[Cherechedza]: Vana vakaberekwa naMwari vane “mutemo waKristu”, uye pfupiso yomutemo ndiKristu - kureva VaRoma 10:4 → Mutemo waKristu "se" ! Ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe ! Ameni. Nokuti pasina mutemo we“kutongwa”, paisazova nechivi uye pasina mhosva . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? saka Shoko raMwari rakavanzika Zvinoratidzwa kuvana vaMwari chete! Kana vari “vokunze” vanonzwa, vanonzwa, asi havanzwisisi; Ona 1 Johane 3:9 na5:18.

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari Baba, uye nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

2021.06.13

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kururama kwaMwari kwakaratidzwa kunze kwemurairo 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [kereke] akatuma vashandi kubudikidza namaoko avo vakanyora nokuparidza shoko rechokwadi, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu! Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Hwisisa kuti "kururama" kwaMwari kwakaratidzwa kunze kwemutemo . Munamato wepamusoro,

Namata, nyengeterera, tenda, uye ropafadza! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) kururama kwaMwari

Mubvunzo: Kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa kupi?
Mhinduro: Zvino kururama kwaMwari kwakaratidzwa kunze kwomurairo.

Ngatitarisei kuna VaRoma 3:21-22 tigovaverenga pamwe chete: Asi zvino kururama kwaMwari kwakaratidzwa pasina murayiro, kune uchapupu hwomurayiro navaprofita; ndiko kururama kwaMwari kunopiwa kuzvinhu zvose. kubudikidza nokutenda muna Jesu Kristu Hapana musiyano kuna vanotenda. Tendeukira kuna VaRoma 10:3 zvekare.

[Cherechedza]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti zvino “kururama” kwaMwari kunoratidzwa “kunze kwomurayiro”, sezvinopupurirwa nomutemo navaprofita → Jesu akati kwavari: “Izvi ndizvo zvandaiita pandakanga ndinemi ” Ndinokuudzai izvi: Zvinhu zvose zvakanyorwa pamusoro pangu muMutemo waMosesi, nevaprofita nomuMapisarema zvinofanira kuzadziswa.”— Ruka 24:44 .

Asi nguva yakati yakwana, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake, akaberekwa nomukadzi, akaberekwa pasi pomurairo, kuti adzikunure vari pasi pomurairo, kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vanakomana. Reference – Kuwedzera chitsauko 4 ndima 4-5. → "Kururama" kwaMwari kunoratidzwa nezvakanyorwa muMutemo, Vaporofita, uye Mapisarema, ndiko kuti, Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga Jesu, Shoko rakava nyama, akaberekwa neMhandara Maria uye akaberekwa Mweya Mutsvene, uye akaberekwa ari pasi pomutemo, kuti adzikinure avo vari pasi pomutemo→ 1 vakasununguka kubva pamurayiro , 2 Wasunungurwa kubva kuchivi, bvisa munhu wekare . Kuburikidza nekumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa, tinozvarwa patsva → kuitira kuti tigamuchire ushamwari hwaMwari ! Ameni. saka, Kugamuchira “humwana hwaMwari” zvinoreva kuva kunze kwemutemo, kusunungurwa pachivi uye kubvisa munhu wekare→ Nenzira iyi chete munhu anogona kuwana “zita romwanakomana waMwari”. ";

nokuti simba rechivi Iwo mutemo - tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:56 → Mumutemo " mukati "Chii chiri kuoneka 〔mhosva〕 , chero uine" mhosva" -Mutemo unogona pachena huya kunze. wakawira pasi pemurairo sei? , nokuti ndimi mutadzi , zvepamutemo simba uye chiyero Ingozvitarisira mhosva 〕. Mumutemo mune chete [vatadzi] Hapana humwanakomana hwaMwari - hapana kururama kwaMwari . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Kururama kwaMwari kwakavakirwa pakutenda, kuti kutenda

Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.”— VaRoma 1:17 . →Panyaya iyi, tingati kudii? VaHedheni vakanga vasingatsvaki kururama vakagamuchira kururama, uko kuri “kururama” kunobva pa“kutenda”. Asi vaIsraeri vakaronda kururama kwemurairo, asi vakakundikana kuwana kururama kwomurairo. Chii chiri chikonzero cheizvi? Imhaka yekuti havakumbiri nokutenda, asi “nemabasa” chete vari kuwira pachigumbuso ichocho. —VaRoma 9:30-32.

(3) Kusaziva kururama kwaMwari pasi pomurairo

Nemhaka yokuti vaIsraeri vakanga vasingazivi kururama kwaMwari uye vaida kugadza kururama kwavo vamene, vaIsraeri vakafunga kuti kupfurikidza nokuchengeta mutemo nokuvimba nenyama kuti iruramise nokuvandudza mufambiro wavo, vaigona kururamiswa. Izvi zvinodaro nekuti vanokumbira nemabasa kwete nekutenda, saka vari kuwira pachigumbuso ichocho. Vaivimba nemabasa emurairo uye vakasateerera kururama kwaMwari. Chirevo - VaRoma 10 ndima 3.

Asi munofanirawo kuziva kuti → imi muri “vanhu vanochengeta mutemo” munotsvaka kururamiswa nomutemo → makaparadzaniswa naKristu uye makawa panyasha. NoMweya Mutsvene, nokutenda, tinomirira tariro yokururama. Reference - Kuwedzera chitsauko 5 ndima 4-5. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Kana zviri zvemurairo, hazvibvi nechivimbiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhurei maBhaibheri edu kuna VaGaratiya chitsauko 3 ndima 18 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti kana nhaka ichibva kumurayiro, haibvi nokuda kwechipikirwa; asi Mwari akapa Abhurahama nhaka nokuda kwechipikirwa. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete “Kana zvichiitwa nomurayiro, hazvibvi pachipikirwa” Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! Mukadzi akanaka [chechi] anotumira vashandi kuti vatakure zvokudya kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure mudenga, uye anotigovera zvokudya nenguva kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise zvikomborero zvakavimbiswa naMwari muBhaibheri→ Kana zviri zvemurairo, hazvibvi nechivimbiso; Kuburikidza no“kutenda” tinogashira Mweya Mutsvene wakapikirwa sechisimbiso, chinova chiratidzo chokugara nhaka yaBaba. Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Kana zviri zvemurairo, hazvibvi nechivimbiso

(1) Mwari akavimbisa vazukuru vaAbrahamu kuti vaizogara nhaka

Ngatidzidzei VaGaratia chitsauko 3 ndima 15-18 muBhaibheri todziverenga pamwe chete: Hama, regai ndizvitaure maererano nomutauro wavanhu vose: Kunyange iri sungano yevanhu, kana yakasimbiswa → zvinoreva kuti “ yakasimbiswa pakati paMwari nomunhu" "Sungano yakanaka yezvinyorwa" haigoni kusiiwa kana kuwedzerwa kwairi. Chipikirwa chakaitwa kuna Abhurahama nezvizvarwa zvake. →Nokuti Mwari akavimbisa kuti Abrahama nezvizvarwa zvake vachagara nhaka yenyika, kwete nomurayiro asi nokururama kwokutenda. --Ona VaRoma 4:13 → Mwari haati “vose vana vako,” achireva vanhu vazhinji, asi “mwana wako mumwe,” achireva “munhu mumwe,” anova Kristu.

(2) Chero ani akavakirwa pakutenda achagara nhaka yaBaba Vekudenga

Mubvunzo: Chii chakavakirwa pakutenda
Mhinduro: Chero ani anotenda mu "chokwadi cheevhangeri" ari "nekutenda", achivimba chete nekutenda uye kwete pamabasa emunhu wekare → kutenda mu "evhangeri yaJesu Kristu" 1 akaberekwa kubva mukutenda kwevhangeri. , 2 vakazvarwa nemvura noMweya Mutsvene, 3 vakazvarwa naMwari! Ipapo ndipo patingazogara nhaka yeumambo hwaMwari, togara nhaka yeupenyu husingaperi, uye togara nhaka yaBaba vedu Vekudenga. Nokudaro, unofanira kuziva kuti avo vanovakirwa pa“kutenda” ndivo vana vaAbrahama. --Tarisa kuna VaGaratia chitsauko 3 ndima 7. Zvandiri kutaura ndezvekuti sungano yaMwari mberi inotaura nezvechipikirwa chaMwari chokuti Abrahama nevana vake vachagara nhaka "umambo hwaMwari" munyika. --Ona kuna Genesisi 22:16-18 naVaRoma 4:13

(3) Zvipikirwa zvaMwari hazvingakoneswi nomutemo

Haikwanise kubviswa nemutemo makore 430 gare gare →_→ inoreva "mutemo waMosesi". Nokuti vose vakatadza uye vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari - tarisa kuchitsauko 3 ndima 23 . Maererano nemutemo →_→ munhu wose ari munyika akaita "chivi", uye basa re "chivi" "rufu". Kureva kuti, vanhu pavanofa vodzokera kuguruva, zvikomborero zvakafanovimbiswa naMwari hazvizovi pasina here?

Naizvozvo, sungano yakagadzwa naMwari haigoni kukoneswa nomurayiro makore mazana mana namakumi matatu gare gare, zvichiita kuti chipikirwa chive chisina maturo. Nokuti kana nhaka ichibva kumurayiro, haibvi nokuda kwechipikirwa; →_→Kana vari vomurairo vari vadyi venhaka, “kutenda” kuchava pasina uye “chipikirwa” chichashaikwa.

(4) Mutemo unomutsa hasha uye unoranga vanhu

Nokuti murayiro unomutsa kutsamwa, pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika; →_→ inoreva kununurwa kwedu naJesu Kristu, uko kunoita kuti → 1 tisunungurwe pachivi → 2 kusunungurwa pamutemo → 3 kusunungurwa kubva kumunhu wekare Adhamu → 4 akatibvisa pa“munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari kuti tiise umambo hwe Mwanakomana anodiwa. Nenzira iyi, iwe hausisiri pasi pemurairo, haungaputsi murairo nechivi, uye haungazotukwa nemutemo wekutonga. Saka, unonzwisisa here? .

(5) Kupunzika panyasha nokuda kwemurairo

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi Mutemo?
Mhinduro: Avo vanoruramiswa nemabasa emurairo.
Naizvozvo, “nokutenda” ndiko kunoita kuti munhu ave mugari wenhaka, uye naizvozvo nenyasha, kuti chipikirwa chigoitwa zvirokwazvo kuvana vose, kwete bedzi kuna avo vari vomurayiro, asi naavo vanotevedzera kutenda kwavo Abrahama. --Verenga VaRoma 4:14-16. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Chenjedzo: Ani naani anobva pamabasa omurayiro akatukwa, nokuti hakuna munhu angaruramiswa pamberi paMwari namabasa omurayiro. Vanhu vane murairo vakaparadzaniswa naKristu uye vakawa panyasha. Zvikomborero zvakavimbiswa naMwari zvakava pasina. Naizvozvo, zvikomborero zvakavimbiswa naMwari zvinobva pa“kutenda” kwete pa“mutemo”! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Zvidzidzo zvemuBhaibheri: Kusatadza
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma chitsauko 4 ndima 15 tiverenge pamwe chete: Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha; Vhura zvakare kuna 1 Johane 3:9 Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; .

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiwadzana, uye tichagoverana dzidziso dzeBhaibheri pamwe chete "Kusapara mhosva sei" Namata: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi vanonyora nemaoko avo uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kure, zvokudya zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira, uye zvinhu zvomudzimu zvinotaurirwa kuvanhu vomudzimu kuita kuti upenyu hwedu hupfume. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Kana uchinzwisisa kuti wakasunungurwa pamurairo nechivi, haungaputsi murairo nechivi; ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, kutenda, uye makomborero! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

bvunza: Bhaibheri rinotidzidzisa → Pane nzira yekusatadza here?
mhinduro: Ngatidzidzei VaGaratia chitsauko 5 ndima 18 muBhaibheri toiverenga pamwe chete: Dan Kana muchitungamirirwa noMweya, hamuzi pasi pomurayiro . Ameni! Cherechedza: Kana uchitungamirirwa noMweya Mutsvene, hausi pasi pomurairo → “Kana usiri pasi pomurairo” haungatadzi. . Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

bvunza: Ndedzipi dzimwe nzira dzekusapara mhosva?
mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【1】Tiza kubva pamutemo

1 Simba rechivi mutemo :Kufa! Simba rako rekukunda riripi? Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi? Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo. Tarisa kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:55-56
2 Kudarika murairo chivi; Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro chivi. Tarisa kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 3 Ndima 4
Jesu akapindura akati, Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Mumwe nomumwe unoita zvivi muranda wezvivi; ona Johane 8:34
3 Mubairo wechivi rufu. Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. Ona VaRoma 6:23
4 Zvido zvakaipa zvinobva pamurairo. Nokuti patakanga tiri munyama, kuchiva kwakaberekwa nomurayiro kwaibata mumitezo yedu, uye kwakabereka chibereko chorufu. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 7:5
Kuchiva kana kwakurirwa kunozvara chivi; Tarisa kuna Jakobho 1:15
5 Hakuna murairo usina kutongwa sezvinoreva murairo; Nokuti Mwari haazi mutsauri wavanhu. Ani naani anotadza asina murayiro achaparadzwa asina murayiro; Tarisa kuna VaRoma 2:11-12

6 Kana pasina murayiro chivi chakafa —Verenga VaRoma 7:7-13
7 Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika; Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha; Tarisa kuna VaRoma 4:15

8 Kana pasina murayiro chivi hachinzi chivi; Mutemo usati wavapo, chivi chakanga chava munyika, asi kana pasina murayiro chivi. Ona VaRoma 5:13
9 Kufa kuchivi ndiko kusunungurwa pachivi. Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vechivi; …Akafa kuzvivi kamwe chete; Saizvozvo nemi vo muzviti makafa kuchivi, asi muri vapenyu kuna Mwari muna Kristu Jesu. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 6, ndima 6-7, 10-11
10 Kufa kumurairo kusunungurwa pamurairo; Asi sezvo takafa kumurairo wakanga wakatisunga, tasunungurwa pamurairo -- ona VaRoma 7:6.

Nokuda kwomurayiro, ini Pauro ndakafa kumurayiro kuti ndirarame kuna Mwari. --Ona VaGaratiya chitsauko 2 ndima 19

【2】Akaberekwa naMwari

Vose vakamugamuchira, akavapa simba rokuti vave vana vaMwari, kuna avo vanotenda muzita rake. Ava ndivo vasina kuberekwa neropa, kwete neruchiva, kana nechido chemurume, asi vakaberekwa naMwari. Tarisa kuna Johani 1:12-13
Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; Kubva pane izvi zvinoratidzwa vana vaMwari uye vana vadhiabhorosi. Ani naani asingaiti zvakarurama haazi waMwari, uyewo ani naani asingadi hama yake. 1 Johani 3:9-10

Tinoziva kuti mumwe nomumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haangatongotadzi; Tarisa kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 5 ndima 18

【3】Muna Kristu

Ani nani unogara maari haatadzi; ani nani anotadza haana kumuona kana kumuziva. Vana vangu vaduku, musaidzwa; Uyo anoita zvakarurama akarurama, saJehovha akarurama. Tarisa kuna 1 Johane 3:6-7
Uyo unoita chivi unobva kuna dhiabhorosi, nekuti dhiabhorosi wakatadza kubva pakutanga. Mwanakomana waMwari akaonekwa kuti aparadze mabasa adhiabhorosi. Tarisa kuna Johane 1 Chitsauko 3 Ndima 8

Ikozvino hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu. Nekuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu. --Tarisa kuna VaRoma 8 ndima 1-2

Nokuti makafa uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe chete naKristu muna Mwari. Panoonekwa Kristu, iye upenyu hwedu, nemiwo muchaonekwa pamwe chete naye mukubwinya. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Tarisa kuna VaKorose chitsauko 3 ndima 3-4 .

[Cherechedza]: Nekuongorora zvinyorwa zvemagwaro zviri pamusoro, isu Bhaibheri rinotidzidzisa kusatyora mutemo kana kutadza : 1 Kutenda kwakabatanidzwa naKristu, kurovererwa pamuchinjikwa, kufa, kuvigwa, uye kumutswa—kusunungurwa kubva kuchivi, kusunungurwa pamurairo, uye kusunungurwa pamunhu wekare; 2 akaberekwa naMwari; 3 Gara muna Kristu. Ameni! Zviri pamusoro apa ndiwo mashoko aMwari ose ari muBhaibheri. Vakaropafadzwa avo vanotenda, nokuti umambo hwokudenga ndohwavo vose vana vaMwari uye vachagara nhaka yenhaka yaBaba Vokudenga munguva inouya! Hareruya! Ameni

Mharidzo dzekugovera zvinyorwa, dzakafemerwa neMweya waMwari, Vashandi vaJesu Kristu, Hama Wang, Sista Liu, Sista Zheng, Bhuratha Cen, nevamwe vashandi, vanotsigira nekushanda pamwechete mubasa revhangeri reChechi yaJesu Kristu. Paridza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, vhangeri rinobvumira vanhu kuponeswa, kukudzwa, uye kuti miviri yavo iregererwe! Ameni

articles.title: Ukama huri pakati pemurairo nechivi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni

Takavhura Bhaibheri [VaRoma 7:7] ndokuverenga pamwe chete: Saka, tingatii? Murairo chivi here? Kwete! Asi dai pasina murayiro, handizaiziva kuti chivi chii. Kutoti mutemo unoti “Usachiva”, handizivi kuti kukara chii .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Ukama huri pakati pemurairo nechivi 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, tenda Jehovha! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa mumaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Zvokudya zvinotakurwa zvichibva kure kuenda kudenga, uye zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga zvinogoverwa kwatiri nenzira yakafanira, zvichiita kuti upenyu hwedu hupfume. Ameni! Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuti avhure pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kuona uye kunzwa chokwadi chemweya → kunzwisisa hukama huri pakati pemutemo nechivi.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Panongova nemupi wemitemo uye mutongi mumwe chete

Ngationgororei Bhaibheri [Jakobo 4:12] toriverenga pamwe chete: Kune mumwe chete anoita mutemo uye mutongi, iye anogona kuponesa nekuparadza. Iwe ndiwe ani kuti utonge vamwe?

1 Mumunda weEdheni, Mwari akaita sungano yepamutemo naAdhamu kuti aisafanira kudya muti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa Jehovha Mwari akaisa munhu mubindu reEdheni kuti aurime nokurichengeta. Jehovha Mwari akamurayira achiti, "Ungadya hako miti yose yomunda, asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa, usadya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya, uchafa zvirokwazvo." Chitsauko 15- Ndima 17 inonyora.

2 Mutemo waMosesi wechiJudha—Jehovha Mwari akapa mutemo “Mitemo Gumi” paGomo reSinai, kureva Gomo reHorebhi. Ekisodho 20 naRevhitiko. Mozisi akadana vaIsraeri vose pamwe chete akati kwavari, “Imi vaIsraeri, inzwai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa zvandiri kukuudzai nhasi kuti muzvidzidze nokuzviita. Jehovha Mwari wedu akaita sungano nesu paGomo reHorebhu. Sungano iyi haisi iyo yakagadzwa nemadzitateguru edu yakagadzwa nesu isu vapenyu nhasi - Deuteronomio 5: 1-3.

(2) Murairo hauna kuisirwa vakarurama;

Tinoziva kuti murairo wakanaka kana uchishandiswa zvakanaka; nokuti murairo hauna kuitirwa vakarurama, asi vasingateereri murairo, navasingateereri, navasingadi Mwari, navanotadza, navasina umwari, navasina maturo, navaparadzi, navaurayi, navafeve, navasingateereri. sodhoma, navanobira vanhu upenyu hwavo, navanoreva nhema, navanopika nhema, kana chipi nechipi chinopesana nokururama. --Zvakanyorwa muna 1Timoti Chitsauko 1:8-10

(3) Mutemo wakawedzerwa nokuda kwokudarika

Nenzira iyi, sei mutemo uripo? Wakawedzerwa nokuda kwokudarika, uchimirira kuuya kwomwana akanga aitirwa chipikirwa, uye akasimbiswa nomurevereri kubudikidza navatumwa. — VaGaratiya 3:19

(4) Mutemo wakawedzerwa kubva kunze kuti uwedzere kudarika

Murairo wakawedzerwa kuti kudarika kuwande; asi zvivi pazvakawanda, nyasha dzakawanda nokupfuvurisa. --Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 5:20. Cherechedza: Mutemo wakafanana ne“chiedza nechionioni” unoratidza “chivi” chiri muvanhu Unonzwisisa here?

(5) Mutemo unoita kuti vanhu vazive zvivi zvavo

Naizvozvo, hakuna nyama inganzi yakarurama pamberi paMwari nokuchengeta murayiro, nokuti murayiro unopa vanhu chivi. --Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 3:20

(6) Mutemo unovhara muromo wese

Tinoziva kuti zvose zviri mumurayiro zvinotaurirwa avo vari pasi pomurayiro, kuti miromo yose idzivirwe, uye kuti nyika yose ive nemhosva pamberi paMwari. --Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 3:19. Nokuti Mwari wakapfigira vanhu vose pakusateerera kwavo, kuti ave netsitsi kuvanhu vose. --Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 11:32

(7) Mutemo mudzidzisi wedu wekudzidzisa

Asi nheyo yoruponeso nokutenda haisati yasvika, uye tinochengetwa pasi pomurayiro kusvikira pakuzoratidzwa chokwadi. Nenzira iyi, murayiro ndiwo mudzidzisi wedu, unotitungamirira kuna Kristu kuti tigoruramiswa nokutenda. --Zvakanyorwa muna VaGaratiya 3:23-24

Ukama huri pakati pemurairo nechivi

( 1 ) Kudarika murairo chivi Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro chivi. -Zvakanyorwa muna 1 Johane 3:4. Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. — VaRoma 6:23 . Jesu akapindura kuti: “Chokwadi, chokwadi ndinoti kwamuri, mumwe nomumwe anoita zvivi muranda wechivi.”— Johani 8:34

( 2 ) Nyama yakabereka chivi kubudikidza nomurayiro Nekuti pataiva munyama, kuchiva kwemurairo kwaibata mumitezo yedu, kuchiva kwakabereka chibereko cherufu. zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 7:5. Asi umwe neumwe unoidzwa kana achikwehwa nekukwezwa nekuchiva kwake. Kuchiva kana kwakurirwa kunozvara chivi; -Maererano naJakobho 1:14-15

( 3 ) Kana pasina murayiro chivi chakafa -- Saka, tingati chii? Murairo chivi here? Kwete! Asi dai pasina murayiro, handizaiziva kuti chivi chii. Kunze kwekunge mutemo unoti, “Usachiva,” handingazivi kuti kukara chii. Zvisinei hazvo, chivi chakawana mukana wokuita kuti kuchiva kwose kuite mandiri nomurayiro; Ndisati ndave mupenyu kunze kwemurairo; Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 7:7-9.

( 4 ) Hakuna murairo Chivi hachisi chivi. Sezvo chivi sezvachakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe, uye nechivi rufu rwakauya kune vose, nokuti vose vakatadza. Mutemo usati wavapo, chivi chakanga chava munyika, asi kana pasina murayiro chivi. Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 5:12-13

( 5 ) Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha, uye pasina murayiro hapana kudarika. Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 4:15.

( 6 ) Ani naani anotadza ari pasi pomurayiro achatongwawo nomurayiro Munhu wose anotadza asina murayiro achaparadzwa asina murayiro; Zvakanyorwa muna VaRoma 2:12.

( 7 ) Takaponeswa kubva kuchivi uye kubva kumurairo uye nekutukwa kwemurairo kuburikidza nekutenda muna Ishe Jesu Kristu.

( Cherechedza: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinogona kuziva kuti chivi chii? Kudarika murairo chivi; --Tarira vaRoma 6:23 Simba rechivi ndiwo mutemo --Tarira kuna 1 Vakorinde 15:56; chivi chakabereka chivi, uye chivi chichikura chinobereka rufu. Kureva kuti, kuchiva munyama yedu kuchaitwa munhengo nokuda kwe“murairo” – kuchiva kwenyama kunenge kuchiitwa munhengo kuburikidza ne“mutemo” zvotanga kunambwa - uye nokukurumidza. sezvo kuchiva kunogamuchirwa, vachabereka “chivi”! Saka “chivi” chiripo nokuda kwomutemo. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

saka" Paul "Pfupiso pamusoro peVaRoma" murayiro nechivi "Hukama:

1 Pasina murairo chivi chakafa;

2 Kana pasina murayiro, chivi hachinzi chivi.

3 Kana pasina murayiro, hapana kudarika!

Somuenzaniso, “Evha” akaedzwa nenyoka mubindu reEdheni kuti adye muchero womuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa Nyoka yakati kwaari: “Hamungafi zvirokwazvo, asi nomusi wamunoudya. meso enyu achasvinudzwa, mukava saMwari, muchiziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa. Mashoko anonyengera e“nyoka” akapinda mumwoyo ma“Evha”, uye nokuda kwoutera hwenyama yake, ruchiva mukati make rwakatanga mumitezo yenyama idya” mumutemo, uye kuchiva kwakatanga kubata pamuviri.” Mushure mokunambwa, chivi chinoberekwa! Saka Evha akatambanudza ruoko ndokutanha muchero wemuti wekuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa ndokuudya nemurume wake "Adam". Saka, imi mose munonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

se" Paul "Zvakanzi muna VaRoma 7! Kunze kwekuti murairo uchiti, Usachiva, handizivi kuti kuchiva chii? Unoziva "kuchiva" - nokuti unoziva murairo - murairo unoti "ruchiva", saka "Pauro" akati. : “Pasina murayiro chivi chakafa, asi nomurayiro womurayiro, chivi chipenyu uye ini ndakafa. saka! Unonzwisisa here?

Mwari vanoda nyika! Akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti ave rudzikunuro rwedu mutemo. Uye chituko chemurairo, torai humwanakomana hwaMwari, muwane hupenyu husingaperi, uye mugare nhaka yeumambo hwekudenga! Ameni

horaiti! Nhasi ndichataura uye ndichagoverana nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye kufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: nyasha nomurayiro
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni.

Takavhura Bhaibheri [Johani 1:17] ndokuverenga pamwe chete: Murayiro wakapiwa kubudikidza naMozisi; nyasha nechokwadi zvakauya kubudikidza naJesu Kristu. Ameni

Nhasi tichadzidza, tichiyanana, uye nekugoverana pamwechete "Nyasha neMutemo" Munamato: Vanodiwa, Baba Vatsvene, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, tenda Jehovha! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Zvokudya zvinotakurwa zvichibva kure uye zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakakodzera kuti upenyu hwedu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye azarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise kuti mutemo wakadzikwa kubudikidza naMozisi. Nyasha nechokwadi zvinobva kuna Jesu Kristu ! Ameni.

Minamato iri pamusoro, minamato, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

(1) Nyasha hadzina basa nemabasa

Ngatinzverei Bhaibheri [VaRoma 11:6] tiverenge pamwe chete: Kana zviri zvenyasha, hazvibvi pamabasa; akafanirwa nenyasha; SaDavidi anodaidza avo vanoruramiswa naMwari kunze kwemabasa avo vakaropafadzwa. VaRoma 9:11 Nokuti mapatya akanga asati aberekwa, uye hakuna chakanaka kana chakaipa chakaitwa, asi kuti kuda kwaMwari pakusanangura kuratidzwe, kwete nokuda kwamabasa, asi nokuda kwaiye anovadana. )

(2) Nyasha dzinopiwa pachena

[ Mateo 5:45 ] Nenzira iyi muchava vanakomana vaBaba venyu vari kudenga, nokuti ivo vanoita kuti zuva ravo ribudire pane vakanaka nevakaipa, uye vanonayisa mvura pane vakarurama nevasakarurama. Mapisarema 65:11 Munoshongedza makore enyu nenyasha; nzira dzenyu dzose dzinodonha mafuta.

(3) Kuponeswa kwaKristu kunotsamira pakutenda;

Ngatinzverei Bhaibheri [VaRoma 3:21-28] tiverenge pamwe chete: Asi zvino kururama kwaMwari kwakaratidzwa kunze kwomurairo, kunouchapupu hwomurairo navaporofita, ndiko kururama kwaMwari nokutenda muna Jesu. Kristu Kuna vose vanotenda, pasina mutsauko. Nokuti vose vakatadza uye vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari; asi zvino vanoruramiswa pachena nenyasha dzaMwari nokudzikinura kuri muna Kristu Jesu. Mwari akagadza Jesu sorudzikinuro kubudikidza neropa raJesu uye nokutenda kwomunhu kuti aratidze kururama kwaMwari; nokuti akashivirira zvivi zvakaitwa kare kare kuti aratidze kururama kwake vanozivikanwa kuti vakarurama, uye kuti varuramise avo vanotenda muna Jesu. Kana zviri izvo, ungazvikudza sei? Hapana chekudada nacho. Tingashandisa sei chinhu chisipo? Iyo inzira yakanaka here? Kwete, inzira yekutenda munaShe. Saka (kune mipumburu yekare: nekuti) tine chokwadi: Munhu anoruramiswa nokutenda, kwete nokuteerera murayiro .

( Cherechedza: Vese maJuda vaive pasi pemutemo waMosesi nevaHedeni vaive vasina mutemo zvino vakaruramiswa nenyasha dzaMwari uye vanoruramiswa pachena kuburikidza nekutenda muruponeso rwaJesu Kristu! Ameni, haisi nzira yebasa rakanaka, asi nzira yekutenda munaShe. Naizvozvo takaona kuti munhu anoruramiswa nokutenda uye hazvibvi pakuteerera murayiro. )

Murayiro wavaIsraeri wakapiwa kubudikidza naMozisi:

(1) Mirayiro yakavezwa pamatombo maviri

[ Eksodho 20:2-17 ] “Ndini Jehovha Mwari wako, akakubudisa munyika yeEgipita, muimba youranda, “Usava navamwe vamwari kunze kwangu usazviitira mufananidzo wakavezwa, kana uri mufananidzo wechinhu chiri kudenga kumusoro, kana wechiri panyika pasi, kana wechiri mumvura. Usareva zita raJehovha Mwari wako pasina; nokuti Jehovha haangaregi kupa mhosva anoreva zita rake pasina, “Rangarira zuva resabata, kuti urichengete rive dzvene kuti mazuva ako ave mazhinji panyika yaunopiwa naJehovha Mwari wako.” “Usaita upombwe.” “Usapupurira wokwako nhema.” “Usachiva imba yomuvakidzani wako usachiva mukadzi wowokwako, kana muranda wake, kana murandakadzi wake, kana nzombe yake, kana mbongoro yake, kana chimwe chaanacho.

(2) Kuteerera mirairo kunoguma nemakomborero

[Dheuteronomio 28:1-6] “Kana ukanyatsoteerera inzwi raJehovha Mwari wako, ukachengeta nokuita mirairo yake yose, yandinokuraira nhasi, uchakugadza pamusoro pendudzi dzose dziri panyika teererai inzwi raJehovha Mwari wenyu, maropafadzo aya achakuteverai, auye pamusoro penyu: Ucharopafadzwa muguta, uye ucharopafadzwa pazvibereko zvomuviri wako, nezvibereko zvevhu rako, nezvibereko zvevhu rako. mucharopafadzwa mhuru dzenyu namakwayana enyu, nomudziyo wenyu wokukanyira chingwa.

(3) Kutyora mirairo uye kutukwa

Vhesi 15-19 “Kana usingateereri inzwi raJehovha Mwari wako, nokuchengeta mirairo yake yose nezvaakatema, zvandinokuraira nhasi, kutukwa uku kunotevera kuchakutevera, nokukuwira: Uchatukwa panyika. Uchatukwa kana uchipinda muguta, uye uchatukwa mumunda wako. Tswanda yako ngaitukwe nomudziyo wako wokukanyira chingwa murayiro uri pachena, nokuti Rugwaro runoti, “Vakarurama vachararama nokutenda. "

(4) Mutemo unoenderana nemaitiro

[ VaRoma 2:12-13 ] Nokuti Mwari haatsauri vanhu. Ani naani anotadza asina murayiro achaparadzwa asina murayiro; (Nokuti havazi vanzwi vomurayiro vakarurama pamberi paMwari, asi vaiti vomurayiro.

VaGaratia 3 Vhesi 12 Nokuti murairo haubvi nokutenda, asi wakati: Uyo anoita zvinhu izvi uchararama nazvo.

( Cherechedza: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti mutemo wakapiwa kubudikidza naMosesi, sokutsiura kwakaita Jesu vaJudha - Johani 7:19 Ko Mosesi haana kukupai mutemo here? Asi hakuna wenyu anochengeta murairo. VaJudha vakadai sa“Pauro” vaichengeta murayiro sezvavakanga vakaita kare Pauro akadzidziswa zvakasimba nomutemo pasi paGamarieri. Nei Jesu akati hapana mumwe wavo aichengeta mutemo? Izvi zvinodaro nekuti vaichengeta murairo, asi hapana akachengeta murairo vose vakadarika murairo chivi, naizvozvo vose vakatadza. Ndiko kusaka Jesu akatsiura maJuda nekusachengeta Mutemo waMosesi. Pauro amene akataura kuti kuchengeta mutemo kwaichimbova kunobetsera, asi zvino zvaakasvika pakuziva ruponeso rwaKristu, kuchengeta mutemo kunokuvadza. --Verenga VaFiripi 3:6-8.

Pashure pokunge Pauro anzwisisa ruponeso rwenyasha dzaMwari kupfurikidza naKristu, akatsiurawo vaJudha vakadzingiswa nokuda kwokusachengeta mutemo kunyange ivo pachavo - VaGaratia 6:13 . Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?

Sezvo munhu wose ari munyika akadarika murayiro, kudarika murayiro chivi, uye vose vari munyika vakatadza uye vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari. Mwari vanoda nyika! Nokudaro, akatuma Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, kuti auye pakati pedu kuzozivisa zvokwadi. —Verenga VaRoma 10:4.

Rudo rwaKristu runozadzisa mutemo → kureva kuti, runoshandura husungwa hwemurairo kuti huve munyasha dzaMwari uye chituko chemurairo kuti chive chikomborero chaMwari! Nyasha dzaMwari, chokwadi, uye rudo rukuru zvinoratidzwa kubudikidza naJesu akaberekwa ari mumwe oga ! Ameni, saka, imi mose munonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

horaiti! Apa ndipo pandinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi nhasi. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, rudo rwaMwari, uye nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Ukama pakati peMutemo, Chivi, uye Rufu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna 1 VaKorinte 15:55-56 toaverenga pamwe chete: Die! Simba rako rekukunda riripi? Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi? Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Ukama huri pakati pemutemo, chivi, uye rufu 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! "Mukadzi akanaka" anotumira vashandi → kuburikidza nemaoko avo vanonyora uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, iro ndiro evhangeri yeruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuzarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye kunzwisisa Bhaibheri. Hwisisa kuti “rufu” runobva kuchivi, uye “chivi” chinokonzerwa nezvishuvo zvakaipa zvinobva pamurairo munyama. Zvinogona kuonekwa kuti kana iwe uchida kupukunyuka kubva ku "rufu" → unofanira kupukunyuka kubva ku "chivi" kana iwe uchida kupukunyuka kubva "kuchivi" → unofanira kupukunyuka kubva "mutemo". Kuburikidza nemuviri waIshe Jesu Kristu takafawo kumurairo → kusunungurwa parufu, nechivi, nemurairo, nekutukwa kwemurairo. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma 5:12, torivhura toverenga tose:
Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza.

1. Rufu

Mubvunzo: Nei vanhu vachifa?
Mhinduro: Vanhu vanofa nokuda kwe (chivi).
Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. VaRoma 6:23
→→Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe (Adhamu), uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, naizvozvo rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose nokuti vanhu vose vakatadza. VaRoma 5:12

2. Chivi

Mubvunzo: Chivi chii?
Mhinduro: Kutyora mutemo → chivi.
Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro chivi. 1 Johani 3:4

3. Mutemo

Mubvunzo: Ndeipi mitemo?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Mutemo waAdhamu

Asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya zvirokwazvo uchafa! ” Genesisi 2:17
(Onai: Adhamu akaputsa sungano ndokutadza - Hosiya 6:7 → “Chivi” chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete (Adhamu), uye rufu rwakabva muchivi, naizvozvo rufu rwakauya kuvanhu vose nokuti vanhu vose vakatadza → Kutyora mutemo ndiko Chivi→ipapo vose vakapiwa mhosva uye vakafa pasi pomurayiro waAdhamu→vose vakafa muna Adhamu (ona 1VaKorinde 15:22).

(2) Mutemo waMosesi

Mubvunzo: Chii chinonzi Mutemo waMosesi?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

1 Mitemo ineGumi--Tarira kuna Ekisodho 20:1-17
2 Mitemo, nemirayiro, nezvakatonga, nemirairo yakanyorwa mubhuku remurairo!
→→Zvose: 613 zvinhu

[Mitemo neMitemo] Mosesi akadana vaIsraeri vose pamwe chete akati kwavari: “Imi vaIsraeri, inzwai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa, zvandiri kukupai nhasi, kuti muzvidzidze nokuzviita.”— Dheuteronomio 5:1
VaIsraeri vose vakadarika murayiro wenyu, vakatsauka, vakasateerera inzwi renyu; naizvozvo kutuka nokupika kwakanyorwa mumurayiro waMozisi muranda wenyu zvakadururwa pamusoro pedu, nokuti takatadzira Mwari. Dhanieri 9:11

4. Ukama huri pakati pomutemo, chivi, norufu

Die! Simba rako rekukunda riripi?
Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi?
Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo. ( 1 VaKorinte 15:55-56 )

(Cherechedza: Kana iwe uchida kusunungurwa kubva ku "rufu" → → unofanira kusununguka kubva ku "chivi"; kana uchida kusununguka kubva "kuchivi" → → unofanira kusununguka kubva pasimba uye kutukwa kwe "mutemo")

Mubvunzo: Ungatiza sei murairo nekutuka?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

→→... kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu takafawo kumurayiro... Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro unotisunga, zvino tasunungurwa pamurayiro...Ona VaRoma 7:4, 6 uye VaG. 3:13

Mubvunzo: Ungatiza sei chivi?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

→→ISHE akaisa paari (Jesu) chivi chevanhu vose--Ona Isaya 53:6
→→ (Jesu) Nokuti sezvo mumwe akafira vose, vose vakafa - tarisa kuna 2 VaKorinde 5:14
→→Nokuti vakafa vanosunungurwa pachivi—Ona VaRoma 6:7 →Nokuti makafa—Ona VaKorose 3:3
→→Munhu wose anofa, uye munhu wose anosunungurwa pachivi. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Mubvunzo: Ungapukunyuka sei kubva murufu?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Tenda muna Jesu

“Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda maari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi … Ani naani anotenda muMwanakomana ane upenyu husingaperi upenyu husingaperi (mashoko okutanga anoreva kuti haazooni upenyu husingaperi), kutsamwa kwaMwari kunogara pamusoro pake.” ( Johani 3:16, 36 )

(2) Tenda muvhangeri→ruponeso rwaJesu Kristu

→→(Jesu) akati: “Nguva yakwana, uye umambo hwaMwari hwaswedera pedyo

→→Uye muchaponeswa nevhangeri iri, kana musingatendi pasina asi muchibatisisa zvandinokuparidzirai. Chandakakumikidzawo kwamuri chaiva chokuti: Kutanga, kuti Kristu akafira zvivi zvedu sezvazvakanyorwa muMagwaro, kuti akavigwa, uye kuti akamutswa pazuva rechitatu maererano neMagwaro, 1 Vakorinde 15:2-4 .

→→Handina nyadzi pamusoro peEvhangeri; Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa muvhangeri iri; Sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” ( VaRoma 1:16-17 )

(3)Unofanira kuberekwa patsva

Jesu akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kana munhu asingaberekwi nemvura noMweya, haangagoni kupinda muushe hwaMwari. Icho chakaberekwa nenyama inyama; . Ndinoti, ‘Unofanira kuberekwa patsva’ Johani 3:5-7
Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu ngaarumbidzwe! Netsitsi dzake huru akatipa upenyu hutsva mutariro mhenyu nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa, 1 Petro 1:3

(4) Ani naani anorarama uye anotenda maari haangatongofi

Jesu akati kwaari, “Ndini kumuka noupenyu. Ani naani anotenda kwandiri achararama, kunyange akafa, uye ani naani anorarama uye anotenda mandiri haangatongofi. Unotenda izvi here?
(Ndinoshamisika kana muchinzwisisa: Ishe Jesu vanorevei nemashoko aya? Kana zvisiri, saka unofanira kuzvininipisa uye kuteerera zvakanyanya kuevhangeri yechokwadi inoparidzwa nevashandi vaMwari.)
4. Mirairo yake haina kuoma kuchengeta

Tinoda Mwari nokuchengeta mirayiro yake, uye mirayiro yake hairemi. 1 Johani 5:3

Mubvunzo: Murairo waMosesi → wakaoma kuchengeta here?
Mhinduro: Zvakaoma kudzivirira.

Mubvunzo: Sei zvakaoma kudzivirira?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

→→Nokuti ani naani anochengeta murayiro wose asi akagumburwa pane chimwe chete ane mhosva yokuputsa iwo ose. Jakobho 2:10

→→Mumwe nomumwe anochengeta murayiro sohwaro, ari pasi pechituko; nokuti kwakanyorwa, kuchinzi: “Ngaatukwe munhu asingarambi achiita zvose zvakanyorwa mubhuku yomurayiro (Chitsauko 613) “Hakuna munhu unonzi wakarurama pamberi paMwari nokuda kwaizvozvo; murayiro (ndiko kuti, nokuchengeta murayiro), nokuti Bhaibheri rinoti: “Wakarurama uchararama nokutenda.” VaGaratia 3:10-11.

Mubvunzo: Kuchengeta mutemo sei?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

(1) Rudo rwaJesu runozadzisa mutemo

Musafunga kuti ndakauya kuzoparadza murairo kana vaporofita; handina kuuya kuzoparadza murairo, asi kuzouzadzisa. Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kusvikira denga nenyika zvapfuura, hapana jota rimwe kana vara rimwe richapfuura. kupfuura Mutemo. Zvose zvichazadzika Mateo 5:17-18.

Mubvunzo: Jesu akazadzisa murairo sei?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

→→...ISHE akaisa pana (Jesu) chivi chedu tose—Isaya 53:6

→→ Nokuti rudo rwaKristu runotimanikidza; nokuti tinorangarira kuti, mumwe akafira vose, vose vakafa;

→→... kubudikidza nomuviri waKristu takafawo kumurayiro... Asi sezvo takafa kumurayiro unotisunga, zvino tasunungurwa pamurayiro...Ona VaRoma 7:4, 6 uye VaG. 3:13

→→Musava nechikwereti nomunhu kunze kwokudanana, nokuti anoda muvakidzani wake azadzisa murayiro. Somuenzaniso, mirayiro yakadai sokuti, “Usaita upombwe, Usauraya, Usaba, Usachiva,” nemimwe mirayiro inoputirwa mumutsara uyu: “Ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe. Rudo haruitiri vamwe zvakaipa, saka rudo runozadzisa murayiro. VaRoma 13:8-10

(2) Anofanira kuberekwazve

1 Akazvarwa nemvura nemweya- Johane 3:6-7

2 Shoko rechokwadi rinobereka— 1 Vakorinde 4:15, Jakobho 1:18

3 Akaberekwa naMwari—Johani 1:12-13

Umwe neumwe wakaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nekuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; 1 Johani 3:9

(3) Rarama muna Kristu

Ikozvino hakuchina kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu. Nekuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura pamurairo wechivi nerufu. VaRoma 8:1-2
Ani nani unogara maari haatadzi; ani nani anotadza haana kumuona kana kumuziva. 1 Johani 3:6

(4)Mirairo yake haina kuoma kuchengeta

Mubvunzo: Sei mirairo isina kuoma kuchengeta?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

→→ Nokuti (munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva) anogara muna Kristu-- Tarisa kuna VaRoma 8:1
→→ (Kuzvarwa patsva kwemunhu mutsva) Zvakavigwa muna Mwari--Verenga VaKorose 3:3
→→ Kristu anooneka (Munhu mutsva) anoonekawo - tarisa VaKorose 3:4
→ Jesu akazadzisa mutemo → kureva, (munhu mutsva) akazadzisa mutemo;
→→ Jesu akamuka kubva kuvakafa → (munhu mutsva) akamuka naye;
→→ Jesu akakunda rufu→ndiko kuti, (munhu mutsva) akakunda rufu;
→→ Jesu haana chivi uye haakwanisi kutadza → kureva kuti, (munhu mutsva) haana chivi;
→→ Jesu ndiye Ishe Mutsvene → Vana vaMwari vatsvene zvakare!

Isu (munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva) tiri nhengo dzemuviri wake, dzakavigwa naKristu muna Mwari! "Testamente Itsva" Mutemo unoiswa mumunhu mutsva - VaHebheru 10:16 → Pfupiso yomurairo ndiKristu - VaRoma 10:4 → Kristu ndiMwari → Mwari rudo - 1 Johane 4:16 (Munhu mutsva akazvarwa patsva ) anosunungurwa kubva pamurairo "mumvuri" wemurairo - VaHebheru 10: 1 → Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika - VaRoma 4: 15. Munhu (mutsva) anogara mumufananidzo wechokwadi waKristu, akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari, uye anogara murudo rwaMwari (munhu mutsva) anongoonekwa kana Kristu aonekwa. Naizvozvo, (munhu mutsva) haana kutyora mutemo mumwe chete uye akachengeta mirairo yese haana kutyora chero mutemo uye akatadza. Ameni!

→→Ani naani akaberekwa naMwari haatadzi, nokuti shoko raMwari rinogara maari; uye haangatadzi, nokuti akaberekwa naMwari. 1 Johane 3:9 (Vatendi vanodarika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vanotadza kukunda muedzo uyu vowira muchimiro chekutenda nedzidziso) - tarisa VaRoma 6:17-23

Handizivi, unonzwisisa here?

Ani naani anonzwa shoko roumambo hwokudenga akasarinzwisisa, wakaipa anouya obvisa chakakushwa mumwoyo make. . Mateu 13:19

Saka Johani akati → Tinoda Mwari kana tichichengeta mirayiro yake (urwo rudo), uye mirayiro yake hairemi. Nokuti mumwe nomumwe akaberekwa naMwari anokunda nyika, uye kutenda kwedu kunotikunda. Ndianiko anokunda nyika? Haasi iye anotenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari here? 1 Johani 5:3-5

Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Verenga VaFiripi 4:1-3

articles.title: Tsananguro yemibvunzo yakaoma: Mukadzi akanaka
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri [Zvirevo 31:10] tiverenge pamwe chete: Ndiani angawana mukadzi anoshingairira zvakanaka? Anokosha kupfuura maparera.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " mukadzi akanaka 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni, tenda Jehovha!

mukadzi akanaka Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu inotumira vashandi – kuburikidza neshoko rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa rechokwadi mumaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu! Tipei zvokudya zvomudzimu zvokudenga munguva, kuti upenyu hwedu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru. Ameni!

Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Hwisisa kuti "mukadzi akanaka" anoreva kereke munaShe Jesu Kristu → Ndiani angaiwana? Anokosha kupfuura maparera . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, uye maropafadzo anoitwa muzita raIshe wedu Jesu! Ameni

【1】PaMukadzi Akanaka

-----Mukadzi akanaka-----

Ndakanzvera Bhaibheri [ Zvirevo 31:10-15 ], ndakarivhura pamwe chete ndokurava: Ndiani angawana mukadzi anoshingairira zvakanaka? Anokosha kupfuura maparera . Murume wake haangashaiwi rubatsiro kana mwoyo wake uchivimba naye; Akatsvaga cashmere nerineni uye aida kushanda nemaoko ake. Akafanana nechikepe chevatengesi chiri kuuya nezvokudya kubva kure. Anomuka kuchiri mambakwedza, ogovera zvokudya kuvanhu veimba yake, uye anopa vashandikadzi vake basa.

(1) Mukadzi

[ Genesi 2:22-24 ] Naizvozvo nembabvu yakanga yatorwa pamunhu naJehovha Mwari, akaumba mukadzi, akamuisa kumunhu. Murume akati, "Uyu ipfupa remafupa angu nenyama yenyama yangu. Ungamuti mukadzi, nokuti akatorwa pamurume." .

( 2 ) wedzinza remukadzi — Genesi 3:15 naMateo 1:23 : “Mhandara ichava napamuviri ndokubereka mwanakomana, uye vachamutumidza kuti Emanueri (Emanueri rinoshandurwa sa“Mwari naMwari.”) Tiri muna ikoku pamwe chete .")

( 3 ) Kereke muviri wake -- VaEfeso 1:23 Kereke muviri wake, wakazadzwa naiye anozadza zvose mune zvose. Chitsauko 5 Ndima 28-32 Nenzira imwe cheteyo, varume vanofanira kuda vakadzi vavo semiviri yavo vamene. Hakuna akambovenga muviri wake, asi anoupa zvokudya uye anouchengeta, sezvinoita Kristu kukereke, nokuti tiri nhengo dzomuviri wake (mamwe magwaro anowedzera: Nyama yake nemapfupa). Nokuda kwaizvozvi, murume achasiya baba namai vake uye asanganiswe nomukadzi wake, uye vaviri ava vachava nyama imwe. Chakavanzika ichi chikuru, asi ndinotaura zvaKristu nekereke.

( Cherechedza: Nekuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro, tinonyora kuti Adhamu mufananidzo uye Jesu Kristu ndiye mufananidzo wechokwadi; mukadzi "Eve ndizvo inofananidzira kereke , kereke ipfupa remapfupa nenyama yenyama yaKristu. Jesu akazvarwa nemhandara Maria, ndiye mwana wemukadzi, isu takazvarwa naMwari - muna Kristu Jesu Ishe Rarama nenzira yechokwadi Kwatiri, tinodya nokunwa muviri neropa raKristu, tichiwana muviri wake noupenyu. Naizvozvo, isu tiri vazukuru vevakadzi; Ndinokutendai Ishe! )

【2】Ndiani angawana mukadzi ane hunhu hwakanaka?

Chechi yechiKristu-----

Ndakanzvera Bhaibheri [ Zvirevo 31:10-29 ]
10 Ndiani angawana mukadzi anoshingairira zvakanaka? Anokosha kupfuura maparera .

Cherechedza: "Mukadzi ane hunhu anoreva kereke. Kereke yemweya"

11Murume wake haangashaiwi rubatsiro kana mwoyo wake uchivimba naye
12 Haana kumbotadzira murume wake.
13 Anotsvaka mari neruchinda, Anobata namaoko ake nomufaro.
14 Akafanana nechikepe chavatengesi chinotakura zviyo kure;
15 Anomuka mambakwedza ndokugovera vanhu veimba yake zvokudya, achipa varandakadzi vake basa.

Cherechedza: "iye" anoreva chechi Zvokudya zvomudzimu zvinotakurwa kubva “kure” zvichiendeswa kudenga Kusati kwaedza, chechi inogadzirira zvokudya zvinobva kudenga nokukurumidza, inopa zvokudya “mana youpenyu,” ndiko kuti, zvokudya zvomudzimu, kuhama nehanzvadzi maererano nokugoverwa kwezvokudya. , uye anogovera basa rinofanira kuitwa ku“varandakadzi” avo vanonongedzera kuVaranda kana kuti vashandi vanoparidza shoko rezvokwadi yevhangeri! Unozvinzwisisa here izvi?

16 Zvino wakati oda munda, akautenga, nemutengo wamaoko ake, akarima munda wemizambiringa;
Cherechedza: "munda" unoreva nyika , vose vakadzikinurwa naye, uye akadyara munda wemizambiringa, “Muti Woupenyu muBindu reEdheni” nebasa remaoko ake.

17 Nekugona kwake ( Simba reMweya Mutsvene ) sunga chiuno chako kuti maoko ako asimbe.
18 Anofunga kuti basa rake rinobatsira; mwenje wake haudzimi usiku.
19 Anobata mudonzvo muruoko rwake, uye gumbo rinomonereka muruoko rwake.
20 Anotambanudzira ruoko rwake kumurombo, uye anotambanudzira ruoko rwake kune anoshayiwa. Cherechedza: Vashandi vekereke vanoparidza vhangeri kune varombo, vachivabvumira kuwana hupenyu chete, asi vanodya uye kunwa mvura yemweya uye chikafu chemweya kuti vave nehupenyu huzhinji. Ameni!
21 Haana kufunga mhuri yake nokuda kwechando, nokuti mhuri yose yakanga yakafuka nguo tsvuku. →Imhando ye"kupfeka munhu mutsva nekupfeka Kristu".
Cherechedza: Kana nzara nenhamo zvasvika pazuva “rechando”, kereke haizonetseke nezvenhengo dzemhuri nekuti vese vane mucherechedzo waJesu pavari. Ameni
22 Akazviitira magumbeze akarukwa;
23 Murume wake akanga agere pasuo reguta navakuru venyika, uye akanga achizivikanwa navanhu vose.
24 Akaita zvokufuka zvomucheka akazvitengesa, akatengesa zvisungo zvake kuvatengesi.
25 Simba noumambo zvipfeko zvake; anonyemwerera paanofunga zvichauya.
26 Anoshamisa muromo wake nouchenjeri;
27 Anoona basa repamba uye haadyi zvokudya zvisina basa. Vana vake vanomuka, vachimuti, Makaropafadzwa;
28 Murume wakewo akamurumbidza;
29 akati: Kune vakadzi vakawanda vane zvipo uye vane hunhu, asi iwe ndiwe wega unovakunda vese. ! "

( Cherechedza: 【Pamukadzi Akanaka】 mukadzi akanaka :murume" Kristu "Rumbidza mukadzi wako" chechi "Mukadzi ane hunhu, anoshama muromo nenjere, anonyemwerera paanofunga nezveramangwana, nekuti vana vake vemweya vanonzwa chokwadi vodzokera kumusha. Sekuseka kwakaita Sara paakabereka Isaka! Haadyi asina chaanongoita. zvokudya - uye Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga kuti zvipe mhuri yake zvokudya zuva nezuva, uye vana vake "vanotinongedza" vanosimuka vachimuti akaropafadzwa! ndiye ega anovapfuura vese!" “Ameni. Zvakazarurwa 19 8-9 Kristu kuroora ［ chechi ]Nguva yasvika. Saka, imi mose munonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Ndinokutendai Ishe! Hareruya!

Uku ndiko kupera kweruwadzano rwangu nemi nhasi Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, uye nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose! Ameni

Manyoro eEvhangeri

Kubva: Hama nehanzvadzi mukereke yaIshe Jesu Kristu
