articles.title: Bhaibheri ｜Chivi chei? Chivi chisingaurayisi here?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri kuna 1 Johane chitsauko 5 ndima 17 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kusarurama kose chivi, uye kune zvivi zvisingaurayisi. .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Chivi chipi chisingaurayisi? 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” akatumira vashandi nemaoko avo, zvose zvakanyorwa uye zvakaparidzwa, neshoko rechokwadi, iro vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti “chivi chipi” chivi chisingaurayisi? Kuti nokuvimba noMweya Mutsvene, tigouraya mabasa ose akaipa omuviri, tidzika midzi mukutenda, uye tidzike midzi nokuvakwa muna Jesu Kristu panzvimbo pokuvakwa muna Adhamu. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mubvunzo: Mhosva yei? Chivi chisingaurayisi here?

Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【1】Zvivi zviri kunze kwemutemo wesungano pakati paMwari nemunhu

Sezvakangoita munguva dzakare apo kwakanga kusina mutemo wewanano, chakanga chisiri chivi kuti mukoma atore hanzvadzi yake munun'una uye akazova mudzimai wangu. Pane zvakare zvinyorwa muna Genesi 38 pamusoro paJudah naTamari, ndiko kuti, chitadzo chehupombwe uye makunakuna pakati patezvara naTamari.

Muna Johane 2, kunewo chifeve chemuHedeni chinonzi Rahabhi, chakaitawo chitadzo chokureva nhema, asi vaHedheni vakanga vasina murairo waMosesi, naizvozvo hazvina kutorwa sechivi. Izvi zvivi zviri kunze kwesungano yemutemo, saka hazvinzi zvitadzo. Nokuti murayiro unomutsa hasha; —Verenga VaRoma 4:15. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

[2] Zvivi zvinoitwa nenyama

Ngatidzidzei VaRoma 8:9 muBhaibheri uye tiiverenge pamwe chete: Kana Mweya waMwari achigara mauri, iwe hausisiri wenyama, asi woMweya. Kana munhu asina Mweya waKristu, haazi waKristu.

Cherechedza: Kana Mudzimu waMwari, kureva kuti, Mudzimu Mutsvene “uchigara” mumwoyo yenyu, hausi wenyama → kureva kuti, “unonzwa” uye unonzwisisa nzira yechokwadi uye kutenda evhangeri yaKristu → kubhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene → kureva kuti, "munhu mutsva" anoberekwazve uye akaponeswa haasi Ndeye "munhu wekare" muviri. Heano vanhu vaviri → mumwe akazvarwa neMweya waMwari; Kudarika kunooneka kwo“munhu wekare” munyama hakuzoverengerwi ku“munhu mutsva” akavanzwa naKristu muna Mwari. Sokutaura kunoita Ishe: “Musaverengera kudarika kwo“munhu [wavo] wekare” ku“munhu [wavo] mutsva!” Ameni – nongedzera kuna 2 VaKorinte 5:19. Unonzwisisa ikoku nenzira yakajeka here?

Mupositora Pauro akatsiura kereke yeKorinde achiti: “Zvakanzwika kuti upombwe huri kuitika pakati penyu. Mhombwe icharangwa Dzingai munhu akadaro kubva pakati penyu uye mugomupa kuna Satani kuti "ashatise nyama yake" kuti mweya wake ugoponeswa pazuva raShe Jesu - nokuti munhu akadaro "murume akwegura" uye achida kuparadza temberi yaMwari, Ishe achamuranga uye achaparadza muviri wake kuti mweya wake uponeswe. zvishuvo zvakaipa, zvishuvo zvakaipa, uye makaro (makaro zvakafanana nokunamata zvidhori). Hupenyu hwaJesu ngahuratidzwe matiri → NdiMwari anokupa mbiri, mubairo, nekorona.

Kana munhu ari muna Kristu, ava chisikwa chitsva; …Ndizvo zvakaita Mwari muna Kristu achiyananisa nyika kwaari, asingavaverengeri kudarika kwavo, akatipa isu shoko rokuyananisa. —Verenga 2 VaKorinde 5:17, 19.

VaRoma 7:14-24 Sezvo muapostora “Pauro” akaberekwa patsva uye nyama ichirwa nomudzimu, naizvozvo ndinoziva kuti mandiri, ndiko kuti, munyama yangu, hamuna chinhu chakanaka. Nokuti zviri kwandiri kuti ndiite zvakanaka, asi hazvisi kwandiri kuti ndizviite. Naizvozvo zvakanaka, zvandinoda, handizviiti; Kana ndikaita chinhu chandisingadi kuita, handisi ini ndinochiita, asi chivi chinogara mandiri. Nyama yekare yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa uye yakafa pamwe chete naKristu. Handichisiri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu anorarama nokuda kwangu. Sezvakataurwa nomuapostora “Pauro”! Ndinozviona ndafa ku“chivi” uye ndakafa kumurayiro nokuda kwe“mutemo” – tarisa vaRoma 6:6-11 naVaGaratiya 2:19-20. Inotsanangura kuti “munhu mutsva” mushure mokuzvarwa patsva uye nokuponeswa haasi wezvitadzo zvenyama yomunhu wekare. Ishe vanoti! Usarangarira zvakare, uye usaverengera zvivi zvenyama yemunhu wekare ku "munhu mutsva." Ameni! Ipapo akati, “Handicharangaririzve zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo.” Zvino sezvo zvivi izvi zvaregererwa. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? —Verenga VaHebheru 10:17-18

(Yambiro: Mambo Dhavhidhi akaitawo upombwe nokuponda panyama, uye njodzi yomunondo yakauya kumhuri yake panyama.” Akataura muPisarema kuti vaya vanonzi vakarurama naMwari “kunze kwemabasa” vanokomborerwa. “Kururama” kwaMwari Kunozarurwa “kunze kwomurayiro” – nongedzerawo kuna VaRoma 3:21 “Mambo Sauro nomupanduki Judhasi” vakadembawo zviito zvavo uye vakareurura zvivi zvavo nokuti “vakanga vasina kutenda” uye havana kugadza mirau pa[kutenda]. ]. , Mwari haana kukanganwira zvivi zvavo? (Ona 2 Timotio 1:4.)

【3】Chivi chakaitwa pasina murairo

1 Ani naani anotadza asina murayiro achaparara asina murayiro, uye ani naani anotadza ari pasi pomurayiro achatongwa nomurayiro. — VaRoma 2:12 .

2 Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika → nokuti mutemo unomutsa hasha (kana kuti kushandura: kuranga, uye pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika); — VaRoma 4:15

3 Kana pasina murayiro, chivi chakafa —VaRoma 7:8

4 Kana pasina murayiro, chivi hachinzi chivi → Mutemo usati wavapo, chivi chakanga chatova munyika; — VaRoma 5:13

(VaRoma 10:9-10) VaHedheni havana murayiro, vanogona kururamiswa uye vova noupenyu husingaperi nokutenda muna Jesu Kristu chete, asi vaJudha vane murayiro waMozisi, vanofanira kutanga vatendeuka pazvivi zvavo vobhabhatidzwa mumvura. Vanofanira kutenda muna Jesu uye vagobhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene kuti vaponeswe uye vave noupenyu.

Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

2021.06.05

articles.title: Bhaibheri: Chivi chii chinoendesa kurufu?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 1 Johane chitsauko 5 ndima 16 tiverenge pamwe chete: Kana munhu achiona hama yake ichiita chivi chisingaurayisi, anofanira kumunyengeterera, uye Mwari achamupa upenyu; .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Chivi chii chinoendesa kurufu? 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza nemaoko avo vanonyora nokutaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinounzwa kubva kure kudenga uye zvinopihwa kwauri panguva yakakodzera, kuti hupenyu hwako hwemweya huve hwakapfuma! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Munoziva kuti chivi chinoendesa kurufu chii? Ngatitendei vhangeri uye tinzwisise nzira yechokwadi, uye tigosunungurwa kubva kuchivi chinoendesa kurufu; ! Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mubvunzo: Chivi chii chinoendesa kurufu?
Mhinduro: Ngatitarisei pana 1 Johani 5:16 muBhaibheri toiverenga pamwe chete: Kana munhu akaona hama yake ichiita chivi chisingaurayisi, anofanira kumunyengeterera, uye Mwari achamupa upenyu chivi chinoendesa kurufu, Ini Hazvina kunzi munhu anofanira kunyengeterera chivi ichi.

Mubvunzo: Zvivi zvinoendesa kurufu ndezvipi?
Mhinduro: Tsanangudzo yakadzama pazasi

【1】Chivi chaAdhamu chekutyora chibvumirano

Genesisi 2 Vhesi 17 Asi muti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa usaudya, nokuti nomusi waunoudya zvirokwazvo uchafa.

VaRoma 5:12, 14 Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye kubudikidza nechivi rufu rwakauya kune vose, nokuti vose vakatadza. ... Asi kubva kuna Adhamu kusvikira kuna Mosesi, rufu rwakabata ushe, kunyange nevasina kutadza saAdhamu. Adamu aive mufananidzo wemunhu aizouya.

1 VaKorinde 15:21-22 Nokuti sezvo rufu rwakauya kubudikidza nomunhu mumwe, kumuka kwavakafa kwakauyawo. Sezvo muna Adhamu vose vanofa, saizvozvowo muna Kristu vose vachararamiswa.

VaHebheru 9:27 Vanhu vakatemerwa kuti vafe kamwe chete, uye shure kwaizvozvo kutongwa.

(Cherekedza: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti “chivi chaAdhamu chokuputsa sungano” chivi chinoendesa kurufu; Jesu Kristu, mwanakomana waMwari, akasuka zvivi zvavanhu ne“ropa” rake amene. [kutenda] maari haazopiwi mhosva → Upenyu husingagumi avo vasingatendi vakatopiwa mhosva - "ropa" raJesu rakasuka zvivi zvevanhu, uye iwe [usingatendi] → uchapiwa mhosva, uye pachava nekutongwa; mushure mekufa → "Maererano newe, uri pasi pemutemo "Uchatongwa pane zvaunoita." Unonzwisisa izvi zvakajeka here?)

【2】Chivi chinobva pakuita kwemutemo

VaGaratia 3 Chitsauko 10 Munhu wose anoita mabasa omurayiro akatukwa, nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: “Ani naani asingarambi achiita zvose zvakanyorwa muBhuku roMurayiro akatukwa.

( Cherechedza: Nokudzidza magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti ani naani anotora murayiro womurayiro, anozvirumbidza pamusoro pokururamiswa kwokuchengeta mirayiro yomurayiro, uye anochengeta mirayiro yomurayiro sechiratidzo chokuzvininipisa. uyo anochengeta mutemo soupenyu hwake, uye uyo “anofamba mumutemo” Avo vasingararami ku“kururama kwomutemo” vachashurikidzwa nomutemo avo vasingateereri tsitsi dzaMwari nemibairo ya Nyasha dzakatukwa. Saka, unonzwisisa here?

Hazvina kunaka kuti munhu apiwe mhosva nokuda kwechivi chomunhu mumwe chete, asi chipo chinoruramiswa nokuda kwezvivi zvizhinji. Kana kubudikidza nokudarika kwomunhu mumwe rufu rwakabata ushe kubudikidza nomunhu iyeye, ko, kuzoti vaya vakagamuchira nyasha huru nechipo chokururama vachatonga sei muupenyu kubudikidza nomunhu mumwe, Jesu Kristu! …Murairo wakawedzerwa uchibva kunze, kuti kudarika kuwande; asi zvivi pazvakawanda, nyasha dzakawanda nokupfuvurisa. Sezvo chivi chakatonga parufu, saizvozvowo nyasha dzinobata ushe kubudikidza nokururama kusvika kuupenyu husingaperi kubudikidza naJesu Kristu Ishe wedu. -Tarira kuna VaRoma 5 ndima 16-17, 20-21. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Sezvakataurwa nomuapostora “Pauro”! Asi sezvo takafa kumurairo wakanga wakatisunga, zvino tasunungurwa pamurairo…--Ona VaRoma 7:6.

nokuda kwomurayiro ndakafa kumurayiro, kuti ndirarame kuna Mwari. —Verenga VaGaratiya 2:19. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? )

【3】 Chivi chokubvisa sungano itsva yakagadzwa neropa raJesu

VaHebheru 9:15 Nokuda kwaizvozvi ndiye murevereri wesungano itsva, kuti avo vakadanwa vagamuchire chipikirwa chenhaka isingaperi, ayananisire zvivi zvesungano yokutanga norufu. Ameni!

(I) Munhu wese munyika anopara mhosva nekutyora kondirakiti

Nokuti vose vakatadza.-VaRoma 3:23 Naizvozvo vose vakaputsa sungano yaMwari, vaHedheni navaJudha vakaputsa sungano vakatadza. VaRoma 6:23 Mubairo wechivi rufu. Jesu, Mwanakomana waMwari, akafira zvitadzo zvedu kuti aregerere zvitadzo zvakaitwa nomunhu “musungano yakapfuura” zvinova “zvitadzo zvaAdhamu achiputsa sungano” uye zvitadzo zvakaitwa nemaJuda mukutyora “mutemo we Mosesi". Jesu Kristu akatidzikinura kubva mukutuka kwemurairo, achitisunungura kubva kumurairo nekutukwa kwawo - ona VaG.

(II) Avo vasingachengeti Sungano Itsva asi vanochengeta Sungano Yekare

VaHebheru 10:16-18 “Iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita navo shure kwemazuva iwayo, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha: Ndichanyora mirairo yangu pamwoyo yavo, ndichaiisa mukati mavo; havachazorangaririzve zvivi zvavo nokudarika kwavo.” Zvino zvivi izvi zvakanganwirwa, hapasisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi. (Asi vanhu vanogara vachipanduka uye vakasindimara, vachiedza nguva dzose kutsvaga nzira dzekurangarira kudarika kwenyama yavo. Havatendi zvakataurwa naJehovha! Jehovha akati havazorangariri kudarika kwenyama. Kudarika kwenyama. Vakarovererwa pamwe chete naKristu Sei uchizvirangarira iwe pachako kana mumashoko echisungo chakaitwa neropa raShe? unonzwisisa here?

Chengeta mashoko mapenyu awakanzwa kwandiri, nokutenda norudo zviri muna Kristu Jesu. Unofanira “kuchengeta” “nzira yakanaka” yawakaronzeswa kuburikidza nokuvimba noMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri. Hukuru hwemazwi akachena → Makanzwa shoko rechokwadi, iro shoko rakanaka, evhangeri yeruponeso rwenyu! Vimba noMweya Mutsvene uye uuchengete wakasimba; Unonzwisisa here? —Verenga 2 Timoti 1:13-14

(III) Avo vanodzoka kuzochengeta sungano yavo yekare

VaGaratia 3:2-3 Ndinongoda kukubvunzai izvi chete: Makagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene kubudikidza namabasa omurayiro here? Imhaka yekunzwa vhangeri here? Sezvo wakatangwa noMweya Mutsvene, uchiri kuvimba nenyama kuti ukwane here? Hamuna kuziva here?
Kristu vanotisunungura. Saka mira wakasimba uye usazvirega uchibatwa nejoko reuranda zvakare. --Ona Kuwedzera chitsauko 5, ndima 1.

( Cherechedza: Jesu Kristu akatidzikinura kubva musungano yekare uye akatisunungura kuti tiite sungano itsva nesu. Kana tikadzokera kuti titeerere mitemo ye“sungano yokutanga,” hazvirevi here kuti takasiya sungano itsva iyo Mwanakomana waMwari akaita nesu kuburikidza neropa rake pachake? Hamuna kuziva here? Iriwo dimikira kwatiri isu vanhu vemazuva ano, kwakanaka here kutevedzera mitemo yekare yeQing Dynasty, Ming Dynasty, Tang Dynasty kana Han Dynasty? Kana muchichengeta mitemo yekare saizvozvo, hamuzivi here kuti muri kuputsa mitemo yazvino?

VaGalàsia 6:7 Musanyengerwa, Mwari haangasekwa. zvinodzvara munhu, ndizvo zvaanochekazve; Usabatwa zvakare nejoko revaranda vechivi. Unonzwisisa here? )

【4】 Chivi chekusatenda muna Jesu

Johani 3:16-19 Mwari akada nyika nokudaro kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. Nokuti Mwari akatuma Mwanakomana wake munyika, kwete kuti ape nyika mhosva (kana kushandurwa se: kutonga nyika; iyo iri pasi), asi kuti nyika iponeswe naye. Ani naani anotenda kwaari haapiwi mhosva, asi ani naani asingatendi atotongwa nokuti haana kutenda muzita roMwanakomana mumwe oga waMwari. Chiedza chakasvika munyika, asi vanhu vakada rima panzvimbo yechiedza nokuti mabasa avo akaipa.

( Cherechedza: Zita roMwanakomana akaberekwa ari mumwe oga waMwari ndiJesu. NdiJesu Kristu achadzikinura avo vari pasi pemutemo, kutiponesa kubva kuzvivi zvemurume wekare Adhamu kutyora chibvumirano, uye kutigonesa kuwana humwanakomana hwaMwari! Ameni. Avo vanotenda maari havazopiwi mhosva → uye vanogamuchira hupenyu husingaperi! Avo vasingatendi vakatopiwa mhosva. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? )

2021.06.04

articles.title: Chivi｜Kusikwa kwaAdamu uye kuwira mubindu reEdheni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Tinovhura Bhaibheri pana Genesisi Chitsauko 3 17, uye ndima 19 inoti kuna Adhamu: “ Zvawakateerera mukadzi wako, ukadya muti wandakakuraira kuti urege kuudya, ivhu ratukwa nokuda kwako; ...uye uchadya zvokudya zvako neziya rechiso chako kusvikira wadzokera kuvhu, kwawakabva. Iwe uri guruva, uye kuguruva uchadzokera. "

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Kusikwa kwaAdamu uye kuwira mubindu reEdheni 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi, rakanyorwa uye richitaurwa mumaoko avo, vhangeri roruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Kumbira Ishe Jesu kuti varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Tinonzwisisa kuti Adhamu akasikwa “asina simba” uye anogona kudonha zviri nyore Mwari anotiudza kuti tisararama muna Adhamu “akasikwa” kuti tirarame muna Jesu Kristu, uyo akaberekwa naMwari. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Kusikwa Adamu akawira pasi mubindu reEdheni

(1) Adhamu akasikwa neguruva renyika

Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mweya woupenyu mumhino dzake, akava mweya mupenyu; zita rake rainzi Adhamu. —Verenga Genesisi 2:7
Mwari akati: “Ngatiite munhu nomufananidzo wedu, akafanana nesu, uye ngaave nesimba pamusoro pehove dzegungwa, napamusoro peshiri dzedenga, napamusoro pezvipfuwo zviri panyika, napamusoro penyika yose, napamusoro penyika yose. zvinokambaira panyika.” Mwari akati akasika munhu nomufananidzo wake, akasika murume nomukadzi; Mwari akavaropafadza, akati kwavari, Berekai, muwande, muzadze nyika, mubate ushe pairi; muve nesimba pamusoro pehove dzegungwa, napamusoro peshiri dzedenga, napamusoro pezvipenyu zvose zvinokambaira panyika. .”— Reference Genesi Chitsauko 1 ndima 26-28

(2) Adhamu akasikwa neguruva ndokuwa

Bhaibheri rinonyorawo ikoku, kuti: “Munhu wokutanga, Adhama, akava munhu mupenyu nomudzimu (mudzimu: kana kuti kushandurwa senyama)”; —Verenga 1 VaKorinde 15:45

Jehovha Mwari akaisa munhu mumunda weEdheni kuti aurime nokuuchengeta. Jehovha Mwari akamurayira achiti, “Ungadya hako zvinobva pamuti upi noupi womumunda, asi haufaniri kudya zvinobva pamuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa, nokuti nomusi waunoudya chokwadi uchafa.”— Genesi 2 15 - Chikamu 17.

Nyoka yakanga ina manomano kupfuura mhuka dzose dzesango dzakanga dzaitwa naJehovha Mwari. Nyoka yakati kumukadzi, "Ichokwadi here kuti Mwari akati hamufaniri kudya muti upi zvawo uri mubindu?"...Nyoka ikati kumukadzi, "Hamungafi zvirokwazvo, nokuti Mwari unoziva kuti murima mamuri? nomusi waunoudya, meso ako achasvinudzwa, sokuziva kunoita Mwari zvakanaka nezvakaipa.”— Genesi 3:1, 4-5 .

Zvino mukadzi wakati achiona kuti muchero womuti wakanaka kudya, uye unofadza meso, uye kuti wakachenjera, akatora umwe wemichero yawo, akadya, ndokupa murume wake, naiye akaudyawo. — Genesisi 3:6

(3) Adhamu akatyora mutemo uye akatukwa nomutemo

Jehovha Mwari akati kunyoka, "Nokuti waita izvozvo, watukwa kupfuura zvipfuwo zvose, nemhuka dzose dzesango; unofanira kufamba nedumbu rako, nokudya guruva mazuva ose oupenyu hwako."
Uye akati kumukadzi, “Ndichawanza marwadzo ako pakuzvara kwako, kurwadziwa kwako mukubereka vana kuzhinji
Zvino akati kuna Adhamu: Nekuti wakateerera mukadzi wako, ukadya muti wandakakuraira kuti urege kuudya, nyika yatukwa nokuda kwako; iwe unofanira kubata mazuva ose oupenyu hwako kuti uwane chokudya pauri. "Minzwa norukato zvichakumera iwe; uchadya miriwo yesango; uchadya zvokudya zvako neziya rechiso chako kusvikira wadzokera kuguruva; nokuti wakaberekwa neguruva, uchadzokazve. .”— Genesi 3:17-19

(4) Chivi chakapinda munyika kubva kuna Adhamu chete

Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza. — VaRoma 5:12
Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. — VaRoma 6 Chitsauko 23
Sezvo rufu rwakauya kubudikidza nomunhu mumwe, kumuka kwavakafa kunouya nomunhu mumwe chete. Sezvo muna Adhamu vose vanofa, saizvozvowo muna Kristu vose vachararamiswa. — 1 VaKorinte 15:21-22
Zvinoenderana nezvinozoitika, munhu wese akatemerwa kufa kamwe chete, uye mushure mekufa pachava nekutongwa. — VaHebheru 9:27

( Cherechedza: Muchinyorwa chakapfuura, ndakakugoverai kuti muBindu reEdheni mudenga, Rusifa, “Nyeredzi Inopenya, Mwanakomana waMangwanani” akasikwa naMwari, akanga ane mwoyo unozvikudza nokuda kworunako rwake, uye akashatisa uchenjeri hwake nokuda runako rwake, uye akabatwa chibharo nokuda kwekutengeserana kwake kwakanyanyisa muruchiva. Nekuda kwehuipi hwake, makaro, ruvengo, godo, umhondi, hunyengeri, ruvengo rwaMwari, kuputsa zvibvumirano, nezvimwe zvakadaro, mwoyo wake unonyadzisa wakashandura chimiro chake kuita shato huru tsvuku inonyadzisa uye nyoka yekare ine mazino anobwaira nenzwara. Yakarongedzerwa kunyengera vanhu kuti vaputse zvibvumirano nokutadza, zvichiita kuti varambe vari kure naMwari mubindu reEdheni pasi pano, Adhamu naEvha, avo vakasikwa neguruva, vakaedzwa ne“nyoka” nokuda kwokusava nesimba kwavo. saka “vakaputsa sungano” vakatadza vakawa.

Asi Mwari anotida tose akatipa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, Jesu, sezvakangoita Johane 3:16, “Nokuti Mwari akada nyika nokudaro, kuti akapa Mwanakomana wake akaberekwa ari mumwe oga, kuti ani naani anotenda kwaari arege kufa asi ave noupenyu husingaperi. ” Tenzi Jesu amene akatiwo, munofanira kuberekwa patsva, makaberekwa noMweya Mutsvene, makaberekwa naMwari, savana vaMwari, kuti murege kutadza - nongedzera kuna Johane 1:3:9 nokuti shoko raMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga imbeu) anogara maari; iyewo Hatingatadzi nokuti akaberekwa naMwari nenzira iyi chete ndipo patinogona kugara nhaka youmambo hwaMwari uye tigopinda muumambo hwatakagadzirirwa naBaba vedu vokudenga.

Adhamu, uyo akasikwa neguruva, aizotyora mutemo uye aizotadza nyore nyore nokuda kwenyama yake isina simba, asi ivo chete vakaberekwa naMwari havazoputsiki, nokuti ndivo vanakomana vaMwari vanogara mumusha nokusingaperi haugone kugara mumba zvachose. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? )

2021.06.03

articles.title: Chivi｜ Nyeredzi yakasikwa inopenya yakadonha kubva kudenga mubindu reEdheni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Isaya chitsauko 14 ndima 12 tiverenge pamwe chete: “Iwe nyeredzi inopenya, mwanakomana wamambakwedza, wawa seiko uchibva kudenga?

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Nyeredzi inopenya yechisiko yakawa kubva kudenga mubindu reEdheni 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa mumaoko avo uye rakataurwa navo, vhangeri roruponeso rwedu. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Nyengetera kuti Ishe Jesu arambe achivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye kuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya → Nzwisisa kuti "nyeredzi inopenya yakasikwa, Mwanakomana wemangwanani" uye muswe wayo uchikweva munhu -chetatu chenyeredzi mudenga , yakawa kubva muEdheni mudenga uye yakakandirwa panyika, ikava shato, nyoka yekare, dhiabhorosi, Satani, mutumwa wakawa uyo akanga ari mweya wakaipa unoita zvakaipa. Kumbirai Ishe Jesu kuti apfekedze vana vake nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMwari, sunga bhanhire rako nechokwadi, pfekai chidzitiro chechipfuva chokururama, pfekai shangu dzenyu nevhangeri, mutore nhovo yokutenda, mupfeke ngowani yokururama. ruponeso, torai munondo woMweya Mutsvene, iro Shoko raMwari! Nekunamata nekukumbira nguva dzese, unogona kukunda nekuramba mazano adhiabhorosi. Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Nyeredzi inopenya yakasikwa Mwanakomana wemangwanani akadonha

(1) Nyeredzi inopenya yekusika-lucifer

Ngatidzidzei Isaya chitsauko 14 ndima 12 muBhaibheri toiverenga pamwe chete: Wawa seiko uchibva kudenga, iwe nyeredzi inopenya, mwanakomana wamambakwedza? Haiwa, imi mukundi wemarudzi, makatemerwa pasi sei? Ezekieri 28:11-15 BDMCS - uye shoko raJehovha rakauya kwandiri richiti, “Mwanakomana womunhu, chema pamusoro pamambo weTire, uti, ‘Zvanzi naChangamire Ishe Jehovha: “Iwe wakashongedzerwa zvinhu zvose, wakachenjera, wakachenjera. wakanaka pazvose. Bindu reEdheni rakashongedzwa namabwe anokosha... uye unewe matanda akaisvonaka nenyere, izvo zvakagadzirirwa pazuva rokusikwa kwako iwe uri kerubhi rakazodzwa rinofukidza areka yesungano Munofamba pamusoro pegomo dzvene raMwari, rinopenya somoto;

[Cherechedza]: Nokuongorora magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti akasikwa “Nyeredzi Inopenya-Mwanakomana weMangwanani” akagadzirira zvose, azere nouchenjeri, uye akanaka chose chose, ndiye ngirozi huru yerumbidzo, uye akagadzirirwa zvizere naMwari pazuva ra kusikwa. Akanga ari makerubhi akazodzwa aifukidza areka yesungano, iyo Mwari akaisa pagomo dzvene raMwari, mubindu rokudenga reEdheni. Iwe unogona kufamba pakati pe "matombo anokosha" anopenya semoto, uye gare gare iwe uchakwanisa kuona kusaruramisira. " kusarurama " → Kusarurama kose chivi .. --Tarisa kuna Johane 1:17 naVaRoma 1:29-31. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(2) Nyeredzi inopenya yechisiko yakadonha

Isaya 14:13-15 Iwe wakati mumwoyo mako, ‘Ndichakwira kudenga, ndichakwiridza chigaro changu choushe pamusoro penyeredzi dzaMwari; ndichakwira kumusoro kwamakore; ’ Asi uchaburukira muHadhesi nomugomba rakadzika-dzika. — Isaya 14:13-15

(Cherechedza: Paunenge uchiti “Ndinoda” mumwoyo mako, uku ndiko kutanga kwekudonha, sezvakangoita ngirozi huru yainamatwa nekurumbidzwa se“Nyeredzi Inopenya - Mwanakomana weMangwanani”, nekuda kwekuzvikudza kwemoyo wake. , iye akati, “Ndinoda” kashanu akatevedzana, uye nokuda kwokuwanda kwokutengeserana, iwe wakazadzwa nechisimba uye ukatadza iwe wakafukidza areka yesungano ndichakuparadza nokuda kworunako rwako, uye nokuda kwokubwinya kwako wakaodza uchenjeri hwako, kuti vakuone uye vasvibise nzvimbo yako nokuda kwokuwanda kwamadzimambo. zvivi zvako nokusarurama kwokutengesa kwako ndichaita kuti moto ubude pakati pako uye ukupedze, uye uchava madota panyika pamberi pavose vanokuona vanokuzivai vachatya uye havachazovipozve munyika nokusingaperi.

(3) Vanonzi baba vadhiabhorosi, baba vokuchiva, uye baba venhema

Johane 8:44 Imi muri vababa venyu dhiabhorosi, munoda kuita kuda kwababa venyu. Akanga ari muurayi kubva pakutanga uye haana kugara muchokwadi, nokuti maari makanga musina chokwadi. Anoreva nhema pachake;

Genesisi 3:1-4 BDMCS - Nyoka yakanga ina manomano kupfuura zvisikwa zvose zvesango zvakanga zvaitwa naJehovha Mwari. Nyoka yakati kumukadzi, "Ichokwadi here kuti Mwari akati hamufaniri kudya muti upi zvawo uri mubindu?" pakati pomunda.” , Mwari akati, ‘Regai kuudya, kana kuubata, kuti murege kufa.’” Nyoka yakati kumukadzi, “Hamungafi zvirokwazvo;

Genesisi 2:17 Asi usadya zvinobva pamuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa, nokuti nomusi waunoudya chokwadi uchafa! "

(Cherechedza: Nyoka ndiyo nyoka yekare, inonziwo dhiragoni, dhiabhorosi, uye Satani - reva Zvakazarurwa 20:2, Bheerizebhubhu, mambo wemadhimoni - tarisa kuna Mateo 12:24. Wakaipa, Antikristu, mukuru mutadzi, munyengeri, "Nyoka" ine mazita akawanda akadai semuedzi → Evha naAdhamu vakatyora mutemo ndokuva muranda wechivi uye vakatukwa nemutemo.

(4) Dhiyabhorosi akapara mhosva uye akauraya vanhu kubva pakutanga

Uyo anotadza ndowadhiabhorosi, nokuti dhiabhorosi akatadza kubva pakutanga... --Rejera kuna 1 Johane 3:8

Imwi muri vababa venyu dhiabhorosi, munoda kuita zvishuvo zvababa venyu. Akanga ari muurayi kubva pakutanga uye haana kugara muchokwadi, nokuti maari makanga musina chokwadi. Anoreva nhema pachake; —Verenga Johani 8:44

Mbavha inongouya kuzoba nokuuraya nokuparadza; --Verenga Johani 10:10

Uyu ndiye munhu anoita nyika renje, anowisira maguta pasi, asingasununguri vatapwa kudzimba dzavo here? ’—Ona Isaya 14, ndima 17

Zvisinei, uchawira muHadhesi nomugomba rakadzika-dzika. --Tarisa kuChitsauko 14, ndima 15 yaIsaya

(Cherechedza: Mukutonga kwekupedzisira, dhiabhorosi, Satani, nevatumwa vake vakakandwa mudziva remoto nesarufa vakapiswa. Tarisa kuna Zvakazarurwa Chitsauko 20)

articles.title: Chivi chii? Kudarika murairo chivi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna 1 Johane chitsauko 3 ndima 4 tiverenge pamwe chete: Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro chivi. Uye tendeukira kuna Johane 8:34 Jesu akapindura akati, “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, mumwe nomumwe anoita zvivi muranda wechivi.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " chivi chii 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza nemaoko avo vanonyora nokutaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva “kudenga” zvichibva kure, uye zvokudya zvomudzimu zvinopiwa kwatiri nenguva, kuitira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu huve hwakapfuma zvikuru! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya uye nekunzwisisa kuti zvitadzo chii? Kudarika murairo chivi.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mubvunzo: Chivi chii?

Mhinduro: Kutyora mutemo chivi.

Ngatidzidzei 1 Johane 3:4 muBhaibheri uye tiiverenge pamwe chete: Ani naani anotadza anodarika murayiro uye anodarika murayiro chivi.

[Ona]: Nokuongorora zvinyorwa zvemagwaro zviri pamusoro apa, “chivi” chii? Kudarika murairo chivi. Mutemo unosanganisira: mirairo, mirau, mirau, uye zvimwe zvinopihwa zvemirau yakasiyana-siyana nemirau "sungano", uyu ndiwo mutemo. Paunodarika murayiro uye uchityora mutemo, [chivi]. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

(1) Mutemo waAdhamu:

“Usadya” murairo! Mubindu reEdheni, "Mwari akaita sungano nomunhu. Akaita murayiro natateguru Adhamu → Jehovha Mwari akaisa munhu mubindu reEdheni kuti aririme nokurichengeta. Jehovha Mwari akamurayira achiti, "Ungadya hako zvinobva pamuti upi zvawo womubindu, asi usadya zvinobva pamuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa, nokuti nomusi waunoudya chokwadi uchafa." Genesi 2 Chitsauko 15-17 mapfundo.

Tateguru wekutanga [Adhamu] akatyora mutemo uye akadya kubva pamuti wekuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa Izvi sezvazvakangoita “chivi” chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe, Adhamu, uye rufu rwakabva kuchivi, “nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu” ipapo rufu runouya kumunhu wose nokuti munhu wose akatadza pasina mutemo yatova munyika; asi kana pasina murairo, chivi hachionekwi sechivi, Namamwe mashoko, kana pasina murairo womutemo wokuti “usadya”, hazvinganzi tateguru Adhamu “akadya zvokudya zvenyama”. muchero womuti". Chivi, nokuti Adhamu haana kutyora mutemo. Unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? Tarisa kuna VaRoma 5:12-13 naVaRoma 6:23.

(2) Ukama huri pakati pemutemo nechivi:

1 Kana pasina murayiro, chivi hachinzi chivi - Tarisa kuna VaRoma 5:13
2 Kana pasina mutemo, hapana kudarika - Tarisa kuna VaRoma 4:15
3 Pasina mutemo, chivi chakafa—ona VaRoma 7:8 . Uhwu ndihwo hukama huri pakati pemurairo nechivi! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?
4 Nomutemo kana ukatadza uri pasi pomurayiro, uchatongwa nomurayiro - VaRoma 2:12

(3) Wenyama anobereka chivi nomurairo;

Nokuti patakanga tiri “munyama,” kuchiva kwakaberekwa no“murairo” kwakanga kuri kuchiva nokuchiva kwenyama, “Uyai; unobereka chibereko chawo cherufu. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 7:5 naJakobho 1:15.

Sokutaura kwakaita muapostora Pauro: “Ini ndisati ndiri mupenyu kunze kwomurairo, asi murairo pawakasvika, zvivi zvakavapozve, ini ndikafa; Saka murayiro mutsvene, uye mutemo mutsvene, wakarurama, uye wakanaka, iye akandiurayisa chivi chinoratidzwa kuva chivi kuburikidza neakanaka, uye chivi chinoratidzwa kuva chakaipa zvikuru nekuda kwemurairo “Pauro” uyo ane hunyanzvi hwemutemo wechiJuda “Pauro” anotitungamirira kuti tiwane “chivi” pachena kuburikidza noMweya waMwari “hukama ne“mutemo.” Ameni!

(4) Nzira dzekugadzirisa chivi: Zvino sezvo manyuko e“chivi” uye “mutemo” awanikwa, [chivi] chinogona kugadziriswa nyore nyore. Ameni! Ngationei zvatinodzidziswa naApostora Pauro

[Kusunungurwa pamurairo] → 1 Asi sezvo takafa kumurairo unotisunga, “munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, akafa munaShe nomuviri waKristu,” zvino tasunungurwa pamurairo.... ..VaRoma 7:6 uye VaG. 2:19 Nokuti nomurayiro ndakafa kumurayiro.
[Kusunungurwa pachivi] → 2 Nokuti tinoziva kuti munhu wedu wekare akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti tirege kuzova varanda vezvivi; Ameni! Ona VaRoma 6:6-7 . Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

articles.title: mutemo waKristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri redu kuna VaGaratia chitsauko 6 ndima 2 tiverenge pamwe chete: Takuriranai mitoro yenyu, uye saizvozvo muchazadzisa murayiro waKristu.

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " mutemo waKristu 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! "Mukadzi akanaka" anotuma vashandi - avo vanonyora nemaoko avo uye kutaura shoko, evhangeri yeruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Hwisisa kuti mutemo waKristu ndiwo mutemo werudo, ida Mwari, ida muvakidzani wako sezvaunozviita. ! Ameni.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【Murairo waKristu rudo】

(1)Rudo runozadzisa murayiro

Hama, kana mumwe akakundwa nokudarika, imwi vomweya mudzose nounyoro; Takuriranai mitoro yenyu, uye saizvozvo muchazadzisa murayiro waKristu. --Chitsauko chokuwedzera 6 ndima 1-2
Johani 13:34 Ndinokupai murayiro mutsva, wokuti mudanane, sezvandakakudai, nemiwo mudanane.
1 Johani 3:23 Murayiro waMwari ndowokuti titende muzita roMwanakomana wake, Jesu Kristu, uye tidanane, sezvaakatirayira. Chitsauko 3 ndima 11 Murairo wekutanga wakaunzwa.
Nekuti murairo wose uri mumutsara umwe uyu: Ida umwe wako sezvaunozvida iwe. --Wedzero chitsauko 5 ndima 14
Musava nechikwerete nomunhu, asi chokudanana; nokuti unoda mumwe, wazadzisa murairo. Somuenzaniso, mirayiro yakadai sokuti, “Usaita upombwe, Usauraya, Usaba, Usachiva,” nemimwe mirayiro inoputirwa mumutsara uyu: “Ida wokwako sezvaunozvida iwe. —VaRoma 13:8-9
rudo rune mwoyo murefu, rudo haruna godo; harufariri zvisakarurama, asi runoda chokwadi; Rudo haruperi. --1 VaKorinte 13:4-8-Nzira inoshamisa!

(2)Rudo rwaKristu rwakarebesa, rwakafara, rwakakwira uye rwakadzika

Nokuda kwaizvozvi ndinopfugama namabvi angu pamberi paBaba (avo mhuri yose iri kudenga napanyika inodanwa kubva kwavari) uye ndichimukumbira maererano nepfuma yokubwinya kwavo, kuti akusimbisei nesimba noMweya wake mukatikati menyu. , kuti Kristu avhenekere kubudikidza nemi kutenda kwake kugare mumwoyo yenyu, kuti muve nemidzi uye musimbiswe murudo, uye mugokwanisa kunzwisisa pamwe chete navatsvene vose kuti rudo rwaKristu rwakasvika rinhi, noupamhi, nokukwirira, nokudzika, uye kuziva kuti rudo urwu runopfuura ruzivo. Mwari anogona kuita zvinhu zvikuru kwazvo kupfuura zvose zvatinokumbira kana kufunga, maererano nesimba rinoshanda mukati medu. — VaEfeso 3:14-20

Zvisati zviri izvo chete, asi tichizvikudza kunyange mumatambudziko, tichiziva kuti kutambudzika kunobereka kutsungirira, uye kutsungirira kunobereka ruzivo, uye ruzivo rwunobereka tariro; uye tariro hainyadzisi, nekuti rudo rwaMwari rwakadururwa mumoyo yedu kubudikidza. Mweya Mutsvene watakapiwa. — VaRoma 5, chitsauko 3-5,

1 Johani 3 11 Tinofanira kudanana. Uyu ndiwo murayiro wamakanzwa kubva pakutanga.

Asi chinovavarirwa nomurayiro ndirwo rudo; — 1 Timotio 1 ndima 5

[Kurovererwa kwaKristu kunoratidza rudo rukuru rwaMwari]

(1) Ropa rake rinokosha rinochenesa mwoyo yenyu nezvivi zvose

akapinda panzvimbo tsvene kamwe chete, kwete neropa rembudzi neremhuru, asi neropa rake pachake, akawana kuyananiswa kusingaperi. … zvikuru sei ropa raKristu, iye kubudikidza noMweya usingaperi akazvipa asina gwapa kuna Mwari, richanatsa mwoyo yenyu pamabasa akafa kuti mushumire Mwari mupenyu? — VaHebheru 9:12, 14

Kana tichifamba muchiedza, saMwari ari muchiedza, tinowadzana nomumwe nomumwe wedu, uye ropa raJesu, Mwanakomana wake, rinotinatsa pazvivi zvose. — 1 Johani 1:7

Nyasha nerugare ngazvive kwamuri, Jesu Kristu, chapupu chakatendeka, wekutanga kumuka kuvakafa, mukuru wemadzishe enyika. Anotida uye anoshandisa ropa rake kushambidza (kusuka) zvivi zvedu - Zvakazarurwa 1:5

Ndizvo zvakanga zvakaita vamwe venyu, asi makashambidzwa, mukaitwa vatsvene, mukaruramiswa nezita raShe Jesu Kristu, noMweya waMwari wedu. — 1 VaKorinte 6:9-11

Ndiye chadzera chokubwinya kwaMwari, ndiye mufananidzo chaiwo wokuva kwake, uye anochengeta zvinhu zvose nomurayiro wesimba rake. Shure kwokunge achenesa vanhu kubva kuzvivi zvavo, akagara pasi kuruoko rworudyi rwoUkuru kudenga. — VaHebheru 1:3

Kana zvisina kudaro, zvibayiro zvingadai zvisina kumira kare kare here? Nokuti hana dzevanamati dzakacheneswa uye havachanzwi vaine mhosva. — VaHebheru 10:2

(Vhiki dzina makumi manomwe dzakatemerwa vanhu vako, neguta rako dzvene, kupedzisa kudarika, nokugumisa zvivi, nokuyananisira zvakaipa, nokuuyisa kururama kusingaperi, nokusimbisa zvakaratidzwa nechiporofita, nokuzodza Mutsvene). ( Dhanieri 9:24 )

(2) Akashandisa muviri wake kuparadza ruvengo - mitemo yakanyorwa mumutemo
Kusanganisira mutemo waAdama, mutemo wehana, uye mutemo waMosesi, mirairo yose yaitipomera yakaputswa, ikadzimwa, yakabviswa, yakabviswa, uye yakaroverwa pamuchinjikwa.

【1】 kuparadza
Imi maimbova kure, zvino maswededzwa pedyo muna Kristu Jesu kubudikidza neropa rake. Nokuti ndiye rugare rwedu, wakaita kuti zviviri zvive chinhu chimwe, akakoromora rusvingo runoparadzanisa;
【2】 Bvisa ruvengo
Akashandisa muviri wake kuti aparadze ruvengo, ndiwo murayiro wakanyorwa mumurayiro, kuitira kuti vaviri ava vagoitwa munhu mumwe chete mutsva kubudikidza naye, vawane rugare. — VaEfeso 2:15
【3】 kuzora
【4】 Bvisa
【5】 kurovererwa pamuchinjikwa
Makanga makafa mukudarika kwenyu uye mukusadzingiswa kwenyama yenyu, uye Mwari akakuitai vapenyu muna Kristu, akatikanganwira kudarika kwedu kwose, 14 uye takadzima bumbiro remitemo rakanyorwa, tikabvisa magwaro aitidzivisa, uye magwaro aitidzivisa. akavaroverera pamuchinjikwa. — VaKorose 2:13-14
【6】 Jesu akariparadza, uye kana akarivaka zvakare aizova mutadzi
Kana ndikavakazve zvandakaputsa, zvinoratidza kuti ndiri mutadzi. --Wedzero chitsauko 2 ndima 18

( alert + ), Bvisai zvinyorwa zvinotirwisa uye zvinotidzivisa (ndiko kuti, ufakazi hwadhiabhorosi achitipomera) uye zvirovererei pamuchinjikwa kana mumwe munhu “akadzidzisa vakuru, vafundisi, kana kuti vaparidzi nokuda kwezvavanoita,” hama uye masisita achadzokera kuTesitamende yekare uye anosungwa Kuva pasi pemutemo [kuteerera mitemo nemirau] kunovaita nhapwa dzechivi uye nokuita zvakaipa ndevadhiyabhorosi neboka raSatani uye havana zvemweya. [Jesu akapira upenyu hwake kuti akudzikinurei pasi pomurayiro; mitemo uye nokuzvisunga pachenyu pasi pemurairo kunoratidza kuti uri mutadzi, vanhu ava havasati vanzwisisa nezveruponeso rwaKristu, vhangeri, havasati vazvarwa patsva, havasati vagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene, uye vakanyengerwa nokukanganisa. )

【Misa sungano itsva】

Izvo zvakatemwa, zvisina simba uye zvisina maturo, zvakabviswa (mutemo hauna kuita chinhu), uye tariro iri nani yakauyiswa, yatingaswedera nayo kuna Mwari. — VaHebheru 7:18-19

Murayiro wakaita asina simba ave muprista mukuru, asi mhiko yakaitwa nomurayiro yakagadza mwanakomana kuti ave muprista mukuru, uye yakazadziswa nokusingaperi. — VaHebheru 7:28

Akava muprista, kwete maererano nezvisungo zvenyama, asi maererano nesimba reupenyu husingagumi (hwepakutanga, husingaparadzwi). — VaHebheru 7:16

Ushumiri zvino hwakapiwa Jesu ndihwo huri nani, sezvaari murevereri wesungano iri nani, yakagadzwa pahwaro hwezvipikirwa zviri nani. Dai pasina kukanganisa musungano yekutanga, pangadai pasina nzvimbo yekutsvaga chibvumirano chekupedzisira. — VaHebheru 8:6-7

“Iyi ndiyo sungano yandichaita navo mushure memazuva iwayo, ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe: Ndichanyora mirairo yangu pamwoyo yavo, uye ndichaiisa mukati mavo uye kudarika kwavo zvakanganwirwa, hapasisinazve chimwe chibayiro chezvivi. — VaHebheru 10:16-18 .

Anotigonesa kubatira savashumiri veiyi sungano itsva, kwete nebhii asi nomudzimu; — 2 VaKorinte 3:6

(Cherechedza: Manyoro haana hupenyu uye anokonzera rufu. Vanhu vasina Mweya Mutsvene havanganzwisisi Bhaibheri zvachose; mweya une hupenyu hunorarama. Vanhu vane Mweya Mutsvene vanodudzira zvinhu zvemweya. Mweya wemurairo waKristu ndizvo zvinoreva rudo, uye rudo rwaKristu runoshandura shoko rakanyorwa kuti rive upenyu uye rinoshandura vakafa kuva zvinhu zvipenyu.

Chinzvimbo chemupristi chashandurwa. Mutemo unofanirawo kushanduka. — VaHebheru 7:12

articles.title: mutemo wega
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzese! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri redu kuna VaRoma Chitsauko 2 Ndima 14-15 Kana vaHedheni vasina murayiro vachiita zvinhu zvomurayiro maererano namasikirwo avo, kunyange vasina murayiro, ivo vamene murayiro. Izvi zvinoratidza kuti basa romutemo rakanyorwa mumwoyo yavo, pfungwa dzavo dzechakanaka nechakaipa dzinopupurirana pamwe chete, uye pfungwa dzavo dzinokwikwidzana, zvingava zvakanaka kana zvakaipa. )

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " mutemo wega 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza nemaoko avo vanonyora nokutaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso edu emweya uye avhure pfungwa dzedu kuBhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya. Hwisisa kuti “mutemo wenyu” ndiwo mutemo wehana wakanyorwa mumwoyo yavanhu, uye mwoyo wechakanaka nechakaipa, chakanaka nechakaipa, unopupura pamwe chete. .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【Mutemo wangu】

Kana vaHedheni vasina murayiro vachiita zvinhu zvomurayiro maererano namasikirwo avo, kunyange vasina murayiro, ivo vamene murayiro. Izvi zvinoratidza kuti basa romutemo rakanyorwa mumwoyo yavo, pfungwa dzavo dzechakanaka nechakaipa dzinopupurirana pamwe chete, uye pfungwa dzavo dzinokwikwidzana, zvingava zvakanaka kana zvakaipa. —VaRoma 2:14-15

( Cherechedza: Vemamwe Marudzi havana mutemo wakataurwa zvakajeka, saka vanovimba nehana dzavo kuti vaite zvinhu zvomutemo; yaMosesi Buda → muna Kristu" rudo “Mutemo. VaKristu vanorarama neMweya Mutsvene, saka vanofanira kufamba noMweya Mutsvene. hana Kana wacheneswa, hauchanzwi mhosva. "Hapana dependence Mutemo waMosesi “Bata.”— VaGaratiya 5:25 uye VaHebheru 10:2

【Basa remutemo wega wega】

(1) Veza zvakanaka nezvakaipa mumoyo mako;

Nokuti chivi chinoparadzanisa vanhu naMwari, munhu wose ari munyika anoita maererano nehana yake uye anotevera kuda kwaAdhamu kuti asiyanise pakati pezvakanaka nezvakaipa.

(2) Ita maererano nehana:

Vanhu vanowanzoti, hana yako yaenda kupi? Kushaya moyo chaiko. Handina chandakatadza, handina chivi, uye handizvidembi.

(3) Kupomera hana:

Kana ukaita chimwe chinhu chinopesana nehana yako, hana yako inopomerwa mhosva.

(4) Kurasikirwa nehana:

Mwoyo womunhu unonyengera kupfuura zvinhu zvose uye wakaipa kwazvo ndiani angauziva? — Jeremiya 17:9
Sezvo hana yaenda, munhu anoita ruchiva uye anoita marudzi ose etsvina. — VaEfeso 4:19
Kune asina kuchena uye asingatendi, hapana chakachena, kunyange mwoyo wake kana hana yake.— Tito 1:15

[Mutemo wehana yemunhu unoburitsa chivi chemunhu]

Zvinoratidza kuti kutsamwa kwaMwari kunoratidzwa kuchibva kudenga pamusoro pavanhu vose vasingadi Mwari navasina kururama, avo vanoita zvisakarurama uye vanodzivisa chokwadi. Zvinogona kuzivikanwa pamusoro paMwari zviri mumwoyo yavo, nokuti Mwari akazvizarurira kwavari... 29 vazere nokusarurama kwose, nokuipa, nokuchiva, nokuvenga, vazere negodo, nomuurayi, nokukakavara, nokunyengera, navanochera vamwe; mucheri, muvengi waMwari, namanyawi, namanyawi, namanyawi, mugadziri wezvakaipa, asingateereri vabereki, asingazivi, anoputsa sungano, asina rudo rwemhuri, uye asinganzwiri vamwe tsitsi. Kunyange zvazvo vachiziva kuti Mwari akatonga kuti avo vanoita zvakadai vakafanirwa norufu, havangoiti ivo chete, asi kuti vanokurudzira vamwe kuti vazviite. — VaRoma 1:1-32

[Mwari vanotonga zvivi zvemunhu zvakavandika maererano nevhangeri]

Ikoku kunoratidzira kuti basa romutemo rakatemerwa mumwoyo yavo, kuti ndangariro dzavo dzechakanaka nechakaipa dzinopupurira pamwe chete, uye kuti mifungo yavo inokwikwidzana, ingava yakarurama kana kuti yakaipa. ) Pazuva iro Mwari achatonga zvakavanzika zvomunhu kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, maererano nezvinotaura evhangeri yangu → Achatonga vasingatendi pazuva rokupedzisira maererano ne“nzira yechokwadi” yaJesu Kristu. --Verenga VaRoma 2:15-16 uye Sungano 12:48

"Unogona kufunga kuti muti wakanaka ( Zvinoreva muti weupenyu ), muchero wacho wakanaka; Muti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa ), muchero wacho wakaipawo; Mhando dzenyoka dzine uturu! Sezvo muri vanhu vakaipa, mungataura zvakanaka sei? Nekuti muromo unotaura kubva pazvizere mumoyo. Munhu akanaka anobudisa zvakanaka zvagara zviri mumwoyo make, uye munhu akaipa anobudisa zvakaipa zvagara zviri mumwoyo make. Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Shoko rimwe nerimwe risina maturo munhu raanotaura, uchazvidavirira pamusoro paro nezuva rekutongwa; nekuti nemashoko ako ucharuramiswa, uye nemashoko ako ucharashwa. ”—Mt 12:33-37

( muti wakashata Zvinoreva muti wezvakanaka nezvakaipa, vose vakaberekwa kubva kumidzi yaAdhamu, vanhu vose vakaipa, zvisinei kuti unouchengeta sei kana kuti unovandudza sei, uchiri kuita zvakaipa uye uchiita seunyengeri, nokuti midzi yaAdama. muti wakasvibiswa nenyoka dzine uturu semavhairasi, saka avo vanozvarwa vanogona chete kuita zvakaipa uye kubereka zvibereko zvakaipa, chibereko cherufu;

muti wakanaka Rinoreva muti woupenyu, izvo zvinoreva kuti midzi yomuti waKristu yakanaka, uye chibereko chawo chinobereka upenyu norugare. Naizvozvo, mudzi wemunhu akanaka ndihwo hupenyu hwaKristu, uye munhu akanaka, kureva munhu akarurama, anongobereka chibereko cheMweya Mutsvene. Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here? )

articles.title: Mutemo waMosesi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhure Bhaibheri Verenga Eksodho 34:27 pamwe chete: Jehovha akati kuna Mosesi: “Nyora mashoko aya, nokuti sungano iyi yandakaita newe nevana vaIsraeri haina kuitwa nemadzitateguru edu isu vapenyu nhasi . — Dhuteronomi 5 ndima 3

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Mutemo waMosesi 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza nemaoko avo vanonyora nokutaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwako. Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Hwisisa kuti murairo waMosesi mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya uye mudzidzisi kuti atitungamirire kuna Kristu kuti tiruramiswe nokutenda muna Jesu Kristu. . Ameni!

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

[Mutemo waMosesi] - mutemo wakataurwa zvakajeka

PaGomo reSinai, Mwari akapa mutemo kurudzi rwaIsraeri, mutemo wemirau yenyama pasi pano, unonziwo Mutemo waMosesi.

【Mwari akaita sungano nevaIsraeri

Zvino Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, Nyora mashoko awa, nekuti naizvozvi ndiri sungano yangu newe, navana vaIsiraeri.
Mozisi akagara naJehovha mazuva ana makumi mana nousiku hunamakumi mana, asingadyi kana kumwa. Jehovha akanyora mashoko esungano, Mirayiro Gumi, pamahwendefa maviri. — Eksodho 34:27-28
Jehovha Mwari wedu akaita sungano nesu paHorebhu. — Dheuteronomio 5:2
Sungano iyi haina kuitwa namadzibaba edu, asi nesu vapenyu nhasi. — Dhuteronomi 5 ndima 3

[Mutemo waMosesi unosanganisira:]

(1) Mirayiro Gumi- Eksodho 20:1-17
(2) Mitemo- Revhitiko 18:4
(3) Chisungo- Revhitiko 18:5
(4) Hurongwa hwetabhenakeri-Ekisodho 33-40
(5) Mitemo Yezvibayiro— Revhitiko 1:1-7
(6) Mutambo - purofiti 23
(7)Yuesu-Min 10:10
(8)Sabata-Ekisodho 35
(9)Gore-Phindu 25
(10)Chikafu Chisungo-Revhi 11
··· etc. Pane 613 zvinyorwa zvakazara!

【Chengeta mirairo uye ucharopafadzwa】

“Kana ukateerera inzwi raJehovha Mwari wako, ukachenjerera kuita mirairo yake yose, yandinokuraira nhasi, uchakugadza pamusoro pendudzi dzose dziri panyika, kana ukateerera inzwi raJehovha Mwari wako ucharopafadzwa muguta, ucharopafadzwa pazvibereko zvomuviri wako, napazvibereko zvomunda wako; muzvibereko zvemombe dzenyu, napamhuru dzenyu, napamakwayana enyu, mucharopafadzwa kana muchibuda, mucharopafadzwa kana muchipindamo. 6.

【Kutyora kondirakiti kunoguma nekutukwa】

Kana usingateereri inzwi raJehovha Mwari wako, ukasachenjerera kuchengeta mirairo yake yose nezvaakatema, zvandinokuraira nhasi, kutukwa uku kose kuchakutevera, nokukuwira... Newewo uchatukwa. Wakatukwa, newewo wakatukwa. — Dheuteronomio 28:15-19

Ani naani asingachengeti mashoko omurayiro uyu achatukwa! ’ Vanhu vese vachati, ‘Ameni! ’”— Dheut. 27:26

1 Jehovha uchauyisa pamusoro pako kutukwa, nenhamo, nokurangwa pamabasa ose amaoko ako, nokuda kwamabasa ako akaipa, amakamurasha, kusvikira waparadzwa, nokuparadzwa nokukurumidza. — Dhuteronomi 28:20
2 Jehovha achaita kuti denda rinamatire kwauri kusvikira akuparadza panyika yawakapinda kuti ive yako. — Dhuteronomi 28:21
3 Jehovha uchashandura mvura inonaya panyika yako, ive guruva neguruva, uye ichaburukira pamusoro pako ichibva kudenga kusvikira waparadzwa. — Dheuteronomio 28:24
4 Jehovha achakurova norukosoro, nefivha, nomoto, nemarariya, nomunondo, nokusanaya kwemvura, nokuvhuvha. Izvi zvose zvichakutevera kusvikira waparadzwa. — Dheuteronomio 28:22
5 Kutukwa uku kwose kuchakutevera, nokukubata kusvikira waparadzwa.”— Dheuteronomio 28:45
6 Naizvozvo uchashumira vavengi vako, vauchatumirwa naJehovha kuzorwa newe, uchinzwa nzara nenyota nedova nokushaiwa. Achaisa joko resimbi pamutsipa wako kusvikira akupedza. — Dhuteronomi 28:48
7 Vachadya zvibereko zvemombe dzako nezvibereko zvevhu rako kusvikira wapera. Zviyo zvako, kana waini yako, kana mafuta ako, kana mhuru dzako, kana makwayana ako, zvichadziviswa kwauri kusvikira waparadzwa. — Dhuteronomi 28:51
8 Uye marudzi ose ehosha namatambudziko asina kunyorwa mubhuku iri romurayiro achauyiswa pamusoro pako kusvikira waparara. — Dhuteronomi 28:61
9 + Uye iye achaparadzaniswa nemarudzi ose aIsraeri maererano nokutukwa kwose kwakanyorwa mubhuku romutemo nomusungano, uye iye acharangwa. — Dheut. 29:21
10 Ndinodana denga nenyika kuti zvikupupurirei nhasi;

Chenjedzo: Naizvozvo, hama, zivai izvi: kubudikidza nemunhu uyu kukanganwirwa kwezvivi kunoparidzwa kwamuri. Pamunhu uyu muchanzi makarurama nemurairo waMozisi, wamunotenda nawo pazvinhu zvose zvamusingaruramiswe nazvo. Naizvozvo chenjerai, kuti zvakanyorwa muvaporofita zvirege kukuwirai. --Verenga Mabasa 13:38-40

Hymn: Eksodo

OK! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano rwangu nemi mose. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose nguva dzose. Ameni

articles.title: Mutemo waAdhamu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama nehanzvadzi dzangu dzinodiwa mumhuri yaMwari! Ameni.

Ngativhurei Bhaibheri kuna Genesisi Chitsauko 2, ndima 16-17, tiverenge pamwe chete: Jehovha Mwari akamurayira akati, "Ungadya hako zvinobva pamuti upi zvawo womumunda, asi haungadyi zvinobva pamuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa, nokuti nomusi waunoudya chokwadi uchafa."

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Mutemo waAdhamu 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi akanaka” anotuma vashandi – kubudikidza nemaoko avo vanonyora nokutaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwako! Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. Nyengetera kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera maziso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tinzwe uye tione chokwadi chemweya uye tinzwisise kuti "mutemo waAdhamu" waive chii mubindu reEdheni. mwari uye munhu Mutemo wesungano.

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

Mutemo waAdhamu mubindu reEdheni

~~【Hazvidyike】~~

Jehovha Mwari akamurayira achiti, “Ungadya hako zvinobva pamuti upi noupi womumunda, asi haufaniri kudya zvinobva pamuti wokuziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa, nokuti nomusi waunoudya chokwadi uchafa.”— Genesi 2 16 - Chikamu 17

【Ziso rezvakanaka nezvakaipa rinosvinudzwa】

Nyoka yakati kumukadzi, "Hamungafi zvirokwazvo, nokuti Mwari anoziva kuti nomusi wamunozvidya nawo, meso enyu achasvinudzwa, mukava savanamwari, muchiziva zvakanaka nezvakaipa." Muchero womuti uyu wakanga wakanakira kudya uye waifadza meso, uye meso ake akanga achiyevedza, uye akachenjera, akatora muchero akaudya akaupa kumurume wake naiye akaudya. Ipapo meso avo vari vaviri akasvinudzwa, uye vakaziva kuti vakanga vasina kusimira, uye vakazvirukira mashizha omuonde, vakazviitira nguo. Genesi 3: Chitsauko 4-7

( Cherechedza: Meso avanhu ezvakanaka nezvakaipa anosvinudzwa anoona kunyadziswa kwavo vamene uye kuona kuti vamwewo vanonyadzisa uye vasina kukwana havazongoratidzi zvikanganiso zvevamwe, kupomera vamwe pamusoro pezviito zvechivi nezvakaipa. asi zvakare gadzira ruvengo muhukama pakati pevanhu, uye hana inozozvipa mhosva yechivi inozopawo mhosva vamwe. Iri ndiro basa revanhu vanoda kuziva mitemo yezvakanaka nezvakaipa yakanyorwa mumoyo yavo. )

[Mhosva yaAdamu yekutyora chibvumirano]

Sezvo chivi chakapinda munyika nomunhu mumwe chete, uye rufu rwakauya nechivi, saizvozvowo rufu rwakauya kune vose nokuti vose vakatadza. Mutemo usati wavapo, chivi chakanga chava munyika, asi kana pasina murayiro chivi. Asi kubva kuna Adhamu kusvikira kuna Mosesi, rufu rwakabata ushe, kunyange vaya vasina kuita chivi chakafanana nechaAdhamu. Adamu aive mufananidzo wemunhu aizouya. --VaRoma 5: Chitsauko 12-14

Hosea 6:7 “Asi akafanana Adhamu akatyora sungano , akandinyengera munharaunda.

[Kutongwa kutongwa nemunhu mumwechete]

Hazvina kunaka kuti munhu apiwe mhosva nokuda kwechivi chomunhu mumwe chete, asi chipo chinoruramiswa nokuda kwezvivi zvizhinji. (VaRoma 5:16) (zvichireva kuti vose vakaberekwa nomudzi waAdhamu vanotongwa, kunyange avo vasina kuita chivi chimwe chete chaAdhama vari pasi pesimba rorufuwo)

【Munhu wese akatadza】

Nokuti vose vakatadza vakasasvika pakubwinya kwaMwari - VaRoma 3:23
Ndakaberekerwa muzvivi, kubva pakubatwa kwamai vangu; — Pisarema 51:5

【Mubairo wechivi rufu】

Nokuti mubairo wechivi ndirwo rufu, asi chipo chaMwari chokungopiwa ndihwo upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu. — VaRoma 6:23

【Simba rechivi mutemo】

Die! Simba rako rekukunda riripi? Die! Kuruma kwako kuripi? Rumborera rwerufu chivi, uye simba rechivi murairo. — 1 VaKorinte 15:55-56

[Uye kuchava nekutongwa mushure merufu]

Sezvo rufu rwakauya nomunhu mumwe...muna Adhamu vose vakafa - 1 VaKorinde 15:21-22

Zvinoenderana nezvinozoitika, munhu wese akatemerwa kufa kamwe chete, uye mushure mekufa pachava nekutongwa. — VaHebheru 9:27

(Yambiro: Mutemo waAdhamu wakaunza chivi chinoendesa kurufu kuvanhu vose, asi makereke mazhinji haana hanya nawo, asi anodzidzisa hama nehanzvadzi kuchengeta murayiro waMosesi. Izvi zvinokonzerwa nokutsauswa naDhiyabhorosi. Kana Adhamu akatyora mutemo uyu, zvinotungamirira kurufu "Kutukwa" kwezvivi zvedu hakuna kugadziriswa? ivo” uye muchawira zvirokwazvo mukutongwa kukuru kwezuva rokupedzisira.” Kutukwa “rufu pamusoro porufu” - ona Judhasi 1:12. Izvi zvinotyisa zvikuru.

Nzira yekutiza kutongwa kweramangwana...?

Ishe Jesu vakati: “Kana munhu akanzwa mashoko angu akasaachengeta, ini handimutongi ini. Handina kuuya kuzotonga nyika, asi kuzoponesa nyika. uchamutonga.” Mharidzo yaakaparidza ndiyo ichamutonga nezuva rokupedzisira, Johane 12:47-48.

Hymn: Mangwanani

Zvokudya zvinotakurwa kubva kudenga zvichibva kure uye zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakafanira kuti upenyu hwedu hwomudzimu hupfume! Ameni. [Mutemo waMosesi] - Mitemo inonyatsoratidza kuti vaJudha vanofanira kutevedzera

Mwari akazivisa mutemo paGomo reSinai uye akaupa kurudzi rwaIsraeri Mutemo wepanyika unonziwo Mutemo waMosesi. Kusanganisira Mitemo ineGumi, mitemo, mirau, hurongwa hwetabhenakeri, mirau yezvibayiro, mitambo, zvivezwa zvemwedzi, maSabata, makore... zvichingodaro. Pane 613 zvinyorwa zvakazara! --Tarisa kuna Eksodo 20:1-17, Revhitiko, Dhuteronomi.

【Murayiro wangu pachangu】-Murayiro wavaHedheni

Kana vaHedheni vasina murayiro vachiita zvinhu zvomurayiro maererano namasikirwo avo, kunyange vasina murayiro. Iwe uri mutemo wako . Izvi zvinoratidza kuti basa romutemo rakatemerwa mumwoyo yavo, uye pfungwa yavo yezvakanaka nezvakaipa inopupurira. , uye pfungwa dzavo dzinokwikwidzana, zvakanaka kana kuti zvakaipa. ) pazuva iro Mwari paachatonga zvakavanzika zvavanhu kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, maererano neevhangeri yangu. — VaRoma 2:14-16 . (Zvinogona kuonekwa kuti pfungwa dzezvakanaka nezvakaipa dzakatemerwa mupfungwa dzeVemamwe Marudzi, ndiko kuti, mutemo waAdhamu unoonekwa sewakarurama kana kuti wakaipa. Hana inopomera munhu wose nezvezvakanaka nezvakaipa, zvakanaka nezvakaipa, izvo zviri zvakanyorwa muhana dzavaHedheni.

【Murayiro waKristu】 Murairo waKristu rudo here?

Takuriranai mitoro yenyu, uye saizvozvo muchazadzisa murayiro waKristu. --Wedzero chitsauko 6 ndima 2
Nekuti murairo wose wakaputirwa pamutsara unoti: Ida umwe wako sezvaunozvida iwe. --Wedzero chitsauko 5 ndima 14
Mwari anotida, uye tinozviziva uye tinozvitenda. Mwari rudo, ani naani anogara murudo anogara muna Mwari, uye Mwari maari. — 1 Johani 4:16

(Cherechedza: Murayiro waAdhamu - murayiro waMozisi - murayiro wehana, iwo murayiro wavaHedheni, ndiwo murayiro wemirau yenyama panyika; murayiro waKristu rudo! Kuda muvakidzani wako sezvaunozvida iwe kunopfuura mitemo yose yenyika. )

[Chinangwa chekugadza mitemo] ?-Ratidza utsvene hwaMwari, kururamisira, rudo, tsitsi nenyasha!

【Basa reMutemo】

(1) Rongedza vanhu nezvechivi

Naizvozvo, hakuna nyama inganzi yakarurama pamberi paMwari nokuchengeta murayiro, nokuti murayiro unopa vanhu chivi. — VaRoma 3:20

(2) wedzera kudarika

Murairo wakawedzerwa kuti kudarika kuwande; asi zvivi pazvakawanda, nyasha dzakawanda nokupfuvurisa. —VaRoma 5:20

(3) Kuvharira munhu wose muchivi nokumuchengeta

Asi Bhaibheri rakasunga vanhu vose muchivi… Dzidziso yoruponeso nokutenda isati yasvika, taichengetwa pasi pomurayiro kusvikira pakuzarurwa kwokutenda mune ramangwana. --Chitsauko chekuwedzera 3 ndima 22-23

(4) misa muromo wevanhu vose

Tinoziva kuti zvinhu zvose zviri mumurayiro zvinotaurirwa avo vari pasi pomurayiro, kuti miromo yose idzivirwe, uye kuti nyika yose ive nemhosva pamberi paMwari. —VaRoma 3:19

(5) Chengeta munhu wose mukusateerera

Makanga musingateereri Mwari, asi zvino magamuchira ngoni nokuda kwokusateerera kwavo. …Nokuti Mwari wakaisa vanhu vose pakusateerera kwavo, kuti avanzwire ngoni vose. —VaRoma 11:30, 32

(6) Mutemo mudzidzisi wedu

Nenzira iyi, murayiro ndiwo muperekedzi wedu, unotitungamirira kuna Kristu kuti tigoruramiswa nokutenda. Asi zvino nheyo yoruponeso nokutenda yasvika, hatisisiri pasi poruoko rwaTenzi. --Chitsauko chekuwedzera 3 ndima 24-25

(7) kuti maropafadzo akavimbiswa apiwe avo vanotenda

Asi Bhaibheri rinosunga vanhu vose muchivi, kuti zvikomborero zvakavimbiswa kubudikidza nokutenda muna Jesu Kristu zvipiwe avo vanotenda. --VaGaratia chitsauko 3 ndima 22

Maari makaiswa chisimbiso neMweya Mutsvene wechipikirwa, pamakatendawo muna Kristu pamakanzwa shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri roruponeso rwenyu. Uyu Mweya Mutsvene rubatso (rugwaro rwekutanga: nhaka) yenhaka yedu kusvikira vanhu vaMwari (chinyorwa chepakutanga: nhaka) vadzikinurwa kuti mbiri yake irumbidzwe. --Onai VaEfeso 1:13-14 naJohani 3:16.

horaiti! Nhasi ndinoda kugoverana ruwadzano nemi mose muri pano. Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, norudo rwaMwari, nokufemerwa noMweya Mutsvene ngazvive nemi mose! Ameni

articles.title: Mukadzi Evha anofananidzira kereke
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kumhuri yangu inodiwa, hama nehanzvadzi! Ameni.

Ngativhure maBhaibheri edu kuna VaEfeso 5:30-32 toaverenga pamwe chete: Nokuti isu tiri mitezo yomuviri wake (mimwe mipumburu yekare inoti: mapfupa ake nenyama yake).

Nokuda kwaizvozvi, murume achasiya baba namai vake uye asanganiswe nomukadzi wake, uye vaviri ava vachava nyama imwe. Chakavanzika ichi chikuru, asi ndinotaura zvaKristu nekereke .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovana " Mukadzi Evha anofananidzira kereke 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vatsvene Vokudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! " mukadzi akanaka "Chechi inotumira vashandi → neshoko rechokwadi rakanyorwa uye rakataurwa nemaoko avo, iro ndiro vhangeri roruponeso rwedu. Ameni! Chingwa chinounzwa kubva kure kudenga kuti chigotipa isu munguva yakafanira yehupenyu hwedu hwemweya. Ameni!

Namata kuti Ishe Jesu varambe vachivhenekera meso edu emweya uye nekuvhura pfungwa dzedu kuti tinzwisise Bhaibheri kuti tigone kunzwa uye kuona chokwadi chemweya. Hwisisa kuti mukadzi Evha anofananidzira kereke .

Minyengetero iri pamusoro, mikumbiro, kureverera, kutenda, nemaropafadzo! Ndinokumbira izvi muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni.

【1】Adhamu anofananidzira Kristu

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri pana Genesisi 2:4-8 toaverenga pamwe chete → Mavambo edenga nenyika paakasika denga nenyika, kwakanga kusina uswa uye miriwo yakanga ichigere kumera, nokuti Jehovha Mwari akanga asati akura, mvura inonaya panyika, uye hakuna munhu anoirima, asi mhute inosimuka ichibva pasi yonyorovesa nyika. Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mumhino dzake mweya woupenyu, akava mweya mupenyu; zita rake rainzi Adhamu. Jehovha Mwari akasima munda muEdheni kumabvazuva uye akaisamo munhu waakasika.

[Ona]: Mavambo okusika denga nenyika nezuva rechitanhatu raJesu, Mwari akasika munhu nomufananidzo wake. Ona Genesisi 1:27 . Jehovha Mwari akaumba munhu neguruva revhu, akafuridzira mumhino dzake mweya woupenyu, akava mweya mupenyu; zita rake rainzi Adhamu. (Pano “mweya” ungava “nyama”)
Adhamu ndiye preimage →Inofananidzira Kristu, uye Adhamu wekupedzisira ndiye Kuda chaiko →Inoreva Kristu! Ameni. Tarisa kuna VaRoma 5:14 uye 1 VaKorinte 15:44-45 .

【2】Mukadzi Evha anofananidzira kereke

Genesisi 2 Chitsauko 18-24 Jehovha Mwari akati, "Hazvina kunaka kuti munhu agare ari oga. Ndichamuitira mubatsiri, Jehovha akaita kuti hope huru dzivate pamusoro pake, akavata." hope “Mukuona kwevanhu, zvinoreva “rufu”; mumaziso aMwari, zvinoreva kurara! Somuenzaniso, Jesu muTestamende Itsva akati, Razaro wangu akavata, zvinoreva kuti Razaro akafa. Jehovha akaita kuti Adhamu arare. "akarara", akabatwa nehope huru. hope ". Inofananidzira Adhamu wekupedzisira weTestamente Itsva, "Jesu," akarovererwa uye akafira zvivi zvedu, "akarara" uye akavigwa muguva; ipapo imwe yembabvu dzake yakabviswa uye nyama yakavharwa. Ishe Mwari Shandisai munhu iyeye” Adhamu "Mbabvu dzakatorwa pamuviri dzakaita imwe" mukadzi "," mukadzi "" mufananidzo we "mwenga", kureva, Chechi yaJesu Kristu - "mwenga" muna Zvakazarurwa Chitsauko 19, ndima 7. "mbabvu iyo Jehovha Mwari akatora kubva kuna Adhamu kuti asike" "mukadzi" i mufananidzo weTestamente Itsva Jesu kuburikidza Iye pachake Muviri "unokonzera" " Newcomer “Ikereke, kereke yemweya. Ameni! Unonyatsonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 2 Chitsauko 15 naJohani Chitsauko 2 Ndima 19-21 “Jesu akaita muviri wake temberi.

Genesi 2:23-24 Murume “Adhamu” akati, “Uyu ipfupa ramapfupa angu nenyama yenyama yangu “Munhu mutsva” muviri waKristu, uye mumwe nomumwe wedu inhengo yemapfupa aKristu nenyama yenyama yake , ndima 27 .

Naizvozvo murume uchasiya baba namai vake, anamatire mukadzi wake, uye vaviri vachava nyama imwe. Inofananidzira kuti “munhu mutsva” akaberekwa naMwari achasiya munhu wekare waAdhama uyo akaberekwa nenyama yavabereki vake, uye achabatanidzwa nomudzimai wake, kana kuti “mwenga, mwenga, kereke” yaKristu, inova muviri waJesu Kristu Iwe naKristu muchava muviri mumwe host kereke yajesu kristu Ameni! Saka, unonzwisisa here? Tarisa kuna VaEfeso 5:30-32. Naizvozvo, “mukadzi Evha” muTesitamende yekare anomiririra “Kereke yechiKristu” muTestamente Itsva! Ameni.

articles.title: Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu (1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Rugare kuhama dzangu dzose dzinodiwa! Ameni.

Ngativhurei [Bhaibheri] kuna VaEfeso 1:23, tivhure toverenga pamwe chete: Kereke muviri wake, wakazadzwa naiye anozadza zvose mune zvose.

naVaKorose 1:18 Ndiyewo musoro womuviri wekereke. Ndiye wokutanga, ndiye wokutanga kumuka kuvakafa, kuti ave mukuru pazvinhu zvose .

Nhasi tichadzidza, kuyanana, uye kugovera "Ishe" kereke muna Jesu Kristu 》Munamato: Vanodikanwa Abba, Baba Vekudenga, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, tinokutendai kuti Mweya Mutsvene anesu nguva dzose! Ameni. Ndinokutendai Ishe! “Mukadzi Akanaka” munaShe Jesu chechi Tumirai vashandi, vanonyora kuburikidza nemaoko avo uye vanotaura shoko rechokwadi, vhangeri reruponeso rwedu. Zvokudya zvinopiwa kwatiri panguva yakakodzera kuti upenyu hwedu huwedzere. Ameni! Ishe Jesu ngaarambe achivhenekera meso emweya yedu nekuzarura pfungwa dzedu kuti tione nekunzwa chokwadi chemweya uye nekunzwisisa mashoko emweya e[Bhaibheri]! Nzwisisa kuti “mukadzi, mwenga, mukadzi, mwenga, mukadzi akanaka” anofananidzira [kereke] kereke munaShe Jesu Kristu! Ameni . [Chechi] muviri waJesu Kristu, uye isu tiri nhengo dzake. Ameni! Minamato, kutenda, uye makomborero kune zviri pamusoro! Muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu! Ameni

【1】Chechi yaIshe Jesu Kristu

Chechi muna Ishe Jesu Kristu:

Inogonawo kunzi « kereke yajesu kristu »

Chechi yaJesu Kristu:

Jesu Kristu ndiye dombo guru repakona, achivaka panheyo dzevaapositori nevaporofita. Ameni!

tarisa ku: 1 VaTesaronika 1:1 Pauro, Sirasi naTimoti vakanyorera kereke yaiva muTesaronika muna Mwari Baba naShe Jesu Kristu. Nyasha norugare ngazvive zvenyu! uye VaEfeso 2:19-22

Kereke muviri wake

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri uye tiverenge VaEfeso 1:23 pamwe chete: Kereke muviri wake, kuzara kwaiye anozadza zvose mune zvose.

VaKorose 1:18 Ndiyewo musoro womuviri wekereke. Ndiye wokutanga, ndiye wokutanga kumuka kuvakafa, kuti ave mukuru pazvinhu zvose.

[Cherechedza:] Nekuongorora zvinyorwa zvemagwaro zviri pamusoro, tinogona kuona [ chechi ] muviri waJesu Kristu, wakazadzwa naiye anozadza zvose mune zvose. Ameni! Ndiye Shoko, Mavambo, uye Kumuka kubva kuvakafa kuenda mumuviri weKereke. Maererano nesimba guru raakashandisa mumuviri waKristu, akamumutsa kubva kuvakafa akamumutsa patsva. mutsva "-Verenga VaEfeso 2:15 "Ita iwe uri woga" mutsva "Uye kumuka kubva kuvakafa, kuberekwa patsva" isu "-Verenga 1 Petro 1: 3. Muna Kristu" munhu wose "Vose vachamutswa zvakare - ona 1 VaKorinte 15: 22. Pano" Vatsva, isu, munhu wese "Vose vanonongedzera ku[ chechi ] Muviri waJesu Kristu pachake wakataura izvozvo, nokuti tiri nhengo dzomuviri! Ameni. Saka, unonzwisisa!

[2] Chechi yakavakirwa padombo remweya raKristu

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri Mateo 16:18 uye ndinoti kwauri, ndiwe Petro, uye paruware urwu ndichavaka kereke yangu; Akanwawo mvura yemweya semuna 1 VaKorinte 10:4. Chavainwa chaibva kune zvakavatevera Dombo romweya; .

[Cherechedza:] Kupfurikidza nokunzvera magwaro ari pamusoro apa, tinonyora kuti Ishe Jesu akati kuna Petro: “Ndichatora angu [ chechi ] yakavakwa padombo iri, rock "zvinoreva [ dombo remweya ], Ndizvo" rock "NdiKristu." rock “Iriwo dimikira rokuti “ibwe benyu nedombo rekona”!Jehovha ibwe benyu.Kunyange akarambwa navanhu, akasarudzwa uye anokosha naMwari.Paunouya kuna Jehovha unoita somupenyuwo. ibwe, riri kuvakwa Imba yomudzimu inobatira somupristi mutsvene, anopira zvibayiro zvomudzimu zvinogamuchirika kuna Mwari kupfurikidza naJesu Kristu Unonyatsonzwisisa here?

【3】Tiri nhengo dzekereke

Ngatidzidzei Bhaibheri, VaEfeso 5:30-32. Nokuti tiri mitezo yomuviri wake (Mimwe mipumburu yekare inowedzera: Just Ndiwo mapfupa ake nenyama yake ) Nokuda kwaizvozvi, murume achasiya baba namai vake uye asanganiswe nomukadzi wake, uye vaviri ava vachava nyama imwe. Chakavanzika ichi chikuru, asi ndinotaura zvaKristu nekereke. Zvisinei, mumwe nomumwe wenyu ngaade mukadzi wake sezvaanozviita. Mudzimai anofanirawo kuremekedza murume wake.

［ Cherechedza: 】Ndakadzidza magwaro ari pamusoro kuti ndinyore kuti tinogashira tsitsi nerudo rukuru rwaMwari Baba! Kuzvarwa patsva nekumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa” isu "zvinoreva [chechi] , chechi Ehe Muviri waKristu isu tiri mitezo yake ! Sokutaura kwakaita Ishe Jesu: “Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musingadyi nyama yoMwanakomana woMunhu nokunwa ropa roMwanakomana woMunhu, hamuna upenyu mamuri. Ani naani anodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu rine upenyu husingaperi.” , Ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rokupedzisira. Nyama yangu ndicho chokudya, uye ropa rangu chinwiwa. Unodya nyama yangu nokunwa ropa rangu, unogara mandiri, neni maari Johane 6. Chitsauko 53-56. Kana tichidya nokunwa nyama neropa raShe, tine muviri noupenyu hwaJesu Kristu matiri, naizvozvo tiri mitezo yomuviri wake! pfupa remapfupa ake nenyama yenyama yake. Ameni.

Munhu wedu akaberekwa patsva akabatanidzwa nemuviri waKristu kuti ave muviri mumwe! Iwo muviri waJesu Kristu, wakaitwa mweya mumwe! Mweya waAbha, Baba Vokudenga, Mweya waIshe Jesu, Mweya Mutsvene! Kwete “mudzimu” waAdhamu. Saka, unonzwisisa zvakajeka here?

Isu takazvarwa naMwari" mutsva “Ndiyo mitezo yomuviri wake, iyo imwe neimwe ine hushumiri hwayo, kuvaka muviri waKristu, kusvikira tose tasvika pakubatana kwokutenda nokuziva Mwanakomana waMwari, uye takura muhurume, tichizadzisa Shoko raMwari pazvinhu zvose, rinokura maari Musoro, Kristu, uyo kubudikidza naye muviri wose wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete uye wakabatanidzwa pamwe chete uye uchibatanidzwa pamwe chete, uye mutezo wose uchishumirana maererano nebasa raKristu. nhengo imwe neimwe, inoita kuti muviri ukure uye uzvivake murudo.” “Muzinda womudzimu”, “temberi”, “nzvimbo yokugara yoMweya Mutsvene”!
